42018006	Awa ka Maliki na i gɛa gbɔnhu, "A oo nhɛɛndɛ nana koto goto kɔhɔ mɔɔ na i kɛi.
42018007	Chaanngi, ee Ngebɔ aigɔ gɔhɔ maa nhiɛ ɔ ngi ndaa i fanwa natiini taa ɔɔ ala nwa aa foo ka kpɔkɔ kpɔ mba nhanwa? Ee ɔɔ nwaa gbɛndɛɛnaa aa kpɔndaa tuaa?
42018008	Ngi kɛ aa wuee, ɔɔ gɔhɔnaa tuɛɛ ti leenjaa na nhanwa awa ɔɔ pelenaa lɛmbi. Kɛlɛ ee Nuu na Lou na ɔɔ laanɛɛ nwaaia ngelou i nhu nhuna ɔɔ ba?"
42018009	Ka Yisɔsi i njia ɔha indinɛi gɛa aa ningaa i ti hagba la ɔ na ti gbekpenjaa na nhu awa tai mbɛɛ gɛ nuua.
42018010	"Ndakpangaa feengaa lɔ ti liiɔ Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau laaminɛ nwa. Ngila kee na Falesi nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala awa lagbiti na kula gula ɔhɛ mɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala.
42018011	"Ka Falesi nwɔɔ na i longa kakanwaa kɛɛ laaminɛa aa gbɔha, 'Ngi fiɛ guai bi nwa, Ngebɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngai gɔɔlini, teenjaa gbahamba nwɔɔ aile aa nge, inaile ndo sia mɔɔ aile aa nge ɛɛ ningaa lagbitia. Ngi fiɛ guai bi nwa gbɛnhaile ngai beleni ɛɛ kula gula ɔhɛ mɔɔ nana i mɛɛ.
42018012	K`angi chu hou mi guu fee fanwa mi guu ɔfɛla na goonhu, awa k`angi ni nii na gua bɛɛ kɔɛmaa ila na kualaa kɔɛmaa puu na.'
42018013	"Kɛlɛ ka kula gula ɔhɛ mɔɔ na i longa gɔha nwaa awa ai au lɛi bɛnhɛ aliyana, kɛlɛ kɛɛ gili nhu gbanhia awa kɛɛ gɛa, 'Ngebɔ, nwaaua nya nwa, nhanda nyɔu nwɔɔ nwɛ aa nge!'
42018014	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Ngi kɛ aa wuee, kula gula ɔhɛ mɔɔ na kɛɛ ya ngi bɛlɛu ala lee ngɔɔ Ngebɔ le. Kɛlɛ Falesi nwɔɔ na aile. Gbaa nuu o nuu nana aa gbɔha lɛ nga, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala yeia mbu, awa nuu o nuu nana aa gbɔha na nwaa yei Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala lɛa nga."
42018015	Ka ningaa lɛingaa ti baa baa aa ndengaa golo goloa Yisɔsi le kangaa i loko bɛɛ bɛɛ tuaa. Nhuna kalandengaa i ti naa lɔi kati ningaa i mbɛndia aa pelendaa,
42018016	kɛlɛ ka Yisɔsi i uinga ndengaa i mba ala le awa kɛɛ gɛa, "Ndengaa i ti baa nya le awa awɛɛ ti bɛndi aa paalaa, gbɛnhaile tua indinɛi bonda tuɛɛ ti bo mɛɛ aa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la.
42018017	A indinɛi laa nɛɛnwaa! Nuu o nuu nana ai kuunni Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na nwa ɛɛ ndou golo, aigɔ ɔa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la."
42018018	Ka Yuu u mɔɔ i Yisɔsi nwɔɔlinga, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ gbekpe, gbɛɛ ngɔɔ pele kangaa ngi wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na hɔlɔ?"
42018019	Ka Yisɔsi i ala nwɔɔlinga, "Gbɔɔ bi uini nyaa aa Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ gbekpe? Nuu ai na nana kpekpe ngɔ k`a Ngebɔ gbo.
42018020	Bi sɔ na gɔɔnaa. 'Bɛɛ ndo sia. Bɛɛ nuu baa nhanda gbaai mba nhanwa. Bɛɛ nwɔa bele. Bɛɛ ndɛɛ gɔɔla nuua. Mbɛɛ gɛa bi kɛɛgɛ naa ka bi nje na.' "
42018021	Ka ndakpa na i kpɛɛmbonga, "Kualaama tɔ nya golo ɔ na nhuɔ, nyaa sɔ ngindinɛi hou ngɔɔ bɛɛ."
42018022	Nhuna Yisɔsi i indinɛi nwɛini kɛɛ gɛa ala nwa, "Nhanda ila tɔ na nana pelendaa i bi eya nana bai lɛ peleni. Lia bi nana nwaa sia i bi eya bɛɛ awa bi maa nahoo na he mbaa mbelaa i mbɛ, awa bɔɔ kpatɛyaa hɔlɔa aliyana. Awa bi ba ba bi nda nyaa."
42018023	Kɛlɛ nhuna ndakpa na i indinɛi nwɛini, ka ala nɛɛnwaa nyaaia kpɔ, gbɛnhaile ala gbatɛ ɔɔ kpɔ.
42018024	Nhuna Yisɔsi i tɔi aa kɛɛlaa ndakpa na nɛɛnwaa oo nyaaia, kɛɛ gɛa, "Kpɛndɛ ngɔe kpatɛ belaa ɔalaa nhanwa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la!
42018025	Kpɛndɛ ngɔ nhaa kpatɛ nwɔɔ ɔalaa nhanwa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la tee ngɔ bɛnhɛ nika ɔalaa nhanwa aa mɛɛnde ngou nhu bele."
42018026	Ningaa i natiini ti indinɛi nwɛini kati mɔɔli pelenga, "K`a ele nwɛɛ tɔ ɔɔ ndendouyaa hɔlɔ?"
42018027	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga, "Nana nuu gbɔha aa gɛ ai bele, Ngebɔ le aa belenaa na."
42018028	Nhu nwɛɛ Pita i gɛi, "Kpeendɛ! Noo nuee na loo looa ndandaa nhanwa biaa."
42018029	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Aaha, awa ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, nuu o nuu nana aa ngi bɛlɛ bɛlɛ na lo, inaile ngi nyanha, inaile ngi ndege nhiindengaa, inaile ngi ungaa, inaile ngi lengaa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na laa nhanwa,
42018030	ɔɔ nhai hɔlɔa kpinhi ɔ yamana indinɛi nhu, awa ɔɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na hɔlɔa yamana lagbiti nhu."
42018031	Ka Yisɔsi i ya kakanwaa aa kalandengaa puungaa i tee manhu fee na kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "A oo nhɛɛna! Yɛlusalɛmu sia nwɛ mi nhu mɛɛna nana bɛɛ Ngebɔ letua i ti kɛi Nuu na Lou na nhanwa naa nwɛɛ ɔɔ bele na.
42018032	Tɔɔ ala gɔannaa Kpitia i ma, natiini tɔɔ ala bele ngaa ngɛɛ ngɛɛ mɔɔ, ti ala ɛi, awa ti yaaiyaai bii ala nwa.
42018033	Tɔɔ ala chuuganaa awa tɔɔ ala baaa, kɛlɛ mi guu chawa ngaa lee, Ngebɔ ɔɔ huua alau kualaa haa na nhu."
42018034	Kɛlɛ nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ hali i ila kelembe kalandengaa i tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔi mba. Njia indinɛi goonhu na ndɔɔgu ngɔɔ tuaa, awa tai nana gɔɔni Yisɔsi ee maa yia gɛ.
42018035	Nhuna i gbɛɛi Yɛliko laa waa na nhu gbɛlaa, kɛɛ titi nwɔɔ nwaaia nana ee heii pele na gaka kɛɛ fɛi pele.
42018036	Titi nwɔɔ indinɛi i faka na oo na nwɛini ee lee, kɛɛ mɔɔli pelenga "Gbɛɛ nwɛ aa indinɛi?"
42018037	Kati gɛa ala nwa, "Yisɔsi Naasalɛti nwɔɔ na ala nwɛ aa lee."
42018038	Kɛɛ labia, "Yisɔsi Leebili mi bemba na Lou na aa biee, nwaaua nya nwa!"
42018039	Ningaa i tee gulɔɔ na sia na nhu kati gbaaia awa kati gɛa ma i londo. Kɛlɛ nhu nwɛɛ bɛnhɛ ee ndabi na lɛ nga ɛgɛ, "Leebili Lou na, nwaaua nya nwa!"
42018040	Faa nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i loni kɛɛ gɛa, "A baa aa ala!" Awa kati baa aa titi nwɔɔ na ala le. Nhuna titi nwɔɔ na i gbɛɛi Yisɔsi gbɛlaa, ka Yisɔsi i ala nwɔɔlinga,
42018041	"Gbɛɛ bi lo ngɔ la ngi pele biɛɛ?" Ka titi nwɔɔ na i gɛa, "Nya lo ngɔ la kangaa ngi nhanda lɔ boma."
42018042	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Awa nhanda lɔaɛ! Bi laanɛɛ na oo bi gɛndɛa."
42018043	Nhu gutu ɔ na siina kɛɛ nhanda lɔa boma, awa kɛɛ ndaa Yisɔsia aa fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa. Nhuna faka na i indinɛi naa lɔi, tua bɛɛ kati Ngebɔ bihɛa.
42019001	Ka Yisɔsi i ya Yɛliko laa waa na nhu awa tee mɛɛ ee lee.
42019002	Awa ndakpa ee naanɔɔ ngi laaɔ aa Saakiɔsi. Kula gula ɔhɛ manha mɛɔ aa ala awa ala gbatɛ ɔɔ.
42019003	Ndakpa indinɛi ee lapia aa Yisɔsi lɔndaa kangaa i Yisɔsi gɔɔ, kɛlɛ ala golo ɔɔ awa ala gutu ɔɔ awa ai Yisɔsi lɔi faka na nhanwa ee na.
42019004	Faa nwɛɛ i loni gulɔɔ aa pinhɛ faka naa kɛɛ lɛa ngulu nhu nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ kpɔɔn ngulu kangaa i Yisɔsi lɔ, gbɛnhaile maa bele na nwɛɔ Yisɔsi ee li la.
42019005	Nhuna Yisɔsi i hitii maa nhinde na siina, kɛɛ ngee na nhu gbeenga awa kɛɛ gɛa Saakiɔsi nwa, "Hitɛa mbu lɛmbi Saakiɔsi, gbɛnhaile bi bɛlɛ nau naa nwɛɛ ngɔɔ yigiyaa na haai."
42019006	Ka Saakiɔsi i hitɛa mbu kati ya ngi bɛlɛ nau awa kɛɛ Yisɔsi binjanga aa koonhu nɛɛ bombou mbaa.
42019007	Ningaa i bɛɛ ti nhanda indinɛi naa lɔi kati tɔɔlonga aa kɔɔnnhu yia. "Ndakpa indinɛi oo ya aa yigiyaa nhanda nyɔu nwɔɔ bɛlɛu."
42019008	Ka Saakiɔsi i huua i longa kɛɛ gɛa Maliki na nwa, "Oo nhɛɛndɛ Maliki! Ni gɛin na ngɔɔ kɔɛa liiyaa nhu, ngi ng`i gɛlɛ na ɔa ɔa mbaa mbelaa i ngeya, awa ina ngoo nhai houaɔ nuu eya aa kalagalasuma, ngɔɔ mbɛɛlaa boma maa nwɔɔ na nwa nhaa heinwaa i gɛ naai."
42019009	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Ngebɔ lendouyaa na oo ɔaa haai bi bɛlɛ indinɛiu, gbɛnhaile ndakpa indinɛi, mi bemba na Eebilahamu lou nwɛɔ gbɔnhu aa ala.
42019010	Gbaa Nuu na Lou na i baia aa natiini ngɔɛ ɔɛ ti u ndo ɔ na nhu awa ka ndendouyaa hendaa nhanwa tuɛɛ."
42019011	Nhuna ningaa i tee oo nhɛɛ indinɛi nwa, ka Yisɔsi i ngi yɛpɛ na longa nda aa njia ɔha gɛndaa. Yɛlusalɛmu gbɛlaa na nwɛ ee na, awa ee naanɔɔ ti nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na i baa paa nwa.
42019012	Faa nwɛɛ i gɛi, "Ndakpa lɔ ee naɔ nana tomaa nwɔɔ aa alaɔ, ala nwɛɔ ee li pɔlɔgɔɔ lagbiti nhu puou kangaa ti ala bele ngaa manha mbaa, ala na aa lee nga, kɛɛ kukunga ma aa ala bɛɛlalaa ala le taa nhu.
42019013	Yeingaa i sia guai, kɛɛ uinga ngi eyaalakpangaa puungaa i mba kɛɛ mabɔɔn nwɔɛ ngɔa ɔaa ti eya i ila ila awa kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, 'A loa aa fee gɔ aa indinɛi nhaa ngi ba.'
42019014	Kɛlɛ ngi bɔlɔgɔɔ nhu belaa i tolo ɔɔ aa ala, faa nwɛɛɔ ti to mbelaa loni kangaa ti nda alaa ti kɛ aa tuee tɛɛ, 'Nai loni la ndakpa indinɛi i bele ngaa ni nwanha mbaa.'
42019015	"Kati ndakpa na belenga aa manha mbaa mɛɛ i lii na awa kɛɛ bɛɛlaa. Nhu gutu ɔ na siina kɛɛ uinga ngi eyaalakpangaa i mba, kangaa i nana gɔɔ ti loi aa hɔlɔ ala boma.
42019016	Ka pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na i baa i gɛa, 'Kenɛi, ngoo mabɔɔn nwɔɛ puu hɔlɔa kualaa i ila na nhu bi ngɔai ngeya.'
42019017	Kɛɛ gɛa ma, 'Bi pelenia maa nhiɛ ɔ. Ngeyaalakpandou gbekpe mɛɛ aa biee! Kina bi lee ngɔ nhanda golo golo nhu, ngɔɔ pelenaa bi gɛ taa waa waa puu manhu.'
42019018	Ka ngeyaalakpandou na fee na i baa i gɛa ala nwa, 'Kenɛi, ngoo mabɔɔn nwɔɛ lɔɔu hɔlɔa kualaa i ila na nhu bi ngɔai ngeya.'
42019019	Indinɛi ala kɛɛ gɛa ala nwa, 'Ngɔɔ pelenaa bi gɛ taa waa waa lɔɔu manhu.'
42019020	"Ka ngeyaalakpandou lagbiti na i baa kɛɛ gɛa ala nwa, 'Kenɛi, bi nwabɔɔn nwɔɛ na houa ngeya. Kangi tibia ngeyaanɛgɛlɛa awa kangi makɛa.
42019021	Ndua nwɛɛ ngi luai biaa, gbɛnhaile bia bi nhanda gbɛndɛ ngɔ. Baa nana gbaunaa bi bo ngaile, awa baa nana leea bai fainni.'
42019022	Kɛɛ gɛa ala nwa, 'Bia ngeyaalakpandou nyɔu nyɔu indinɛi aa biee! Bi yɛpɛ na bi kɛi ala nwɛ ngɔɔ bi nyaai la! Bi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nya nhanda gbɛndɛ ngɔ, k`angi nana gbau nya bo ngaile, awa k`angi nana lee ngai fainni.
42019023	Chaanngi nhu, gbɔɔ bai ni nahoo na lɛi nahoo gbugu na la? Gbaa ngi ba hɔlɔa na boma tii nda ma o nhuna ngi ba bɛɛla,'
42019024	"Awa nhu nwɛɛ i gɛi natiini ma tee na lo toni, 'A mabɔɔn nwɔɛ na houa ala eya wu ngɔa ngeyaalakpandou na eya nana mabɔɔn nwɔɛ puu na i ngeya.'
42019025	Kɛlɛ kati gɛa ala nwa, 'Kenɛi, mabɔɔn nwɔɛ puu tɔ ala eya tɔ!'
42019026	Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, ngi kɛ aa wuee, 'Nuu o nuu nana nhai i ngeya tɔɔ maalonaa ngeya. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana nhai ai ngeya, hali kolo na aa gɛ ngeya tɔɔ kuaa ngeya.
42019027	Chaanngi nhu, natiini fanwa nya haaleengaa i ngaa tuee aa kɛɛlaa kpala ngaile tuaaɔ kangaa ngi bele ngaa ti nwanha mbaa, a baa bei aa tuee wu ti baa nya au bele nhu!' "
42019028	Yisɔsi i indinɛi gɛia awa kɛɛ ya Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu tuaa.
42019029	Nhu gutu ɔ na i gbɛɛi Bɛtifagi laa na nhu gbɛlaa ka Bɛtani laa na nhu gbɛlaa mɛɛ Oliibi Yie nau, kɛɛ kalandengaa feengaa longa gulɔɔ
42019030	aa ngoo indinɛi, "A lia taa na nhu i wu gulɔɔ, waa hiti na, wɔɔ bapu lou nwaaia ngili ngɔ, nana nuu ai lɛ hei lɛɔ kɔmaa. A fuona wu ba aa ala bei.
42019031	Ina nuu aa wu nwɔɔli ngaa kɛɛlaa gbɔɔ waa bapu lou indinɛi huo, a kɛa aa ala aa kɛɛlaa Maliki na lo ngɔ la."
42019032	Kati ya awa kati gbɛ o gbɛ na nwaaia ɛɛ gbo Yisɔsi i kɛi aa tuee.
42019033	Nhuna tee bapu lou na huo, ka maa belaa i ti ti nwɔɔlinga, "Gbɔɔ waa bapu lou na huo?"
42019034	Ka kalandengaa i ti gɛa ti nwa, "Kpala tɔ Maliki naa."
42019035	Awa kati ya aa bapu lou na Yisɔsi le. Kati ti lonwa na beembeenga bapu lou na nwa, awa ka Yisɔsi i heia ma.
42019036	Awa nhuna Yisɔsi ee heii bapu lou na nwa ee li, ka ningaa i ti ti lonwa ndonwa na laa laa pele na nhu.
42019037	Nhuna i gbɛɛi Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu gbɛlaa, nhinde na mɛɛ pele na yei ɔ na Oliibi Yie naa, ala bou belaa gbinhi gbinhia i kati tɔɔlonga aa fiɛ guandaa Ngebɔ nwa tii ala bihɛndaa o ndabi labi nhu, nhanda nwaa luu lua na nhanwa bɛɛ ti tɔi i peleni.
42019038	"Nduba i gɛa manha mbaa na nwa nana aa ba aa Maliki na laa na! Maa lɛi i gɛ aliyana, awa mbɛɛ gɛ Ngebɔa!"
42019039	Awa nhu nwɛɛ Falesiisia i lɛingaa i tee na faka na nhu ti yɛpɛi Yisɔsi le. Kati gɛa, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, kɛa aa bi galandengaa i kangaa ti londo!"
42019040	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga, "Ngi kɛ aa wuee, ina taa londo, kɔtu na gbɔha na ɔɔ labi labia."
42019041	Kɛɛ gbɛɛa taa na nhu gbɛlaa fɔɔ, awa i taa na nhu lɔi, kɛɛ ɔɔa,
42019042	ɛgɛ, "Ina wu nana gɔɔnaa haai kpala ngi ningaaa maa lɛi nhanwa! Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu waigɔ tɔ!
42019043	Lɔgɔ na ɔɔ baa nhuna wu haaleengaa i tɔɔ wu goli koli ngaa kɔɔ gbangba ti wu nwaa goi nhu aa pele o pele.
42019044	Tɔɔ wu nyaaia bɛɛ ka ningaa i tɔɔ gɛ wu gbangba na nhu. Hali kɔtu i ila kele aigɔ lo laai ngi laanwaa, gbɛnhaile wai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔi lɔgɔ naa Ngebɔ i bai ndendouyaa hendaa nhanwa wuɛɛ!"
42019045	Awa ka Yisɔsi i ya Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau kɛɛ tɔɔlonga aa ningaa i kpɛndaa, napangaa natiini tee fee gɔɔ gɔɔ na.
42019046	Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Kpaali ngɔ Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɛgɛ, 'Ni Bɛlɛ na tɔɔ uinaa mba aa laaminɛ bɛlɛ.' Kɛlɛ woo naa belenga aa yaanga nhu nwɔa belaa nhanwa!"
42019047	Foo o foo k`a Yisɔsi i ningaa nagɔli Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau. Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo, Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i ngoo, ka ningaa gulɔɔ belaa i kpala ngee naanɔɔ tuaa ti ala baa,
42019048	kɛlɛ tai pele lɔi taa pele nda, gbɛnhaile ningaa i bɛɛ k`ati oo nhɛɛ ala nwa. Kpala ngaile tuaa ti bɔɔla njia ila mba hali.
42020001	Foo ila ma nhuna Yisɔsi ee ningaa i nagɔli Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, awa kɛɛ ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛ aa tuee, Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo, Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i ngoo, ka mbaa waangaa i kati baa ala le
42020002	kati gɛa ala nwa, "Kɛa aa nuee, gbɛɛ fɔha nwɛ i bi eya nana aa pele baa nhanda indinɛi bele pele? Awa ele nwɛɛ i fɔha indinɛi ɔai bi eya?"
42020003	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga ti nwa, "Chaanngi nhu gbɛɛ ngi mɔɔli pii wuaa. A kɛa aa nge,
42020004	ee Ngebɔ ua na Yɔni ee pele ngaa ningaa i maa fɔha na siina ee Ngebɔ le mɛ i guai na, inaile ee ningaa gbɔhaa le mɛ?"
42020005	kati tɔɔlonga aa tonga pelendaa loganhu gɛnhi, " Ina maa gɛ 'Ngebɔ le mɛ', ɔɔ gɛa, 'Kɛlɛ gbɔɔ wai laanɛɛi aa Yɔni Ngebɔ Ua Bele Mɔɔ na?'
42020006	Kɛlɛ ina maa gɛ 'Kua ɔ ningaa gbɔhaa le,' faka indinɛi i bei bɛɛ ɔɔ fuulu biinaa mi nwa, gbɛnhaile ti nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Yɔni Ngebɔ letu nwɛɔ aa ala."
42020007	Awa ka ti Yisɔsi gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Nua nai kɔɔ."
42020008	Awa ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Nya bɛnhɛ gbɔnhu ngaigɔ kɛ aa wuee gbɛɛ fɔha nwɛ i nya eya ngaa nhanda indinɛi bele pele nda bɛɛ."
42020009	Ka Yisɔsi i yɛpɛa ningaa i ngee njia ɔha nhu. "Ndakpa lɔ i pɔpɔ ɔgɔ nhɛɛ laiɔ kɛɛ kpangba goia ma. Ka nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na i nhɛɛ na loa aa ningaa kangaa ti manhugbee, awa kɛɛ ya wolege nhu lɔgɔ nhu gɔha nhanwa.
42020010	Nhuna lɔgɔ na i hitii pɔpɔ ɔgɔ wa na gɔlindaa nhanwa, ka nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na i ngi eyaalakpandou longa ningaa i ngee natiini i nhɛɛ na loi aa tuee ngi nda nii na nhanwa. Kɛlɛ ka ningaa i ti ngeyaalakpandou na houa kati kpanhia, awa kati ala bɛɛlaa aa eyaa haka. Ai lii aa gbɛ o gbɛ nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na le.
42020011	Ka nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na i ngeyaalakpandou lagbiti longa, kati ala gbanhia boma awa kati ala chambonga, awa kati ala bɛɛlaa aa eyaa haka. Ai lii aa gbɛ o gbɛ nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na le.
42020012	Awa kɛɛ ngeyaalakpandou lagbiti longa gbɔnhu tuee, chawa na nwɛɔ aa ala. Ka nhɛɛ nwanhu gbee mbelaa i ti ala upua nhu gbɔnhu, awa kati ala gbɛa kpangba na nhu.
42020013	Awa ka nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na i gɛa, 'Gbɛɛ ngɔɔ pele? Ngɔɔ ni lou ila ngɔ na lonaa tuee. Nya laanɛɛ ɔ tɔɔ mbɛɛ gɛa alaa!'
42020014	Kɛlɛ nhɛɛ nwanhu gbee mbelaa i ti maa lou na lɔi, kati gɛa gbɔha na nwa, 'Nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na lou na nwɛ aa indinɛi! Ami ala baaa, kangaa kɛin na nana i ba lo la guna, i lo tɔ mi gaanhu.'
42020015	Faa nwɛɛ ti ala guai pɔpɔ ɔgɔ gbangba na nhu kati ala baaa. Faa nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i nhu nwɔɔlini, "Gbɛɛ nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na ɔɔ pele ngaa nhɛɛ nwanhu gbee mbelaa i?
42020016	Ɔɔ baa i nhɛɛ nwanhu gbee mbelaa i paa, awa i nhɛɛ na ɔa ningaa lagbitia eya manhugbeendaa nhanwa." Nhuna ningaa i ti indinɛi nwɛini, kati gɛa, "Aa tɔmbaga aigɔ bele!"
42020017	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbeenga awa kɛɛ ti nwɔɔlinga, "Gbɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali indinɛi goonhu na le? 'Kɔtu na nana pɛlɛ lo mbelaa i ti gbeei mbaɔ alɛɛ i belenga ɛɛ bahi na.'
42020018	Nuu o nuu nana aa gula kɔtu na siina nwa ɔɔ gbulukpulunaa. Awa ina maa gɔtu na aa gula nuu nwa, ɔɔ ala hukaa ɛɛ fuufue"
42020019	Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i ka Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i kati lapia aa Yisɔsi aa gbotondaa aa nhu gutu ɔ na siina, gbɛnhaile ti nhu kɔɔnia aa kɛɛlaa kiiloo indinɛi i kuaiɔ ti nhaa nwɛɛ. Kɛlɛ ti lua ɔɔ ningaa i mba.
42020020	Faa nwɛɛ ti pele ɔɛ ɔɛi taa ala hou la. Faa nwɛɛ ti nahoo ɔai ndakpangaa lɛingaa eya kangaa ti gbɔha na bele ɛɛ tee mbelaa nwɛɔ aa tuee, tua nwɛ ti ti loni kangaa ti Yisɔsi hou ala laa yia na nhu mɔɔli mɔɔli nhu, kangaa ti ba ala gɔan fɔha belaa i ma o, ka Loomu hota manha na fɔha na nwa.
42020021	Ka ndakpangaa indiini ti gɛa Yisɔsi nwa, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa bai nuu gbau ngɔ tee ngɔ ndegea ngi gbekpenjaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ k`abi ningaa nagɔli aa tɔmbaga na nana Ngebɔ lo ngɔ la nuu gbɔha nhanwa.
42020022	Kɛa aa nuee, ee tee ngɔ ni nhanwa aa luti bɛɛndaa Loomu hota manha mbaa naɛ Sisa, inaile ee ngaa haa ɔ?"
42020023	Kɛlɛ kina Yisɔsi ee ti laahaa nɛɛ na gɔɔ ngɔɔ, kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa,
42020024	"A baa nyɛɛ aa nahoo nwɔɛ ngi kpee. Ele guague mɛ ndaan ngɔ nahoo indinɛi nwa?" Kati gɛa, "Hota manha mbaa na nwɛ Sisa."
42020025	Faa nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i gɛi, "Awa faa nwɛɛe nana Sisa bo mɛɛ, a ngɔaa Sisa eya, awa nana Ngebɔ bo mɛɛ, a ngɔaa Ngebɔ eya."
42020026	Mɛɛ ningaa i ngau bele nhu tai kuni taa ala hou na gbɛ o gbɛ nwa, faa nwɛɛ ti londoni, awa kati gbɛia ngi gbɛɛmbo ngindinɛia.
42020027	Nhu nwɛɛ Salusiisia lɛingaa natiini taa gɛ nuu aa haa ai huu gbɔnhu haa nhu, kati baa Yisɔsi le awa kati gɛa ala nwa,
42020028	"Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, ka Moosisi i sɔ ngindinɛi gbaalia ni nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa, 'Ina ndalia na aa haa awa i ngɔɔ nyanha lo nana ndengaa tai ngeya, k`a ndaboogee na aa ngɔɔ nyanha na siina gɔli ti ndengaa le ndalia na lɔgɔ fanwa nana i haai.'
42020029	Ndegenhiindengaa ɔfɛlangaa lɔ tee naɔ. Ka ndalia waa na i nyanha gɔlia. Kɛlɛ i haai, ai ndengaa loi ngi nyanha na eya.
42020030	Awa ka ndalia na fee na i ngɔɔ nyanha na gɔlia,
42020031	awa nhaa ndalia na chawa na. Ngemɛɛ i beleni aa ti ɔfɛla ngɔ na bɛɛ. kati haaa awa tai ndengaa loi aa ngɔɔ nyanha na.
42020032	Gbelembanwaa na tɔ bɛɛ ka nyanha na i haaa.
42020033	Chaanngi nhu, gbee na haa belaa i tɔɔ huu haa na nhu, ele nwɛɛ nyanha indinɛi ɔɔ bele ngaa ngi nyanha kualaa ndege nhiindengaa ɔfɛlangaa indiini ndiiya? Gbaa tua bɛɛ kɛɛ belenga aa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ gɛmbɛ nwaa nyanha."
42020034	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga ti eya, "Kɛgɛingaa o njiengaa o yamana indinɛi nhu k`ati kɛmbɛ guu gua awa k`ati nyanhaa gɔli,
42020035	kɛlɛ kɛgɛingaa o njiengaa o natiini ti huulaa na i na kualaa haa na nhu, ti gɛ kɛndɛyaa nhu aa yamana nana nhu ɔɔ ba, tua taigɔ kɛmbɛ guu gua awa taigɔ nyanhaa gɔli.
42020036	Tɔɔ belenaa ɛɛ malekaa awa taigɔ haa. Tua na siina Ngebɔ lengaa i mɛ aa tuee, gbɛnhaile too huuaɔ haa nhu.
42020037	Awa Moosisi kɛɛ kɛa chanhai aa kɛɛlaa haa belaa i tɔɔ huua haa na nhu. Mɛɛ kpaali na nhu ngu to ngɔ mɔ ndɔgbɔ na nhanwa, Moosisi kɛɛ yɛpɛa Maliki na nhanwa gɛnhi, 'Mi bemba na Eebilahamu Eebɔ na, Aaisaaki Eebɔ na, awa ka Yekɔpi Eebɔ na.'
42020038	Ala nwɛ i kɛndɛ belaa ti Eebɔ na aa ala, kɛlɛ haa belaa ti Eebɔ aile aa ala, gbɛnhaile tua bɛɛ ti gɛndɛ ɔ ala nhu. "
42020039	Ka Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i lɛingaa ti gɛa, "Kpɛɛmbo gbekpe mɛɛ aa indinɛi, Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ!"
42020040	Gbaa kati luaa aa mɔɔli piindaa alaa.
42020041	Ka Yisɔsi i mɔɔli piinga tuaa, "Gbɔɔ Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i taa gɛ Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na Leebili mi bemba na lou na nwɛ?
42020042	Gbaa Leebili gbɔha na kɛɛ gɛa Ngue Gɔɔ na nhu, 'Ka Maliki na Ngebɔ i gɛa ni Nwaliki na nwa. Heia bei nya ɛha loko na nhu
42020043	nhaa ngi pele bi haaleengaa i ti gɛ bi ɔgɔsambala nau.'
42020044	Leebili mi bemba na gbɔha na kɛɛ ui mba aa 'Maliki.' Aa gee bele gbɔnhu Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa bele ngaa ngi goo na nhu lou?"
42020045	Nhuna ningaa i tee oo nhɛɛ Yisɔsi nwa, ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ngi galandengaa i ma,
42020046	"A sogia Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i mba, natiini ti lo ngɔ na aa ndonwa kɔha gɔha buu buundaa nwa, k`ati lee tee nda njɔpɔwaa waa na nhu fama hama bii piindaa nhanwa tuaa. Ti lo ngɔ na aa hei heilaa heinwaa gbekpe na Yuua ti gɔɛ pɛlɛ bɛlɛ nau, awa hali bɛnhɛ kpolo nhu ti emɛɛ.
42020047	K`ati ngɔɔ nyanhaa ti gɛin mɛɛ nwɛɛ ti eya, awa k`ati laaminɛ nhu gɔha gɔha bele pele ndɔgɔɔundaa aa kɛɛlaa ti lee ngɔ. Maa belaa indiini bonda, tɔɔ ti gbɔɔnia nja lee ngɔnhu!"
42021001	Yisɔsi i au siai lɛɛ kɛɛ kpatɛ belaa i tɔa tee ti hembɛ na buu buu nahoo bu kuma na nhu mɛɛ Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau.
42021002	Awa kɛɛ ngɔɔ nyanha lɔa boma nana mbaa ngɔɔ fɛi ee ngi nda nahoo hembɛ na gula nahoo bu kuma na nhu, maa nahoo na alɛɛ kolo tɔ bɛɛ nahoo liiya.
42021003	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa mbaa ngɔɔ nyanha indinɛi oo nahoo bua tee ngɔ ningaa lagbitia i mba bɛɛ,
42021004	gbɛnhaile ningaa lagbitia i ti kaka buu buia gbo ka na i loo looa ti eya. Kɛlɛ ala mbaa ngɔ na fɛi, nana bɛɛ ee ngeya alɛɛ i kulai nahoo hembɛ bu kuma na nhu."
42021005	Kalandengaa i lɛingaa i tee yɛpɛa Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ na nyandendaa na nhanwa, nhaa maa gɔtu nwaa nhii nhiɛ na, awa ka fembɛ na ningaa i tee fee hee Ngebɔɛ. Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa,
42021006	"Indinɛi bɛɛ waa tɔ, maa lɔgɔ na ɔɔ baa nhuna hali kɔtu ila kele aigɔ lo laai ndege gɔtu gɔma, kɛlɛ ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ tɔɔ piinaa."
42021007	Kati ala nwɔɔlinga, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, gbɛɛ gaila mɛ ɔɔ lɔgɔɔu pɛnhɛɛ yeingaa nhanda indinɛi bi gɛi ɔɔ belenaa i gilaa bele?"
42021008	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "A sogia, nuu ɛɛ wu bu aa kaka pele. Ndakpangaa gbinhi ɔ taa pele ɛɛ tua taa yɛpɛ nya nhanwa maa nhiɛ ɔ tɔɔ baa ti gɛ, 'Nya nwɛ aa ala!' Awa, maa lɔgɔ na oo hiti ma. Kɛlɛ awɛɛ nda tuaa.
42021009	Awɛɛ lua nhuna waa kɔɔ nwaanhaa nwɛi mɛi. Nhanda bele ngɔ ɛɛ indinɛi kaa bele pɛnhɛɛ, kɛlɛ ala aile ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa kpelenwaa na oo gbɛɛa gbɛlaae."
42021010	Kɛɛ gɛa gbɔnhu, "Pɔlɔgɔɔ ɔɔ gɔa aa ndege bɔlɔgɔɔ. Awa manhayaa ɔɔ gɔa aa ndege nwanhayaa.
42021011	Pɔlɔgɔɔ gbɛilaa ɔɔ gɛa na, ka ndɔɛ, ka kpɔu gbɔu mii o mii. Nhanda nwaa luu lua o ka kaila nhanda ɔɔ gɛa aa bele pelendaa kualaa feenaa na nhu.
42021012	Yeingaa nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ i bele pele, aa pele o pele tɔɔ wu aa gbotoa awa ti wu aa sɛɛgɛ. Tɔɔ wu gɔannaa kɔhɔ fanwa Yuua ti gɔɛ pɛlɛ bɛlɛ nau, awa tɔɔ wu biinaa kpindi bɛlɛ nau. Tɔɔ baa aa wuee manhangaa gulɔɔ ka hota manhangaa nya lɔgɔ fanwa.
42021013	Indinɛi ɔɔ belenaa aa fɛɛlɛ wu nhanwa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛndaa nhanwa.
42021014	A nɛɛnwaa nhaa gɔɔna pɛnhɛɛ, kangaa wai ba nɛɛnwaa yogobee ngaa kɛɛlaa wɔɔ gee ti gbɛɛmbo,
42021015	gbɛnhaile ngɔɔ ngoo ɔaa wu eya ka nhu lo nana ɔɔ pele wu haaleengaa i taigɔ nwaagai nana nwa wɔɔ kɛ.
42021016	Ningaa i tɔɔ wu gɔan, tua nwɛ aa wu ungaa i, ka wu ndege nhiindengaa i, ka wu ungaabɛɛmbaa i, awa ka wu gɛnwa belaa i. Awa tɔɔ wu lɛingaa baaa.
42021017	Nuu o nuu ɔɔ loloa aa wuee nya nhanwa.
42021018	Kɛlɛ hali ngu ngi ila kele aigɔ gua wu umbaa fanwa.
42021019	A lona nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, awa wɔɔ ndendouyaa hea gbɔhaɛ.
42021020	"Nhuna waa tɔ kulugbaangaa taa Yɛlusalɛmu goli koli, awa wɔɔ kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa tɔɔ naa nyaaia.
42021021	Awa natiini ti Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu kataa lii lii aa binhɛ njie na nhu. Awa natiini ti taa waa na nhu kataa li, awa natiini ti pɔlɔgɔɔ na gakanwaa na tɛɛ li taa waa na nhu,
42021022	gbɛnhaile na ɔɔ belenaa aa, 'Kpɔɔni Hoo,' kangaa nana bɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi i bele ngaa tɔmbaga.
42021023	Maa ɔɔ luaa guna koo nyanhaa i fanwa o ka komilaangaa i. Kpɔu gbɔu ɔɔ gɛa pɔlɔgɔɔ indinɛi nwa, awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ngi gbaai mba na yeia ningaa indiini ma.
42021024	Tɔɔ lɛingaa baaa aa saasigɔ, awa tɔɔ lɛingaa belenaa aa kpindi bɛlɛu belaa pɔlɔgɔɔ i nhu bɛɛ. Awa Kpitia i natiini Yuua aile aa tuee, tɔɔ Yɛlusalɛmu nyaaia nhaa Kpitia indiini ti nda yamana na ngaa lo.
42021025	"Nhanda nwaa luu lua ɔɔ bele pelenaa aa foo na, ka ngau na, awa ka teelega na. Ngelou i nhu pɔlɔgɔɔ gbɔha na ɔɔ gɛa nɛɛnwaa nyaai nhu, luaa nja yii na oo naa o ka nja he na.
42021026	Ndua ɔɔ ningaa hɛɛgboa nhuna taa gɛ aa nana nwaa golondaa ɔɔ ba ngelou gbɔha i nhu, gbɛnhaile fɔha na i feenaa na nhu ɔɔ nwɔinaa ngi lomaa na.
42021027	Awa nhu nwɛɛ Nuu na Lou na ɔɔ gɛ aa paalaa feenaa na nhu aa fɔha waa ka mbɛɛ bombou mbaa.
42021028	Nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ aa tɔɔlo ngaa pele pelendaa, a lona wu u kula nga, gbɛnhaile wu lendouyaa na hɔlɔndaa nwaa gutu ɔ."
42021029	Awa nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i njia ɔha indinɛi gɛi aa tuee. A nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla lɛ baa ngulu na nwa pele ngɔ na ɛɛ kpɔɔn ngulu ka ngulu lagbiti bɛɛ.
42021030	Nhuna waa tɔ ndaga na i mba aa tɔɔlo ngaa kpɔkundaa, aa kɔɔna gbo tɔ aa kɛɛlaa, nhanwa na nwaa ai gɔha gbɔnhu.
42021031	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu, ina waa tɔ nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ aa gɛ aa pele pelendaa, wɔɔ kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na i baa paa nwa.
42021032	"A ndaa nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ ɔɔ belenaa yamana indinɛi nhu belaa au bele nhu natiini tai lɛ haai.
42021033	Aliyana na o ka ngelou i ngaa ɔɔ loa kɛlɛ nya oo na ngaa aigɔ lo.
42021034	"A sogia! Awɛɛ luu gbɔha na ɔa ɔa kpolo waa waa nhu o ka ndɔɔ waa gbɔɛ gbɔɛndaa nhu, awa inaile ndɛɛhu indinɛi nwa yogobee yogobee, inaile maa Hoo nana ɔɔ bi houa ɛɛ maai,
42021035	gbɛnhaile ɔɔ baa ningaa i ma bɛɛ mii o mii ngelou i nhu.
42021036	A gɛa aa au siandaa awa wu laaminɛ aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, kangaa wu nhu gbɛndɛnjaa hɔlɔ kundaa nhanwa nhanda nana nwa bɛɛ ɔɔ bele pele, awa ka tondaa Nuu na Lou na gulɔɔ."
42021037	Foo indinɛi bɛɛ k`a Yisɔsi i ningaa nagɔli Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, awa kpɔkɔhoo na ee hiti, ee guaa i li mɛɛ njie naa taa ui mba aa Oliibi Yie na, naa nwɛɛ ee kpindi na nhu lee nwa na.
42021038	Aa ngeenda kpɔlɔ gbɔlɔ na, ningaa i bɛɛ k`ati li Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau oo nhɛɛ ma ala nwa.
42022001	Ka lɔgɔ na i gbɛɛa gbɛlaa kpolo na nhanwa nana tee lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛ ma nana mbugu gbɔnhu aile nhu, nana tee ui mba aa Pii Manhu Gbolo.
42022002	Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i ngoo kati luaa ningaa i mba, awa indinɛi nhanwa, tee lapia aa pele ɔɛ ɔɛndaa nana ti ba Yisɔsi baa laɔ gbundu nhu.
42022003	Awa ka Setani i ɔaa Yulasi lii na nwa, tee ui ngɔɔ gbɔnhu alaa aa Isikaliɔti, awa ngila mɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala kalandengaa puungaa i ndiiya ti manhu fee na.
42022004	Awa ka Yulasi i ya i yɛpɛa Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngee o ka tomaa belaa i Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau nhanwa, pele na nhanwa ɔɔ Yisɔsi nwaa sia la ti nwa.
42022005	Kati goonhu nɛɛa, awa kati Yulasi nɛɛnwaa longa aa nahoo ɔandaa nhanwa ngeya.
42022006	Ka Yulasi i kuunnga ma awa kɛɛ tɔɔlonga aa pele gbekpe ngɔɛ ɔɛndaa Yisɔsi gɔanndaa la nhanwa ti nwa nana ningaa i tai ba nhu kɔɔ.
42022007	Ka foo na i hitia ma nana taa lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛ ma nana mbugu gbɔnhu aile ma. Lɔgɔ indinɛi nwa, nhu nwɛɛ taa mbaala lou na baa Pii Manhu Gbolo nwɛnhɛi na nhanwa.
42022008	Ka Yisɔsi i Pita longa tii Yɔni o aa ngoo indinɛi, "A lia wu Pii Manhu Gbolo na nwaa nwɛnhɛi na nhu gbatɛ mi nhanwa mɛndaa nhanwa."
42022009	Kati ala nwɔɔlinga, "Mii nwɛ bi lo ngɔ aa naa ni nhu gbatɛ na?"
42022010	Kɛ ti gbɛɛmbonga, "Waa gɛ aa ngɔalaa taa waa na nhu, ndakpa ila kee ɔɔ wu nwaaia nana nja bɔlɔhɛɛ i heii ala umbaa. A ndaa alaa pɛlɛ nau nana aa ɔa mbu,
42022011	awa wu gɛ pɛlɛ nwɔɔ na nwa, 'Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ na ɛgɛ bi nwa, Ɛɛ nya hotanjaa gungu na mɛɛna nɔɔ Pii Manhu Gbolo nwɛnhɛi na nwɛ na nii nya galandengaa i ngoo?'
42022012	Ɔɔ kungu mbaa lɔgɔɔunaa aa wuee ngee na nhu maa bɛlɛ na siinau, gbɛ o gbɛ na mi lo ngɔ la mɛnhɛi indinɛi nwɛndaa nhanwa ɔɔ gɛa na. A nhu gbatɛa na."
42022013	Kati ya awa kati maaia aa kɛɛlaa nana bɛɛ Yisɔsi i kɛi aa tuee ngemɛɛ i beleni, awa kati mɛnhɛi na nhu gbatɛa na.
42022014	Nhuna lɔgɔ na i hitii ma Pii Manhu Gbolo nwɛnhɛi na nwɛndaa nhanwa, ka Yisɔsi i heia mɛnhɛi na nwɛ ma tii to mbelaa i ngoo.
42022015	Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Kpala mbaa lɔ nyaa ngi Pii Manhu Gbolo nwɛnhɛi indinɛi nwɛ ngilamaaa mii wua o yeingaa ngi gilaa yɔgɔlɔ!
42022016	Gbaa ngi kɛ aa wuee, ngaigɔ mɛ hali nhaa pɛnhɛɛ Pii Manhu Gbolo indinɛi koonhu na ndaa fe Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la."
42022017	Awa ka Yisɔsi i tɔɔmbila gbaunga, kɛɛ fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa, awa kɛɛ gɛa, "A indinɛi gbauna wu kɔɛ gɔɛ nwa.
42022018	Ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa kualaama chaanngi ngaigɔ ndɔɔ indinɛi gbɔɛ nhaa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na i ba."
42022019	Awa nhu nwɛɛ i lɛgɛ gbɛnha gutu gbauni, kɛɛ fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa, kɛɛ nhu aai aaia, awa kɛɛ ngɔaa ti eya, awa kɛɛ gɛa, "Indinɛi nya lugu na nwɛ nana ngi kɔannga wu nhanwa, A indinɛi belena nɛgililaa nhanwa aa nge."
42022020	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, kɛɛ tɔɔmbila na ɔaa ti eya nhuna ti bilani aa gbele mba nwɛnhɛi na nwɛndaa, kɛɛ gɛa, "Tɔɔmbila indinɛi Ngebɔ ilimayaa nyiɛ na nwɛ nana ngi kpatɛi aa nya qanwa na, nana ngi pua wu nhanwa.
42022021	"Kɛlɛ a kpeendɛ! Nuu na nana ɔɔ nya nwaa sia alaa biee nii ala o naa mɛnhɛi indinɛi nwɛ.
42022022	Nuu na Lou na ɔɔ haaa ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i ndaalaai, kɛlɛ maa lua ɔ na siina maa nwɔɔ na siina nhanwa nana ɔɔ nya nwaa sia!"
42022023	Awa nhu nwɛɛ ti tɔɔloni aa gbɔha na nwɔɔli mɔɔlindaa aa kɛɛlaa ngigbɛɛ nwɛ ti liiya nana ɔɔ indinɛi bele.
42022024	Ka tonga ngi biinga kalandengaa i ndoganhu aa kɛɛlaa ele nwɛɛ tɔɔ nɛgili la aa kɛɛlaa ala nwɛ tee ngɔ na.
42022025	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Ngelou indinɛi nhu nwanhangaa i fɔha lɔ tuaa ti ndaa i manhu, awa ti nwanhangaa i taa uinaa tuaa aa 'Ningaa ti Gɛnwa belaa.'
42022026	Kɛlɛ indinɛi ngemɛɛ aile aa wuee. Nana maa nhiɛ ɔ, nuu na nana tee ngɔ na wu liiya kaa bele ɛɛ ndou golo, awa ngu mɔɔ na kaa bele ɛɛ ngeyaalakpandou.
42022027	Ele nwɛɛ tee ngɔ feengaa indiini ndiiya, nuu na nana aa hei mɛnhɛi nwɛ ma o, ka nuu na nana aa mɛnhɛi hei nuuɛ mbɛtɛ nwa? Nuu na nana aa hei mɛnhɛi na nwɛ ma ala nwɛ tee ngɔ. Kɛlɛ nya nyaa wu liiya ɛɛ ngeyaalakpandou.
42022028	"Wuaa naɔ tii nya o ni yɔgɔlɔ na nhu bɛɛ.
42022029	Awa ɛɛ gbo ni Kɛɛgɛ na i fɔha ɔai ngeya sialaa la nhanwa, ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu ngɔɔ maa fɔha na siina ɔa ɔa wu eya.
42022030	Wɔɔ mɛnhɛi nwɛa awa wu ndɔɔ gbɔɛ ni bɛtɛ na nwa mɛɛ ni nwanhayaa na la, awa wɔɔ heia manhayaa gbakaa nhu nde puu na nwanhu i manhu fee na Iisilɛli bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu."
42022031	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Saimɔni, Saimɔni, Oo nhɛɛndɛ! Setani oo fɛɛlɛ hɔlɔa wu nhuandaa nhanwa bɛɛ, ɛɛ gbo nhɛɛ nwɔɔ na aa mba gbekpe na lee nwa kualaa mba boole naa.
42022032	Kɛlɛ ngoo laaminɛa bi nhanwa, Saimɔni, aa kɛɛlaa bi laanɛɛ na aigɔ gbaha. Awa nhuna baa bote nya le, kabaa bi ndege lengaa i nhu gbɛndɛ."
42022033	Ka Pita i kpɛɛmbonga, "Maliki, nya nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa ndiilaa ngilamaaa kpindi bɛlɛu tii bia o, awa ka haalaa ngilamaaa tii bia o! "
42022034	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Ngi kɛ aa biee Pita, tɛɛ na aigɔ gɛ gokoeni aa kpɔkɔ indinɛi, bɔɔ gɛa nwaagaii nya nwa nhaa naa heinwaa chawa aa kɛɛlaa bai nya gɔɔ."
42022035	Nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i ngi galandengaa i mɔɔlini, "Nhuna ngi wu loniɔ ngelou i nhu nahoo bu mbɔlɔ aile wu eya, inaile sii sia bɔlɔ, inaile chambala, ee nhai baa ngi wu houia?" Kati gɛa, "Gbɛ o gbɛ baa ngai ni houi."
42022036	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Kɛlɛ chaanngi, nuu o nuu nana nahoo bu mbɔlɔ i ngeya inaile sii sia bɔlɔ kaa kpau. Awa nuu o nuu nana saasigɔ ai ngeya kaa ngi lonwa na nwaa sia i saasigɔ ila ngeya.
42022037	Gbaa ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na nana i gɛi, 'Too ala nwaa gbɔnga aa nhanda nyɔu belaa.' Awa indinɛi kaa bele ngaa tɔmbaga nya nhanwa, gbɛnhaile nana ti kpaalii nya nhanwa alaa bele."
42022038	Ka kalandengaa i ti gɛa, "Kpeendɛ, saasigɔ fee mɛɛ aa indinɛi Maliki!" Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Na oo banga."
42022039	Ka Yisɔsi i guaa taa waa na nhu kɛɛ ya mɛɛ Oliibi Yie naa ɛɛ aa pele ngɔɔ. Awa ka kalandengaa i ti ya tii ala o.
42022040	I hitii nhinde na, kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "A laaminɛa kangaa nhua ngɛɛ wu nwaai?"
42022041	Awa kɛɛ golo siaa nhu tuaa, kɛɛ ombi hitɛa, awa kɛɛ laaminɛa.
42022042	Kɛɛ gɛa, "Hapa, ina bi guunmayaa na nwɛ, njɔgɔlɔ lɔɔmbila indinɛi gbauna nya eya, ni nda guunmayaa aile, kɛlɛ bi nda guunmayaa na i belena."
42022043	Ka maleka i guaa aliyana kɛɛ baa i gbɔha na lɔgɔɔunga aa ala awa kɛɛ ala nhu gbɛndɛnga.
42022044	Awa kɛɛ laaminɛa pulai gbɛnhaile ala nɛɛnwaa yogobee ngɔɔ. Fɔndɔ na ee gua ala nwa pele ngɔ ɛɛ qanwa aa gɛ aa puulaa lɔa.
42022045	I huui laaminɛ na nwa, kɛɛ bɛɛlaa boma kalandengaa i ngee awa kɛɛ maaia kati yii, maa nwɔuyaa i ti hou ngɔ.
42022046	Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Gbɔɔ waa yii? A huua wu laaminɛ kangaa nhua ngɛɛ wu nwaai."
42022047	Nhuna Yisɔsi ee laaminɛ na bele tuun, ka Yulasi i baa na aa faka. Yulasi indinɛi ngila mɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala kalandengaa puungaa i ndiiya ti manhu fee na. Kɛɛ baa Yisɔsi le i ala guunnga.
42022048	Kɛlɛ ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Yulasi, ee nuu guunndaa lɔ baa Nuu na Lou na nwaa sia la?"
42022049	Nhuna kalandengaa i natiini tee na tii Yisɔsi o aa maa lɔgɔ na nhanda indinɛi i ba ba ma, kati mɔɔli pelenga, "Maliki, ee ni gɔ aa ni saasigɔ na?"
42022050	Awa ngila mɔɔ kalandengaa i ndiiya kɛɛ Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na eyaalakpandou na ɛha ou na leea mba.
42022051	Kɛlɛ ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Gbena!" Kɛɛ siaa ndakpa na ou naa awa kɛɛ kɛndɛa.
42022052	Awa nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i gɛi Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ma ka tomaa belaa i tee Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ na nwanhu gbee, awa ka mbaa waangaa i natiini ti bai na ala aa gbotondaa nhanwa, "Ee sɔ mɛ ngi ngaa haai waa ba nya aa gboto ma aa saasigɔ o ka kpengbe?
42022053	Aa foo o foo nyaa naɔ tii wua i ngoo Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, wai nya aa gbotoi. Kɛlɛ wu nda lɔgɔ na nwɛ aa indinɛi i hitia pelendaa nhanwa, nhuna Setani nwanhayaa na i nga lɛ."
42022054	Kati Yisɔsi aa gbotoa awa kati ya aa ala Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na bɛlɛ nau. Awa ka Pita i kolo laa tuaa.
42022055	Oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ngɔmbu aa lee ngɔɔ njia baka na nwaa gbangba na nhu, awa ka Pita i nwaa gbɔnga aa kɔɔlɔɔu mbelaa i ngɔmbu na nwanhu.
42022056	Nhuna ngeyaanyɔugbɛa ila kee i ala lɔi na heii ngɔmbu na nwanhu kɛɛ gɔɔlɔɔu, kɛɛ Pita gbeenga tiinini awa kɛɛ gɛa ala nwa, "Ndakpa indinɛi Yisɔsi bou nwɔɔ nwɛɔ!"
42022057	Kɛlɛ ka Pita i nwaagaia, "Nyɔugbɛa i, ngai ala gɔɔ bɛnhɛ!"
42022058	Nhu golo lɛmbini ka ndakpa ila i Pita lɔa kɛɛ gɛa, "Ngila mɔɔ nwɛ aa biee gbɔnhu!" Kɛlɛ ka Pita i gɛa, "Ndakpa i, nya aile."
42022059	Awa nhu golo lɛmbini ka ndakpa lagbiti i yɛpɛa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, "Nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ ngai mba bɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa ndakpa indinɛi tua nwɛ ti naɔ tii Yisɔsi o taa lee tee, gbɛnhaile ala gbɔnhu Galiili nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala!"
42022060	Kɛlɛ ka Pita i ala gbɛɛmbonga, "Ndakpa i, ngai nana gɔɔ baa maa yia gɛ!" Nhu gutu ɔ na Pita ee njia indinɛi gɛ, ka tɛɛ na i gokoenga.
42022061	Ka Maliki na i botenga kɛɛ Pita gbenga, awa ka Pita i ndaa nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa Maliki na oo gɛ nha ala nwa, "Yeingaa tɛɛ na i gokoe ngaa kpɔkɔ indinɛi, bɔɔ gɛa bai nya gɔɔ nhaa naa heinwaa chawa."
42022062	Ka Pita i guaa kɛɛ ɔɔa nja lee ngɔnhu.
42022063	Ndakpangaa i tee Yisɔsi nwanhu gbee ngaa gboto indinɛi nhu kati ala belenga aa ngɛɛ ngɛɛ mɔɔ, awa kati ala gbanhi gbanhia.
42022064	K`ati pɛɛ ngaunwaa bele ngaa ala awa k`ati ala nwɔɔli mɔɔli, "Ele nwɛɛ i bi gbakpani? Ndɔgɔɔuna!"
42022065	Awa kati njia nyɔu gbinhi gbinhi lagbiti gɛɛ gɛɛa aa ala.
42022066	Awa ngee oni, mbaa waangaa i ngoo. Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo, awa ka Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i kati aa lɔgɔa ngilamaa, awa kati baa aa Yisɔsi ti yia nwanhangaa i kulɔɔ.
42022067	Kati gɛa ala nwa, kɛa aa nuee, "Ee bia nwɛ Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa biee?" Kɛɛ kpɛɛmbonga, "Ina ngaa kɛ aa wuee, waigɔ laanɛɛ aa nge.
42022068	Awa ina ngaa mɔɔli pii wuaa, waigɔ kpɛɛmbo.
42022069	Kɛlɛ kualaama chaanngi nhu Nuu na Lou na ɔɔ heia Ngebɔ waa fɔha Kɛɛgɛ na ɛha loko na nhu."
42022070	Tua bɛɛ kati gɛa, "Ee faa nwɛɛ bia nwɛ tɔ Ngebɔ Lou na aa biee?" Kɛɛ ti gbɛɛmbonga, "Ɛɛ wu kɛa, nya nwɛ aa ala."
42022071	Kati gɛa, "Nai loni aa seelia hali! Ni gbɔha i noo mɛinga nana i kɛa!"
42023001	Faka gbɔha na bɛɛ ee ngaa lɔgɔ na nhu kati huua awa kati ya aa Yisɔsi Paileti gulɔɔ,
42023002	mɛɛna ti tɔɔloni aa ala hɔɔlɛ hɔɔlɛndaa na aa njia gɛnhi, "Ni ndakpa indinɛi houia kɛɛ mi ndaa i kaka, kɛɛ kɛ aa tuee aa kɛɛlaa tɛɛ luti bɛɛ hota manha mbaa naɛ Sisa, awa alaa kɛ boma aa kɛɛlaa ala gbɔha na nwɛ Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa ala, napangaa manha mbaa."
42023003	Ka Paileti i ala nwɔɔlinga, "Ee bia nwɛ Yuua i ti nwanha mbaa na aa biee?" Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa "Ɛɛ bi kɛa."
42023004	Awa ka Paileti i gɛa Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ma ka faka na, "Ngai nhanda lɔi nana ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa ndakpa indinɛi lɛɛ ɔ."
42023005	Kɛlɛ nhu nwɛɛ bɛnhɛ tee nɔa nhu aa kɛndaa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, "Aa ngi nagɔli na, oo tɔɔlonga aa ningaa i ndii gbɛindaa la bɛɛ ti Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ i nhu. I tɔɔlonia Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu awa chaanngi nhu oo ba bei."
42023006	Nhuna Paileti i indinɛi nwɛini, kɛɛ mɔɔli pelenga, "Ee ndakpa indinɛi Galiili nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala?"
42023007	I nhu kɔɔni aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi, manha mbaa na Hɛlɔli ngi bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala, kɛɛ ala leenga manha mbaa na le Hɛlɔli. Aa maa lɔgɔ na Hɛlɔli ee naanɔɔ Yɛlusalɛmu.
42023008	Ka Hɛlɔli goonhu nɛɛa nhuna i Yisɔsi lɔi, gbɛnhaile oo ala nwaanhaa nwɛingaɔ awa giilɛɔ aa Yisɔsi nwaa gbalambo kangaa i ala lɔ. Ala nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa ala lɔndaa aa kamaa nhanda lɛingaa bele pele.
42023009	Faa nwɛɛ manha mbaa na Hɛlɔli i Yisɔsi nwɔɔlini aa mɔɔli kpinhi gbinhi, kɛlɛ Yisɔsi ai kpɛɛmboni.
42023010	Awa Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i ngoo kati ya na, awa kati ndɛɛ gbogo gbogo gɔɔla gɔɔlaa alaa.
42023011	Manha mbaa na Hɛlɔli o ka ngi gulugbaangaa i kati Yisɔsi belenga aa ngɛɛ ngɛɛ mɔɔ awa kati ala chambonga. Awa nhu nwɛɛ ti ndonwa maa nhii nhiɛ bui ala nwa awa ka ti ya aa ala Paileti le.
42023012	Maa hoo na siina nwa manha mbaa na Hɛlɔli ka Paileti kati belenga aa kɛnwa belaa. Kɛlɛ tuaaɔ pɛnhɛɛ faaleenjaa nhu nhuna foo indinɛi ai lɛ gɛiɔ hitii ma.
42023013	Ka Paileti i ui nguinga Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i mba, ka ngu mbelaa i, awa ka ningaa i ngilamaa,
42023014	kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Wua nwɛ wu bai aa ndakpa indinɛi bei nya le kawu gɛa alaa ningaa i pu aa kaka pele. Chaanngi nhu ngoo ala gbɛngbɛa wu au bele nhu, awa ngai maaleii ala lɛɛ ɔ gbɛ o gbɛ nhu nana nhanwa bɛɛ wu kɛi ala nhanwa.
42023015	Inaile bɛnhɛ manha mbaa na Hɛlɔli ai maaleii ala lɛɛ ɔ, gbɛnhaile oo ala bɛɛlaa boma muee. Gbɛ o gbɛ ai na nana ndakpa indinɛi i pelenga ngaa haa ɔ aa kɛɛlaa kaa haa hɔlɔ fanwa.
42023016	Faa nwɛɛe ngɔɔ ala gbɔannaa awa ngɔɔ gbenaa alaa nhanda baa ngɔ mba."
42023017	((Paileti, nhanda indinɛi oo ala lugu gɔɔngaɔ aa kpendaa kpindi bɛlɛu nwɔɔa nhanda baa ngɔ mba aa Pii Manhu Gbolo na lɔgɔ.))
42023018	Ka faka gbɔha na i labia gɛnhi, "Ti ala baa! Gbena Balabaasia nhanda baa ngɔ mba!"
42023019	(Balabaasi indinɛi ti ala biinia kpindi bɛlɛu, gbɛnhaile njia gbogo gbogo lɔɔ alaa kɔɔ gulandaa nhanwa taa waa na nhu, awa ka nuu baa njia gbɔnhu ee alaa.)
42023020	Paileti kpala ngee alaaɔ kangaa i nhanda baa Yisɔsia, faa nwɛɛ i yɛpɛi tuee gbɔnhu maa nhiɛ ɔɔ.
42023021	Kɛlɛ kati labi labia gbɔnhu nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, "Ti ala baa! Ti ala baa!"
42023022	Na hiti ɔ na naa heinwaa chawa na nhu, ka Paileti i ti nwɔɔlinga, "Kɛlɛ gbɛɛ nhanda nwɛ i ngaa haai? Ngai nhanda lɔi nana i ngaa haai aa kɛɛlaa kaa haa hɔlɔ fanwa! Indinɛi nhanwa, ngɔɔ ala gbɔannaa awa ngɔɔ gbenaa alaa nhanda baa ngɔ mba."
42023023	Kɛlɛ nhu nwɛɛ tee labi labi nja lee ngɔnhu aa kɛɛlaa k`a Yisɔsi ɔɔ haa hɔlɔ, awa ngaa guanwaa na bɛɛ, kati labi labi na i bɛnga ma.
42023024	Indinɛi nhanwa, ka Paileti i Yisɔsi baa njia na gɛa ɛɛ gbo ti nhu nwɔɔlini kangaa i bele.
42023025	Faa nwɛɛ i nhanda baani ndakpa naa nana ti ala biini kpindi bɛlɛ nau kɔɔ gulandaa nhanwa taa waa na nhu, ka nuu baa njia nhanwa, awa kɛɛ Yisɔsi gɔannga ti nwa ɛɛ gbo kpala ngee tuaa i pele tuɛɛ.
42023026	Kati ya aa Yisɔsi, awa tee li pele na nhu, kati ndakpa nwaaia Sailini nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala taa ui mba aa Saimɔni, kɛɛ ba taa waa na nhu nhuna ee gua pɔlɔgɔɔ na gakanwaa. Kati gbundɛa ala nwa, awa kati ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu na laa ala gbaki ma, napangaa kpekpa ngulu na, awa kati pelenga i ndaa la Yisɔsia.
42023027	Ka faka waa i ndaa Yisɔsi bou nwa. Maa belaa i mɛɔ aa njiengaa lɛingaa natiini ti ɔgɔ lɔgɔi umbaa k`ati ɔɔ ala nhanwa.
42023028	Ka Yisɔsi i botenga tuee kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Yɛlusalɛmu yiengaa, awɛɛ ɔɔ nya nhanwa, kɛlɛ a ɔɔa wu gbɔha na nhanwa kawu lengaa i.
42023029	Gbaa maa yamana na lɔ aa ba nhuna ningaa tɔɔ gɛ, 'Nduba lɔ njiengaa i ma natiini ndengaa tai tuɛɛ, natiini bɔlɛkɛa aa tuee, awa ka natiini komilaangaa aa tuee.'
42023030	Na ɔɔ belenaa aa lɔgɔ na nhuna ningaa tɔɔ gɛ njie njie mbaa waa na nwa, 'Lɔgɔa ni nwa!' awa ka aa kɛɛlaa njie njie kolo golo na nwa, 'Ni lɔɔgua!'
42023031	Gbaa ina nhanda bonda ɛɛ indinɛi bɛɛ aa bele nhuna ndaga na undu ɔ na ngulu naa, gbɛɛ ɔɔ bele nhuna ndaga na aa be mbe?"
42023032	Ndakpangaa fengaa lagbitia natiini nhanda nyɔu belaa aa tueeɔ, kati guaa gbɔnhu aa tuee ti baandaa nhanwa ngilamaaa tii Yisɔsi o.
42023033	Nhuna ti bai nhinde na taa ui naa aa "Ngu Hɛɛga," naa nwɛɛ ti Yisɔsi baai na awa ka nhanda nyɔu belaa feengaa i, ngila mɔɔ na i Yisɔsi ɛha loko nhu gaka, awa lagbiti na i ala gɔbɔ loko na nhu gaka.
42023034	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Ndoa na tuɛɛ, Hapa! Tai nana gɔɔ taa pele." K`ati ngi nwaa ili nhaanhaa i kɔɛ gɔɛa nwa aa kpɔɔyɔɔ gulandaa le pele.
42023035	Ningaa i tee naanɔɔ lo toni kati naa gbee nhuna Yuu u mbelaa i tee gɛ ala nwa, "Kɛɛ ndendouyaa he ningaa lagbitiaɛ. I ndendouyaa he lɛ baa gbɔha naɛ ina ala nwɛ Kilaisi na aa ala, napangaa Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na."
42023036	Ka kulugbaangaa i ti ngɛɛ ngɛɛ nhɛɛnga alaa. Kati baa na ala le kati ndɔɔ gbaati gbaati hea alɛɛ,
42023037	awa kati gɛa, "Ndendouyaa hea gbɔha naɛ ina bia nwɛ Yuua i ti nwanha mbaa na aa biee!"
42023038	Kati njia indinɛi gbaalia ala nwanhu na, "Indinɛi Yuua i ti Nwanha mbaa na nwɛ aa ala."
42023039	Nhanda nyɔu nwɔɔ na ila kee na ee na nhɛɛni, kɛɛ njia nyɔu gɛa aa Yisɔsi, "Ee bia aile Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa biee? Ndendouyaa hea gbɔha naɛ tii nua o!"
42023040	Ka lagbiti na i gɛa ndege lou na nwa, "Ee bai lua Ngebɔa? Mua nwɛ mɔɔ haa ila na hɔlɔ ngilamaa.
42023041	Mi nda haa na kaa bele gbo, nana nhanwa mi peleni. Kɛlɛ ala ai nhanda nyɔu beleni."
42023042	Awa kɛɛ gɛa Yisɔsi nwa, "Nɛgilia aa nge, Yisɔsi, nhuna bɔɔ ba aa bi nwanhayaa na!"
42023043	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Ngi bi nɛɛnwaa lo ngaa kɛɛlaa haai, bɔɔ gɛa aliyana ngilamaaa tii nya o."
42023044	Aa fooliiya na ka kpindi nhiɛ mbaa i hitɛa pɔlɔgɔɔ gbɔha i nwa bɛɛ. Kpindi nhiɛ mbaa indinɛi ee naanɔɔ nhaa aa kpɔkɔhoo hooliiya na yeingaa ngaa lo.
42023045	Awa kɔla na ee na nhɛɛni Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau ka nhu bɛaa liiyaa na nhu.
42023046	Ka Yisɔsi i labia aa njia indinɛi, "Hapa! Bi eya, naa nwɛɛ ngi ni yina na ɔaa na!" I indinɛi gɛi kpɛti, kɛɛ haaa.
42023047	Tomaa nwɔɔ na kulugbaa enge na nhu kɛɛ nana lɔa i beleni, awa kɛɛ Ngebɔ bihɛa gɛnhi, "Aa tɔmbaga nuu gbekpe mɛɛɔ aa indinɛi!"
42023048	Nhuna naa gbee mbelaa i natiini ti aa lɔgɔi na ti nana lɔi i beleni, tua bɛɛ kati bɛɛlaa tuee pɛlɛu, k`ati li aa lii nwaa gbanhi gbanhi aa maaumayaa.
42023049	Natiini bɛɛ tee Yisɔsi gɔɔ ngɔɔ pandaa, ti nhupu ngɔ naɔ aa njiengaa i natiini ti ndai alaa kualaa Galiili, kati longa gɔhanwaa k`ati naa gbee.
42023050	Ndakpa ee naanɔɔ ngi laaɔ aa Yosɛfu. Alimatia laa na nhu nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala.
42023051	Nuu gbekpe mɛɛɔ awa mbɛɛ lɔ mbaɔ gbɔnhu, awa nuu nwɛɛɔ nana ee Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na baalaa nwaa golo. Hali aa kɛɛlaa ngila mɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala njia baka mbuu belaa i ndiiya, kɛlɛ ai kuunni ti laalaa na nwa o, ka ti eyaabele na.
42023052	Kɛɛ ya Paileti le awa kɛɛ Yisɔsi boonwa na nhanda nhu nwɔɔlinga.
42023053	Awa kɛɛ poonwa na yeia mbu, kɛɛ mbeembeenga kɔla gue nhu, kɛɛ ndaa kɔtu nwaau ndoga nhu nana tai lɛ nuu lai nhuɔ.
42023054	Maa Gbatɛ Hoo na nwaa nwɛɛɔ taa ui mba aa Manhalɔgɔ. Maa hoo indinɛi oo leenaa, Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo na oo hiti.
42023055	Njiengaa i natiini ti guai Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu ti ndai Yisɔsia, kati ndaa Yosɛfu bou nwa awa kati maau na lɔa, awa nhaa ti gee Yisɔsi boonwa na lai nhu.
42023056	Awa nhu nwɛɛ ti bɛɛla bɛɛlai tuee pɛlɛu kati sebe nhu gbatɛa ka ngua gu nɛɛ nɛɛ poonwa na nhanwa. Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo na nwa kati lɛɛhua ɛɛ gbo Sɔ na i kɛi pelendaa nhanwa.
42024001	Pɛnhɛɛ foo na nwa mi guu ɔfɛla na nhu, napangaa Lɔgɔwaa na nwa aa ngeenda kpɔlɔ gbɔlɔ na, ka njiengaaa i ti ya maau na le aa sebe na nana ti nhu gbatɛi.
42024002	Kati maaia aa kɛɛlaa kɔtu laalo na kiikii ngɔ kualaa maau na la,
42024003	faa nwɛɛ ti ɔai nhu. Kɛlɛ tai Maliki na Yisɔsi boonwa na nwaaleii nhu.
42024004	Kati longa na nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ nhu indinɛi nhanwa. Nhu gutu ɔ na siina kati ndakpangaa feengaa lɔa tee lo toni ti gbɛlaa, natiini ti nwaa ili ngɔɔ aa kɔla gue nana ee huo yain.
42024005	Awa ndua na nhanwa ee ti laa fe ngɔ, kati u hitɛa, kɛlɛ nhu gutu ɔ na siina ndakpangaa i ti ti lɔi, kati gɛa ti nwa, "Gbɔɔ waa au sia aa kɛndɛ nwɔɔ haa belaa liiya?
42024006	Ai na. Oo huua. A ndaa nɛɛnwaa nana i kɛi aa nuee nhuna ee Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu aa kɛɛlaa,
42024007	Nuu na Lou na tɔɔ ala gɔannaa nhanda nyɔu belaa nwa, tɔɔ ala baaa, awa mi guu chawa ngaa lee ɔɔ huua haa na nhu."
42024008	Awa nhu nwɛɛ njiengaa i ti ngi yia na lai nɛɛnwaa,
42024009	kati bɛɛlaa kualaa kɔtu nwaau na nhu, awa kati indinɛi gɛa bɛɛ aa kalandengaa puungaa i ti manhu ila na awa ka natiini tɔ bɛɛ.
42024010	Njiengaa i siina tua nwɛɔ aa Meeli Magilala laa na nhu nwɔɔ na, ka Yɔana, awa ka Meeli, Yemiisi ngi nje na. Tua o ka njiengaa lagbitia i tee na tii tua i ngoo, tua nwɛɔ ti njia indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛi bɛɛ aa to mbelaa i.
42024011	Kɛlɛ to mbelaa i tɔɔ tɔɔngaaɔ nana njiengaa i ti kɛi aa tuee mɔu mɔu njia nwɛɔ, awa tai laanɛɛi aa tuee.
42024012	Kɛlɛ ka Pita i huua kɛɛ ya aa binhɛ kɔtu nwaau na le. Kɛɛ u nhɛɛnga awa kɛɛ kɔla gue na lɔa kɛlɛ ai gbɛ o gbɛ lɔi nhu gbɔnhu. Awa kɛɛ bɛɛlaa boma tuee pɛlɛu ala gbɛi ɔɔ nana nhanwa i belenga.
42024013	Foo ila na siina nwa k`a Yisɔsi galandengaa feengaa ti li taa golo nhu taa ui naa aa Imeɔsi. Nhu aile gɔha nja lee ngɔnhu aa Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na, (mi gɛa maili ɔfɛla)
42024014	k`ati li aa yɛpɛ ngu to ngɔ nhanda na nhanwa bɛɛ naa i bele peleni.
42024015	Tee li aa yɛpɛ pele na nhu, ka Yisɔsi i gbɛɛa ti gbɛlaa awa k`ati li aa sia ngilamaa.
42024016	Kati ala lɔa, kɛlɛ tai gɔɔmaa hɔlɔi alaa.
42024017	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Gbɛɛ wee ba aa maa yia gɛ loganhu pele i nhu?" Kati longa kpɛɛ, maa nwɔuyaa ee naanɔɔ ti aunwaa.
42024018	Ka ngila mɔɔ na i Yisɔsi nwɔɔlinga taa ui mba aa Kiliopasi, "Ee bi ila ngɔ na nwɛ gbo hitima nwɔɔ aa biee Yɛlusalɛmu, nana ai nana gɔɔni aa bele pele na mi guu indinɛi nhu?"
42024019	Ka Yisɔsi i ti nwɔɔlinga, "Gbɛɛ nhanda nwɛ?" Kati gɛa, "Nhanda na nana i beleni aa Yisɔsi, napangaa Naasalɛti nwɔɔ na. Ndakpa indinɛi alaaɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ letu nwɛɔ aa ala ndi ɔ aa fɔha na nhanwa i nana nhu i pele peleni, awa ka nana nhu i kɛɛ gɛɛi Ngebɔ au bele nhu, awa ka ningaa i ngau bele nhu bɛɛ.
42024020	N`i Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo ka n`i u mbelaa i kati ala gɔannga paandaa nhanwa, awa kati ala baaa.
42024021	Kɛlɛ noo nɛɛnwaa la ɔɔ tɔ aa kɛɛlaa ala nwɛ i ba ba i Iisilɛlia i kua nduayaa na nhu, kangaa ti bele ngaa nhanda baamba belaa! Kɛlɛ na aile tɔ bɛɛ, nhanda indinɛi i beleni oo kpaunga haai aa mi guu chawa.
42024022	Ka njiengaa i lɛingaa i ti n`i lii gbɛia, natiini tee ngaa lɔgɔ ila na nhu tii nua o aa kɛɛlaa, kati ya maau na nhu,
42024023	kɛlɛ tai ngi boonwa na nwaaleii nhu. Kati bɛɛlaa boma aa gɛ, kati nhanda lɔa nɛɛnwaa nhu aa kɛɛlaa ka malekaa ti kɛa aa tuee aa kɛɛlaa ala gɛndɛ ɔ.
42024024	Ningaa lɛingaa i nee ngaa lɔgɔ na nhu kati ya maau na nhu awa kati maaia gbo ɛɛ njiengaa i ti kɛi, kɛlɛ tai ala lɔi."
42024025	Awa nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i gɛi ti nwa, "Wu nwɔu mɔu ngɔ, wu nwaa gbɛndɛɛ ngɔ aa laanɛɛlaa aa nana bɛɛ Ngebɔ letua i ti kɛɛ gɛɛi!
42024026	Ee maa ai nhiɛi nha Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na nhanwa aa njɔgɔlɔ indinɛi bele pele bɛɛ, awa poungaa na siina i ɔa ngi bɛɛyaa na la?"
42024027	Awa ka Yisɔsi i ngambonga ti nwa nana ti kɛɛ gɛɛi ala nhanwa Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu bɛɛ, tɔɔlo ngɔ na Moosisi gɔɔ naa ka Ngebɔ letua i ti gbaali gbaali na bɛɛ.
42024028	Ti gbɛɛi kpou na laa gbɛlaa mɛɛ tee li na, ka Yisɔsi i pelenga ɛɛ gɔhanwaa nwɛɔ ee li na.
42024029	Kɛlɛ kati ala bɛndia aa ndiilaa, "Loa bei tii nua o. Foo na oo baa gula, awa mi nwaa na oo baa gbindi." Awa kɛɛ ɔaa tuee.
42024030	Kɛɛ heia mɛnhɛi nwɛ ma tii tua i ngoo, kɛɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha gbaunga awa kɛɛ nduba hɛia. Awa kɛɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nhu aai aaia, awa kɛɛ ngɔaa ti eya.
42024031	Awa ka Ngebɔ i ti au na nwaa o ngonga, awa kati gɔɔmaahɔlɔa alaa kɛlɛ kɛɛ loa nhu ti eya.
42024032	Kati gɛa gbɔha na nwa, "Ee ai beleni ɛɛ ngɔmbu aa gɛ mi lii nwa nhuna ee yɛpɛ muee pele na nhu ka Ngebɔ Gbaali na ee ngambo mi nwa?"
42024033	Nhu gutu ɔ na siina kati huua ti bɛɛlaa Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu, mɛɛna ti kalandengaa puungaa i maaleii na ti manhu ila na tee ngaa lɔgɔ nhu tii lagbitia i ngoo.
42024034	Kati gɛa, "Aa tɔmbaga Maliki na oo huua! Oo gbɔha na lɔgɔɔunga aa Saimɔni!"
42024035	Ka kalandengaa feengaa i ti ngambonga ti nwa bɛɛ nana i beleni pele na nhu, awa nhaa ti gee gɔɔmaa hɔlɔi Maliki naa boma nhuna i lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nhu aai aa leii.
42024036	Nhuna feengaa i tee indinɛi gɛ aa tuee, kpula mba nhanda nhu, ka Yisɔsi i gbɔha na longa ti liiya kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Maa lɛi i gɛ na tii wua o."
42024037	Kati luaa, tɔɔ tɔɔngaa maa bote mɔɔ nwɛɔ ti tɔi.
42024038	Kɛlɛ kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Gbɔɔ waa lua? Gbɔɔ nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ ngindinɛi bonda i wu nhu?
42024039	A nya loko na gbee kpeendɛ ka nya gbala na, awa wu tɔ aa kɛɛlaa nya nwɛ kpei. A siaa nyaa, awa wɔɔ kɔɔnaa, gbɛnhaile maa bote mɔɔ ndugu ai ma ka kaai, ɛɛ ndugu indinɛi gbo waa tɔ i nya nwa."
42024040	I indinɛi gɛia awa kɛɛ loko na lɔgɔɔu ndɔgɔɔunga aa tuee ka kpala na.
42024041	Nhaahaai tai laanɛɛi, koonhu nɛɛ lɔ ti laa fe ngɔ awa kati gbɛia. Faa nwɛɛ i ti nwɔɔlini, "Ee nhai lɔ wu eya bei mɛndaa nhanwa?"
42024042	Kati nyiɛ ii gutu ɔaa ngeya,
42024043	nana i kpauni kɛɛ mɛa ti au bele nhu.
42024044	Awa nhu nwɛɛ i gɛi ti nwa, "Indinɛi kpei alɛɛ ngi maa yia gɛi aa wuee nhuna ngee na tuun tii wua o. Gbɛ o gbɛ na nana kpaali ngɔ nya nhanwa Ngebɔ letu na Moosisi Sɔ na nhu, Ngebɔ letua i, awa ka Ngue Gɔɔ na nhu, kaa bele ngaa tɔmbaga."
42024045	Awa kɛɛ ti nɛɛnwaa na laau ndaaunga nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔndaa nhanwa Ngebɔ Gbaali naa
42024046	awa kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Indinɛi nwɛ kpaali ngɔ. Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na kaa yɔgɔlɔ, awa kaa huu haa na nhu mi guu chawa ngaa lee,
42024047	awa ngi laa na fɔha na nhu, kataa ngoo na gɛɛ gɛɛ nana ngu to ngɔ na potendaa nhanwa kualaa nhanda nyɔu nhu o, ka nhanda nyɔu londaa na nhanwa nde naɛ bɛɛ, tɔɔlo ngɔ na Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu.
42024048	Wua seelia nwɛ aa wuee nhanda indinɛi nhanwa bɛɛ.
42024049	Awa nya gbɔha i ngɔɔ nana yeia wu nwa ni Kɛɛgɛ na i nya nɛɛnwaa loni laɔ. Kɛlɛ wua kawaa wolo taa waa na nhu nhaa fɔha na nana i ngee na nhu i yei wu nwa."
42024050	Awa kɛɛ guaa aa tuee kualaa taa waa na nhu kati ya Bɛtani laa golo na nhu, mɛɛna i loko na lɛɛ lɛi nga na kɛɛ ti lubaa.
42024051	Ee ti luba, kɛɛ loganhu gɔɛa aa tuee awa kɛɛ lɛa aliyana.
42024052	Kati ala batounga awa kati bɛɛlaa boma Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu, ti laa fe ngɔɔ aa koonhu nɛɛ,
42024053	awa lɔgɔ na bɛɛ ee tuɛɛ kati kpaunga fiɛ guandaa la nhanwa Ngebɔ nwa Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau.
43001001	Yeingaa Ngebɔ i ngelou na gbatɛiɔ, nuu na nana ngi laa na nwɛɔ aa Ngoo ee naanɔɔ tɔ, awa Ngoo indinɛi siina, ee naanɔɔ tii Ngebɔ o, awa Ngebɔ nwɛɔ aa ala.
43001002	Yeingaa ngelou na gbatɛndaa i gɛi ɔɔ lɔɔlo, Ngoo indinɛi ee naanɔɔ tɔ tii Ngebɔ o.
43001003	Awa gbɛ o gbɛ na nana Ngebɔ i kpatɛi, i kpatɛia aa Ngoo na nhu bele. Awa maa nhai ai na nana Ngebɔ ai kpatɛi aa ala nhu bele.
43001004	Awa Ngoo na ala nwɛɔ ndɛɛhu he mɔɔ na aa ala gbɛ o gbɛ na nhanwa bɛɛ nana ndɛɛhu i nhu. Awa maa lɛɛhu na nwɛɔ i bai aa waun ningaa gbɔhaa nwa.
43001005	Maa waun na siina k`ɛɛ huo kpindi na nhu, awa kpindi na ai lɛ kuniɔ aa ngaa sibi.
43001006	Ka Ngebɔ i ndakpa longa ngi laaɔ aa Yɔni.
43001007	Yɔni na siina, ala nwɛɔ i bai aa waun na nwaa yia gɛɛ gɛɛ aa ningaa i, kangaa ningaa i bɛɛ ti ba bele ngaa laanɛɛ belaa aa waun na siina nhu bele.
43001008	Yɔni gbɔha na ala aileɔ waun na aa alae kɛlɛ i baia gbo kangaa i waun na nwaa yia gɛɛ gɛɛ aa ningaa i.
43001009	Waun na siina i baaɔ ngelou na nhu, tɔmbaga waun na nwɛ nana aa huo nuu o nuu nwa.
43001010	Ngoo na alaa naɔ ngelou na nhu, awa ala nhu bele nwɛɛɔ Ngebɔ i ngelou na gbatɛi la, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, ningaa i ti ngelou i nhu tai gɔɔmaa hɔlɔi alaa.
43001011	Kɛɛ baa ngi bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu kɛlɛ ngi ndaa i tai ala binjaniɔ.
43001012	Kɛlɛ natiini bɛɛ ti ala binjani awa kati laanɛɛa boma aa ala, tua na siina kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa ti hiti ɔ nhuɔ taa bele ngaa Ngebɔ lengaa.
43001013	Tai beleniɔ aa Ngebɔ lengaa aa pele na ningaa gbɔhaa taa foli hɔlɔ lae kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ i peleni ti beleni aa ngi lengaa.
43001014	Ka Ngoo na i belenga aa nuu gbɔha, awa kɛɛ heia mi liiya. Awa ala laa fe ngɔɔ aa panda bandayaa o ka tɔmbaga. Kani ngi bombounjaa na lɔa, napangaa mbombounjaa na nana i hɔlɔi kualaa Kɛɛgɛ na eya, gbɛnhaile ala nwɛ Kɛɛgɛ na Lou ila ngɔ na aa ala.
43001015	Ka Yɔni i seeliyaa hee heea ala nhanwa. Ɛgɛ, "Nuu i nwɛ aa indinɛi ngee ngi yia na gɛ ɔɔ nhuna ngi gɛi, 'Nuu na nana ɔɔ ba nya bou nwa ala bombou ngɔ lee ngɔ nya, gbaa alaa naɔ pɛnhɛɛ yeingaa ti gilaa nya le.' "
43001016	Awa kualaa ngi banda bandayaa na nhu nana i ala laa fe ngɔ, moo panda bandayaa na siina hɔlɔa kpinhi ɔ gbo.
43001017	Gbaa Sɔ na nana Ngebɔ i fei, i feia aa Moosisi nhu bele. Kɛlɛ panda bandayaa o, tɔmbaga o, maa gee nana Ngebɔ i feia aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele.
43001018	Nuu ai na nana i Ngebɔ lɔaɔ. Ndou ila ngɔ na gbo nana ti bele ngɔ na i ila na tii Ngebɔ o, awa nana i na Kɛɛgɛ na gbɛɛmbu, ala nwɛ i pelenga ningaa ti Ngebɔ bele ngɔ gɔɔnga.
43001019	Yuu fɔha belaa i tee Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu kati Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa longa ka Libaia mɛɛ Yɔni le ala nwɔɔlindaa nhanwa gɛnhi, "Ele nwɛɛ aa biee?"
43001020	Yɔni ai lelei aa kpɛɛmbondaa, kɛlɛ kɛɛ kɛa aa tuee kpou, awa nana i kɛi aa tuee maa ɛa ɔɔ nhuna i gɛi, "Nya aile Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa nge."
43001021	Awa nhu nwɛɛ ti ala nwɔɔlini gɛnhi, "Ele nwɛɛ nha tɔ aa biee, ee Ilaiya nwɛ aa biee?" Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Nya aile." Nhu nwɛɛ ti mɔɔlini boma, "Ee bia nwɛ Ngebɔ Letu na aa biee?" Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Nya aile."
43001022	Nhu nwɛɛ ti gɛi ala nwa, "Ele nwɛɛ tɔ aa biee? Njia gɛa nana ngu to ngɔ bi gbɔha naa, kangaa ni nana hɔlɔ naa li naa kɛ ngu to ngɔ biaa aa natiini ti ni loni."
43001023	Nhu nwɛɛ i gɛi, " 'Nya nwɛ nuu na aa nge ngaa loi qɛa bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. A Maliki na bele na lee teena ala sialaa nhu nhanwa,' ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ letu na Aiseya i kɛi."
43001024	Awa Yuu fɔha belaa indiini ti tetua i toni, Yuua i siina Falesiisia nwɛɔ aa tuee. (Falesiisia i Yuua ti eebɔyaa gbapi lagbiti nwɛɛ.)
43001025	Nhu nwɛɛ tetua i ti Yɔni nwɔɔlini gɛnhi, "Ina bia aile Ngebɔ Letu na aa biee, gbɔɔ baa Ngebɔ ua bele ngaa ningaa?"
43001026	Ka Yɔni i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Nya nja lɔ ngaa Ngebɔ ua bele nda aa ningaa. Kɛlɛ nuu lɔ wu liiya loni nana wai ala gɔɔ.
43001027	Ala nwɛ ɔɔ ba nya bou nwa. Kɛlɛ nya, nya hiti ɔ nhu gbo aa ngi chambala ngɛha na houndaa. Awa hali bɛnhɛ maa gee nana, ngai hitii nhu aa pelendaa."
43001028	Nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ i bele pelenia mɛɛ Bɛtani laa golo na nhu, napangaa Yɔlani Ya na bou nwa mɛɛ Yɔni ee Ngebɔ ua na bele na aa ningaa i.
43001029	Maa ee na i oni, ka Yɔni i Yisɔsi lɔa k`a Yisɔsi i ba ala le. Nhu nwɛɛ Yɔni i gɛi, "Ngebɔ Baala Lou na gbeendɛ, nana aa ningaa i ti nhanda nyɔu na lo na tuɛɛ!
43001030	Indinɛi nwɛ ngee ngi yia na gɛ ɔɔ nhuna ngi gɛi, 'Nuu lɔ aa ba nya bou nwa nana mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ nyaa. Gbaa alaa naɔ pɛnhɛɛ yeingaa ti gilaa nya le.'
43001031	Nya gbɔha na kpei ngai ala gɔɔni aunwaae kɛlɛ ngi baia gbo ngaa Ngebɔ ua bele ngaa ningaa aa nja, kangaa ngi pele Iisilɛlia i ti kɔɔ ele nwɛɛ aa ala!"
43001032	Awa ka Yɔni i seeliyaa indinɛi hea. Ɛgɛ, "Kangi Ngebɔ Yina na lɔa ee yei ala nwa kualaa aliyana ɛɛ ndɔkolo aa gɛ aa njeilaa. Awa maa lɔkolo na siina kɛɛ loa hei ala nwa.
43001033	Nya gbɔha na kpei ngai ala gɔɔni aunwaae kɛlɛ nuu na nana i nya loni kangaa ngi Ngebɔ ua bele ngaa ningaa aa nja, oo gɛ ɔɔ nya nwa, 'Nuu na nana baa tɔ Ngebɔ Yina na aa yei ala nwa awa i lo hei ala nwa, maa nwɔɔ na siina ala nwɛ aa Ngebɔ ua bele ngaa ningaa i aa Ngebɔ Yina na.' "
43001034	Awa ka Yɔni i gɛa, "Ngoo naa lɔa indinɛi i beleni, awa ngoo seeliyaa hea aa kɛɛlaa indinɛi nwɛ Ngebɔ Lou na aa ala."
43001035	Maa ee na i oni, nhuna Yɔni o ngi galandengaa feengaa o tee loni,
43001036	ka Yɔni i Yisɔsi lɔa ee lee, awa ka Yɔni i gɛa, "Ngebɔ Baala Lou na nwɛ aa na!"
43001037	Ka kalandengaa feengaa i ti njia indinɛi nwɛinga Yɔni i kɛi, awa nhu gutu ɔ na siina kati ndaa Yisɔsia.
43001038	Ka Yisɔsi i botenga bou gbee ma, awa kɛɛ ti lɔa tee nda alaa. Nhu nwɛɛ i ti nwɔɔlini, "Gbɛɛ waa au sia la?" Kati gɛa ala nwa, "Labai, mii nwɛ bi na hei?" (Labai, koonhu na nwɛ aa Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ.)
43001039	Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "A baa wu naa lɔ." (Gbaa mi gɛa kpɔkɔhoo hooliiya nwɛɔ.) Awae kati ya awa kati mɛɛ lɔa ee na. Awa tee naanɔɔ ala le nhaa ka maa hoo na siina i leenga.
43001040	Kalandengaa feengaa i natiini ti njia na nwɛiniɔ Yɔni i kɛi, awa kati ndaa Yisɔsia, ngila kee na nwɛɔ aa Andulu, napangaa Saimɔni Pita ndege nhiindou na.
43001041	Nhu gutu ɔ na siina kɛɛ ya pɛnhɛɛ i kɛa aa ngi ndege nhiindou na Saimɔni. Ɛgɛ, "Noo Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na lɔa." (Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ koonhu na nwɛ aa Kilaisi na.)
43001042	Nhu nwɛɛ Andulu i bai aa Saimɔni Yisɔsi le. Ka Yisɔsi i Saimɔni gbeenga awa kɛɛ gɛa ala nwa, "Bia nwɛ Saimɔni aa biee, Yɔni nhiindou na aa biee. Ngoo ndaa nyiɛ hea biɛɛ taa gɛ ma Sifɔsi." (Sifɔsi, ndaa ila na nwɛ aa Pita, awa koonhu na nwɛ aa faha.)
43001043	Maa ee na i oni, ka Yisɔsi i ndaalaaa aa ala liilaa Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Kɛlɛ yeingaa i gɛi ɔɔ sia gua Galiili nhanwa, kɛɛ Filiipi lɔa. Awa nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i gɛi Filiipi nwa, "Ndaa nyaa!" (
43001044	Filiipi indinɛi Bɛtisaila nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala, napangaa Andului ngee taa nhu tii Pita o.)
43001045	Ka Filiipi i Natanɛɛli lɔa, awa kɛɛ gɛa Natanɛɛli nwa, "Noo nuu na lɔa nana Moosisi i kpaali beleni ala nhanwa Sɔ kɔɔ na nhu, awa ala nwɛɔ gbɔnhu Ngebɔ letua i ti kpaali beleni ala nhanwa. Nuu na siina ala nwɛ aa Yosɛfu nhiindou na, taa ui mba aa Yisɔsi, Naasalɛti nwɔɔ na aa ala."
43001046	Ka Natanɛɛli i gɛa ala nwa, "Ee nhanda gbekpe ngaa guaa Naasalɛti?" Ka Filiipi i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Baa bi naa lɔ bi gbɔha na."
43001047	Nhuna Yisɔsi i Natanɛɛli lɔi ee baa ala le, kɛɛ gɛa Natanɛɛli nhanwa, "Iisilɛli nwɔɔ gaai gaai nwɛɛ aa indinɛi. Ndɛɛ ai mba polou."
43001048	Ka Natanɛɛli i Yisɔsi nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Bi gee nya gɔɔni?" Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Yeingaa Filiipi i uini biaa, nyaa pɛnhɛɛ bi lɔ ngɔ nhuna bee loni ngulu nau nana pele ngɔ na ɛɛ kpɔɔn ngulu."
43001049	Ka Natanɛɛli i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, biɛɛ Ngebɔ Lou na aa biee! Awa biɛɛ Iisilɛlia i ti Nwanha mbaa na aa biee!"
43001050	Nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i gɛi ala nwa, "Kina ngi gɛi bi nwa kangi bi lɔa nhuna bee ngulu nau nana pele ngɔ na ɛɛ kpɔɔn ngulu, ee faa nwɛɛ bi laanɛɛa? Bɔɔ nhanda lɔɔ lɔɔa nana mbombou ngɔ lee tee ngɔ indinɛia!"
43001051	Awa kɛɛ gɛa gbɔnhu ti nwa, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, wɔɔ tɔa aliyana na ɔɔ laau, awa wɔɔ Ngebɔ nwalekaa i tɔa tɔɔ gɛ aa tɛɛlaa Nuu na Lou na nwanhu awa ka tɔɔ gɛ aa njeilaa Nuu na Lou nau."
43002001	Nhuna Yisɔsi i uini Filiipia o ka Natanɛɛli, i kpauni aa mi guu fee, chawa na nwa, ka kɛmbɛ gbolo i gulaa taa na nhu taa ui naa aa Kena, mɛɛ Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Awa Yisɔsi nje na ee naanɔɔ kɛmbɛ gbolo na siina nhu,
43002002	awa kati uinga boma Yisɔsia tii ngi galandengaa i ngoo kɛmbɛ gbolo ila na siina nhu.
43002003	Nhuna ndɔɔ na aa loi kɛmbɛ gbolo nhu belaa i ngeya, ka Yisɔsi nje na i gɛa Yisɔsi nwa, "Ndɔɔ ɛa na gbɔnhu."
43002004	Nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i gɛi ala nwa, "Yaiyo, bia nya gbeena gbo tɔ! Nya lɔgɔ na ai lɛ hitii lɛ ngaa nhanda bele nda."
43002005	Ka ngi nje na i gɛa ngeyaalakpangaa i ma, "Nana bɛɛ aa gɛ wu nwa wu pele, a pelena."
43002006	Chaanngi nhue Yuua i s`ɔ tɔ ti eya. Nhuna taa gɛ tɔɔ Ngebɔ batou, kataa mɔɔ bele ngaa pele na ti sɔ na i gɛi ti pele nda. Awa maa nhanda na siina nhaa nwɛɛɔ kɔtuhɛɛ ɔhita ngee naanɔɔ hei heii maa ya na bundaa nhu nhanwa. Kɔtuhɛɛ na siina, ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ mi gɛa nja bɛibaani gɛmɛ ila aa hou, inaile pa, nja bɛibaani gɛmɛ ila, bɛibaani buu buu lɔɔu.
43002007	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ngeyaalakpangaa i ma, "A kɔtuhɛɛ na laa he fena aa nja." Awa kati fe fenga la yelele.
43002008	Nhu nwɛɛ i gɛi ti nwa, "Chaanngi nhu, a nja na golo guaa ma, wu li la nuu na le nana i loni kpolo indinɛi gulɔɔ." Awa kati ya la ala le.
43002009	Awa nhuna i nja na gɔgɔni nana i botenga tɔ aa ndɔɔ, awa ai mɛɛ gɔɔni i guai na, (kɛlɛ ngeyaalakpangaa i ti mɛɛ gɔɔnia i guai na,) faa nwɛɛɔ i uini nyanha nwɔɔ naa
43002010	awa kɛɛ gɛa ala nwa, "Ndɔɔ gbekpe tɔ pɛnhɛɛ nuu aa puu buu kpolo nhu belaaɛ. Awa nhuna aa gu ngaa tuee, too gilaa nana buu buua nyiɛ ɔ na. Kɛlɛ bia boo ndɔɔ gbekpe na nwakɛa nhɔ nhaa k`a chaanngi nhu bi kuaa!"
43002011	Indinɛi pɛnhɛɛ kamaa nhanda na nwɛ Yisɔsi i peleni ngelou i nhu. Awa i pelenia taa na nhu taa ui naa aa Kena mɛɛ Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Awa naa nwɛɛɔ i ngi bombounjaa na lɔgɔɔuni na. Awa ka kalandengaa i ti laanɛɛa aa ala.
43002012	Kɛmbɛ gbolo indinɛi i leeni, Yisɔsi o, ngi nje na o, ngi ndege nhiindengaa i ngoo, ka ngi galandengaa i kati ya Kepanɔmu laa na nhu. Awa ti guu ai nwaa loni na.
43002013	Nhuna Yuua i ti Bii Manhu Gbolo na nwaa guu na i gbɛɛi gbɛlaa, ka Yisɔsi i ya Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu.
43002014	Naa nwɛɛ Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau Yisɔsi i ningaa nwaaleii na k`ati nikaa nwaa sia na, mbaalaa o, ka poobogoa. Awa nahoo nwaa lobi mbelaa tee naanɔɔ gbɔnhu ti nda nhanda nhu.
43002015	Kɛɛ ngɛha limba kpatɛa aa fɔan nana i ti gbɛi la na bɛɛ, nhaa nikaa i ngoo, mbaalaa i ngoo kɛɛ ti gbɛa na faun. Awa kɛɛ nahoo nwaa lobi mbelaa i ti nahoo na yanjanga, awa kɛɛ mbɛtɛ na gula gulaa.
43002016	Awa kɛɛ gɛa natiini ma tee poobogoa i maa sia, "A nhaanhaa indiini kuu guaa bei! Waigɔ ni Kɛɛgɛ na Bɛlɛ na bele ngaa fee gɔ pɛlɛ."
43002017	Ka ngi galandengaa i ti nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Nya lomayaa na bi Bɛlɛ na nhanwa ndomayaa nwɛe."
43002018	Nhu nwɛɛ Yuu fɔha belaa i ti ala gbɛɛmboni aa mɔɔli piindaa alaa gɛnhi, "Kamaa nhanda na ngigbɛɛ nwɛ bɔɔ pele ni naa lɔ, nana ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa bi hiti ɔ nhu nhanda indinɛi bele pelendaa nhanwa?"
43002019	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "A Ngebɔ Bɛlɛ indinɛi lɔgɔa, awa mi guu chawa ndoganhu, ngɔɔ tonaa boma."
43002020	Nhu nwɛɛ Yuu fɔha belaa i ti gɛi ma, "Fogo buu buu naai manhu ɔhita alɛɛ ti kpauni aa Ngebɔ Bɛlɛ indinɛi londaa. Ee bɔɔ kunaa bi to mi guu chawa ndoganhu?"
43002021	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ bɛlɛ na nana Yisɔsi ee maa yia gɛ ala nwɛɔ aa ala lugu na.
43002022	Faa nwɛɛe nhuna Yisɔsi i huui haa na nhu, ka ngi galandengaa i ti nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa aa kɛɛlaa kɛɛ indinɛi gɛaɔ. Awa kati laanɛɛa aa nana Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi o, ka nana Yisɔsi i kɛaɔ.
43002023	Nhuna Yisɔsi ee Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu aa Pii Manhu Gbolo na lɔgɔ, ka ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti laanɛɛa aa ala, nhuna tee kamaa gamaa nhanda na lɔɔ lɔɔ nana i pele peleni.
43002024	Kɛlɛ Yisɔsi gbɔha na ai hagba lai ti nhu.
43002025	Ai loni laɔ bɛnhɛ nuu i nuu lagbiti yia gbaga ala nwa, gbɛnhaile i nana gɔɔnaa ee ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nɛɛnwaa.
43003001	Ndakpa lɔ ee naɔ ngi laa aa Nikolimɔsi. Heimanhu nwɛɛɔ aa ala Yuua ti eebɔyaa gbapi na nhu taa ui mba aa Falesiisia, awa ngu mɔɔ nwɛɔ gbɔnhu aa ala ngi ndege Yuua i fanwa.
43003002	Ndakpa indinɛi Nikolimɔsi, kɛɛ baa Yisɔsi le aa kpindi, awa kɛɛ gɛa Yisɔsi nwa, "Labai, ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ningaa nagɔli mɔɔ nwɛ aa biee nana i baa kualaa Ngebɔ le. Gbaa nuu ai na nana ku ngɔ aa kamaa nhanda na bele pele nana bia baa pele pele, kɛlɛ k`a Ngebɔ aa gɛ na tii maa nwɔɔ na o yeingaa i gilaa ku i pele pele."
43003003	Ka Yisɔsi i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa biee aa kɛɛlaa, kataa nuu le ngaa nyiɛ, yeingaa i gilaa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na lɔ. Kɛlɛ ina tai ndeni aa nyiɛ, aigɔ Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na lɔ."
43003004	Ka Nikolimɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Taa gee nuu le ngaa nyiɛ nana nhu lɛmbingaɔ tɔ ti ala leni nhaa oo nuu waayaa nwɛa? Ee maa nwɔɔ na aa kunaa gbɔnhu i ɔa ngi nje goo nhu kangaa ti ala le boma?"
43003005	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa biee aa kɛɛlaa ndenjaa nyiɛ na ngaa maa yia gɛ ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, kataa nuu le ngaa nyiɛ aa nja o ka Ngebɔ Yina na. Kɛlɛ ina tai peleni aa nuu, maa nwɔɔ na siina aigɔ ɔa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la.
43003006	Nuu aa lugu na hɔlɔa kualaa ngi ungaa i ngeya nhuna taa ala le, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ Yina na nwɛ aa yinayaa lenjaa ɔa nuu eya.
43003007	Awae ɛɛ gbɛɛ bi la gbɛnhaile ngoo gɛ bi nwa kataa bi le ngaa nyiɛ.
43003008	Hɛfɛ na aa gindɛa mɛɛna aa lo ngaa kindɛlaa na. Awa bɔɔ ngoo na nwɛinaa, kɛlɛ baigɔ mɛɛ gɔɔ aa gua na, awa baigɔ mɛɛ gɔɔ aa li na. Awa ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa nuu o nuu nana Ngebɔ Yina na aa nde."
43003009	Ka Nikolimɔsi i ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Indinɛi aa gee bele?
43003010	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Biɛɛ ningaa nagɔli mɔɔ bombou mbaa aa biee Iisilɛlia i ndiiya, gbɔɔ tɔ bai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ indinɛia?
43003011	Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa biee aa kɛɛlaa, nua ni yɛpɛ nana nhanwa ni kɔɔ ngɔ, awa ni nana nwaa seeliyaa hee hee ni naa lɔa, kɛlɛ wai kuunni n`i seeliyaa na nwa ni fee heei.
43003012	Nhanda nhanda na nana aa bele pele ngelou i nhu ngoo maa yia gɛɛ gɛɛa aa biee, awa bai laanɛɛi, bɔɔ gee laanɛɛ ina ngaa nana nwaa yia gɛ aa biee aa bele pele mɛɛ aliyana?
43003013	Awa nuu ai lɛ lɛiɔ aliyana, k`a Nuu na Lou na gbo nana i bai mbuu indinɛi kualaa aliyana."
43003014	Awa ɛɛ Moosisi i kɛɛmu na gbatɛi gbo ɛɛ kaai, nana i ngɔai ngulu gɔhaa awa kɛɛ tɛa nga tombo na nhu, ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu katɔɔ Nuu na Lou na lɛ nga,
43003015	kangaa nuu o nuu nana aa laanɛɛ aa ala, maa nwɔɔ na i ba wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ.
43003016	Gbaa Ngebɔ i lonia aa ngelou na nhaali, faa nwɛɛ i ngi Lou ila ngɔ na gɔanni, kangaa nuu o nuu nana aa laanɛɛ la, ngu ngaigɔ lo nhu, kɛlɛ ɔɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔa.
43003017	Gbaa Ngebɔ ai ngi Lou na leeni ngelou na gɔhɔndaa nhanwae kɛlɛ i teenia kangaa ngelou na i ndendouyaa hɔlɔ aa ala nhu bele.
43003018	Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa laanɛɛ aa Ndou na, Ngebɔ aigɔ ala gɔhɔ. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana bɛɛ ai laanɛɛi aa Ndou na, maa nwɔɔ na siina, Ngebɔ oo ala gɔhɔnga tɔ, gbɛnhaile ai laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ Lou ila ngɔ na laa na.
43003019	Indinɛi ngemɛɛ gɛnhi Ngebɔ aa ngelou na gɔhɔ nda. Waun na oo ba ngelou na nhu, kɛlɛ ningaa i tai loni aa waun na. Nana ti lo ngɔ la ala nwɛ aa kpindi na, gbɛnhaile ti eyaabele na nyɔu ɔ.
43003020	Gbaa nuu o nuu nana aa nhanda nyɔu bele, ala lolo ɔ aa waun na nana aa tɔmbaga na lɔgɔɔu, awa aigɔ ba pa mɛɛna maa waun na aa gɛ na, gbɛnhaile ngɔi ai alaa kangaa ngi nhanda nyɔu na nwaa gɛ.
43003021	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa nana bele tɔmbaga na lo ngɔ la, maa nwɔɔ na siina aa baa waun na le, kangaae waun na i ba ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa, nana i peleni, oo ndɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa ee nwaa bɛɛa Ngebɔu.
43003022	Nhanda nhanda indinɛi i leenia, ka Yisɔsi i ya Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu tii ngi galandengaa i ngoo. Awa naa nwɛɛ tɔ ee na tii tua i ngoo awa kɛɛ Ngebɔ ua bele pelenga aa ningaa i.
43003023	Yɔni gbɔnhu ee Ngebɔ ua belenaa aa ningaa mɛɛ Eenɔnu, Salimu gbɛlaa na, gbɛnhaile nja gbinhi gbinhi ee naanɔɔ maa nhinde na. Ningaa tee lia na ala le, awa ee Ngebɔ ua belenaa aa tuee. (
43003024	Indinɛi i belenia aa lɔgɔ na tai lɛ gɛi Yɔni bii ngɔ kpindi bɛlɛu.)
43003025	Ka tonga ngi ɔaa Yɔni galandengaa i lɛingaa loganhu o ka Yuu nwɔɔ ngu to ngɔ pele naa Yuua i taa gbɔha na chanhai nda Ngebɔ batoundaa nhanwa.
43003026	Awa kati baa Yɔni le ti gɛa ala nwa, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, nuu na nana wee mɛɛ Yɔlani Ya na nwaa gɔɔ na gaka naɔ, napangaa nuu na nana bee seeliyaa hee hee ɔɔ ala nhanwa, kpeendɛ aa Ngebɔ ua bele pele ngaa ningaa chaan, awa nuu o nuu lɔ aa li chaanngi nhu ala le!"
43003027	Ka Yɔni i kpɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Maa nhanda ai na nana aa bele ngaa nuu ɛɛ nhanda indinɛi bonda, kɛlɛ k`a Ngebɔ gbo alɛɛ aa pele maa nhanda na siina aa bele.
43003028	Wua wu gbɔha na kpei nya seelia nwɛ tɔ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa kangi gɛa, 'Nya aile Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa nge, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ i nya lonia gulɔɔ aa paalaa alaa.'
43003029	Nyanha nwɔɔ na alɛɛ po mɛɛ aa kɛmbɛ gua nyanha na. Kɛlɛ nuu na kɛmbɛ na nwaa saabu na aa ala, aa gɛa loni kɛɛ oo nhɛɛ nana nwa nyanha nwɔɔ na aa kɛ, awa ala goonhu nɛɛ ɔ nhuna aa nyanha nwɔɔ na oo na nwɛi aa gɛ aa njɛpɛlaa. Indinɛi nhanwa, nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ nja lee ngɔnhu.
43003030	Kolo na i ala nhu kaa bunde, awa nya nda na kaa yei mbu."
43003031	Nuu na nana aa ba kualaa mi nwanhu na ala bombou ngɔ lee ngɔ ningaaa bɛɛ. Nuu na nana aa ba kualaa ngelou na nhu, ngelou na bo mɛɛ aa ala awa alɛɛ aa yɛpɛ nhanda na nhanwa nana aa bele pele ngelou na nhu. Awae nuu na nana aa ba kualaa aliyana alɛɛ kolo ɔ lee ngɔ nuu o nuua bɛɛ.
43003032	Aa seeliyaa hea nana nhanwa i naa lɔa o ka nana i mɛinga aliyana, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, nuu ai laanɛɛ aa nana i kɛa.
43003033	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana bɛɛ i kuunnga ngi oolee na nwa, maa nwɔɔ na siina oo ndɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ aa tɔmbaga na gɛa.
43003034	Gbaa nuu na nana Ngebɔ i ala longa, Ngebɔ oo na nwɛ aa kɛɛ gɛɛ, gbɛnhaile aa ngi Yina na ɔaa ala eya nana kpelenwaa ai mba.
43003035	Kɛɛgɛ na lo ngɔ aa ngi Lou na, awa oo gbɛ o gbɛ na laa ala eya.
43003036	Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa laanɛɛ aa Ngebɔ Lou na, wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu lɔ maa nwɔɔ na eya. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana bɛɛ ai nwaa bɛɛi Ngebɔ Lou nau, aigɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ gbaai mba na ɔɔ yeia ala nwa.
43004001	Maliki na kɛɛ nhu kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa Yuua ti eebɔ gbapi na taa ui mba aa Falesiisia too nhu kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi ee kalandengaa hɔlɔa tee ngɔ Yɔnia awa ee Ngebɔ ua bele pelenaa aa tuee. (
43004002	Hali nha Yisɔsi gbɔha na aile ee Ngebɔ ua na bele ngaa tuee, kɛlɛ ngi galandengaa i mɛ tee pele.)
43004003	Faa nwɛɛ i gbueni Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu awa kɛɛ bɛɛlaa boma Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
43004004	Awa ala bɛɛlalaa ee naanɔɔ aa Sameelia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu bele.
43004005	Awae kɛɛ baa Saika laa waa na nhu mɛɛ Sameelia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Saika indinɛi ee naanɔɔ ndɔgbɔ na gbɛlaa nana Yekɔpi i ndoiɔ aa ngi nhiindou na taa ui mba aa Yosɛfu.
43004006	Yekɔpi ya loga na ee naanɔɔ maa lɔgbɔ na siinaa. Faa nwɛɛe mi gɛa aa fooliiliiya na lɔgɔ, nhuna sia na i Yisɔsi gaanhu haai, kɛɛ heia maa ya loga na gbɛlaa ndɛɛhu nwa.
43004007	Ka Sameelia nyɔugbɛa i baa na nja ui ma maa ya loga na nhu, awa ka Yisɔsi i gɛa na ala nwa, "Nya gɔa aa nja ngi kpɔɛ." (
43004008	Gbaa aa maa lɔgɔ na ngi galandengaa i taile na. Ti liiɔ taa waa na nhu mɛnhɛi eya ma.)
43004009	Ka Sameelia nyɔugbɛa na i Yisɔsi gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Gbɔɔ bia Yuu nwɔɔ indinɛi aa biee, baa nya nwɔɔli Sameelia nyɔugbɛa aa nge kangaa ngi nja ɔa bi eya bi kpɔɛ? " (Gbaa Yuua tai nhanda ila nhu ti Sameeliangaa o hali.)
43004010	Ka Yisɔsi i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Aa bele ngaa bi fembɛ na gɔɔnaa nana Ngebɔ aa fe ningaaɛ, fee na o gbɔnhu, aa bele ngaa bi nuu na gɔɔnaa i gɛi bi nwa, 'Nya gɔa aa nja ngi kpɔɛ,' bi ba ala nwɔɔlinaa nha nja ɔandaa nhanwa bi eya, awa i ba nja ɔaa nha bi eya nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ."
43004011	Ka nyɔugbɛa na i gɛa ala nwa, "Kenɛi, kɛɛmu ai bi eya nana baa nja na laan nda, awa fee na o gbɔnhu, nja loga na nhu suluun ngɔ, mii nwɛ bɔɔ nja na hɔlɔ na nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ?
43004012	Ee bi lo ngɔ la bi gɛ bi gbekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ mi bemba naa Yekɔpi, nana i nja loga indinɛi loi aa nuee, nhaa ala gbɔha na kɛɛ nhu ya gbɔɛa, awa nhaa ngi nhiindengaa i ngoo ngi nhuaa i ngoo kati nhu ya gbɔɛa?"
43004013	Ka Yisɔsi i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nja loga indinɛi nhu ya na gbɔɛ, maa nwɔɔ na siina nja nwɔi ɔɔ gbaia alaa,
43004014	kɛlɛ nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nja na gbɔɛ nana ngɔɔ ngɔa ngeya, maa nwɔɔ na siina nja nwɔi aigɔ gbaai gbɔnhu alaa. Gbaa nja na nana ngɔɔ ngɔa ngeya ɔɔ belenaa ala nhu ɛɛ nja unhu, nana ɔɔ nja ɔa ala eya, awa maa ya na siina nwɛ ɔɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu ɔa ala eya."
43004015	Ka nyɔugbɛa na i gɛa ala nwa, "Kenɛi, nya gɔa aa maa ya indinɛi, kangaa nja nwɔi ai ba gbaai gbɔnhu nyaa, fee na o gbɔnhu, ngai ba ba bei gbɔnhu nja ui ma."
43004016	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Lia bi ui bi nhii naa wu ba bei."
43004017	Ka nyɔugbɛa na i gɛa ala nwa, "Ngai nhii mbɛ." Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Bi lee ngɔ nhuna bi gɛi bai nhii mbɛ.
43004018	Gbaa boo kɛmbɛ guaaɔ nhiingaa lɔɔungaa le aa ngila ngila, awa nhii nana bi ngeya chaanngi nhu, bi nhii gbekpe ngaile. Awae boo tɔmbaga yia gɛa."
43004019	Ka nyɔugbɛa na i gɛa ala nwa, "Kenɛi, ngoo tɔa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ letu nwɛ aa biee.
43004020	Njie ngindinɛia naa nwɛɛɔ n`i bembaa i tee Ngebɔ batou na, kɛlɛ wua Yuua i ngaa wuee wɛɛ ningaa kataa Ngebɔ batou Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu."
43004021	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Nyɔugbɛa i, laanɛɛa aa indinɛi ngi baa kɛ aa biee aa kɛɛlaa, lɔgɔ ɔɔ baa nhuna nuu aigɔ Kɛɛgɛ na batou gbɔnhu njie ngindinɛia inaile Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu.
43004022	Wua Sameeliangaa i ngaa wuee, wai nana gɔɔ waa batou kɛlɛ nua Yuua i ngaa nuee, ni nana gɔɔnaa naa batou, gbɛnhaile ndendouyaa hɔlɔndaa i baia kualaa Yuua i ngee.
43004023	Kɛlɛ lɔgɔ na lɔ aa ba, awa hiti ɔ tɔ bɛnhɛ nhuna tɔmbaga batou mbelaa tɔɔ Kɛɛgɛ na batou ngi Yina na fɔha na nhu ka tɔmbaga nhu. Gbaa ningaa indiini bonda, tua nwɛ Kɛɛgɛ na aa ti ɔɛ ɔɛ kangaa ti ala batou.
43004024	Ngebɔ Yina nwɛɛ. Awa natiini taa ala batou, kataa ala batou ngi Yina na fɔha na nhu o ka tɔmbaga nhu."
43004025	Ka nyɔugbɛa na i gɛa Yisɔsi nwa, "Ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ ɔɔ baa, (ala nwɛ taa ui mba aa Kilaisi) awa nhuna ɔɔ ba, ɔɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na gɛa aa muee."
43004026	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Nya, ngaa yɛpɛ biee, nya nwɛ maa nwɔɔ na aa nge."
43004027	Aa maa lɔgɔ na siina kpɛti, ka ngi galandengaa i ti baa, awa kati gbɛia nja lee ngɔnhu aa Yisɔsi nwaaindaa k`ati yɛpɛ tii nyɔugbɛa o. Kɛlɛ hali bɛnhɛ ti ila kee ai gɛi nyɔugbɛa na nwa, "Gbɛɛ baa ngɔɛ ɔɛ?" inaile ai gɛi Yisɔsi nwa, "Gbɔɔ waa yɛpɛ wui ala o?"
43004028	Nhu nwɛɛ nyɔugbɛa na i kɛɛmu na loi na heii awa nja ee naanɔɔ nhu tɔ, kɛɛ bɛɛlaa taa waa na nhu, awa kɛɛ gɛa na ningaa i ma,
43004029	"A balɛ wu ndakpa lɔ nana i gbɛ o gbɛ na ambonga nya nwa bɛɛ ngi pelengaɔ. Ee wɛɛ Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aile gɔi aa ala?"
43004030	Nhu nwɛɛ ningaa i ti ɛai nhu taa waa na nhu awa kati uunnga nhu Yisɔsi nwa.
43004031	Naa loganhu na siina, k`a kalandengaa i ti Yisɔsi gɔɔbi gɛnhi, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, mɛnhɛi nwɛa!"
43004032	Kɛlɛ kɛɛ ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Mɛnhɛi lɔ nya eya mɛndaa nhanwa nana wua wai kɔɔ."
43004033	Nhu nwɛɛ kalandengaa i ti tɔɔloni aa mɔɔli pele pelendaa loganhu gɛnhi, "Ee i ba bele ngaa ka nuu i baa alɛɛ aa mɛnhɛi?"
43004034	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Nya nwɛnhɛi na nwɛ aa nuu na guunmayaa na belendaa nana i nya loni, awa ka pilandaa ngenge na nwa nana i ngɔai ngeya kangaa ngi pele.
43004035	Ee wai kɛɛ nwa, 'Oo lo ngau ngi naai mi ba tɔɔnhai na lɛɛ lɛɛ mba?' Kpeendɛ, ngi kɛ aa wuee, a nhɛɛ na nhu gbeena pandaa, awa wɔɔ tɔa aa kɛɛlaa tɔɔnhai na oo hiti nhu tɛɛ lɛɛndaa mba nhanwa.
43004036	Ngebɔ alaa nuu na baabaa ngɔ tɔ nana aa njɔpɔ na nhu gbatɛ gbatɛ awa i ma tɔɔnhai na aa lɔgɔ kpeele na nhu wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu nhanwa. Awae nuu na nana aa fain ka nuu na nana aa tee, tɔɔ goonhu nɛɛa ngilamaa.
43004037	Awa njia indinɛi tɔmbaga yia nwɛ ti kɛi gɛnhi, 'Nuu nana oo fainnaa, nuu lagbiti naa oo teea.'
43004038	Ngi wu lonia kangaa wu li wu nana lɛ kpeele na nhu nana wai nwɔɛi nwa fanwa. Ningaa lagbitia nwɛ ti maa nwɔɛ na nwɛi, awa wua woo qani hɔlɔa kualaa ti nwɔɛ nwa na nhu."
43004039	Sameeliangaa gbinhi ɔɔ maa laa na siina nhu kati laanɛɛa aa Yisɔsi, gbɛnhaile nyɔugbɛa na oo gɛ ti nwa, "Oo nana gɛa na nge bɛɛ ngi pelengaɔ."
43004040	Awae nhuna Sameeliangaa i ti baa baai ala le, kati Yisɔsi lɔɔndɔɔnga kangaa i gɛ na tii tua o, awa ee naanɔɔ tii tua o nhaa mi guu fee.
43004041	Awa ngoo na nana Yisɔsi ee kɛɛ gɛɛ aa ningaa i, ka ngoo na siina i pelenga ka ningaa gbinhi gbinhia lagbitia ti laanɛɛa.
43004042	Nhu nwɛɛ ti gɛi nyɔugbɛa na nwa, "Chaanngi nhu nua noo laanɛɛa, kɛlɛ na nhaile gbo bi kɛi aa nuee ala nhanwae kɛlɛ ni laanɛɛia gbɛnhaile, nua ni gbɔha na kpei noo ala oo nwɛinga aa guegue, awa noo kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa aa tɔmbaga indinɛi nwɛ Ndendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala ngelou naɛ."
43004043	Awa nhuna mi guu fee na i leeni na Yisɔsi nwa, kɛɛ segea na awa kɛɛ ya mɛɛ Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
43004044	Gbaa Yisɔsi gbɔha na oo kɛa aa kɛɛlaa, Ngebɔ letu na ningaa tai mbɛɛ gɛ alaa mɛɛ ngi bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
43004045	Awae nhuna i bai mɛɛ Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, ka Galiilia i ti ala binjanga nhanda nhanda na nhanwa bɛɛ nana ti tɔi i pele peleni mɛɛ Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu aa Pii Manhu Gbolo na lɔgɔ.
43004046	Awa ka Yisɔsi i bɛɛlaa boma taa golo na nhu taa ui naa aa Kena mɛɛ Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, napangaa mɛɛ i nja na nwaa boteni na aa ndɔɔ na. Awa tomaa nwɔɔ ee naanɔɔ mɛɛ Kepanɔmu nana ngi nhiindou na hegbɛ ɔɔ.
43004047	Nhuna i mɛini aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi oo ba Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu aa sege Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, kɛɛ ya na ala le awa kɛɛ maa nɛɛ nɛɛnga kangaa i li Kepanɔmu laa waa na nhu i ngi nhiindou na gɛndɛ nana ee haa chambala ngɔa ngɔ qaanhu.
43004048	Faa nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i gɛi ala nwa, "Wua k`a kamaa nhanda nwɛ waa tɔ aa bele tii kaila nhanda o waa tɔ aa gula yeingaa wu gilaa laanɛɛ, kɛlɛ ina ai beleni, hali wu ila kee ai laanɛɛ."
43004049	Ka tomaa nwɔɔ na i gɛa ala nwa, "Kenɛi, kina nya nhiindou na ai lɛ haai lɛ ndaalo, bi lee nwɛɛ baa mi li."
43004050	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Lia, bi nhiindou na ɔɔ gɛndɛa." Ka ndakpa na i laanɛɛa aa ngoo na nana Yisɔsi i kɛi, awae kɛɛ ya.
43004051	Awa ee li, kati gɔɛnga aa ngi eyaalakpangaa i natiini ti gɛi ala nwa ngi nhiindou na oo gɛndɛ!
43004052	Awae kɛɛ ti nwɔɔlinga aa kɛɛlaa lɔgɔ na ngigbɛɛ nwɛ i tɔɔloni aa kɛɛlaa bisa? Nhu nwɛɛ ti gɛi ala nwa, "Gbengi aa fooliiya na, mi gɛa nhuna foo na i gɛi kigisi, nhu nwɛɛ kaanhu gbaai gbaai hegbɛ na i gbeni alaa."
43004053	Awae ka nhiindou na kɛɛgɛ na i kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa maa lɔgɔ na nwɛ aa na kpei nhuna Yisɔsi i gɛi ala nwa, "Bi nhiindou na ɔɔ gɛndɛa." Awae ala gbɔha na kɛɛ laanɛɛa, awa nhaa tɔ bɛnhɛ ngi bongaa gbɔhaa i bɛɛ, kati laanɛɛa.
43004054	Awa kamaa na fee na nwɛɔ aa indinɛi nana Yisɔsi i peleni Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu nhuna i segei Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
43005001	Nhuna nhanda nhanda indinɛi i leeni nga, ka Yuua i ti kpolo gbatɛa, awa ka Yisɔsi i ya maa gbolo na nhu mɛɛ Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu.
43005002	Mɛɛ Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu, kpangba laa bele lɔ na taa ui mba aa Mbaala Gbangba Laa Bele. Kpangba Laa Bele na siina gbɛlaa popa tɔ na nana taa ui mba aa Bɛtisata Hibulu haa na nhu. Heinwaa lɔɔu kpatɛ gbatɛ ngɔ mba na nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ kake gake.
43005003	Awa maa gake gake na siinaa, naa nwɛɛ hegbɛ belaa gbinhi gbinhia tee na laa laai, napangaa, titi belaa o, kunduu mbelaa o, ka gbɔlɔgbɔlɔ belaa. ((Tee naanɔɔ laa laai k`ati nja na nwaa golo kangaa i sii sia nhu.
43005004	Gbaa Ngebɔ nwaleka ee baa lɔgɔ lɛingaa nwa maa bopa na nhu, awa kɛɛ nja na sii siaa nhu, kangaae nhuna aa sii sia la, nuu na nana pɛnhɛɛ aa nhumbu aa hitɛ maa ya nau, maa nwɔɔ na siina ɔɔ kɛndɛyaa hɔlɔa kualaa hegbɛ o hegbɛ nhu nana aa gɛɔ ala nhu.))
43005005	Ndakpa ila ngee naanɔɔ nana i kpaungaɔ hegbɛ nhu aa fogo buu buu chawa i manhu ɔsaakpa.
43005006	Nhuna Yisɔsi i ndakpa na lɔi na laai, awa i nhu kɔɔni boma aa kɛɛlaa giilɛɔ ndakpa na siina aa hegbɛ, kɛɛ ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Ee bi lo ngɔ la bi gɛndɛ?"
43005007	Ka hegbɛ nwɔɔ na i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Kenɛi, nuu ai mbɛ nana aa nya gula popa nau nhuna maleka na aa sii sia aa nja na. Awa nhuna ngaa gɛ aa ndiilaa, nuu lagbiti oo hitɛ mbu pɛnhɛɛ nyaa."
43005008	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Huua, bi ala na gbauna bi sia!"
43005009	Nhu gutu ɔ na siina ka ndakpa na i belenga aa kɛndɛ nwɔɔ. Kɛɛ ngi ala na gbaunga, awa kɛɛ sia guaa. Nhanda indinɛi siina i beleniaɔ Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo nwa.
43005010	Faa nwɛɛ Yuu fɔha belaa i ti gɛi ndakpa na nwa nana Yisɔsi i ala gɛndɛa, "Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo nwɛ aa indinɛi. Awa ni Sɔ na ɛgɛ ngaa haa ɔ bi nhanwa bi ala na houndaa nhanwa k`abi sia la."
43005011	Kɛlɛ kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Ndakpa na nana i nya gɛndɛi alɛɛ i gɛi nya nwa, 'Bi ala na gbauna bi sia.' "
43005012	Kati ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Ndakpa na ngigbɛɛ i gɛi bi nwa, 'Bi ala na gbauna bi sia?' "
43005013	Kɛlɛ ndakpa na, napangaa nana Yisɔsi i ala gɛndɛi, ai nuu na gɔɔni Yisɔsi aa ala, gbaa faka na waa ɔɔ ee na awa Yisɔsi oo gua nhinde na siina nuu ai nhu kɔɔni.
43005014	Nhu golo lɛmbini, ka Yisɔsi i ndakpa na nwaaia Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, awa ka Yisɔsi i gɛa na ala nwa, "Kpeendɛ! Boo gɛndɛ. Awae bɛhaa nhanda nyɔu bele kpɔnhu kpɔ. Ina pa baa nhanda nyɔu bele, nhanda ɔɔ belenaa aa biee nana ɔɔ gɛ nyɔui lee ngɔ."
43005015	Nhu nwɛɛ ndakpa na i lii kɛɛ kɛa aa Yuu fɔha belaa i aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi nwɛɔ i ala gɛndɛi.
43005016	Saabu indinɛi nhanwa, kati Yisɔsi aa sɛɛgɛa gbɛnhaile oo indinɛi belenga Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo na nwa.
43005017	Kɛlɛ ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Kina nya Kɛɛgɛ na lɔ aa enge nhaahaai, faa nwɛɛ nya gbɔnhu kangɔɔ enge."
43005018	Njia indinɛi nhanwa Yisɔsi i kɛi, kɛɛ pelenga Yuu fɔha belaa i ti ndaalaa belenga aa kɛɛlaa kaa haa hɔlɔ, gbɛnhaile ai gbelei gbo Sɔ naa nana i ngaa haai Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo na nwae kɛlɛ ngui na nhanwa gbɔnhu i uini Ngebɔa aa ngi Kɛɛgɛ, nhanda ila mɛɛ gbɔnhu aa maa gee nana. Gbaa aa pele ngɔ indinɛi nwɛ i gbɔha na nwaa gɛa la sɔu ngaa Ngebɔ.
43005019	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee, Ndou na ai gbɛ o gbɛ bele gbɔha nhu, kɛlɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na aa pele, nana nwɛ aa tɔ Kɛɛgɛ na aa pele. Gbaa nana bɛɛ Kɛɛgɛ na aa pele, alɛɛ gbɔnhu Ndou na aa pele.
43005020	Gbaa Kɛɛgɛ na lo ngɔ aa Ndou na, awa i nana lɔgɔɔu ngaa Ndou na bɛɛ nana ala Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala aa pele pele. Awa ɔɔ ngenge bombou mbaa lɔgɔɔu ndɔgɔɔuna aa ala nana tee tee ngɔ indinɛia, nana ɔɔ pele maa nhanda i gbɛɛ wu la.
43005021	Gbaa ɛɛ gbo Kɛɛgɛ na aa huu haa belaa i mbu kɛɛ ndɛɛhu he tuɛɛ, ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa Ndou na, aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, aa ndɛɛhu hea ningaaɛ natiini aa lo ngaa fendaa tuɛɛ.
43005022	Kɛɛgɛ na ala aile aa ningaa gɔhɔngee kɛlɛ oo fɔha na ɔaa bɛɛ Ndou na eya kɔhɔ pelendaa nhanwa,
43005023	kangaa ningaa i bɛɛ ti ba mbɛɛ gɛ Ndou naa ɛɛ taa mbɛɛ gɛ Kɛɛgɛ naa. Nuu na nana bɛɛ ai mbɛɛ gɛi Ndou naa, k`a oo lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa maa nwɔɔ na ai mbɛɛ gɛi Kɛɛgɛ naa nana i Ndou na loni.
