43005024	"Aa tɔmbaga ngi indinɛi gɛ aa wuee. Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nya oo na nwɛi awa i nwaa bɛɛ mbu, awa i laanɛɛ aa nuu na nana i nya loni, maa nwɔɔ na siina wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu lɔ ngeya. Awa Ngebɔ aigɔ ala gɔhɔ gbɔnhu, kɛlɛ oo biinga haa na nwanhu awa oo ba ndɛɛhu le.
43005025	Aa tɔmbaga ngi indinɛi gɛ aa wuee, lɔgɔ ɔɔ baa, awa maa lɔgɔ na siina paa ɔ tɔ nhuna haa belaa i tɔɔ Ngebɔ Lou na oo na nwɛi, awa natiini taa mɛi awa ti nwaa bɛɛ mbu tɔɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔa.
43005026	Gbaa ɛɛ gbo Kɛɛgɛ na ndɛɛhu he mɔɔ na aa ala, aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, oo ngi Lou na belenga aa nuu nana aa ndɛɛhu he.
43005027	Awa oo fɔha ɔaa boma Ndou na eya ningaa gɔhɔndaa nhanwa, gbɛnhaile alɛɛ Nuu na Lou na aa ala.
43005028	Indinɛi ɛɛ wu gbɛi aa kɛɛlaa, lɔgɔ ɔɔ baa nhuna haa belaa i bɛɛ tɔɔ ala oo na nwɛi
43005029	awa tɔɔ guu guaa maau na nhu. Awa natiini ti nhanda gbekpe pelengaɔ tɔɔ huua awa tɔɔ gɛa kɛndɛyaa nhu, kɛlɛ natiini ti nhanda nyɔu bele pelengaɔ tɔɔ huua awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti gɔhɔnaa awa ɔɔ ti gbɔɔnia nhaa guna bɛɛ.
43005030	"Ngai gbɛ o gbɛ bele ma nya nda guegue fɔha nhu. Ngi ningaa gɔhɔ ngaa pele na Ngebɔ i gɛi ngi ti gɔhɔ nda, na nhaa nwɛɛ kɔhɔ na nana ngaa pele ngaa ningaa i tee ngɔ, gbɛnhaile ngai nya nda guegue guunmayaa ɔɛ ɔɛ ma, kɛlɛ k`a nuu na gbo i nya loni ngi guunmayaa na nwɛ ngaa ngɔɛ ɔɛ.
43005031	"Ina nya gbɔha na ngaa seeliyaa hee hee nya gbɔha lɔgɔ fanwa, nya seeliyaa na siina waigɔ kpau ngaa tɔmbaga seeliyaa.
43005032	Kɛlɛ nuu lagbiti lɔ na nana aa seeliyaa he nya lɔgɔ fanwa, awa ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nana aa kɛ nya nhanwa tɔmbaga nwɛɛ.
43005033	Woo tetua longa Yɔni le, awa kɛɛ tɔmbaga na gɛa nya nhanwa.
43005034	Ai beleni gbo aa kɛɛlaa k`a nuu gbɔha seeliyaa aa gɛ nya eyae kɛlɛ ngi indinɛi gɛ gbo kangaa wu ndendouyaa hɔlɔ.
43005035	Yɔni ala bele ngɔɔ ɛɛ sɔuntaa nana to ngɔ nga awa k`ɛɛ huo, awa kawu goonhu nɛɛa aa kɛɛlaa ngi waun na nhu lɔgɔ lɛingaa nhanwa.
43005036	Kɛlɛ seeliyaa lɔ na nya lɔgɔ fanwa nana mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ seeliyaa naa Yɔni aa fe nya lɔgɔ fanwa, gbaa ngenge na nana Kɛɛgɛ na i ngɔa ɔai nya eya pelendaa nhanwa, napangaa ngenge indinɛi kpei ngaa pele, maa enge enge na nwɛ aa seeliyaa lɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa Kɛɛgɛ na oo nya longa.
43005037	Awa Kɛɛgɛ na nana i nya loni ala gbɔha na kpei i seeliyaa hee hee nya lɔgɔ fanwa. Wai lɛ ala oo nwɛiniɔ lɛ, inaile wai lɛ ala lɔi lɛɔ,
43005038	awa wai ngi oo na nwakɛ ngɔ wu lii na nwa, gbaa wai laanɛɛi aa nuu na i toni.
43005039	K`awu Ngebɔ Gbaali Gbaali na nhu gbee kpee, gbɛnhaile wu nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa naa nwɛɛ wɔɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ na. Awa maa Eebɔ Gbaali Gbaali na siina ala nwɛ aa seeliyaa he nya nhanwa.
43005040	Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ wu lele ɔ aa paalaa nya le kangaa wu ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ.
43005041	"Ningaa gbɔhaa le ngaile ngɔi nya ngi mbihɛ hɔlɔ na,
43005042	kɛlɛ ngi wu gɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ndomayaa ai wu nhu Ngebɔ nhanwa.
43005043	Ngoo ba nya Kɛɛgɛ na laa na fɔha na nhu, kɛlɛ wai nya binjani. Kɛlɛ nhuna bɛɛ nuu lagbiti aa ba ngi nda guegue laa na fɔha na nhu, wɔɔ ala binjanaa.
43005044	Wɔɔ gee laanɛɛ aa nge, wua wu lo ngɔ na aa mbihɛ hɔlɔndaa gbɔha loganhu, kɛlɛ wai mbihɛ ɔɛ ɔɛ nana sege ɔ Ngebɔ le nana aa kɛɛlaa ngila ngɔ na nwɛ gbo kele Ngebɔ aa ala?
43005045	Awɛɛ nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa ngɔɔ wu hɔɔlɛ hɔɔlɛa aa njia mɛɛ Kɛɛgɛ na le. Nuu na nana aa wu hɔɔlɛ hɔɔlɛ aa njia mɛɛ Kɛɛgɛ na le, ala nwɛ aa Moosisi nana wu wu nɛɛnwaa la na bu ngɔ ala nhu.
43005046	Gbaa ina aa tɔmbaga kawu laanɛɛa aa Moosisi, wu ba laanɛɛa aa nge, gbɛnhaile kɛɛ nhanda gbaalia nana ngu to ngɔ nyaa.
43005047	Kɛlɛ ina wai laanɛɛi aa nana i kpaali gbaalii, wɔɔ gee laanɛɛ aa nya nda oo nana ngaa kɛ?"
43006001	Nhuna nhanda nhanda indinɛi i leeni nga, ka Yisɔsi i ya Galiili Ya Loka na bou nwa, (napangaa nja loka na taa ui mba gbɔnhu aa Taibaliasi).
43006002	Awa ka faka bombou mbaa i ndaa alaa, gbɛnhaile kati ngi gamaa na lɔa nana ee pele pele natiini ma ti hegbɛ hegbɛ ɔ naɔ.
43006003	Ka Yisɔsi i lɛa na njie nga, awa kɛɛ heia na tii ngi galandengaa i ngoo.
43006004	Chaanngi nhu lɔgɔ na oo gbɛɛa gbɛlaa Yuua i ti gbolo na guandaa nhanwa nana taa ui mba aa Pii Manhu Gbolo.
43006005	Ka Yisɔsi i au siaa, awa kɛɛ faka bombou mbaa lɔa nana ee ba ala le, awae kɛɛ Filiipi nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Mii nwɛ mɔɔ mɛnhɛi eya na nana ɔɔ gu ngelou haka indinɛi laa gɔndaa la nhanwa?" (
43006006	Yisɔsi i indinɛi gɛia gbo kangaa i Filiipi nhua. Gbaa ala gbɔha na kpei i nana gɔɔnia pelendaa ee ngeya.)
43006007	Ka Filiipi i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ɔɔ leenaa kɔpa gɔu gɛmɛ fee nhu nana taa ui mba aa linaaliɔsi, lɛgɛ gbɛnha eyandaa la nhanwa kangaa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ faka indinɛi liiya i kolo hɔlɔ, aigɔ gu ti nhanwa hali." (Linaaliɔsi foo ila paabaa nwɛɔ ngenge nwɔɔ nhanwa.)
43006008	Ngi galandou ila kee taa ui mba aa Andulu, napangaa Saimɔni Pita ndege nhiindou na, ala nwɛɔ i gɛi Yisɔsi nwa,
43006009	"Nhiindou lɔ bei nana lɛgɛ gbɛnha lɔɔu ngi ngeya nana ti kpatɛi kualaa tɔɔnhai gaai nhu taa ui mba aa baali, awa nyiɛa feengaa lɔ gbɔnhu ngeya. Kɛlɛ gbɛɛ na aa kua ningaa gbinhi gbinhia?"
43006010	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa kalandengaa i ma, "A pelena ningaa i ti hei." (Nhinde na siina nguu gbinhi gbinhi ee naanɔɔ.) Awae ka ningaa i ti heia bɛɛ. Ningaa i siina liiya, mi gɛa kɛgɛingaa wuulu lɔɔungaa nwɛɔ tee na ina mai njiengaa i kulai kpaga naa tii ndengaa i ngoo.
43006011	Ka Yisɔsi i lɛgɛ gbɛnha na gbau kpaunga, kɛɛ fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa, awa kɛɛ kɔɛ gɔɛa ningaa i ma natiini tee na hei heii. Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu i peleni aa nyiɛa i, awa tua bɛɛ kati hɔlɔ hɔlɔa ɛɛ gbo ngɔi ee tuaa.
43006012	Awa nhuna ti mɛi nhaa ka ti goo henga, kɛɛ gɛa ngi galandengaa i ma, "A ngi gbaha mba na aa lɔgɔ lɔgɔa kangaa mai ba pele nhu aa nyaai."
43006013	Awae kati ngi gbaha mba aa lɔgɔ lɔgɔa bɛɛ nhaa kɛɛ bɛɛtɛ puu i manhu fee laa fe fenga kualaa lɛgɛ gbɛnha lɔɔu na nhu nana ningaa i ti mɛa.
43006014	Nhuna ningaa i ti kamaa ngindinɛi lɔi nana Yisɔsi i peleni, kati gɛa, "Aa tɔmbaga, indinɛi nwɛ Ngebɔ Letu na aa ala nana paalaa i na ngelou i nhu."
43006015	Ee naanɔɔ ningaa i nɛɛnwaa nhu aa kɛɛlaa tɔɔ ba ti gbundɛ Yisɔsi nwa, kangaa ti ala bɔlɔ aa manhayaa, napangaa manha mbaa. Kɛlɛ nhuna Yisɔsi i indinɛi nhu kɔɔni, kɛɛ guaa na ti liiya awa kɛɛ ya njie njie na nhu ala ila ngɔ kele.
43006016	Nhuna kpɔkɔhoo na i hitii, ka ngi galandengaa i ti yeia nja loka na nhu,
43006017	kati heia na njaa lɛndɛ nhu, awa kati sia guaa nja loka na leendaa nhanwa ndiilaa Kepanɔmu laa waa na nhu. Kpindi oo bɛɛa tuaa, awa Yisɔsi ai lɛ gɛi bai na tuee.
43006018	Awa ka hɛfɛ mbombou mbaa i baa nana i tɔɔloni aa nja na sii siandaa nhu.
43006019	Nhuna kalandengaa i natiini tee njaa lɛndɛ na nhu ti nja na uini nhaa kati hofo guaa bou nwa nana nhu gɔha ɔ na hiti ɔɔ taa naai ma, kati Yisɔsi lɔa ee sia nja na gɔma, awa k`ɛɛ ba njaa lɛndɛ na gbɛlaa nana tee nhu heii, awae kati luaa kpɔ.
43006020	Kɛlɛ ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Awɛɛ lua, nya nwɛ!"
43006021	Nhu nwɛɛ ti peleni i ɔai njaa lɛndɛ na nhu, awa ti pelenia aa koonhu nɛɛ. Awa nhu gutu ɔ na siina, ka njaa lɛndɛ na i hitia aa tuee njie na nwa mɛɛna ti naa sia guai.
43006022	Maa ee na i oni, faka na nana i loi nja loka na bou nwa, maa haka na siina oo tɔa aa kɛɛlaa njaa lɛndɛ ila mɛɛɔ gbo kele ee na maa nhinde na siina, awa tai tɔi Yisɔsi aa ɔa njaa lɛndɛ na nhu ngilamaaa tii ngi galandengaa i ngoo, kɛlɛ kalandengaa i teelee na nwɛɔ gbo tee nhu ti lii.
43006023	Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, ka njaa lɛndɛ lagbiti i baa baa kualaa Taibaliɔsi laa waa na nhu, awa kɛɛ baa baa nhinde na gbɛlaa mɛɛna ti lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛɛ nwɛɛi na nhuna Maliki na i maa hiɛ guai pɛnhɛɛ Ngebɔ nwa fanwa.
43006024	Awae nhuna faka na i tɔi aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi aile na, awa ngi galandengaa i ngoo gbɔnhu taile na, ti gbɔha na kati ɔa ɔaa maa yaa lɛndɛ na nhu, awa kati ya Kepanɔmu laa waa na nhu aa Yisɔsi ɔɛ ɔɛ.
43006025	Nhuna faka indinɛi i Yisɔsi nwaaleii nja loka na bou nwa, kati gɛa ala nwa, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, gbee nwɛɛ bi bai bei?"
43006026	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee, kamaa nhanda na wu tɔi faa aile waa nya ɔɛ ɔɛe kɛlɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nhaa nwɛɛ nana wu mɛi nhaa kawu goo henga.
43006027	Awɛɛ enge mɛnhɛi na nhanwa nana ɔɔ nyaai, kɛlɛ a engea mɛnhɛi na nhanwa nana aa lɛmbi wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu nhanwa, nana Nuu na Lou na ɔɔ ngɔa wu eya, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo ndɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa ala goonhu nɛɛ ɔ ala nwa."
43006028	Nhu nwɛɛ ti gɛi ala nwa, "Gbɛɛ nɔɔ pele kangaa ni nana bele kpala ngi Ngebɔa ni pele alɛɛ?"
43006029	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Nana kpala ngi Ngebɔa wu pele ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, wu laanɛɛ aa nuu na nana Ngebɔ i ala longa."
43006030	Nhu nwɛɛ ti kpɛɛmboni gɛnhi, "Gbɛɛ gamaa mɛ bɔɔ pele kangaa ni naa lɔ awa ni ba laanɛɛ aa biee? Gbɛɛ enge nwɛ baa pele?
43006031	Ni bembaa i ngɔɔ kati lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛaɔ qɛa bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, napangaa lɛgɛ gbɛnha na taa ui mba aa mana ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i yɛpɛi gɛnhi fanwa, 'Kɛɛ lɛgɛ ɔaa ti eya, nana i pui mbu tuɛɛ kualaa aliyana, kangaa ti mɛ.' "
43006032	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, Moosisi aile i lɛgɛ gbɛnha na ɔa ɔaa wu eya kualaa aliyanae kɛlɛ nya Kɛɛgɛ na nwɛ nana aa tɔmbaga lɛgɛ na ɔa ɔa wu eya kualaa aliyana.
43006033	Gbaa Ngebɔ nda lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nana aa fe ala nwɛ aa nuu na nana aa ba kualaa aliyana, nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaa i mbɛ ti ngelou na nhu."
43006034	Kati gɛa ala nwa, "Kenɛi, maa lɛgɛ indinɛi ɔaa ni eya aa gbele o gbele."
43006035	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Nya nwɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha na aa nge nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ. Nuu na nana aa ba nya le, ndɔɛ aigɔ gbaai alaa. Awa nuu na nana aa laanɛɛ aa nge, nja nwɔi aigɔ gbaai alaa gbɔnhu.
43006036	Kɛlɛ ngoo kɛa aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa woo nya lɔa, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, waigɔ laanɛɛ.
43006037	Nuu o nuu nana Kɛɛgɛ na aa ngɔa nya eya ɔɔ baa nya le. Awa nuu na nana pa aa ba nya le, aa tɔmbaga ngaigɔ ala gbɛ.
43006038	Gbaa ngoo hitɛa mbu kualaa aliyana kangaa ngi nuu na guunmayaa na bele nana i nya loni, kɛlɛ nya nda guunmayaa belendaa nhaa aile ngi bai.
43006039	Awa nuu na nana i nya loni ngi nda guunmayaa na nwɛ aa indinɛi aa kɛɛlaa, natiini yɔ i ti ɔaa nya eya, ngɛɛ ngila kee lo nhu hali, kɛlɛ ngi huu tiu bɛɛ kualaa haa nhu gbele mba hoo na nwa.
43006040	Gbaa nya Kɛɛgɛ na guunmayaa na nwɛ aa indinɛi aa kɛɛlaa, nuu o nuu nana aa Ndou na lɔ awa i laanɛɛ aa ala, k`a maa nwɔɔ na siina aa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ. Awa ngɔɔ huua alau kualaa haa na nhu gbele mba hoo na nwa."
43006041	Ka Yuu u mbelaa i ti gɔɔ nhu yiaa aa ala, gbɛnhaile oo gɛ, "Nya nwɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha na aa nge nana i hitɛi mbu kualaa aliyana."
43006042	K`ati gɛ, "Ee Yisɔsi aile aa indinɛi, napangaa Yosɛfu nhiindou na? Mi ngi kɛɛgɛ na gɔɔnaa ka ngi nje na. Aa gee gɛ, 'Ngoo hitɛa mbu kualaa aliyana?' "
43006043	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Awɛɛ gɔɔ nhu yia.
43006044	Nuu ai na nana aa ba nya le aa gbɔha, k`a Kɛɛgɛ na nwɛ nana i nya loni, ala nwɛ aa maa nwɔɔ na nwaa laan nya le yeingaa i gilaa ba nya le. Awa nya ngɔɔ huua maa nwɔɔ nau kualaa haa na nhu gbele mba hoo na nwa.
43006045	Ka Ngebɔ letua i ti indinɛi gbaalia, tɛɛe 'Tua bɛɛ tɔɔ nagɔli hɔlɔa Ngebɔ eya.' Ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nana aa gɛ ngoo nwɛi ngɔɔ kualaa Kɛɛgɛ na le awa i gɛ nagɔli hɔlɔ ngɔɔ gbɔnhu ngeya, maa nwɔɔ na nwɛ ɔɔ ba nya le.
43006046	Indinɛi ai beleni aa kɛɛlaa k`a nuu lagbiti lɔ na nana i Kɛɛgɛ na lɔa. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana gbo kpɛti i Kɛɛgɛ na lɔa ala nwɛ aa nuu na nana i baa kualaa Ngebɔ le.
43006047	Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, nuu na nana aa laanɛɛ aa nge, wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu lɔ maa nwɔɔ na eya.
43006048	Nya nwɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha na aa nge nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ.
43006049	Ka wu bembaa i ti ti lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛaɔ nana taa ui mba aa mana mɛɛ qɛa bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, kɛlɛ kati haaa.
43006050	Kɛlɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nana aa bu mbu kualaa aliyana kangaa nuu i mɛ, nhuna aa mɛ, ɛagɔ haa.
43006051	Lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ nana i hitɛi mbu kualaa aliyana, nya nwɛ maa lɛgɛ gbɛnha na aa nge. Awa ina nuu aa maa lɛgɛ gbɛnha indinɛi siina nwɛ, aigɔ haa, kɛlɛ ɔɔ gɛa na wɔwɔwɔ. Awa lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nana ngɔɔ fe kangaa i ndɛɛhu he ningaa i mbɛ ti ngelou i nhu, ala nwɛ aa nya lugu na."
43006052	Ka indinɛi i baa aa tonga Yuu u mbelaa i ndoganhu nhaa ka ngaa guaa mbaabaga nhu. k`ati gɛ gbɔha na nwa, "Ndakpa indinɛi aa gee ala lugu ɔa mi eya kangaa mi mɛ?"
43006053	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, kawaa nuu na Lou na lugu na nwɛ awa wu ngi qanwa na gbɔɛ. Kɛlɛ ina wai peleni, waigɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ wu gbɔha na nhu hali.
43006054	Nuu na nana aa nya lugu na nwɛ awa i bote boma i nya qanwa na gbɔɛ, wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu lɔ maa nwɔɔ na eya, awa ngɔɔ huua alau kualaa haa na nhu gbele mba hoo na nwa.
43006055	Gbaa nya lugu na tɔmbaga nwɛnhɛi na nwɛ, awa nya qanwa na tɔmbaga nhai na nwɛ nuu aa kpɔɛ.
43006056	Nuu na bɛɛ aa nya lugu na nwɛ awa i nya qanwa na gbɔɛ, maa nwɔɔ na siina alaa nya nhu awa nyaa pa ala nhu.
43006057	Ɛɛ gbo Kɛɛgɛ na nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ i nya loni, oo ndɛɛhu hea nyɛɛ, ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu ngɔɔ pele ngaa nuu na nana aa nya nwɛ, ngɔɔ ndɛɛhu hea alɛɛ.
43006058	Indinɛi lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛ nana i hitɛi mbu kualaa aliyana. Awa ai beleni ɛɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nana wu bembaa i ti mɛiɔ, awa kati haaa. Faa nwɛɛe nuu na nana aa lɛgɛ gbɛnha indinɛi nwɛ nana i hitɛi mbu kualaa aliyana, maa nwɔɔ na siina ɔɔ gɛa na wɔwɔwɔ."
43006059	Yuua ti gɔɛ pɛlɛ nau nwɛɛɔ Yisɔsi i maa yia indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛi na nhuna ee ningaa i nagɔli mɛɛ Kepanɔmu laa waa na nhu.
43006060	Faa nwɛɛe ngi galandengaa gbinhi ɔ nhuna ti njia indinɛi nwɛini i kɛi, kati gɛa, "Njia indinɛi i kɛa kaande ngɔ. Ele nwɛɛ aa oo nhɛɛ ma?"
43006061	Kɛlɛ ka Yisɔsi i indinɛi gɔɔnga nana kalandengaa i ti maa gɔɔ nhu yia beleni, gbɛnhaile ala nɛɛnwaa na oo kɛa aa ala. Faa nwɛɛ i gɛi ti nwa, "Ee indinɛi oo pelenga wu gbaha wu laanɛɛ na nhu?
43006062	Ɛɛ waa tɔ k`a Nuu na Lou na i lɛ boma mɛɛ ee naɔ pɛnhɛɛ ngɔhanwaa?
43006063	Nana aa ndɛɛhu he nuuɛ ala nwɛ aa Ngebɔ Yina na. Kɛlɛ nuu gbɔha fɔha ai ku aa pele. Kɛlɛ ngoo na nana ngi kɛa aa wuee ala nwɛ aa ba aa Ngebɔ Yina na nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ.
43006064	Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, wu lɛingaa lɔ na wua na wai laanɛɛi." (Yisɔsi i nhu kɔɔniaɔ kualaa tɔɔlomaa na natiini tai ba laanɛɛ awa ka nuu na nana ɔɔ ala nwaa sia.)
43006065	Awa kɛɛ gɛa boma, "Saabu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ kpei ngi kɛi aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa nuu ai ku aa ba nya le, k`a Kɛɛgɛ na nwɛ aa maa fɛɛlɛ na he alɛɛ, i gilaa ba nya le."
43006066	Indinɛi nhanwa, Yisɔsi bou belaa gbinhi ɔ kati gɔngaa hea alaa, awa taile sia gbɔnhu ngilamaaa tii ala o kpɔ.
43006067	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ngi galandengaa puungaa i ma ti manhu fee na, "Ee wua gbɔnhu wu lo ngɔ la wu gɔngaa he nyaa?"
43006068	Ka Saimɔni Pita i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Maliki, ele le mɛ nɔɔ li na? Bia nwɛ ngoo na i bi eya nana aa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu hee hee ningaaɛ.
43006069	Awa noo laanɛɛa awa noo kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa bia nwɛ Nuu na aa biee nana Ngebɔ i toni."
43006070	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ee nya gbɔha na aile ngi wu puu ngɔ na nhu ɔhɛi wu manhu fee na? Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ wu ila kee na ngafɔ mɛ aa ala!"
43006071	Yulasi nwɛɔ Yisɔsi i gɛi ma ngafɔ mɛɔ, napangaa Saimɔni Isikaliɔti nhiindou na. Gbaa Yulasi indinɛi ngila mɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala kalandengaa puungaa i ndiiya ti manhu fee na, awa ala nwɛɔ Yisɔsi nwaa siandaa na ee ngeya.
43007001	Nhanda nhanda indinɛi i leeni nga, ka Yisɔsi i sii siaa Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Kpala ngaile alaaɔ i sii sia Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, gbɛnhaile ala baa mɔi ee naanɔɔ Yuu fɔha belaa i mba.
43007002	Awa ka lɔgɔ na i gbɛɛa kpɛlaa Yuua i ti gbolo na guandaa nhanwa, napangaa kpolo na nana tee kua ti nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlandaa nhanwa lɔgɔ na nwa nhuna ti bembaa i tee kpaanya gbaanya nau.
43007003	Ka Yisɔsi ndege nhiindengaa i ti gɛa Yisɔsi nwa, "Segea nhinde indinɛi bi li Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, kangaa bi bou belaa i ngɔɔ napangaa natiini ti guaaɔ bi bou nwa, ti ba kamaa na lɔ nana baa pele pele.
43007004	Gbaa nuu na nana bɛɛ ndo ngɔ la ti ala gɔɔ kɔɔ, maa nwɔɔ ai nhanda bele ndɔɔgu nhu. Kina bia baa nhanda nhanda indinɛi bele pele, maa nhiɛ ɔ baa gbɔha na lɔgɔɔu ngaa ngelou gbɔha na kangaa ti bi gɔɔ!" (
43007005	Gbaa hali bɛnhɛ ngila mɔɔ ngi ndege nhiindengaa i ndiiya, ai laanɛɛi aa ala.)
43007006	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Nya nda lɔgɔ na ai lɛ hitii, kɛlɛ wua, lɔgɔ o lɔgɔ lɔgɔ nwɛɛ wu nhanwa.
43007007	Ngelou na ai lolo aa wuee, kɛlɛ nya nwɛ tolo ɔ aa nge, gbɛnhaile k`angi yia ma aa kɛɛlaa ngeyaabele na nyɔu ɔ.
43007008	Wua wu gbɔha na a lia kpolo na nhu, kɛlɛ nya gbɔha na ngaigɔ li kpolo indinɛi nhu, gbɛnhaile nya lɔgɔ na ai lɛ hitii nhu lɛ pandaa."
43007009	Nhuna i bilani aa indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛndaa, kɛɛ loa Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
43007010	Kɛlɛ nhuna ngi ndege nhiindengaa i ti lii kpolo na nhu, ka Yisɔsi gbɔha na i ya na boma kpolo na nhu. Kɛlɛ i lii ai guai kpou, kɛlɛ ndɔɔgu nhu nwɛɛɔ ee na.
43007011	Yuu fɔha belaa i tee au siaa aa ala kpolo na nhu, k`ati gɛ, "Ala mii?"
43007012	Ka ningaa i ti ngi laa houa la faka na nhu, lɛingaa i k`ati gɛ, "Nuu gbekpe mɛɛ aa ala." Kɛlɛ lagbitia i k`ati gɛ, "Nuu gbekpe ngaile aa ala hali. Alaa ningaa i pu aa kaka pele."
43007013	Kɛlɛ nuu ai gbandɛi aa ngi yia, gbɛnhaile k`ati lua Yuu fɔha belaa i mba.
43007014	Ningaa i ti gɛi tɔɔ gua liiyaa nhu aa kpolo na, nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i lii Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau awa kɛɛ tɔɔlonga aa ningaa nagɔlindaa na.
43007015	Ka indinɛi i gbɛɛa Yuu fɔha belaa i nda, faa nwɛɛ ti gɛi, "Ndakpa indinɛi i gee beleni aa kɔɔ lɔ mɔɔ, kɛlɛ ai lɛ lii lɛɔ kala pɛlɛu?"
43007016	Nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmboni gɛnhi, "Nana ngaa ningaa nagɔli la, nya nda guegue nagɔli aile, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nana i nya loni, ngi nagɔli na nwɛ.
43007017	Nuu na nana bɛɛ ngi guunmayaa le aa nana belendaa kpala ngi Ngebɔa, maa nwɔɔ na siina ɔɔ kɔɔnaa aa bele ngaa nana ngaa ningaa nagɔli la seege ɔ Ngebɔ le, inaile pa ɔɔ kɔɔnaa ina nya nda guegue fɔha nwɛ ngaa yɛpɛ la.
43007018	Nuu na nana aa yɛpɛ kualaa ngi nda guegue fɔha nhu, ndo ngɔ la kangaa i mbihɛ hɔlɔ ala gbɔha na nhanwa. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa mbihɛ ɔɛ ɔɛ nuu na nhanwa nana i ala loni, i tɔmbaga gɛ, awa ai ndɛɛ gɔɔla hali.
43007019	Ee Moosisi ai Sɔ na ɔa ɔaiɔ wu eya, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ hali wu ila kee bɛnhɛ ai nwaa bɛɛ maa Sɔ na siinau? Gbɔɔ waa nya ɔɛ ɔɛ nya baandaa nhanwa?"
43007020	Ka ningaa i ti ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ngafɔ tɔ bi eya! Ele nwɛɛ aa bi ɔɛ ɔɛ bi baandaa nhanwa?"
43007021	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Kangi kamaa ngila pelenga, nana i peleni wua bɛɛ kawu gbɛia.
43007022	Ka Moosisi i gɛa wu nwa wu wu nhiindengaa ti nwanha nhanda bele pele (ai beleni aa kɛɛlaa k`a Moosisi nwɛɔ i ala indinɛi lɔɔloniɔ, kɛlɛ wu bembaa i mɛɔ ti tɔɔloni), awa wua k`awu manha nhanda bele Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo na nwa.
43007023	Ina aa bele ngaa kɛɛlaa wua k`awu manha nhanda bele Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo na nwa kangaa wai ba Sɔ na nyaai nana Moosisi i kpaalii, ina nya ngoo nuu gɛndɛa tɔ yimbou Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo na nwa, gbɔɔ waa gbaai nya nwa?
43007024	Awɛɛ nya gɔhɔ ngaa nya lɔ ngɔ na, kɛlɛ a nya gɔhɔna aa tee pele na."
43007025	Faa nwɛɛ Yɛlusalɛmua lɛingaa ti gɛi, "Ee ndakpa indinɛi aile taa ngɔɛ ɔɛ paandaa nhanwa?
43007026	Kpeendɛ! Alaa yɛpɛ faka nhu, njia ai na taa kɛ aa ala. Baa tɔ ɛɛ ti nhu kɔɔnaa qai aa kɛɛlaa ala nwɛ Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa ala?
43007027	Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ mi mɛɛ gɔɔnaa ndakpa indinɛi i segei na. Awa nhuna Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa ba, nuu aigɔ mɛɛ gɔɔ aa sege na."
43007028	Awa nhuna Yisɔsi ee ningaa i nagɔli mɛɛ Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, kɛɛ labia aa njia indinɛi gɛnhi, "Wu nya gɔɔnaa, awa wu mɛɛ gɔɔnaa ngaa sege na. Awa ngai bai nya nda guegue fɔha nhu. Awa nuu na nana i nya loni aa tɔmbaga yia gɛa awa wai ala gɔɔ.
43007029	Ngi ala gɔɔnaa, gbɛnhaile ala le mɛ ngi segei na, awa ala nwɛ i nya loni."
43007030	Nhu nwɛɛ ti pele ɔɛ ɔɛi kpundɛlaa ma nhanwa, kɛlɛ nuu ai ɔgɔ bɛɛi alaa, gbɛnhaile ngi lɔgɔ na ai lɛ gɛiɔ hitii ma.
43007031	Kɛlɛ ningaa gbinhi ɔɔ faka na nhu kati laanɛɛa aa ala, awa kati gɛa, "Gbee na Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa ba, ee ɔɔ kamaa nhanda bele pelenaa nana tee ngɔ indinɛia ndakpa indinɛi i pele pelenga?"
43007032	Ka Falesiisia i ti mɛinga nhuna faka na ee laa bɛɛ bɛɛ ou nhu aa nhanda nhanda indinɛi Yisɔsi nhanwa. Awae Yuu chaaga gua manhanga i ngoo Falesiisia i ngoo kati tomaa belaa lɛingaa longa kangaa ti li ti Yisɔsi aa gboto.
43007033	Nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i gɛi, "Ngɔɔ gɛa na lɛ tii wua o lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa, awa nhu nwɛɛ ngɔɔ li nuu na le nana i nya loni.
43007034	Wɔɔ au siaa aa nge, kɛlɛ waigɔ nya lɔ, awa mɛɛna ngi na, wai ba na."
43007035	Ka Yuu fɔha belaa i ti gɛa gbɔha na nwa, "Mii nwɛ ndakpa indinɛi i gɛa ɔɔ li na aa kɛɛlaa maigɔ ala lɔ? Ee ndii lɔ ɔɔ li baa Gilikia i ti laa waa waa na nhu i Gilikia i nagɔli na?
43007036	Gbɛɛ i ma i gɛi, 'Wɔɔ au siaa aa nge, kɛlɛ waigɔ nya lɔ, awa mɛɛna ngi na, wai ba na?' "
43007037	Kpolo indinɛi guandaa nwaa gbele mba hoo na nwa, napangaa kolo hoo bombou mbaa na maa gbolo na siina nhanwa, ka Yisɔsi i huua kɛɛ longa awa kɛɛ labia aa njia indinɛi gɛnhi, "Nuu na bɛɛ mbolo nhu aa gɛ beni, i baa nya le i nja gbɔɛ.
43007038	Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, 'Nuu na bɛɛ aa laanɛɛ aa nge, njei ya na nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ, maa ya na siina, ɔɔ gɛa aa njeilaa kualaa maa nwɔɔ na lii na nwa.' "
43007039	Yisɔsi i indinɛi gɛia ngu to ngɔ Ngebɔ Yina naa nana ningaa i tɔɔ hɔlɔ napangaa natiini ti laanɛɛi aa ala. Gbaa aa maa lɔgɔ nana Ngebɔ ai lɛ gɛi ngi Yina na ɔa ngɔɔ lɛ laanɛɛ belaa i ngeya, gbɛnhaile aa maa lɔgɔ nanaɔ, Ngebɔ ai lɛ gɛi Yisɔsi lɛ ngɔ nga awa ai lɛ gɛiɔ mbɛɛ he ngɔ alɛɛ mɛɛ aliyana.
43007040	Nhuna ti njia indinɛi nwɛi mɛini, ka ningaa i lɛingaa i ti gɛa, "Aa tɔmbaga, ndakpa indinɛi Ngebɔ Letu na nwɛ aa ala!"
43007041	Ka lagbitia i ti gɛa, "Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na nwɛ aa indinɛi!" Kɛlɛ ka lɛingaa i ti gɛa, "Ee Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu nwɛɛ ɔɔ gua na?
43007042	Ee Ngebɔ Gbaali Gbaali na ai kɛaɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na Leebilini ti goo na nhu nwɛɛ ɔɔ gua na, awa tɔɔ ndenaa Bɛtilɛhɛmu laa na nhu mɛɛna Leebili ee naɔ?"
43007043	Awae ka ndoganhu bai bai i ɔaa faka na loganhu Yisɔsi nhanwa.
43007044	Ka lɛingaa ti gɛa tɔɔ ala aa gboto, kɛlɛ nuu ai kuniɔ aa ɔgɔ bɛɛ alaa.
43007045	Ka tomaa belaa i ti bɛɛlaa boma, awa Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo Falesiisia i ngoo kati tomaa belaa i mɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Gbɔɔ wai bai aa ala?"
43007046	Ka tomaa belaa i ti ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Nuu ai lɛ yɛpɛiɔ lɛɔ ɛɛ ndakpa indinɛi aa yɛpɛ!"
43007047	Ka Falesiisia i ti ti nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Ee wua gbɔnhu oo wu gakanga?
43007048	Ee wai nuu o nuu gɔɔni manhangaa i ndiiya inaile Falesiisia i ndiiya nana i laanɛɛi aa ala?
43007049	Kɛlɛ faka indinɛi nana ai Sɔ na gɔɔ kɔɔ ngɔ nana Moosisi i kpaali gbaalii, tuaa Ngebɔ laangaa nau!"
43007050	Ti ila kee na nana tee ui mbaɔ aa Nikolimɔsi, nana i yaɔ pɛnhɛɛ Yisɔsi le, ala nwɛɔ i gɛi lagbitia i ma,
43007051	"Ee mi Sɔ na mi nda ngɔ alaa fɛɛlɛ he ngɔ muɛɛ aa nuu lɛɛndaa nhanda nhu ina maa nwɔɔ na ai lɛ siai njia nhu maa ndaahaa gɔɔ, awa mi nana gɔɔ i peleni?"
43007052	Nhu nwɛɛ ti gɛi ala nwa, "Ee bia gbɔnhu Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu nwɛɛ bi segei na? Ɔɛ ɔɛa Ngebɔ Gbaali Gbaali na bou nwa ina bɔɔ maaia nhinde aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ letu ɔɔ guaa Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Naa ai na hali." ((
43007053	Nhu nwɛɛ ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ i bɛɛlai ala le pɛlɛ la,
43008001	kɛlɛ Yisɔsi ala kɛɛ ya Oliibi Yie naa.
43008002	Awa aa ngeenhu na kɛɛ baa boma Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau. Awa ningaa i bɛɛ kati baa baa na ala le. Kɛɛ heia awa kɛɛ tɔɔlonga aa ti nagɔlindaa.
43008003	Awa Sɔ Mbelaa waa waa i ngoo, Falesiisia i ngoo, kati baa aa kɛmbɛ nwaa nyanha Yisɔsi le nana ningaa ti ala houi laai nhii ndagbiti bou nwa, nana i ala beleni na aa ngi nyanha, awa kati nyɔugbɛa na siina longa faka na liiya.
43008004	Kati gɛa Yisɔsi nwa, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, kɛmbɛ nwaa nyanha indinɛi ningaa too ala houa laai nhii ndagbiti bou nwa mɛɛna i ala beleni na aa ngi nyanha.
43008005	Chaanngi nhu ni Sɔ na nhu nana Moosisi i kpaalii, oo kɛa nhu na aa nuee aa kɛɛlaa maa nyanha indinɛi bonda, kataa maa hɔɔ aa fuulu nhaa ti paa. Chaanngi nhu bia bɛɛ gbɛ indinɛi nhanwa?"
43008006	Ti indinɛi gɛia kangaa ti ala nhua kangaae ti ba njia hɔɔlɛ hɔɔlɛ alaa. Kɛlɛ kɛɛ nwaa bɛɛa kpaali bele ma lɔa na aa ɔgɔsibo na.
43008007	Kɛlɛ nhuna ti nɔai ala nwɔɔli mɔɔlindaa na nhu, kɛɛ huua i longa kpele awa kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Nuu na nana bɛɛ ai lɛ nhanda nyɔu beleniɔ, maa nwɔɔ na siina i belena aa pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na nana ɔɔ fuulu bii nyɔugbɛa indinɛi nwa."
43008008	Awa kɛɛ nwaa bɛɛa boma kpaali na bele ma lɔa na.
43008009	Kɛlɛ nhuna ti indinɛi nwɛini i kɛi, tua bɛɛ kati loa nhu na aa ngila ngila. Ngumbaa guengaa i pɛnhɛɛ ti loo looi nhu na, awa ka Yisɔsi i loa na ngila ngɔ na. Awa nyɔugbɛa na ee naanɔɔ loni tuun ala gulɔɔ.
43008010	Ka Yisɔsi i huua i longa kpele awa kɛɛ gɛa nyɔugbɛa na nwa, "Nyɔugbɛai, ti mii ndo? Ee nuu i loia kɛndaa nhanwa aa biee aa kɛɛlaa bi lɛɛ ɔ?"
43008011	Ka nyɔugbɛa na i gɛa, "Kenɛi, hali ngila mɔɔ ai loi." Awa ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Nya gbɔha i bɛnhɛ kpei ngai gɛi bi lɛɛ ɔ nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhanwa. Lia, kɛlɛ kualaama tɔ chaanngi nhu, bɛhaa nhanda nyɔu bele gbɔnhu kpɔ."))
43008012	Ka Yisɔsi i yɛpɛa gbɔnhu Falesiisia i ngee gɛnhi, "Nya nwɛ ngelou na nhu waun na aa nge. Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nda nyaa, aigɔ sia kpindi nhu, kɛlɛ ɔɔ waun na hɔlɔa nana aa ndɛɛhu he nuuɛ."
43008013	Nhu nwɛɛ Falesiisia i ti gɛi, "Bia baa seeliyaa he bi gbɔha nhanwa, awa maa seeliyaa na siina tɔmbaga gee aile."
43008014	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Hali ngi seeliyaa he nya gbɔha na nhanwa, nya seeliyaa na ngaa fe tɔmbaga gee nwɛ. Gbaa ngi mɛɛ gɔɔnaa ngi segei na tii mɛɛ o ngaa li na. Kɛlɛ wua wai mɛɛ gɔɔ ngi segei na inaile mɛɛ ngaa li na.
43008015	Wua wu nuu gɔhɔ ngaa ala lɔ ngɔ na, kɛlɛ nya ngai nuu o nuu gɔhɔ.
43008016	Kɛlɛ hali bɛnhɛ ngi nuu gɔhɔ, nya gɔhɔ na tɔmbaga gee nwɛ. Gbaa nya ila ngɔ aile ngaa nuu gɔhɔ, kɛlɛ nya o ka Kɛɛgɛ na nana i nya loni nua nwɛ naa nuu gɔhɔ.
43008017	Moosisi lɔ kpaali ngɔ wu nda Sɔ na nhu nana nda ngɔ wu nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa nhanda o nhanda nana maa seelia feengaa taa gɛ na, nana taa kɛ maa nhanda na siina nhanwa tɔmbaga nwɛɛ.
43008018	Nya ngi seeliyaa he nya gbɔha na nhanwa, awa Kɛɛgɛ na nana i nya loni ala gbɔnhu kɛɛ seeliyaa he nya nhanwa."
43008019	Nhu nwɛɛ ti ala nwɔɔlini gɛnhi, "Bi Kɛɛgɛ na mii?" Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Wai nya gɔɔ awa wai nya Kɛɛgɛ na gɔɔ ngɔ. Ina kawu nya gɔɔnga, wu ba nya Kɛɛgɛ na gɔɔnaa boma."
43008020	Yisɔsi i njia indinɛi gɛia bɛɛ kungu na nhu mɛɛ fembɛ ɔhɛ kuma guma na ee na hei heii Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, nhuna ee ningaa i nagɔli Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau. Awa nuu ai ala aa gbotoi, gbɛnhaile ngi lɔgɔ na ai lɛ gɛiɔ hitii ma.
43008021	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa gbɔnhu ti nwa, "Ngɔɔ lia puou. Wɔɔ au siaa aa nge, awa wɔɔ haaa wu nhanda nyɔu na nhu. Mɛɛ ngaa lii na, wai ku waa li na."
43008022	Nhu nwɛɛ Yuu fɔha belaa i ti gɛi, "Ee ɔɔ gbɔha baa, gbaa oo gɛ, 'Mɛɛ ngaa li na, wai ku waa li na'?"
43008023	Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Wua mbuu indinɛi nwɛ wu segei na, kɛlɛ nya manhu na nwɛ ngi segei na. Wua ngelou indinɛi nhu belaa nwɛ aa wuee, kɛlɛ nya ngelou indinɛi nhu nwɔɔ aile aa nge.
43008024	Na nhaa nwɛɛ ngi kɛi aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa wɔɔ haaa wu nhanda nyɔu na nhu. Awa kawɔɔ haaa pa wu nhanda nyɔu na nhu ina gbo wai laanɛɛi aa kɛɛlaa 'Nya Nwɛ Maa nwɔɔ na aa Nge.' "
43008025	Nhu nwɛɛ ti ala nwɔɔlini gɛnhi, "Ele nwɛɛ aa biee?" Kɛɛ ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Gbɛɛ tɔ kpɛlɛ ngi kɛa aa wuee kualaa tɔɔlomaa na?
43008026	Nhanda na kpinhi ɔ nana i nya eya ngaa kɛ ngu to ngɔ wuaa, awa kpinhi ɔ gbɔnhu i nya eya ngaa wu gɔhɔ fanwa nhaa ngi wu lɛɛ. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana i nya loni i tɔmbaga na gɛ, awa njia na nana ngaa mɛi ala la, ala nwɛ gbo ngaa kɛ."
43008027	Tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔi aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi ee yɛpɛa tuee Kɛɛgɛ na nhanwa.
43008028	Awae ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Nhuna wɔɔ Nuu na Lou na lɛ ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na, nhu nwɛɛ wɔɔ kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa 'Nya Nwɛ Maa nwɔɔ na aa Nge,' awa ngai gbɛ o gbɛ bele ma aa nya nda guegue fɔha, kɛlɛ k`a nana gbo Kɛɛgɛ na i kɛi aa nge maa gee na nwɛ ngaa kɛ.
43008029	Awa nuu na nana i nya loni alaa na tii nya o. Ai guai nya bou nwa, gbɛnhaile aa gbele o gbele k`angi nana bele aa ala goonhu nɛɛ."
43008030	Awa ningaa i natiini ti njia indinɛi nwɛi mɛini, ti gbinhi ɔɔ kati laanɛɛa aa ala.
43008031	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa Yuua i ma natiini ti laanɛɛa aa ala, "Ina waa nwaa bɛɛ nya nagɔli nau nana ngaa pele ngaa wuee, oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa nya galandengaa gbekpengaa nwɛ aa wuee.
43008032	Wɔɔ tɔmbaga na gɔɔnaa, awa tɔmbaga na ɔɔ nhanda baanaa wuaa."
43008033	Kati ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Nua Eebilahamu goo na nhu lengaa nwɛ aa nuee, awa nai lɛ beleniɔ aa nduaa nuu le hali. I gee bai baa gɛ ni nwa, 'Nhanda ɔɔ baanaa wua'?"
43008034	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nhanda nyɔu bele, nhanda nyɔu lua nwɛ aa ala.
43008035	Ndua na ai gula ningaa ti gooa i bele ngaa koo na nhu nwɔɔ tɔ guna kpɔ, kɛlɛ koo na siina nhu lou, ala aa gɛa koo na siinaa wɔwɔwɔ.
43008036	Faa nwɛɛe ina Ndou na aa nhanda baa wuaa, nhanda ɔɔ baanaa wuaa aa tɔmbaga.
43008037	Ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Eebilahamu goo na nhu lengaa nwɛ aa wuee. Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, k`awu pele ɔɛ ɔɛ nana ɔɔ pele wu nya baa, gbɛnhaile wai kuun ngɔ nya nagɔli na nwa nana ngaa pele ngaa wuee.
43008038	Ngi yɛpɛ nana nhanwa nya Kɛɛgɛ na i ndɔgɔɔunga aa nge, kɛlɛ wua wu nana bele wu kɛɛgɛ na i kɛa aa wuee."
43008039	Kati ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "N`i Kɛɛgɛ waa na nwɛɔ aa Eebilahamu." Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Ina k`a Eebilahamu goo na nhu lengaa nwɛɔ aa wuee, wu ba nana belenaa Eebilahamu i pele peleniɔ.
43008040	Nana ngi pele pelenga tɔmbaga na gɛndaa nhaa nwɛɛ nana ngi mɛini kualaa Ngebɔ la, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, k`awu pele ɔɛ ɔɛ nya baandaa la nhanwa. Eebilahamu ai nhanda indinɛi bonda beleniɔ!
43008041	Wua waa nana bele wu Kɛɛgɛ na i peleniɔ." Kati gɛa ala nwa, "Ndo nhu lengaa aile aa nuee, na nhaa nwɛɛ Kɛɛgɛ ila mɛɛ i ni eya, Kɛɛgɛ na siina ala nwɛ aa Ngebɔ."
43008042	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Ina k`a wu kɛɛgɛ nwɛ aa Ngebɔ, wu ba lonaa aa nge, gbɛnhaile ngoo ba, ngaa sege Ngebɔ le, awa nyaa bei. Ngai bai nya nda guegue fɔha nhue kɛlɛ nuu na nana i nya loni ngi fɔha nhu nwɛɛ ngi baa na.
43008043	Gbɔɔ wai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ma nanaa ngaa kɛ? Wai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ma mba gbɛnhaile wu lele ɔ aa oo nhɛɛndaa nya oo na nwa ngaa kɛ.
43008044	Ngafɔ Manha na nana wu kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, ngi lengaa i mɛ aa wuee, awa ngɔi na nana i wu kɛɛgɛ naa ala nwɛ ngɔi wuaa wu hitɛ pou nwa. Ningaa baa mɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala wɔwɔwɔ, awa ai loni aa tɔmbaga na, gbɛnhaile tɔmbaga ai ala la. Gbee na bɛɛ aa ndɛɛ gɔɔla, i kɔɔlaia ɛɛ gbo ala bele ngɔ na i na, gbɛnhaile ndɛɛ gɔɔla mɔɔ nwɛ aa ala, awa ndɛɛ na kɛɛgɛ na nwɛ aa ala.
43008045	Kɛlɛ kina ngaa tɔmbaga na gɛ, na nhaa nwɛɛ wai laanɛɛ aa nge.
43008046	Wu ila kee na ngigbɛɛ nwɛ ku ngɔ ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa ngaa nhanda nyɔu belenaa? Kɛlɛ gbɔɔ wai laanɛɛ aa nge nhuna ngaa tɔmbaga na gɛ?
43008047	Nuu na nana i segei Ngebɔ le ala nwɛ aa oo nhɛɛ Ngebɔ oo na nwa. Kɛlɛ saabu na wua wai oo nhɛɛ ma ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa wua wai segei Ngebɔ le."
43008048	Ka Yuu fɔha belaa i ti ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Ee ndɛɛ nwɛɛ ni kɔɔlai biaa aa kɛɛlaa Sameelia nwɔɔ nwɛ aa biee awa ngafɔ tɔ bi eya?"
43008049	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ngafɔ ngai nya eya. Nyaa mbɛɛ gɛ ngɔ nya Kɛɛgɛ naa, kɛlɛ wuaa mbɛɛ baa ngɔ nyaa.
43008050	Ngai mbɛɛ ɔɛ ɔɛ ma nya gbɔha nhanwae kɛlɛ nuu na nana i nya lo pele ngɔ alaa na, awa ala nwɛ aa mbɛɛ ɔɛ ɔɛ nya nhanwa.
43008051	Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nwaa bɛɛ nya nagɔli nau nana ngaa pele pele ngaa ningaa, maa nwɔɔ na siina aigɔ haa."
43008052	Kati gɛa ala nwa, "Chaanngi nhu noo kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa ngafɔ tɔ bi eya! Ka Eebilahamu i haaa, awa nhaa gbɔnhu Ngebɔ letua i kati haaa. Bi gbeendɛ baa gɛ ina nuu aa nwaa bɛɛ bi nagɔli nau nana baa pele pele ngaa ningaa, maa nwɔɔ na siina aigɔ haa.
43008053	Ee bɔɔ gɛa kolo lɔ bi nhu nana mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ ni bemba naa Eebilahamu nana i haa ɔɔ? Nhaa gbɔnhu Ngebɔ letua i mba? Gbɛɛ bi gbɔha na gbau ngɔ la?"
43008054	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ina ngaa gbɔha bihɛ, mbihɛ haka nwɛ. Ni Kɛɛgɛ na nwɛ aa nya bihɛ, napangaa Kɛɛgɛ na nana wu gɛi wu Eebɔ nwɛ aa ala.
43008055	Kɛlɛ wua wai lɛ ala gɔɔni. Nya ngi ala gɔɔnaa. Ina ngaa gɛ ngai ala gɔɔ ngɔ, ngɔɔ belenaa aa ndɛɛ gɔɔla mɔɔ ɛɛ wua. Kɛlɛ ngi ala gɔɔnaa, awa nya nwaa bɛɛ ɔ ngi oo nau.
43008056	Wu bemba na Eebilahamu kɛɛ goonhu nɛɛaɔ aa foo na lɔndaa nana ngi ba ba ma. Kɛɛ tɔa pa, awa ka ala goonhu nɛɛa."
43008057	Nhu nwɛɛ ti gɛi ala nwa, "Ti bi leniɔ bɛɛ bai lɛ hitii fogo buu buu lɔɔu nhu, alɛɛ baa gɛ kabi Eebilahamu lɔa?"
43008058	Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa yeingaa ti Eebilahamu leni, nyaa naɔ tɔ, gbɛnhaile 'Nya Nwɛ Maa nwɔɔ na aa Nge'."
43008059	Nhu nwɛɛ ti kɔtu gbau kpauni Yisɔsi nwaa hɔɔndaa la nhanwa, kɛlɛ kɛɛ lɔɔgua, awa kɛɛ gua Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau.
43009001	Awa nhuna Yisɔsi ee lee, kɛɛ ndakpa lɔa nana titi ɔɔ, awa ngemɛɛ ti ndeni laɔ.
43009002	Awa ka Yisɔsi galandengaa i ti ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, ele nhanda nyɔu nwɛ i peleni ti ndakpa indinɛi leniɔ titi ɔ? Ee ngi nda guegue nhanda nyɔu nwɛ, inaile ee ngi ungaa i ti nda nhanda nyɔu nwɛ?"
43009003	Ka Yisɔsi i ti nwɔɔli na gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ala o ngi ungaa i ngoo ti nhanda nyɔu lɔgɔ faa aile i litiie kɛlɛ ti ndenia titi ɔɔ kangaa Ngebɔ fɔha na i enge ala nhu ningaa ti tɔ.
43009004	Kina foo nwɛɛ aa indinɛi, kamaa gɛ aa nuu na enge na belendaa nana i nya loni. Gbaa kpindi lɔ aa bɛɛ nhuna nuu ai ku aa enge.
43009005	Nhuna ngi ngelou na nhu, nya nwɛ ngelou na nhu waun na aa nge."
43009006	Nhuna i bilani aa indinɛi gɛndaa, kɛɛ yaaiyaai bua pɔlɔ na nwa nana i kpatɛi aa njogbo. Awa kɛɛ maa yogbo na sii siaa ndakpa na au fee na nwa,
43009007	awa kɛɛ gɛa ndakpa na nwa, "Lia bi mɔɔ bele popa nau taa ui mba aa Siloamu. (Popa na Yisɔsi aa ui mba aa Siloamu koonhu na nwɛ aa "Ti Teeni".) Awae ka ndakpa na i ya na, kɛɛ mɔɔ na belenga, kɛɛ bɛɛlaa, awa kɛɛ kunga i nhanda lɔa.
43009008	Ala gbɛlaa belaa i ngoo, ka natiini ti ala lɔaɔ nhuna fɛi mɔɔ na aa alaɔ, tua na siina bɛɛ kati gɛa, "Ee ndakpa na aile aa indinɛi aa hei na bele fɛi na nwa?"
43009009	Ka lɛingaa ti gɛa, "Ala nwɛ." Kɛlɛ ka lagbitia i ti gɛa, "Ala aile. Kɛlɛ baa tɔ ɛɛ ala nwɛ." Awae ka ndakpa na gbɔha na i gɛa ti nwa, "Nya nwɛ."
43009010	Faa nwɛɛ ti gɛi ala nwa, "I gee beleni baa ku k`abi nhanda lɔ chaan?"
43009011	Kɛɛ ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ndakpa na taa ui mba aa Yisɔsi, ala nwɛ i njogbo gbatɛi kɛɛ sii siaa nya au na nwa, awa kɛɛ gɛa nya nwa, 'Lia Siloamu bi mɔɔ bele.' Awae kangi ya na. Awa nhu gutu ɔ na ngi mɔɔ na beleni maa bopa na siinau, kangi kunga ngi nhanda lɔa."
43009012	Kati gɛa ala nwa, "Maa Yisɔsi na i mii tɔ? Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Ngai mɛɛ gɔɔ i na."
43009013	Kati baa aa ndakpa na Falesiisia i ngee, napangaa titi nwɔɔ ɔha na.
43009014	Foo na Yisɔsi i njogbo na gbatɛiɔ kɛɛ titi hegbɛ na haaia ndakpa naa, Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo nwaa nwɛɛɔ
43009015	Ka Falesiisia i ti ndakpa na nwɔɔlinga gbɔnhu aa kɛɛlaa i gee peleni nhaa i kuni i nhanda lɔi. Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Kɛɛ njogbo bua nya au fee na nwa, kangi mɔɔ belenga, awa chaanngi nhu ngoo kunga ngi nhanda lɔ."
43009016	Ka Falesiisia i lɛingaa i ti gɛa, "Ndakpa indinɛi ai segei Ngebɔ le gbɛnhaile ai nwaa bɛɛ ma Sɔ nau nana nda ngɔ Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo na nwaa nhanwa." Kɛlɛ ka lagbitia i ti gɛa, "Nhanda nyɔu bele mɔɔ aa gee ku kɛɛ kamaa nhanda bonda indinɛi bele pele?" Awae kati loganhu baia aa lagbitia i.
43009017	Nhu nwɛɛ Falesiisia i ti gɛi gbɔnhu titi nwɔɔ ɔha na nwa, "Kina ndakpa indinɛi oo bi gɛndɛa kualaa bi litiyaa hegbɛ na nhu nana bee nhu, awa chaanngi nhu boo kunga bi nhanda lɔ, bia bɛɛ gbɛ ala nhanwa?" Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Ngebɔ letu nwɛ aa ala."
43009018	Yuu fɔha belaa i tai laanɛɛiɔ aa kɛɛlaa ndakpa na lɔɔ pɛnhɛɛ titiyaa nhu, awa oo kunga i nhanda lɔ, kiiloo ti uini ngi ungaa i mba
43009019	awa kati ti nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Ee wu nhiindou i nwɛ aa indinɛi wu gɛi wu ndeniɔ ala liti ɔ? I gee beleni aa nhanda lɔ chaan?"
43009020	Ka ngi ungaa i ti gɛa, "Ni kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa n`i nhiindou i nwɛ aa indinɛi, awa n`i ndeniɔ titi ɔ.
43009021	Kɛlɛ i gee peleni nhaa aa nhanda lɔ chaan, nua nai kɔɔ, inaile nai nuu gɔɔ nana i ala gɛndɛi kualaa ngi litiyaa hegbɛ na nhu nana ee nhuɔ. Kɛlɛ a ala gbɔha na nwɔɔlina, ɔɔ kpɛɛmbonaa gbɔha nhanwa. Gbaa ndou golo aile aa ala !"
43009022	Titi nwɔɔ ɔha na ungaa i ti njia indinɛi gɛiaɔ gɛnhi, gbɛnhaile ti lua ɔɔ Yuu fɔha belaa i mbaɔ. Gbaa Yuu fɔha belaa i siina too kuunnga maɔ tɔ aa kɛɛlaa, ina nuu aa gɛ oo laanɛɛa aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala, tɔɔ maa nwɔɔ na siina gbɛa Yuua ti gɔɛ pɛlɛ nau.
43009023	Saabu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ ngi ungaa ti gɛiɔ, "A ala gbɔha na nwɔɔlina, ɔɔ kpɛɛmbonaa gbɔha nhanwa. Gbaa ndou golo aile aa ala!"
43009024	Nhu nwɛɛ ti fee kulai ma aa nguindaa gbɔnhu titi nwɔɔ ɔha naa, awa kati gɛa ala nwa, "Gɔalɛ Ngebɔ nwa aa kɛɛlaa bia baa tɔmbaga na gɛ. Gbaa ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ndakpa indinɛi i bi gɛndɛi nhanda nyɔu bele mɔɔ nwɛ aa ala."
43009025	Kɛɛ ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "A nya ngai kɔɔ ina nhanda nyɔu bele mɔɔ nwɛ aa ala. Nhanda ila mɛɛ gbo ngi kɔɔ ngɔ. Ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa nya liti ɔɔ pɛnhɛɛ, kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu ngoo kunga ngi nhanda lɔ."
43009026	Kati ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Gbɛɛ i peleni aa biee? Awa i gee bi gɛndɛi kualaa bi litiyaa hegbɛ na nhu bee nhuɔ?"
43009027	Kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Ngoo bilanga aa kɛndaa aa wuee, awa wai oo nhɛɛni. Gbɔɔ gbɔnhu wu lo ngɔ la wu mɛi? Naangaa wua gbɔnhu wu lo ngɔ la wu bele ngaa ngi galandengaa hie?"
43009028	Kati ala ɛinga awa kati gɛa ala nwa, "Biɛɛ gbo ngi galandou aa biee, kɛlɛ nua aile. Moosisi galandengaa nwɛ aa nuee.
43009029	Ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ oo yɛpɛ Moosisi le. Kɛlɛ ndakpa nana nhanwa, nua nai mɛɛ gɔɔ aa sege na!"
43009030	Ka ndakpa na i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "A nhanda indinɛi kpɛi mba nhanda bombou mbaa nwɛ, aa kɛɛlaa wai mɛɛ gɔɔ aa sege na, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ oo nya liti hegbɛ na gɛndɛa nyaa!
43009031	Mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ai oo nhɛɛ nhanda nyɔu bele mbelaa nwa, kɛlɛ aa oo nhɛɛnaa ningaa nwa natiini taa ala batou awa ti ngi guunmayaa na bele.
43009032	Kualaama aa lɔgɔ na Ngebɔ i ngelou na gbatɛiɔ, nuu ai lɛ mɛiniɔ lɛ aa kɛɛlaa nuu oo titi hegbɛ gɛndɛa nuua nana ti ndenga titi ɔ.
43009033	Ina Ngebɔ le ngaile ndakpa indinɛi i segei na, ai ba ku aa gbɛ o gbɛ bele."
43009034	Nhu nwɛɛ ti ala gbɛɛmboni gɛnhi, "Bia ti bi leni nhanda nyɔu nhu, awa kati bi siaa nhanda nyɔu nhu, ee bia nwɛ baa ni nagɔli?" Awa kati ala gbɛa Yuua ti gɔɛ pɛlɛ nau.
43009035	Nhuna Yisɔsi i mɛini aa kɛɛlaa Yuua i too titi nwɔɔ ɔha na gbɛa kualaa Yuua ti gɔɛ pɛlɛ nau, kɛɛ ya aa au sia aa ndakpa na, awa nhuna i tɔi kɛɛ ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Ee bi laanɛɛ ɔ aa Nuu na Lou na?"
43009036	Kɛɛ Yisɔsi gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Kenɛi, ele nwɛɛ aa maa nwɔɔ na, kangaa ngi ba laanɛɛ aa ala?"
43009037	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Biaa ala lɔ ngɔ, awa ala nwɛ aa indinɛi waa yɛpɛ."
43009038	Nhu nwɛɛ ndakpa na i gɛi, "Maliki, nya laanɛɛ ɔ." Awa kɛɛ Yisɔsi batounga.
43009039	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Ngi baia ngelou indinɛi nhu ningaa gɔhɔndaa nhanwa, kangaa natiini ti liti ɔ na, ti ba nhanda lɔ. Awa natiini taa nhanda lɔ, tua na siina ti ba liti."
43009040	Falesiisia i lɛingaa i natiini tee na ala gbɛlaa kati njia indinɛi nwɛinga nana Yisɔsi i kɛa. Faa nwɛɛ ti gɛi ala nwa, "Ee nua gbɔnhu ni liti ɔ?"
43009041	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Ina wu liti ɔɔ, nhanda nyɔu ai ba gɛ wu nwa. Kɛlɛ wu gɛa tɔ chaanngi nhu waa nhanda lɔa, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa wu lɛɛ ɔ nhanda nhu."
43010001	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, nuu o nuu nana ai ɔai mbaala gui na nhu aa kui na laa bele, kɛlɛ i lɛ i ɔa na aa pele lagbiti, maa nwɔɔ na siina sɔi sɔi nwɔa nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala awa fɔha fɔha nwɔa bele mɔɔ nwɛ gbɔnhu.
43010002	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa ɔa aa kui na laa bele na, ala nwɛ mbaalaa lo mɔɔ na aa ala.
43010003	Nuu na nana aa kui na laa bele na nwanhu gbee, alɛɛ aa kui na laau alɛɛ. Mbaalaa i ti ala oo nwɛi awa i ui ngi nda baalaa i mba aa ti laa na, awa i gɛ ti gulɔɔ ti gua ngilamaa.
43010004	Nhuna aa gɛ ngi ndaa i kua ngɔ bɛɛ ngiti naa, oo hitɛ ti gulɔɔ, awa mbaalaa i too ndaa alaa, gbɛnhaile ti ala oo na gɔɔnaa.
43010005	Taigɔ nda nuu lagbiti bou nwa, kɛlɛ tɔɔ binhɛa alaa, gbɛnhaile tai ningaa lagbitia oo gɔɔ."
43010006	Yisɔsi i njia ɔha indinɛi gɛia aa tuee, kɛlɛ tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔi nanaa ee kɛ aa tuee.
43010007	Awae ka Yisɔsi i gɛa gbɔnhu ti nwa, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, nya bele ngɔ ɛɛ mbaala gui laa bele.
43010008	Ningaa i natiini bɛɛ ti longaɔ nyaa gulɔɔ pɛnhɛɛ aa paalaa, sɔi sɔi nwɔa belaa nwɛ aa tuee awa fɔha fɔha nwɔa belaa nwɛ gbɔnhu, kɛlɛ mbaalaa i tai oo nhɛɛni ti nwa.
43010009	Nya bele ngɔ ɛɛ mbaala gui laa bele. Awa nuu na nana bɛɛ aa ɔa aa nya nhu bele, ɔɔ belenaa aa ndendou. Awa maa nwɔɔ na siina ɔɔ ɔaa awa i gua i mɛɛlimaa hɔlɔ.
43010010	Nwɔa nwɔɔ na aa baa gbo ngaa nwɔa nwa o, ningaa baandaa o, ka ningaa nyaaindaa. Kɛlɛ nya ngi baia kangaa ngi pele ningaa ti ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ, awa ti hɔlɔ nja lee ngɔnhu.
43010011	"Nya nwɛ mbaalaa lo mɔɔ gbekpe na aa nge. Mbaalaa lo mɔɔ gbekpe na nuu nwɛɛ nana aa ngi lɛɛhu na gɔan ngi baalaa i maa gbɛndaa nhanwa.
43010012	Ngenge nwɔɔ na nana ala aile mbaalaa lo mɔɔ na aa ala, awa ala aile po mɛɛ aa mbaalaa i, nhuna aa tɔ k`a kpoo i ba mbaalaa i ngee, i mbaalaa i ndo na i li aa binhɛ. Awa kpoo na i gbundɛ mbaalaa i ma nana aa pele mbaalaa i bɛɛ taa yanja nhu.
43010013	Nuu na ti kpau ngɔ aa ngenge na i li aa binhɛ, gbɛnhaile ngenge nwɔɔ gbama nwɛɛ gbo aa ala, awa ala lɔgɔlaa aile mbaalaa i fanwa.
43010014	Nya nwɛ mbaalaa lo mɔɔ gbekpe na aa nge. Ngi nya nda baalaa i kɔɔnaa, awa nya nda baalaa i ti nya gɔɔnaa,
43010015	ɛɛ gbo Kɛɛgɛ na i nya gɔɔ ngɔ ɛɛ pa ngi ala gɔɔ ngɔ. Awa ngi nya lɛɛhu na gɔan nya nda baalaa i fanwa.
43010016	Awa mbaalaa lagbitia lɔ nya eya natiini kui indinɛi nhu geea aile aa tuee. Kangɔɔ ba aa tuee gbɔnhu. Tɔɔ oo nhɛɛnaa nya nwa, awa tɔɔ nwaa gbɔnaa aa natiini ti kui na nhu ti ba bele ngaa mbaalaa ilangaa mbaalaa lo mɔɔ ila ngeya.
43010017	"Kɛɛgɛ na lo ngɔ aa nge, gbɛnhaile ngi nya lɛɛhu na gɔan kangaae ngi hɔlɔ boma.
43010018	Nuu ai nya lɛɛhu na gbau nya eya. Nyɛɛ ngaa kɔan ngaa nya nda guegue guunmayaa na. Nya ku ngɔ ngaa kɔan awa nya ku ngɔ ngaa kpau boma. Nya Kɛɛgɛ na nwɛ i kɛi gɛnhi aa nge."
43010019	Njia indinɛi nhanwa Yisɔsi i kɛi, kɛɛ pelenga Yuua i ti loganhu gɔɛa.
43010020	Ti gbinhi ɔɔ k`ati gɛ, "Ngafɔ mɛ i ala eya! Mɔu nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala! Gbɔɔ waa oo nhɛɛ ala nwae?"
43010021	Kɛlɛ lagbitia i k`ati gɛ, "Nuu na nana Ngafɔ ngi ala nhu ngemɛɛ aile gɛnhi aa yɛpɛ! Ngafɔ ngaa gee pele titi nwɔɔ i nhanda lɔ?"
43010022	-
43010023	Aa Nuungbuaukolo na, nhuna Yuua i ti kpolo na guai mɛɛ Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu, napangaa kpolo na taa ui mba aa Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ Nwaa Gɔan Kpolo, aa maa lɔgɔ na, k`a Yisɔsi i sia Sɔlɔmɔni Gake naa mɛɛ Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau.
43010024	Naa nwɛɛ ningaa lɛingaa ti aa lɔgɔi na ala nwa awa kati ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Nhu lɛmbi ngɔ na aa gbɛ bɔɔ ni lo ngoo nhɛɛ nhu? Ni gualɛ baa waun maa. Ee bia nwɛ Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa biee?"
43010025	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ngoo kɛa aa wuee, kɛlɛ wai laanɛɛ aa nge. Ngenge enge na ngaa pele nya Kɛɛgɛ na laa na fɔha na nhu, alɛɛ aa seeliyaa he nya nhanwa.
43010026	Kɛlɛ wua wai laanɛɛ, gbɛnhaile nya baalaa aile aa wuee.
43010027	Nya baalaa i ti nya oo nwɛi. Ngi ti gɔɔnaa, awa k`ati nda nyaa.
43010028	K`angi wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu he tuɛɛ, awa ti u ngaigɔ lo nhu. Awa nuu aigɔ ti gapu nya eya.
43010029	Nya Kɛɛgɛ na nana i ti ɔaa nya eya ala bombou ngɔ lee ngɔ bɛɛ, awa nuu ai ku aa ti gapu ala eya.
43010030	Nya o Kɛɛgɛ na o ningaa ilangaa nwɛ aa nuee."
43010031	Nhu nwɛɛ ningaa i ti kɔtu gbau kpauni boma ala nwaa hɔɔndaa la nhanwa.
43010032	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Ngoo ngenge gbekpe kpinhi gbinhi bele pelenga wu au bele nhu nana nya Kɛɛgɛ na i ngɔa ɔai nya eya. Ngigbɛ nwɛ ngenge enge na siina liiya waa nya nwaa hɔɔ fanwa?"
43010033	Kati ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ngenge gbekpe faa aile naa gɛ nɔɔ bi nwaa hɔɔe kɛlɛ bi biindaa na nhaa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ gahe nhu! Gbaa nuu gbɔha gbama nwɛɛ gbo aa biee, kɛlɛ bi lo ngɔ la bi gbɔha na nwaa gɛ sɔu aa Ngebɔ!"
43010034	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ee tai kpaali ngɔ wu nda Sɔ na nhu aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɛgɛ, 'Wu bele ngɔ ɛɛ Ngebɔ?'
43010035	Mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nana Ngebɔ Gbaali na aa kɛ tɔmbaga ɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ. Awa ningaa i natiini Ngebɔ i ngi oolee na ɔai ti eya, tua na siina kɛɛ gɛa ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ Ngebɔ.
43010036	Nya, nya nhanwa, ka Kɛɛgɛ na i nya nhu ɔhɛa awa kɛɛ nya longa ngelou indinɛi nhu. I gee bai waa kɛ aa kɛɛlaa nya ngaa bii Ngebɔ gahe nhu, gbɛnhaile ngoo gɛ, 'Nya nwɛ Ngebɔ Lou na aa nge'?
43010037	Ina ngai ngenge na bele pele ma nana kpala ngi nya Kɛɛgɛ naa kangaa ngi pele pele, k`a awɛɛ laanɛɛ nha aa nge.
43010038	Kɛlɛ ina nya ngaa pele pele, hali wai laanɛɛi aa nge, aa laanɛɛa aa ngenge enge na, kangaae wu ba kɔɔ awa wu ba nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba aa kɛɛlaa, Kɛɛgɛ na alaa nya nhu awa nya pa nyaa Kɛɛgɛ na nhu."
43010039	Kati gɛa gbɔnhu tɔɔ ala aa gboto, kɛlɛ kɛɛ guaa na ti liiya sɔi.
43010040	Nhu nwɛɛ Yisɔsi i bɛɛlai boma Yɔlani Ya na bou nwa, napangaa nhinde na mɛɛ Yɔni Ngebɔ Ua Bele Mɔɔ na ee Ngebɔ ua na bele na aa ningaa i. Awa naa nwɛɛɔ tɔ ee na hei nhu.
43010041	Ka ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti baa baa na ala le awa kati gɛa gbɔha na nwa, "Yɔni ai kamaa nhanda beleniɔ, kɛlɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ i kɛiɔ ndakpa indinɛi nhanwa tɔmbaga nwɛɛɔ."
43010042	Awa ti gbinhi ɔɔ kati laanɛɛa na aa ala.
43011001	Ka ndakpa ila kee i hegbɛa nana taa ui mba aa Laasalɔsi. Ndakpa na siina Bɛtani laa na nhu nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala. Bɛtani na siina, Meeli o ngi ndege nyɛɛlou na o Mata tuee taa na nhu nwɛɛɔ. (
43011002	Meeli indinɛi ala nwɛɔ i ngua gu nɛɛ nɛɛ na buiɔ Maliki na ɔgɔsambala na nwa awa kɛɛ ngɛa ɛaa ma aa ala u na. Ngi ndege nhiindou na nwɛɔ aa Laasalɔsi nana hegbɛ ɔ naɔ.)
43011003	Ka Laasalɔsi ndege nyɛɛlengaa i ti ngoolee teenga Yisɔsi nwanhu gɛnhi, "Maliki, bi gɛnwa nwɔɔ waa na hegbɛ ɔ."
43011004	Kɛlɛ nhuna Yisɔsi i mɛini kɛɛ gɛa, "Hegbɛ indinɛi aa guanwaa aigɔ bele ngaa haa Laasalɔsi nhanwa. Indinɛi i belenia gbo kangaa i pele ningaa ti Ngebɔ bombounjaa na gɔɔ, awa ɔɔ belenaa aa pele na nana Ngebɔ Lou na ɔɔ mbihɛ hɔlɔ la."
43011005	Yisɔsi ndo ngɔɔ aa Mata o, Mata ndege nyɛɛlou na o, ka Laasalɔsi.
43011006	Kɛlɛ nhuna Yisɔsi i mɛini aa kɛɛlaa Laasalɔsi hegbɛ ɔɔ, kɛɛ mi guu fee lagbiti gbaunga mɛɛ ee na.
43011007	Nhu nwɛɛ i gɛi ngi galandengaa i ma, "Ami lia boma Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu."
43011008	Ka kalandengaa i ti gɛa ala nwa, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ, hɔgɔi chaan ningaa i ti na kati gɛa tɔɔ bi nwaa hɔɔ. Ee bɔɔ li na gbɔnhu?"
43011009	Ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ee wagati puu ngaile i manhu fee i foo na nhu? Ina nuu aa sia aa foo, aigɔ lugba, gbaa k`ɛɛ ngelou indinɛi nhu waun na lɔ.
43011010	Kɛlɛ ina nuu aa sia aa kpɔkɔ, aa lugbaa, gbɛnhaile waun ngai ala nhu."
43011011	I baa indinɛi gɛ, kɛɛ gɛa gbɔnhu, "Mi gɛnwa nwɔɔ na Laasalɔsi oo gula na njii, kɛlɛ ngɔɔ lia ngi ala u."
43011012	Ka kalandengaa i ti gɛa ala nwa, "Maliki, ina njii nhu nwɛ i na, ɔɔ gɛndɛa."
43011013	Yisɔsi i yɛpɛia Laasalɔsi haalaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ tua tɔɔ tɔɔngaaɔ njii gbama nwɛɛɔ ee maa yia gɛ.
43011014	Indinɛi nhanwa, ka Yisɔsi i kɛa aa tuee kpou, ɛgɛ, "Laasalɔsi haa ɔ,
43011015	kɛlɛ wu lɔgɔ fanwa, nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngaile na mɛɛ ngilamaaa nii Laasalɔsi o, kangaa wu ba laanɛɛ. Kɛlɛ ami lia ala le."
43011016	Tɔ mɔɔsi, (nana taa ui mba aa Tuu) kɛɛ gɛa ngi ndege galandou na nwa, "Mua gbɔnhu ami lia, kangaa mua gbɔnhu mi haa ngilamaaa mii ala o!"
43011017	Awae nhuna Yisɔsi i hitii na, i maaleii tɔ too Laasalɔsi lɔɔgua, awa oo kpaungaɔ tɔ aa mi guu naai maau na nhu.
43011018	Awa Bɛtani o Yɛlusalɛmu o, ti loganhu na nhu gɔhalaa naɔ mi gɛa taa ila ti loganhu,
43011019	awa Yuua gbinhi ɔɔ too ba na Meeli le tii Mata o ti ndege nhiindou na haa na nwaa ɔɔ na nhu.
43011020	Nhuna Mata i mɛini aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi lɔɔ aa ba, kɛɛ ya ala laa kɔɛ ma, kɛlɛ Meeli ala kɛɛ loa pɛlɛ nau.
43011021	Ka Mata i gɛa Yisɔsi nwa, "Maliki, ina bi ba gɛɔ bei, nya ndege nhiindou na ai ba haa!
43011022	Kɛlɛ ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa hali chaanngi nhu, nana bɛɛ baa Ngebɔ nwɔɔli fanwa, ɔɔ ngɔaa bi eya."
43011023	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Bi ndege nhiindou na ɔɔ huua gbɔnhu kualaa haa na nhu."
43011024	Ka Mata i gɛa ala nwa, "Ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ huua gbɔnhu kualaa haa na nhu gbele mba hoo na nwa nhuna haa belaa i tɔɔ huu kualaa haa na nhu."
43011025	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Nya nwɛ ngaa huu ningaau kualaa haa nhu, awa nya nwɛ ngaa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ. Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa laanɛɛ aa nge, hali nha i gɛ haai, ɔɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔa boma.
43011026	Awa nuu o nuu nana ai lɛ haai lɛ, awa i laanɛɛ aa nge, maa nwɔɔ na siina ɛagɔ haa kpɔ. Bi laanɛɛ ɔ aa indinɛi?"
43011027	Kɛɛ kpɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Aaha Maliki! Nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa bia nwɛ Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na aa biee, napangaa Ngebɔ Lou na, nana paalaa ee na ngelou na nhu."
43011028	Mata i baa njia indinɛi gɛ o, kɛɛ bɛɛlaa boma awa kɛɛ uinga ngi ndege nyɛɛlou naa sɔi napangaa Meeli, ɛgɛ, "Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ na lɔ bei, awa ala aa ui biaa kangaa bi ba."
43011029	Nhuna Meeli i indinɛi nwɛini, kɛɛ huua lɛmbi awa kɛɛ ya Yisɔsi le. (
43011030	Yisɔsi ai lɛ gɛiɔ hitii kpou na la chɔɔ chɔɔ, kɛlɛ nhinde na mɛɛ Mata i ala laa gɔɛni na, naa nwɛɛɔ tuun ee na.)
43011031	Awa ngɔɔ nhu belaa i tee na tii ala o pɛlɛ nau, nhuna ti tɔi i huui lɛmbi awa kɛɛ guaa ngiti naa, kati ndaa alaa. Tɔɔ tɔɔngaaɔ ndii nwɛɛ ee li ngɔɔ nwa maau na nwa.
43011032	Awa nhuna Meeli i hitii mɛɛ Yisɔsi ee na, nhu gutu ɔ na siina i Yisɔsi lɔi, kɛɛ gulaa Yisɔsi ɔgɔu, awa kɛɛ gɛa, "Maliki, ina bi ba gɛɔ bei, nya ndege nhiindou na ai ba haa!"
43011033	Nhuna Yisɔsi i ala lɔi ee ɔɔ, awa ka ngɔɔ nhu belaa i natiini ti ndai alaa tee ɔɔ, ka maa nwɔuyaa i baa ala nɛɛnwaa na, awa kɛɛ yogobeenga.
43011034	Kɛɛ ti nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Mii nwɛ wu ala lɔɔgua na?" Kati gɛa ala nwa, "Baa bi naa lɔ Maliki,"
43011035	Ka Yisɔsi i ɔaa.
43011036	K`a ningaa i ti gɛ gbɔha na nwa, "Woo tɔa kpɛlɛ ndo ngɔ waa na la!"
43011037	Kɛlɛ ti lɛingaa i kati gɛa, "Ee ndakpa indinɛi i titi nwɔɔ na au na gɛndɛiɔ, ee ai ba pele haa indinɛi aa bii Laasalɔsi nwanhu?"
43011038	Ka maa nwɔuyaa i baa gbɔnhu Yisɔsi nɛɛnwaa, awae kɛɛ ya maau na nwa, awa maau na siina yaanga nhu nwɛɛɔ awa ndaa gbibi ngɔɔ aa kɔtu.
43011039	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "A kɔtu na gbauna nda!" Nhu nwɛɛ haa nwɔɔ na ndege nyɛɛlou na, napangaa Mata i gɛi, "Maliki, aa lɔgɔ indinɛi naa gu ngɔɔ guaa, gbaa oo kpaunga tɔ haai aa mi guu naai nhuna ti ala lɔɔgui maau ngindinɛi nhu!"
43011040	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Ee ngai kɛi aa biee aa kɛɛlaa ina baa laanɛɛ, bɔɔ Ngebɔ bombounjaa na lɔa?"
43011041	Awae kati kɔtu na nwɔinga nda. Ka Yisɔsi i u kulaa nga awa kɛɛ gɛa, "Hapa, ngi fiɛ guai bi nwa aa kɛɛlaa boo oo nhɛɛnga nya nwa.
43011042	Ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa k`abi oo nhɛɛ nya nwa aa gbele o gbele, kɛlɛ ngi kɛia ningaa i lɔgɔ fanwa ti lo toni nya gbɛlaa, kangaa ti laanɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa bia nwɛ bi nya loni."
43011043	Awa nhuna i indinɛi gɛi kpɛti, kɛɛ labia gɛnhi, "Laasalɔsi, gua bei!"
43011044	Ka haa nwɔɔ na i guaa, awa kɔla gue na beembee ngɔɔ ala loko na nwa o ka kpala na nwa, awa kɔla beembee ngɔɔ gbɔnhu ala aunwaa na. Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "A ala huo fuona awa wu gbe mba i li."
43011045	Ningaa gbinhi ɔɔ kualaa natiini ndiiya ti bai maau na nwa ngilamaaa tii Meeli o, nhuna ti nana lɔi Yisɔsi i peleni, kati laanɛɛa aa ala.
43011046	Kɛlɛ ti lɛingaa i kati bɛɛlaa Falesiisia i ngee awa kati kɛa aa Falesiisia i nana Yisɔsi i pelenga.
43011047	Awae Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo Falesiisia i siina o kati kɔɛ houa tii njia nwanhangaa i ngoo awa kati gɛa, "A mɔɔ gee bele? Kamaa nhanda na gbeendɛ bɛɛ nana ndakpa indinɛi aa pele pele!
43011048	Ina maa ala lo ala bele ngɔ nhu, ningaa i bɛɛ tɔɔ laanɛɛa aa ala, awa Loomu fɔha belaa i tɔɔ baa ti mi Eebɔ Bɛlɛ na nyaai mi eya ka mi le kpɔha na bɛɛ!"
43011049	Kɛlɛ ti ila mɔɔ lagbiti taa ui mba aa Keafɔsi, nana Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na aa alaɔ aa maa hogo na siina kɛɛ gɛa ti nwa, "Wu nwɔu mɔu ngɔ!
43011050	Ee wai kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa pisa ɔ wu nhanwa waa pele kangaa ngila mɔɔ i haa ningaa i fanwa, yeingaa Loomu fɔha belaa i ti nde kpɔha na nyaai?"
43011051	Keafɔsi ai njia indinɛi gɛi kualaa ngi nda guegue fɔha nhue kɛlɛ i kɛia gbɛnhaile ala nwɛɔ Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na aa ala aa maa hogo na siinaɔ. Awae gulɔɔ yia nwɛɔ i kɛi aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi haalaa ee naanɔɔ nde kpɔha na nhanwa bɛɛ,
43011052	awa haalaa ila ngɔ nhaile gbo nde kpɔha na nhanwae kɛlɛ alɛɛ boma ɔɔ Ngebɔ lengaa i ngaa lɔgɔ ngilamaaa natiini ti yanja ngɔ na nhu, kangaa ti ba bele ngaa ngila mbelaa.
43011053	Awae kualaama tɔ aa maa hoo nana, Yuu fɔha belaa i too ndaalaaa aa Yisɔsi baandaa.
43011054	Indinɛi nhanwa, Yisɔsi aile guu gua gbɔnhu kpou aa ngi sii sia na mɛɛ Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, kɛlɛ kɛɛ gbuenga na awa kɛɛ ya qɛa bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu gbɛlaa na, taa na nhu taa ui naa aa Ifilemu awa naa nwɛɛɔ ee na tii kalandengaa i ngoo.
43011055	Nhuna Yuua i ti Bii Manhu Gbolo na i gbɛɛi gbɛlaa, ka ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti guu guaa Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu awa kati lɛa Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu kangaa ti gbɔha na chanhai aa pele na Yuua i ti Sɔ na lo ngɔ la yeingaa ti gilaa kpolo na gua.
43011056	K`ati au sia aa Yisɔsi, awa nhuna tee Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, k`ati gbɔha nwɔɔli mɔɔli gɛnhi, "Wu nɛɛnwaa ɛgɛ gbɛ? Ee wɛɛ ɔɔ baa kpolo indinɛi nhu?"
43011057	Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ngoo Falesiisia i ngoo too kɛaɔ aa ningaa i aa kɛɛlaa ina nuu aa gɛ mɛɛ gɔɔ ngɔɔ Yisɔsi ee na, i kɛ aa tuee kangaa ti ba ala aa gboto.
43012001	Nhuna i loi mi guu ɔhita Pii Manhu Gbolo na nhanwa, ka Yisɔsi i ya Bɛtani, mɛɛ Laasalɔsi le pɛlɛu, napangaa ndakpa na nana Yisɔsi i huuiɔ alau kualaa haa na nhu.
43012002	Ka ningaa lɛingaa ti kpɔkɔ unde kuaa na Yisɔsiɛ awa Mata nwɛɔ i mɛnhɛi na gɔɛ gɔɛi ti nwa. Awa Laasalɔsi gbɔnhu ee naanɔɔ natiini ndiiya ti hei ɔɔ mɛnhɛi na nwɛ ma ngilamaaa tii Yisɔsi o.
43012003	Ka Meeli i mɔɔ mba ua gu nɛɛ nɛɛ bitila gbaunga, nana ti kpatɛi kualaa hape nhu, nana taa hɔlɔ kualaa nhii nhiinhaanhaa nhu nana taa ui mba aa naali, awa kɛɛ pua Yisɔsi ɔgɔsambala na nwa, awa kɛɛ ngɛaa ma aa ala u na. Ngua gu nɛɛ nɛɛ na gu na kɛɛ pɛlɛ gbɔha nau henga yelele.
43012004	Yisɔsi galandou ila kee taa ui mba aa Yulasi Isikaliɔti, napangaa nana Yisɔsi nwaa siandaa na ee ngeya, kɛɛ gɛa,
43012005	"Gbɔɔ tai ngua gu nɛɛ nɛɛ indinɛi nwaa siai aa kɔpa gɔu gɛmɛ chawa nana taa ui mba aa linaaliɔsi, awa ti maa nahoo na hee hee mbaa mbelaaɛ?" (Linaaliɔsi foo ila paabaa nwɛɔ ngenge nwɔɔ nhanwa.)
43012006	Ai indinɛi gɛi aa nɛɛnwaa na mbaa mbelaa i lɔgɔ fanwae kɛlɛ i kɛia gbɛnhaile nwɔa nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala. Awa kina ala nwɛɔ ee nahoo bu mbɔlɔ na nwakɛ, ee nahoo gbau kpaunaa nhu na ala gbɔha nhanwa.
43012007	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa Yulasi nwa, "Gbena Meelia! I nana nwakɛa i ala eya nya lɔɔgu ngee na nhanwa maau na nhu.
43012008	Gbaa mbaa mbelaa i tuaa na tii wua o aa gbele o gbele, kɛlɛ nya ngai na tii wua o aa gbele o gbele."
43012009	Ka faka bombou mbaa i nhu kɔɔngaɔ aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi lɔɔ mɛɛ Bɛtani laa na nhu, awae kati ya na, awa tai lii naɔ gbo Yisɔsi ila ngɔ lɔgɔ fanwae kɛlɛ ti liia gbɔnhu Laasalɔsi lɔgɔ fanwa, napangaa ndakpa na nana Yisɔsi i huui alau kualaa haa na nhu.
43012010	Awae ka Yuu chaaga gua manhangaa i ti ndaalaa belenga aa Laasalɔsi baandaa gbɔnhu,
43012011	gbɛnhaile ala lɔgɔ fanwa, ka Yuua gbinhi gbinhia ti guu guaa ti eya awa k`ati laanɛɛ ɔɔ aa Yisɔsi.
43012012	Maa ee na i oni, faka waa na nana i baa baai Pii Manhu Gbolo na nhanwa kati mɛinga aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi lɔɔ aa ba Yɛlusalɛmu.
43012013	Awae kati tɔkpɔ ɔgɔ gbau kpaunga awa kati ya la Yisɔsi laa kɔɛ ma, awa k`ati li aa labi labi gɛnhi, "Ami Ngebɔ bihɛa! Nduba lɔ nuu na nwa nana aa ba aa Maliki na laa na! Nduba lɔ Iisilɛli Nwanha mbaa na nwa!"
43012014	Ka Yisɔsi i bapu lou hɔlɔa nana i heii ma k`ɛɛ li aa ala, ɛɛ gbo soola na i kɛi Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu nana i gɛi,
43012015	"Awɛɛ lua, wua Saiɔnia i ngaa wuee! Wu nwanha mbaa na gbeendɛ aa ba, alaa heii bapu lou nwa."
43012016	Ngi galandengaa i tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔi pɛnhɛɛ nhanda indinɛia. Kɛlɛ nhuna Ngebɔ i huui Yisɔsiu kualaa haa na nhu, awa i mbɛɛ na hei alɛɛ mɛɛ aliyana, kati nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa aa kɛɛlaa soola na Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu oo indinɛi gɛaɔ ala nhanwa awa too indinɛi belengaɔ alɛɛ.
43012017	Ningaa i natiini tee naɔ ngilamaaa tii Yisɔsi o nhuna Yisɔsi i uiniɔ Laasalɔsia kualaa maau na nhu, awa kɛɛ huua alau kualaa haa na nhu, maa belaa i siina kati seeliyaa hea nana nhanwa i beleni.
43012018	Saabu na nana i peleniɔ ningaa i ti lii ala laa kɔɛ ma ala nwɛɔ aa kɛɛlaa, too mɛingaɔ aa kɛɛlaa oo kamaa nhanda indinɛi belenga.
43012019	Nhu nwɛɛ Falesiisia i ti gɛi gbɔha na nwa, "Woo tɔa tɔ aa kɛɛlaa mɛa kuni maa gbɛ o gbɛ bele! A kpeendɛ, ngelou gbɔha na lɔ aa nda alaa!"
43012020	Gilikia lɛingaa tee naanɔɔ natiini ndiiya ti liiɔ batou na nwa mɛɛ Yɛlusalɛmu aa kpolo na lɔgɔ.
43012021	Ka Gilikia indiini ti ya Filiipi le (Filiipi Bɛtisaila laa na nhu nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala mɛɛ Galiili bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu) awa kati gɛa ala nwa, "Kenɛi, ni lo ngɔ la ni Yisɔsi lɔ."
43012022	Ka Filiipi i ya kɛɛ kɛa aa Andulu, awa ti fee ngɔ na kati ya ti kɛa aa Yisɔsi.
43012023	Awa ka Yisɔsi i ti gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Lɔgɔ na oo hiti nhuna Nuu na Lou na ɔɔ mbɛɛ bombou mbaa hɔlɔ.
43012024	Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, ina nuu ai tɔɔnhai gaai ila nhiini lɔa awa maa lɔɔnhai na siina i haa, maa lɔɔnhai na siina ɔɔ gɛa gbo ila bou nwa kelembe. Kɛlɛ ina aa haa, nhu nwɛɛ aa haai, oo gua nhu, awa oo ba aa ngi wa kpinhi gbinhi.
43012025	Nuu na bɛɛ nana ndo ngɔ gbo aa ala gbɔha na kpɛti, maa nwɔɔ na siina ɔɔ ngi lɛɛhu na u ndoa nhu. Nuu na bɛɛ nana ai loni gbo aa ala gbɔha na kpɛti ngelou indinɛi nhu, maa nwɔɔ na siina ɔɔ ngi lɛɛhu na nwakɛa wɔwɔwɔ fanwa.
43012026	Nuu na nana ndo ngɔ la i bele ngaa nya eyaalakpandou, kaa nda nyaa. Awa mɛɛna ngi na, naa nwɛɛ gbɔnhu nya eyaalakpandou na aa gɛ na. Awa nya Kɛɛgɛ na ɔɔ mbɛɛ gɛa nuu naa nana aa bele ngaa nya eyaalakpandou.
43012027	"Chaanngi nhu nya lii nyaai ɔ, awa ngɔɔ gɛ gbɛ? Ee ngi ba gɛ, 'Hapa, njɔgɔlɔ indinɛi biina nya nwanhu'? Ngaigɔ kɛ, gbɛnhaile kolo na siina nhaa nwɛɛ kpei ngi bai, kangaa ngi u ngɔa njɔgɔlɔ na siinau nhuna maa lɔgɔ na aa ba.
43012028	Hapa, pelena bi laa na i mbɛɛ hɔlɔ!" Nhu nwɛɛ nuu oo i guai aliyana nana i gɛi, "Ngoo pelenga nya laa na oo mbɛɛ hɔlɔa, awa ngɔɔ pelenaa i mbɛɛ hɔlɔ gbɔnhu."
43012029	Faka na ee na loni kati nuu na oo na nwɛinga, awa ti lɛingaa i ti gɛia ngee nwɛɛɔ i hitɛi, awa lagbitia kati gɛa, "Maleka nwɛ i yɛpɛi ala le!"
43012030	Kɛlɛ ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Nya nhaile nuu na oo na i baie kɛlɛ wu nhaa nwɛɛ.
43012031	Chaanngi nhu lɔgɔ na nwɛ aa indinɛi Ngebɔ ɔɔ ngelou na gɔhɔ nda. Awa chaanngi nhu Ngebɔ ɔɔ kunjaa hɔlɔa ngelou indinɛi nhu nwanha na nwanhu.
43012032	Awa nya, nhuna tɔɔ nya lɛ ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na, ngɔɔ nuu o nuu nwaa laannaa nwa. (
43012033	I indinɛi gɛia kangaa i haa na siiyaa lɔgɔɔu nana pelendaa ee ngeya.)
43012034	Ka faka na i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ni Sɔ na lɔ kɛ ngɔ aa nuee aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na ɔɔ gɛa na wɔwɔwɔ. I gee bai gbɔnhu baa gɛ katɔɔ Nuu na Lou na lɛ ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na? Ele nwɛɛ Nuu na Lou indinɛi aa ala?"
43012035	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ti nwa, "Waun na ɔɔ gɛa na wu liiya lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa. A siaa nhuna waun na i wu eya, kangaa kpindi ai ba hitɛ wu nwa. Gbaa nuu na nana aa sia kpindi nhu, maa nwɔɔ na siina aigɔ mɛɛ gɔɔ aa li na.
43012036	Nhuna waun na i wu eya lɛ, a laanɛɛa la, kangaa wu ba bele ngaa ningaa natiini waun na bo mɛɛ aa tuee." Nhuna Yisɔsi i indinɛi gɛi, kɛɛ segea na awa kɛɛ ya i lɔɔgua tuaa.
43012037	Haliɔ oo kamaa nhanda gbinhi gbinhi bele pelengaɔ ti au bele nhu, na nhu bɛɛ, tai laanɛɛiɔ aa ala,
43012038	kangaa nana Ngebɔ letua na Aiseya i kɛi, maa nhanda na siina i lo ma, nhuna i gɛi, "Maliki, ele nwɛɛ i laanɛɛi aa kɔan na ni kulai? Ele nwɛɛ Maliki na i ngi fɔha na lɔgɔɔuni aa ala?"
43012039	Awae tai kuniɔ taa laanɛɛ. Gbaa ka Ngebɔ i yɛpɛa aa Aiseya nhu bele gɛnhi,
43012040	"Ngoo ti au na litia nhu awa ngoo ti belenga aa nɛɛnwaa haa belaa, kangaa ti au na ai ba nhanda lɔ, awa ti lii na ai ba nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ nhandaa, awa taigɔ bote nya le kangaa ngi ti gɛndɛ."
43012041	Aiseya i indinɛi gɛia gbɛnhaile kɛɛ Yisɔsi bɛɛyaa na lɔa awa ee yɛpɛa ngu to ngɔ Yisɔsia.
43012042	Kɛlɛ hali na, Yuu fɔha belaa gbinhi ɔɔ kati laanɛɛa aa Yisɔsi. Kɛlɛ ndua na nhanwaɔ tee lua Falesiisia i mba, taile kɛɛ gɛɛ, kangaa Falesiisia i tai ba ti gbɛ Yuua ti gɔɛ pɛlɛ nau.
43012043	Gbaa tua tai loni la Ngebɔ i ti bihɛ, kɛlɛ ti lo ngɔ la ningaa gbɔhaa ti ti bihɛ.
43012044	Ka Yisɔsi i labia gɛnhi aa njia indinɛi, "Nuu na bɛɛ aa laanɛɛ aa nge, nya aile gbo i laanɛɛi aa ngee kɛlɛ oo laanɛɛa boma aa nuu na nana i nya loni.
43012045	Awa nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nya lɔ, oo nuu na lɔa gbɔnhu nana i nya loni.
43012046	Ngoo ba ngelou i nhu ɛɛ waun, kangaa nuu o nuu nana aa laanɛɛ aa nge, aigɔ lo kpindi nhu.
43012047	Awa ina nuu aa nya oolee na nwɛi, naa lo ai nwaa bɛɛi maa oolee nau, ngaigɔ ala gɔhɔ. Gbaa ngai bai ngelou na gɔhɔndaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ ngi baia ndendouyaa hendaa nhanwa ngelou naɛ.
43012048	Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa lele aa kuunndaa nya nwa awa i lele boma aa kuunndaa nya oolee na nwa, maa nwɔɔ na siina nuu lɔ na nana ɔɔ ala gɔhɔ. Ngoo na nana ngi kɛɛ gɛɛa, maa oo na nwɛ ɔɔ bele ngaa maa nwɔɔ na gɔhɔ mɔɔ gbele mba hoo na nwa!
43012049	Gbaa ngai yɛpɛi aa nya nda guegue fɔha, kɛlɛ Kɛɛgɛ na nana i nya loni oo kɛa aa nge nana ngaa kɛ.
43012050	Awa ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nana Kɛɛgɛ na aa kɛ, maa oo na nwɛ aa ba aa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu. Faa nwɛɛe nana ngaa kɛ ala nwɛ Kɛɛgɛ na i kɛi aa nge kɛndaa nhanwa."
43013001	Aa kɛɛlaa lian nwɛ aa Pii Manhu Gbolo na, haai Yisɔsi oo kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa ngi guu na oo hiti ala loganhu bailaa nhanwa aa ngelou indinɛi i ba li Kɛɛgɛ na le. Awa ndomayaa lɔɔ ala eyaa lɔgɔ bɛɛ natiini fanwa ti ngelou i nhu awa ngi ndaa i ngaa tueeɔ, awa ala lo ngɔɔ aa tuee nhaa kɛɛ haaa.
43013002	Yisɔsi o ka ngi galandengaa i k`ati kpɔkɔ nwɛnhɛi na nwɛ. Ngafɔ mbaa na oo pelengaɔ nɛgili nyɔu i lɛ Yulasi Isikaliɔti nɛɛnwaa aa Yisɔsi nwaa siandaa. Yulasi Isikaliɔti, Saimɔni Isikaliɔti nhiindou na nwɛɔ aa ala.
43013003	Yisɔsi lɔɔ nhu kɔɔ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa Kɛɛgɛ na oo fɔha ɔaa ala eya gbɛ o gbɛ belendaa nhanwa bɛɛ, awa oo ba kualaa Kɛɛgɛ na le awa ala le mɛ boma ee baa bɛɛla na,
43013004	faa nwɛɛ i huui mɛnhɛi na nwanhu, kɛɛ ngi ufɔɔli na guaa nwa awa kɛɛ ndaa kaka, awa kɛɛ nwaa ɛa kɔla ilia nwa taa ui mba aa tawɛɛli.
43013005	Nhu nwɛɛ i nja bui maamu nhu awa kɛɛ tɔɔlonga aa kalandengaa ngɔgɔsambala na nwaa uu uandaa awa kɛɛ maa ɛɛ ɛaa aa nwaa ɛa kɔla na ee ilii ala nwa.
43013006	Kɛɛ baa Saimɔni Pita le nana i gɛi ala nwa, "Maliki, bɛɛ gbɛ bɔɔ nya ɔgɔsambala na nwaa ua?"
43013007	Ka Yisɔsi i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Bai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ lɛ nanaa ngaa pele chaanngi nhu, kɛlɛ bɔɔ nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔa mba guna pa."
43013008	Ka Pita i gɛa ala nwa, "Bɛɛ nya ɔgɔsambala maa ua guna kpɔ?" Ka Yisɔsi i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ina ngai bi ɔgɔsambala na nwaa uai, bɛagɔ bele ngaa nya galandou gbɔnhu kpɔ."
43013009	Ka Saimɔni Pita i gɛa, "Maliki, nya ɔgɔsambala na ila ngɔ aile gbo baa maa uae kɛlɛ nya loko na nwaa uu uaa boma ka nya umbaa na!"
43013010	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Nuu o nuu nana i mɔɔ belenga ala chanhai ngɔ hiti ɔ nhu, awa mɔɔ belendaa ai ngeya gbɔnhu, k`a ɔgɔsambala na nwɛ gbo maa uandaa aa gɛ ngeya. Awa wua bɛɛ wu chanhai ngɔ tɔ, k`a ngila mɔɔ gbo ala nwɛ ai chanhaini." (
43013011	Gbaa Yisɔsi lɔɔ tɔ nuu na gɔɔ ngɔ nana ɔɔ Yisɔsi gbɔha na nwaa sia. Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛɔ i gɛi, "Wu bɛpɛ ngaile wu chanhai ngɔ.")
43013012	Yisɔsi i bilani aa ti ɔgɔsambala na nwaa uu uandaa, kɛɛ ngi ufɔɔli na bua nwa boma awa kɛɛ bɛɛlaa boma i heia mɛɛ pɛnhɛɛ ee na heii nhuna tee mɛnhɛi na nwɛ. Awa kɛɛ kalandengaa i mɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Ee wuaa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ nanaa ngi pele pelenga aa wuee chaanngi nhu?
43013013	K`awu ui nyaa aa Ningaa Nagɔli Mɔɔ o ka Maliki, awa hiti ɔ nhu pa waa pele gɛnhi, gbɛnhaile ala nwɛ aa nge.
43013014	Ina nya tɔ, wu Nwaliki na aa nge ka wu Nagɔli Mɔɔ na, ngoo wu ɔgɔsambala na nwaa uu uaa, wua gbɔnhu kawaa gɛ aa wu nda ɔgɔsambala na nwaa uu uandaa loganhu aa ndɔgɔ.
43013015	Gbaa kuague mɛɛ ngi ndɔgɔɔunga aa wuee, kangaa wua gbɔnhu wu ba pele ɛɛ ngi pele pelenga aa wuee.
43013016	Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, ngeyaalakpandou kolo ai ala nhu mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ ala nwanhu nwɔɔ naa, awa tetu na kolo ai ala nhu mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ nuu naa i ala loni.
43013017	Chaanngi nhu wu tɔmbaga indinɛi gɔɔnga, ina waa pu ngeyaabele nhu, wɔɔ maa luba hɔlɔa!
43013018	"Wu bɛpɛ na aile bɛɛ ngaa yɛpɛ wu lɔgɔ fanwae gbaa ngi natiini kɔɔnaa ngi ti nhu ɔhɛa. Kɛlɛ nana Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi kaa lo ma nhuna i gɛi, 'Nuu na nana ni nya lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛi ala nwɛ i nya belenga aa ngi haalee.'
43013019	Ngi indinɛi gɛ aa wuee chaanngi nhu yeingaa i gilaa bele, kangaa nhuna aa bele, wu ba laanɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa, 'Nya Nwɛ Maa nwɔɔ na aa Nge.'
43013020	Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, nuu o nuu nana aa nuu na binja nana ngaa to, maa nwɔɔ na siina nya nwɛ i nya binjanga. Awa nuu o nuu nana aa nya binja, maa nwɔɔ na oo nuu na binjanga nana i nya loni."
43013021	Nhuna Yisɔsi i bilani aa indinɛi gɛndaa, ka ala nɛɛnwaa yogobeenga nja lee ngɔnhu, faa nwɛɛɔ i njia indinɛi gɛi kpou, ɛgɛ, "Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, ngila mɔɔ lɔ wu liiya nana ɔɔ nya nwaa sia."
43013022	Ka kalandengaa i ti aunwaa gbee kpeenga, kati loa nuu na nwaa gbindi nhu nana Yisɔsi i njia na gɛi fanwa.
43013023	Yisɔsi galandou ila kee, nana ala lo ngɔ waa na laɔ, ee naanɔɔ heii Yisɔsi gbɛlaa fɔɔn.
43013024	Ka Saimɔni Pita i maa galandou na ɔlɛnga awa kɛɛ gɛa ma, "Ala nwɔɔlindɛ baa, ele nwɛɛ aa ngi yia gɛ?"
43013025	Awae ka maa galandou na siina i gbɛɛa Yisɔsi gbɛlaa fɔɔn awa kɛɛ mɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Maliki, ele nwɛɛ?"
43013026	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ngɔɔ lɛgɛ gbɛnha hitɛa mbooya nau, awa nuu na nana waa tɔ ngaa ngɔa ngeya, maa nwɔɔ na nwɛ. Awae nhuna i lɛgɛ gbɛnha na hitɛi mbooya nau, kɛɛ ngɔaa Yulasi eya, napangaa Saimɔni Isikaliɔti nhiindou na.
43013027	Nhu gutu ɔ na Yulasi i lɛgɛ gbɛnha na siina nwɛi, ka Setani i ɔaa ala nɛɛnwaa. Awa ka Yisɔsi i gɛa Yulasi nwa, "Nana pelendaa i bi eya, pelena lɛmbi!"
43013028	Hali ngila mɔɔ bɛnhɛ ti liiya ai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔi mba gbɔɔ Yisɔsi i njia indinɛi gɛi aa Yulasi.
43013029	Ka lɛingaa i ti nɛgilia ma gɛnhi aa kɛɛlaa, kina Yulasi nwɛɔ nahoo bu mbɔlɔ na nwanhu gbee mɔɔ na aa ala, naangaa Yisɔsi oo kɛa aa ala kangaa i li i nana eya kpala ngee tuaaɔ kpolo na nhanwa, inaile tɔɔ tɔɔngaaɔ ɛgɛ i nhai ɔa ɔa mbaa mbelaa i ngeya.
43013030	Awae nhu gutu ɔ na Yulasi i lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛi, kɛɛ guaa ngiti naa. Kpindi na bɛɛ ɔ tɔ aa maa lɔgɔ na.
43013031	Nhuna Yulasi i guai ngiti naa, ka Yisɔsi i gɛa, "Chaanngi nhu ningaa too baa naa lɔ Nuu na Lou na ɔɔ gee mbɛɛmbayaa hɔlɔ, awa ala nhu bele nwɛɛ ningaa tɔɔ naa lɔ Ngebɔ ɔɔ gee mbɛɛmbayaa hɔlɔ.
43013032	Awa ina Ngebɔ bɛɛyaa na aa lɔgɔɔu ngaa ala nhu bele, nhu nwɛɛ Ngebɔ gbɔha na ɔɔ ngi bɛɛyaa na lɔgɔɔu Nuu na Lou na nhu, awa ɔɔ pelenaa gɛnhi aa nhu gutu ɔ na siina.
43013033	Nya lengaa, nyaa na lɛ ngilamaaa tii wua o lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa gbo. Wɔɔ nya ɔɛ ɔɛa, awa ngɔɔ nana gɛa aa wuee ngi kɛiɔ aa Yuu fɔha belaa i, nhuna ngi gɛi, 'Mɛɛ ngaa li na wai ku waa li na.'
43013034	Awa chaanngi nhu ngoo ba ngaa sɔ nyiɛ ɔa wu eya. Ndomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu. Ndomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu ɛɛ gbo ngi longaɔ aa wuee.
43013035	Gbaa ina ndomayaa aa gɛ wu loganhu, ndomayaa na siina ɔɔ pelenaa nuu o nuu i kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nya galandengaa nwɛ aa wuee."
43013036	Ka Saimɔni Pita i ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Maliki, mii nwɛ baa li na?" Ka Yisɔsi i ala gbɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Bai ku baa nda nyaa chaanngi nhu mɛɛ ngaa li na, kɛlɛ nhu golo aa lɛmbi, bɔɔ ndaa na nyaa."
43013037	Ka Pita i ala nwɔɔlinga gɛnhi, "Gbɔɔ ngai ku ngaa ndaa biaa tɔ chaanngi nhu? Nya nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa haalaa bi nhanwa!"
43013038	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Ee bi nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa haalaa nya nhanwa aa tɔmbaga? Awa aa tɔmbaga, ngi kɛ aa biee aa kɛɛlaa tɛɛ na aigɔ gɛ gokoeni, bɔɔ gɛa nwaagaii nya nwa nhaa naa heinwaa chawa."
43014001	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa kalandengaa i ma bɛɛ, "Awɛɛ lii na yaakpaa. A laanɛɛa aa Ngebɔ, awa a laanɛɛa gbɔnhu aa nge.
43014002	Nya Kɛɛgɛ na bɛlɛ nau kungu kpinhi gbinhi lɔ na, awa ngoo ya ngaa nhinde nwaa gbatɛ wu nhanwa. I ba bele ngaa ngemɛɛ aile, ee ngi ba indinɛi gɛa aa wuee?
43014003	Awa nhuna ngaa li ngaa nhinde na gbatɛ wu nhanwa, ngɔɔ baa gbɔnhu ngi wu gbau awa ngi li aa wuee nya le, kangaa mɛɛ ngaa gɛ na, naa nwɛɛ waa gɛ na.
43014004	Awa wu pele na gɔɔnaa nana ndi ɔ na mɛɛ ngaa li na."
43014005	Ka Tɔ mɔɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Maliki, nai mɛɛ gɔɔ baa li na. Nɔɔ gee pele na gɔɔ ngee?"
43014006	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Nya nwɛ pele na aa nge, ka tɔmbaga na, awa ka ndɛɛhu na. Nuu o nuu aigɔ ba Kɛɛgɛ na le, kɛlɛ kaa sia aa nya lepele."
43014007	Kɛɛ gɛa gbɔnhu ti nwa, "Ina woo nya gɔɔnga, wu ba nya Kɛɛgɛ na gɔɔnaa gbɔnhu. Awa kualaama tɔ chaanngi nhu, woo ala gɔɔnga awa woo ala lɔa."
43014008	Ka Filiipi i gɛa ala nwa, "Maliki, Kɛɛgɛ na lɔgɔɔu na aa nuee, awa na ɔɔ pelenaa ni lii lɛi."
43014009	Ka Yisɔsi i gɛa ala nwa, "Giilɛɔ tɔ ngi na tii wua o bɛɛ. Naa loganhu indinɛi tɔ bɛɛ Filiipi, ee bai nya gɔɔni? Nuu o nuu nana i nya lɔa, maa nwɔɔ na siina oo Kɛɛgɛ na lɔa. Kɛlɛ i gee bai gbɔnhu baa gɛ, 'Kɛɛgɛ na lɔgɔɔuna aa nuee'?
43014010	Filiipi, ee bai laanɛɛi aa kɛɛlaa nyaa Kɛɛgɛ na nhu, awa Kɛɛgɛ na pa alaa nya nhu? Ngoo na nana ngaa kɛ aa wuee bɛɛ, ngai kɛ ma aa nya nda guegue fɔhae kɛlɛ Kɛɛgɛ na nana i nya nhu alaa ngi enge na bele pele.
43014011	Kawaa laanɛɛ aa nge nhuna ngaa kɛ aa kɛɛlaa nyaa Kɛɛgɛ na nhu awa Kɛɛgɛ na lɔ nya nhu. Ina wai laanɛɛi aa nge maa gee nana nhanwa, a laanɛɛa nha aa nge ngenge na lɔgɔ fanwa nana ngaa pele pele.
43014012	Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, nuu o nuu nana aa laanɛɛ aa nge, ɔɔ ngenge na bele pelenaa nana ngaa pele pele. Ɔɔ ngenge bele pelenaa bɛnhɛ nana mbombou ngɔ lee tee ngɔ indinɛia ngaa pele pele, gbɛnhaile ngoo ya Kɛɛgɛ na le.
43014013	Awa nana bɛɛ waa nhu nwɔɔli ngaa nya laa na, ngɔɔ pelenaa, kangaa mbɛɛ na nana i Kɛɛgɛ naa, mbɛɛ na siina i ba lɔgɔɔu ngaa Ndou na nhu bele.
43014014	Ina waa mɔɔli pele gbɛ o gbɛ nhanwa aa nya laa na, ngɔɔ pelenaa.
43014015	"Ina wu lo ngɔ aa nge, wɔɔ nwaa bɛɛa nanau ngaa kɛ aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa.
43014016	Ngɔɔ Kɛɛgɛ na nwɔɔlinaa kpɔ mba nhanwa wu nhanwa, awa ɔɔ Kpɔmba nwɔɔ lagbiti ɔaa wu eya, nana ɔɔ gɛ na tii wua o nhaa guna bɛɛ.
43014017	Maa Gbɔmba nwɔɔ na nwɛ aa Ngebɔ Yina na nana aa tɔmbaga na lɔgɔɔu ngaa ningaa ngu to ngɔ Ngebɔa. Ngelou na ai ku aa ala binja, gbɛnhaile ngelou na ai ala lɔ inaile ai ala gɔɔ. Kɛlɛ wua wu ala gɔɔnaa gbɛnhaile alaa na tii wua o, awa ɔɔ gɛa wu gbɔha na nhu.
43014018	"Ngaigɔ wu lo pondouyaa nhu. Faa nwɛɛe nhuna ngaa li ngɔɔ baa boma wuee.
43014019	Nhu golo aa lɛmbi, ngelou na nhu belaa i taigɔ nya lɔ gbɔnhu kpɔ, kɛlɛ wua wɔɔ nya lɔa. Awa kina ngɔɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔa boma, wua gbɔnhu wɔɔ gɛndɛa.
43014020	Nhuna maa hoo na ɔɔ hiti, wɔɔ kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nyaa ni Kɛɛgɛ na nhu awa wua wuaa nya nhu, ɛɛ gbo ngi wu nhu.
43014021	"Nuu o nuu nana aa kuun nana nwa ngaa kɛ awa i nwaa bɛɛ maa oo na siinau, maa nwɔɔ na nwɛ ndo ngɔ aa nge. Awa nuu na nana ndo ngɔ aa nge, nya Kɛɛgɛ na ɔɔ lonaa aa ala, awa nya gbɔnhu ngɔɔ lonaa aa ala awa ngi gbɔha lɔgɔɔu ngaa ala."
43014022	Ka Yulasi lagbiti i gɛa, "Maliki, i gee bai bɔɔ gbɔha lɔgɔɔu ngaa nuee, yeingaa nha bi ba gbɔha lɔgɔɔu ngaa ngelou nhu belaa i?"
43014023	Ka Yisɔsi i kpɛɛmbonga gɛnhi, "Ina nuu aa lo ngaa nge, ɔɔ nwaa bɛɛa nya oo nau ngaa kɛ, awa nya Kɛɛgɛ na ɔɔ lonaa aa ala, awa nya o ni Kɛɛgɛ na o nɔɔ baa ala le kangaa ni gɛ na nii ala o.
43014024	Nuu na nana ai loni aa nge, ai nwaa bɛɛ nya oo nau ngaa kɛ. Awa ngoo na nana waa mɛi ngaa kɛ nya nda guegue oo aile, kɛlɛ Kɛɛgɛ na nana i nya loni, ala le mɛ ngoo na aa sege na.
43014025	"Ngoo indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛa aa wuee nhuna ngi na lɛ tii wua o tuun.
43014026	Kɛlɛ Kpɔmba nwɔɔ na, napangaa Ngebɔ Yina na, nana Kɛɛgɛ na ɔɔ tee aa nya laa na, Kpɔmba nwɔɔ na siina ɔɔ wu nagɔlia aa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ, awa ɔɔ pelenaa wu nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla gbɛ o gbɛ na nwa nana ngi kɛa aa wuee.
43014027	"Ngoo ba ngaa maa lɛi lo aa wuee, napangaa nya nda nwaa lɛi na ala nwɛ ngaa ngɔa wu eya. Awa ngai ngɔa wu eya aa pele na ngelou nhu belaa i taa maa lɛi ɔa la ningaa eyae. Faa nwɛɛe awɛɛ lii na yaakpaa inaile awɛɛ lua.
43014028	Kawu mɛinga ngi gɛi wu nwa, 'Ngoo ba ngaa wu lo ngaa li, kɛlɛ ngɔɔ baa boma wuee.' Ina wu lo ngɔɔ aa nge, wu ba goonhu nɛɛa aa mɛindaa aa kɛɛlaa ngoo ya Kɛɛgɛ na le, gbaa Kɛɛgɛ na ala bombou ngɔ lee ngɔ nyaa.
43014029	Awa chaanngi nhu ngoo nhumbu aa kɛ aa wuee yeingaa i gilaa bele, kangaa nhuna aa bele, wɔɔ laanɛɛa.
43014030	Ngaigɔ yɛpɛ wuee gbɔnhu nhu gɔha, gbɛnhaile ngelou indinɛi nhu nwanha na lɔ aa ba. Kɛlɛ ngi fɔha ai nya nwanhu,
43014031	kɛlɛ k`a ngelou nhu belaa i taa kɔɔ qai aa kɛɛlaa nya lo ngɔ aa Kɛɛgɛ na. Na nhaa nwɛɛ ngaa gbɛ o gbɛ na bele ɛɛ gbo aa kɛ aa nge pelendaa nhanwa. "A huua, ami segea kungu ngindinɛi nhu.
43015001	"Nya nwɛ tɔmbaga ulu na aa nge, awa nya Kɛɛgɛ na maa gbatɛ gbatɛ mɔɔ na nwɛ aa ala.
43015002	Mbeke o mbeke i nyaa nana ai wani, ɔɔ kpaainaa nyaa, kɛlɛ mbeke o mbeke i nyaa nana aa wa, ɔɔ maa gbatɛ gbatɛa kangaa i nwaa lo ngaa mbandaa.
43015003	Ngoo na nhanwa nana ngi kɛaɔ aa wuee, oo pelengaɔ tɔ woo chanhainga.
43015004	A loa hounwayaa nhu nya nhu, awa nya gbɔnhu ngi lo hounwayaa nhu wu nhu. Ɛɛ gbo mbeke gbama na ai wa, kaa gɛ ngulua, ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa wuee, waigɔ wa, k`a ndoo nwɛɛ waa lo nya nhu.
43015005	"Nya bele ngɔ ɛɛ ngulu na, awa wua wu bele ngɔ ɛɛ mbeke beke na. Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa lo nya nhu, awa nya ngi lo ala nhu, maa nwɔɔ na siina ɔɔ wanaa kpinhi ɔ. Gbaa gbɛ o gbɛ ai na waa ku waa pele nya boma.
43015006	Nuu na nana bɛɛ ai loi nya nhu, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala gbaainaa nyaa i pii, ɛɛ gbo taa mbeke na bii awa i be. Mbeke beke na siina, taa ngaa lɔgɔa awa ti pii ngɔmbua awa i nwɔ.
43015007	Ina baa lo nya nhu awa nya oo na ngaa kɛ i lo bi nhu, nhu nwɔɔli pelena gbɛ o gbɛ na nhanwa bi lo ngɔ la, awa maa nhanda na siina ɔɔ belenaa biɛɛ.
43015008	Nhuna waa wa kpinhi ɔ, nya Kɛɛgɛ na bɛɛyaa bombou mbaa na oo lɔgɔɔunga aa naa bele. Awa pele ngɔ indinɛi nwɛ waa bele nda aa nya galandengaa.
43015009	Nya lo ngɔ aa wuee ɛɛ gbo Kɛɛgɛ na i longa aa nge. Faa nwɛɛe a loa nya lomayaa na nhu.
43015010	Ina waa nwaa bɛɛ nanau ngaa kɛ aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa, wɔɔ loa nya lomayaa na nhu, ɛɛ gbo ngi loa nya Kɛɛgɛ na lomayaa na nhu, gbɛnhaile ngoo nwaa bɛɛa nanau i kɛi aa nge pelendaa nhanwa.
43015011	"Ngoo indinɛi gɛa aa wuee kangaa nya goonhu nɛɛ na i ba gɛ wu nhu, awa kangaa wu nda goonhu nɛɛ na ndaa fe.
43015012	Indinɛi nwɛ ngaa kɛ aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa, ndomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu, ɛɛ gbo nya lo ngɔ na aa wuee.
43015013	Nuu ai na nana ndomayaa i ngeya nana mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ indinɛia aa kɛɛlaa, k`a nuu aa ngi lɛɛhu na gɔan ngi gɛnwa belaa i fanwa.
43015014	Nya gɛnwa belaa nwɛ aa wuee ina waa nana bele ngaa kɛ aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa.
43015015	Ngɛagɔ ui wuaa gbɔnhu aa ngeyaalakpangaa, gbɛnhaile ngeyaalakpandou na ai nana gɔɔ ala nwanhu nwɔɔ na aa pele. Kɛlɛ ngoo uinga wuaa aa kɛnwa belaa, gbɛnhaile ngoo nana lɔgɔɔunga bɛɛ aa wuee nana ngi mɛini kualaa nya Kɛɛgɛ na le.
43015016	Wua aile wu nya nhu ɔhɛie kɛlɛ nya nwɛ ngi wu nhu ɔhɛi awa ngoo ngenge ɔaa wu eya pelendaa nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa, wu li wu wa ngaa nguluwa kpinhi gbinhi, napangaa nguluwa na nana aa gɛ na aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ. Awa indinɛi nhanwa, nana bɛɛ waa Kɛɛgɛ na nwɔɔli fanwa aa nya laa na, ɔɔ ngɔaa wu eya.
43015017	Faa nwɛɛe ngi indinɛi gɛ aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa, ndomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu.
43015018	"Ina ngelou na aa lolo aa wuee, a kɔɔna aa kɛɛlaa oo lolo ɔ pɛnhɛɛ aa nge yeingaa i gilaa lolo aa wuee.
43015019	Ina i ba bele ngaa kɛɛlaa ngelou na bo mɛɛ aa wuee, ngelou na i ba lonaa aa wuee ɛɛ ndo ngɔ na aa ngi ndaa i. Kɛlɛ kina ngi ndaa i ngaile aa wuee, faa nwɛɛ tolo ɔ na aa wuee, gbaa ngoo wu nhu ɔhɛa kualaa ngelou na nhu.
43015020	A nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlalɛ baa ngoo na nwa ngi kɛi aa wuee gɛnhi, 'Ngeyaalakpandou kolo ai ala nhu mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ ala nwanhu nwɔɔ naa.' Faa nwɛɛe ina too nya aa sɛɛgɛa, tɔɔ wu aa sɛɛgɛa boma. Ina too nwaa bɛɛa nya oo nau ngaa kɛ, tɔɔ nwaa bɛɛa boma wu nda nau.
43015021	Kɛlɛ tɔɔ indinɛi belenaa aa wuee bɛɛ nya lɔgɔ fanwa, gbɛnhaile tai nuu na gɔɔ nana i nya loni.
43015022	Ina ngai ba ba ɔɔ ngaa yɛpɛ tuee, tai ba gɛ lɛɛi nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhanwa. Kɛlɛ kina ngoo yɛpɛ ɔ tuee, maa gabali ai na nana taa fe.
43015023	Nuu na nana tolo ɔ aa nge, ala lolo ɔ boma aa nya Kɛɛgɛ na.
43015024	Tai ba gɛ lɛɛi nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhanwa ina ngai ba ba ngaa nhanda bele pele ti liiya nana nuu o nuu ai lɛ peleni lɛɔ. Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu too naa lɔa awa too lolo boma aa nya o ka nya Kɛɛgɛ na.
43015025	Kɛlɛ too indinɛi belenga kangaae ngoo na laa fe nana kpaali ngɔ ti Sɔ na nhu gɛnhi, 'Ti lolo ɔɔ aa nge nhunhaa ai mba.'
43015026	"Nhuna Kpɔmba nwɔɔ na aa ba nana ngɔɔ tee wuɛɛ kualaa Kɛɛgɛ na le, napangaa Ngebɔ Yina na nana aa tɔmbaga na lɔgɔɔu ngu to ngɔ Ngebɔa, nana aa ba kualaa Kɛɛgɛ na le, maa Yina na siina ɔɔ seeliyaa hea nya nhanwa.
43015027	Awa wua gbɔnhu wɔɔ seeliyaa hee heea nya nhanwa, gbɛnhaile wuaa naɔ tii nya o kualaama aa lɔgɔ na ngi tɔɔloni aa ningaa nagɔlindaa.
43016001	"Ngoo indinɛi gɛa bɛɛ aa wuee kangaa wu hagba la Ngebɔ nhu.
43016002	Ningaa tɔɔ wu gbɛa kualaa Yuua ti gɔɛ pɛlɛ bɛlɛ nau. Aa tɔmbaga lɔgɔ lɔ aa ba nhuna nuu o nuu nana aa wu baa, ɔɔ nɛgilia wu baandaa na siina nwa aa kɛɛlaa ala Ngebɔ enge nwɛ aa pele.
43016003	Awa tɔɔ indinɛi belenaa, gbɛnhaile tai lɛ Kɛɛgɛ na gɔɔni inaile tai lɛ nya gɔɔni.
43016004	Kɛlɛ ngoo indinɛi gɛa aa wuee, kangaa nhuna lɔgɔ na aa hiti ti nhanwa nhanda indinɛi bele pelendaa nhanwa, wu ba nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla aa kɛɛlaa kangi maa yia gɛaɔ aa wuee. "Ngai indinɛi gɛiɔ aa wuee tɔɔlomaa na, gbɛnhaile ngee naanɔɔ tii wua o.
43016005	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu ngoo ba ngaa li nuu na le nana i nya loni. Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, wu ila kee ai na nana aa nya nwɔɔli aa gɛ, "Boo ya mii?"
43016006	Awa chaanngi nhu tɔ ngi indinɛi gɛa aa wuee, maa nwɔuyaa lɔ wu nwa.
43016007	Kɛlɛ ngi tɔmbaga na gɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, maa nhiɛ ɔ wu nhanwa ina ngaa li, gbɛnhaile ina ngai lii, Kpɔmba nwɔɔ na aigɔ ba wuee. Kɛlɛ ina ngaa li, nhu nwɛɛ ngɔɔ ala lee wuee.
43016008	Awa nhuna aa ba, ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔunaa aa ngelou na nda ningaa i aa kɛɛlaa ti nɛgili na taa pele ngu to ngɔ nhanda nyɔua o teenjaa o awa ka Ngebɔ gɔhɔ na, maa nɛgili na siina ngaa haa ɔ.
43016009	Ti gaka ngɔ ngu to ngɔ nhanda nyɔua, gbɛnhaile tai laanɛɛi aa nge.
43016010	Ti gaka ngɔ ngu to ngɔ teenjaaa gbɛnhaile ngoo ba ngaa li Kɛɛgɛ na le, awa waigɔ nya lɔ gbɔnhu kpɔ.
43016011	Ti gaka ngɔ ngu to ngɔ kɔhɔ mba gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo ngelou indinɛi nhu nwanha na gɔhɔnga tɔ.
43016012	"Nhanda gbinhi gbinhi lɔ na lɛ nya eya kɛndaa nhanwa aa wuee, kɛlɛ waigɔ ku waa nda nɛɛnwaa chaanngi nhu bɛɛ, gbɛnhaile kpinhi ɔ.
43016013	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ Yina na nana aa tɔmbaga na lɔgɔɔu Ngebɔ nhanwa, nhuna aa ba, ɔɔ pelenaa wu tɔmbaga na gɔɔ bɛɛ. Gbaa aigɔ yɛpɛ aa ngi nda guegue fɔha, kɛlɛ nana gbo bɛɛ aa mɛi ala nwɛ aa kɛ, awa ɔɔ kɛa aa wuee nana paa baalaa i na.
43016014	Ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔunaa aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa mbɛɛ lɔ nyaa, gbɛnhaile nana ngaa kɛ ala nwɛ Yina na ɔɔ kpau i kɛ aa wuee.
43016015	Nana bɛɛ i Kɛɛgɛ na eya nya bo mɛɛ. Na nhaa nwɛɛ ngi gɛi nana ngaa kɛ ala nwɛ Yina na ɔɔ kpau i kɛ aa wuee.
43016016	"Nhu golo ɔɔ lɛmbinaa waigɔ nya lɔ. Awa nhu golo aa lɛmbi boma, wɔɔ nya lɔa."
43016017	Ka ngi galandengaa i lɛingaa i ti gɛa loganhu, "Indinɛi i kɛa aa muee koonhu na nwɛ aa ngigbɛ, nhuna i gɛi, 'Nhu golo ɔɔ lɛmbinaa waigɔ nya lɔ. Awa nhu golo aa lɛmbi boma, wɔɔ nya lɔa?' Koonhu na nwɛ aa ngigbɛ boma i gɛi, 'Gbɛnhaile ngoo ba ngaa li Kɛɛgɛ na le?'
43016018	Awae kati gɛa, "Gbɛɛ koonhu na le aa 'nhu golo aa lɛmbi?' Mai nana gɔɔ i ma!"
43016019	Ka Yisɔsi i nhu kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa ti lo ngɔ laɔ ti ala nwɔɔli, faa nwɛɛ i gɛi ti nwa, "Gbɛɛ waa nwɔɔli mɔɔli fanwa? Ee ngi gɛi, 'Nhu golo ɔɔ lɛmbinaa waigɔ nya lɔ. Awa nhu golo aa lɛmbi boma, wɔɔ nya lɔa?'
43016020	Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, wɔɔ yɔkpɔu gulaa aa ngɔɔ, kɛlɛ ngelou na ndaa i tɔɔ goonhu nɛɛa. Awa maa nwɔuyaa ɔɔ wu houa, kɛlɛ wu nwaa nwɔuyaa na ɔɔ botenaa aa koonhu nɛɛ.
43016021	Nhuna njie na aa gɛ fuu na nhu, maa nwɔuyaa lɔ ala nwa, gbɛnhaile ngi lɔgɔ na oo hiti ala yɔgɔlɔlaa nhanwa. Kɛlɛ oo ndou na lenaa, ngi yɔgɔlɔ na gili oo nɔa alɛɛ, gbɛnhaile ala goonhu nɛɛ ɔ tɔ aa kɛɛlaa oo ndou lenga ngelou na nhu.
43016022	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa wuee, maa nwɔuyaa lɔ lɛ wu nwa chaanngi nhu, kɛlɛ ngɔɔ wu lɔa gbɔnhu, awa wu goonhu ɔɔ nɛɛa. Koonhu nɛɛ na siina nuu ai ku aa kpau wu eya.
43016023	"Nhuna maa hoo na ɔɔ hiti, waigɔ nya nwɔɔli gbɛ o gbɛ nhanwa. Aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, ina waa nya laa laau gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu waa Kɛɛgɛ na nwɔɔli fanwa, ɔɔ ngɔaa wu eya.
43016024	Nhaa chaanngi wai lɛ gbɛ o gbɛ nhanda nhu nwɔɔlini waa ui nhu nya laa naa. Faa nwɛɛe a nhu nwɔɔlina awa wɔɔ hɔlɔa, kangaa wu goonhu nɛɛ na laa fe.
43016025	"Ngoo indinɛi gɛa aa wuee njia ɔha nhu. Maa lɔgɔ ɔɔ baa nhuna ngaigɔ yɛpɛ gbɔnhu wuee aa pele ngɔ nana, kɛlɛ ngɔɔ kɛa aa wuee kpou Kɛɛgɛ na nhanwa.
