45008002	Gbaa Yina na nana i mi nwanhu awa aa ba muɛɛ aa ndɛɛhu mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, maa Yina na siina, oo nhanda baanga nyaa kualaa sɔ na eya nana ngu to ngɔ na nhanda nyɔua o, ka haa.
45008003	Kina nuu gbɔha lii na njaaiyaai ɔɔ, Sɔ na ai kuni aa nana bele pelendaa ee ngeya, maa nhanda na siina nwɛ Ngebɔ i peleni. Kɛɛ nhanda nyɔu na gɔhɔnga nana i nuu gbɔha lii na nwa awa kɛɛ nyaaia. I indinɛi belenia aa ngi nda Lou na leendaa ngelou i nhu, nana ala lii na bele ngɔɔ ɛɛ nhanda nyɔu lii nana i nuu gbɔha eya. I baia kangaa i nhanda nyɔu gua nuu gbɔha lii na nwa.
45008004	Ngebɔ i indinɛi belenia kangaa mua na maa sia aa pele na nana kpala ngi Ngebɔ Yina naa, kɛlɛ mai sia nwa aa pele na nana kpala ngi mi lii naa, mi ku mi nana bele hiti ɔ nhu kpala ngi Sɔ naa aa kɛɛlaa tee ngɔ.
45008005	Ningaa i natiini taa gɛ na aa pele na kpala ngi ti lii naa kangaa ti gɛ na, nana kpala ngi ti lii naa kangaa ti pele, alɛɛ aa sia aa ti nɛɛnwaa na. Awa ningaa i natiini taa gɛ na aa pele na kpala ngi ngi Yina naa kangaa ti gɛ na, alɛɛ aa sia aa ti nɛɛnwaa na.
45008006	Nɛɛnwaa bundaa nana nhu kpala ngi nuu gbɔha na lii naa, aa baa aa haa. Kɛlɛ nɛɛnwaa bundaa nana nhu kpala ngi Yina naa, aa baa aa ndɛɛhu o ka maa lɛi.
45008007	Gbaa nuu na nana aa nɛɛnwaa bu nana nhu kpala ngi ala lii naa, Ngebɔ haalee mɛ aa ala. Gbaa ai nwaa bɛɛi Ngebɔ sɔ nau. Awa aa tɔmbaga ai ku aa nwaa bɛɛ mbu bɛnhɛ.
45008008	Ningaa i natiini taa nana bele kpala ngi ti lii naa tai ku taa Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ.
45008009	Kɛlɛ wua wai nana bele ma kpala ngi wu lii naa. Kɛlɛ wua waa nana bele kpala ngi Yina naa, ina aa tɔmbaga k`a Ngebɔ Yina na lɔ wu nhu. Kɛlɛ ina Kilaisi Yina na ai gɛi nuu nhu, maa nwɔɔ na siina Kilaisi nda aile aa ala.
45008010	Kɛlɛ ina aa bele ngaa Kilaisi lɔ wu nhu, hali nha wu lugu na ɔɔ haaa nhanda nyɔu lɔgɔ fanwa, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ Yina na ɔɔ pelenaa wu gɛ na, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo wu belenga aa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ.
45008011	Ngebɔ nwɛ i huui Yisɔsi Kilaisiu kualaa haa na nhu. Awa ina ngi Yina aa hei bi nhu, maa Eebɔ na nana i huui Yisɔsi Kilaisiu kualaa haa na, ɔɔ ndɛɛhu ɔaa boma wu lugu na eya nana aa haa. Ɔɔ indinɛi belenaa aa ngi Yina na nhu bele nana i hei wu nhu.
45008012	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, nhanda lɔ na nana pelendaa i mi eya qai, kɛlɛ mi gɛɛlaa na aile aa pele na kpala ngi mi lii naa kangaa mi gɛ na.
45008013	Gbaa ina waa gɛ na aa pele na kpala ngi wu lii naa, wɔɔ haaa. Kɛlɛ ina aa Yina na fɔha na, wu wu nhanda nyɔu na eyaabele na baa, wɔɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔa.
45008014	Gbaa natiini bɛɛ Ngebɔ Yina na aa sia aa tuee, Ngebɔ lengaa nwɛ aa tuee.
45008015	Yina na nana wu hɔlɔa aigɔ wu bele gbɔnhu aa nduaa kangaa i pele wu lua. Kɛlɛ Yina na nana wu hɔlɔa oo wu belenga ɛɛ ngi lengaa, nana aa pele maa ɔɔ Ngebɔ le gɛnhi, "Hapa! N`i Kɛɛgɛ i."
45008016	Ngebɔ Yina na gbɔha na nwɛ aa nwaa gbɔ ngaa mi nda luu na, awa too kɛa aa muee aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ lengaa nwɛ aa muee.
45008017	Awa kina Ngebɔ lengaa nwɛ aa muee, mɔɔ nduba na hɔlɔa nana aa makɛ ngi ndaa i fanwa. Awa mɔɔ nana hɔlɔa boma ɛɛ Kilaisi i nana hɔlɔi Ngebɔ i makɛi alɛɛ, ina bɛnhɛ maa yɔgɔlɔ ɛɛ ala i yɔgɔlɔi, kangaa mi ba mbɛɛ bombou mbaa hɔlɔ ɛɛ ala.
45008018	Nya nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa njɔgɔlɔ na maa pele chaanngi nhu aa lɔgɔ indinɛi, mai nhua hali mbɛɛ bombou mbaa na nwa nana Ngebɔ ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu mi nhu.
45008019	Nhai o nhai nana Ngebɔ i kpatɛi alaa wolo ngaa ngɔi bombou mbaa, kangaa ti Ngebɔ lɔ aa ngi lengaa i ndɔgɔɔu.
45008020	Gbaa Ngebɔ oo ngelou na gɔhɔnga aa kɛɛlaa ngelou na ɔɔ guaa fuu. Awa oo belenga tɔ. Ngelou na guunmayaa aile, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ i kuunni ma gɛnhi. Na nhu bɛɛ, nɛɛnwaa la indinɛi lɔɔ Ngebɔ eya,
45008021	kangaa foo ila ma, ngelou na gbɔha na, Ngebɔ ɔɔ nhanda baanaa mba kualaa ngi luayaa na nhu kangaa ai ba gbuuli, awa ɔɔ nhanda baanaa mba, kangaa i mbɛɛ bombou mbaa hɔlɔ ɛɛ ngi lengaa i tɔɔ hɔlɔ.
45008022	Gbaa mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhaahaai ngelou gbɔha na lɔ aa ɔɔ kaanhu gbaai gbaai eya ɛɛ ndou le koonhu gbaai aa njie hou fuu nhu.
45008023	Kɛlɛ ngelou na ila ngɔ aile gbo aa ɔɔe. Mua pɛnhɛɛ fembɛ na i mi eya, napangaa Ngebɔ Yina na, k`ami ɔɔ gbɔnhu mi lii na nwa nhuna maa gɛ aa Ngebɔ nwaa golondaa aa ngɔi bombou mbaa, kangaa i mi bele ngaa ngi lengaa, napangaa lɔgɔ na ɔɔ nhanda baa muaa.
45008024	Gbaa nɛɛnwaa la indinɛi nhu nwɛɛ mi ndendouyaa hɔlɔi na. Kɛlɛ ina maa nana lɔ mi nɛɛnwaa la ɔ fanwa, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa nɛɛnwaa la aile. Gbaa ele nwɛɛ aa nɛɛnwaa la nana nhu aa tɔ?
45008025	Kɛlɛ ina maa nɛɛnwaa la nana nhanwa mai tɔi, kamaa maa golo aa ndii lo.
45008026	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, Ngebɔ Yina na aa baa i gbɔ muaa nhuna maa gɛ yaaiyaaii. Gbaa mai bɛɛlii maa laaminɛ bele ngaa pele na nana mi ba pele nda. Kɛlɛ Yina na gbɔha na nwɛ aa yɛpɛ Ngebɔ le muɛɛ aa ngɔɔ nana nuu ai ku aa kɛ.
45008027	Awa Ngebɔ, nana aa mi lii na nwaa lɔ, i nana gɔɔnaa i Yina na nɛɛnwaa na, gbɛnhaile Yina na nwɛ aa yɛpɛ Ngebɔ le Ngebɔ ndaa i fanwa, ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na lepele.
45008028	Mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu Ngebɔ i enge kpekpenjaa nhanwa natiini ngee ti lo ngɔ na aa ala, napangaa natiini i uinga tuaa ndi ɔ aa ngi laalaa na lepele.
45008029	Gbaa natiini Ngebɔ i ti nhu ɔhɛaɔ awa kɛɛ ndaalaaa boma aa kɛɛlaa ti bele ngaa tɔɔgɔɔ mbelaa ɛɛ ngi Lou na, kangaa maa Lou na i ba bele ngaa pɛnhɛɛ ndou na ndege nhiindengaa gbinhi gbinhia liiya.
45008030	Awa natiini i ndaalaa ɔ aa ti belendaa aa tɔɔgɔɔ mbelaa, maa belaa i siina kɛɛ uinga boma tuaa ala le. Awa natiini i uini tuaa, kɛɛ ti belenga boma aa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ. Awa natiini i ti beleni aa tee mbelaa, kɛɛ ti belenga boma aa ningaa natiini i ngi bɛɛ bombou mbaa na gaka ɔai ti eya.
45008031	A mɔɔ gɛ gbɛ nhanda indinɛi nhanwa bɛɛ? Ina Ngebɔ lɔ na mi nhanwa, ee gbɛ o gbɛ aa kunaa mi nwa? Hali!
45008032	Ai ngi nda Lou na nwakɛi, kɛlɛ kɛɛ kɔannga mi nhanwa bɛɛ. Kina oo ngi Lou na ɔaa mi eya, ee aigɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na ɔa mi eya polou?
45008033	Ele nwɛɛ ɔɔ Ngebɔ nhu ɔhɛ belaa i fɔɔlɛ hɔɔlɛ aa njia? Ngebɔ gbɔha na oo gɛ ti leo ɔ.
45008034	Ka ele nwɛɛ tɔ ɔɔ kɔhɔ na bele? Nuu ai na. Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwɛ i haai, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, ka Ngebɔ i huua alau kualaa haa na nhu, awa alaa heii Ngebɔ ɛha loko na nhu gaka, awa ala nwɛ gbɔnhu aa yɛpɛ Ngebɔ le mi nhanwa!
45008035	Ele nwɛɛ ɔɔ mi loganhu gɔɛ kualaa Kilaisi lomayaa na eya? Ee kpɔu gbɔu nwɛ, inaile ee nhanda nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ma nwɛ, inaile ee ngaa sɛɛgɛ nwɛ, inaile ee ndɔɛ nwɛɛ ɔɔ gula, inaile ee fɛli nwɛɛ, inaile ee kpɛndɛ kpɛndɛ mɛ, inaile ee haa nwɛɛ?
45008036	Ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Bi lɔgɔ fanwa, nuaa haa nhu aa foo o foo. Tuaa ni bele ngɔ ɛɛ mbaalaa natiini taa li aa tuee ti baa ma."
45008037	Kɛlɛ nhanda indinɛi nhu bɛɛ, kunjaa lɔ mi eya nana hiti ɔ nhu aa ala nhu bele nana ndo ngɔ na aa muee!
45008038	Gbaa nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa i bele bɛnhɛ aa haa, inaile ndɛɛhu, inaile malekaa, inaile yinayaa nwanhangaa, inaile nhaanhaa i ti na chaanngi nhu, inaile nhaanhaa i tɔɔ ba guna, inaile fɔha,
45008039	inaile ngee nhu o, inaile lɔu o, inaile nhai o nhai lagbiti nana Ngebɔ i kpatɛi, indinɛi bɛɛ ai na nana ku ngɔ aa mi loganhu gɔɛ kualaa Ngebɔ lomayaa na eya nana mi bo mɛɛ aa mi Nwaliki na nhu bele Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
45009001	Nana ngi baa kɛ tɔmbaga nwɛɛ. Kilaisi bo mɛɛ aa nge, awa nana ngaa kɛ tɔmbaga nwɛɛ. Nya nɛɛnwaa na le, ngi hounwayaa na nhu tii Ngebɔ Yina na o, alaa ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ gbɔnhu aa nge aa kɛɛlaa nana ngaa kɛ tɔmbaga nwɛɛ.
45009002	Nana nya lo ngɔ la ngi kɛ ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. Nya nwaa nwɔuyaa na mbombou ngɔ, awa nya lii oo nyaaia nya ndege Yuua i fanwa.
45009003	Gbaa nya gbɔha na ngɔɔ lonaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ laangaa nau, ngi loganhu gɔɛ aa Kilaisi ti lɔgɔ fanwa.
45009004	Iisilɛli bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu belaa nwɛ aa tuee. Ka Ngebɔ i ti belenga aa ngi lengaa, awa kɛɛ ngi bɛɛyaa na lɔgɔɔunga aa tuee. Kɛɛ ngi ilimayaa na gbatɛa loganhu aa tuee, awa kɛɛ Sɔ na ɔaa ti eya. Tɔmbaga batounjaa na lɔ ti eya. Awa too Ngebɔ nɛɛnwaa lo na hɔlɔa.
45009005	Tua koonhu leengaa nwɛ aa tuee kualaa tɔgɔ mba Hibulu bembaa i ngee. Ka Kilaisi nana i bai ɛɛ nuu gbɔha, ti le na nhu nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala. Kangaa Ngebɔ nana i gbɛ o gbɛ na nwanhu aa sia la, i mbihɛ hɔlɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ! Kangaa i bele.
45009006	Ai beleni k`a kɛɛ nwɛɛ ngaa gɛ Ngebɔ oo na oo gbahaae gbaa Iisilɛlia i bɛpɛ ngaile Ngebɔ ndaa i ngaa tuee.
45009007	Awa ti bɛpɛ ngaile Ngebɔ lengaa aa tuee, gbɛnhaile Eebilahamu goo na nhu lengaa nwɛ aa tuee. Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Aaisaaki nhu bele nwɛɛ bɔɔ koo nhu lengaa i hɔlɔ na nana ngi bi nɛɛnwaa loni fanwa."
45009008	Indinɛi oo lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa ningaa i natiini taa ti le gbo ndugumayaa nhu, tua aile Ngebɔ lengaa i ngaa tuee, kɛlɛ ndengaa i natiini Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei, tua nwɛ Ngebɔ i ti gbau ngɔ aa koo nhu lengaa.
45009009	Gbaa indinɛi nwɛ nɛɛnwaa lo na i kɛi, "Aa lɔgɔ indinɛi bonda fogo nana nhu ɔɔ ba, ngɔɔ baa boma, awa Sela ɔɔ nhiindou hɔlɔa."
45009010	Awa indinɛi aile gboe kɛlɛ Libɛɛka ee naanɔɔ gbɔnhu, nana ee koo nhu aa tuua kɛɛgɛ ila fanwa, napangaa mi bemba na Aaisaaki.
45009011	-
45009012	Ka Ngebɔ i gɛa LIbɛɛka nwa, "Bi nhiindengaa i, ndalia gee na nwɛ ɔɔ enge ndaboogee nau." I indinɛi gɛia kangaa i ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa ngila mɔɔ na nhu ɔhɛndaa ɔɔ belenaa ndi ɔ aa ngi laalaa na lepele. Oo indinɛi gɛaɔ yeingaa ti gila ti le ngɔɔ, awa yeingaa ti gila nana bele kpekpe ngɔ tii nana o nyɔu ɔ. Indinɛi oo lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ nhu ɔhɛ na i peleni, i pelenia ngu to ngɔ ngi ui naa, kɛlɛ ngu ngai loni gbɛ o gbɛa nana ti peleni.
45009013	Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Nya lo ngɔɔ aa Yekɔpi, kɛlɛ nya lolo ɔɔ aa Isɔ."
45009014	Ee faa nwɛɛ mɔɔ gɛa Ngebɔ galahai ɔ? Kangaa ɛɛ bele!
45009015	Gbaa kɛɛ gɛa Moosisi nwa, "Ngɔɔ maaumayaa gbaunaa nuu na nwa nana ngaa lo ngaa kpaundaa ma. Awa ngɔɔ nwaaua nuu na nwa nana ngaa lo ngaa maulaa ma."
45009016	Awae Ngebɔ nhu ɔhɛ na nana aa pele njigba ngɔ ngi nwaaumayaa na nhu, kɛlɛ ai yigbani nana nhu kpala ngi nuua inaile nana nuu aa pele.
45009017	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛia Iyibiti nwanha mbaa na nwa, "Ngi bi belenia aa manha mbaa indinɛi nhanwa, aa kɛɛlaa ngi nya fɔha na lɔgɔɔu ngaa bi nhu bele, kangaa ngi pele nya laa na i yanja nhu ngelou gbɔha na nhu bɛɛ."
45009018	Faa nwɛɛe Ngebɔ aa maaumayaa gbaunaa nuu na nwa bɛɛ nana aa lo nda, awa ina aa gɛ ɔɔ pele nuu i lihi lihi, aa pelenaa.
45009019	Kɛlɛ wɔɔ nya nwɔɔlinaa gɛnhi, "Gbɔɔ Ngebɔ aa mi lɛɛgɛ tuun? Ele nwɛɛ tele ɔ Ngebɔ guunmayaa naa?"
45009020	Kɛlɛ bia nuu gbɔha gbama nwɛɛ gbo aa biee, ee baa kunaa bi kɛ aa Ngebɔ nana aa pele? Pɔlɔhɛɛ ai gɛ nuu na nwa i ala gbatɛi, "Gbɔɔ bi nya gbatɛi aa pele ngɔ indinɛi?"
45009021	Na nhu bɛɛ, ndakpa na nana aa pɔlɔhɛɛ gbatɛ ala hiti ɔ nhu i enge aa njogbo bɔlɔ na, aa pele na ala lo ngɔ la. Aa siiyaa fee kpatɛ gbatɛa kualaa njogbo bɔlɔ aa lɔgɔ maa ila na, i ila na faka nhu nhanda nhanwa, awa ila na pɛlɛu gee nwɛ.
45009022	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa Ngebɔ nana nhu i peleni. Ngɔi ee naanɔɔ alaa kangaa i ngi gbaai mba na lɔgɔɔu ngaa ningaa i, kangaa ti ngi fɔha na gɔɔ. Kɛlɛ kɛɛ wolonga ndii lo nhu yeingaa i ba gilaa natiini kpɔɔni ti gbɔɔnindaa ee ngeya. Awa tua na siina too gbɔha nwaa gbatɛa ti nyaaindaa nhanwa.
45009023	Awa ngɔi lɔ mba gbɔnhu i ngi bɛɛyaa bombou mbaa na lɔgɔɔu, nana i pui mi nwa mua na i maaumayaa lɔgɔɔunga aa muee, napangaa mua na i mi nwaa gbatɛa ngi bɛɛyaa na hɔlɔndaa nhanwa.
45009024	Gbaa mua nwɛ ningaa i ngaa muee i uini muaa. yuua i nhu aile gbo i uini na muaae kɛlɛ kɛɛ uinga boma kualaa Kpitia i nhu.
45009025	Indinɛi nwɛ Ngebɔ i kɛi Hosia gɔɔ na nhu, "Ningaa i natiini nya ndaa aileɔ aa tuee, ngɔɔ uinaa tuaa aa 'Nya ndaa.' Awa nde na nana ngai loni laɔ, ngɔɔ uinaa mba aa 'Nya lomayaa belaa.'
45009026	Awa nhinde na gbɔha na kpei mɛɛ Ngebɔ i gɛi na ti nwa, 'Nya ningaa aile aa wuee,' naa nwɛɛ tɔɔ ui na tuaa aa kɛndɛ Eebɔ na lengaa."
45009027	Aiseya ɛgɛ Iisilɛli nhanwa, "Hali bɛnhɛ ina Iisilɛlia i ti gɛ gbinhi nhaa ɛɛ qɛa nana aa gɛ kpolo ya na nwaa qɛagbaa nhu, ti gɛ ɔ chokole natiini tɔɔ ndendouyaa hɔlɔ.
45009028	Gbaa Maliki na ɔɔ nana belenaa i gɛi ɔɔ pele pɔlɔgɔɔ i nwa. Ɔɔ pelenaa i hiti nhu chɔɔ, awa ɔɔ pelenaa lɛmbi."
45009029	Ɛɛ gbo Aiseya i kɛaɔ giilɛ gɛnhi, "Ina Lamanhu Nwaliki na ai ba koo nhu lengaa loɔ aa muee, mi ba belenaa ɛɛ Sɔlɔmu, awa mi ba guaguenaa aa Gɔmola."
45009030	A mɔɔ gɛ gbɛ? Kpitia i natiini taile lapiɔ aa gbɔha belendaa aa tee mbelaa Ngebɔ gulɔɔ, tua indinɛi siina, ka Ngebɔ i ti belenga aa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ, gbɛnhaile kati laanɛɛa aa ala.
45009031	Awa Iisilɛlia i natiini tee sɔ ngɔɛ ɔɛ ɔ kangaa sɔ na i ti bele ngaa tee mbelaa Ngebɔ gulɔɔ, tai tɔi.
45009032	Gbɔɔ tai tɔi? Gbɛnhaile tai ngɔɛ ɔɛi aa laanɛɛ, kɛlɛ ti pelenia gbo aa ngenge enge lepele. Awae kati lugbaa "kɔtu naa nana ningaa taa lugba mba."
45009033	Ngebɔ Gbaali na i yɛpɛia fanwa gɛnhi, "kpeendɛ, nya ngaa kɔtu la Saiɔni nana ɔɔ pele ningaa tɔɔ lugba, faha nwɛɛ nana ɔɔ pele tɔɔ gula. Kɛlɛ nuu na bɛɛ nana aa laanɛɛ aa ala, aigɔ ala nɛɛnwaa sege."
45010001	Nya ndegea, nana nya lii na i ngɔi ngɔ o, ka nana ngaa maa laaminɛ bele Ngebɔ le ti nhanwa, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, kangaa ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔ!
45010002	Ngaa kunaa ngi kɛ kpou ti nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa tuaa gbɔha na gɔan ngɔ Ngebɔ nwa, kɛlɛ tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ pele gbekpe naa.
45010003	Tai pele na gɔɔni nana Ngebɔ aa ningaa bele nda aa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ, awae kati lapia aa ti nda bele ɔɛ ɔɛndaa. Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ tai kuunniɔ Ngebɔ nda bele na nwa nana aa ningaa bele nda aa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ.
45010004	Gbaa Kilaisi oo ba aa Sɔ na kpelenwaa na, kangaa nuu o nuu nana aa laanɛɛ, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala belenaa aa tee mɔɔ ala gulɔɔ.
45010005	Moosisi i indinɛi gbaaliia ngu to ngɔ teenjaaa ndi ɔ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa nhanwa Sɔ nau. "Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nwaa bɛɛ nanau Sɔ na aa gɛ ti pele, maa nwɔɔ na ɔɔ gɛa maa hei nhu."
45010006	Kɛlɛ nana Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi ningaa belendaa nhanwa aa tee mbelaa Ngebɔ gulɔɔ aa laanɛɛ nhu bele, ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. "Bɛɛ gɛ gbɔha na nwa, Ele nwɛɛ ɔɔ lɛ aliyana?" (ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, paalaa nwɛ aa Kilaisi mbuu indinɛi).
45010007	"Inaile bɛɛ gɛ gbɔha na nwa, Ele nwɛɛ ɔɔ yei lɔu na?" (ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, huulaa nwɛ Kilaisiu kualaa haa na nhu).
45010008	Kɛlɛ nana i kɛi ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. "Ngebɔ oo na lɔ wu gbɛlaa. Alaa wu laaguun na nhu, awa alaa wu lii na nwa," napangaa laanɛɛyaa oo na nana naa kɛ aa ningaa i.
45010009	Gbaa ina waa kua la waa kɛ aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Maliki nwɛ, awa wu laanɛɛ wu lii na nwa aa kɛɛlaa ka Ngebɔ i huua alau kualaa haa na nhu, wɔɔ ndendouyaa hɔlɔa.
45010010	Gbaa mi laanɛɛ na nhu bele nwɛɛ Ngebɔ aa mi bele ngaa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ. Awa mi gɛɛ gɛɛlaa na nhu bele nwɛɛ maa ndendouyaa hɔlɔ la.
45010011	Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Nuu na bɛɛ aa laanɛɛ aa ala, aigɔ ala nɛɛnwaa sege."
45010012	Indinɛi lɔ nuu o nuu gula ngɔ kpaga naa, gbɛnhaile ndoganhu bai ai Yuua i ndoganhu ka Kpitia i. Ngebɔ, Maliki ila na nwɛ ningaa nhanwa bɛɛ, awa alaa natiini nduba ngɔ bɛɛ aa nduba gbinhi gbinhi taa ui alaa.
45010013	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Nuu na bɛɛ nana aa ui Maliki na laa naa, Maliki na ɔɔ ndendouyaa hea alɛɛ."
45010014	Kɛlɛ tɔɔ gee ui alaa ina tai laanɛɛi aa ala? Awa tɔɔ gee laanɛɛ aa ala ina tai lɛ ala nwaanhaa nwɛini lɛɔ? Awa tɔɔ gee mɛi ina Ngebɔ yia gɛ mɔɔ ai gɛi na?
45010015	Awa tɔɔ gee ngoo na gɛ ina nuu ai Ngebɔ yia gɛ mbelaa loni? Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Maa nhiɛ ɔ na siina kpɔ natiini paalaa taa ba aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na!"
45010016	Kɛlɛ ti bɛpɛ ngaile ti nwaa bɛɛa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ nau Kilaisi nhanwa. Gbaa Aiseya gbɔha na ɛgɛe "Ele nwɛɛ i laanɛɛa aa ngoo na nana ni kɛi aa ala?"
45010017	Awae laanɛɛ i ba kualaa ngoo na nwɛindaa le, awa ngoo na nwɛindaa i ba aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa nhu bele Kilaisi nhanwa.
45010018	Kɛlɛ gbɛɛ ngi nhu nwɔɔli. Ee tai lɛ ngoo na nwɛini? Aa tɔmbaga too mɛinga. Gbaa ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali i gɛi, "Ti oo na oo sia nhu ngelou gbɔha i nhu bɛɛ. Ti oo na taa kɛ oo hiti pɔlɔgɔɔ gbelenwaa."
45010019	Gbɛɛ ngi nhu nwɔɔli gbɔnhu, ee Iisilɛlia i tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔiɔ? Pɛnhɛɛ na ka Ngebɔ i gɛa aa Moosisi nhu bele, "Ngɔɔ pelenaa wu lolo ningaa nhanwa natiini nde ngaile aa tuee. Ngɔɔ pelenaa wu gbaai nde ma nana mɔu mɔu ngɔ."
45010020	Awa Aiseya lii gbɛndɛ ngɔ kpɔ nhuna aa gɛ Ngebɔ ɛgɛ, "Ningaa i natiini taile nya ɔɛ ɔɛ tuɛɛ ti nya lɔa. Ngoo gbɔha na lɔgɔɔunga aa natiini tai nya nhanda nhu nwɔɔlini."
45010021	Kɛlɛ ngu to ngɔ na Iisilɛlia, kɛɛ gɛa, "Ngoo loko nhu laannga foo gbɔha na nhu paalii ningaa binjandaa nhanwa natiini tai nwaa bɛɛi nyɛɛ, awa kati gbonjounga nhu aa nge."
45011001	Gbɛɛ ngi nhu nwɔɔli, ee Ngebɔ oo gbeea ngi ndaa i mba? Kangaa ɛɛ bele! Gbaa nya gbɔnhu Iisilɛli nwɔɔ nwɛ aa nge, Eebilahamui ti goo na nhu lou nwɛɛ aa nge, awa Bɛnjaminii ti le na nhu nwɔɔ nwɛ aa nge.
45011002	Ngebɔ ai gbeeiɔ ngi ningaa i mba natiini i nhumbuaɔ aa ti gɔɔ. Ee wai nana gɔɔ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi ngu to ngɔ Ilaiyaa nhuna i chaagbe laanni Ngebɔ nwa Iisilɛlia i fanwa?
45011003	"Maliki, too bi Eebɔ letua i paaa. Bi chaaga gua nhinde nhinde na too naa nyaai nyaaia. Nya ila ngɔ na nwɛ gbo ngi loa, awa tua taa lapi nya baandaa nhanwa."
45011004	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ i gee ala gbɛɛmboni? Ɛgɛ, "Ngoo kɛgɛingaa wuulu ɔfɛlangaa nwakɛa boma nya gbɔha nhanwa natiini tai ndɛɛ lɛɛ Eebɔ na batouni taa ui mba aa Beeli."
45011005	Pele ngɔ ila na nwɛ chaanngi. Ti chokolengaa lɔ na natiini ti loɔ Ngebɔ i ti nhu ɔhɛa ndi ɔ aa ngi banda bandayaa na lepele.
45011006	Kɛlɛ ina aa bele ngaa panda bandayaa nhu bele nwɛɛ, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ngu ngai loni gbɔnhu ngengea. Inaile ngi banda bandayaa na ɛagɔ bele ngaa panda bandayaa.
45011007	Ka ngigbɛɛ gbɔnhu? Iisilɛlia i tai nana lɔi tee ngɔɛ ɔɛ ɔ. K`a ti chokolengaa i Ngebɔ i ti nhu ɔhɛi tua nwɛɔ ti tɔi. Kɛlɛ lagbitia i natiini tɔ bɛɛ kati lihi lihia Ngebɔ ui na nwa i peleni aa tuee.
45011008	Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi. "Ngebɔ oo pelenga ti nɛɛnwaa haa ka ti lii na gbɔnhu. Awa nhaahaai tai nhanda lɔ nana taa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba."
45011009	Awa Leebili ɛgɛ, "Kangaa ti gbolo gbolo na nana taa kua i bele ɛɛ nyiɛ gbɛ mboonwa o ka maai nana tɔɔ gɔɔ nga, kangaa i pele ti lugba ti gula, kangaa i pele ti kpɔɔni hɔlɔ!
45011010	Kangaa ti liti, kangaa tai ba nhanda lɔ. Awa kangaa ti gɔma i gua ti gbɔu gbɔu nau ti nhu aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ."
45011011	Awae gbɛɛ ngi nhu nwɔɔli, Ee Yuua i ti gbala oo gɔɔa kangaa ti gula? Kangaa ɛɛ bele! Kɛlɛ kina kati nhanda nyɔu belenga, faa nwɛɛ ndendouyaa i bai Kpitia i ngee, kangaa i pele Yuua i ti lolo.
45011012	Awa ina aa bele ngaa Yuua i ti nhanda nyɔu na oo pelenga ngelou na i kpatɛyaa hɔlɔ, awa ti gbahalaa na oo pelenga Kpitia i ti gbatɛ, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa kpɔhayaa ɔɔ gɛa na tee ngɔ indinɛia nhuna Yuua i bɛɛ taa gula mba!
45011013	Chaanngi nhu wuee mɛ ngaa yɛpɛ na wua Kpitia i ngaa wuee. Kina gbo tɔ to mɔɔ nwɛ aa nge Kpitia i ngee, ngɔɔ ni enge na bihɛa aa maa gɛndaa waa,
45011014	naangaa kangaa ngi pele ni ndege Yuua i ti lolo, kangaa ti lɛingaa ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔ.
45011015	Gbaa nhuna Ngebɔ i gbeei tuaa, ningaa lagbitia i bɛɛ ka Ngebɔ i ti nwaa lobinga kualaa faaleenjaa na nhu tee nhu tii Ngebɔ o, awa kɛɛ pelenga ti belenga aa ngi gɛnwa belaa. Bi nɛgili ɔ gbɛɛ ɔɔ bele nhuna Ngebɔ aa kuun ti nwa? Ɔɔ belenaa ɛɛ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔndaa nwɛ kualaa haa nhu!
45011016	Ina pɛnhɛɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha gutu na nana nuu aa tee mba, aa maa gee nana gɔan Ngebɔ nwa, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa lɛgɛ gbɔha na nwɛ tɔ i kɔannga Ngebɔ nwa. Awa ina nuu aa ngulu hape na gɔan Ngebɔ nwa, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa mbeke beke na gbɔnhu Ngebɔ bo mɛɛ.
45011017	Ngulu na nana ti nhiini taa ui mba aa oliibi ulu, too ngi beke na gaka aai aaia mba, awa too mbeke beke gbau kpaunga kualaa oliibi ulu naa nana nuu ai nhiini, too maa gbɔnga oliibi ulu na nana nuu i nhiini. Wua na Yuua aile aa wuee, wu bele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ oliibi ulu na nana nuu ai nhiini. Awa chaanngi nhu wua waa Yuua i ti luba bombou mbaa na aa nɛɛ ɔ gɔɔ.
45011018	Faa nwɛɛe awɛɛ aunwaa lɛ aa natiini Ngebɔ i ti lee leei ɛɛ mbeke beke. Kɛlɛ ina waa tɔ aa kɛɛlaa kawaa aunwaa lɛ la qai, a ndaa nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa wua aile waa hape na gɔe kɛlɛ hape na nwɛ aa wu gɔ.
45011019	Kɛlɛ wɔɔ gɛa, "Ngebɔ i mbeke beke na lee leeia mba, kangaa ni ba ɔa na aa poto."
45011020	Na tɔmbaga nwɛɛ. Kɛɛ tee leea mbaɔ gbɛnhaile tai laanɛɛi, kɛlɛ wua wuaa loni nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ gbɛnhaile wu laanɛɛ ɔ. Awae awɛɛ aunwaa lɛ fanwa, kɛlɛ a luaa!
45011021	Gbaa ina Ngebɔ ai maaumayaa gbauni mbeke beke na nwa nana ee ngulu naa, ee wu nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ maaumayaa gbaunaa wu nwa?
45011022	Beindo moo Ngebɔ banda bandayaa ɔ na lɔa na, awa moo ngi nhanda gbɛndɛ ngɔ na lɔa na. Ngi nhanda gbɛndɛ ngɔ natiini ma ti gulaa, kɛlɛ ala nhanda banda ɔ wuee ina waa li gulɔɔ ngi nhanda banda na nhu. Kɛlɛ ina wai loi nhu, wua gbɔnhu ɔɔ wu lee leea mba.
45011023	Awa hali lagbitia i, napangaa Yuua i natiini ti bele ngɔ na ɛɛ mbeke beke na mi maa yia gɛi, ina taa gbe ti laanɛɛ gbahambayaa naa, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti bɛɛlaa boma ngulu naa mɛɛ i ti lee leei mba na, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ ku ngɔ aa na bele.
45011024	Wua Kpitia i ngaa wuee wu bele ngɔ ɛɛ mbeke beke na nana ti tee leei oliibi ulu naa nana nuu ai nhiini, awa too maa beke beke na bɛɛ bɛɛa ngulu lagbitia nana ningaa ti nhiini, nana ngemɛɛ aile aa bele. Yuua i ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ maa nhii ngulu indinɛi. Awa ɔɔ gɛa yɔhɔgɔni Ngebɔɛ nja lee ngɔnhu aa mbeke beke na bɛɛ bɛɛndaa boma ngi nda ulu naa mɛɛna Ngebɔ i tee leei mba na.
45011025	Nya ndegea, tɔmbaga gbundu lɔ na nana nya lo ngɔ la wu kɔɔ, gbaa ɔɔ wu bɛndia aa nɛgililaa wu nhu lo na bele ngɔ na nwa. Tihi lihiyaa oo ɔaa Iisilɛlia nhu lɛ, nhaa pɛnhɛɛ Kpitia i ti hiti kpaga na nhu aa paalaa Ngebɔ le.
45011026	Awae Iisilɛlia i bɛɛ tɔɔ belenaa aa ndendengaa. Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Ndendouyaa He Mɔɔ na ɔɔ baa kualaa Saiɔni, awa ɔɔ ngeyaabele nyɔu na guaa bɛɛ Yekɔpi goo na nhu lengaa i ngeya.
45011027	Awa indinɛi nya ilimayaa na nwɛ ngɔɔ kpatɛ loganhu nii tua o nhuna ngaa ti nhanda nyɔu na gua ti eya."
45011028	Kina Yuua i k`ati gbee Kilaisi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ naa, faa nwɛɛe Ngebɔ haaleengaa nwɛ aa tuee wu lɔgɔ fanwa wua Kpitia i ngaa wuee. Kɛlɛ aa Ngebɔ nhu ɔhɛ na lepele, Ngebɔ gɛnwa belaa nwɛ aa tuee ti bembaa i tɔgɔ fanwa.
45011029	Gbaa fembɛ na nana Ngebɔ aa fe ningaaɛ ka ngi nhu ɔhɛ na aa pele ngaa ningaa i, ala nɛɛnwaa ai lobi ti nhanwa.
45011030	Ɛɛ gbo wua Kpitia i ngaa wuee, pɛnhɛɛ naɔ wai nwaa bɛɛi Ngebɔu. Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu woo Ngebɔ nwaaumayaa na hɔlɔa, gbɛnhaile Yuua i ti nwaa bɛɛ gbaha mba ɔ.
45011031	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, Ngebɔ nwaaumayaa na nhanwa wu hɔlɔa, chaanngi nhu Yuua i tai nwaa bɛɛ Ngebɔu, kangaa tua o gbɔnhu ti Ngebɔ nwaaumayaa na hɔlɔ chaanngi.
45011032	Gbaa Ngebɔ oo pelenga ningaa i bɛɛ ti bele ɛɛ kpindi bɛlɛu belaa, gbɛnhaile tai nwaa bɛɛi alau, kangaae i ba maaumayaa lɔgɔɔu ngaa tuee bɛɛ.
45011033	Maa nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa Ngebɔ gbatɛyaa na bombou ngɔ na nwa! Aa tɔmbaga Ngebɔ ngi nhu lo na o ngi gɔɔnjaa na o mbombou ngɔ nja lee ngɔnhu. Nuu ai na nana aa Ngebɔ laalaa na nhu huo fuo. Nuu ai na nana aa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ nanaa Ngebɔ aa pele.
45011034	Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Ele nwɛɛ i Maliki na nɛɛnwaa nhaa gɔɔ? Ele nwɛɛ ku ngɔ aa nɛɛnwaa he alɛɛ?
45011035	Ele nwɛɛ i nhai ɔa ɔ Maliki na eya, kangaa Maliki na i ba poto mbɛɛla maa nwɔɔ na nwa?"
45011036	Gbaa ala nwɛ i gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛi, awa gbɛ o gbɛ na lɔ na aa ala nhu bele, awa alaa na ala nhanwa. Kamaa ala bihɛ nhaa guna bɛɛ! Kangaa i bele.
45012001	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ Ngebɔ nwaaumayaa bombou mbaa na nhanwa i kpau ngɔ mi nwa, aa kɛɛlaa a gbɔha na gɔanna Ngebɔ nwa ɛɛ kɛndɛ chaaga, nana tɛ ngɔ kaka Ngebɔ nhanwa, awa nana aa ala goonhu nɛɛ. Indinɛi tɔmbaga batou na nwɛ pelendaa i wu eya.
45012002	Awɛɛ bele ɛɛ ngelou indinɛi nhu belaa i pele ngɔ na. Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ i nɛɛnwaa nyiɛ ɔaa wu eya, kangaa wu ba ku wu Ngebɔ guunmayaa na gɔɔ, nana kpekpe ngɔ awa aa ala goonhu nɛɛ, awa hiti ɔ nhu.
45012003	Awa aa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa hembɛ na nhanwa nana i ngɔaa nya eya, ngi kɛ aa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ wu liiya aa kɛɛlaa nuu ɛɛ gbɔha na gbau mbombou ngɔ tee ngɔ ala bele ngɔ naa. Kɛlɛ nana maa nhiɛ ɔ baa pele, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa gbɔha na gbauna aa nuu yɔhɔgɔ ndi ɔ aa laanɛɛ na lɔɛ na nana Ngebɔ i ngɔaa bi eya.
45012004	Gbaa pele ngɔ ɛɛ nuu ila na lugu na kpapi na gbinhi ɔ na mba, awa kpapi o kpapi ngi nda enge,
45012005	ngemɛɛ aa muee, hali mi gbinhi ɔ, kɛlɛ ndugu ila mɛɛ aa muee mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Kilaisi o. Awa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ mi liiya kpapi nwɛ aa ala lagbitia i fanwa bɛɛ.
45012006	Awa kina fembɛ hembɛ lɔ mi eya, nana ngaa hɛɛla fɛɛla ngɔ, ndi ɔ aa panda bandayaa na nana Ngebɔ i ngɔaa mi eya, ami engea la aa ngi bele. Ina mi hembɛ na njɛpɛlaa nhaa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ lɔgɔ fanwa, kamaa pele ndi ɔ aa laanɛɛ na belena gɔ na i mi eya.
45012007	Ina ngengelaa nhaa nwɛɛ, ami engea la. Ina ningaa nagɔlindaa nhaa nwɛɛ, ami ti nagɔlia.
45012008	Ina njɛpɛlaa nwɛ ningaa le kangaa ti lii gbɛndɛ, ami pelena. Ina maa gbɔnaa ningaaa aa nhai hendaa tuɛɛ, ami fea tuɛɛ kpinhi ɔ. Ina pelendaa nwɛ aa ngu mɔɔ, ami siaa aa tuee maa nhiɛ ɔ. Ina maaumayaa lɔgɔɔundaa nhaa nwɛɛ, ami pelena aa koonhu nɛɛ.
45012009	Wu lomayaa na ɛɛ bele ɛɛ manɔnɔ ndomayaa. A loloa aa nana nyɔu ɔ. A nana houa kpekpe ngɔ na aa loko hee ngɔ.
45012010	Ndomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu ɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa, awa mbɛɛ hendaa ɔi i gɛa wu loganhu.
45012011	Awɛɛ bɛɛla bou nwa aa wu ɔi na nana i wuaa ngengelaa nhanwa Maliki naɛ, kɛlɛ ngɔi nhu gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ ngi gɛa wuaa wu luu na nhu, ngengelaa nhanwa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ Maliki na nhanwa.
45012012	A goonhu nɛɛa wu nɛɛnwaa la na nhu, awa wu lii lo wu gbɔu gbɔu na nhu wu nhu. Awa wu laaminɛ bele ngaa nwaa gɔla.
45012013	A gbɔna Ngebɔ ndaa i mba aa nana ɔandaa nhanwa ti eya ai ti eya, awa hotangaa binjandaa i wu lugu gɔɔna.
45012014	A nduba hɛia Ngebɔ nwa natiini fanwa taa wu aa sɛɛgɛ. Awɛɛ mɔɔli ti laangaandaa nhanwae kɛlɛ a mɔɔlina kangaa i ti luba.
45012015	A goonhu nɛɛa wui natiini ngoo taa goonhu nɛɛ, awa wu ɔɔ wui natiini ngoo taa ɔɔ.
45012016	Ngoo ila ngi gɛa wu loganhu. Awɛɛ aunwaa lɛ, kɛlɛ a gɛa maayeiyaa nhanda nhu. Awɛɛ gbɔha na gbau ngaa nhu lo mbelaa waa.
45012017	Awɛɛ nhanda nyɔu aa bɛɛla nuu o nuu nwa. Kɛlɛ a lapia kangaa wu nhanda bele nana nuu o nuu aa kpau ngaa nhanda gbekpe.
45012018	Ina waa to ngɔ hɔlɔ, kina gbo tɔ wuɛɛ ndo ɔ mba aa wuee, a gɛa maa lɛi nhu wui ningaa i ngoo bɛɛ.
45012019	Wua nya lomayaa belaa i ngaa wuee, awɛɛ nhanda nyɔu aa bɛɛla nuu o nuu nwa, kɛlɛ a lii lona Ngebɔ gbaai na i pele wuɛɛ. Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Nyɛɛ ngɔɔ wu lo pele, nyɛɛ ngɔɔ nhu yɔgɔ. Ngemɛɛ Maliki na i kɛi."
45012020	Kɛlɛ nana maa nhiɛ ɔ wu nhanwa waa pele ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Ina ndɔɛ lɔ bi faalee naa, ndaa gɔa. Ina mbolo nhu be ngɔ, nhai ɔaa ngeya i kpɔɛ. Gbaa aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, bɔɔ ngufe ndoa la ala nwa."
45012021	Awɛɛ fɛɛlɛ he nhanda naɛ nana nyɔu ɔ kangaa i ku wu nwa, kɛlɛ wua a kuna ma aa nhanda gbekpe pelendaa.
45013001	Nuu o nuu i nwaa bɛɛa natiini mbu fɔha na i tuaa. Gbaa fɔha ai na nana aa gɛ ningaa nwanhu aa kɛɛlaa ai segei Ngebɔ le. Awa natiini fɔha na i tuaa haai Ngebɔ nwɛ i maa lomaa na ɔa ɔai ti eya.
45013002	Faa nwɛɛe nuu na nana ai nwaa bɛɛi nuu nau nana fɔha na i mba ala nwanhu, maa nwɔɔ na ai nwaa bɛɛi nanau Ngebɔ i kɛi. Awa natiini taa pele gɛnhi tɔɔ baa aa kɔhɔ gbɔha nwa.
45013003	Gbaa natiini taa nhanda gbekpe pele, ti lualaa ai na manhangaa i mba, kɛlɛ natiini taa ngeyaabele nyɔu bele tua nwɛ ti lualaa i na manhangaa i mba. Ee wu lo ngɔ la kangaa ndua ɛɛ gɛ wu nhu fɔha belaa i fanwa taa gɛ wu nwanhu? A nana belena kpekpe ngɔ na, awa tɔɔ goonhu nɛɛa wu nwa,
45013004	gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ eyaalakpandou nwɛ nana aa enge wu nda gbekpenjaa nhanwa. Kɛlɛ ina waa ngi nyɔu bele, a luaa alaa, gbɛnhaile ngi fɔha na wu gbɔɔnindaa nhanwa fɔha gbekpe mɛɛ. Ngebɔ eyaalakpandou nwɛ aa ala. Awa Ngebɔ gbɔɔni na nwɛ aa pele ngaa natiini taa ngi nyɔu na bele.
45013005	Faa nwɛɛe kawaa nwaa bɛɛ tiu, awa awɛɛ nwaa bɛɛ gbo gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ ɔɔ gbaaia wu nwa, kɛlɛ a nwaa bɛɛa tiu gbɛnhaile wu kɔɔnaa wu nɛɛnwaa na nhu aa kɛɛlaa tee ngɔ aa pelendaa.
45013006	Saabu ila na siina nhanwa, faa nwɛɛ waa luti bɛɛ, gbɛnhaile fɔha belaa i ti wu nwanhu Ngebɔ eyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa tuee, nhuna taa nana bele ti hiti ɔ nhu pelendaa nhanwa.
45013007	Tua bɛɛ a nana ɔaa ti eya ti hiti ɔ nhu ti hɔlɔ. A luti na guaa nuu na le ala hiti ɔ nhu waa kua ngee. Wu kula gula na bele natiini fanwa ti hiti ɔ nhu aa hɔlɔndaa. A luaa natiini mba bɛɛ ti wu nwanhu, awa wu mbɛɛ gɛ tuaa.
45013008	Kue ɛɛ gɛ wuaa ningaa le, kɛlɛ kue na nana gbo aa gɛ wuaa ala nwɛ aa ndomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu. Gbaa nuu na nana aa lo ngaa ngi ndege nuu gbɔha na, maa nwɔɔ na siina oo nana laa fenga Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la.
45013009	Gbaa sɔ sɔ na nana i gɛi, "Awɛɛ ndo sia. Awɛɛ nuu baa nhanda gbaai mba nhanwa. Awɛɛ nwɔa bele. Awɛɛ nana heelaa aa gɛ ningaa lagbitia eya," maa gee indinɛi bɛɛ ka ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ lagbiti nana aa gɛ na, alaa sɔ ngila ngindinɛi goonhu nana i gɛi, "Lona aa bi ndege nuu gbɔha na ɛɛ bi lo ngɔ na aa bi gbɔha na."
45013010	Gbaa ina baa lo ngaa nuu na, baigɔ nhanda aa haa aa ala. Faa nwɛɛe ndomayaa alɛɛ aa nana laa fe Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la.
45013011	Indinɛi nhu bɛɛ, wu lɔgɔ indinɛi gɔɔnaa. Lɔgɔ nwɛɛ wu nhanwa waa u njii na nhu, gbɛnhaile lɔgɔ na nana mɔɔ ndendouyaa hɔlɔ, oo gbɛɛa mi gbɛlaa chaanngi nhu tee ngɔ lɔgɔ naa nhuna mi nhumbuiɔ aa laanɛɛ.
45013012	Kpindi na leendaa nwɛ ndaalo, awa ngee ondaa nwɛ. Faa nwɛɛe ami kpindi nhiɛ na eyaabele na laa kaka, awa ami waun na gɔɔ nhaanhaa i pua nwa.
45013013	Ami gɛa na aa tee pele ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti foo na waun na nhu, kɛlɛ amɛɛ gɛ na ɛɛ ningaa natiini taa gɛ ndɔɔ hounjaa gɛbɛlɛ nhu o bɛɛ, ndo siandaa o, ndandaa ngɔi nyɔu nyɔu bou nwa o, awa ka kɛɛlaa mbaabaga nhu o inaile tolo.
45013014	Kɛlɛ Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi bua nwa ɛɛ kɔɔ nhaanhaa, awa bɛɛ ndaalaa aa nhanda nyɔu belendaa nana kpala ngi bi lii naa ndii lɛindaa nhanwa.
45014001	Chaanngi nhu a kuunna nuu na nwa nana ala yaaiyaai ɔ na ngi laanɛɛ na nhu, kɛlɛ awɛɛ nana gɔhɔ aa nɛgili aa pelendaa.
45014002	Laanɛɛ aa gɛa ngila mɔɔ eya nana aa fɛɛlɛ he alɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ nwɛndaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ nuu na nana njaaiyaai ɔ na ngi laanɛɛ na nhu, ala ai ndaahaa nwɛnhɛi nwɛ hali.
45014003	Nuu na nana aa gbɛ o gbɛ na nwɛ ɛɛ au bii nuu na nwanhu nana ai gbɛ o gbɛ na nwɛ ma. Awa nuu na nana ai ndaahaa nwɛnhɛi nwɛ, ɛɛ nuu na gɔhɔ nana aa gbɛ o gbɛ na nwɛ, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo kuunnga ala nwa.
45014004	Eleni mɛ aa wuee waa ningaa ti eyaalakpandou gɔhɔ? Ala Nwanhu nwɔɔ na nwɛ aa kɛ ina ku ngɔ inaile ala gbaha ɔ. Awa ɔɔ kunaa, gbɛnhaile Maliki na ku ngɔ aa pele maa nwɔɔ na i ku.
45014005	Ngila mɔɔ aa nɛgilia aa kɛɛlaa foo lagbiti na kolo ɔ lee ngɔ foo lagbitia. Nuu lagbiti pa aa nɛgilia aa kɛɛlaa foo na bɛɛ nhanda ila mɛɛ. Nuu o nuu i hagba laa nɛɛnwaa na nhu nana nhanwa ala laanɛɛ ɔ la.
45014006	Nuu na bɛɛ nana aa nɛgili foo lagbiti nwa aa foo bombou mbaa, i pele Maliki na bɛɛyaa na nhu. Nuu na bɛɛ nana aa gbɛ o gbɛ nwɛ, i mɛ Maliki na bɛɛyaa na nhu, gbɛnhaile aa fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa mɛnhɛi na nhanwa. Awa nuu na bɛɛ nana aa lele aa nhaanhaa lɛingaa nwɛndaa, i pele Maliki na bɛɛyaa na nhu. Awa i fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa.
45014007	Gbaa mi ila kee ai na nana i na gbɔha nhanwa, awa mi ila kee ai na nana aa haa gbɔha nhanwa.
45014008	Gbaa nhuna ndɛɛhu na aa gɛ mi nhu, Maliki na nhaa nwɛɛ mi na, inaile ina maa haa, Maliki na nhaa nwɛɛ maa haa. Faa nwɛɛe ndɛɛhu i gɛ mi nhu, inaile mi gɛ haai, Maliki na ndaa nwɛ aa muee.
45014009	Gbaa ka Kilaisi i haaa awa kɛɛ huua haa na nhu kangaa i bele ngaa Maliki na kɛndɛ belaa i fanwa ka haa belaa i.
45014010	Kɛlɛ gbɔɔ wu lɛingaa i waa wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i kɔhɔ? Awa gbɔɔ wu lagbitia i waa au bii wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i manhu? Gbaa mua bɛɛ mɔɔ lonaa Maliki na gulɔɔ kangaa i mi gɔhɔ.
45014011	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Maliki na ɛgɛ, 'Ɛɛ ngi kɔɔ ngɔ na aa kɛɛlaa nya nwɛ kɛndɛ Eebɔ na aa nge, ngombi o ngombi ɔɔ hitɛa nya gulɔɔ, awa nuu o nuu ɔɔ kɛa aa kɛɛlaa nya nwɛ Ngebɔ aa nge.' "
45014012	Awae mua bɛɛ nuu o nuu ɔɔ nwaa gɔan kulaa Ngebɔ le.
45014013	Faa nwɛɛe gbɔha gɔhɔndaa ɛhaa gɛ mi loganhu gbɔnhu kpɔ. Kɛlɛ a nɛɛnwaa siaa indinɛi nwa aa kɛɛlaa, awɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ bele nana aa pele wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aa lugba inaile aa pele aa gula nhanda nyɔu nhu.
45014014	Nya hounwayaa na ngi nhu nii Yisɔsi o, alaa pele ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa mɛnhɛi ai na nana ai chanhaini ala gbɔha nhu. Kɛlɛ ina nuu aa laanɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa mɛnhɛi lɛingaa maa ai nhiɛi aa mɛndaa, nhu nwɛɛ aa bele ngaa mɛnhɛi nana ai chanhaini ala nhanwa.
45014015	Ina waa nɔa kɛndaa nhu aa kɛɛlaa mɛnhɛi lɛingaa hiti ɔ nhu aa mɛndaa, awa indinɛi i pele bi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na i gula, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa wai sia nwa aa ndomayaa bele. Awɛɛ pele wu nwɛnhɛi na nana waa mɛ i nuu nyaai nana Kilaisi i haai fanwa!
45014016	Faa nwɛɛe nana wu kpau ngɔ aa nhanda gbekpe, awɛɛ pele ningaa taa njia nyɔu gɛ fanwa.
45014017	Gbaa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na ngu ngai loni nanaa ningaa taa mɛ o ka nana taa kpɔɛ kɛlɛ teenjaa nwɛ o, maa lɛi o, awa ka koonhu nɛɛ nana Ngebɔ Yina na aa fe.
45014018	Awa nhuna nuu aa enge Kilaisiɛ aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, Ngebɔ ɔɔ goonhu nɛɛa ala nwa awa ningaa tɔɔ kuunnaa ala nwa nana nhanwa i pelenga.
45014019	Awae aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ kamaa nhaanhaa i natiini ngɔi taa ba aa maa lɛi, awa ka nana aa pele laanɛɛ belaa lagbitia ti nhu gbɛndɛ ti laanɛɛ na nhu.
45014020	Mɛnhɛi lɔgɔ fanwa, awɛɛ nana nyaai Ngebɔ i pelenga. Tɔmbaga nwɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa mɛnhɛi o mɛnhɛi taa mɛa, kɛlɛ ngaa haa ɔ nuu nhanwa aa mɛnhɛi o mɛnhɛi nwɛndaa nana aa pele nuu lagbitia i gula nhanda nyɔu nhu.
45014021	Nana maa nhiɛ ɔ pelendaa nhanwa ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, a gbena aa ndaahaa nwɛnhɛi nwɛndaa o, ka ndɔɔ gbɔɛndaa, inaile ɔ gbena aa gbɛ o gbɛ belendaa nana ɔɔ pele wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ i gula nhanda nyɔu nhu.
45014022	Bi laanɛɛ na nana i bi eya maa nhanda indinɛi nhanwa i gɛa wu loganhu wui Ngebɔ o. Koonhu nɛɛ lɔ nuu na nwa nana ai gbɔha gɔhɔni awa i gbɔha lɛɛ nhuna aa nhanda bele nana aa kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa tee ngɔ aa pelendaa!
45014023	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa gɛ nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ nhu nana nhanwa aa mɛ, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala gɔhɔnaa nhuna aa maa nhai na nwɛ, gbɛnhaile ala eyaabele na ai segei laanɛɛ le. Awa nhai o nhai nana ai segei laanɛɛ le nhanda nyɔu nwɛ.
45015001	Chaanngi nhu mua na mi nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ na mi laanɛɛ na nhu, kamaa gbɔ natiini mba ti yaaiyaai ɔ na ti laanɛɛ na nhu, kɛlɛ mi gbɔha goonhu nɛɛndaa aile gbo maa gɛ nhu.
45015002	Kɛlɛ nana maa nhiɛ ɔ mi nhanwa aa pelendaa ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, ngila mɔɔ o ngila mɔɔ mi liiya, kaa ngi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na goonhu nɛɛ ngi gbekpenjaa nhanwa, kangaa i gbɛa ngi laanɛɛ na nhu.
45015003	Gbaa hali Kilaisi ai gbɔha goonhu nɛɛi. Kɛlɛ ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Ngɛi na nana ningaa ti piini aa wuee, nya nwɛ maa ɛi na i baa nya nwa."
45015004	Gbaa nana bɛɛ ti kpaaliaɔ Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu yamana na nhu nana i leengaɔ, ti kpaaliia mi nagɔlindaa nhanwa, kangaae mi nɛɛnwaa la hɔlɔ aa ndii lo na nhu bele ka ndii gbɛndɛ na nana Ngebɔ Gbaali na aa fe muɛɛ.
45015005	Awa kangaa Ngebɔ, nana aa ndii lo fe ningaaɛ ka ndii gbɛndɛ, i pele kangaa wua bɛɛ wu ku wu gɛ ngoo ila nhu, aa hitɛlaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi guague na bou nwa,
45015006	aa kɛɛlaa wua bɛɛ, aa oo ilana ngilamaa, kangaa wu Ngebɔ na mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi Kɛɛgɛ na bihɛ.
45015007	Faa nwɛɛe gbɔha binjandaa i gɛa wu loganhu, ɛɛ gbo Kilaisi i wu binjanga, kangaa ningaa i ti ba Ngebɔ bihɛ.
45015008	Gbaa ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi i belenia aa ngeyaalakpandou Yuua i ngee, kangaa i ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ nana belenaa i gɛi ɔɔ pele, pelendaa nhanwa kangaa nana Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei mi bembaa i mbɛ i bele,
45015009	awa kangaae Kpitia i gbɔnhu ti ba Ngebɔ bihɛ, gbɛnhaile aa maaumayaa lɔgɔɔunaa aa ningaa. Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Awae ngɔɔ bi bihɛa Kpitia i ndiiya. Ngɔɔ bi bihɛ bihɛ ue aainaa aa bi laa na."
45015010	Awa kɛɛ gɛa gbɔnhu, "Kpitia i, a goonhu nɛɛa wui Ngebɔ ndaa i ngoo!"
45015011	Awa kɛɛ gɛa gbɔnhu, "Wua bɛɛ Kpitia i ngaa wuee a Ngebɔ bihɛa, awa ningaa i bɛɛ ti ala bihɛa!"
45015012	Awa ka Aiseya i gɛa gbɔnhu, " Yɛsi goo na nhu lou ɔɔ baa. Ɔɔ baa i gɛ Kpitia i manhu, awa tɔɔ ti nɛɛnwaa la na bua ala nhu."
45015013	Kangaa Ngebɔ nana aa nɛɛnwaa la he i wu laa fe ngaa koonhu nɛɛ o ka maa lɛi aa laanɛɛ na nhu bele ala nhu, kangaa wu nɛɛnwaa la na i ba to nda aa kpɛalaa aa Ngebɔ Yina na fɔha na.
45015014	Nya ndegea, nya gbɔha na kpei nya lii lɛi ɔ wu nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa wu laa fe ngɔ aa kpekpenjaa, awa kɔɔnjaa lɔ wu laa fe ngɔ, awa wu ku ngɔ aa gbɔha nagɔlindaa loganhu.
45015015	Kɛlɛ ngoo ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaalia wuee aa ndii gbɛndɛ ngu to ngɔ nhanda lɛingaaa, kangaa ngi kili hitɛ wuɛɛ. Nya lii gbɛndɛ ngɔ panda bandayaa na nhanwa nana Ngebɔ i ngɔai nya eya,
45015016	pelendaa nhanwa aa ngeyaalakpandou Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhanwa mɛɛ Kpitia i ngee. K`angi enge ɛɛ chaaga gua mɔɔ Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛndaa nhu kualaa Ngebɔ le, kangaae Kpitia i ti ba bele ɛɛ chaaga nana Ngebɔ aa kuun ma, awa Ngebɔ Yina na i ti bele ngaa tɔɔgɔɔ mbelaa Ngebɔ gulɔɔ.
45015017	Faa nwɛɛe hounwayaa nhu aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi, ngoo gua saabu saabu nwa yonga leendaa nhanwa nhanda nhanda nhu nana ngu to ngɔ Ngebɔa.
45015018	Ngɔɔ lii gbɛndɛnaa aa njɛpɛlaa ngu to ngɔ nanaa Kilaisi i pelenga aa nya nhu bele, kangaa Kpitia i ti nwaa bɛɛ Ngebɔu. Oo indinɛi belenga aa ngoo nhu bele ka ngeyaabele,
45015019	aa kuague nhanda fɔha o, ka kaila nhanda, awa ka Ngebɔ Yina na fɔha na. Awae ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa ngoo kɛɛ gɛɛa aa ningaa i hiti ɔ nhu kualaa Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu nhaa ndi ɔ mɛɛ Ililikɔmu bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu bɛɛ.
45015020	Nana to ngɔɔ nya lii nwa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, ala nwɛ aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa Kilaisi nhanwa aa ningaa i nhinde na mɛɛna tai lɛ Kilaisi laa nwɛini naɔ, kangaa ngai ba ngenge lo nda nana nuu lagbiti i tɔɔlongaɔ.
45015021	Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Natiini tai lɛ ala nwaanhaa nwɛiniɔ, tɔɔ naa lɔa, awa natiini tai lɛ mɛiniɔ tɔɔ nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔa."
45015022	Awae saabu indinɛi nhanwa, nhanda nhanda oo nya bɛndia aa paalaa wuee naa gbinhi ɔ.
45015023	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu tɔ ngi bilanga aa nya enge na belendaa pɔlɔgɔɔ bɔlɔgɔɔ indinɛi nhu, awa kina oo kpaunga aa fogo gbinhi gbinhi kpala ngaa nya hou ɔ kangaa ngi ba wuee,
45015024	gbee na bɛɛ ngaa li Sipeeni, nya laanɛɛ ɔ ngɔɔ wu lɔa nhuna ngaa gɛ aa teendaa, kangaa wu gbɔ nyaa ndiilaa na nhanwa, nhuna ngaa gɛ hitima na aa nɛɛ ɔ gɔɔ ngɔ tii wua o lɔgɔ lɛingaa nhanwa.
45015025	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu, i gee beleni aa pele o pele, ngoo ya Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu aa kpɔ mba Ngebɔ ndaa i ngee.
45015026	Gbaa laanɛɛ belaa i ti Masilonia ka Akeea kati kuunnga aa kula gula lɛingaa belendaa, kpɔndaa la nhanwa mbaa mbelaa i mba ti Ngebɔ ndaa i ndiiya mɛɛ Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu.
45015027	Ti goonhu nɛɛia aa pelendaa. Kɛlɛ aa tɔmbaga, kataa pele tuɛɛ. Gbaa ina Yuua i too laanɛɛ Gbitia i kɔa aa nduba na nana Ngebɔ Yina i ngɔai ti eya, awae laanɛɛ Gbitia i pa kataa gbɔ Yuua i mba gbɔnhu aa nhaanhaa i natiini taa ti hɔlɔ kualaa Ngebɔ le ti lugu na nhanwa.
45015028	Awa faa nwɛɛe nhuna ngaa bila ngaa ngenge indinɛi, awa ngi gɛ nana gɔan ngɔ ti nwa ningaa ti tɛɛ lɛɛi mba ti nhanwa, ngɔɔ lia aa wuee pele nhuna ngaa gɛ aa ndiilaa Sipeeni bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
45015029	Awa ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhuna ngaa ba wuee, ngɔɔ baa Kilaisi luba na i nya laa fe ngɔ nana ngɔɔ wu gɔ.
45015030	Chaanngi nhu, nya ndegea, ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ ngaa mi Nwaliki na laa na Yisɔsi Kilaisi, ka aa Yina na lomayaa na, kangaa wu gula nyaa nya sɔbɛ na nhu ngaa hou, aa laaminɛlaa Ngebɔ le nya nhanwa,
45015031	kangaa i nya bele ngaa ndendou kualaa laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa i ngeya ti Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, awa kangaa nya enge na Yɛlusalɛmu goonhu, Ngebɔ ndaa i ti kuun ma na,
45015032	kangaa ngi ba ba wuee nya laa fe ngɔ aa koonhu nɛɛ aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na, kangaa nya hitima na wuee i pele ngi nya goonhu nɛɛ aa nyiɛ awa ngi lɛɛhu.
45015033	Kangaa Ngebɔ na nana aa maa lɛi he i gɛ na tii wua o bɛɛ. Kangaa i bele.
45016001	Ngi Fiibi laa banda gɛ aa wuee, nana mi ndege nyɛɛlou na aa ala, napangaa mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na aa ala, nana ngeyaanyɔugbɛa na aa ala laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa ti mɛɛ Kɛnichilia.
45016002	A ala binjana aa Maliki na laa na, ɛɛ Ngebɔ ndaa i kataa pele, awa wu kpɔ mba o kpɔ mba ɔa ala eya nana kpala ngaa gɛ alaa wu eya. Gbaa ala gbɔha na oo belengaɔ aa kɛnwa nwɔɔ gbekpe ningaa gbinhi gbinhia nhanwa awa nhaa gbɔnhu nya nhanwa.
45016003	Ngi fama leeni Pilisilaɛ o ka Akuila, nya ndege enge belaa i ngaa tuee Yisɔsi Kilaisi enge na nhu
45016004	natiini ti gɛi tɔɔ haa nya nhanwa. Awa nya aile gbo ngaa fiɛ gua ti nwae kɛlɛ laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ natiini kpitia i ngaa tuee k`ati fiɛ gua gbɔnhu ti nwa.
45016005	Ngi fama leeni boma laanɛɛ belaa i mbɛ natiini taa gɔɛ batou ngaa lɔgɔ na nwa mɛɛ ti bɛlɛ nau. Ngi fama leeni boma Ɛpanetɔsiɛ nana nya lo ngɔ na la, nana pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na aa ala Eesia bɔlɔgɔɔ na gaka nwaa na nana i laanɛɛi aa Kilaisi.
45016006	Ngi fama leeni Meeliɛ nana i engea nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ wu nhanwa.
45016007	Ngi fama leeni boma Andulonikɔsiɛ ka Yuniasi, nya ndege Yuua i ngaa tuee, nee kpindi bɛlɛ nau ngilamaa. To mbelaa i ti ti gɔɔnaa kpɔ, awa tua pɛnhɛɛ ti beleni aa laanɛɛ belaa nyaa.
45016008	Ngi fama leeni Amupiliatɔsiɛ, nana nya lo ngɔ na la ni hounwayaa na nhu Maliki na nhu.
45016009	Ngi fama leeni boma Ɔibanɔsiɛ, nana mi ndege enge nwɔɔ na aa ala Kilaisi enge na nhu, awa ngi hai boma Sitaakisiɛ nana nya lo ngɔ na la.
45016010	Ngi fama leeni boma Apɛlisiɛ nana i ndɔgɔɔunga chanhai aa kɛɛlaa ala laanɛɛ ɔ aa Kilaisi hiti ɔ nhu. Ngi fama leeni boma Alisitobulɔsi bongaa i mbɛ.
45016011	Ngi fama leeni Hɛloliɔniɛ. Ala Yuua ilangaa i mɛ aa nuee. Awa ngi hai boma mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i ma natiini ti Naasisɔsi bongaa i nhu.
45016012	Ngi fama leeni Tilifenaɛ o ka Tilifosa, taa Maliki na enge na bele. Awa ngi hai boma Pasisi nwa nana nya lo ngɔ na la, nana i ngenge gbinhi gbinhi belenga Maliki na nhanwa.
45016013	Ngi fama leeni Lufusiɛ, ngenge nwɔɔ waa na aa ala Maliki na enge na nhu. Awa ngi hai boma ngi nje na nwa, nana aa gbele o gbele, kɛɛ nya hou ɛɛ ngi nhiindou.
45016014	Ngi fama leeni Asinikilitɔsiɛ o, Filɛgɔniɛ o, Hamisiɛ o, Patilobasiɛ o, Hamasiɛ, o ka ti ndege laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ ti na tii tua o.
45016015	Ngi fama leeni Filologɔsiɛ ka Yulia, ka Nɛlusi o ngi ndege nyɛɛlou na o, ka Olimbɔsii, awa ka Ngebɔ ndaa i bɛɛ ti na tii tua o.
45016016	Fama hama nwaa nhii nhiɛ i gɛa na wu loganhu. Laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ aa Kilaisi ti fama leeni wuɛɛ.
45016017	Chaanngi, nya ndegea. ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ. A sogia natiini mba taa pele ndoganhu gɔɛ gɔɛ aa ɔa wu liiya, awa taa ningaa i ti laanɛɛ na yogobee, awa tai kuun ngɔ nagɔli na nwa nana wu hɔlɔa. Tua na siina, a loganhu gɔɛa aa tuee!
45016018	Gbaa ningaa i natiini bonda taa nhanda indinɛi bonda bele, tai ngenge nwa mi Nwaliki naɛ Kilaisi, kɛlɛ ti nda ɔi na nwɛ ti pou. K`ati ningaa nwɔu mɔu ngaa ndaa yia nwaa nhii nhiɛ o ka mbihɛ bihɛ yia waa waa. Ningaa i natiini ti leo ɔ nhanda nhu tua nwɛ taa ti nwɔu mɔu.
45016019	Gbaa wu nwaa bɛɛlaa na ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ nau Kilaisi nhanwa nuu o nuu lɔ maanhaa nwɛi ngɔ, awa saabu indinɛi siina nhanwa, nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ wu nhanwa. Ngɔi lɔ nyaa kangaa wu nhu lo nana belendaa nhu kpekpe ngɔ, kɛlɛ awɛɛ loko bu nana belendaa nhu nyɔu ɔ.
45016020	Awa lɔgɔ ɔɔ baa nhuna Ngebɔ nana aa maa lɛi he ɔɔ Setani chugbu wu ɔgɔsambala nau. Kangaa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi banda bandayaa na i gɛ na tii wua o.
45016021	Nya ndege enge nwɔɔ na Timootii i fama leeni wuɛɛ. Awa nhaa gbɔnhu Lusiɔsi o, Yesɔni o, ka Sosipata, nya ndege Yuua i ngaa tuee, ti fama leeni wuɛɛ.
45016022	Nya Taatiɔsi aa nge, ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali Pɔɔluɛ wu nwanhu, ngi fama leeni wuɛɛ ɛɛ laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aa Kilaisi.
45016023	Geiɔsi, nana ngi yigiyaa ngɔ ngi bɛlɛ nau, i fama leeni wuɛɛ, napangaa Geiɔsi nana laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ taa gɔɛ ngi bɛlɛ nau batou fanwa. Ilasitɔsi, nana aa taa waa na nahoo na nwanhu gbee i fama leeni wuɛɛ. Awa ka mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na Kuatɔsi i hai wu nwa.
45016024	(( Kangaa mi Nwaliki na banda bandayaa na i gɛ na tii wua o.))
45016025	Ami Ngebɔ bihɛa! Ala ku ngɔ aa pele wu lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kpou wu laanɛɛ na nhu, ndi ɔ aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na lepele nana ngaa kɛ Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhanwa, awa ndi ɔ na aa gbundu lɔmbaga na lɔgɔɔundaa nana i ndɔɔgu nhuɔ fogo nhu gɔha gɔha nhanwa nana i leengaɔ.
45016026	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu maa lɔmbaga na too kuaa kpou aa kpaali na nhu bele nana Ngebɔ letua i ti kpaalii. Awa nde na bɛɛ oo kɔɔnga aa kɛndaa na nhu bele wɔwɔwɔ Ngebɔ na i kɛi la, kangaa tua bɛɛ ti ba laanɛɛ awa ti nwaa bɛɛ.
45016027	Kangaa mbihɛ i gɛ Ngebɔ nwa nana ala ila ngɔ na nwɛ gbo nhu lo ngɔ, aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele nhaa guna bɛɛ! Kangaa i bele.
46001001	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, Ngebɔ i uini nyaa aa ngi guunmayaa na kangaa ngi bele ngaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi lo mɔɔ, nya o mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na o Sɔsitɛnisi,
46001002	nua nwɛ naa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee wua wu laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Ngebɔ wu mɛɛ Kɔlindi, tii natiini ngoo tɔ bɛɛ Ngebɔ i ti belenga aa tɔɔgɔɔ mbelaa ala gbɔha nhanwa mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, maa gbɔ ngɔ na tɔ aa ningaa i bɛɛ ti mii o mii taa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi batou, nana ti Nwaliki na aa ala awa mua gbɔnhu mi Nwaliki na nwɛ.
46001003	Kangaa mi Kɛɛgɛ na Ngebɔ ka Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti wu gɔ aa pandaa bandayaa o ka maa lɛi.
46001004	Aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ k`angi fiɛ gua nya Eebɔ na nwa wu nhanwa, panda bandayaa na nhanwa nana i ngɔaa wu eya aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele.
46001005	Gbaa wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Kilaisi o, woo gbatɛa nhanda o nhanda nhu, maa gbɔ ngɔ na tɔ aa njɛpɛ o ka nɛɛnwaa nhu lee.
46001006	Awa ngoo na Kilaisi nhanwa oo hape bua tɔ wu nhu.
46001007	Awae yina hembɛ ai na nana wu baa ngɔ la, nhuna waa gɛ aa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi baalaa na nwaa golondaa.
46001008	Ɔɔ wu nhu gbɛndɛnaa nhaa kpelenwaa na i hiti, kangaa tɛi ngaigɔ gɛ wuaa aa Foo na mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ɔɔ ba ningaa i kɔhɔ ma.
46001009	Ngebɔ nana i uini wuaa kangaa wu gɛ hounwayaa nhu wui ngi Lou na o Yisɔsi Kilaisi, mi Nwaliki na aa ala, Ngebɔ na siina ala hiti ɔ nhu laanɛɛlaa nhanwa aa ala.
46001010	Ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa, ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ ngaa mi Nwaliki na laa na Yisɔsi Kilaisi, aa kɛɛlaa wua bɛɛ a gɛa ngoo ila nhu, awa awɛɛ aa gɔɛ gɔɛ, kɛlɛ aa gɛa hounwayaa hiti hiti nhu aa nɛɛnwaa ila ngoo ka nhanda ila fanwa.
46001011	Gbaa, ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa, ningaa lɛingaa kualaa Kuloni ti le na nhu too chaagbe laannga nya nwa ngu to ngɔ wuaa aa kɛɛlaa k`awu baabaga na wu gbɔha na loganhu.
46001012	Nana ngaa maa yia gɛ ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ wu liiya kɛɛ gɛ, "Nya Pɔɔlu nda nwɛ aa nge," Na oo gɛ, "Nya Apɔlɔsi nda nwɛ aa nge." Awa na oo gɛ, "Nya Kilaisi nda nwɛ aa nge. "
46001013	Ee Kilaisi ngaa gɔɛ gɔɛ nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala? Ee Pɔɔlu nwɛɛɔ ti ala baai kpekpa ngulu naa wu nhanwa? Inaile ee ti Ngebɔ ua belenia aa wuee aa Pɔɔlu laa na?
46001014	Ngi fiɛ guai Ngebɔ nwa aa kɛɛlaa ngai Ngebɔ ua beleni bɛnhɛ aa nuu o nuu kualaa wu liiya, ningaa i gbo ngi Ngebɔ ua beleni aa tuee k`a Kilisipɔsi o ka Geiɔsi,
46001015	kangaa nuu ai ba kɛ aa kɛɛlaa ti Ngebɔ ua belenia aa wuee aa nya laa na.
46001016	Kangi Ngebɔ ua belenga boma aa Sitiifɛnasi o ngi bongaa i ngoo. Na i leeni nga, ngai laanɛɛi kangi Ngebɔ ua belenga gbɔnhu aa nuu lagbiti.
46001017	Gbaa Kilaisi ai nya loni Ngebɔ ua bele ma aa ningaa, kɛlɛ i nya lonia kangaa ngi ba, awa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa ngi kɛɛ gɛɛ. Inaile ai nya loni kangaa ngi pele ngaa nuu gbɔha nhu lo, kangaa haa na nana Kilaisi i peleni kpekpa ngulu naa aigɔ ngi fɔha na lo nhu.
46001018	Gbaa ngoo na Kilaisi haa na nhanwa i peleni kpekpa ngulu naa mɔu mɔu njia nwɛ natiini fanwa ti u ndo ɔ na nhu, kɛlɛ mua na mi ndendouyaa hɔlɔa, mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ fɔha nwɛ.
46001019	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Ngɔɔ nhu lo mbelaa i ti nhu lo na nyaaia, awa ngɔɔ nɛɛnwaa nhu lee mbelaa i ti nɛɛnwaa nhu lee na lɛa kaka."
46001020	K`a mii nwɛ tɔ nhu lo mɔɔ na i na? Ɛɛ Sɔ mɔɔ wa na mii nwɛ i na? Awa ɛɛ ngaani gɔhɔ mbelaa i ngelou indinɛi nhu nhanwa mii nwɛ ti na? I gee na, ee Ngebɔ ai ndɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa ngelou indinɛi nhu nhu lo na mɔu mɔu mɛɛ?
46001021	Gbaa kina ndi ɔ na aa Ngebɔ nhu lo na lepele, ngelou nhu belaa i tai kuni taa Ngebɔ gɔɔ ngaa ti nda nhu lo na. Kɛlɛ nana i beleni ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, kualaa ngoo na nhu ningaa taa ui mba aa "Mɔu mɔu ngoo" nana naa kɛɛ gɛɛ aa ningaa i, naa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ i ndaalaai aa ndendouyaa hendaa na natiini mbɛ taa laanɛɛ.
46001022	Yuua i ti lo ngɔ na ti kamaa nhanda guague tɔ, awa Gilikia i tɔ taa nhu lo ngɔɛ ɔɛ.
46001023	Kɛlɛ nua ni nhanwa, nua naa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ Kilaisi nhanwa nana ti paai kpekpa ngulu naa, awa ngoo nwɛɛ nana Yuua i ti kpau ngɔ aa fagɔli ngoo ti nhanwa, awa Kpitia i tɔ kpau ngɔ aa mɔu mɔu ngoo.
46001024	Kɛlɛ Yuua i ngoo Gilikia i ngoo napangaa natiini Ngebɔ i uinga tuaa kualaa ti liiya, ngoo indinɛi Kilaisi nwɛ ti nhanwa, nana Ngebɔ fɔha na aa ala ka Ngebɔ nhu lo na.
46001025	Gbaa nana Ngebɔ aa pele mua maa kpau ngaa mɔu mɔu nhanda, maa nhanda na siina nhu lo nhanda nwɛ tee ngɔ ningaa gbɔhaa ti nhu lo mba, awa nana Ngebɔ aa pele mua maa kpau ngaa njaaiyaai nhanda, maa nhanda na siina kaanhu gbɛndɛ nhanda nwɛ nana tee ngɔ ningaa gbɔhaa ti gaanhu gbɛndɛ mba.
46001026	Ni ndegea, a nɛgililɛ baa wee gee na nhuna Ngebɔ i uini wuaa. Ina maa wu nhua ngelou na nhu lomaa na lee tee ngɔ na nwa, waile gbinhi wu nhu lo ngɔ, inaile fɔha ee wuaa, inaile wee tomaa aa gɔha gɔha.
46001027	Kɛlɛ nana ngelou nhu belaa i taa gɛ ma mɔu mɔu nhanda nwɛ, alɛɛ Ngebɔ aa nhu ɔhɛ kangaa i nhu lo mbelaa i ngaa ufe nda. Awa nana ngelou nhu belaa i taa gɛ ma njaaiyaai nhanda nwɛ, alɛɛ Ngebɔ aa nhu ɔhɛ kangaa i kaanhu gbɛndɛ mbelaa i ngaa ufe nda.
46001028	Nana ngelou nhu belaa i taa tɔ aunwaa yɔhɔgɔ awa taa au bii manhu, awa ti nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa gbɛ o gbɛ aile, alɛɛ Ngebɔ aa nhu ɔhɛ kangaa i nana nyaai la ngelou nhu belaa i nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa kolo ɔ,
46001029	kangaa nuu gbɔha ai ba yonga lee Ngebɔ gulɔɔ.
46001030	Kɛlɛ aa Ngebɔ enge na lepele bi lɛɛhu na nhanwa, Ngebɔ oo pelenga woo gɛ hounwayaa nhu wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, awa oo pelenga Kilaisi i bele ngaa mi nhu lo na, awa aa ala nhu bele, Ngebɔ oo mi belenga aa tee mbelaa ala gbɔha na nhanwa. Moo belenga aa tɔɔgɔɔ mbelaa Ngebɔ nhanwa, awa oo nhanda baanga muaa.
46001031	Faa nwɛɛe ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Nuu o nuu nana aa gɛ ɔɔ yonga lee, i yonga leea nana nhu Maliki na i pelenga."
46002001	Ni ndegea, nhuna ngi bai wuee Ngebɔ oo na gɛ ma aa wuee nana i ndɔɔgu nhuɔ, ngai njia nɛɛ nɛɛ lagbiti gɛi na inaile nhu lo.
46002002	Gbaa nhuna ngee na tii wua o, nya lɔgɔlaa aileɔ aa gbɛ o gbɛ lagbiti gɔɔndaa, kɛlɛ k`a Yisɔsi Kilaisi gbo, awa eengaa bɛnhɛ aa ngi haa na i peleni kpekpa ngulu naa alɛɛɔ gbo nya lɔgɔlaa ɔɔ fanwa.
46002003	Awa nhuna ngi bai wuee, nya yɔɔkɔ ɔɔ, awa k`angi gbɛi aa ndua,
46002004	awa nhuna ngee yɛpɛ awa ngee ni Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa gɛɛ gɛɛ aa wuee, ngaai ndaahaa nɛɛ beleni, kɛlɛ kangi pelenga Ngebɔ Yina na o ngi gɔhɔ na o ti tɔmbaga na lɔgɔɔu ngaa wuee,
46002005	kangaa wu laanɛɛ na ai ba yigba ningaa gbɔhaa ti nhu lo nhu, kɛlɛ ɔɔ yigbanaa Ngebɔ fɔha na nhu.
46002006	Na nhu bɛɛ, nhuna maa gɛ laanɛɛ nhu gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ mbelaa nhu, maa nhu lo tɛa nga na, kɛlɛ nhu lo mɛ nana ngelou nhu belaa i ti nda aile, inaile ngu mbelaa i ngelou indinɛi nhu nhanwa natiini ti fɔha na ngaa ɔɔ lo.
46002007	Nhu lo na nana ngi maa yia gɛi ala nwɛ aa Ngebɔ gbundu nhu lo na, nana ndɔɔgu ngɔ nuu gbɔhaa, kɛlɛ nana i nhu ɔhɛaɔ mi bɛɛyaa nhanwa yeingaa i ngelou na gbatɛi.
46002008	Hali ngila mɔɔ bɛnhɛ ngelou indinɛi nhu gulɔɔ belaa i ndiiya ai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ maa nhu lo ngindinɛia. Gbaa aa bele ngaa tuaaɔ nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ mba, tai ba Maliki na baaa kpekpa ngulu naa nana mbɛɛ ila na i mba ɛɛ Ngebɔ.
46002009	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi gɛnhi, "Nhanda na nana nuu au ai lɛ tɔi lɛɔ, awa nana nuu ou ai lɛ mɛiniɔ, awa nana nuu ai nɛgili ma bɛnhɛ aa kɛɛlaa aa belenaa, maa nhanda na siina na nwɛ Ngebɔ i maa gbatɛa natiini fanwa ti lo ngɔ na aa ala."
46002010	Ngebɔ oo kpundu ngindinɛi lɔgɔɔunga aa nuee aa ngi Yina na nhu bele. Gbaa Yina na nwɛ aa gbɛ o gbɛ na ɔɛ ɔɛ nhaa i gua ma, hali bɛnhɛ Ngebɔ gbundu na goonhu goonhu na ku ngɔ aa gua ma.
46002011	Ele nwɛɛ i nuu nɛɛnwaa nhaa gɔɔ, k`a ngi luu na nwɛ gbo i ala nhu? Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, k`a Ngebɔ Yina na ila ngɔ na gbo kpɛti alɛɛ i nana gɔɔ i Ngebɔ nɛɛnwaa.
46002012	Chaanngi nhu Yina na mi hɔlɔa, ngelou na nhu gee ailee kɛlɛ Yina nwɛɛ nana Ngebɔ i teeni, kangaa mi ba nhanda gbekpe na gɔɔ nana Ngebɔ i teeni mi nhanwa aa panda bandayaa.
46002013	Faa nwɛɛe indinɛi naa kɛ aa wuee ai guai nuu gbɔha nhu lo nhu, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ Yina na nwɛ i mi nagɔlii la, nhuna naa gɛ aa yina lɔmbaga na ambondaa natiini ma Yina na i ti eya.
46002014	Nuu na bɛɛ nana Ngebɔ Yina na ai ngeya, aigɔ nana hɔlɔ aa gua Ngebɔ Yina na le, gbaa alaa kpau ngɔ aa mɔu mɔu nhanda ala le, awa ai ku aa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba, gbɛnhaile kolo na nana i nhu ndo ngɔ gbo yina nwaa nhanda nhu.
46002015	Nuu o nuu nana Ngebɔ Yina na aa gɛ ngeya, maa nwɔɔ na aa kunaa i nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ kolo naa nana aa gɛ gbɛ o gbɛ nhu. Kɛlɛ ala gbɔha na kpei nuu o nuu ai ku aa ala bele ngɔ na gɔhɔ.
46002016	Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Ele nwɛɛ i Maliki na nɛɛnwaa nhaa gɔɔ, kangaa i ba nɛɛnwaa he Maliki naɛ?" Kɛlɛ mua Kilaisi nɛɛnwaa na nwɛ i mi eya.
46003001	Ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa, kɛlɛ wua ngaigɔ yɛpɛ wuee ɛɛ ningaa natiini Yina na i ti eya, kɛlɛ ngɔɔ yɛpɛa wuee ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti yigba ngɔ ti nda nhu lo na nhu, awa natiini ndengaa aa tuee lɛ tuun ti laanɛɛ na nhu.
46003002	Nyii lɔ ngi wu laa gɔi la, kɛlɛ ngai wu laa gɔi aa mɛnhɛi nana kaai ɔ, gbɛnhaile wai ba ku waa mɛ, awa hali bɛnhɛ chaanngi nhu waigɔ ku waa mɛ,
46003003	gbaa wu bele ngɔ gbo tuun ɛɛ ngelou nhu belaa. Gbaa kina tolo nhanda lɔ na wu nhu awa k`awu baabaga na loganhu, ee ngelou na bele ngɔ na aile aa na, awa ee wu sia ɔ na ai belenga ɛɛ ningaa gbamaa?
46003004	Gbaa nhuna wu ila kee aa gɛ, "Nya Pɔɔlu nda nwɛ aa nge," awa lagbiti na oo gɛ, "Nya Apɔlɔsi nda nwɛ aa nge," ee na ai ndɔgɔɔunga tɔ aa kɛɛlaa ningaa gbamaa nwɛ aa wuee natiini tai gbɛ o gbɛ gɔɔ yinayaa nhanda nhu.
46003005	Gbɛɛ aa Apɔlɔsi? Inaile gbɛɛ aa Pɔɔlu? Ngebɔ eyaalakpangaa nwɛ gbo aa nuee aa kɛɛlaa ni nhu bele nwɛ wu beleni na aa lanɛɛ belaa. Awa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ ni liiya aa ngi enge na belenaa ɛɛ Maliki na i maa fɛɛlɛ na hei alɛɛ pelendaa nhanwa.
46003006	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge nyɛɛ ngi tɔɔnhai gaai na nhiini, awa ka Apɔlɔsi i nja bua ngi haai na nwa, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ ee pele ee gbɛa.
46003007	Faanwɛɛe, nuu na nana aa nhii tii nuu na o nana aa nja bu ma, tua aile nhanda aa tuee, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ, nana aa pele aa gbɛa, alɛɛ kolo ɔ tee ngɔ.
46003008	Nuu na nana aa nhii tii nuu na o nana aa nja na bu ma ti sɔu yɛ, awa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ ɔɔ ngi baabaa na hɔlɔa aa ngi enge na bele ngɔ na i peleni.
46003009	Nua Ngebɔ eyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa nuee naa enge ngilamaaa tii ala o, awa wua pa Ngebɔ nhɛɛ na nwɛ aa wuee. Awa wua nwɛ boma ngi bɛlɛ na aa wuee.
46003010	Ndi ɔ na aa panda bandayaa na nana Ngebɔ i ngɔaa nya eya, nana i nya bele ngɔ ɛɛ mbɛɛi bɛlɛ lo mɔɔ waa, kangi ndambu na laa, awa ndakpa lagbiti lɔ aa pɛlɛ lo na kɔmaa. Kɛlɛ ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ i sogia aa gee to na kɔmaa.
46003011	Gbaa nuu aigɔ ndambu lagbiti la gbɔnhu, k`a indinɛi nwɛ gbo Ngebɔ i ndaaɔ tɔ, napangaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
46003012	Faa nwɛɛ ina ndambu indinɛi nwa nuu aa gbɛ o gbɛ lo na kɔmaa aa mabɔɔn, inaile aa kɔpa gɔu, inaile aa nahoo gɔtu, inaile aa ngulu, inaile aa munyɛ, inaile pa aa kaa nana ti niganga,
46003013	ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nana nuu o nuu i peleni ɔɔ lɔgɔɔnaa kpou, aa Foo na nhuna Kilaisi ɔɔ ba ningaa i kɔhɔ ma, gbɛnhaile ngɔmbu na ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔunaa awa ɔɔ nhuanaa kangaa i ngenge na nhua nana ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ i pelenga kangaa i ba pele ngɔ na gɔɔ.
46003014	Ina nana bi toni ndambu na nwa ngɔmbu na ai nyaanii, bia bi toni bɔɔ paabaa hɔlɔa.
46003015	Kɛlɛ ina nana bi toni ngɔmbu na aa mɔ na kpugu, baigɔ paabaa hɔlɔ. Kɛlɛ bi gbɔha na bɔɔ ndendouyaa hɔlɔa, hali ɔɔ belenaa ɛɛ k`a ngɔmbu nhu bele nwɛ bi hɔlɔi la.
46003016	Ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa wuɛɛ Ngebɔ Bɛlɛ na aa wuee, awa wu nhu naa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ Yina na i na?
46003017	Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa Ngebɔ Bɛlɛ na nyaai, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala nyaaia. Gbaa Ngebɔ Bɛlɛ na, ala pele ngɔ aa tɔɔgɔɔ kee ala gbɔha nhanwa, awa wua nwɛ maa Eebɔ Bɛlɛ na aa wuee.
46003018	Awɛɛ gbɔha na nwɔu mɔu. Ina wu liiya nuu aa gɛ na nana aa nɛgili aa gbɔha na aa kɛɛlaa ala nhu lo ngɔ aa ningaa gbɔhaa i ti nhu lo na ngelou indinɛi nhu, i belena aa mɔu mɔu mɔɔ chaanngi nhu, kangaa i ba bele ngaa nhu lo mɔɔ.
46003019	Gbaa nana ningaa gbɔhaa ti kpau ngɔ aa nhu lo nhanda Ngebɔ gulɔɔ, maa nhanda na siina Ngebɔ lɔ kpau ngɔ aa mɔu mɔu nhanda. Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi gɛnhi, "Ngebɔ alɛɛ aa nhu lo mbelaa i hou ti aani na nhu taa kuu gua,"
46003020	awa gbɔnhu, Maliki na i kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhu lo mbelaa i ti laalaa na taa pele kua ɔ fuu.
46003021	Faa nwɛɛe nuu ɛɛ yonga lee nana nhu ningaa taa pele, gbɛnhaile gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ wu bo mɛɛ,
46003022	i bele bɛnhɛ aa Pɔɔlu, inaile, Apɔlɔsi, inaile Sifɔsi, inaile i bele ngaa ngelou na, inaile ndɛɛhu na o haa na o, inaile chaanngi o ka guna, indinɛi bɛɛ wu bo mɛɛ,
46003023	awa wua Kilaisi bo mɛɛ aa wuee, awa Kilaisi Ngebɔ bo mɛɛ aa ala.
46004001	K`a ningaa taa nɛgili aa nuee gɛnhi aa kɛɛlaa nua Kilaisi eyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa nuee, natiini Ngebɔ i ngenge na ɔaa ti eya Ngebɔ lɔmbaga gbundu na yanjandaa nhu nhanwa ningaa nwa.
46004002	Awa nhanda na nana Ngebɔ aa pele nhu gbee nda ngeyaalakpangaa eya ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, kataa gɛ laanɛɛyaai ti nwanhu nwɔɔ na le.
46004003	Kɛlɛ nya nya nhanwa, nhanda golo nwɛ nyɛɛ tanii aa kɛɛlaa kawaa nya gɔhɔ, inaile ti nya gɔhɔ ningaa gbɔhaa ti yia baka mbu. Ngaa kɛa bɛnhɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa ngai gbɔha gɔhɔ.
46004004	Ngai gbɛ o gbɛ gɔɔ ngɔ gbɔha nhanwa nana nya lɛɛ ɔ nhu, kɛlɛ na aile aa nya bele ngaa teo mɔɔe gbaa Maliki na nwɛ ɔɔ nya gɔhɔ.
46004005	Faa nwɛɛe awɛɛ nhumbu aa gbɛ o gbɛ gɔhɔ nuu o nuua, kɛlɛ a wolona nhaa Maliki na i ba, nana ɔɔ pele waun ngi huo nana nwa i ndɔɔgu nhu, awa ka kpindi nhu, awa ndaalaa na nana i ningaa nɛɛnwaa nhu, ɔɔ kuaa waunmaa. Awa nhu nwɛɛ gila nuu o nuu ɔɔ ngi nda bihɛ na hɔlɔ Ngebɔ eya.
46004006	Ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa, nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ ngi maa yia gɛi nya nhanwa nii Apɔlɔsi o ai leteni ni nwa tolou, kɛlɛ wu lɔgɔ faa nwɛɛ. Ani gbauna aa kuague awa wu nana nagɔli i gɛi, "Awɛɛ bii nana bou nwa kpaali ngɔ na." Yonga leendaa ngila mɔɔ nhu, wu au bii lagbiti na nwanhu, kawaa gbe nda.
46004007	Ele nwɛɛ ɔɔ wu gbau ngaa ningaa natiini ti gbekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ ningaa lagbitiaa? Awa gbɛɛ i wu eya aa kɛɛlaa wai hɔlɔi Ngebɔ eya? Kɛlɛ ina ala eyaa nwɛ wu hɔlɔi na, gbɔɔ waa yonga lee ɛɛ waa tɔ k`a fembɛ aile Ngebɔ i ngɔai wu eya?
46004008	Wu lii lɛi ɔ tɔ! Woo belenga tɔ aa kpatɛ belaa ! Woo belenga tɔ aa manhangaa waa waa nua nai mba! Ngɛɛ gɔi k`a wu ba bele ngaa manhangaa waa waa aa tɔmbaga, kangaa nua gbɔnhu ni ba bele ngaa manhangaa waa waa ni gɛ ngilamaaa tii wua o.
46004009	Gbaa pele ngɔ nya le ɛɛ Ngebɔ oo gbelembanwaa na siina ɔaa mi eya mua to mbelaa i ngaa muee, ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti gɛa ti nwa kataa haa hɔlɔ faka gulɔɔ, gbɛnhaile moo belenga aa kpee kpee mbelaa ngelou na le, malekaa o ka ningaa gbɔhaa le.
46004010	Kina nua ni nwɔu mɔu ngɔ Kilaisi nhanwa awa k`a wuɛɛ nha wu nhu lo ngɔ wu hounwayaa na nhu wu na wui Kilaisi o. Nua ni yaaiyaai ɔ, awa k`a wua nwɛ nha wu gaanhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ. Ti au bii ngɔ ni nwanhu, awa k`a wua nwɛ nha ti mbɛɛ gɛ ngɔ wuaa.
46004011	Nhaahaai ndɔɛ lɔ nuaa awa ni bolo nhu be ngɔ. Nai maa ili gbekpe nhu, tai ni hou ma maa nhiɛ ɔ, awa heinwaa gbandi ai nuaa.
46004012	Kani nwɔɛa ngenge gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ nhu. Awa nhuna ningaa taa ni laangaa, kani ti luba fanwa. Awa nhuna ningaa taa ni aa sɛɛgɛ, k`ani lii lo.
46004013	Nhuna taa ni ɛi, k`ani kpɛɛmbo ti eya aa njia banda. Nua noo belengaɔ aa ngelou i nhu nwaa nɔgɔ. Nua nwɛ pɔlɔgɔɔ na gaagɔɔ na aa nuee nhaahaai.
46004014	Ngai indinɛi gbaalii wu aa ufendaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ ndaanhii mɛ ngaa ngɔa wu eya ɛɛ ni lomayaa lengaa.
46004015	Gbaa hali bɛnhɛ ina ningaa nagɔli mbelaa gbinhi gbinhia lɔ wu eya nuu ai ku aa ti gbaga wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Kilaisi o, kɛɛgɛa gbinhi gbinhia tai wu eya. Gbaa wu hounwayaa na nhanwa wu nhu wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o kang~a~a bele ngaa wu kɛɛgɛ ndi ɔ aa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na nhu bele nana ngi kɛi aa wuee.
46004016	Faa nwɛɛe ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ kangaa wu hitɛ nya ɔgɔbo nhu.
46004017	Indinɛi nhanwa, ngoo Timootii longa wuee, nana nya lomayaa nwɔɔ o ka laanɛɛ lou aa ala Maliki na nhu. Awa ɔɔ kili hitɛa wuɛɛ nya eyaabele na nhanwa nya hounwayaa na nhu nii Kilaisi o, ɛɛ gbo ngaa ningaa nagɔli la mii o mii laanɛɛ belaa ti na.
46004018	Chaanngi nhu wu lɛingaa i wu aunwaa oo lɛ, gbaa wɔɔ tɔɔngaa ngɛagɔ ba wuee hitima nwa.
46004019	Kɛlɛ ina Maliki na aa kuun, ngɔɔ baa wuee guui nhu. Awa ngai bai ngaunwaa lɛ belaa i ti laa yia na gbɛngbɛ mae, kɛlɛ ti fɔha na nwɛ ngɔɔ kpɛngbɛ.
46004020	Gbaa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na ai na njɛpɛ nhu kɛlɛ fɔha nhu nwɛɛ i na.
46004021	Nya baalaa wuee aa kpengbe ngoo, inaile aa ndomayaa o maa lɛiyaa yina nhu, ngigbɛɛ nwɛ wɔɔ lo nda?
46005001	Ngoo mɛinga aa kɛɛlaa, aa tɔmbaga, ndo sia nhanda lɔ na wu nhu aa kɛɛlaa, nuu lɔ aa ndo sia aa ngi kɛɛgɛ na nyanha na. Nhanda indinɛi bonda, hali natiini ngebɔ belaa aile aa tuee tai pele.
46005002	Wɔɔ gee yonga lee tɔ? Maa nhiɛ ɔ nha wu ba gɛ maa nwɔuyaa nhu, kangaa nuu na nana i nhanda indinɛi belenga wu kpɛ liiya.
46005003	Hali ngai na tii wua o waa nya lɔ aunwaa, nyaa na tii wua o tuu na nhu, faa nwɛɛe ngoo nuu na gɔhɔnga tɔ wu liiya nana i nhanda indinɛi beleni, baa tɔ ɛɛ k`a nyaa na.
46005004	Aa mi Nwaliki na laa na Yisɔsi, nhuna waa gɛ ngaa lɔgɔ nhu, awa nya ngi gɛ na tii wua o tuu na nhu, aa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi fɔha na,
46005005	ngoo ndaalaaa aa nuu indinɛi bonda gɔanndaa Setani nwa kangaa i ndugu na nyaai, kangaa ngi luu na i ndendouyaa hɔlɔ aa lɔgɔ na Maliki na Yisɔsi ɔɔ ba.
46005006	Wu yonga na waa tee ai gbekpeni. Ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa mbugu gbɔnhu golo alɛɛ aa pele lɛgɛ hɛɛka gbɔha na aa bugu nhu?
46005007	A gbena mbugu gbɔnhu ɔha naa napangaa nhanda nyɔu, kangaa wu ba bele ngaa ningaa natiini ti chanhai ngɔ awa ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha nyiɛ nana nhanda nyɔu ai mba, ɛɛ gbo ngi kɔɔ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa wu chanhai ngɔ. Gbaa Kilaisi nana mi chaaga baala lou na aa ala, too kuaaɔ tɔ aa chaaga.
46005008	Faa nwɛɛe ami koonhu nɛɛ gbatɛa aa mi gbolo na. Kɛlɛ amɛɛ kpatɛ aa mbugu gbɔnhu ɔha na, gbɛnhaile mbugu gbɔnhu ɔha na ala nwɛ aa ndondo ngoo nwa o ka nhanda nyɔu. Kɛlɛ ami koonhu nɛɛ gbatɛa fanwa aa lɛgɛ na nana mbugu gbɔnhu ai ma, napangaa lɛgɛ na nana i na chanhainjaa nhanwa o ka tɔmbaga.
46005009	Ni oolɛɛkɔɔ na nhu ngi kpaalii wuee kangi kɛa nhu aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa awɛɛ nwaa gbɔ ngaa ndo sia mbelaa.
46005010	Ningaa nyɔu nyɔua i ti ngelou i nhu tua aile ngi ti nwa bɛɛe, inaile kɔɔli mbelaa o nwɔa belaa o, inaile natiini taa ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa batou. Gbaa ina aa bele ngaa tuɛɛ, wɔɔ guaa ngelou i nhu polou.
46005011	Kɛlɛ nana ngi ma kpei ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa nuu o nuu nana aa ui gbɔha naa aa laanɛɛ nwɔɔ, kɛlɛ ngeyaabele na nwɛ aa ndo siandaa o, kɔɔli ngoo, ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa batoundaa o, njafa belendaa o, ndɔɔ hou ngoo, ka nwɔa belendaa, maa belaa indiini awɛɛ nwaa gbɔ ngaa tuee, awa awɛɛ mɛnhɛi nwɛ nwa bɛnhɛ aa tua indinɛi bonda.
46005012	-
46005013	Na nhu bɛɛ, ni nda nhanda aile aa natiini kɔhɔndaa laanɛɛ belaa aile aa tuee. Ngebɔ nwɛ ɔɔ ti gɔhɔ. Kɛlɛ ee wua wai natiini kɔhɔ wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i nga tuee? Faa nwɛɛe a nuu nyɔu na gbɛa liiya.
46006001	Ina wu ila kee pu nwa aa ɔa ti loganhu tii ngi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ o, ee ɔɔ lia aa ndege lou na teenjaa gbaha mba yia nwanhangaa i ngee, yeingaa nha i ba njia na bu Ngebɔ ndaa i kulɔɔ.
46006002	Ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ndaa i tua nwɛ tɔɔ ngelou na gɔhɔ? Awa ina aa bele k`a wua nwɛ wɔɔ ngelou na gɔhɔ, ee wai ku waa nhanda golo golo nwaa gɔhɔ pele?
46006003	Ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa mɔɔ malekaa gɔhɔnaa? Mii nwɛ gbɔnhu naa lo ɔ ndɛɛhu indinɛi nwaa nhanda nhanwa?
46006004	Ina nha k`a njia nwanhangaa lɔ wu eya natiini taa ndɛɛhu indinɛi nwaa yia gɛ wuɛɛ, ee wɔɔ ti belenaa aa kɔhɔ mbelaa natiini ti bele ngai laanɛɛ belaa i mba?
46006005	Ngi indinɛi gɛ kangaa wu ufe. Ee i ba bele ngaa kɛɛlaa nuu ai na wu liiya nana nhu lo ngɔ hiti ɔ nhu njia gɛndaa nhanwa ngi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i ndoganhu?
46006006	Kɛlɛ kpeendɛ baa, laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aa li aa ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ njia nwanhangaa le natiini laanɛɛ belaa aile aa tuee.
46006007	Kina i belenga bɛnhɛ aa kɛɛlaa pu nwa ɔa ɔa ɔ wu loganhu, alaa ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ tɔ aa kɛɛlaa woo gbahaa hiti ɔ nhu chɔɔ. Ee ai ba bisa nha wu nhanwa waa gɛ lɛɛi? Ee ai ba bisa nha wu nhanwa taa wu aa nwɔa?
46006008	Kpeendɛ mi maaia aa kɛɛlaa wu gbɔha na wua waa nhanda aa haa haa, awa k`awu ngaa nwɔa bele pele, awa hali wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i k`awu indinɛi bele ngaa tuee!
46006009	Inaile, ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa teenjaa gbahamba belaa i taigɔ ɔa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la? Awɛɛ gbɔha na nwɔu mɔu, gbɛnhaile ningaa i natiini taa ndo sia ka natiini taa ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa batou, ka kɛgɛingaa i taa ndo sia aa ti ndege gɛgɛingaa i,
46006010	inaile natiini taa nwɔa bele, ka natiini ti gɔɔli ngɔ, ka ndɔɔ hou mbelaa, ka natiini ti yafa ɔ na, tua indinɛi bɛɛ taigɔ ɔa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la. Ngebɔ oo wu belenga aa tɔɔgɔɔ mbelaa ala gbɔha na nhanwa awa oo wu belenga aa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ, aa Maliki na laa na Yisɔsi Kilaisi, ka mi Eebɔ na Yina na.
46006011	Awa maa belaa bonda nwɛɔ aa wu lɛingaa. Kɛlɛ too wu chanhainga kualaa nhanda nyɔu nhu. Too wu gɔannga Ngebɔ nwa. Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ka mi Eebɔ na Yina na too wu belenga aa tee mbelaa Ngebɔ gulɔɔ.
46006012	Nuu lagbiti ɔɔ gɛa, "Fɛɛlɛ he ngɔ mbɛ gbɛ o gbɛ belendaa nhanwa," kɛlɛ gbɛ o gbɛ aile kpekpe ngɔ nya nhanwa. Nya ngaa gɛa, "Fɛɛlɛ he ngɔ nyɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ belendaa nhanwa," kɛlɛ hali i ila kele aigɔ bele ngaa nya nwanhu nwɔɔ.
46006013	Mɛnhɛi alaa na mi goo na nhanwa awa mi goo na pa alaa na mɛnhɛi nhanwa, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ ɔɔ tua indinɛi gbelea kpɔ. Mi lugu na Ngebɔ ai kpatɛiɔ ndo siandaa la nhanwa kɛlɛ Maliki na batoundaa la nhaa nwɛɛ i kpatɛi. Awa Maliki na pa, Ngebɔ i ala gbatɛia mi lugu na nhanwa.
46006014	Awa kina Ngebɔ, aa ngi fɔha na, oo huua Maliki nau, ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu ɔɔ huu miu haa na nhu aa ngi fɔha na.
46006015	Ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wu lugu na Kilaisi lugu na gaka nwɛɛ. Ee ngi Kilaisi lugu na gaka gua mba ngi pele ngaa ndo sia nyanha lugu? Kangaa ɛɛ bele.
46006016	Inaile, ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa kɛgɛi na nana aa lugu na nwaa gbɔ ngaa ndo sia nyanha ti fee ngɔ na too belenga aa ndugu ila? Gbaa ka Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛa, "Feengaa i tɔɔ belenaa aa ndugu ila."
46006017	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa gbɔha na nwaa gbɔ ngaa Maliki na, tɔɔ belenaa aa ngila mɔɔ yina na nhu.
46006018	A gbena aa ndo siandaa. Nhanda nyɔu o nhanda nyɔu lagbiti nana nuu aa pele, maa gee na ndugu na aile. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa ndo sia oo nhanda nyɔu belenga aa ala lugu na.
46006019	Ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa wu lugu na Ngebɔ Bɛlɛ na nwɛ Ngebɔ Yina na nhanwa nana i bi nhu, napangaa nana Ngebɔ i ngɔai wu eya? Wua aile wu bo mɛɛ aa wu gbɔha nae kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ ala bo mɛɛ aa wuee,
46006020	gbɛnhaile kɛɛ wu eyaa aa mɔɔ, faa nwɛɛe awu lugu na bua ngeyaabele nhu aa pele na nana ɔɔ mbɛɛ gɛ la Ngebɔa.
46007001	Chaanngi nhu ngu to ngɔ na nhanda naa nana wu maa ooleekɔɔ gbaalii nya nwanhu, nhanda kpekpe mɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa kɛgɛi ngɛɛ nyanha gɔli.
46007002	Kɛlɛ kina ndo siandaa i gɛa gbinhi, kɛgɛi ngoo kɛgɛi kaa ngi nda nyanha gɔli, awa njie ngoo njie kaa gɛ ngi nda nhii mbɛ.
46007003	Aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ nana hɔlɔndaa i nyanha na eya, k`a ngi nhii na aa ngɔa ala eya, awa nana pa hɔlɔndaa i nhii na eya k`a ngi nyanha na aa ngɔa ala eya.
46007004	Nyanha na ala aile manhu nwɔɔ na aa ala ala lugu na nhanwa, kɛlɛ ngi nhii na nwɛ manhu nwɔɔ na aa ala. Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, kɛgɛi na ala aile manhu nwɔɔ na aa ala ala lugu na nhanwa, kɛlɛ ngi nyanha na nwɛ manhu nwɔɔ na aa ala.
46007005	Awɛɛ gaasou ngaa gbɔha na, k`a kuun mɛɛ waa kuun ma pɛnhɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa wɔɔ gbɔha na gɔan laaminɛ belendaa nhanwa. Awa wu ba ba gbɔnhu ngilamaa, kangaa wu ba Setani bɛndi aa wu hagɔlindaa gbɛnhaile wai ku waa sia aa wu gbɔha na.
46007006	Indinɛi ngaa kɛ gɛnhi aa wuee ngai gɛi kawaa pele qai, kɛlɛ wu lee ngɔ aa pelendaa.
46007007	Aa tɔmbaga i ba nwaa nhiɛa i ba bele ngaa wua bɛɛ wu bele ngɔ ɛɛ nya nyanha ai mbɛ. Kɛlɛ ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ ngi nda hembɛ lɔ ngeya tɔɔgɔɔ kualaa Ngebɔ le. Ngila mɔɔ nda, fembɛ indinɛi. Lagbiti na pa, fembɛ nana.
46007008	Chaanngi nhu ngɔɔ gɛa kpagoa i ma tii ngɔɔ nyanha i ngoo aa kɛɛlaa maa nhiɛ ɔ wu nhanwa waa lo kpagoyaa na nhu ɛɛ ngi nhu.
46007009	Kɛlɛ ina wai ku ngaa gbɔha nhu houndaa, a kɛmbɛ guu gua awa wu nyanhaa gɔli. Gbaa maa nhiɛ ɔ waa gɛ kɛmbɛ bele ngɔ tee ngɔ waa nwɔ ngaa ngɔi.
46007010	Wua na wu kɛmbɛ nhu tɔ, ngi kɛ aa wuee, nya aile kpeie kɛlɛ Maliki na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa nyanha na ɛɛ loganhu gɔɛ aa ngi nhii na.
46007011	Awa kɛlɛ ina aa pele, i heia ngila ngɔ inaile i ngoo ila kpatɛa boma aa ngi nhii na. Awa nyanha nwɔɔ na pa ɛɛ kpagoyaa hiti ngi nyanha na nwa.
46007012	Wu bɛpɛ na le bɛɛ ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa, ina nyanha aa gɛ laanɛɛ nwɔɔ eya awa maa nyanha na laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aile aa ala, kɛlɛ maa nyanha na oo kuunnga aa heilaa kɛmbɛ na siina na nwa, nhii na ɛɛ nyanha na lo. (Indinɛi nya aile ngi kɛie kɛlɛ Maliki na nwɛ i kɛi.)
46007013	Ina nhii ngaa gɛ nyanha eya awa nhii na laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aile aa ala, kɛlɛ maa nhii na oo kuunnga aa kɛɛlaa ti gɛmbɛ na i gɛa nhu, nyanha na ɛɛ kɛmbɛ na nhu lee.
46007014	Gbaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ kuunnaa laanɛɛ gbaha mba nyanha nwɔɔ na nwa ti hounwayaa na nhanwa tii ngi nyanha na o. Awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ kuunnaa laanɛɛ gbaha mba nhii mɔɔ na nwa ti hounwayaa na nhanwa tii ngi nhii na o. Ina k`a ngemɛɛ aileɔ gɛnhi, ti lengaa i ti ba belenaa ɛɛ laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa ti lengaa, kɛlɛ kina ngemɛɛ, Ngebɔ oo kuunnga ti nwa.
46007015	Kɛlɛ ina laanɛɛ gbahamba nwɔɔ na aa gɛ ɔɔ kɛmbɛ na nhu lee, aa pelenaa. Maa gee indinɛi bonda nhu, laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na ti ndoi, i bele ngaa njie na, inaile kɛgɛi na, aigɔ gɛ nduayaa nhu, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo uinga muaa kangaa mi gɛ maa lɛi nhu.
46007016	Kɛmbɛ nwaa nyanha, bi gee kɔɔni aa bele ngaa bɔɔ ndendouyaa hea bi nhii naɛ? Nyanha nwɔɔ, bi gee kɔɔni aa bele ngaa bɔɔ ndendouyaa hea bi nyanha naɛ?
46007017	Kɛlɛ nuu o nuu kaa gɛ na ɛɛ gbo Maliki na i gɛi ngemɛɛ aa gɛ na, ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i uini alaa. Indinɛi nya sɔ na nwɛ ngaa laanɛɛ belaa i nagɔli la bɛɛ.
46007018	Ee nuu ee naanɔɔ nana ngi nwanha nhanda bele ngɔɔ yeingaa Ngebɔ i gila ui alaa? Ɛɛ gbe maa nwanha nhanda na siinaa. Ee nuu ee naanɔɔ nana ngi nwanha nhanda bele ngɔ aileɔ nhuna Ngebɔ i uini alaa, tɛɛ ngi nwanha nhanda bele.
46007019	Gbaa ti gɛ nuu nwanha nhanda bele ngɔ, inaile tai gɛ pele ngɔ, kolo nhanda aile. Nana kolo ɔ na ala nwɛ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa Ngebɔ Sɔ nau.
46007020	Nuu o nuu kaa gɛ na ɛɛ ala bele ngɔ na ee na nhuna Ngebɔ i uini alaa.
46007021	Ee ndua nwɛɛɔ aa biee nhuna Ngebɔ i uini biaa? Bɛɛ nɛɛnwaa nyaai fanwa. Kɛlɛ ina baa fɛɛlɛ hɔlɔ bi belendaa nhanwa aa nhandaa baamba nwɔɔ, pelena.
46007022	Gbaa ina nuu na ndua nwɛɛɔ aa ala nhuna Maliki na i uini alaa, maa nwɔɔ na siina Maliki na nhanda baamba nwɔɔ na nwɛ aa ala. Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, nuu na nana nhanda baa ngɔ alaa nhuna Maliki na i uini alaa, maa nwɔɔ na siina Kilaisi lua nwɛ aa ala.
46007023	Ngebɔ kɛɛ wu eyaa aa mɔɔ, faa nwɛɛe awɛɛ bele ngaa nduaa ningaa nhanwa.
46007024	Ni ndegea, ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ kaa gɛ na tii Ngebɔ o ɛɛ gbo ee naɔ nhuna Ngebɔ i uini alaa.
46007025	Awa aa ba aa njiengaa i fanwa natiini tai nhiingaaɛ ti nda yɛpɛ na, Maliki na ai gbɛ o gbɛ gɛi aa nge fanwa. Kɛlɛ Maliki na nwaaumayaa na oo nya belenga aa nuu nana ningaa taa laanɛɛ la. Awae ngɔɔ nana gɛa aa wuee i nya nɛɛnwaa fanwa.
46007026	Kpɔu gbɔu na lɔgɔ fanwa nana mi nhu, nya laanɛɛ ɔ maa nhiɛ ɔ kɛgɛi ngoo kɛgɛi fanwa aa lo bele ngɔ nhu.
46007027	Ee boo nyanha hɔlɔa? Awa k`a bɛɛ ndo. Ee kpago nwɛɛ aa biee? Awa k`a bɛɛ nyanha gɔli nha.
46007028	Kɛlɛ ina baa nyanha gɔli, nhanda nyɔu aile bi peleni, awa ina njie na nana ai nhii mbɛ, aa kɛmbɛ gua, nhanda nyɔu aile i peleni. Kɛlɛ natiini taa kɛmbɛ gbatɛ, tɔɔ ngelou na nhu gbɔu gbɔu na hɔlɔa. Nya ngi kɛ gbo kangaa wai ba u ngɔa nhu.
46007029	Ni ndegea, nana ngi ma ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, lɔgɔ na nhu oo gɛ gutu, awa kualaama tɔ chaanngi nhu, natiini nyanhaa ti tuɛɛ ti belena ɛɛ tai tuɛɛ.
46007030	Awa natiini taa ɔɔ ti belena ɛɛ taile ɔɔ, awa natiini taa goonhu nɛɛ ti belena ɛɛ taile goonhu nɛɛ, awa natiini taa nhaanhaa eya, ti belena ɛɛ k`a nhaanhaa tai tuɛɛ.
46007031	Awa natiini ti ngelou na nhu nɛɛ nɛɛ na bou, tɛɛ luu u ngɔa nhu nja lee ngɔnhu. Gbaa ngelou indinɛi, ɛɛ i na chaanngi nhu, aigɔ lɛmbi gbɔnhu nja lee ngɔnhu.
46007032	Nya lo ngɔ la kangaa wu gua nɛɛnwaa yogobee nhu. Kɛgɛi na nana nyanha ai alɛɛ, ala Maliki na nwaa nhanda nwɛ maa lii i koo nhu, aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ gee Maliki na goonhu nɛɛ.
46007033	Kɛlɛ kɛgɛi na nana nyanha i mbɛ, ala ngelou nhu nhanda lɔ maa lii i koo nhu, aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ gee ngi nyanha na goonhu nɛɛ,
46007034	awae ala lii na aa oo gɔɛa nhinde fee ma. Awa njie na nana ai nhii mbɛ, inaile lambunhu nyanhalou, ala ndii bu ɔ Maliki na nwaa nhanda nhu, aa kɛɛlaa i bele ngaa tɔɔgɔɔ mɔɔ Ngebɔ nhanwa ala lugu na nhu ka tuu na nhu. Kɛlɛ kɛmbɛ nwaa nyanha na, ala ala lii na bu ɔ ngelou na nhu nwaa nhanda na nhu, aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ gee ngi nhii na goonhu nɛɛ.
46007035	Indinɛi ngaa kɛ wu gbɔ mba nwɛ gɛnhi, kɛlɛ wu bɛndindaa aile. Ndapi nwɛɛ gbo ngaa lapi aa ndɔgɔɔundaa aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa wɔɔ gee gɛ ndiilɛi nhu Maliki na nhanwa nhanda ɛɛ gɛ na nana aa wu nɛɛnwaa yogobee.
46007036	Kɛlɛ ina kɛgɛi ngoo kɛgɛi aa nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa ai sia nwa aa ngi bele ngu to ngɔ ngi nwaa bɔ nyanha naa, ina kaka nhu oo gbɛɛa, a kaa bele qai, kɛgɛi na i nana belena aa lo nda, ai nyɔui, i pelena aa ngi nyanha.
46007037	Kɛlɛ ina kɛgɛi na, nana nuu ai ala gɔɔbii bɛɛ, aa ngili lii na nwa, kɛlɛ ala ku ngɔ aa ngi ɔi na nhu hou, awa oo indinɛi laalaaa tɔ ala lii na nwa aa kpendaa ngi nwaa bɔ nyanha naa ɛɛ i na, ɔɔ pelenaa maa nhiɛ ɔ.
46007038	Awae nuu na nana aa ngi nwaa bɔ nyanha na gɔli, maa nwɔɔ na oo pelenga maa nhiɛ ɔ. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana ai ala gɔlii, oo pelenga maa nhiɛ ɔ tee ngɔ.
46007039	Kɛmbɛ nwaa nyanha na nhanda ai baani alaa ina ngi nhii na ai lɛ haai. Kɛlɛ ina ngi nhii na aa haa, nhanda baa ngɔ alaa aa kɛmbɛ guandaa nuu na le nana aa lo nda, kɛlɛ k`a maa nhii na aa bele ngaa laanɛɛ nwɔɔ.
46007040	Kɛlɛ nya nda nɛɛnwaa na nhu, koonhu ɔɔ nɛɛa nja lee ngɔ nhu ina aa lo ngɔɔ nyanhayaa na la. Awa nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nya gbɔnhu Ngebɔ Yina na lɔ ngeya.
46008001	Chaanngi nhu ngu to ngɔ na mɛhɛia nana taa kua aa chaaga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le. Mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa mua bɛɛ kɔɔnjaa lɔ mi eya tɔmbaga na nhanwa. Kɔɔnjaa aa pelenaa nuu i aunwaa lɛ, kɛlɛ ndomayaa ala aa laanɛɛ belaa i nhu gbɛndɛnaa.
46008002	Ina nuu aa nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa i nhanda o nhanda gɔɔnaa, ai lɛ kɔɔni lɛ ɛɛ nha i ba kɔɔ.
46008003	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana ndo ngɔ aa Ngebɔ, Ngebɔ i ala gɔɔnaa.
46008004	Faa nwɛɛe ngu to ngɔ na nhaanhaa nwɛndaa natiini taa ti gua aa chaaga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le, mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔ gbɛ o gbɛ aile aa ala ngelou indinɛi nhu, awa Ngebɔ lagbiti ai na, k`a Ngebɔ ila kele alɛɛ i na.
46008005	Gbaa hali bɛnhɛ ɛɛ taa kɛ, ina ngebɔa lɔ na, i bele ngaa aliyana, inaile i bele ngaa pɔlɔgɔɔ nwa, ɛɛ gbo aa tɔmbaga ngebɔa indiini bonda gbinhi gbinhia lɔ na ka malikia gbinhi gbinhia,
46008006	na nhu bɛɛ Ngebɔ ila mɛɛ kele i mi eya, napangaa mi Kɛɛgɛ na. Ala nwɛ i gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛi, awa ala nhaa nwɛɛ mi na. Awa Maliki ila mɛɛ kele i mi eya, napangaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi. Aa ala nhu bele, ka Ngebɔ i gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛa. Awa aa ala nhu bele, muaa na.
46008007	Aa pele o pele, nuu o nuu aile i tɔmbaga indinɛi gɔɔ ngɔ. Ningaa lɛingaa ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔ nhanda indinɛi oo ti lugu gɔɔngaɔ nja lee ngɔ nhu awa nhaahaai, awa nhuna taa maa nwɛnhɛi na bonda nwɛ, k`ati nɛgili ma tuun ɛɛ mɛnhɛi nana ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔ bo mɛɛ. Ti nɛgili gbekpe na njaaiyaai ɔ, awa ti nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa mɛnhɛi na oo ti nwaa nɔgɔa.
46008008	Kɛlɛ mɛnhɛi aigɔ ba aa muee Ngebɔ gbɛlaa. Ina mai mɛi, aigɔ gbɛ o gbɛ gua muaa, ina maa mɛ, maigɔ gbɛ o gbɛ hɔlɔ nhu.
46008009	Kɛlɛ a sogiae kangaa wu nhanda baa mba eyaabele na ai ba pele natiini ti yaaiyaai ɔ na laanɛɛ nhu, taa gula nhanda nyɔu nhu.
46008010	Kɛlɛ ina nuu lɔ na nana njaaiyaai ɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu maa nhanda indinɛi nhu, aa bi lɔ bia kɔɔnjaa na i bi eya, k`abi mɛnhɛi nwɛ ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa ti Yuu eebɔ bɛlɛu nana ti kuaa aa chaaga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le, ee na aigɔ ndii gbɛndɛ fe alɛɛ aa mɛnhɛi nwɛndaa nana taa kua aa chaaga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le?
46008011	Awae aa wu gɔɔnjaa na nhu bele, nuu na nana ala yaaiyaai ɔ na ngi laanɛɛ na nhu, napangaa wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na nana Kilaisi i haai ala nhanwa, bi gɔɔnjaa na lɔgɔ fanwa, oo pelenga i gaka.
46008012	Awa ina waa nhanda nyɔu bele ngaa wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, nhaa wu ti nɛgili gbekpe na nyaai, a kɔɔna aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi nwɛ wu nhanda nyɔu belenga la.
46008013	Faa nwɛɛe ina mɛnhɛi aa pele ni ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aa ɔa nhanda nyɔu nhu, nya pa ngaigɔ nhua nwɛ gbɔnhu, kangaa ngai ba pele aa ɔa nhanda nyɔu nhu.
46009001	Ee nhanda ai baani nyaa? Ee to mɔɔ aile aa nge? Ee ngai mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi lɔa aa au? Ee wua aile ni engebo na aa wuee napangaa nya enge na Maliki na nhanwa?
46009002	Ina bɛnhɛ ningaa lagbitia tai nya gbauni aa to mɔɔ, kɛlɛ wua wu nhanwa to mɔɔ nwɛ aa nge, gbɛnhaile ndi ɔ na aa wu hounwayaa na lepele wu nhu wui Maliki na o, maa gee nwɛ aa nge.
46009003	Pele ngɔ indinɛi nwɛ ngaa gbɔha na nwaa gaau nda ningaa eya nhuna taa nya gbɛngbɛ.
46009004	Ee nya ngai hitii nhu ngaa mɛnhɛi nwɛ nya enge na nhanwa?
46009005	Ee nya ngai hitii nhu nya gɛmbɛ nwaa nyanha aa nda nyaa ɛɛ to mbelaa lagbitia i taa pele, ka Maliki na ndege nhiindengaa i, awa ka Pita?
46009006	Inaile, ee nya o Banabaasi o nuɛɛ gbo naa enge ni gbɔha gɔndaa nhanwa?
46009007	Kulugbaa na ngigbɛɛ aa gbɔha baabaa kulugbaa enge nhu? Ele nwɛɛ aa pɔpɔ ɔgɔ nhɛɛ la naa lo ai ngi wa mɛ? Ele nwɛɛ aa nikaa lo naa lo ai manɔnɔ hɔlɔ?
46009008	Ee indinɛi ngaa kɛ nuu gbɔha laalaa nwɛ? Gbɔɔ ee Sɔ na ai njia ila na siina gɛi?
46009009	Gbaa ka Moosisi i kpaalia Sɔ na nhu gɛnhi, "Bɛɛ nika na laa na ili nhuna aa gɛ aa bi ba na nigandaa." I gee na, ee nika nhaa nwɛɛ gbo kpɛti Ngebɔ i indinɛi gɛi?
46009010	Ee mi lɔgɔ faa aile i njia gbɔha indinɛi gɛi? Ngemɛɛ, mi lɔgɔ faa nwɛɛ ti kpaalii, gbɛnhaile nuu na nana aa mba na bu, ka nuu na nana aa mba na niga, ti nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa mba na gɔɛndaa nwa.
46009011	Ina noo yina nhaanhaa nhiinga wu nhu, ee nhanda waa nwɛ ina naa nhaanhaa gbamaa hɔlɔ wu eya?
46009012	Ina lagbitia hiti ɔ nhu aa pele nhu gbeendaa aa indinɛi wu eya, ee nua aile nha hiti ɔ nhu naa pele nhu gbee nda wu eya tee ngɔ bɛnhɛ tuaa? Kɛlɛ i gee beleni aa pele o pele, nai hitɛi fɛɛlɛ indinɛi siina bou nwa. Kɛlɛ kani lapia aa pele o pele kangaa nɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ bele nana aa Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na hɔlɔndaa bɛndi.
46009013	Ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa natiini ti ti gbaunga aa Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau enge belaa, maa enge belaa i siina Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau nwɛɛ taa ti nwɛnhɛi na hɔlɔ na? Awa natiini taa chaaga na gua mɛɛ Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, k`ati ti nda hɔlɔ chaaga nhaanhaa i nhu?
46009014	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, ka Maliki na i kɛa aa kɛɛlaa natiini taa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ Kilaisi nhanwa, kataa ti hɔlɔ na hɔlɔ kualaa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na nhu.
46009015	Kɛlɛ fɛɛlɛ indinɛi bɛɛ Ngebɔ i ngɔa ngɔ nya eya, hali i ila kele ngai pui ngeyaabele nhu. Awa ngai ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaalii kangaa wu maa nhanda na bonda bele nyɛɛ. Yeingaa nuu i pele ni yonga na ngaa tee i bele nyɛɛ aa yonga haka, ngɔɔ haaa gbo!
46009016	Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa nana ngaa kɛ aa ningaa i, nhai aile nana ngaa yonga lee fanwa. Ngoo nwɛɛ nana aa kɛɛlaa kangɔɔ kɛ qai. Awa maa lua ɔ na siina nya nhanwa ina Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa ngai kɛi!
46009017	Gbaa ina ngaa pele aa ni nda guunmayaa na, paabaa lɔ nyɛɛ. Kɛlɛ ina ngai peleni aa ni nda guunmayaa na, ni enge na nwɛ gbo tuun aa pelendaa.
46009018	Gbɛɛ tɔ nya baabaa na le? Ala nwɛ aa indinɛi gbo aa kɛɛlaa, ngai mɔɔ la Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ naa Kilaisi nhanwa nhuna ngaa gɛ aa kɛndaa aa ningaa i, kangaa ngai ba fɛɛlɛ na bu ngeyaabele nhu hiti ɔ nhu nana i nyɛɛ Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛndaa nhanwa.
46009019	Gbaa hali nha nhanda baa ngɔ nyaa ningaa i ngee bɛɛ, ngoo gbɔha na belenga aa ndua ti eya kangaa ngi ti nwaa longaa hɔlɔ laanɛɛlaa nhanwa aa Kilaisi.
46009020	Yuua i ngee kangi belenga ɛɛ Yuu nwɔɔ, kangaa ngi ti hɔlɔ. Awa ka natiini ngee taa nwaa bɛɛ Yuua i ti Sɔ nau, kangi belenga tuee ɛɛ k`a nya gbɔnhu nya nwaa bɛɛ ɔ Sɔ na siinau, kangaa ngi tua na siina hɔlɔ.
46009021	Awa natiini ngee tai nwaa bɛɛ ma Sɔ nau, kangaa ngi tua na siina hɔlɔ. Indinɛi ai ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngai nwaa bɛɛ ma Sɔ nau nana Ngebɔ i kpaaliie kɛlɛ nya nwaa bɛɛ ɔ Sɔ nau nana Kilaisi i kpaalii.
46009022	Awa natiini ngee ti yaaiyaai ɔ na laanɛɛ na nhu, kangi belenga ɛɛ k`a nya laanɛɛ na yaaiyaai ɔ, kangaa ngi ba tua na siina hɔlɔ. Ngoo belenga aa gbɛ o gbɛ ningaa i ngee bɛɛ, kangaa aa pele o pele ti lɛingaa ti ku ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔ aa nya bou bele.
