46009023	Indinɛi bɛɛ ngaa pelenaa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa lɔgɔ fanwa, kangaa ngi ngi luba na hɔlɔ.
46009024	Ee wu nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa kpaganɛ binhɛ nhu pinhɛ belaa i bɛɛ ti gbanganɛ, kɛlɛ k`a ngila mɔɔ gbo alɛɛ aa kpaganɛ baabaa na hɔlɔ? Faa nwɛɛ a binhɛa kangaa wu ba hɔlɔ.
46009025	Awa nuu o nuu nana aa gula kpaganɛ boogea, kaa gɛ kuni aa gbɔha na nhu houndaa gbɛ o gbɛ nhu. Taa pelenaa paabaa nhanwa nana ɔɔ nyaai. Kɛlɛ mua maa pelenaa paabaa nhanwa nana aigɔ nyaai nhaa guna bɛɛ.
46009026	Faa nwɛɛe ni binhɛ na ngaa pele ngukoko lɔ mba. Ngai bɔtaali aa loi ma ɛɛ nuu aa gɛ aa hɛfɛ kpanhindaa.
46009027	K`angi lugu na gbanhi gbanhi, awa k`angi gbɛndɛ ngɔ, awa k`angi pele ngaa ni lua, kangaa nhuna Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa ngaa gɛ kɛ ngɔ aa ningaa lagbitia, nya gbɔha na ngɛɛ gɛ gbahai.
46010001	Ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa, ngɔi lɔ nyaa wu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa mi bembaa i ngɔɔ bɛɛ feenaa na nwanhu gbeenjaa nau nwɛɛɔ tee na, awa tua bɛɛ kati leenga kpolo ya na nwa napangaa Nja Gbɔu Gbɔu na.
46010002	Kualaa feenaa na le ngoo ka kualaa Nja Gbɔu Gbɔu na le, kɛɛ belenga ɛɛ kati Ngebɔ ua hɔlɔa kangaa ti bele ngaa Moosisi bou belaa.
46010003	Awa tua bɛɛ kati yinayaa nwɛnhɛi na nwɛa,
46010004	awa tua bɛɛ kati yinayaa ya na gbɔɛa, gbaa tee kpɔɛa kualaa faha nhu nana yinayaa gee leɔ. Awa faha na siina Kilaisi gbɔha na nwɛɔ.
46010005	Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, ti gbinhi ɔɔ Ngebɔ goonhu ai nɛɛiɔ ti nwa, awae kɛɛ pelenga ti haa hɔlɔa mɛɛ qɛa bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
46010006	Chaanngi nhu nhanda nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ ndaanhii mɛ mi nhanwa, kangaa amɛɛ nhanda nyɔu ɔi ɛɛ tua ti peleni,
46010007	awa awɛɛ bele ngaa ningaa natiini taa ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa batou ɛɛ tua ti lɛingaa ti peleniɔ. Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Ka ningaa i ti heia mɛnhɛi nwɛ ma, kati ndɔɔ gbɔɛa, awa kati huua ti kpɛa guaa."
46010008	Amɛɛ ɔa ndo siandaa nhu ɛɛ ti lɛingaa i ti peleniɔ, awa kati haaaɔ ti wuulu buu fee i manhu chawa aa foo ila na.
46010009	Amɛɛ Maliki na bu nhua ma ɛɛ ti lɛingaa i ti peleniɔ, awa ka kaaia i ti ti baaa.
46010010	Inaile amɛɛ gɔɔ nhu yia ɛɛ ti lɛingaa i ti peleniɔ, awa ka Ndɛɛhu Gbau Maleka na i ti baaa.
46010011	Nhanda indinɛi i bele peleniɔ kuague mɛɛɔ ningaa lagbitia nhanwa, awa ti kpaaliia kangaa i mi laanhii mua na mai lɛ haai nhuna ngelou na aa ba kpelenwaa.
46010012	Faa nwɛɛe nuu na nana aa nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa alaa loni nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, i lo ngɔ gbatɛa kangaa ai ba gula.
46010013	Nhua ngai lɛ wu nwaaleiiɔ nana ai lɛ beleniɔ aa nuu. Awa kina Ngebɔ aa ngi nɛɛnwaa lo na laa fenaa, aigɔ pele nhua ngaa wu nwaai nana tee ngɔ wu nhu gbɛndɛnjaa na nwa. Kɛlɛ nhuna nhua ngaa wu nwaai, Ngebɔ ɔɔ wu gua pele gbatɛa, kangaa wu ku nhua na siina nwa.
46010014	Faa nwɛɛe wua nya lo ngɔi aa wuee, a loko guaa ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa i mbatoundaa nhu.
46010015	Ngi yɛpɛ wuee ɛɛ nhu lo mbelaa, awae a nɛɛnwaa siaa nana nwa ngaa kɛ.
46010016	Tɔɔmbila na nana aa gɛ mi eya Maliki na gbele mba nwɛnhɛi na nwɛ ma, nana maa fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa fanwa, nhuna maa nhai gbɔɛ nhu, ee Kilaisi qanwa na aile maa hɔlɔ? Awa lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nana maa nhu aai, nhuna maa mɛ, ee Kilaisi lugu na aile maa hɔlɔ?
46010017	Kina lɛgɛ gbɛnha ila mɛɛ i na, mua mi gbinhi ɔ na ndugu ila mɛɛ aa muee, gbaa mua nwɛ maa lɛgɛ gbɛnha ila na siina hɔlɔ.
46010018	A nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlalɛ baa Iisilɛlia i ma. Ee natiini taa nana nwɛ kua ngɔ na aa chaaga, tua aile taa gula natiini ma taa chaaga na guamaa na nwaa enge na bele?
46010019	Gbɛɛ ngi ma nha, ee kɛɛlaa nwɛ nhai na nana taa kua aa chaaga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le kolo ɔ, inaile ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔ golo ɔ?
46010020	Ala aile hali! Kɛlɛ nana ngi ma ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, nhaanhaa i Kpitia i taa ti gua aa chaaga, ngafɔngaa le mɛ taa chaaga na siina gua na, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ le ngaile taa kua na. Awa kpala ngai nyaa wu gula natiini ma taa indinɛi bele pele ngafɔngaa le.
46010021	Waigɔ ndɔɔ gbɔɛ Maliki na lɔɔmbila na nhu wu bote boma wu kpɔɛ ngafɔngaa i ti lɔɔmbila na nhu. Waigɔ mɛnhɛi nwɛ Maliki na bɛtɛ na nwa wu bote boma wu mɛ ngafɔngaa i ti nda bɛtɛ na nwa.
46010022	Ee ndapi nwɛɛ maa lapi kangaa mi pele Maliki na i lolo? Ee mi gaanhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ tee ngɔ alaa?
46010023	"Fɛɛlɛ he ngɔ muɛɛ aa gbɛ o gbɛ belendaa," ɛɛ ningaa taa kɛ, kɛlɛ gbɛ o gbɛ aile kpɔmbayaa ɔ mi nhanwa. "Fɛɛlɛ he ngɔ muɛɛ aa gbɛ o gbɛ belendaa," kɛlɛ gbɛ o gbɛ aile aa pele nuu laanɛɛ nhu gbɛndɛndaa aa nwaa lo.
46010024	Nuu ɛɛ kpekpenjaa gɔli gbɔha nhanwa, kɛlɛ i kɔlia ala gbɛlaa nwɔɔ na nhanwa.
46010025	Nhai o nhai nana taa maa sia nhua nwaa sia njɔpɔwaa na nhu, a mɛa, awɛɛ gula mɔɔli pelendaa nhu nana nhanwa wu nɛgili gbekpe na aa kɛ aa wuee fanwa.
46010026	Gbaa pɔlɔgɔɔ na ka nana bɛɛ i nhu Maliki na bo mɛɛ aa tuee.
46010027	Ina laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa i ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ ngila kee aa ui wuaa mɛnhɛi nwɛ ma, awa woo kuunnga aa ndiilaa, nana bɛɛ aa hei wu ɔgɔu mɛndaa nhanwa, a mɛa, awa awɛɛ gula mɔɔli pelendaa nhu nana nhanwa wu nɛɛnwaa na aa kɛ aa wuee fanwa.
46010028	Kɛlɛ ina nuu aa gɛ wu nwa, "Indinɛi nhua nwɛɛ nana ti kuai aa chaaga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le." Awɛɛ mɛ nuu na lɔgɔ fanwa nana i kɛi aa wuee awa tii nana nhanwa o ala nɛɛnwaa na aa kɛ fanwa.
46010029	Nana ngi ma ala nwɛ aa nana ngi nda nɛɛnwaa na ɔɔ kɛ fanwa, kɛlɛ nana aile wu nda nɛɛnwaa na ɔɔ kɛ fanwa. Gbaa nuu lagbiti aa gɛa, "Gbɔɔ nuu lagbiti aa nya nhanda baambayaa gbele pele nhu?
46010030	Ina ngaa fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa nana nhanwa ngaa mɛ, gbɔɔ nuu lagbiti aa nya guugua mba nana nhanwa ngaa fiɛ gua?"
46010031	Awae nhuna waa gbɛ o gbɛ nwɛ, inaile wu gbɛ o gbɛ gbɔɛ, inaile nana bɛɛ waa pele, a pelena bɛɛ mbɛɛ gɛndaa nhanwa Ngebɔa.
46010032	Awɛɛ fagɔli kɔli Yuua i ma, inaile Gilikia i, inaile laanɛɛ belaa i aa Ngebɔ.
46010033	Ɛɛ gbo nya gbɔnhu ngaa lapi aa ningaa i koonhu nɛɛndaa bɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu bɛɛ, nya nda qaniyaa aile ngaa ngɔɛ ɔɛe kɛlɛ ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti qaniyaa nwɛ, kangaa ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔ.
46011001	A hitɛa nya ɔgɔbo nhu ɛɛ nya ngaa hitɛ Kilaisi ɔgɔbo nhu.
46011002	Ngi wu bihɛ gbɛnhaile k`awu nɛgili aa nge gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu, awa k`awu hitɛ nagɔli na bou nwa nana ngi peleni aa wuee.
46011003	Kɛlɛ kpala tɔ nyaa wu nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi alɛɛ ngukoko nwɔɔ na aa ala kɛgɛi ngoo kɛgɛi nhanwa, awa kɛgɛi na ala nwɛ ngukoko nwɔɔ na aa ala njie na nhanwa, awa Ngebɔ ala nwɛ ngukoko nwɔɔ na aa ala Kilaisi nhanwa.
46011004	Awae kɛgɛi ngoo kɛgɛi nana aa nhai bɛɛ umbaa nhuna aa gɛ aa laaminɛ belendaa, inaile aa gɛ aa ngoolee kɛndaa nana i guai Ngebɔ le, oo mbɛɛ baaa ala ukoko nwɔɔ naa.
46011005	Awa njie ngoo njie nana aa umbaa haka lo nhuna aa gɛ aa laaminɛ belendaa, inaile aa gɛ aa ngoolee kɛndaa nana i guai Ngebɔ le, oo mbɛɛ baaa ala ukoko nwɔɔ naa. Gbaa ɔɔ belenaa gbo ɛɛ njie na nana ngumbaa gbue ngɔ.
46011006	Gbaa ina njie na aigɔ umbaa na gbibi, i pelena ti ngu na gbue ala umbaa. Kɛlɛ ina aa bele ngaa mbɛɛ baa mba nhanda nwɛ nhuna taa ngu kpue njie ngumbaa, inaile taa ngɛa ma ngumbaa bɛɛ, i umbaa na gbibia nha.
46011007	Fɛɛlɛ ai na nana fe ngɔ kɛgɛi mbɛ aa kɛɛlaa i nhai bɛɛ umbaa, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ guague mɛ aa ala, awa Ngebɔ bɛɛyaa na guague mɛ aa ala. Kɛlɛ njie na ala kɛgɛi na bɛɛyaa na nwɛ.
46011008	Gbaa Ngebɔ ai kɛgɛi kpatɛi kualaa njie nhu, kɛlɛ njie na nwɛ i kpatɛi kualaa kɛgɛi na nhu.
46011009	Gbaa tɔmbaga nwɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ai kɛgɛi kpatɛi njie lɔgɔ fanwa, kɛlɛ njie tɔ i kpatɛi kɛgɛi lɔgɔ fanwa.
46011010	Faa nwɛɛe malekaa i fanwa, njie na kaa umbaa na gbibi nhuna aa gɛ aa laaminɛ belendaa. Umbaa na gbibindaa na nwɛ aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa alaa kɛgɛi na fɔha nau.
46011011	Na nhu bɛɛ, mi hounwayaa na nhu Maliki na nhu, kɛgɛi na ai lo njie ngai mba, awa njie na ai lo kɛgɛi ngai mba.
46011012	Gbaa ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i njie na gbatɛi kualaa kɛgɛi na nhu, ngemɛɛ pa gbɔnhu aa kɛgɛi na njie tɔ aa ala le, awa indinɛi bɛɛ kua ɔ Ngebɔ le.
46011013	A nɛɛnwaa siaa indinɛi nwa aa gbɔha. Ee tee nhanda nwɛ njie na nhanwa aa laaminɛ Ngebɔ le aa umbaa haka?
46011014	Ee nuu gbɔhayaa na gbɔha na bɛnhɛ kpei ai wu nagɔli ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa ina kɛgɛi na aa ngu tɔmbɔ lo umbaa aa mbɛɛ baaa alaa,
46011015	kɛlɛ ina njie na aa ngu kpinhi gbinhi lo umbaa mbɛɛ nwɛɛ ala le? Ngebɔ i ngu nana ɔaia ngeya ngi umbaa gbibi nhanwa.
46011016	Kɛlɛ ina nuu o nuu aa gɛ ɔɔ tonga pele fanwa, tɔɛ na bɛɛ kɛndaa i nya eya ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa i bele ngaa nua, inaile laanɛɛ belaa i aa Ngebɔ, nhanda lagbiti ai na ni eya batou nhu.
46011017	Ngi baa ba ngaa indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛ aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa, ngai wu bihɛie gbenhaile wu aa lɔgɔ na waa pele batou na nwa nhanda gbekpe faa aile, kɛlɛ nana nhaa nwɛɛ nyɔu ɔ na.
46011018	Pɛnhɛɛmaa na, ngoo mɛingaa aa kɛɛlaa nhuna waa aa lɔgɔ batou na nwa, wu loganhu bai bai ɔ. Awa kaka lɛingaa nya laanɛɛ ɔ tɔmbaga nwɛɛ.
46011019	Indinɛi nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ ngai mba aa kɛɛlaa k`a ndoganhu bai bai aa gɛ wu loganhu, kangaa natiini ti tee nhanda na nhu, ningaa ti ba ti gɔɔ.
46011020	Nhuna waa aa lɔgɔ batou na nwa, Maliki na Gbele mba Nwɛnhɛi na nwɛndaa nhaile gbo.
46011021	Gbaa mɛnhɛi na nwɛ ma, ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ kɛɛ nhumbu aa ngi nda nwɛnhɛi na nwɛ lagbitia i mba, awa ndɔɛ ɔɔ gɛa naa awa na i gɛ ndɔɔ hou nhu.
46011022	Gbɔɔ, ee wuee pɛlɛ laa ai na mɛɛna waa mɛnhɛi nwɛ na wu ndɔɔ gbɔɛ na? Inaile ee wu au bii laanɛɛ belaa i manhu aa Ngebɔ, awa wu natiini ngaa ufe nhai ai ti eya? Ngɔ gɛ gbɛ wu nwa? Ee ngi ba wu bihɛ? Hali, ngaigɔ wu bihɛ indinɛi nhu.
46011023	Gbaa Maliki na le naa nwɛɛ ngi nana hɔlɔi na ngi wu nagɔlii la aa kɛɛlaa, aa kpindi na ti Maliki na Yisɔsi nwaa siai, kɛɛ lɛgɛ gbɛnha gbaunga,
46011024	awa nhuna i fiɛ guai Ngebɔ nwa fanwa, kɛɛ nhu aai aaia, awa kɛɛ gɛa, "Indinɛi nya lugu na nwɛ nana i na wu nhanwa. A indinɛi belena nɛgililaa nhanwa aa nge."
46011025	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, nhuna ti bilani aa gbele mba nwɛnhɛi na nwɛndaa, kɛɛ tɔɔmbila na gbaunga awa kɛɛ gɛa, "Tɔɔmbila indinɛi ngilimayaa nyiɛ na nwɛ nana kpatɛ ngɔ aa nya qanwa na. Gbee na bɛɛ waa kpɔɛ, wu pele nɛgililaa nhanwa aa nge."
46011026	Aa gbee na bɛɛ waa lɛgɛ gbɛnha indinɛi nwɛ awa waa ndɔɔ na gbɔɛ tɔɔmbila indinɛi nhu, wua waa kɛ Maliki na i gee haai, nhaa i ba boma.
46011027	Faa nwɛɛe nuu o nuu nana aa Maliki na lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛ inaile aa ndɔɔ na gbɔɛ Maliki na lɔɔmbila na nhu aa pele na nana aa mbɛɛ nyaai la alaa, ɔɔ gɛa lɛɛi nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhanwa aa Maliki na lugu na ka ngi qanwa na.
46011028	Awae k`a nuu o nuu aa gbɔha na gbɛngbɛ pɛnhɛɛ yeingaa i gilaa lɛgɛ gbɛnha na nwɛ awa i gilaa ndɔɔ gbɔɛ tɔɔmbila na nhu.
46011029	Gbaa nuu o nuu nana aa lɛgɛ gbɛnha nana nwɛ i bote boma i maa lɔɔ na gbɔɛ, poungaa na siina ai nɛgilii aa Maliki na lugu na, maa nwɔɔ na siina oo lɛgɛ gbɛnha nwɛa awa oo ndɔɔ gbɔɛa nana ɔɔ ba aa kɔhɔ ala gbɔha na nwa.
46011030	Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ ti gbinhi ɔ wu liiya ti gaanhu haa ɔ awa ti hegbɛ ɔ, awa lɛingaa too haaa.
46011031	Kɛlɛ ina maa gbɔha gbɛngbɛ aa ngi bele, Ngebɔ aigɔ mi gɔhɔ.
46011032	Kɛlɛ nhuna Ngebɔ aa mi gbɛngbɛ, Maliki na oo mi gbɔɔnia, kangaa tai ba mi gbɔɔni guna ngilamaaa tii natiini ngoo ti ngelou na nwaa nhanda nhu.
46011033	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, nhuna waa aa lɔgɔ ngilamaaa Maliki na Gbele mba Nwɛnhɛi na nwɛ ma, a nwaa golo nwaa goloa!
46011034	Ina ndɔɛ aa gɛ nuua, i mɛnhɛi nwɛa ngi bɛlɛ na la, kangaa wu aa lɔgɔ na aigɔ ba wu nwa aa kɔhɔ. Awa nhanda nhanda lagbiti nana i loa, ngɔɔ ndaalaaa mba nhuna ngaa ba.
46012001	Nya ndegea, chaanngi nhu kpala tɔ nyaa kangaa wu Yina na hembɛ hembɛ na nwaa nhanda gɔɔ.
46012002	Wu nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhuna laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa i ngaa wueeɔ, ka ningaa lagbitia ti wu gakanga kangaa wu laanɛɛ aa bobo lɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa, kɛlɛ aa pele o pele too wu gakanga.
46012003	Kpala tɔ nyaa wu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nuu ai na nana Ngebɔ Yina na aa sia aa ala aa Yisɔsi laangaa. Awa nuu aigɔ gɛ, "Yisɔsi Maliki nwɛ," k`a nuu nwɛɛ nana Ngebɔ Yina na aa gɛ ala nhu, alɛɛ aa kɛ.
46012004	Chaanngi nhu fembɛ gɛbɛlɛ lɔ na, kɛlɛ Yina ila na nwɛ aa fee hee.
46012005	Awa pele gɛbɛlɛ gɛbɛlɛ lɔ na nana nuu aa enge la, kɛlɛ Maliki ila na nwɛ ningaa taa enge mbɛ.
46012006	Ngenge gɛbɛlɛ gɛbɛlɛ lɔ na, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ ila na nwɛ nana aa gbɛ o gbɛ na enge ningaa nhu bɛɛ.
46012007	Yina na aa gbɔha na lɔgɔɔunaa aa pele lɛingaa nuu o nuu nhu kangaa tua bɛɛ ti kpɔ mba hɔlɔ.
46012008	Yina na alɛɛ aa fɔha na ɔa nuu eya kangaa i nhu lo njia gɛ, awa nuu lagbiti le, Yina ila na siina aa fɔha na ɔaa ala eya nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa kɔɔnjaa lɔ ala eya kualaa Ngebɔ le.
46012009	Nuu lagbiti le, Yina na i laanɛɛ ɔa ala eya, awa nuu lagbiti le, Yina na i fɔha ɔa ala eya ningaa gɛndɛndaa nhanwa.
46012010	Nuu lagbiti le, Yina na i fɔha na ɔa ala eya kamaa nhanda bele pelendaa nhanwa. Awa nuu lagbiti le, yinaa loganhu gɔɔndaa. Awa nuu lagbiti le, maa nwɔɔ na aa yiaa nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, awa nuu lagbiti le, Yina na aa pelenaa i fɔha hɔlɔ aa nana nhu gbagandaa nuu aa kɛ nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu.
46012011	Kɛlɛ Yina ila mɛɛ awa Yina ila na siina nwɛ aa nhanda indinɛi bele bɛɛ, awa aa fembɛ gɛbɛlɛ ɔa ɔa ningaa eya ndi ɔ aa ngi guunmayaa na lepele.
46012012	Ɛɛ gbo ndugu na i ila na awa kpapi gbinhi gbinhi lɔ mba, awa kpapi na bɛɛ i ndugu naa, hali kpinhi ɔ, kɛlɛ ndugu ila mɛɛ. Awa ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu Kilaisi i na.
46012013	Aa Yina ila lepele mua bɛɛ, wu bele ngaa Yuua inaile Gilikia, wu bele ngaa nduaa inaile nhanda baamba belaa, tuaa Ngebɔ ua bele ngɔ aa muee ndugu ila nhu, awa ka Ngebɔ i pelenga mua bɛɛ kami Yina ila kpɔɛa.
46012014	Gbaa ndugu na kpapi ila ngaile i mbae kɛlɛ kpapi gbinhi gbinhi nwɛ i mba.
46012015	Ina kpala na aa gɛ, "Kina toko aile aa nge, faa nwɛɛe kpapi aile aa nge ndugu naa," na aigɔ ala bɛndi aa ala belendaa aa kpapi ndugu na nhanwa.
46012016	Awa ina ngou na aa gɛ, "Kina ngau aile aa nge, faa nwɛɛe kpapi aile aa nge ndugu naa," na aigɔ ala bɛndi aa ala belendaa aa kpapi ndugu na nhanwa.
46012017	Ina ndugu gbɔha na i ba bele ngaa ngau gbo, i ba gee ku i nhaanhaa gu ku?
46012018	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu kpapi na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ Ngebɔ oo pɛɛa ndugu naa, ɛɛ gbo kpala ngi alaa i bele nda.
46012019	Ina indinɛi bɛɛ i belenia aa kpapi ila, mii nwɛ ndugu na i ba gɛ na?
46012020	Ɛɛ i na gbo, kpapi gbinhi gbinhi lɔ na, kɛlɛ ndugu ila mɛɛ.
46012021	Awae ngau na aigɔ gɛ toko na nwa, "Bi bele ngai nyaa!" Inaile ngukoko na aigɔ gɛ kpala na nwa, "Bi bele ngai nyaa!"
46012022	Maa kpau ngaa kpapi lagbiti na, kpapi na nana bɛɛ maa nɛgili la ndugu naa aa kɛɛlaa njaaiyaai ɔ, kpapi na siina mai ku maa gbɛ o gbɛ bele poma,
46012023	awa kpapi na nana maa nɛgili la aa kɛɛlaa kolo ai luu nhu, maa gee na nwɛ maa hou aa manhu gbeenjaa bombou mbaa, awa kpapi na i muaa nana ai guai kpou, k`ami hou aa manhu gbee kpekpe tee ngɔ lagbitia i mba,
46012024	nhuna kpapi na nana nyande ngɔ lee ngɔ na manhu gbee na siina gbala ngai mba. Ngebɔ gbɔha na oo ndugu na bu ngilamaaa aa pele na nana ningaa taa mbɛɛ bombou mbaa he la kpapi naɛ nana mbɛɛ gbala ngi mba.
46012025	Awae ndoganhu bai bai ɛɛ gɛ na ndugu na nhu, kɛlɛ kpapi gɛbɛlɛ na bɛɛ ti gɛ nwaa nhanda nhu loganhu.
46012026	Ina kpapi ila ndugu naa aa yɔgɔlɔ, kpapi lagbiti nana bɛɛ ɔɔ maa yɔgɔlɔ belenaa. Awa ina ngila kee aa mbihɛ hɔlɔ, kpapi lagbiti na bɛɛ ɔɔ maa goonhu nɛɛ belenaa.
46012027	Chaanngi nhu wua Kilaisi lugu na nwɛ aa wuee, awa kpapi nwɛ aa wuee alaa aa ngila ngila.
46012028	Awa laanɛɛ belaa i nhu Ngebɔ lɔ tomaa lɔgɔɔu ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ na. Pɛnhɛɛmaa na nwɛ aa to mbelaa i, fee na nwɛ aa Ngebɔ letua i, awa chawa na nwɛ aa ningaa nagɔli mbelaa i. Aa leenga, natiini taa kamaa nhanda bele pele, ka natiini ti fɔha na ɔa ngɔ na ti eya ningaa gɛndɛndaa nhanwa, ka natiini taa kpɔ mba bele ngaa ningaa, ka natiini taa ngenge na nwanhu gbee, awa natiini tɔ na boma taa yɛpɛ nde kɛbɛlɛ gɛbɛlɛ nhu.
46012029	Ee tua bɛɛ to mbelaa nwɛ aa tuee? Ee Ngebɔ letua nwɛ aa tuee bɛɛ? Ee ningaa nagɔli mbelaa nwɛ aa tuee bɛɛ? Ee tua nwɛ bɛɛ taa kamaa nhanda bele pele?
46012030	Ee tua nwɛ bɛɛ fɔha tuaa ningaa gɛndɛndaa nhanwa? Ee tua nwɛ bɛɛ taa yia nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu? Inaile ee tua nwɛ bɛɛ ti ku ngɔ taa nana nhu huo fuo ningaa taa kɛ nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu?
46012031	Kɛlɛ a lii na bua nha fembɛ na nhu nana kolo ɔ lee ngɔ. Awa ngɔɔ gɛa nha aa pele gbekpe ndɔgɔɔundaa aa wuee nana tee ngɔ bɛɛ.
46013001	Ina ngaa yɛpɛ nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu awa ngi malekaa ti laa yia gɛ bɛnhɛ, kɛlɛ ina ndomayaa ai gɛi nya eya, ni yɛpɛ na ɔɔ belenaa gbo ɛɛ taa gɛ aa laalo gbanhindaa inaile taa gɛ aa kɔu gbɛngɛ gbɛngɛ gbanhindaa.
46013002	Awa ina fembɛ aa gɛ nya eya ngoolee kɛndaa nhanwa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, awa ngi gɛ Ngebɔ lɔmbaga gbundu na gɔɔ ngɔ bɛɛ, awa ngi gɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na gɔɔ ngɔ, awa ina laanɛɛ na bɛɛ alaa nya nhu nana aa pele ngi ku ngaa njie mbaa waa gbue kpuendaa, kɛlɛ ina ndomayaa ai gɛi nya eya, gbɛ o gbɛ aile aa nge.
46013003	Hali nana bɛɛ i nya eya ngi fe ningaaɛ, awa hali ngi nya lugu na gɔan kangaa ti mɔ, kɛlɛ ina ndomayaa ai gɛi nya eya, ngaigɔ maa qaniyaa hɔlɔ.
46013004	Ndomayaa ala nwɛ aa ndii lo ka nhanda banda. Kɛlɛ ndomayaa ala aile aa tolo. Ndomayaa ai yonga lee, awa ndomayaa ngaunwaa lɛ aile.
46013005	Ndomayaa ai sɔ kpɔlɔ bele, inaile ai fɔɔndiyaa bele, inaile ai nhanda bele nana aa pele nuu aa gbaai, ndomayaa ai na kpaai mba nwakɛndaa nhanwa nɛɛnwaa.
46013006	Ndomayaa ai goonhu nɛɛ nhanda nyɔu nwa, kɛlɛ aa goonhu nɛɛa tɔmbaga nwa.
46013007	Ndomayaa ndii lo ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛ nau, ndaanɛɛ ɔ aa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ, nɛɛnwaa la ɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu, awa ku ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na nwa.
46013008	Ndomayaa ai gbele, kɛlɛ ina fembɛ lɔ na ngoolee kɛndaa nhanwa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, ngaa ɔɔ loa. Ina fembɛ lɔ na nana aa pele ningaa taa yia nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, ngaa ɔɔ loa. Fembɛ na nana i na kɔɔnjaa nhanwa, ngaa ɔɔ loa.
46013009	Gbaa mi gɔɔnjaa na nhu, kpapi nwɛ mi kɔɔ ngɔ mba, awa ngoolee na gɛndaa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, kpapi nwɛ maa kɛ.
46013010	Kɛlɛ nhuna nana aa gɛ hitii nhu aa ba, nana ai gɛi hitii nhu maa nhanda na ngaa ɔɔ loa.
46013011	Nhuna ngee ndou goloyaa na nhu, ngee yɛpɛa ɛɛ ndou golo, ngi nɛgili ɛɛ ndou golo, ngi ndaalaa bele ɛɛ ndou golo. Kɛlɛ nhuna ngi hitii chondegeyaa nhu, kangi gbenga ndou goloyaa bele naa.
46013012	Gbaa chaanngi nhu pele ngɔ ɛɛ maa gbɔha lɔ mɛɛmunɛ nhu biti biti, kɛlɛ pae a mɔɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na lɔa chanhai. Nana ngi kɔɔ ngɔ chaanngi nhu kpapi nwɛ gbo, kɛlɛ pae ngɔɔ kɔɔnaa hiti ɔ nhu, ɛɛ gbo nya gbɔnhu Ngebɔ i nya gɔɔ ngɔ hiti ɔ nhu.
46013013	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu nhanda chawa ngindinɛi lɔ na, laanɛɛ o, nɛɛnwaa la o, ka ndomayaa. Awa nana mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ nhanda chawa ngindinɛi liiya ala nwɛ aa ndomayaa.
46014001	A ndomayaa belena aa nhai nana waa ngaa nɛkɛ, ngɔi waa i gɛa wuaa aa Yina na hembɛ hembɛ na hɔlɔ hɔlɔndaa, eengaa tɔ bɛnhɛ aa fembɛ na nana aa pele waa ngoolee na gɛ nana aa gua Ngebɔ le.
46014002	Gbaa nuu na nana aa yia nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu ningaa gbɔhaa le ngaile aa yɛpɛ nae kɛlɛ Ngebɔ le mɛ aa yɛpɛ na, gbɛnhaile nuu ai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ nanaa aa kɛ, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ lɔmbaga gbundu na nana Yina na aa ndɔgɔɔu nda ala nwɛ aa kɛ.
46014003	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa ngoolee kɛ nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, njɛpɛ nwɛɛ aa yɛpɛ ningaa le kpɔndaa nhanwa tuaa kangaa ti laanɛɛ na i gbɛa, ti ndii gbɛndɛ hɔlɔ, awa tii ti lɔɔndɔɔndaa o.
46014004	Nuu na nana aa yɛpɛ nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu gbɔha na nwɛ gbo aa gbɔ mba, kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa ngoolee kɛ nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, maa nwɔɔ na oo gbɔnga laanɛɛ belaa gbɔha i mba.
46014005	Chaanngi nhu nya lo ngɔ la i ba gɛɛ wua bɛɛ wu yia nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, kɛlɛ hali bɛnhɛ nya lo ngɔ la wu ngoolee kɛ nana aa gua Ngebɔ le. Gbaa nuu na nana aa ngoolee kɛ nana aa gua Ngebɔ le ala bombou ngɔ lee ngɔ nuu naa nana aa yia nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, k`a nuu nwɛɛ aa gɛ na nana aa nana nhu huo fuo i kɛi kangaa laanɛɛ belaa i ti ba kpɔ mba hɔlɔ nhu.
46014006	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, ina ngaa ba wuee aa yia nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, ngɔɔ gee gbɔ wuaa, k`a kɛɛ nwɛɛ ngaa nana gɛ aa wuee Ngebɔ i kɛa aa nge, inaile kualaa nana nhu ngi kɔɔ ngɔ, inaile ɛɛ ngoolee kɛndaa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, inaile ɛɛ ningaa nagɔlindaa?
46014007	Kɛlɛ hali bɛnhɛ kuayaa nhaanhaa i aa kɛɛlaa ndɛɛhu ai ti nhu, i bele bɛnhɛ aa ndogo inaile bondoma, ina tai ngaii inaile tai fɛi aa ngi bele, nuu ɔɔ gee kili gili na gɔɔ taa fɛ ndogo na nhu inaile taa ngai bondoma na nhu?
46014008	Awa ina aa bele ngaa fueu na ngoo na nwaa ai gɛi ɛai, ele nwɛ ɔɔ nwaa gbatɛ kɔɔ nhanwa?
46014009	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa wuee, ina wai yɛpɛi maa ɛa ɔ aa pele na nana nuu aa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ la mba, nuu o nuu ɔɔ gee nana gɔɔ waa kɛ? Gbaa wu yia na hɛfɛ nhu lɔ ɔɔ lo na.
46014010	Nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nde kɛbɛlɛ gbinhi gbinhi lɔ na ngelou i nhu, awa ai na nana nhunhaa ai mba.
46014011	Ina nuu aa yia nde nhu nana ngai nhunhaa gɔɔ, nuu na i kɛi ngaa tɔa gbo ɛɛ hota, awa nya bɛnhɛ ngɔɔ belenaa ngaunwaa aa hota.
46014012	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa wuee, kina ngɔi lɔ wuaa nja lee ngɔnhu wu Yina na hembɛ hembɛ na hɔlɔ, a gɛa maa lapi nhu tee ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛa kangaa fembɛ hembɛ na nana aa pele laanɛɛ belaa i ti laanɛɛ na aa gbɛa, wu pu ngeyaabele mbombou mbaa nhu.
46014013	Faa nwɛɛe nuu na nana aa yia nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, maa nwɔɔ na i laaminɛa kangaa i ku i nana nhu huo fuo aa kɛ.
46014014	Gbaa ina ngaa laaminɛ nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, nya luu na i laaminɛ, kɛlɛ nya nɛɛnwaa na ai na.
46014015	k`a gbɛɛ nha ngɔɔ pele? Ngɔɔ laaminɛa aa nya luu na, kɛlɛ ngɔɔ laaminɛa boma aa nya nɛɛnwaa na. Ngɔɔ ngue aainaa aa nya luu na, awa ngɔɔ ngue aainaa boma aa nya nɛɛnwaa na.
46014016	Ina na aile pa, ina waa fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa aa wu luu na gbo kpɛti, ningaa i natiini tai fembɛ na hɔlɔi, nuu na nana aa gɛ hei na ti nda heinwaa na ɔɔ gee gɛ mɛɛ bi hiɛ na nwa ba kua, "Kangaa i bele" kina ai nana gɔɔ ngɔ baa kɛ? Gbaa tɔmbaga nwɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa bia baa fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa, kɛlɛ ai gbɔni nuu lagbiti naa hali.
46014017	Hali nha ina bi laaminɛ na Ngebɔ le i gɛ gbekpeni pandaa, ai gbɔni nuu lagbiti naa hali.
46014018	Ngi fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa aa kɛɛlaa k`angi yia nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu tee ngɔ wuaa bɛɛ.
46014019	Kɛlɛ laanɛɛ belaa i ngee, maa nhiɛ ɔ nya nhanwa ina ngaa njia lɔɔu kɛ na nana taa ku taa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba, kangaa ngi lagbitia nagɔli la, tee ngɔ bɛnhɛ ngaa njia wuulu puu kɛ nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu.
46014020	Nya ndegea, awɛɛ bele ɛɛ ndengaa wu nɛgili ɔ na nhu. A gɛa leoni nhanda nyɔu nhu ɛɛ ndengaa lalaa, kɛlɛ a gɛa chondegeyaai wu nɛgili ɔ na nhu.
46014021	Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Maliki na ɛgɛe Aa ningaa i nhu bele natiini taa yia nde kɛbɛlɛ gɛbɛlɛ nhu, ngɔɔ yɛpɛa nya nda ningaa i ngee. Ngɔɔ yɛpɛa tuee a hotangaa i ti laa na nhu bele, kɛlɛ hali na, ningaa indiini taigɔ oo nhɛɛ nya nwa."
46014022	Faa nwɛɛ pae njia gɛndaa nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu kuague mɛɛ laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa i fanwa kɛlɛ natiini faa aile ti laanɛɛ ɔ na. Kɛlɛ ngoolee kɛndaa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le ala na kuague mɛɛ natiini fanwa ti laanɛɛ ɔ na, kɛlɛ natiini faa aile ti laanɛɛ gbaha mba ɔ na.
46014023	Awa chaanngi nhu ɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa gbɔhaa i taa aa lɔgɔ ngilamaaa awa tua bɛɛ k`ati yia nde kɛbɛlɛ gɛbɛlɛ nhu, ina natiini maa hembɛ na ai ti eya inaile laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa taa ɔa na, ee taigɔ gɛ woo belenga aa mɔu belaa?
46014024	Kɛlɛ ina wua bɛɛ waa gɛ aa ngoolee na gɛndaa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, awa nhuna laanɛɛ gbahamba nwɔɔ inaile nuu na nana maa hembɛ na ai ngeya aa ɔa na, indinɛi ɔɔ pelenaa i gua ngi nhanda nyɔu na nwa bɛɛ, awa ɔɔ ala gɔhɔnaa bɛɛ.
46014025	Ngi gbundu nhu nɛgili na ɔɔ guaa kpou, awa ɔɔ aa bɛɛa i Ngebɔ batou, awa ɔɔ gɛa, "Aa tɔmbaga Ngebɔ alaa wu liiya."
46014026	Ni ndegea, ngigbɛɛ wɔɔ pele? Nhuna waa aa lɔgɔ batou na nwa, ngila mɔɔ nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa ngue, lagbiti na nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa ningaa nagɔlindaa, lagbiti na nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa Ngebɔ lɔmbaga gbundu na lɔgɔɔundaa, lagbiti na nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa njia gɛndaa nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, awa lagbiti na nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa maa oo na nhu huo fuondaa. A indinɛi bele pelena kangaa i ba gbɔ wu laanɛɛ naa i gbɛa.
46014027	Ina nuu yialaa lɔ na nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu, ti gɛa gbo fee inaile ti gbinhilaa na i gbelea chawa ma tua nwɛ taa yia aa ngila ngila, awa nuu lagbiti i nana nhu huo fuona taa kɛɛ gɛɛ.
46014028	Kɛlɛ ina aa bele ngaa nuu ai na nana aa nhu huo fuo, ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ ɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ gɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i, kɛlɛ i yɛpɛa gbo ala gbɔha na le awa ka Ngebɔ le.
46014029	Ngebɔ letua feengaa inaile ti chawa ti ngoolee na gɛa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, awa lagbitia ti nana gbɛngbɛa pandaa taa kɛ.
46014030	Kɛlɛ ina Ngebɔ aa ngi lɔmbaga gbundu na lɔgɔɔu ngaa nuu lagbiti na aa gɛ heei, pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na nha aa yɛpɛ kaa londo.
46014031	Wua bɛɛ waa ngoolee na gɛa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le aa ngila ngila kangaa nuu o nuu i nagɔli hɔlɔ awa ala lii gbɛndɛ.
46014032	Ningaa i natiini ti hembɛ na nwɛ aa ngoolee na gɛndaa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, kataa ti hembɛ na hou ngɔ nwanhu gbee,
46014033	gbaa Ngebɔ, yogobee Ngebɔ aile aa ala kɛlɛ maa lɛi Eebɔ nwɛ. Awa ɛɛ Ngebɔ ndaa i ti batou ngaa lɔgɔ na nhu bɛɛ,
46014034	njiengaa i kataa londo nhuna taa gɛ batou ngaa lɔgɔ na nhu, gbɛnhaile Yuua i ti Sɔ na ai fɛɛlɛ he ngɔ tuɛɛ kangaa ti yɛpɛ na, kɛlɛ ɛgɛ kataa nwaa yei.
46014035	Ina taa lo nhanda nwaa gbindi nhu nana ti lo ngɔ la ti kɔɔ, ti lia ti ti nhiingaa i mɔɔli tuee pɛlɛ la, gbaa ngaa haa ɔ njie na yɛpɛlaa nhanwa batou ngaa lɔgɔ na nhu.
46014036	Gbɔɔ ee Ngebɔ oo na wuee tɔ pɛnhɛɛ i guai na? Inaile ee wu ila ngɔ lɔ gbo i bai wuee?
46014037	Ina ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ aa nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ letu nwɛ aa ala, inaile Yina na hembɛ lɔ ngeya, kaa kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nana ngaa kpaali wuee, ala nwɛ Maliki na i kɛi.
46014038	Kɛlɛ ina nuu aa gbee indinɛia, wua pa a gbeea maa nwɔɔ naa.
46014039	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, a ngɔi ɔaa nwa ngoolee na gɛndaa nhanwa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, awa awɛɛ nuu o nuu bɛndi aa njialaa nde kɛbɛlɛ nhu.
46014040	Kɛlɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ kawaa pele maa nhiɛ ɔ aa ngi bele.
46015001	Chaanngi nhu nya ndegea, ngi wu nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla kolo na le nana i Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na nhu Kilaisi nhanwa nana ngi kɛi aa wuee, nana wu hɔlɔi, awa nana wu laanɛɛ na i ma loni kpou,
46015002	nana wu ndendouyaa hɔlɔa aa nhu bele, ina aa bele ngaa kawu ngoo na houa aa loko hee ngɔ nana ngi kɛi aa wuee, k`a pele mɛɛ aa bele ngaa kɛɛlaa laanɛɛ haka nwɛ wu pelenie.
46015003	Kangi baa wuee aa nana ngi hɔlɔi, awa kolo ɔ tee ngɔ bɛɛ, aa kɛɛlaa ka Kilaisi i haaa mi nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa ndi ɔ na aa Ngebɔ Gbaali na lepele.
46015004	Awa kati ndɔɔgua maau na nhu, awa kɛɛ huua haa na nhu foo na nwa nana hiti ɔ na chawa na nhu ndi ɔ na aa Ngebɔ Gbaali na lepele.
46015005	Awa kɛɛ ya i gbɔha na lɔɔgɔɔunga aa Pita, awa ka to mbelaa puungaa i ngee ti manhu fee na.
46015006	Na i leeni nga, kɛɛ gbɔha na lɔɔgɔɔunga aa laanɛɛ belaa i natiini ti lee ngɔɔ kɛmɛ lɔɔu nhu tomaa ila nhu. Tua indinɛi ti gbinhi ɔ ndɛɛhu lɔ ti nhu nhaahaai, kɛlɛ ti lɛingaa i too haa ɔ.
46015007	Nhu nwɛɛ i gbɔha na lɔgɔɔuni aa Yemiisi, awa poungaa na kɛɛ gbɔha na lɔgɔɔunga aa to mbelaa i bɛpɛ na bɛɛ.
46015008	Gbele mba gee na tɔ bɛɛ, nya, nya bele ngɔ indinɛi ɛɛ nuu nana tai ndeni ala le ndɔgɔ nwa, kɛɛ lɔgɔɔunga boma aa nge.
46015009	Gbaa nya nwɛ tɔ yaaiyaai nwɔɔ na aa nge to mbelaa i ndiiya, awa ngai hitii nhu bɛnhɛ aa nguindaa nyaa aa to mɔɔ, gbɛnhaile kangi natiini ngaa sɛɛgɛa ti laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Ngebɔ.
46015010	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na oo nya belenga ɛɛ nya bele ngɔ indinɛi. Awa panda bandayaa na i fei mbɛ nhu ai nyaanii. Kangi engea bɛnhɛ kpɛndɛ ngɔ tee ngɔ to mbelaa lagbitia i mba. Ngai engei gbɔha nhu gboe kɛlɛ panda bandayaa na nana Ngebɔ i fei mbɛ alɛɛ ee enge aa nge.
46015011	Awae i bele tɔ aa nya nwɛ inaile i bele ngaa tua nwɛ, kani ngoo ila na gɛa aa wuee awa kawu laanɛɛa.
46015012	Chaanngi nhu ina noo ngoolee na gɛa aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa ka Kilaisi i huua haa na nhu, aa gee bele gbɔnhu wu lɛingaa i waa gɛ haa belaa tai huu haa nhu?
46015013	Kɛlɛ ina aa bele ngaa haa belaa tai huu haa nhu, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi bɛnhɛ ai huui.
46015014	Awa ina Kilaisi ai huui, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ngoolee na nana naa kɛ ngɔ na bele naa haka nwɛɛ, awa wua gbɔnhu woo laanɛɛa naa haka nwanhu.
46015015	Awa nua bɛnhɛ nɔɔ guaa gbɔha nwa aa kɛɛlaa ni lɛɛ ɔ ndɛɛ gɔɔlandaa nhanwa Ngebɔa, gbɛnhaile noo kɛa kpou aa kɛɛlaa kɛɛ huua kilaisiu kualaa haa na nhu, kɛlɛ ina k`a tɔmbaga nwɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa haa belaa tai huu haa nhu, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ai huui Kilaisiu.
46015016	Gbaa ina k`a haa belaa tai huu haa nhu, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi ai huui nha haa na nhu.
46015017	Awa ina k`a Kilaisi ai huui haa na nhu, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa wu laanɛɛ na kolo ai nhu, awa wuaa wu nhanda nyɔu na nhu nhaahaai.
46015018	K`a oo belenga gbɔnhu aa kɛɛlaa natiini ti laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Kilaisi ti haa ɔ, awa ti u ngoo lo nhu.
46015019	Ina mi nɛɛnwaa la na i Kilaisi nhu k`a ndɛɛhu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ gbo, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa mua nwɛ tɔ maa nwɔu belaa i ngaa muee tee ngɔ bɛɛ.
46015020	Kɛlɛ aa tɔmbaga ka Kilaisi i huua haa na nhu. Awa ala nwɛ pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na aa ala i huua haa nhu natiini ndiiya taa haa.
46015021	Kina haa i baia aa nuu gbɔha nhu bele, aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, nuu gbɔha nhu bele nwɛɛ haa belaa huulaa haa nhu i lɔɔloni na.
46015022	Gbaa ɛɛ ningaa i bɛɛ taa haa ti hounwayaa na nhanwa tii Alama o, aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, ningaa i bɛɛ tɔɔ huua haa na nhu ti hounwayaa na nhanwa ti nhu tii Kilaisi o.
46015023	Kɛlɛ ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ ngi nda lɔgɔ ɔɔ lɛa nga ala huulaa nhanwa haa na nhu. Kilaisi pɛnhɛɛ i huui, awa aa lɔgɔ na ɔɔ ba gbɔnhu ngelou i nhu, nhu nwɛɛ natiini ngi ndaa i ngaa tuee tɔɔ huu haa na nhu.
46015024	Nhu nwɛɛ kpelenwaa na ɔɔ ba, nhuna Kilaisi ɔɔ manhayaa na gɔan Ngebɔ nwa nana Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, nhuna ɔɔ gɛ bilani aa manhayaa o manhayaa lagbiti nyaaindaa, ka ningaa o ningaa natiini taa fɔha ɔa ningaa eya, awa ka fɔha na.
46015025	Gbaa kaa gɛ ngi nwanhayaa na la nhaa i gɛ bilani aa ngi haaleengaa i ngɔandaa ɔgɔsambala mbu.
46015026	Gbele mba haalee na nana Kilaisi ɔɔ ku ma ala nwɛ aa haa na.
46015027	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Oo gbɛ o gbɛ na ɔa ala ɔgɔsambala nau." Kɛlɛ nhuna aa gɛ oo gbɛ o gbɛ na ɔaa ala ɔgɔsambala nau, maa ɛa ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nuu na i gbɛ o gbɛ na ɔai ala ɔgɔsambala nau ai gbɔha gulai mba.
46015028	Kɛlɛ nhuna Ngebɔ i gbɛ o gbɛ na gɔanni Ndou na nwa, Ndou na gbɔha na ɔɔ gɔannaa Ngebɔ nwa nana i gbɛ o gbɛ na gɔanni ala nwa, kangaa Ngebɔ gbɔha na i ba gɛ pɛpɛ na nwanhu bɛɛ.
46015029	Chaanngi nhu, ɛɛ ningaa i natiini taa Ngebɔ ua bele ngaa tuee haa belaa i fanwa tɔɔ gee bele? Ina k`a haa belaa tai huu nwa haa nhu bɛɛ, gbɔɔ nha ti Ngebɔ ua beleni aa tuee haa belaa i fanwa?
46015030	Awa gbɔɔ mi kpɛndɛ kpɛndɛ nhu aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ?
46015031	Nya ndegea, ɛɛ ngaa goonɛ wu nhu mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o mi Nwaliki na, ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa nyaa haa nhu aa foo o foo.
46015032	Kualaa nuu gbɔha nɛgili ɔ na nhu, ina kangi gɔa aa nhuaa gbaai gbaaia bei Ɛfisɔsi, qani na ngigbɛɛ nwɛ ngi ba hɔlɔ nhu? Ina haa belaa tai huu nwa haa nhu, "K`a ami mɛnhɛi nwɛaɛ ami ndɔɔ gbɔɛ, gbaa lian na aa gɛ bɛɛ moo haa," ɛɛ ningaa taa kɛ.
46015033	Awɛɛ kuun ningaa taa wu nwɔu mɔu. "Waa gɛ kɛnwayaa nhu wui wu ndege lengaa o natiini ti eyaabele na ai gbekpeni, tɔɔ wu sɔ kpekpe na nyaaia."
46015034	Wu aa lona boma, ngemɛɛ maa nhiɛ ɔ wu nhanwa waa gɛ na, awa wu gbe ngaa nhanda nyɔu belendaa. Ngi indinɛi gɛ aa wuee kangaa wu ufe, aa kɛɛlaa wu lɛingaa i wai Ngebɔ gɔɔ.
46015035	Kɛlɛ nuu ɔɔ nhu nwɔɔlinaa, "Haa belaa i taa gee huu haa na nhu? Ndugu na siiyaa na ngigbɛ nwɛ ɔɔ gɛ ti nwa?"
46015036	Bia mɔu mɔu mɔɔ indinɛi aa biee! Nhuna baa tɔɔnhai gaai nhii, kaa haa pɛnhɛɛ yeingaa i gila haai.
46015037	Awa nana bi fainni, ndugu na nana ɔɔ hɔlɔ aile ma, kɛlɛ ngi gbala gbama nwɛɛ, naangaa mba nwɛɛ inaile nhai lagbiti nwɛɛ.
46015038	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ i ndugu ɔa ngeya nana kpala ngi alaa kangaa i hɔlɔ, awa tɔɔnhai gaai na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ ngi nda lugu na gba.
46015039	Ndugu bɛpɛ ngaile pele ngɔ ila ngee, kɛlɛ ningaa gbɔhaa ti nda lɔ na, nhuaa ti nda lɔ na, qɔia ti nda lɔ na, awa nyiɛa ti nda lɔ na.
46015040	Awa aliyana lugu lɔ na ka ngelou nhu lugu na, kɛlɛ aliyana lugu na nyande ngɔ ila mɛɛ, awa ngelou nhu lugu na nyande ngɔ ila lagbiti nwɛɛ.
46015041	Foo na ngi nda nyande tɔ ngeya, ngau na ngi nda nyande lagbiti lɔ ngeya, awa teelega na ngi nda nyande tɔ ngeya. Gbaa teelega lagbiti ngi nyande na ndoganhu lɔ mba aa teelega lagbiti.
46015042	Indinɛi ngemɛɛ ɔɔ bele nhuna haa belaa i tɔɔ huu haa na nhu. Nhuna taa ndugu na nhii, aa gbɔlɔa. Nhuna aa huu, aigɔ gbɔlɔ.
46015043	Nhuna taa ndɔɔgu maau na nhu, nyɔu ɔ awa njaaiyaai ɔ. Nhuna taa huu mbu haa na nhu, ɔɔ gɛa nyandeni awa ɔɔ gɛa gaanhu gbɛndɛni.
46015044	Nhuna taa ndɔɔgu maau na nhu, ngelou indinɛi nhu lugu gbama na nwɛ aa gɛ ma, awa nhuna taa huu mbu kualaa haa na nhu, yinayaa lugu na nwɛ aa gɛ ma. Ina ngelou indinɛi nhu lugu gbama lɔ na, yinayaa lugu lɔ na boma.
46015045	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Pɛnhɛɛ kɛgɛi na Alama kɛɛ belenga aa kɛndɛ nuu gbɔha," kɛlɛ gbele mba Alama na, ndɛɛhu he Yina na nwɛ aa ala.
46015046	Kɛlɛ Yina lugu na aile pɛnhɛɛ i gulɔe kɛlɛ nuu gbɔhayaa lugu gbama na nwɛ i gulɔɔ. Oo leenaa nga, Yina lugu na oo ba.
46015047	Ngebɔ fuufue mɛ i pɛnhɛɛ kɛgɛi na gbatɛi la nana i kpauni kualaa pɔlɔgɔɔ na nwa. Kɛlɛ kɛgɛi na fee na aliyana nwɛ i guai na.
46015048	Natiini Ngebɔ i ti gbatɛi kualaa fuufue na nhu ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ kɛgɛi na nana Ngebɔ i nhumbui aa kpatɛ kualaa fuufue na nhu, awa natiini aliyana na bo mɛɛ aa tuee ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ kɛgɛi na nana i guai aliyana.
46015049	Awa ɛɛ gbo kɛgɛi na nana Ngebɔ i kpatɛi kualaa fuufue na nhu, nana mi ngi guague na bu ngɔ nwa, awae mɔɔ kɛgɛi na guague na bua nwa boma nana i guai aliyana.
46015050	Chaanngi nhu nya ndegea, nana ngaa maa yia gɛ ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. Mi nuu gbɔhayaa lugu gbama na aigɔ ɔa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la. Awa nana aa gbɔlɔ aigɔ kpapi hɔlɔ nanaa ai gbɔlɔ.
46015051	Gbɛɛ ngi Ngebɔ lɔmbaga gbundu kɛ aa wuee. Mua bɛɛ maigɔ haa, kɛlɛ mua bɛɛ mi nwaa ɔɔ lobinaa,
46015052	lɔgɔ nhu gutu loganhu, ɛɛ nuu aa au nwaa gɛ kpage aa lɔgɔ na taa gbele mba hueu na hɛ. Gbaa fueu na oo na ɔɔ baa, awa haa belaa i tɔɔ huua aa ndugu nana aigɔ gbɔlɔ gbɔnhu, awa mi nwaa ɔɔ lobinaa.
46015053	Gbaa ndugu na nana aa gbɔlɔ maa ɔɔ lobinaa aa ndugu na nana ai gbɔlɔ. Awa nana aa haa, maa ɔɔ lobinaa aa nana aigɔ haa.
46015054	Nhuna ndugu na nana aa gbɔlɔ ɔɔ bele ngaa ndugu nana aigɔ gbɔlɔ, awa ndugu na nana aa haa nhuna ɔɔ bele ngaa ndugu nana aigɔ haa gbɔnhu, nhu nwɛɛ nana Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi ɔɔ loma, nana i gɛi, "Kunjaa oo kunga haa na nwa aa nyaaindaa!"
46015055	"Haa, ɛɛ bi gunjaa na? Haa, ɛɛ mboti na i biaa?"
46015056	Mboti na nana i haa naa nhanda nyɔu nwɛ i fei, awa Sɔ na alɛɛ aa nhanda nyɔu na fɔha na ɔaa ngeya.
46015057	Kɛlɛ ami fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa nana aa kunjaa ɔa mi eya aa mi Nwaliki na nhu bele Yisɔsi Kilaisi!
46015058	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, a lona nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, awɛɛ pele gbɛ o gbɛ aa wu nwɔi na, kɛlɛ a gɛa ngenge nhu Maliki na nhanwa aa gbele o gbele, gbɛnhaile wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wu nwɔɛ nwa na waa pele Maliki na enge na nhu fuu ngaile.
46016001	Chaanngi nhu, ngu to ngɔ na kula gula naa natiini fanwa Ngebɔ ndaa i ngaa tuee, nya lo ngɔ la wu pele ɛɛ gbo ngi kɛi aa laanɛɛ belaa i ti Galeesia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu pelendaa nhanwa.
46016002	Pɛnhɛɛ foo na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nwa mi guu ɔfɛla na nhu wua bɛɛ ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ i wu liiya kaa gɛ aa ndaanwaa gbatɛ belendaa kualaa nahoo na nwa nana aa gɛ aa hɔlɔndaa, kangaa nahoo hou houndaa ɛɛ gɛ na wu eya nhuna ngaa ba.
46016003	Awa nhuna ngaa ba, ningaa i wɔɔ ti lɔgɔɔu, ngɔɔ ti lonaa aa wu hembɛ na wɔɔ fe kangaa ti li la mɛɛ Yɛlusamɛmu laa waa na nhu, awa ngɔɔ ngooleekɔɔ bɛɛa tuaa.
46016004	Ina aa bele pa aa kɛɛlaa kang~a~a li nya gbɔha na, nɔɔ lia nii tua i ngoo.
46016005	Ngɔɔ baa wuee nhuna ngaa gua Masilonia. Gbaa ngoo ndaalaaa aa ndiilaa aa Masilonia bele.
46016006	Naangaa ngɔɔ gɛa na tii wua o lɔgɔ lɛingaa nhanwa, naangaa pa bɛnhɛ ngɔɔ gɛa na tii wua o nhaa mi nhanwa gɛlɛ gbɔha na aa lo, kangaa wua wu ba gbɔ nyaa nhaa ndi ɔ mɛɛna ni hitima na ɔɔ gbele na.
46016007	Ngɔi lɔ nyaa ngi ba gbo ngi wu lɔ nhuna ngaa gɛ aa tee teendaa, gbɛnhaile alaa nya nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa nya guu golo ɔɔ nwaa lonaa pandaa mɛɛ wuee ina Maliki na aa ba aa maa fɛɛlɛ na.
46016008	Kɛlɛ ngɔɔ gɛa lɛ bei Ɛfisɔsi nhaa lɔgɔ na taa ui mba aa Pɛndikɔsi i hiti.
46016009	Gbaa ngoo fɛɛlɛ hɔlɔa bei aa ngenge bombou mbaa belendaa, hali nha ningaa gbinhi ɔ tai kuun ma nana nwa ngaa kɛ.
46016010	Ina Timootii aa ba wuee kaka, aa ala binjana pandaa, gbɛnhaile alaa Maliki na enge na bele, ɛɛ gbo nya ngaa pele.
46016011	Faa nwɛɛe nuu ɛɛ au bii manhu. Kɛlɛ a ala leena maa lɛi nhu kangaa i bɛɛla boma bei nya le, gbɛnhaile nyaa ngaa pele nhu gbee nda boma kangaa i ba aa mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa lagbitia i.
46016012	Kɛlɛ ngu to ngɔ na mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ naa Apɔlɔsi, kangi ala lii gbɛndɛnga mbombou ngɔ kangaa i ba wuee tii laanɛɛ belaa lagbitia i ngoo. Awa ala lii na ai kɔi aa paalaa wuee chaanngi, kɛlɛ ɔɔ baa nhuna aa nwaa hɔlɔ.
46016013	Awɛɛ nɔa nwa, a lona nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ wu laanɛɛ na nhu, a lii gbɛndɛna, awa wu gaanhu i gɛa gbɛndɛni.
46016014	Nana bɛɛ waa pele, a pelena aa ndomayaa.
46016015	Wu kɔɔnaa tɔ Sitiifɛnasi nhanwa tii ngi bongaa i ngoo aa kɛɛlaa tua nwɛɔ pɛnhɛɛ mbelaa i ngaa tuee mɛɛ Akeea ti beleni aa laanɛɛ belaa aa Kilaisi, awa wu kɔɔnaa boma ti gee gbɔha na gɔannga ngenge na belendaa nhanwa nana Ngebɔ ndaa i taa pele. Chaanngi nya ndegea, ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ,
46016016	kangaa wu gbɔha na nwaa bɛɛ ngu mbelaa indiini bondau, awa wu nwaa bɛɛ bɛnhɛ ngigbɛ o ngigbɛu nana aa enge nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ tii tua o ngilamaa.
46016017	Nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ inditiini paalaa na nwa, Sitiifɛnasi o, Fɔtunatɔsi o, ka Akaikɔsi, gbɛnhaile wu boma, too nana hea wu baa ngɔ laɔ
46016018	awa too nya luu na goonhu nɛɛa aa nyiɛ nhaa wu nda na gbɔnhu. Kawaa mbɛɛ bombou mbaa gɛ ndakpangaa indiini bondaa.
46016019	Laanɛɛ belaa i ti Eesia bɔlɔgɔɔ na gaka gakanwaa na ti fama leeni wuɛɛ. Awa Akuila o, Pilisila o, ka laanɛɛ belaa i taa ba na tuee pɛlɛu batou ngaa lɔgɔ na nwa ti fama nwaa nhii nhiɛ leeni wuɛɛ aa Maliki na laa na.
46016020	Laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ ti fama leeni wuɛɛ. Wu haa haa gbɔha na nwa aa guunndaa lepele.
46016021	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, nya nwɛ ngi fama oo indinɛi gbaalii wuee aa nya guegue loko na.
46016022	Laangaa i gɛa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nwa nana ai loni a Maliki na! Mi Nwaliki na, baa!
46016023	Kangaa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi banda bandayaa na i gɛ na tii wua o.
46016024	Kangaa ni lomayaa na i gɛ na tii wua o bɛɛ wu hounwayaa na nhu wu na wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
47001001	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, Ngebɔ i uini nyaa aa ngi guunmayaa na kangaa ngi bele ngaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi lo mɔɔ, nya o mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na o Timootii, nua nwɛ naa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wu nwanhu wua wu laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Ngebɔ wu mɛɛ Kɔlindi, tii natiini ngoo tɔ bɛɛ Ngebɔ i ti belenga a tɔɔgɔɔ mbelaa ala gbɔha nhanwa ti mɛɛ Akeea bɛpɛ na bɛɛ.
47001002	Kangaa mi Kɛɛgɛ na Ngebɔ ka Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa o ka maa lɛi.
47001003	Nduba i gɛa Ngebɔ nwa nana mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala. Kɛɛgɛ nwɛ aa ala nana maaumayaa ɔ, awa Ngebɔ nwɛ aa ala nana aa kpɔ mba gɛbɛlɛ na bele pele bɛɛ!
47001004	Ngebɔ nwɛ aa ala nana aa gbɔ muaa mi gbɔu gbɔu na nhu bɛɛ, kangaa aa kpɔ mba na nana maa hɔlɔ ala eya, maa gbɔ mba ila na siina mi ku mi gbɔ nda lagbitia i mba natiini taa gɛ kpɔu gbɔu gɛbɛlɛ nhu bɛɛ.
47001005	Gbaa ɛɛ gbo njɔgɔlɔ gbinhi gbinhi na nana Kilaisi i peleni mi yɔgɔlɔ nwɛ, ngemɛɛ pa gbɔnhu aa mi gbɔ mba na kpinhi ɔ nana maa hɔlɔ aa Kilaisi nhu bele.
47001006	Kɛlɛ ina maa yɔgɔlɔ, wu gbɔmbayaa nhaa nwɛɛ tii wu lendouyaa hɔlɔndaa nhanwa o. Awa ina naa kpɔ mba hɔlɔ, wu gbɔmbayaa nhaa nwɛɛ kangaa wu lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa ndii lo nhuna waa njɔgɔlɔ ila na hɔlɔ nana naa pele.
47001007	Awa n`i nɛɛnwaa la na wu nhanwa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, gbɛnhaile ni kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ɛɛ gbo waa gula nuaa n`i yɔgɔlɔ na nhu, wɔɔ gulaa boma nuaa kpɔ mba na nhu nana naa hɔlɔ.
47001008	N`i ndegea, kpala ngai nuaa wu lo kpindi nhu n`i yɔgɔlɔ na nhanwa ni peleni mɛɛ Eesia. Nhanda na nana ti teeni na ni umbaa mbombou ngɔ nja lee ngɔnhu, awa tee ngɔ n`i ukoko nwa nana i peleni ni gɛi nɔɔ haa.
47001009	Gbaa aa tɔmbaga, kani haa na lɔa nwa tɔ. Kɛlɛ indinɛi i belenia kangaa nɛɛ hagba la gbɔha na nhu, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nana aa pele haa belaa i taa huu haa na nhu alɛɛ naa hagba la nhu.
47001010	Oo ndendouyaa hea nuɛɛ kualaa njɔgɔlɔ bombou mbaa na eya nana i peleni ni gɛi nɔɔ haa. Awa ɔɔ ndendouyaa hea nuɛɛ, awa noo ni nɛɛnwaa la na bu ala nhu aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ ndendouyaa hea nuɛɛ gbɔnhu.
47001011	Wua gbɔnhu kawaa gbɔ nuaa laaminɛ nhu, kangaa ningaa gbinhi ɔ ti ba fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa ni lɔgɔ fanwa, Ngebɔ banda bandayaa hembɛ na nhanwa nana i ngɔa ngɔ ni eya ndi ɔ aa ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti laaminɛ nhu bele.
47001012	Gbaa n`i yonga na nwɛ aa indinɛi. k`a n`i nɛɛnwaa na i kɛ aa nuee aa kɛɛlaa nuaa tee pele nwaa hei nhu ngelou i nhu, awa hali bɛnhɛ wuee ni lee ngɔ na. Nuaa hei chanhai hei nhu ka tɔmbaga lɛɛhu nhu ɛɛ gbo kpala ngi Ngebɔa kangaa ni gɛ na. Nai hagba la ngɔ nuu gbɔha nhu lo nhu, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ bandaa bandayaa na nwɛ.
47001013	Nua naa nana gbaali wu nwanhu wu ku ngɔ waa kala, awa wu ku ngɔ waa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba, awa nya nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa kɛɛlaa wɔɔ nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔa mba nhaa kpelenwaa na,
47001014	ɛɛ gbo wu nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔa nuaa kolo, kangaa wu ba goonɛ ni nhu awa nua gbɔnhu ni ba goonɛ wu nhu aa foo na mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi ɔɔ ba ma.
47001015	Kina nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa indinɛi, faa nwɛɛ ngi ndaalaai aa paalaa wuee pɛnhɛɛ, kangaa wu ba qani hɔlɔ naa heinwaa fee.
47001016	Gbaa ngi ndaalaaia aa sialaa aa wuee pele nhuna ngaa gɛ aa ndiilaa Masilonia, awa ngaa gua Masilonia ngi ba ba boma wuee, kangaa ngi kpɔ mba hɔlɔ wu eya nya liilaa nhanwa Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
47001017	Gbɔɔ ee kpɛi lɔ ngee gbɛi nhuna ngi gɛi ngɔɔ indinɛi bele? Ee ni laalaa na ngaa pele pele, ee ngaa pele pelenaa gbo kualaa nuu gbɔha laalaa nhu, aa kɛɛlaa ngoo gɛa "Aaha", kɛlɛ pa "Aanhoo" nwɛɛ ngi ma?
47001018	Awa aa tɔmbaga ɛɛ Ngebɔ hiti ɔ na nhu nuu aa laanɛɛ aa ala, faa nwɛɛ pa n`i yia na naa kɛ aa wuee nai gɛ aaha ni gɛ boma aanhoo.
47001019	Gbaa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nana nya o, Silibanɔsi o, ka Timootii ni kɛi aa wuee Ngebɔ Lou na nhanwa napangaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi, nɛɛ fee fee njia aileɔ, kɛlɛ kɛɛlaa nwɛɔ, "Aaha," ala nhu aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ.
47001020	Gbaa nɛɛnwaa lo na bɛɛ nana Ngebɔ aa fee hee, Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwɛ kpɛɛmbo na aa ala napangaa "Aaha." Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ ala nhu bele nwɛɛ maa gɛ la, "Kangaa i bele" nana aa baa aa mbɛɛ Ngebɔ nwa.
47001021	Kɛlɛ nua o, wua o, Ngebɔ gbɔha na nwɛ i pele ngɔ mi nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kpou mi hounwayaa na nhu mi na mii Kilaisi o. Awa Ngebɔ gbɔha na nwɛ i mi nhu ɔhɛa.
47001022	Alɛɛ i choo bɛaa mi nwa nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa ala bo mɛɛ aa muee, awa oo ngi Yina na ɔaa mi lii na nwa, nana i to nhu mi nhanwa, nana nhanwa bɛɛ i Ngebɔ eya kpugu la mi nhanwa.
47001023	Ni loganhu nii Ngebɔ o, waa tɔ ngai bai mɛɛ Kɔlindi, kpala ngaile nyaaɔ ngi nhanda bele nana i ba pele wu gbaai.
47001024	Wu laanɛɛ na aile ni kulɔɔ sialaa la nhanwa wuɛɛe kɛlɛ ngenge nwɛɛ naa enge tii wua o wu nda goonhu nɛɛ nhanwa, gbɛnhaile ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wuaa loni nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kpou wu laanɛɛ na nhu.
47002001	Awae ngi ndaalaaia nɛɛnwaa nhu aa kɛɛlaa kangaa ngɛhaa ba ngaa hitima gbaai gbaai bele ngaa wuee gbɔnhu.
47002002	Gbaa ina ngaa pele wu nwaa nwɔu, k`a ele nwɛɛ tɔ ɔɔ pele nya goonhu nɛɛ? K`a ningaa i mɛ gbo gbɔnhu natiini ngi peleni ti nwaa nwɔui.
47002003	Awa indinɛi maa nhanda na nwɛ kpei ngi kpaalii wuee, inaile gbo bɛɛ, nhuna ngi ba ba, ningaa i natiini ti ba pele nya goonhu nɛɛ, ti ba pelenaa nya nwaa nwɔu. Gbaa nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa wuee bɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa nana aa nya goonhu nɛɛ, wua gbɔnhu aa wu goonhu nɛɛa bɛɛ.
47002004	Nhuna ngi ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaalii wu nwanhu aa maa nwɔu bombou mbaa o, ndii yogobee ngoo, tii ngaai gbinhi gbinhi o nana ee gua nya au nwa, ngai peleni wu nwaa nwɔundaa nhanwae kɛlɛ ngi pelenia kangaa wu nya lomayaa na lɔɛ na gɔɔ i nya eya wu nhanwa.
47002005	Kɛlɛ ina nuu oo pelenga nuu nwaa nwɔu, nya aile i peleni aa nge, kɛlɛ bia na i peleni aa biee, inaile teendaa kutu ɔ, mi gɛa, wua nwɛ bɛɛ i peleni aa wuee tɔ.
47002006	Kpɔɔni na nana wua bɛɛ wu ndai maa nwɔɔ nana bonda umbaa, ku ngɔ tɔ aa ala.
47002007	Awa chaanngi nhu kawaa tomaa lagbiti na gbau. Ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, wu ndo na alɛɛ, awa wu ala lɔɔndɔɔ, inaile gbo, maa nwɔuyaa ɔɔ maa nwɔɔ nana bonda nwaa gbɔɛa.
47002008	Ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ kangaa wu wu lomayaa na nhu bote boma ala nhanwa.
47002009	Gbaa ngi ngooleekɔɔ nana gbaaliia wu nwanhu kangaa ngi wu nhua, awa kangaa ngi kɔɔ ina aa bele ngaa wu nwaa yei ɔ gbɛ o gbɛ nhu.
47002010	Nuu na nana waa nhanda lo na alɛɛ, nya gbɔnhu ngoo ndo na alɛɛ. Awa ina nhanda lɔ na nana ndondaa na nyɛɛ nuuɛ, ngoo ndoa na tɔ maa nwɔɔ naɛ Kilaisi au bele nhu wu lɔgɔ fanwa,
47002011	kangaa Setani ɛɛ kalagalasuma gbau mi nwa, gbaa mi nana gɔɔnaa i ala nɛɛnwaa nhu.
47002012	Nhuna ngi bai Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛ ma aa ningaa i mɛɛ Tiloasi laa na nhu, ngi maaleia aa kɛɛlaa Maliki na oo pele laaunga na ngenge na nhanwa.
47002013	Kɛlɛ ka nya lii na i yogobeenga, gbɛnhaile ngai nya ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na nwaaleii na napangaa Taitɔsi. Awae kangi hɛi oo gulaa ningaa i ma tee na awa kangi ya nhaa Masilonia.
47002014	Kɛlɛ ngi fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa! Gbaa mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Kilaisi o, Ngebɔ lɔ na mi gulɔɔ k`ɛɛ sia aa muee aa gbele o gbele Kilaisi gunjaa na nhu. Awa mua nwɛ Ngebɔ aa enge aa muee kangaa Kilaisi gɔɔndaa na i sia nhu mii o mii ɛɛ nhai gu nɛɛ nɛɛ.
47002015	Gbaa mua mi bele ngɔ ɛɛ sebe gu nɛɛ nɛɛ na nana Kilaisi i ngɔai Ngebɔ eya, nana ku na sia ɔ natiini ma ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔa o ka natiini ti u ndo ɔ na nhu.
47002016	Lagbitia i ngee natiini ti u ndo ɔ na nhu, haa nwaa gu mɛɛ i ti baai. Kɛlɛ natiini ngee ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔaɔ, ku nɛɛ nɛɛ na nwɛ nana aa ba aa ndɛɛhu. Ele nwɛɛ mbɛɛi nwɔɔ aa ala nhanda indinɛi bonda nhanwa?
47002017	Gbaa nua nai tee tee ma Ngebɔ oo na nwaa siandaa nhanwa ningaa nwa ɛɛ ningaa lagbitia taa pele. Kɛlɛ kina Ngebɔ oo ni longa, k`ani yɛpɛ aa tɔmbaga nɛɛnwaa ala au bele nhu ɛɛ Kilaisi eyaalakpangaa.
47003001	Ee indinɛi oo lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa nua naa gbɔha yonga lee gbɔnhu? Ee ɔgɔ bele ngaa kɛɛlaa ni lo ngɔ aa mbihɛ gɔɔ teendaa nhanwa wu nwanhu, inaile waa tee ni nwanhu ɛɛ ningaa lagbitia taa pele?
47003002	Wua wu gbɔha na wua nwɛ ni bihɛ kɔɔ na aa wuee, nana kpaali ngɔ ni lii na nwa, kangaa ningaa i bɛɛ ti kɔɔ awa ti ku ngaa kalandaa.
47003003	Kue ɔ nuu o nuuɛ aa kɛɛlaa wua Kilaisi ooleekɔɔ nwɛ aa wuee, nana i teeni aa nuee, Kilaisi ai kpaalii aa kpaali bele kongo kɔtu gindo kindo ma, kɛlɛ i kpaaliia ningaa gbɔhaa lii nwa, aa kɛndɛ Eebɔ na Yina na.
47003004	Ni indinɛi gɛ gbɛnhaile muaa hagba la ngɔ Ngebɔ nhu aa Kilaisi nhu bele.
47003005	Ai beleni aa kɛɛlaa ni ku ngɔ naa gbɛ o gbɛ bele kualaa ni gbɔha nhu, kɛlɛ ni gunjaa na kua ɔ Ngebɔ le.
47003006	Awa ala nwɛ boma i ni beleni aa ngeyaalakpangaa gbekpengaa ngilimayaa nyiɛ na nhanwa, nana sɔ ngaile kpaali ngɔ kɛlɛ Yina na nwɛ. Gbaa sɔ na nana kpaali ngɔ alɛɛ aa ba aa haa, kɛlɛ yina na ala alɛɛ aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ.
47003007	Sɔ na kati kpaalia kɔtu gindo kindo ma, awa ka Ngebɔ bɛɛyaa na i lɔgɔɔunga waun mbombou mbaa nhu nhuna ti Sɔ ngindinɛi ɔai ti eya. Hali nha Moosisi aunwaa na huondaa yain kɛɛ tɔɔlonga aa ngualaa, kɛɛ huo gbo yain awa maa yain na kɛɛ pelenga ningaa i tee Iisilɛli tai kuni taa au lo alaa. Ina Sɔ na nana aa ba aa haa ningaa nwa nhuna fɔha ee mba, maa Sɔ na kɛɛ baa aa mbɛɛ nana bonda,
47003008	ɛɛ Yina na enge na tɔ?
47003009	Ina ngenge na nana aa ba aa haa kɛɛ mbɛɛ hɔlɔa, ɛɛ ngenge na tɔ nana aa mi bele ngaa tee mbelaa Ngebɔ gulɔɔ?
47003010	Gbaa aa tɔmbaga, nhai na nana mbɛɛ ee mbaɔ pɛnhɛɛ, mbɛɛ ɛa mba gbɔnhu, gbɛnhaile mbɛɛ bombou mbaa lɔ lagbiti indinɛia tee ngɔ pɛnhɛɛ kee naa.
47003011	Gbaa ina nana ngaunwaa i uaaɔ kɛɛ baaɔ aa mbɛɛ, nana tɔ i na nhaa guna nhanwa kaa mbɛɛ hɔlɔ nana tee ngɔ naa.
47003012	Kina nɛɛnwaa la indinɛi bonda lɔ ni eya, faa nwɛɛ ni lii gbɛndɛ ngɔ mbombou ngɔ ni yɛpɛ na nhu naa kɛ.
47003013	Nua nai beleni ɛɛ Moosisi, nana i kɔla bɛɛi aunwaa na kangaa ningaa i tee Iisilɛli tɛɛ ngaunwaa na lɔ naa ee ua nhuna maa bɛɛyaa na aa loi.
47003014	Kɛlɛ ti nɛɛnwaa na haa ɔ. Gbaa nhaahaai, taa gɛ aa ngilimayaa ɔha na galandaa, kɔla ila na siina lɔ beembeeni ti nɛɛnwaa na. Kɔla na siina aa guaa nuu na nɛɛnwaa na ina gbo maa nwɔɔ na ɔɔ hounwayaa gbatɛa aa Kilaisi.
47003015	Kɛlɛ nhaahaai, gbee na bɛɛ taa Sɔ na gala nana Moosisi i kpaalii, k`a kɔla na i ti nɛɛnwaa na gbibi.
47003016	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Gbee na bɛɛ nuu aa bote Maliki na le, ɔɔ kɔla na siina nwɔinaa."
47003017	Chaanngi nhu nhuna aa gɛ "Maliki na" koonhu na nwɛ aa Yina na. Awa mɛɛna Maliki na Yina na aa gɛ na, nhanda baambayaa lɔ na.
47003018	Mua bɛɛ kɔla ai mi aunwaa gbibi ngɔ. Awa mbɛɛ na nana i Maliki naa alaa muaa. Awa mbɛɛ ila na siina, alɛɛ aa mi bote ngaa ala guegue na gbɔha na, nana aa mbɛɛ bombou mbaa nwaa lo nuaa. Indinɛi Maliki na enge na nwɛ nana Yina na aa ala.
47004001	Ngebɔ oo ngenge indinɛi ɔaa mi eya ngi nwaaumayaa na nhu, awae nai nɛɛnwaa nyaaii fanwa.
47004002	Gbundu nhu nhanda na bɛɛ nana ngufe maa nhanda le bɛɛ noo ndaa kaka. Nai sɔti gula ma inaile nai Ngebɔ oo na nwaa lobi ma aa ndɛɛ. Nuaa Ngebɔ au bele nhu tɔmbaga na waun na nhu nana hiti ɔ nhu, awa k`ani lapi aa gbɔha na lɔgɔɔundaa kangaa nuu o nuu i ni lɔ awa i kuun ni nwa aa ni bele ngɔ na ni na.
47004003	Awa hali bɛnhɛ Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa naa kɛ aa ningaa i, nuu aa ndɔɔgu, i ndɔɔguia gbo natiini mba ti u ngi loa nhuɔ.
47004004	Tua tai laanɛɛi, gbɛnhaile ngelou i nhu nwanha na napangaa Setani, oo ti nɛɛnwaa na gbindia. Oo ti bɛndia aa waun na lɔndaa nana aa huo ti nwa, napangaa waun na nana kua ɔ na ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na le Kilaisi bɛɛyaa na nhanwa, nana Ngebɔ guague na aa ala.
47004005	Gbaa nai gbɔha gɛɛ gɛɛ ma, kɛlɛ Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwɛ naa ala gɛɛ gɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa Maliki nwɛ aa ala, awa nua pa ni gbɔha na wu eyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa nuee Yisɔsi lɔgɔ fanwa.
47004006	Gbaa Ngebɔ na nana i gɛi, "Waun ngi huona kualaa kpindi na nhu!" maa Eebɔ ila na nwɛ i peleni ngi waun na aa huo ni lii na nwa, paalaa nhanwa nuee aa ngi bɛɛyaa gɔɔnjaa na nana aa huo Kilaisi aunwaa na.
47004007	Kpatɛyaa indinɛi alaa mi eya pɔlɔhɛɛ nhu, ndɔgɔɔundaa nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa fɔha na nana mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ na fɔhaa bɛɛ Ngebɔ bo mɛɛ, kɛlɛ mi bo ngaile.
47004008	Kpɔu gbɔu gbinhi gbinhi lɔ ni nwa, kɛlɛ nai gɛ noo gbahaa. Lɔgɔ lɛingaa naa gɛa nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ nhu, kɛlɛ k`ani kpɔ mba hɔlɔ.
47004009	K`ati ni aa sɛɛgɛ, kɛlɛ tai gbeei nuaa. K`ati ni gbanhi, kɛlɛ tai ni baai.
47004010	Aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ k`ani haa na lɔ ni lugu na nwa nana Yisɔsi i peleni, kangaa ningaa ti Yisɔsi lɛɛhu na lɔ ni lugu na nhu.
47004011	Ni lɛɛhu gbɔha na nhu bɛɛ nuaa haa nhu kpɛndɛ kpɛndɛ ngeya Yisɔsi lɔgɔ fanwa, kangaa ningaa ti ngi lɛɛhu na lɔ ni lugu indinɛi nwa nana ɔɔ gbɔlɔ.
47004012	Indinɛi oo lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa haa lɔ aa enge ni nhu, awa wua pa ndɛɛhu lɔ aa enge wu nhu.
47004013	Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Kangi yiaa gbɛnhaile kangi laanɛɛa." Kina maa laanɛɛ ila na siina nwɛ i ni eya, faa nwɛɛ naa yia gbɛnhaile ni laanɛɛ ɔ.
47004014	Ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ nana i huui Maliki na Yisɔsiu haa na nhu, ɔɔ huua boma miu mii Yisɔsi o, awa ɔɔ ni gbaunaa ngilamaaa mii wua o, ala au bele nhu.
47004015	Indinɛi bɛɛ wu lɔgɔ faa nwɛɛ aa bele pele, kangaa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na hiti ɔ na aa gɛ aa hitilaa ningaa gbinhi gbinhia nwa, awa k`ati gbinhilaa na i nwaa lo, maa banda bandayaa na siina ɔɔ pelenaa ningaa i ti hiɛ gua laaminɛ na belendaa i nwaa lo, nana ɔɔ ba aa mbɛɛ bombou mbaa Ngebɔ laa na nwa.
47004016	Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ nai lii nyaai. Hali nha n`i lugu gbama na lɔ aa gbɔlɔ, kɛlɛ n`i luu na lɔ aa nyiɛyaa hɔlɔ aa foo o foo.
47004017	Awa kpɔu gbɔu golo indinɛi nana maa yɔgɔlɔ nhu chaanngi nhu, ɔɔ baa mi nwa aa mbɛɛ gbinhi gbinhi o ka wɔwɔwɔ mbɛɛ, nana tee ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛa maa nhua ma.
47004018	Gbaa nhaanhaa i natiini maa ti lɔ tua aile maa ti gbee ngee, kɛlɛ ami natiini kpeena mai ti lɔ, gbɛnhaile nana maa tɔ ai lɛmbi, kɛlɛ nana mai tɔ aa gɛa na wɔwɔwɔ.
47005001	Mi lugu na pɛlɛ na nwɛ nana mi luu na i mbu bei ngelou indinɛi nhu. Nhuna maa bɛlɛ nana aa nyaai, mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ pɛlɛ lagbiti ɔaa mi eya nana nuu gbɔha ai toni aa ɔgɔ, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ i kpatɛi awa ɔɔ gɛa na aliyana wɔwɔwɔ.
47005002	Aa tɔmbaga, nhuna mi pɛlɛ indinɛiu nana i mi eya chaanngi nhu, k`ami ɔɔ aa ngɔi bombou mbaa aa kɛɛlaa mi lo ngɔ la kangaa mi bɛlɛ na nana i aliyana, Ngebɔ i pu mi nwa.
47005003	Kangaa ina aa pu mi nwa, maigɔ lo ndugu ai mi nwa.
47005004	Gbaa aa tɔmbaga nhuna mi pɛlɛ indinɛiu lɛ k`ami ɔɔ mɛɛ mui ɔ. Ai beleni aa kɛɛlaa ngɔi lɔ muaa mi ndugu na bii nana i mi nwa ngelou indinɛi nhu, kɛlɛ ngɔi lɔ muaa mi aliyana gee na bu nwa, kangaa ndɛɛhu nana i pele ndugu gbama na nwaa lobi.
47005005	Ngebɔ gbɔha na nwɛ i mi nwaa gbatɛa maa lobi ngindinɛi nhanwa, awa kɛɛ ngi Yina na ɔaa mi eya aa nhɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na nhanwa bɛɛ nana i na ngeya kpugu la mi nhanwa.
47005006	Awae mi laa fe ngɔ aa ndii gbɛndɛ aa gbele o gbele. Mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ina gbo tɔ muaa na ndugu indinɛi nhu, mi nwaa gɔha pa Maliki naa.
47005007	Gbaa mi lɛɛhu na ngu to ngɔ laanɛɛa, kɛlɛ ngu ngai loni nanaa maa tɔ.
47005008	Mi laa fe ngɔ aa ndii gbɛndɛ, awa mɔɔ lonaa nja lee ngɔnhu aa kualaa ndugu indinɛi nhu mi gɛ na mɛɛ mii Maliki na o.
47005009	Faa nwɛɛe mi gɛ bei mai gɛ na, mi lo ngɔ la mi Maliki na goonhu nɛɛ.
47005010	Gbaa mua bɛɛ kam~a~a lo Kilaisi gulɔɔ kangaa i mi gɔhɔ. Ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ ɔɔ nana hɔlɔa hɔlɔndaa i ngeya, i gɛ nyɔui inaile i gɛ gbekpeni, ndi ɔ aa gbɛ o gbɛ na lepele maa nwɔɔ na i pelenga ala lugu na nhu.
47005011	Faa nwɛɛe kina mi kɔɔ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa Maliki na nduamba nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala, k`ani ningaa i tɔɔndɔɔ, Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ i ni bele ngɔ na gɔɔnaa, awa nya nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa kɛɛlaa wua gbɔnhu wu kɔɔnaa.
47005012	Awa ni gbɔha na aile gbɔnhu naa gbɔha bihɛ wuee, kɛlɛ fɛɛlɛ nwaa nhii nhiɛ nwɛ naa ngɔa wu eya kangaa wu goonɛ ni nhu, kangaa wu ku wu natiini kpɛɛmbo taa goonɛ ti bele ngɔ na nwa kɛlɛ tai ti sɔ na bele ngɔ na gbee.
47005013	Gbaa ina aa bele ngaa ni nwɔu ɔ, Ngebɔ nhaa nwɛɛ. Awa ina pa ni nɛɛnwaa nhu lee ngɔ, wu nhaa nwɛɛ.
47005014	Gbaa ndomayaa na nana i Kilaisi eya mi nhanwa alɛɛ aa sia aa muee, gbɛnhaile mua bɛɛ muaa kɔɔ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngila mɔɔ nwɛ i haai ningaa i fanwa bɛɛ, nana i ndɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa mua nwɛ bɛɛ mi haai.
47005015	Kɛɛ haaa ningaa i fanwa bɛɛ, kangaa natiini tai lɛ haai, tɛhaa gɛ gbɔha hei nhu, kɛlɛ ala i haai ti lɔgɔ fanwa awa kɛɛ huua haa na nhu, alɛɛ gbo taa gɛ ngi hei nhu.
47005016	Faa nwɛɛ kualaama tɔ chaanngi nhu, maigɔ nuu gbau ngaa nuu gbɔhayaa lepele. Hali moo Kilaisi gɔɔngaɔ aa nuu gbɔhayaa lepele, kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu mai ala gbau ngɔ aa pele ngɔ nana gbɔnhu kpɔ.
47005017	Faa nwɛɛe nuu o nuu nana aa gɛ hounwayaa nhu tii Kilaisi o, maa nwɔɔ na siina nuu nyiɛ nwɛ aa ala. Ngeyaabele ngɔha na ngaa oo lo awa ngi nyiɛ nwɛɛ i baa.
47005018	Indinɛi bɛɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ i peleni, nana i mi nwaa lobini aa Kilaisi nhu bele kualaa faaleenjaa nhu, kɛɛ mi belenga aa ngi gɛnwa belaa awa kɛɛ ngenge na ɔaa mi eya kangaa mi lagbitia bele ngaa ngi gɛnwa belaa boma.
47005019	Gbaa Kilaisi nhu bele nwɛɛ Ngebɔ ee ngoo ila kpatɛ la ala gbɔha na loganhu o ka ngelou nhu belaa i, awa ai ti nhanda nyɔu na gbeeni nana tee pele pele ngaa ala. Awa oo ngoo na ɔaa mi eya nana i kɛ ngɔ aa muee i gee ti beleni aa ngi gɛnwa belaa.
47005020	Faa nwɛɛe ngenge belaa nwɛ aa nuee Kilaisi nhanwa, awa nua nwɛ Ngebɔ aa enge aa nuee nguindaa nhanwa ningaaa. Ni wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ Kilaisi lɔgɔ fanwa kangaa Ngebɔ i wu bote boma ala le.
47005021	Kilaisi ai nhanda nyɔu beleni. Kɛlɛ mi lɔgɔ fanwa, Ngebɔ oo ala ɔaa nhanda nyɔu nhu, kangaa mi Ngebɔ leenjaa na hɔlɔ mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Kilaisi o.
47006001	Mi enge na nhu maa pele ngilamaaa tii Ngebɔ o, ni wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ kangaa awɛɛ Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na gbau ɛɛ nhai nana kolo ai nhu.
47006002	Gbaa Ngebɔ ɛgɛ, "Nhuna lɔgɔ gbekpe na i hitii, kangi oo nhɛɛnga wu nwa. Nhuna foo na i hitii nhuna ngaa ndendouyaa he la wuee, kangi gbɔnga wuaa." A oo nhɛɛna! Lɔgɔ na nwɛ aa indinɛi waa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na hɔlɔ la. Haai indinɛi foo na nwɛ waa ndendouyaa hɔlɔ ma!
47006003	Kina kpala ngai nuaa n`i enge na i ndaa nyɔu hɔlɔ, faa nwɛɛ nai gbɛ o gbɛ bele ma nana aa ningaa hagɔli.
47006004	Nana naa pele, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu naa pele, k`ani ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ eyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa nuee aa kundaa kpɔu gbɔu na nwa aa ndii lo, nhanda nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ma na nhu, awa ka kaande nhanda nhu.
47006005	Too ni gbanhia, too ni biinga kpindi bɛlɛu, too labi labia ni nwa, naa nwɔɛa nwa ngenge gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ nhu, noo njii nyaaia nwa au siandaa nhanwa, awa noo ndɔɛ houa.
47006006	Chanhainjaa nhu o, kɔɔnjaa nhu o, ndii lo nhu o, nhanda banda nhu o, noo gbɔha na lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ eyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa nuee aa Ngebɔ Yina na nhu bele o, n`i lɔmbaga lomayaa na nhu o,
47006007	tɔmbaga oo na nhu o, awa ka aa Ngebɔ na fɔha na. Awa teenjaa na fɔan na nwɛ ni nhanwa nana naa ningaa hou la awa naa gbɔha gua la ti eya.
47006008	Taa mbɛɛ gɛa nuaa ti ni chambo. Taa ni ɛinaa ti ni bihɛ. Taa ni houa ɛɛ ndɛɛ gɔɔla mbelaa, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ k`ani tɔmbaga na gɛ.
47006009	K`ati ni hou ɛɛ tai ni gɔɔ, kɛlɛ pa ti ni gɔɔnaa pandaa, baa tɔ ɛɛ ni haa ɔ, kɛlɛ ɛɛ waa naa lɔ gbo aa kɛɛlaa ni gɛndɛ ɔ. Hali kati ni gbɔɔnia kɛlɛ tai ni baai.
47006010	Hali k`ati ni nwaa nwɔu, kɛlɛ ni goonhu nɛɛ ɔ aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ. Taa ni lɔa ɛɛ mbaa mbelaa, kɛlɛ k`ani pele ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti gbatɛ. Taa ni lɔa ɛɛ nhai ai ni eya, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ nua nwɛ ni bo mɛɛ aa gbɛ o gbɛ na.
47006011	Wua Kɔlindiasia i ngaa wuee, noo yɛpɛ wuee kpou. Noo ni nɛɛnwaa na gɛa aa wuee.
47006012	Nua nai n`i nɛɛnwaa na gbɔlui wu nhanwae kɛlɛ wua nwɛ wu nɛɛnwaa gbɔlu ngɔ ni nhanwa.
47006013	Chaanngi nhu nya ngaa yɛpɛ wuee ɛɛ k`a nya lengaa nwɛ aa wuee. Awu nɛɛnwaa na lɔgɔɔuna aa nuee ɛɛ nua ni ndɔgɔɔuni aa wuee.
47006014	Awɛɛ hounwayaa gbatɛ loganhu wui natiini ngoo laanɛɛ belaa aile aa tuee. Hounwayaa na ngigbɛ nwɛ i teenjaa loganhu o ka teenjaa gbaha mba? Inaile kɛnwayaa na ngigbɛ nwɛ i waun ndoganhu o ka kpindi?
47006015	Kilaisi o Ngafɔ mbaa na o taa gee gɛ mbɛ nhue? Inaile nhu waun waunnjaa na ngigbɛ nwɛ i laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na loganhu tii nuu na o laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aile aa ala?
47006016	Inaile Ngebɔ Bɛlɛ na o ka ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa i tɔɔ gee gɛ mbɛ nhue? Gbaa mua, mua nwɛ kɛndɛ Eebɔ na Bɛlɛ na aa muee! Ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i gɛi, "Ngɔɔ gɛa nya nda ningaa i nhu awa ngɔɔ gɛa ti liiya. Ngɔɔ belenaa aa ti Eebɔ awa tua tɔɔ belenaa aa nya nda ningaa i."
47006017	Awae Maliki na ɛgɛ, "Faa nwɛɛe a segea ti liiya awa a loganhu baia aa tuee. Awɛɛ loko bu gbɛ o gbɛ nwaa nhanda nhu nana ai chanhaini, awa ngɔɔ kuunnaa wu nwa.
47006018	Ngɔɔ belenaa aa wu Kɛɛgɛ, awa wua wɔɔ belenaa aa nya nhiindengaa o ka ni nyanhaleengaa, ngemɛɛ Lamanhu Nwaliki na i kɛi."
47007001	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, kina nɛɛnwaa lo ngindinɛi bɛɛ fe ngɔ muɛɛ, ami gbɔha na chanhaina kualaa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu nana aa pele nuu na lugu na o ka ala luu na maa nɔgɔ. Awa kam~a~a bele ngaa ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu ngebɔyaa nhu ɛɛ maa gɛ aa mbɛɛ gɛndaa Ngebɔa.
47007002	A lii na lɔɔgɔɔuna aa nuee. Gbaa nai nhanda aa haai aa nuu, nai nuu nhu bui, awa nai kalagalasuma gbauni nuu nwa.
47007003	Ngai indinɛi gɛi wu hɔɔlɛ hɔɔlɛndaa nhanwa aa njia. Gbaa ngoo kɛaɔ pɛnhɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa wu lomayaa na lɔ ni lii nwa baa tɔ ɛɛ k`a muaa ngilamaa, mi gɛ bɛnhɛ haai inaile mi gɛ bɛnhɛ gɛndɛi.
47007004	Nya hagba la ɔ wu nhu mbombou ngɔ, nya goonɛ na mbombou ngɔ wu nhu, nya lii gbɛndɛ ngɔ hiti ɔ nhu chɔɔ. Awa kpɔu gbɔu na nhu bɛɛ naa gɛ na, nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ.
47007005	Gbaa hali nhuna ni bai Masilonia, nai lɛɛhu ɔ hɔlɔi hali. Kpɔu gbɔu ee naanɔɔ ni nwa mii o mii. Mbaabaga ee naanɔɔ i ni beembee ngɔ, awa ndua ee naanɔɔ ni nhu.
47007006	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ, nana aa natiini ndii gbɛndɛ ningaa taa fɔha gbɔɔnda ti nwa, kɛɛ ni lii gbɛndɛnga aa Taitɔsi baalaa nhanwa nuee.
47007007	Awa ala baalaa na ila ngɔ aile gboe kɛlɛ ngi gɔan na i kulai ala hou ngɔ na nhanwa wu houi la. Kɛɛ kɛa aa nuee waa gee nya ɔi nya lɔndaa nhanwa, wu nwaa nwɔu ɔ na i gee na, wu nwaa gbatɛ ɔ na i gee na tondaa nhanwa nya nhanwa. Awae indinɛi oo nya goonhu nɛɛ na nwaa longa.
47007008	Gbaa hali nha kangi pelenga wu nwaa nwɔua aa nana nhanwa ngi kpaalii ngooleekɔɔ na nhu wuee, kɛlɛ ai nya nwaa nwɔu ngɔ aa kpaalindaa. Naangaa kɛɛ pelenga nya nwaa nwɔua pɛnhɛɛ nhuna ngi tɔi wu nwaa nwɔui lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa.
47007009	K`ang~a~a goonhu nɛɛ fanwa chaanngi nhu, awa ai beleni wu nwaa nwɔui faa nwɛɛ, kɛlɛ wu nwaa nwɔu na i peleni wu bɛni faa nwɛɛ. Wu nwaa nwɔuia ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na lepele, kangaa wai ba yɔgɔlɔ gbɛ o gbɛ nhu yaai aa ni bou bele.
47007010	Gbaa maa nwɔuyaa na nana ndi ɔ na aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na lepele, nhu gbɛɛlaa na nwɛ aa potendaa kualaa nhanda nyɔu nhu nana aa ba aa ndendouyaa nana maa nwɔuyaa ai mba. Kɛlɛ maa nwɔuyaa na nana ndi ɔ na aa ngelou nhu belaa i ngee pele, nhu gbɛɛlaa na nwɛ aa haa.
47007011	A nana lɔlɛ nana Ngebɔ i peleni aa wu nwaa nwɔuyaa na, kɛɛ pelenga wu tee nhanda belenga. Kpala ngee naanɔɔ wuaa wu gbɔha na gua ngaa haa haa nhanda eya, kawu loloa aa nana nyɔu ɔ, kawu luaa, Ngɔi ee naanɔɔ wuaa nja lee ngɔnhu aa nana belendaa tee nhanda le, kawu longa nana nhanwa tee nhanda le, kawu nhanda nyɔu gbɔɔnia. Aa pele o pele kawu gbɔha lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa wu leo ngɔ nhanda na nhu.
47007012	Awae hali nha kangi ngooleekɔɔ nana gbaalia wu nwanhu, ngai kpaalii fagɔli mɔɔ na lɔgɔ fanwae inaile nuu na i ala hagɔlini, kɛlɛ ngi kpaaliia kangaa wu naa lɔ aa gbɔha, Ngebɔ au bele nhu, wu sago na bele ngɔ na ni nhu wu nhanwa.
47007013	Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ ni lii gbɛndɛ ngɔ. Ni lii gbɛndɛndaa na aile gboe kɛlɛ ka n`i goonhu nɛɛ na i nwaa longa Taitɔsi goonhu nɛɛ na nhanwa, gbɛnhaile wua bɛɛ kawu pelenga ala lii na i heia nyiɛɛ!
47007014	Gbaa ina aa bele ngaa ngoo yonga leea ala le gbɛ o gbɛ nhu wu nhanwa, wai peleni ngaa ufe. Kɛlɛ ɛɛ ni gbɛ o gbɛ na gɛi bɛɛ aa wuee tɔmbaga nhu, ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa n`i yonga na ni teei Taitɔsi gulɔɔ oo belenga aa tɔmbaga.
47007015	Awae ngi lomayaa na wu nhanwa k`ɛɛ gbɛa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, nhuna aa gɛ aa nɛgililaa wee gee nwaa bɛɛ alau, awa wu gee ala binjani aa ndua o ka kpɛi.
47007016	Ngi goonhu nɛɛ, gbɛnhaile gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu, nya hagba la ɔ wu nhu.
47008001	Chaanngi, n`i ndegea, ni lo ngɔ la ni ndɔgɔɔu ngaa wuee kangaa wu kɔɔ nana Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na i pelenga laanɛɛ belaa i nhu ti mɛɛ Masilonia.
47008002	Kati nhua kpɛndɛ gbɛndɛ hɔlɔa kualaa kpɔu gbɔu na nhu nana ee ti nwaai. Kɛlɛ ka ti goonhu nɛɛ na i gɛa bombouni nana ee pele tee fembɛ he nana kpinhi ɔ, hali nha ti baa ngɔ nja lee ngɔnhu.
47008003	Ngaa kɛa aa wuee gbɛnhaile nya gbɔha na kangi naa lɔa, aa kɛɛlaa tee fembɛ hea ɛɛ gbo ti ku ngɔ, awa tee fea bɛnhɛ pii ngɔ pou nwa aa pele na ti lii na aa ti gɔ la.
47008004	Kati ni nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛnga nja lee ngɔnhu, kangaa ni fɛɛlɛ he tuɛɛ ti kpapi gbau kpɔ mba belendaa nhanwa, aa fembɛ hendaa lepele Ngebɔ ndaa i fanwa ti mɛɛ Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
47008005	Awa indinɛi ti pelenia tee ngɔ nanaa n`i nɛɛnwaa ee ti gulɔɔ aa pelendaa. Kati gbɔha na ɔaa pɛnhɛɛ Maliki na eya. I leeni nga, kati gbɔha na ɔaa ni eya aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na.
47008006	Nhanda indinɛi nhu gbɛɛlaa na nhanwa, kani Taitɔsi nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛnga aa kɛɛlaa, ngenge banda banda na nana i tɔɔloni wu nhu, maa enge na siina kangaa i to nda.
47008007	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ gbo waa gbɛa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu, laanɛɛ nhu o, wu yɛpɛ ɔ na nhu o, kɔɔnjaa nhu o, wu sɔbɛ gbekpe na houndaa nhu o bɛɛ, ka wu lomayaa na nana i wu eya ni nhanwa, ni lo ngɔ la gbɔnhu wu nhu gɛ gbɛndɛni ngenge banda banda indinɛi nhu.
47008008	Ngai gɛi kawɔɔ pele qaie kɛlɛ ngi kɛia ndɔgɔɔundaa nhanwa aa wuee ngɔi na bele ngɔ na i ningaa lagbitiaa kpɔ mba belendaa nhanwa, kangaa ti wu lomayaa na lɔmbaga ɔ na lɔ.
47008009	Gbaa wua wu mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi banda bandayaa na gɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ala gbatɛ ɔɔ, kɛlɛ kɛɛ gbɔha na belenga aa mbaa mɔɔ wu lɔgɔ fanwa, kangaa wu bele ngaa kpatɛ belaa aa ngi baanjaa na nhu bele.
47008010	Chaanngi nhu ngɔɔ nya nda nɛɛnwaa hembɛ na hea wuɛɛ. Maa nhiɛ ɔ wu nhanwa waa bila ngaa nana belendaa chaanngi nhu wee pele hogo na. Gbaa wua pɛnhɛɛ wu peleni, awa pelendaa na aile gboe kɛlɛ ngɔi na nwɛ pɛnhɛɛ ee wuaa nhanda belendaa nhanwa.
47008011	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu a bilana aa pelendaa. Ngɔi i gɛa wuaa aa ngaa londaa ɛɛ gbo ngɔi ee wuaaɔ aa tɔɔlo ngee naɔ, awa a pelena aa nana wu ku ngɔ la chaanngi nhu.
47008012	Gbaa ina bi nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa fendaa, Ngebɔ ɔɔ kuunnaa bi hembɛ na nwa ndi ɔ aa nana i bi eya, kɛlɛ nana aile ai bi eya.
47008013	Ngai indinɛi gɛi ningaa lagbitia guandaa nhanwa nhanda nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ma nhue awa wua pa ngi kooti laa laa wu umbaae kɛlɛ kpala tɔ nyaa i gɛ aa teengaa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nhanwa.
47008014	Kɛlɛ kina wu hɔlɔ na gbinhi ɔ aa lɔgɔ indinɛi, ɔɔ lia gbo maa nhiɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa wu gbɔ natiini mba nhai baa ngi ti nwa. Awa aa lɔgɔ na nhai baa ngɔɔ wu hou awa tua pa ti hɔlɔ na gbinhi ɔ, tɔɔ gbɔnaa wuaa. Aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, wɔɔ gɛa aa teengaa.
47008015	Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi gɛnhi, "Nuu na nana i ngaa lɔgɔa kpinhi ɔ, aile luu gbinhi ngeya, awa nuu na nana i ngaa lɔgɔi kolo, ngi baa ngaile ma."
47008016	Ni fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa nana i peleni Taitɔsi i ngɔi gbauni aa kpɔndaa wuaa ɛɛ gbo nua ni gbɔni wuaa!
47008017	N`i nɛɛnwaa nhaa gɔɔ na ila ngɔ aile gboe i kuunni ma, kɛlɛ kina ala gbɔha na sɔbɛ hou mɔɔ nwɛ aa ala, faa nwɛɛ i bai wuee ɛɛ gbo ala lii na i ala gɔi pelendaa nhanwa.
47008018	Awa mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na nana ala nwaanhaa banda sia ɔ nhu laanɛɛ belaa i ma bɛɛ ngi enge na nhanwa aa pele, Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛndaa na nhu, noo ala bɛɛa Taitɔsia kangaa ti ba mɛɛ wuee.
47008019	Awa na aile gboe kɛlɛ laanɛɛ belaa i too ala nhu ɔhɛa kangaa ni gɛ aa sialaa panda banda enge indinɛi nhu Maliki na bɛɛyaa na lɔgɔ fanwa, awa kangaa ni ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa kpala tɔ nuaa ni pele.
47008020	Nua naa nwanhu gbee kangaa nɛɛ tɛɛgɛ hɔlɔ kualaa nuu o nuu eya pele na nhanwa naa fembɛ gbinhi gbinhi indinɛi nwanhu gbee nda.
47008021	Ni lo ngɔ laa ni nana bele tee ngɔ Maliki na gulɔɔ. Awa Maliki na gulɔɔ aile gboe kɛlɛ ningaa gbɔhaa gulɔɔ gbɔnhu.
47008022	Awa noo ti leenga wuee ngilamaaa tii ni ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ o, nana ni ala nhuanga naa gbinhi ɔ, awa noo maaia aa kɛɛlaa sɔbɛ hou mɔɔ nwɛ nhanda gbinhi gbinhi nhu. Awa nuu nwɛɛ nana aa sɔbɛ hou chaanngi nhu tee ngɔ pɛnhɛɛ naaɔ bɛɛ, gbɛnhaile alaa hagba la ngɔ wu nhu mbombou ngɔ.
47008023	Awa Taitɔsi nhanwa, ala nya ndege lou nwɛɛ awa alaa enge tii nya o kpɔndaa nhanwa wuaa. Awa mi ndegea i fanwa pa natiini taa li ngilamaaa tii ala o, tua nwɛ ti loni laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa o ka paalaa aa mbɛɛ Kilaisi nwa.
47008024	Faa nwɛɛe awu lomayaa na lɔgɔɔuna aa tuee laanɛɛ belaa i kulɔɔ kangaa ti naa lɔ, awa kangaa ti kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nai yonga haka leei wu nhu.
47009001	Ngai laanɛɛi kang~a~a gula nhu gbɔnhu aa gbɛ o gbɛ gbaalindaa wu nwanhu kpɔ mba na nhanwa Ngebɔ ndaa i ngee mɛɛ Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
47009002	Gbaa ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wu goonhu nɛɛ ɔ aa kpɔ mba hendaa, awa ngoo yonga leea wu nhu ningaa i ngee ti Masilonia. Ngɛɛe "Ningaa i ti Akeea too nwaa gbatɛaɔ aa kpɔ mba kualaama tɔ hogo na." Awa wu guunmayaa na alɛɛ i pelenga ti gbinhi ɔ kpɔ mba belendaa nwɔi i ti houa.
47009003	Chaanngi nhu ngoo nya ndege laanɛɛ belaa indiini teenga wu nwanhu, kangaa n`i yonga na naa tee wu nhanwa nhanda indinɛi nhu, ɛɛ bele nuɛɛ aa yonga haka. Kɛlɛ ɛɛ gbo ngee kɛ, wɔɔ gɛa nwaa gbatɛi.
47009004	Ina na aile, ina aa bele ngaa kɛɛlaa ngi ba mɛɛ wuee ngilamaaa nii Masiloniangaa o, ni ba ni maai aa kɛɛlaa wu nwaa ai gbatɛi, ngɔɔ loa ngufe nhu ti eya, (gbaa wua wu nda na nai gula nhu bɛnhɛ aa kɛndaa,) gbɛnhaile nuaa hagba la ngɔɔ wu nhu mbombou ngɔ!
47009005	Awae ngi tɔia aa kɛɛlaa maa nhiɛ ɔ aa mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa indiini maa nɛɛ nɛɛndaa kangaa ti lo gulɔɔ nyaa paalaa nhanwa mɛɛ wuee, kangaa ti nhumbu aa ndomayaa hembɛ na hɔlɔ wu eya maa gbatɛ nhu nana wu maa nɛɛnwaa lo fei yeingaa ngi gilaa ba. Nhu nwɛɛ ɔɔ gɛ laai maa gbatɛ nhu ɛɛ fembɛ nana wu fei aa guegue guunmayaa, kɛlɛ ɛɛ bele ɛɛ nana ti wu gɔɔbini aa fendaa.
47009006	Chaanngi nhu gbɛɛ ngi indinɛi gɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa nuu na nana aa fain kolo, ɔɔ teea kolo. Awa nuu na nana aa fain kpinhi ɔ, ɔɔ teea kpinhi ɔ.
47009007	Ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ i nana hea ala nɛɛnwaa na i kɛi aa ala fendaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ ɛɛ fe aa ndii gbaai, inaile ɛɛ fe gbɛnhaile too ala gɔɔbinga aa fendaa. Gbaa Ngebɔ ndo ngɔ aa nuu na nana a nhai he aa koonhu nɛɛ.
47009008	Awa Ngebɔ ku ngɔ aa nhai ɔandaa wu eya nana tee ngɔ nanaa kpala ngi wuaa, kangaae nana bɛɛ ngi baa ngi wu nwa i gɛ wu eya aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, awa wɔɔ nhai hɔlɔa kpinhi ɔ nhanda gbekpe pelendaa la nhanwa.
47009009	Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi gbo gɛnhi, "Ngebɔ aa ngi hembɛ na yanjanaa nhu ningaa nwa, i fe mbaa mbelaa i mbɛ. Ngi leenjaa na ɔɔ gɛa na nhaa guna bɛɛ."
47009010	Ngebɔ, nana aa nhai hugu na ɔa fain mɔɔ na eya, awa ka lɛgɛ gbɛnha na mɛndaa nhanwa, ɔɔ nhai hugu na ɔaa gbɔnhu wu eya bɛɛ nana ngi baa ngi wu nwa, awa ɔɔ pelenaa i gbɛa. Awa kualaa wu nhanda gbekpe na nhu waa pele pele, Ngebɔ ɔɔ pelenaa wu hɔlɔ kpinhi ɔ.
47009011	Ɔɔ pelenaa wu gbatɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu kangaa wu ba fe ningaaɛ aa pele o pele, kangaa ti gbinhi ɔ ti ba fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa wu hembɛ na nhanwa nana taa hɔlɔ aa n`i eyaa bele.
47009012	Gbaa kpɔ mba indinɛi waa pele ku ngɔ nanaa ngi baa ngi Ngebɔ ndaa i ma, awa alaa boma aa ba aa fiɛ gbinhi gbinhi guandaa Ngebɔ nwa.
47009013	Fembɛ indinɛi hendaa alɛɛ ɔɔ wu bele ngɔ na lɔgɔɔu ngaa ningaa i. Tɔɔ Ngebɔ bihɛa gbɛnhaile woo nwaa bɛɛa Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ nau nana waa kɛ aa ningaa i. Awa tɔɔ Ngebɔ bihɛa boma gbɛnhaile woo fembɛ indinɛi hea kpɔndaa nhanwa tuaa ka lagbitia i bɛɛ.
47009014	Awae aa ndomayaa bombou mbaa wu nhanwa tɔɔ laaminɛa wu nhanwa gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo panda bandayaa bombou mbaa lɔgɔɔunga aa wuee.
47009015	Ami fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa ngi hembɛ bombou mbaa na nhanwa nana maa yia gɛ ngɔ ai na!
47010001	Chaanngi nhu nya gbɔha i kpei Pɔɔlu aa nge, waa gɛ nya nwa nya nwaa yei ɔ nhuna ngaa gɛ wu aunwaa, kɛlɛ wɛɛ nya lii gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa wuee nhuna mi nwaa gɛ gɔha, ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ ngaa Kilaisi nwaa yeiyaa na o ka ngi nhanda bandayaa na aa kɛɛlaa
47010002	awɛɛ pele ngaa lii gbɛndɛ ngaa wuee nhuna ngaa ba wuee. Gbaa nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngaa lii gbɛndɛnaa natiini ma taa gɛ mi eyaabele na sege ɔ ngelou nhu nhanda na le.
47010003	Ngemɛɛ hati, muaa na ɛɛ ngelou nhu belaa, kɛlɛ mai kɔɔ nwa ɛɛ ngelou nhu belaa.
47010004	Gbaa kɔɔ nhaanhaa i natiini naa gɔ aa tuee, ngelou i nhu gɔɔ nhaanhaa i ngaile, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ fɔha gɔɔ nhaanhaa i mɛ naa gɔ aa tuee, awa tua nwɛ naa faaleengaa i ti gbingbii na nyaai nyaai aa tuee mɛɛna taa lɔɔgu na, awa naa ndɛɛ lɛɛ longa nyaaia aa tuee.
47010005	Ngaunwaa lɛ nhanda na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nana nuu aa tɛ nga kangaa i ningaa bɛndi aa Ngebɔ gɔɔndaa, nɔɔ nyaaia, awa nɔɔ nɛgili o nɛgili houa aa kpindi bɛlɛuyaa nhaa ni pele i nwaa bɛɛ Kilaisiu.
47010006	Awa gbee na bɛɛ wu nwaa bɛɛyaa na aa hiti nhu, ni nwaa gbatɛ ɔ aa natiini kpɔɔnindaa tai nwaa bɛɛi.
47010007	Wua waa nhaanhaa gbee kpee ngaa ti oo ngaa bele. Ina nuu aa gɛ na nana i hagba la ngɔ gbɔha na nhu aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi nda nwɛ aa ala, kaa tɔ aa kɛɛlaa nua gbɔnhu Kilaisi ndaa nwɛ aa nuee ɛɛ gbo ala.
47010008	Gbaa hali bɛnhɛ ngi ni yonga na leendaa golo nwaa lo gbɔnhu ngu to ngɔ fɔha naa nana i ni eya, nana Maliki na i ngɔai ni eya wu nhu gbɛndɛndaa la nhanwa wu laanɛɛ na nhu, kɛlɛ wu nyaaindaa la nhaile, ngaigɔ ufe.
47010009	Kpala ngai nyaa i bele ɛɛ k`a nya ngaa wu aa luu lua aa nya ooleekɔɔ na ngaa kpaali gbaali wu nwanhu.
47010010	Gbaa ningaa lɔ taa gɛ, "Pɔɔlu ooleekɔɔ na fɔha fɔha yia lɔ nhu awa nhu gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ ngɔ, kɛlɛ nhuna ala gbɔha na aa gɛ na tii nua o ala yaaiyaai ɔ, awa ngi yia na aa kɛ njia haka nwɛ!"
47010011	Ningaa i nana bonda ti nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔa mba aa kɛɛlaa, nana naa kpaali ngooleekɔɔ na nhu nhuna nai gɛi na, naa kɛa boma gbɔnhu nhuna naa gɛ na.
47010012	Hati, nua naigɔ gbɔha gbau ɛɛ natiini taa gbɔha na bihɛ bihɛ, inaile naigɔ gbɔha nhua ti nwa. Kɛlɛ nɛɛnwaa baambayaa nwɛ taa pele, gbɛnhaile k`ati gbɔha na gɔhɔ aa ti nda nhu lo na, awa k`ati gbɔha na gbau ngaa ningaa gbekpengaa.
47010013	Kɛlɛ nua naigɔ yonga lee naa tee mɔɔ nhu, kɛlɛ nɔɔ kpelea gbo mɛɛ nwa Ngebɔ i naa ɔai ni eya, awa ni engelaa na wu liiya alaa gbɔnhu indinɛi goonhu.
47010014	Kina wuaa maa lambi na siina goonhu, nai biini n`i lambi na bou nwa nhuna ni bai wuee aa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa.
47010015	Nua naigɔ yonga lee naa tee mɔɔ nhue napangaa yonga leendaa ngenge nhu nana ningaa lagbitia ti pelenga, kɛlɛ ni nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa kɛɛlaa wu laanɛɛ na ɔɔ gbɛaa, awa kangaa n`i ba ku ni ngenge bombou mbaa bele mɛɛ wu liiya lambi na goonhu nana Ngebɔ i ngɔai ni eya.
47010016	Awa nhu nwɛɛ naa Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ pɔlɔgɔɔ bɔlɔgɔɔ lagbiti na nhu nana i wu bou nwa, awa naigɔ yonga lee ngenge nhanwa nana nuu i pelengaɔ nhinde lagbiti.
47010017	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Nuu na nana yonga leendaa i ngeya, i teea Maliki na nhu."
47010018	Gbaa nuu na nana aa gbɔha bihɛ ala aile ala gbekpe ngɔe kɛlɛ nuu na nana ala gbekpe ngɔ na hati, ala nwɛ aa nuu na nana Maliki na aa ala bihɛ.
47011001	Ngɔi lɔ nyaa nha wu oo nhɛɛ nya nwɔu mɔu njɛpɛ golo indinɛi nwa ngi baa kɛ. Awu lee nwɛɛ a oo nhɛɛna nya nwa!
47011002	Nya lolo ɔ wu nhanwa ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ lolo ɔ na wu nhanwa. Wua wu bele ngɔ ɛɛ lambunhu nyanhalou nana ngi maabɔa kɛmbɛ guandaa nhanwa nyanha nwɔɔ ila ngee kpɛti. Nyanha nwɔɔ na siina ala nwɛ aa Kilaisi gbɔha na.
47011003	Kɛlɛ nya lua ɔ aa kɛɛlaa ɛɛ gbo kaai na i sɔti gulai aa Iibi, aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, nya lua ɔ aa kɛɛlaa wu nɛɛnwaa nhu ɔɔ bua nana ɔɔ pele wu bote kualaa ndomayaa gbekpe na nhu nana i wu eya Kilaisi nhanwa.
47011004	Gbaa ina aa bele ngaa nuu aa ba i ngoo gɛɛ gɛɛ aa wuee Yisɔsi lagbiti nhanwa nana nua nai kɛi aa wuee, inaile waa yina lagbiti hɔlɔ nana wai hɔlɔi kualaa ni eya, inaile Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ Kilaisi nhanwa nana wai lɛ kuunni maɔ, wua k`awu gɛ, "Maa nhiɛ ɔ!"
47011005	Ngai gbɔha na gbau ngɔ ɛɛ k`a nya nuu gbɔhayaa na njei ɔ mbu nhuna maa nhua natiini ma kpei waa ui tuaa aa "tɔɔgɔɔ lo mbelaa."
47011006	Kɛlɛ hali bɛnhɛ ngai bɛɛlii ngaa yɛpɛ, ngi nana gɔɔnaa ngaa kɛ. Faa nwɛɛe aa pele o pele noo indinɛi lɔgɔɔunga aa wuee nhanda o nhanda nhu bɛɛ.
47011007	Ee nhanda nyɔu nwɛ ngi peleni aa gbɔha na nwaa yeindaa kangaa wua wu ndaa bombou mbaa hɔlɔ, gbɛnhaile ngoo Ngebɔ Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛa aa wuee nana wai maa baabaa beleni?
47011008	Nhuna ngee enge wu liiya, laanɛɛ belaa lagbitia nwɛ tee nya baabaa. Kɛɛ belenga ɛɛ k`a ngaa nwɔa nwɛ ngee pele ngaa tuee kpɔndaa nhanwa wuaa.
47011009	Awa nhuna ngee na tii wua o awa ngee lo nhai baa nhu, ngai maa gooti na lai na wu umbaa. Gbaa nhuna mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i ti bai kualaa Masilonia, kati gbɛ o gbɛ na ɔaa nya eya nana ngi baa ngee nya nwa, awa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu, ngai peleni nya gooti na aa la wu umbaa, awa ngɔɔ tonaa nda aa pelendaa gɛnhi.
47011010	Kina gbo tɔmbaga oo na nana Kilaisi aa kɛ alaa nya nhu, nya yonga indinɛi ngaa tee, teendaa aigɔ gbele Akeea bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
47011011	Kɛlɛ gbɔɔ, ee kɛɛlaa nwɛ ngai loni aa wuee? Ngebɔ i kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nya lo ngɔ aa wuee!
47011012	Kɛlɛ nana ngaa pele chaanngi nhu, ngɔɔ tonaa nda aa pelendaa, kangaa ngi fɛɛlɛ na gua natiini ngeya ti fɛɛlɛ ɔi ngɔ, awa taa gɛ tua taa enge ɛɛ gbo nua naa enge.
47011013	Gbaa ningaa indiini bonda ndɛɛ lɛɛ lo mbelaa nwɛ aa tuee, k`ati enge ningaa nwɔu mɔundaa nhanwa, awa tuaa gbɔha na bele ngɔ ɛɛ k`a Kilaisi lo mbelaa nwɛ aa tuee.
47011014	Awa la ngai mba, gbaa hali Setani kɛɛ gbɔha na bele ɛɛ k`a maleka nwɛ aa ala nana aa ba aa waun!
47011015	Faa nwɛɛe ala na nwaa nhanda aigɔ nuu gbɛi ina Setani eyaalakpangaa taa gbɔha bele ɛɛ k`a ngeyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa tuee natiini taa tee nhanda bele. Ngaa guanwaa na, tɔɔ ti baabaa na hɔlɔa aa ti enge na bele ngɔ na taa pele.
47011016	Ngi kɛ gbɔnhu, nuu ɛɛ nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa mɔu mɔu mɔɔ nwɛ aa nge. Kɛlɛ ina nuu aa nɛgili la aa pele ngɔ nana, ai nhanda nyaai ngɔ, aa nya gbaunaa aa mɔu mɔu mɔɔ, kangaa nya o gbɔnhu ngi ba yonga golo lee.
47011017	Nana ngaa kɛ nhuna ngaa yonga lee nhanda nhanwa, ngai kɛ ma ɛɛ ka Maliki na nwɛ i kɛie kɛlɛ ngaa kɛa gbo ɛɛ mɔu mɔu mɔɔ.
47011018	Kina ningaa gbinhi ɔ k`ati yonga lee ngelou nhu nhaanhaa i nhu, nya gbɔnhu ngɔɔ yonga leea.
47011019	Gbaa wua, wu nhu lo ngɔi, k`awu oo nhɛɛ mɔu mɔu belaa nwa aa koonhu nɛɛ!
47011020	Gbaa wua hali nuu i wu bele ngaa nduaa, i wu gɛin na nwɛ wu eya, i kalagalasuma gbau wu nwa, i gbɔha lɛ nga bɛnhɛ, i wu lebe bɛnhɛ wu aunwaa, wu oo nhɛɛ ngɔ gbo ala nwa.
47011021	Nya ufe ngɔ bɛnhɛ aa kuunndaa ma. Ɛɛ wu kɛi gbo, mi gaanhu haa ɔ aa maa lɔgɔ na. Kɛlɛ nana bɛɛ nuu aa lii gbɛndɛ ngaa yonga leendaa nhu, kang~a~a nya nda nwɔu mɔu njia gɛ, nya bɛnhɛ gbɔnhu nya lii gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa yonga leendaa ɛɛ tua.
47011022	Ee Hibulua nwɛ aa tuee? Nya gbɔnhu Hibulu nwɔɔ nwɛ aa nge. Ee Iisilɛlia nwɛ aa tuee? Nya gbɔnhu Iisilɛli nwɔɔ nwɛ aa nge. Ee mi bemba na Eebilahamu goo na nhu lengaa nwɛ aa tuee? Nya gbɔnhu ala goo na nhu lou nwɛɛ aa nge.
47011023	Ee Kilaisi eyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa tuee? Nya nwɛ nya lee ngɔ tuaa, hali nya ngaa yɛpɛ ɛɛ mɔu nwɔɔ! Ngoo nwɔɛa nwa aa ngenge tee ngɔ tuaa, too nyaa biinga kpindi bɛlɛu naa gbinhi ɔ, too nya fɛqɛnga naa gbinhi ɔ, awa haa oo bɔɔla nyaa naa gbinhi ɔ.
47011024	Kpanhi buu buu chawa na i manhu laabu na, Yuua i too pelengaa aa nge naa heinwaa lɔɔu.
47011025	Ka Loomua i ti nya gbɔannga aa fɔan naa heinwaa chawa, kati fuulu biinga nya nwa naa ila. Njaa lɛndɛ oo gbɛɛbaa aa nge naa heinwaa chawa, awa naa ila boma kangi lugbaa paalii awa kangi sɔɔgɔa kpɛɛsi kpolo ya nau.
47011026	Nya sia gbinhi gbinhi na nhu ngee pele pele, ngee kpɛndɛ kpɛndɛ nhuɔ nja he ngeya o, nwɔa belaa eya o, nya ndege Yuua i ngeya o, Kpitia i ngeya o, taa waa na nhu o, tombo na nhu o, kpolo yaa o, awa ka kualaa ndɛɛ lɛɛ gɛnwa belaa eya.
47011027	Ngoo nwɔɛa nwa ngenge nhu o ka nhanda nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ma nhu. Kpindi gbinhi ɔ ngaile yii ɔ hɔlɔ. Ngoo ndɔɛ houa awa ngaile gbɛ o gbɛ hɔlɔ ngaa kpɔɛ. Naa gbinhi ɔ ngaile mɛnhɛi hɔlɔ, ngaile pɛlɛ hɔlɔ ngaa la mbu, awa fɛli ee naanɔɔ nya nwa.
47011028	Awa ngai gɛi tɔ na bɛɛ, kɛlɛ aa foo o foo nyaa nɛgili waa nhu laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa bɛɛ.
47011029	Nhuna nuu aa yaaiyaai ngi laanɛɛ na nhu, i gee na ee nya aile ngi yaaiyaaia? Nhuna nuu aa ɔa nhanda nyɔu nhu, i gee na ee nya aile ngaa yogobee nja lee ngɔnhu?
47011030	Ina yonga leendaa aa gɛ nya eya qai, ngɔɔ teea nhanda na nhu nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa nya gaanhu haa ɔ.
47011031	Ngebɔ na nana Maliki na Yisɔsi ngi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, nana nduba i ngi laa na nwa nhaa guna bɛɛ, i nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ndɛɛ aile ngaa kɔɔla.
47011032	Nhuna ngee Lamaasikɔsi, hota manha na nana ee Manha mbaa nau Alitasi, kɛɛ pelenga kulugbaangaa ti au siaa aa nge kangaa ti nya aa gboto.
47011033	Kɛlɛ kangi heia bɛɛtɛ nhu nana ti nya guai la aa pɛlɛ goi na huulɛnwaa na bele, awae kangi ala nwaa hakpaa.
47012001	Kang~a~a yonga lee, hali nha qani ngai nhu. Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu ngɔɔ yɛpɛa nana nhanwa Maliki na i pelenga ngi tɔa nya nɛɛnwaa nhu o, ka nana Maliki na i kɛi aa nge.
47012002	Ngi laanɛɛ nwɔɔ ila kee gɔɔnaa nana Ngebɔ i ala lɛi mɛɛ aliyana mɛɛna naa aa gɔha na tɔ bɛɛ, kɛlɛ oo kpaunga tɔ aa fogo puu i manhu naai nhuna maa nhanda indinɛi i beleni. (Ngai kɔɔ ina i belenia tɔmbaga nhu inaile ala nɛɛnwaa nhu nwɛɛɔ i tɔi na, kɛlɛ k`a Ngebɔ gbo alɛɛ i maa gee nana gɔɔ.)
47012003	Awa ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ndakpa indinɛi ka Ngebɔ i ala lɛa aliyana, (kɛlɛ ngi kɛ gbɔnhu, ngai kɔɔ ina i belenia tɔmbaga nhu inaile ala nɛɛnwaa nhu nwɛɛɔ i tɔi na, kɛlɛ k`a Ngebɔ gbo alɛɛ i maa gee nana gɔɔ.)
47012004	Ka ndakpa indinɛi i nhanda nwɛi mɛinga na nana nhu huo fuo ngɔ ai na, awa nana nuu gbɔha laa ai ku aa kɛ.
47012005	Ngaa yonga leea ndakpa indinɛi bonda lɔgɔ fanwa, kɛlɛ ngaigɔ yonga lee nya gbɔha na lɔgɔ fanwa, k`a nhanda nhanda na nwɛ gbo nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa nya gaanhu haa ɔ alɛɛ ngaa yonga lee fanwa.
47012006	Gbaa ina yonga leendaa gbala ngaa gɛ nyaa, ngaigɔ bele ngaa mɔu mɔu mɔɔ, gbɛnhaile tɔmbaga na nwɛ ngɔɔ gɛ aa kɛndaa. Kɛlɛ ngoo loko guaa maa gee indinɛi nhu, kangaa nuu ai ba nya gbau ngaa pele lagbiti nana tee ngɔ nanaa aa tɔ ngaa pele, inaile nanaa aa mɛi nya la.
47012007	Nhanda nwaa luu lua bombou mbaa na nhanwa nana Maliki na i ndɔgɔɔuni aa nge, i ba pelenaa ngi yonga lee nja lee ngɔnhu. Kɛlɛ ka nhanda i belenga nana i nya bɛndii aa maa yonga na leendaa. Maa nhanda na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa kangi kpaai gbaai hɔlɔa nya lugu na nwa, nana i beleni aa Setani lo mɔɔ, awa kɛɛ baa nya le, kangaa i nya gbɔan, awa tii nya bɛndindaa o aa yonga leendaa.
47012008	Kangi laaminɛa Maliki na le naa heinwaa chawa kangaa i pele kpɔu gbɔu indinɛi i gbe nyaa.
47012009	Kɛlɛ kpɛɛmbo na i ngɔai nya eya ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, "Nya banda bandayaa na ku ngɔ tɔ aa biee, gbaa nhuna bi gaanhu aa gɛ haai, k`a nya fɔha na i ngi enge na bele tee ngɔ bɛɛ." Faa nwɛɛe ngɔɔ goonhu nɛɛa nja lee ngɔnhu aa yonga leendaa nya gaanhu haa na nhu, kangaa Kilaisi fɔha na i ba gɛ nya nhu.
47012010	Gbaa, Kilaisi lɔgɔ fanwa, nya gaanhu haa na na nhu o, ka ngɛi na nhu o, nhanda nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ma nhu o, ngaa sɛɛgɛ nhu o, ka kaande nhanda nhu o, ku ngɔ tɔ aa nge. Gbaa ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhuna nya gaanhu haa ɔ na, nhu nwɛɛ nya nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ na.
47012011	Ngoo belenga aa mɔu mɔu mɔɔ! Wua nwɛ wu peleni ngi beleni la. Gbaa yaati wua nwɛ nha wu ba gɛ aa nya yia banda gɛndaa nana nhanwa ngi pele pelenga.
