Gbaa hali nha nya nuu gbɔhayaa na ai gbekpeni ina maa nhuu nhua to mbelaa gbekpengaa i natiini ma, tai gbekpeni ti lee ngɔ nyaa hali kolo seeli.
47012012	Kuague guague tɔ na nana aa tɔmbaga lo mɔɔ lɔgɔɔu. Ala nwɛ aa kuague ngoo, ngenge nwaa luu lua o, ka kamaa nhanda, awa ka Ngebɔ i indinɛi belenga aa nya nhu bele aa ndii lo bɛɛ nhuna ngee na mɛɛ wu liiya.
47012013	Ee ngai wu houi maa nhiɛ ɔ ɛɛ ngi laanɛɛ belaa lagbitia i houi la bɛɛ, gbaa k`a indinɛi nwɛ gbo, aa kɛɛlaa ngai gulai nhu aa wu nwɔɔlindaa nya baabaandaa nhanwa? Awae a ndoa na nyɛɛ indinɛi nhanwa ngi ngaa haai.
47012014	Awa nya baalaa na wuee naa chawa na nwɛ aa indinɛi tɔ ngi nwaa gbatɛa aa pelendaa, awa ngaigɔ pele nya gooti aa la wu umbaa, gbɛnhaile nana i wu eya ala aile ngaa ngɔɛ ɔɛ, kɛlɛ wu gbɔha na nwɛ ngaa wu ɔɛ ɔɛ. Gbaa ndengaa i tua aile ti ungaa i ti gooti na i laa laai ti umbaae kɛlɛ ti ungaa i mɛ ndengaa i ti gooti na i laa laai ti umbaa.
47012015	Awa nya, nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nana aa gɛ nya eya, ngi nyaai wu nhanwa, awa ngi gbɔha na gɔan wu lɛɛhu na nhanwa. Kɛlɛ nhuna nya lomayaa na wu nhanwa aa gɛ aa tɛɛlaa ma, ee wu nda lomayaa na nya nhanwa ɔɔ yeia mbu?
47012016	Kɛlɛ a kuunndɛ ma aa kɛɛlaa nya gbɔha na ngai nya gooti lai wu umbaa. Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, wu nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nya sɔti ɔ, awa ndɛɛ umbaa bele nwɛ ngi wu nwaa hɔlɔi la.
47012017	Gbɔɔ ee ngi nhai hoia wu eya aa natiini nhu bele ngi ti loni wuee?
47012018	Kangi Taitɔsi nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛnga kangaa i ba wuee, awa kangi mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na bɛɛa alaa, ee Taitɔsi i nhai hoia wu eya aa kalagalasuma? Ee nua aile ni engei yina ila na nhu? Ee nua aile naa sia aa pele ila na?
47012019	Lɔgɔ indinɛi nhu bɛɛ wua waa nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nua naa lapi aa gbɔha guandaa wu eya. Ngemɛɛ aile hali! Naa yɛpɛa aa pele ngɔ na kpala ngi Kilaisia kangaa ni yɛpɛ la Ngebɔ au bele nhu, awa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ naa pele pele, kpɔndaa nhaa nwɛɛ wuaa kangaa wu gbɛa wu laanɛɛ na nhu, napangaa wua n`i lomayaa belaa i ngaa wuee.
47012020	Nya lua ɔ aa kɛɛlaa naangaa lɔgɔ na ngaa ba wuee, wu gɛ ɔ na wɔɔ gɛ na, ndoganhu bai ɔɔ gɛa mba aa pele na ngɔi i nyaa wu gɛ na. Awa nya gbɔnhu naangaa nya gɛ ɔ na ngɔɔ gɛ na, ndoganhu bai ɔɔ gɛa mba aa pele na ngɔi wuaa ngi gɛ na. Awa naangaa mbaabaga ɔɔ gɛa na, tii tolo o, ndii gbaai o, fɔɔndiyaa o, njafa o, sia nhu o, ngaunwaa lɛ o, ka yogobee.
47012021	Nya lua ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nhuna ngaa ba gbɔnhu wuee, naangaa nya Eebɔ na ɔɔ nya aa ufenaa wu au bele nhu, awa ngɔɔ ɔɔa ningaa gbinhi gbinhia nwa natiini ti nhanda nyɔu belengaɔ ngɔhanwaa, kɛlɛ tai boteni kualaa chanhainjaa gbaha mba na nhu o, ndo siandaa nhu o, ka feelaa nyɔu nyɔu na nana ti pelengaɔ.
47013001	Indinɛi heinwaa chawa na nwɛ ngaa ba wuee hitima nwa. Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Chaagbe o chaagbe k`a maa seelia feengaa taa gɛ na inaile ti gɛ chawa."
47013002	Nhuna ngee na tii wua o aa nya hitima na fee na lɔgɔ, awa ka chaanngi nhu ngai na tii wua o, kangi natiini ndaanhiinga ti nhanda nyɔu belengaɔ ngɔhanwaa, awa ka lagbitia i gbɔnhu bɛɛ, aa kɛɛlaa nhuna ngaa ba gbɔnhu, ngɔɔ ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ gbɔɔnia.
47013003	Indinɛi nwɛ ɔɔ bele ngaa seeli na nana kpala ngi wuaa aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi aa yɛpɛa aa nya nhu bele. Nhuna aa wu hou ngɔ gbatɛ, njaaiyaai nwɔɔ aile aa ala wu nhanwa, kɛlɛ k`ɛɛ ngi fɔha na lɔgɔɔu wu nhu.
47013004	Gbaa hali kɛɛ haaa njaaiyaai nhu kpekpa ngulu naa, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, aa Ngebɔ na fɔha na, ala gɛndɛ ɔ tuun. N`i hounwayaa na nhu ni na tii ala o, nua gbɔnhu ni yaaiyaai ɔ ni laanɛɛ na nhu. Kɛlɛ nua o wua o mi loganhu na nhanwa, mɔɔ gɛa na tii ala o aa Ngebɔ fɔha na.
47013005	A gbɔha na gbɛngbɛa awa wu gbɔha na nhua, kangaa wu tɔ ina wuaa laanɛɛ hei nhu. Aa tɔmbaga, wu nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi lɔ wu nhu? K`a pele mɛɛ aa bele ngaa kɛɛlaa woo gbahaa nhua nau tɔ ngaa lo ɔ fɛ.
47013006	Kɛlɛ nya laanɛɛ ɔ wɔɔ nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nua ni gbɔha na nai gbahai nhua na eya.
47013007	Chaanngi nhu k`ani laaminɛ Ngebɔ le aa kɛɛlaa waigɔ nhanda bele nana ngaa haa ɔ. Ndɔgɔɔundaa aile aa kɛɛlaa nai gbahaie kɛlɛ kpala tɔ nuaa kangaa wu nana bele tee ngɔ, hali nha bɛnhɛ mi bele ɛɛ kpaha belaa.
47013008	Gbaa nua nai gbɛ o gbɛ bele ma nana tɔmbaga na lolo ɔ la, kɛlɛ nana tɔmbaga na lo ngɔ la ala nwɛ naa pele.
47013009	Ni goonhu nɛɛ ɔ nhuna ni yaaiyaai ɔ na kɛlɛ wua wu nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ. Awa k`ani laaminɛ gbɔnhu kangaa wu chanhai hiti ɔ nhu.
47013010	Saabu indinɛi nhanwa, nya ngaa nhanda indinɛi gbaali gbaali nhuna ngai lɛ bai lɛ, kangaa nhuna ngaa ba, ngaigɔ bele ngaa kɔi wu liiya nhuna ngɔɔ gɛ aa ngengelaa aa fɔha na nana Maliki na i ngɔai nya eya, pelendaa nhanwa wu gbɛa wu laanɛɛ na nhu, kɛlɛ wu nyaaindaa la nhaile.
47013011	Nya gbelenwaa na, nya ndegea, kang~a~a gɛ, a awao yoo, a pelena kangaa wu gɛ chanhaini hiti ɔ nhu, a gɛa aa oo nhɛɛndaa nana nwa ngaa kɛ aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa, a gɛa ngoo ila nhu, a gɛa maa lɛi hei nhu, awa Ngebɔ na nana aa ndomayaa he ka maa lɛi ɔɔ gɛa na tii wua o.
47013012	Wu haa haa gbɔha na nwa pandaa ɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa. Ngebɔ ndaa i bɛɛ ti fama leeni wuɛɛ.
47013013	Kangaa Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi banda bandayaa na o, Ngebɔ lomayaa na o, ka Ngebɔ Yina na hounwayaa na i gɛ na tii wua o bɛɛ.
48001001	Nya, Pɔɔlu aa nge, ngi fama leeni wuɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa wuee Galeesia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Nya belendaa aa to mɔɔ ai segei nuu le inaile ningaa nhu bele, kɛlɛ Yisɔsi Kilaisi ka Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, nana i huui Yisɔsiu haa na nhu, too nya belenga aa ti lo mɔɔ.
48001002	Laanɛɛ belaa i ti bei bɛɛ too gula nya nwa aa fama leendaa laanɛɛ belaa i mbɛ Galeesia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
48001003	Kangaa mi Kɛɛgɛ na Ngebɔ ka mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti panda bandayaa lɔgɔɔu ngaa wuee ka maa lɛi.
48001004	Maliki indinɛi Yisɔsi Kilaisi ala nwɛ i ngi lɛɛhu na gɔanni haalaa nhanwa mi nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa mi umbondaa nhanwa kualaa yamana nyɔu nyɔu indinɛi eya, ndi ɔ aa mi Eebɔ na guunmayaa na lepele nana mi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala.
48001005	Nana maa ala bihɛ nhaa guna bɛɛ. Kangaa i bele.
48001006	Nana wu pelenga oo pelenga ngi gbɛi aa kɛɛlaa nhu gutu ɔ na siina wua waa gbee Ngebɔa, nana i uini wuaa ndi ɔ aa Kilaisi lepele nana i belengaɔ aa panda banda nwɔɔ wuee. awa wua waa bote ngoo lagbiti le nana ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na aile.
48001007	Ai beleni aa kɛɛlaa K`a ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ lagbiti lɔ na, kɛlɛ ningaa lɛingaa lɔ na natiini taa wu nɛɛnwaa yogobee awa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa kpala tɔ tuaa ti maa bote ngaa ndɛɛ.
48001008	Kɛlɛ hali bɛnhɛ i bele ngaa nua naa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ gɛɛ gɛɛ, inaile maleka na nana aa gua aliyana, aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ gɛ aa wuee nana ngaa hɛɛla ngɔ aa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ indinɛi naa kɛɛ gɛɛ aa wuee, kangaa Ngebɔ i maa nwɔɔ na gbɔɔni.
48001009	Ɛɛ ni kɛi nha pɛnhɛɛ, chaanngi nhu ngi kɛ gbɔnhu, ina nuu aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ gɛ aa wuee nana ngaa hɛɛla ngɔ aa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ indinɛi naa kɛɛ gɛɛ aa wuee, kangaa Ngebɔ i maa nwɔɔ na gbɔɔni.
48001010	Ngai peleni kangaa ningaa ti gɛ nya nhanda gbekpe ngɔ, Ngebɔ lɔ kpala ngi nyaa i kɛ. Ngai kɛi ningaa goonhu nɛɛlaa nhanwa nya nwa. Ina ngaa kɛ ningaa goonhu nɛɛlaa nhanwa nya nwa, ngai bele nha aa Kilaisi bou nwɔɔ.
48001011	Ni ndegea, kpala tɔ nyaa wu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nana ngaa kɛ ngɔ na bele ngaa wuee ai guai ningaa gbɔhaa le.
48001012	Ngai hɔlɔi kualaa nuu gbɔha le, inaile nuu gbɔha ai nya nagɔlii la, kɛlɛ Yisɔsi Kilaisi gbɔha na nwɛ i kɛi aa nge.
48001013	Wɔɔ gɛaɔ nya nwaanhaa nwɛi ngɔ nya eyaabele na ee gee na nhuna ngee Ngebɔ batou. Nhaa ngi gee peleni laanɛɛ belaa i ti yɔgɔlɔi awa ngaile maaumayaa gbau ti nwa. Awa nhaa ngi gee lapii aa ti nyaaindaa.
48001014	Ni Yuu batounjaa na nhu, nya nwɛ ngee laai ni ndege leenhua gbinhi gbinhia nwanhu, gbɛnhaile kangi gbɔha na gɔannga mi bembaa i ti s~ɔ na nwa.
48001015	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ ngi banda bandaayaa na nhu, oo nya nhu ɔhɛaɔ tɔ yeingaa ti gilaa nya le, awa kɛɛ uinga nyaa kangaa ngi enge mbɛ. Awa nhuna i ndaalaai
48001016	pelendaa nhanwa kangaa ngi kɔɔ ele nwɛɛ ngi Lou na aa ala kpei, kangaa ngi ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ ala nhanwa Kpitia i ngee, ngai nuu o nuu nwɔɔlini kɛndaa nhanwa aa nge nana ngɔɔ pele.
48001017	Awa hali bɛnhɛ Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu ngai lii na ngaa njɛpɛ laa laa nii natiini ngoo ti nhumbui aa bele ngaa to mbelaa gulɔɔ nyaa. Nana ngi peleni, nhu gutu ɔ na siina kangi ya Aleebia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, awa kangi bɛɛlaa boma Lamaasikɔsi laa waa na nhu.
48001018	Awa fogo chawa ngi leeni nhuna ngi beleni aa laanɛɛ nwɔɔ, kangi lɛa Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu hitima nwa Pita le, awa ngee naanɔɔ ala le nhaa kɛɛ kpaunga aa mi guu puu i manhu lɔɔu.
48001019	Kɛlɛ ngi lii na, to mɔɔ na lagbiti na nana ni lɔi na ala nwɛɔ aa Yemiisi napangaa mi Nwaliki na ndege nhiindou na.
48001020	Indinɛi bɛɛ ngaa kɛ aa wuee Kpaali nhu tɔmbaga nwɛɛ. Ngebɔ i nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ngai ndɛɛ gɔɔlai.
48001021	Poungaa na siina kangi ya hitima nwa Siilia bɔlɔgɔɔ na gakanwaa na ka Silisia bɔlɔgɔɔ na gakanwaa na.
48001022	Aa maa lɔgɔ na laanɛɛ belaa i tee Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu tai au bɛɛi nya nwa,
48001023	kɛlɛ tee nana nwɛi mɛinaa gbo lagbitia i tee kɛɛ gɛɛ, "Ndakpa na aa mi aa sɛɛgɛ ngɔ na bele ngɔɔ alaa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ gɛ chaanngi laanɛɛlaa nhanwa aa Kilaisi, kɛlɛ pɛnhɛɛ naɔ kɛɛ lapi aa natiini nyaaindaa ti laanɛɛ ɔ naɔ aa Kilaisi."
48001024	Awa faa nwɛɛ ti ngebɔ bihɛi nya nhanwa.
48002001	Ngi guai Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu i kpauni aa fogo puu i manhu naai kangi bɛɛlaa na boma nii Banabaasi o, awa kangi ya gbɔnhu aa Taitɔsi.
48002002	Ngi liia na gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo ndɔgɔɔungaɔ aa nge aa kɛɛlaa kang~a~a li. Nhuna nee tɔɔ na nhu nii ngu mbelaa i ngoo, kangi ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhu gbagaa ti nwa nana ngaa maa Eebɔ yia na gɛɔ aa Kpitia i, gbɛnhaile kpala ngaile nyaa aa kɛɛlaa ni enge na ngi pelengaɔ ka nana ngɔɔ pele i li mbɛ yaaiyaai ma bele nhu.
48002003	Ni ndege lou na Taitɔsi, hali nha Giliki nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala, tai ala gɔɔbii ngi nwanha nhanda belendaa nhanwa,
48002004	hali nha ngemɛɛ kpala ngee lagbitiaa kangaa i bele gɛnhi. Ka ningaa indiini ti gbɔha na belenga ɛɛ ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa nwɛɔ aa tuee, kati gulaa ni nwa ɛɛ ngu ndɛkpɛ belaa kangaa ti mi umbonjaa na gɔɔ kualaa Yuua i ti sɔ na eya nana mi hɔlɔa ndi ɔ aa hounwayaa na mi nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, gbɛnhaile ti lo ngɔ la ti mi bele ngaa nduaa Sɔ na eya.
48002005	Kɛlɛ nai kuunni nana nwa kpala ngee tuaa kangaa ni pele hali kangaa tɛɛ ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na lɔmbaga na nwaa lobi wu nhanwa.
48002006	Kɛlɛ natiini ti gɛi ti nwa ngu mbelaa nwɛɔ aa tuee, maa u mbelaa indiini siina tai gɛi kang~a~a gbɛ o gbɛ nwaa lobi kualaa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhu nana ngee kɛɛ gɛɛ. (Ngi indinɛi gɛia gbɛnhaile ti nhanda na tee nhu ngai nhu. Ngebɔ ai nuu gɔhɔ ngaa ala lɔ ngɔ na.)
48002007	Kɛlɛ kati nhu kɔɔnga tɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ oo ngenge ɔa ɔ ngeya ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa nhanwa aa Kpitia i, ɛɛ gbo i ngenge ɔai Pita eya ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa nhanwa aa Yuua i.
48002008	Gbaa Ngebɔ i nya belenia aa to mɔɔ Kpitia i ngee, ɛɛ gbo i Pita beleni aa to mɔɔ Yuua i ngee.
48002009	Awa nhuna Pita o, Yemiisi o, ka Yɔni, natiini ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ ngu mbelaa, ti nhu kɔɔni aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ oo ngenge indinɛi bonda ɔaa ngeya tolou, kati eyaa hama bii piinga nuaa nii Banabaasi o, ndɔgɔɔundaa nwɛɔ aa nuee aa kɛɛlaa nhanda ilangaa i mɛ aa nuee. Awa nua bɛɛ kani kuunnga aa kɛɛlaa nya o Banabaasi o ni enge Kpitia i ndiiya, awa tua pa mɛɛ Yuua i ndiiya.
48002010	Nana gbo kpɛti ti maa nhanda nhu nwɔɔlini ala nwɛɔ aa kɛɛlaa kanaa nɛgili aa mbaa mbelaa i natiini ti laanɛɛ belaa i ndiiya Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu ɛɛ gbo kpala ngi nyaaɔ kangaa i bele gɛnhi.
48002011	Kɛlɛ nhuna Pita i bai Antiɔki laa waa na nhu, kangi njia gɛa aa ala laanɛɛ belaa i ngau bele nhu bɛɛ, gbɛnhaile nana i peleni ngaa haa ɔ.
48002012	Gbaa ndakpangaa lɛingaa Yemiisi i ti loni nhuna tai lɛ gɛi bai, Pita ee mɛnhɛi nwɛa ngilamaaa tii Kpitia i ngoo. Kɛlɛ nhuna ndakpangaa indiini ti bai kɛɛ gbenga aa mɛnhɛi nwɛndaa ngilamaaa tii Kpitia i ngoo, gbɛnhaile kɛɛ luaa natiini mba ti gɛi k`a ningaa taa Kpitia i ti nwanha nhanda bele pele.
48002013	Awa Yuua i bɛpɛ na bɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa tueeɔ aa maa lɔgɔ na kati nwɔia Pita nwa. Awa hali bɛnhɛ Banabaasi kɛɛ nwɔia ti nwa.
48002014	Nhuna ngi tɔi aa kɛɛlaa tai sia nwa aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na lɔmbaga na bele, kangi gɛa Pita nwa laanɛɛ belaa i ngau bele nhu, "Bia Yuu nwɔɔ nwɛ aa biee, kɛlɛ bi eyaabele na ai beleni ɛɛ Yuu nwɔɔ. Aa gee bele baa Kpitia i kɔɔbi kangaa ti bele ɛɛ Yuua?"
48002015	Aa tɔmbaga, Yuua nwɛ aa muee kpei kɛlɛ "Nhanda nyɔu Gbitia i" ngaile ɛɛ Yuua i taa ui nda tuaa.
48002016	Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nuu ai gbɔha bele ngaa tee mɔɔ Ngebɔ gulɔɔ ndi ɔ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa sɔ nau, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ aa nuu bele ngaa tee mɔɔ ndi ɔ aa laanɛɛlaa aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi. Mua o gbɔnhu, moo laanɛɛaɔ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi kangaa Ngebɔ i ba mi bele ngaa tee mbelaa ndi ɔ aa mi laanɛɛ na bele ngɔ na Kilaisi nhu, kɛlɛ nana belendaa aile hali Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la. Gbaa Ngebɔ aigɔ nuu o nuu bele ngaa tee mɔɔ nana belendaa nhanwa Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la.
48002017	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ Ngebɔ aa gɛ ɔɔ mi bele ngaa tee mbelaa mi hounwayaa na nhanwa mii Kilaisi o, oo maaia aa kɛɛlaa nhanda nyɔu belaa nwɛ aa muee ɛɛ nhanda nyɔu Gbitia i, ee na nwɛ ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi nwɛ aa mi ɔa nhanda nyɔu nhu? Ala aile hali!
48002018	Ina aa bele ngaa nya nwɛ ngɔɔ nana gbatɛ boma ngi nyaaiaɔ, ɔɔ belenaa aa kɛɛlaa ngoo gbɔha na belenga aa nuu nana i Sɔ na nyaaia.
48002019	Kina mua maa yɛpɛ Sɔ na nhanwa, baa tɔ gbo ɛɛ nya haa ɔ, Sɔ na gbɔha na nwɛ i indinɛi beleni aa nge. Indinɛi bɛɛ i belenia kangaa ngi gɛ na Ngebɔ nhanwa. Kɛɛ belenga ɛɛ nii Kilaisi o ni haai nwa ngilamaaa ngi ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na.
48002020	Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, nya aile nya gɛndɛ ɔ kɛlɛ Kilaisi nwɛ ala gɛndɛ ɔ nya nhu. Nya bele ngɔ indinɛi ngi nhu chaanngi nhu nya yigba ngɔ Ngebɔ Lou na nhu, nana i loni aa nge, awa kɛɛ ngi lɛɛhu na gɔannga haalaa nhanwa ni qaniyaa nhanwa.
48002021	Ngai gbeei Ngebɔ banda bandayaa naa. Kɛlɛ ina Ngebɔ aa teenjaa hea nuuɛ ndi ɔ aa Sɔ na lepele, ɔɔ lɔgɔɔunaa aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi haa na i peleni kolo ai nhu!
48003001	Wua nɛɛnwaa haa Galeesia indiini ngaa wuee, wu bele ngɔ ɛɛ nhɔa lɔ ti fei wuɛɛ. Ee wai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ mba Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhɛɛndaa na nhanwa ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na!
48003002	Gbɛɛ ngi wu nwɔɔli ngaa mɔɔli ngindinɛi, "Ee wu Ngebɔ Yina na hɔlɔia aa nana belendaa nhanwa Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la inaile aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nwɛindaa lepele ka laanɛɛlaa la?"
48003003	Ee wu nɛɛnwaa haa ɔ nja lee ngɔnhu? Woo tɔɔlongaɔ aa kɛɛlaa ndɛɛhu nyiɛ nhu ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ Yina na nhu bele. Ee wu lo ngɔ la wu ngaa gua aa wu nda fɔha?
48003004	Ee nana bɛɛ wu kɔɔni i bele peleni wu liiya wɔɔ gɛa bɔnɔfuu mɛɛ? Ina aa tɔmbaga aa bele ngaa bɔnɔfuu mɛɛ,
48003005	ee Ngebɔ i Ngi Yina na leenia wuɛɛ awa ee kɛɛ kamaa nhanda bele pelenga wu nhu, gbɛnhaile woo nana belenga Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la, inaile gbɛnhaile woo ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nwɛinga awa woo laanɛɛa la?
48003006	Ami nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlalɛ baa mi bemba na Eebilahamu nhanda na nwa, "Kɛɛ laanɛɛa aa Ngebɔ, awa ngi laanɛɛ na nhaa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ i ala gbauni ɛɛ tee mɔɔ."
48003007	Faa nwɛɛe kawaa kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa laanɛɛ belaa i tua nwɛ mi bemba na Eebilahamu lengaa i ngaa tuee kpei.
48003008	Awa Ngebɔ Gbaali na lɔ kɛ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ Kpitia i pelenaa aa tee mbelaa ndi ɔ aa ti laanɛɛ na lepele. Awa indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi kpou aa mi bemba na Eebilahamu, "Ngebɔ ɔɔ nde ngoo nde lubaa aa bi nhu bele."
48003009	Mi bemba na Eebilahamu kɛɛ laanɛɛa aa Ngebɔ. Faa nwɛɛ natiini bɛɛ ti laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Ngebɔ, Ngebɔ oo ti lubaa ɛɛ i mi bemba na Eebilahamu lubai.
48003010	Natiini bɛɛ ti yigba ngɔ nana belendaa nhu Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la tuaa laangaa hei nhu. Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Laangaa i gɛa nuu o nuu nwa nana ai nana beleni bɛɛ kpaali ngɔ na Sɔ kɔɔ na nhu ɛɛ Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la i pele."
48003011	Chaanngi moo nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba aa kɛɛlaa nuu aigɔ gbɔha na bele ngaa tee mɔɔ Ngebɔ gulɔɔ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa sɔ nau, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Nuu na nana Ngebɔ aa ala bele ngaa tee mɔɔ ndi ɔ aa maa nwɔɔ na laanɛɛ na nhu bele ala nwɛ aa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na hɔlɔ."
48003012	Kɛlɛ Sɔ na hounwayaa ai ti loganhu tii laanɛɛ o. Nana maa nhiɛ ɔ, ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Nuu o nuu nana aa nana bele Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la bɛɛ ɔɔ gɛa Sɔ na nwaa hei nhu."
48003013	Kilaisi oo mi umbongaɔ kualaa Sɔ na laangaa na eya, kina ala i belengaɔ aa laangaa mi nhanwa, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛia, "Nuu o nuu nana ti ala baai ngulua, maa nwɔɔ na Ngebɔ laangaa na nwɛ i ala nwa."
48003014	Kilaisi i mi umbonia kangaa nduba na nana Ngebɔ i mi bemba na Eebilahamu nɛɛnwaa loniɔ fanwa, maa luba na siina Ngebɔ ɔɔ pelenaa Kpitia i ti hɔlɔ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele, kangaa aa laanɛɛ nhu bele mi ba Ngebɔ Yina na hɔlɔ nana Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei.
48003015	Ni ndegea, ngɔɔ kuague ndɔgɔɔunaa aa wuee nana nhanwa aa bele chaanngi. Feengaa taa kuun nhanda nwa loganhu ti bote boma ti ngilima bele ngilimayaa indinɛi nhanwa, ti hee ngɔ na loganhu ngila mɔɔ aigɔ gɛ na nana aa maa ilimayaa na siina nyaai inaile aigɔ njia lagbiti bɛɛ mba na.
48003016	A kɔɔna aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ kɛɛ nɛɛnwaa lo to fee heeaɔ mi bemba naɛ Eebilahamu ka Eebilahamu lou na. Ngebɔ Gbaali na ai wuumbaa yia gɛie aa kɛɛlaa "ndengaa", koonhu na nwɛ aa ningaa gbinhi gbinhia, kɛlɛ ngila mɔɔ yia nwɛ i kɛi aa kɛɛlaa "ndou," koonhu na nwɛ aa nuu i ila kele napangaa Kilaisi.
48003017	Nana ngaa maa yia gɛ ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ kɛɛ Ngilimayaa gbatɛa loganhu tii mi bemba na o Eebilahamu, awa ka Ngebɔ i kɛa aa kɛɛlaa nana ngi maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei ngɔɔ pelenaa. Sɔ na nana Ngebɔ i fei kuunmayaa indinɛi bou nwa, nhuna Ngilimayaa na i kpauni aa fogo gɛmɛ naai, fogo buu buu chawa kɔmaa, maa Sɔ ngindinɛi fɛɛlɛ ai alɛɛ aa Ngilimayaa na nyaaindaa awa ka Ngebɔ nɛɛnwaa lo na guandaa kpagaa.
48003018	Ina nana Ngebɔ aa fe, nuu nwaa yeilaa nhaa nwɛɛ Sɔ naɛ aa fe, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ai beleni nha nana nhanwa Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo fei aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ pelenaa. Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ i ngɔaia mi bemba na Eebilahamu eya aa nɛɛnwaa lo nhu bele.
48003019	K`a kolo na ngigbɛɛ nwɛ nha i Sɔ ngindinɛi nhu? Ti maalonia gbo Ngilimayaa indinɛi nwa kangaa ti nana lɔgɔɔu taa gɛ ma nhanda nyɔu. Awa Ngebɔ i Sɔ na siina belenia aa kolo nhu Sɔ nhaa Kilaisi kualaa mi bemba na Eebilahamu le na nhu i bai nana Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo fei. Ngebɔ kɛɛ Sɔ na siina ɔaa maleka i ngeya kɛndaa nhanwa aa Moosisi. Awa Moosisi indinɛi siina oo belenga aa liiyaanhulo ningaa i ngee ka Ngebɔ.
48003020	Kɛlɛ mɛɛna nuu ila ngaa gɛ na, liiyaanhulo gbala ngai gɛ alaa. Awa Ngebɔ kɛɛ engea ngila ngɔ.
48003021	Ee indinɛi lɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa nana Sɔ na i kɛi ndoganhu bai ɔ aa nɛɛnwaa lo na nana Ngebɔ i fei? Ngemɛɛ aile hali! Gbaa ina sɔ ngee naanɔɔ nana ɔɔ ba aa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ nuu o nuu belenaa aa tee mɔɔ maa nwɔɔ na nwaa bɛɛlaa nhanwa Sɔ nau.
48003022	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ ngelou gbɔha na lɔ nhanda nyɔu fɔhau. Indinɛi nhanwa, nana Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo fei ndi ɔ aa laanɛɛ nhu bele Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu, ɔɔ ngɔaa natiini ngeya taa laanɛɛ.
48003023	Kɛlɛ yeingaa lɔgɔ na i hitii ma nhuna ningaa ti laanɛɛi aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi, Sɔ na oo mi belengaɔ aa ngi gbindi bɛlɛu belaa nhaa Ngebɔ i ndɔgɔɔu ngaa muee aa kɛɛlaa kamaa laanɛɛ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
48003024	Faa nwɛɛe Sɔ na mi nwanhu nwɔɔ na nwɛɔ nhaa aa lɔgɔ na Kilaisi i bai, kangaa Ngebɔ i ba mi bele ngaa tee mbelaa ndi ɔ aa laanɛɛlaa aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
48003025	Chaanngi nhu lɔgɔ na i hitia laanɛɛlaa nhanwa aa Kilaisi, Sɔ na mi nwanhu nwɔɔ aile gbɔnhu.
48003026	Wua bɛɛ Ngebɔ lengaa nwɛ aa wuee wu laanɛɛ na nhanwa aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
48003027	Ti Ngebɔ ua bele pelenia aa wuee hounwayaa nhu wui Kilaisi o, awae, chaanngi woo belenga ɛɛ Kilaisi.
48003028	Indinɛi nhanwa, ndoganhu gɔɛ ai Yuua i ndoganhu tii Kpitia i ngoo, ai nduaa i ndoganhu tii nhanda baamba belaa i ngoo, awa ai kɛgɛingaa i ndoganhu ti njiengaa i ngoo, kɛlɛ wua bɛɛ ningaa ilangaa nwɛ aa muee hounwayaa nhu Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu.
48003029	Awa ina woo belenga aa Kilaisi ndaa, k~a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa mi bemba na Eebilahamu lengaa nwɛ aa wuee awa wɔɔ nana hɔlɔa Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei.
48004001	Nana ngaa maa yia gɛ ala nwɛ aa nhiindou nana ngi kɛɛgɛ na i ala nɛɛnwaa loni aa kɛin. Aa bele ngaa maa nhiindou na lɔ lou goloyaa nhu, aa belenaa gbo ɛɛ ndua. Hali nha ala bo mɛɛ aa kɛin na bɛpɛ na bɛɛ.
48004002	Nhuna aa gɛ lou goloyaa na nhu, ningaa lɔ na natiini ala nwaa nhanda na aa gɛ laai ti umbaa nhaa i ku nwaa nhanda nau aa gbɔha.
48004003	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa muee, nduaa nwɛɔ aa muee ngelou i nhu afɔngaa i ngeya pɛnhɛɛ yeingaa mi gilaa nana gɔɔ tɔmbaga le.
48004004	Kɛlɛ nhuna lɔgɔ gbekpe na Ngebɔ i ndai i hitii ma, ka Ngebɔ i ngi Lou na leenga ngelou i nhu. Ndou indinɛi kɛɛ baa nuu gbɔha guague nhu awa kɛɛ nwaa bɛɛa Yuua i ti Sɔ nau,
48004005	natiini ngumbondaa nhanwa tee nana bele Sɔ na lo ngɔ na la, kangaa mua bɛɛ mi ba bele ngaa Ngebɔ lengaa.
48004006	Ndɔgɔɔundaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ lengaa nwɛ aa wuee, ka Ngebɔ i ngi Lou na Yina na leenga muɛɛ, Yina na siina nana aa pele maa gɛ, "Hapa, ni Kɛɛgɛ i!"
48004007	Faa nwɛɛe ndua aile gbɔnhu aa biee, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ lou nwɛ aa biee. Awa kina Ngebɔ lou nwɛ aa biee, Ngebɔ ɔɔ nana ɔaa bi eya bɛɛ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei ngi lengaa i fanwa.
48004008	Nhuna wai lɛ gɛiɔ beleni aa laanɛɛ belaa aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi, maa lɔgɔ na siina wai Ngebɔ gɔɔ, faa nwɛɛe nduaa nwɛɔ aa wuee ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le.
48004009	Kɛlɛ chaanngi wu Ngebɔ gɔɔnga aa wu Eebɔ la, mi gɛa chaanngi Ngebɔ i wu gɔɔnga, gbɔɔ gbɔnhu waa nwaa bɛɛ ngelou i nhu afɔ manhangaa i mbu? Ti yaaiyaai ɔ awa kolo ai ti nhu. Gbɔɔ gbɔnhu wu lo ngɔ la wu bele ngaa ti luaa?
48004010	Wuaa nɛɛnwaa na bu ngɔ foo lɛingaa nhu o, ngau lɛingaa nhu o, fogo lɛingaa nhu o, ka lɔgɔ lɛingaa nhu tɔɔgɔɔ wu batou na nhu Ngebɔ le.
48004011	Nya lii nhɛɛ ngɔ wu nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa ngenge na bɛɛ nana ngi pelengaɔ wu nhanwa wai kpauni aa kolo enge.
48004012	Ni ndegea, awu lee nwɛɛ, a hitɛa nya ɔgɔbo nhu, gbɛnhaile ngoo belenga ɛɛ wua. Wai lɛ nhanda aa haaiɔ ngɔhanwaa aa nge.
48004013	Wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhuna ngi ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛiɔ aa wuee, nya hegbɛ ɔ na nhaa nwɛɛɔ.
48004014	Kɛlɛ haliɔ ni hegbɛ na ngi peleni kawu nɛɛnwaa nyaaia fanwa, kɛlɛ wai nya guu guai mbaɔ awa wai gbeei nyaa. Nana wu peleni, kawu nya binjanga ɛɛ wu ba ngebɔ nwaleka binjan gɔɔ, inaile aa pele ngɔ ila na kele wu ba Yisɔsi Kilaisi binja nda ɔ.
48004015	Wu goonhu nɛɛ ɔɔ aa pɛnhɛɛ na nhuna ngee na tii wua o, kɛlɛ gbɛɛ i pelenga nɛɛnwaa lobi ngi ɔaa wu nhu nya nhanwa? Ngaa yonga leea wu nhu aa kɛɛlaa hali wu au na kpei wu ba kuu guaa nhuɔ wu ngɔa ɔa nya eya ina maa fɛɛlɛ i ba gɛ wuɛɛ.
48004016	Ee tɔmbaga na nhanwa ngaa kɛ aa wuee faa nwɛɛ wu nɛgili ɔ na nya nhanwa i belenga ɛɛ wu haalee?
48004017	Ningaa lɛingaa i ti lii na bu ɔ wuee nja lee ngɔnhu, kɛlɛ nana i ti nɛɛnwaa aa pelendaa aigɔ wu qani. Nana kpei i ti nɛɛnwaa ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa ti pele ni laanɛɛ na o, wu nda laanɛɛ na o i ege nwa, kangaa wu lii na i ba bu tuee ɛɛ ti nda lii na bu ɔ na wuee.
48004018	Chaanngi, nhanda gbekpe mɛɛ aa lii na bundaa ngilamaaa ina maa belaa i taa gɛ tɔɔ pele ɔɔ baa ti nwa aa qani, Indinɛi tɔmbaga nwɛɛ awa kaa bele, kɛlɛ ai beleni ngi na tii wua o faa nwɛɛ.
48004019	Ni ungaa, ngi kɛ gbɔnhu aa wuee, ɛɛ gbo wu kɔɔ ngɔ njie na yɔgɔlɔ na aa pele nhuna aa gɛ fuu na nhu, maa yɔgɔlɔ na bonda nwɛ ngi nhu wu nhanwa nhaa wu bele ɛɛ Kilaisi.
48004020	Kpala tɔ nyaa ngi gɛ na tii wua o chaanngi nhu kangaa mi yɛpɛ ngilamaa. Kɛlɛ ngai nana gɔɔ ngɔɔ pele wu nhanwa.
48004021	Nya lo ngɔ la ngi mɔɔli pii natiini mba kpala ngi tuaa ti gbɔha na bele ngaa tee mbelaa Ngebɔ gulɔɔ ndi ɔ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa Sɔ nau.
48004022	Ngebɔ Gbaali na lɔ kɛ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa mi bemba naɔ Eebilahamu nhiindengaa feengaa tee ngeyaɔ. Nhiindou ila na feengaa indiini ndiiya ngi nje na ngeyaanyɔugbɛa nwɛɔ ngi nyanha na nhanwa, awa Eebilahamu nyanha na nana ndua aileɔ aa ala ngi nda nhiindou na nwɛɔ aa nhiindou lagbiti na.
48004023	Ngi nhiindou na nana ti hɔlɔi tii ngeyaanyɔugbɛa na o, maa nhiindou na ti ndenia ɛɛ chaanngi nhu holi, kɛlɛ ngi nhiindou na nana ti hɔlɔi tii ngi nyanha na o, ala ti hɔlɔia gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ nwɛɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei tuɛɛ.
48004024	Awa nhanda indinɛi i bele peleni mi bemba na Eebilahamu nhiindengaa feengaa i ti nwaa nhanda na nhu, maa nhuanaa nhanda lagbiti nwa. Njiengaa feengaa i tuaa ngilimayaa fee lomaa gbau ngɔ. Ka Heega leengaa i ti belenga aa nduaa nhuna i ti leni, awa Heega indinɛi ala nwɛ i ngilimayaa na ila kee na lomaa na gbau ngɔ nana kpatɛ ngɔ na Sainai Yie naa.
48004025	Nhuna nuu aa gɛa njɛpɛlaa Heega nhanwa, maa nwɔɔ na siina alaa yɛpɛ Sainai Yie na nhanwa. Awa Heega ai loni gbo Sainai Yie na nhanwa mɛɛ Aleebia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, kɛlɛ alaa gbɔnhu loni yamana indinɛi nhu Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nhu nhanwa. Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na ndua nwɛɛ, awa ngemɛɛ aa maa belaa i bɛɛ.
48004026	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nda Yɛlusalɛmu laa waa na nduayaa nhanda baa ngɔ mba, awa pele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ mi nje na nwɛ aa ala.
48004027	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Bia na bɔlɛkɛ aa biee goonhu nɛɛa. Bia na nhanwa bai ndou le koonhu gbaai beleni, yɔkpɔu gulaa bi bote boma bi koonhu nɛɛ ɔɔ bele. Gbaa njie na nana ngi nhii na aa gbee alaa ɔɔ ndengaa gbinhi gbinhia hɔlɔa tee ngɔ njie naa nana ngi nhii na ai gbeei alaa."
48004028	Chaanngi mua, ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa, moo belenga aa Ngebɔ lengaa ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ nɛɛnwaa lo na nhu gbɛɛlaa na gɔɔndaa lepele, ɛɛ gbo i nɛɛnwaa lo fei mi bemba naɛ Eebilahamu Aaisaaki nhanwa.
48004029	Aa maa lɔgɔ na nhiindou na nana ti hɔlɔi ɛɛ chaanngi nhu holi indinɛi, kɛɛ nhiindou nana aa sɛɛgɛa nana ti ndeni ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ Yina na lepele. Awa maa aa sɛɛgɛ indinɛi bonda alaa bele chaanngi nhu yamana indinɛi nhu.
48004030	Kɛlɛ ngigbɛɛ nwɛ maa kala Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu? Ɛgɛe "Ngeyaanyɔugbɛa na gbɛa nwa tii ngi nhiindou na o. Ngeyaanyɔugbɛa na nhiindou na aigɔ gbɛ o gbɛ hɔlɔ kɛɛgɛ na gɛin na nwa, kɛlɛ kɛin na bɛɛ kaa gɛ kɛmbɛ nwaa nyanha na nhiindou na gaanhu."
48004031	Awa faa nwɛɛe ni ndegea, ngeyaanyɔugbɛa na lengaa aile aa muee kɛlɛ kɛmbɛnwaa nyanha na lengaa nwɛ aa muee.
48005001	Nhanda baambayaa nhu nwɛɛ mi na gbɛnhaile Kilaisi oo nhanda baangaɔ muaa! A kɔɔna aa kɛɛlaa kawaa lo nhu gbɛndɛnjaa nhu ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti umbo ngɔ, awa awɛɛ gbɔha na bele ngaa nduaa gbɔnhu.
48005002	A oo nhɛɛndɛ! Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge ngi kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa ina waa kuun taa wu nwanha nhanda bele pele ndi ɔ aa Yuua i ti Sɔ na lepele, k`a oo lɔɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa nana Kilaisi i peleni wu nhanwa wai maa qani hɔlɔi hali kolo seeli.
48005003	Ngi kɛ gbɔnhu aa wuee nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa nuu o nuu nana aa kuun ti ngi nwanha nhanda bele, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa maa nwɔɔ na kaa nwaa bɛɛ Sɔ nau bɛɛ.
48005004	Wua na waa pele kangaa Ngebɔ i wu bele ngaa tee mbelaa wu nwaa bɛɛlaa na nhanwa Sɔ nau, wua na siina woo loganhu gɔɛaɔ aa Kilaisi. Woo guaɔ Ngebɔ banda bandayaa nau.
48005005	Mua mi nhanwa, mi nɛɛnwaa la na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ mi belenaa aa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ. Awa ndi ɔ na aa Ngebɔ Yina na fɔha na lepele mua maa maa nɛɛnwaa lo ngindinɛi nwaa golo ɛɛ mi laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Kilaisi.
48005006	Gbaa ina maa gɛ hounwayaa nhu mii Kilaisi o, ti gɛ nuu nwanha nhanda bele ngɔ inaile tai gɛ pele ngɔ, ala aile aa ndoganhu gɔɛ gbatɛ hali. Kɛlɛ nana kolo ɔ aa pelendaa ala nwɛ aa laanɛɛ nana aa enge aa ndomayaa nhu bele.
48005007	Wee pelenaaɔ maa nhiɛ ɔ! Kɛlɛ ele nwɛɛ i pelenga wu gbenga aa nwaa bɛɛlaa tɔmbaga oo nau? I gee wu gɔɔbii?
48005008	Aa tɔmbaga Ngebɔ aile, gbɛnhaile alɛɛ i wu nwaa laanni ala le.
48005009	Ɛɛ taa kɛ tɛɛ, "Mbugu gbɔnhu golo alɛɛ aa pele lɛgɛ gbɛnha na aa gɛ waa."
48005010	Kina mua bɛɛ mi nwaa gbɔ ngɔ na ngilamaaa aa Maliki na, nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa waigɔ nɛɛnwaa lobi pele, awa nuu na nana aa wu nɛɛnwaa yogobee, maa nwɔɔ na i gee beleni aa gbɛ o gbɛ nwɔɔ, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala gbɔɔnia.
48005011	Kɛlɛ ni ndegea, ina nha ɛɛ ningaa taa kɛ nya nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa nya ngaa kɛ aa kɛɛlaa manha nhanda kolo ɔ, ina k`a ngemɛɛ, gbɔɔ ningaa taa nya aa sɛɛgɛ tuun? Ina tɔmbaga nwɛɛ kangi kɛa, k~a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ni yɛpɛ na ngaa kɛ ngu to ngɔ Kilaisi haalaa na nhanwa ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na, maa yɛpɛ na siina aigɔ ba aa kpɔu gbɔu.
48005012	Alaa nya nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa ningaa i natiini taa wu nɛɛnwaa yogobee, maa nhiɛ ɔ nha ti nhanwa ti ba gbɔha na hɛɛmbo!
48005013	Ni ndegea, wua Ngebɔ oo wu nwaa laannga nhanda baambayaa nhu. Kɛlɛ ɛɛ gɛ wu nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa indinɛi nhanwa wɔɔ nana belenaa ngɔi na i wu lugu naa, awa maa ɔi na siina i sia aa wuee. Kɛlɛ nana maa nhiɛ ɔ waa pele, ndomayaa i pelena wu gbɔ kpɔ gbɔha naa.
48005014	Gbaa Sɔ na bɛpɛ na bɛɛ maa sɔu gbo yɛ aa Sɔ ngi ila, "Lona aa bi ndege nuu gbɔha na ɛɛ bi lo ngɔ na aa bi gbɔha na."
48005015	Kɛlɛ ina waa bele ɛɛ nhuaa gbaai gbaaia aa gbɔha na haaleenjaa lepele ka tolomayaa, a sogia, inaile wɔɔ gbɔha na nyaaia.
48005016	Nana ngaa maa yia gɛ ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, a gɛa na gbo ɛɛ Ngebɔ Yina na i gɛi wu gɛ na, awa awɛɛ nana bele kpala ngi wu lii naa pelendaa nhanwa.
48005017	Gbaa mua mi nuu gbɔhayaa na nhu nana kpala ngi muaa pelendaa nhanwa kpala ngai Ngebɔ Yina naa, awa nana kpala ngi Ngebɔ Yina naa kpala ngai muaa. Nhanda fee ngindinɛi faaleengaa nwɛ aa tuee loganhu, awa indinɛi oo lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa hali, awɛɛ nana bele kpala ngi wuaa.
48005018	Ina Ngebɔ Yina na aa sia aa wuee, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa awɛa fɛɛlɛ hei Sɔ naɛ kangaa i sia aa wuee.
48005019	Nana nuu aa pele ngi nuu gbɔhayaa na nhu kɔɔndaa nhu ai mba. Ala nwɛ aa, ndo siandaa o, ndii nyɔu o,
48005020	ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa batoundaa o, nhɔa nhanda o, faaleenjaa o, kɔɔ gɔɔ o, tolo o, ndii gbaai o, fɔɔndiyaa o, ka ngaa gɔɛ gɔɛyaa o,
48005021	nɛɛnwaa gbindi o, ndɔɔ hounjaa o, ndabi labi o, ka nhanda lagbiti nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ indinɛi bɛɛ. Ngi wu laanhii ɛɛ ngi wu laanhiiniɔ pɛnhɛɛ, aa kɛɛlaa natiini bɛɛ taa nhanda indinɛi bele pele bɛɛ taigɔ Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na laa hɔlɔ.
48005022	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ Yina na ala i ba aa ndomayaa o, koonhu nɛɛ o, maa lɛi o, ndii lo ngoo, nhanda banda o, kpekpenjaa o, laanɛɛyaa o,
48005023	maa yeiyaa o, ka gbɔha nhu houndaa. Sɔ ngai na nana tolo ɔ aa nhanda indinɛi.
48005024	Awa ningaa i natiini Yisɔsi Kilaisi ndaa i ngaa tuee too pelenga ti nuu gbɔhayaa na i haaa ka nana bɛɛ kpala ngi ti nuu gbɔhayaa naa ti pele.
48005025	Kina Ngebɔ Yina na oo ndɛɛhu heaɔ muɛɛ, awae kaa mi lɛɛhu na nwanhu gbee.
48005026	Amɛɛ aunwaa lɛ, inaile amɛɛ gbɔha na lɛ nga, inaile amɛɛ nɛɛnwaa lolo gbau mi ndege lengaa i fanwa.
48006001	Ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa, ina nuu aa nhanda nyɔu bele, wua na Ngebɔ Yina na aa sia aa wuee kawaa maa nwɔɔ na hitɛ teenjaa bele nhu. Kɛlɛ kawaa pele maa yeiyaa umbaa. Awa wu sogi, kangaa wua gbɔnhu wai ba maa nhanda nyɔu nana bonda bele.
48006002	A gbɔ kpɔna gbɔha naa aa wu gooti na. Awa ina waa pele, k~a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa wɔɔ nwaa bɛɛa Kilaisi Sɔ nau.
48006003	Ina nuu aa gbɔha na gbau ngaa kolonhu nwɔɔ, awa i maai na pa aa kɛɛlaa gbɛ o gbɛ aile aa ala, maa nwɔɔ na siina mɔu mɔu mɛɛ gbo aa gbɔha na nwɔu mɔu.
48006004	Ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ kaa eyaabele na sɔgbɛ. Ina ngeyaabele na aa gɛ gbekpeni, aa kunaa tɔ i gbɔha na gbau ngaa nuu gbekpe nana nhanwa i pelenga. Ɛɛ ngi nda eyaabele na nhua nuu nda eyaabele ma,
48006005	gbɛnhaile nuu o nuu ngi nda enge belendaa lɔ ngeya.
48006006	Nuu na nana ti ala nagɔlia aa Kilaisi oo na, maa nwɔɔ na siina kaa ala nagɔli mɔɔ na gɔ kualaa gbɛ o gbɛ na nwa aa gɛ ngeya.
48006007	Awɛɛ gbɔha na gaka. Nuu ai na nana aa Ngebɔ nwɔu mɔu. Tɔɔnhai na nana bi nhiini ala nwɛ baa ngi wa na gɔli.
48006008	Ina nuu aa nhii ngaa ngɔi nyɔu nyɔu waa, ɔɔ haa hɔlɔa pou nwa. Ina pa aa nhii Ngebɔ Yinayaa nhɛɛ nhu, kualaa Ngebɔ Yina na nhu ɔɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔa.
48006009	Faa nwɛɛe mi gaanhu ɛɛ haa aa nhanda gbekpe pelendaa. Gbaa ina mai gbahai, lɔgɔ na ɔɔ baa nhuna mɔɔ teendaa na nwaa qani na hɔlɔ.
48006010	Faanwɛɛe, ɛɛ fɛɛlɛ na i muɛɛ gɛnhi, kamaa nhanda gbekpe pele ngaa nuu o nuu, eengaa tɔ bɛnhɛ aa natiini mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa tuee.
48006011	Waa kpaali na bele ngɔ lɔa tɔ ngi kpaalia wuee aa nya guegue loko indinɛi.
48006012	Ningaa i natiini taa lapi aa wu gɔɔbindaa aa kɛɛlaa kawaa kuun ningaa ti wu nwanha nhanda bele tua nwɛ kpala ngi tuaa ti pele ɛɛ ti golo ɔ. Taa indinɛi belenaa kangaa ningaa tɛɛ ti aa sɛɛgɛ. Gbaa ningaa tɔɔ ti aa sɛɛgɛa ina i ba bele ngaa kati yɛpɛa Kilaisi haa na nhanwa i peleni ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na.
48006013	Awa hali bɛnhɛ natiini ti nwanha nhanda bele ngɔ tai nwaa bɛɛ ngɔ Sɔ nau. Kpala tɔ tuaa ningaa ti wu nwanha nhanda bele pele, kangaa ti ba yonga lee wu nhu aa kɛɛlaa woo gbɔha na ɔaa ti eya wu nwanha nhanda belendaa nhanwa.
48006014	Kɛlɛ kina indinɛi nya nda nhanda lɔ mba, ngɔɔ yonga leea gbo haa na nhu nana mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi i peleni ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na. Awa ngi haa na nhanwa i peleni, ningaa lii haa ɔ nya nhanwa awa nya gbɔnhu nya lii haa ɔ ti nhanwa.
48006015	Ai nhanda nyaai ngɔ hali aa bele ngaa nuu nwanha nhanda bele ngɔ inaile pelendaa aa nuu nyiɛ Ngebɔ le.
48006016	Ningaa i natiini taa gɛ hei indinɛi bonda nhu ɛɛ gbo ngi kɛi, kangaa maa lɛi o Ngebɔ nwaaumayaa o i gɛ ti nwa. Tua o Ngebɔ ndaa i ngoo tɔ bɛɛ ti nhaa nwɛɛ.
48006017	Nuu ɛhaa pele gbɔnhu ngaa njɔgɔlɔ lagbiti bele, gbɛnhaile paa na nana i nya lugu na nwa bɛɛ oo ndɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi eyaalakpandou na nwɛ aa nge.
48006018	Ni ndegea, ngi laaminɛ kangaa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi banda bandayaa na i gɛ na tii wua o. Kangaa i bele.
49001001	Nya nwɛ Pɔɔlu aa nge, Yisɔsi Kilaisi lo mɔɔ na aa nge, ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na. Nya nwɛ ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali Ngebɔ ndaa i ngee mɛɛ Ɛfisɔsi, natiini laanɛɛyaa ti eya ti hounwayaa na nhu tii Kilaisi o.
49001002	Kangaa mi Kɛɛgɛ na Ngebɔ, ka Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa ka maa lɛi.
49001003	Ami fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa, nana mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi Eebɔ na aa ala ka ngi Kɛɛgɛ na. Mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, Ngebɔ oo nduba o nduba hea muɛɛ nana Yinayaa luba nwɛ i aliyana.
49001004	Ngebɔ ai lɛ gɛiɔ pɔlɔgɔɔ na gbatɛ ngɔ nhuna i mi nhu ɔhɛi kangaa mi bele ngaa ngi ndaa i ndi ɔ aa mi laanɛɛyaa na nhu bele Kilaisi nhu. Awa i indinɛi belenia kangaa mi bele ngaa Ngebɔ belaa natiini tɛɛgɛ ai ti nwa ala gulɔɔ.
49001005	Oo mi nhu ɔhɛaɔ ndi ɔ aa ngi lomayaa na nhu bele mi nhanwa kangaa mi bele ngaa ngi lengaa ɛɛ mi hou ɔ na nwa mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o. Awa pele indinɛi nwɛ ndo ngɔ laɔ i bele nda.
49001006	Ami Ngebɔ bihɛa ngi bɛɛ banda bandayaa na nhanwa nana i fei muɛɛ yimbou ndi ɔ aa ngi Lou na lepele nana ndo ngɔ na la.
49001007	Awa ndi ɔ aa Kilaisi haa na nhu bele Ngebɔ oo mi umbonga, napangaa aa kɛɛlaa nhu, oo mi nhanda nyɔu na loa na muɛɛ. ngebɔ banda bandayaa na mbombou ngɔ,
49001008	nana i fei muɛɛ kpinhi ɔ.
49001009	Gbaa oo kpundu na lɔgɔɔunga aa muee ndaa to ngɔ nanaa i ndaalaaaɔ aa pelendaa ndi ɔ aa Kilaisi lepele. Awa indinɛi i pelenia ndi ɔ aa ngi nhu lo na ka ngi nɛɛnwaa nhu lee na bɛɛ.
49001010	Ngebɔ ɔɔ bilanaa ndaalaa indinɛi nwa nhuna lɔgɔ na aa hiti nhu, awa ɔɔ indinɛi belenaa kangaa i gbɛ o gbɛ na nwaa gbɔ ngilamaa, natiini ti aliyana ka ngelou indinɛi nhu, awa Kilaisi nwɛ ɔɔ pele ngaa ti ukoko nwɔɔ na.
49001011	Ngebɔ aa gbɛ o gbɛ belenaa ndi ɔ aa ngi guunmayaa laalaa na, awa oo mi nhu ɔhɛaɔ kangaa mi bele ngaa ngi ndaa i mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Kilaisi o. Awa indinɛi oo ndaalaaaɔ aa pelendaa kualaama tɔɔlomaa na.
49001012	Faa nwɛɛ mua mi laanɛɛi pɛnhɛɛ aa Kilaisi, Ngebɔ oo mi nhu ɔhɛa kangaa mi eyaabele na i ba aa mbihɛ ala nwa, gbɛnhaile ala bombou ngɔ.
49001013	Ngebɔ oo ngi Yina na ɔaa wu eya nana i wu nɛɛnwaa loni la ɛɛ kuague nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa nhu ngi ndaa i mɛ aa wuee. I indinɛi belenia nhuna wu tɔmbaga oo na nwɛini awa kawu laanɛɛa la, napangaa Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na nana i bai wuɛɛ aa ndendouyaa.
49001014	Yina na seeli na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa nhu mɔɔ nana hɔlɔa Ngebɔ i ngi ndaa i nɛɛnwaa lo ngɔ fanwa, nhaa guna aa lɔgɔ na Ngebɔ aa ngi ndaa i ngumbo hiti ɔ nhu, awa indinɛi ɔɔ baa aa mbihɛ ngi bombounjaa na nwa.
49001015	Wu laanɛɛyaa na Maliki na nhu Yisɔsi, ngoo maa laanɛɛyaa na nwaanhaa nwɛinga ka wu lomayaa na Ngebɔ ndaa i fanwa bɛɛ. Awa saabu indinɛi nhanwa,
49001016	ngai gbelei aa fiɛ guandaa Ngebɔ nwa wu nhanwa. kang~a~a nɛgili aa wuee nya laaminɛ na nhu.
49001017	Ngi laaminɛ kangaa ngebɔ i wu gɔ aa Yina na nana ɔɔ pele wu nɛɛnwaa nhu lee hɔlɔ, nana ɔɔ Ngebɔ lɔgɔɔu ngaa wuee kangaa wu kɔɔ. Ngebɔ indinɛi, mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi Eebɔ na nwɛ, awa Kɛɛgɛ bombou mbaa nwɛ.
49001018	Ngi laaminɛ kangaa Ngebɔ i wu nɛɛnwaa na laau, kangaa wu nana gɔɔ nɛɛnwaa la le i uini wuaa fanwa, kpatɛyaa bombou mbaa na nana i ngi ndaa i nɛɛnwaa lo ngɔ fanwa,
49001019	awa kangaa wu Ngebɔ fɔha na bombounjaa na gɔɔ nana aa enge mi nhu mua na mi laanɛɛa. Fɔha indinɛi aa enge mi nhu fɔha ila na nwɛ
49001020	i engei Kilaisi nhu nhuna Ngebɔ i huui alau kualaa haa na nhu, kɛɛ ala heia ɛha na nhu gaka mɛɛ aliyana bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
49001021	Kilaisi alaa ningaa nwanhu belaa i manhu bɛɛ, ngi fɔha naa tee ngɔ fɔha o fɔhaa, awa ndaa na Ngebɔ i fei alɛɛ tee ngɔ ndaa o ndaaa ngelou indinɛi nhu ka ngelou nana gbɔnhu ɔɔ ba.
49001022	Ngebɔ oo gbɛ o gbɛ na bu Kilaisi ɔgɔu, awa oo ala ɔaa laanɛɛ belaa i ngeya ɛɛ ngukoko nwɔɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na nwanhu bɛɛ.
49001023	Laanɛɛ belaa i tuɛɛ Kilaisi lugu na aa tuee, awa tua nwɛ taa ala hiti nhu, gbɛnhaile ala nwɛ aa gbɛ o gbɛ na hiti nhu mii o mii.
49002001	Pɛnhɛɛ naɔ wu haa ɔɔ Ngebɔ gbapi na nhu, gbɛnhaile wai nwaa bɛɛi Ngebɔu awa kawu nhanda nyɔu belenga.
49002002	Aa lɔgɔ na siina kawu hitɛa ningaa i pou nwa natiini taa nhanda nyɔu na bele, awa kawu nwaa bɛɛa ngelou indinɛi nhu Afɔ Manha nau, nana aa fɔha la ngelou indinɛi nwanhu. Awa alɛɛ aa enge ningaa i nhu natiini tai nwaa bɛɛ Ngebɔu.
49002003	Awa hali bɛnhɛ nua kpei, ni gulaɔ ningaa indiini mba, awa ni goonhu nɛɛ ɔɔ nana nwa ni lugu na lo ngɔ laɔ ni pele ka ni nɛɛnwaa na. Indinɛi nhanwa, ka Ngebɔ i gbaaia gbɔnhu ni nwa o ka ningaa i bɛɛ.
49002004	Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ kɛɛ maaumayaa bombou mbaa lɔgɔɔunga aa nuee, kua ɔ ngi lomayaa bombou mbaa na nhu mi nhanwa,
49002005	gbɛnhaile, hali mi haa ɔ naɔ Ngebɔ gbapi na nhu ndi ɔ aa mi nhanda nyɔu na lepele, ka Ngebɔ i ndɛɛhu ɔaa mi eya ngilamaaa nhu mii Kilaisi o. Woo ndendouyaa hɔlɔa ndi ɔ a Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na lepele.
49002006	Mi hounwayaa na mii Kilaisi o, Ngebɔ oo huua miu mii Kilaisi o, awa oo pelenga mi hei manhayaa na la ngilamaaa mii Kilaisi o mɛɛ aliyana.
49002007	Ngebɔ i indinɛi belenia kangaa i ba ngi wɔwɔwɔ banda bandayaa bombou mbaa na lɔgɔɔu nana ningaa tai ku taa kpaga, ndomayaa nhu nana i ndɔgɔɔuni aa muee Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu.
49002008	-
49002009	Kina Ngebɔ panda banda ɔ, faa nwɛɛ i ndendouyaa hei wuɛɛ wua na wu laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi. Awa wai gbɛ o gbɛ beleni fanwa kɛlɛ Ngebɔ hembɛ nwɛ, ningaa ti eyaabele ngai le, kangaa nuu aigɔ goonɛ fanwa.
49002010	Ngebɔ oo mi gbatɛaɔ, awa mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, oo mi gbatɛaɔ kangaa mi ngeyaabele gbekpe pele nana i ndaalaaaɔ giilɛ kangaa mi pele.
49002011	Faa nwɛɛ a nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa aa kɛɛlaa nhu nhuna ti wu leni Kpitia nwɛɔ aa wuee, awa Yuua i tee ui wua aa ningaa natiini tai ti nwanha nhanda bele ngɔ, awa ti ui gbɔha naa aa seemangaa, napangaa nana kɛgɛingaa taa pele ngaa ti lugu na.
49002012	A nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa aa kɛɛlaa aa maa lɔgɔ nanaɔ, wu loganhu bai ɔɔ aa Kilaisi, wu gua ngɔɔ Iisilɛlia i ti le naa, awa Kpitia nwɛɔ aa wuee ngilimayaa na le nana ngu to ngɔ na nɛɛnwaa lo naa nana Ngebɔ i fei ngi ndaa i mbɛ. Nɛɛnwaa la aile wu eya, awa waile Ngebɔ gɔɔ ngɔ ngelou i nhu.
49002013	Kɛlɛ chaanngi, wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, wua wu nwaa gɔha naɔ pɛnhɛɛ puou, Ngebɔ oo wu nwaa banga ala gbɛlaa ndi ɔ aa Kilaisi haa na.
49002014	Awa Kilaisi oo maa lɛi gbatɛa mi loganhu, aa Yuua i ngoo ka Kpitia i pelendaa aa ningaa ilangaa, awa oo kpingbii na nwɔinga nana i ndoganhu gɔɛ ɔai ti loganhu ka faaleenjaa lɔgɔ gbinhi gbinhi nhanwa.
49002015	Gbaa nhuna i haai, kɛɛ Yuua i ti Sɔ na gbelea, ka nana bɛɛ sɔ na aa ningaa nagɔli la ndaa to ngɔ nana nhanwa taa pele ngoo ka nana tai pele, kangaa Yuua i ngoo ka Kpitia i ti bele ngaa ningaa ilangaa ɛɛ ti hou ɔ na nwa tii ala o. Awa pele indinɛi nwɛ i maa lɛi gbatɛi la mi loganhu.
49002016	Oo faaleenjaa na gbelea mi loganhu, awa oo nde fee ngindinɛi belenga aa nde ngila, awa oo ba boma aa tuee Ngebɔ le, ndi ɔ aa ngi haa na lepele i peleni ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na.
49002017	Nhuna Kilaisi i bai, kɛɛ ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛa aa wuee wua wu nwaa gɔha naɔ Ngebɔa ka nua ni gbɛɛ ɔ naɔ ala gbɛlaa. Awa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ indinɛi aa baa aa maa lɛi ningaa nhanwa bɛɛ.
49002018	Gbaa Kilaisi oo pelenga mua bɛɛ mi fɛɛlɛ hɔlɔ aa paalaa Ngebɔ mi kɛɛgɛ na gulɔɔ, ndi ɔ aa Yina ila na lepele.
49002019	Faa nwɛɛ hotangaa aile gbɔnhu aa wuee. Kɛlɛ woo belenga aa lugulea wui Ngebɔ ndaa i ngoo, awa woo belenga aa kpapi Ngebɔ le naa.
49002020	Wu lɛɛhu na njigba ngɔ nana nhu to mbelaa i ka Ngebɔ letua i tee ningaa nagɔli la. Pele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ ndambu, awa Yisɔsi Kilaisi gbɔha na pele ngɔ ɛɛ bahi,
49002021	gbɛnhaile alɛɛ aa mi hou nwa ngilamaa, kangaa mi bele ɛɛ Ngebɔ bɛlɛ.
49002022	Awa ɛɛ wu hou ɔ na nwa wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, woo belenga aa kpapi pɛlɛ indinɛia mɛɛ Ngebɔ ɔɔ gɛ na ndi ɔ aa ngi Yina na lepele.
49003001	Indinɛi nhanwa, nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, Yisɔsi Kilaisi gbindi bɛlɛu nwɔɔ na aa nge wu lɔgɔ fanwa, ngi laaminɛ Ngebɔ le.
49003002	Ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhu woo mɛinga aa kɛɛlaa nhu Ngebɔ oo panda bandayaa lɔgɔɔunga aa nge aa ngenge indinɛi ɔandaa nya eya wu nhanwa.
49003003	Ngebɔ oo ngi gbundu na lɔgɔɔunga aa nge gbo tolou, ɛɛ ngi kpaalii gbo.
49003004	Awa ina waa nana gala ngi kpaalii, wɔɔ nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔa mba aa kɛɛlaa nhu nyaa Kilaisi gbundu na gɔɔ ngɔ.
49003005	Ngebɔ ai kpundu ngindinɛi gɛiɔ aa ningaa aa pɛnhɛɛ na, kɛlɛ oo kɛa chaanngi aa ngi lo mbelaa i ka ngi letua i aa ngi Yina na fɔha na.
49003006	Kpundu na ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa nhue ndi ɔ aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na lepele, Kpitia i too kpapi hɔlɔa ngilamaaa tii Yuua i ngoo nduba na nhu nana Ngebɔ aa fe, too belenga aa ningaa ilangaa Kilaisi lugu na nhu, awa tɔɔ ti nda gbapi na hɔlɔa nɛɛnwaa lo naa nana Ngebɔ i gbatɛaɔ Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu.
49003007	Ngebɔ oo nya belenga aa ngeyaalakpandou Kilaisi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛndaa nhanwa, ndi ɔ aa ngi banda bandayaa na nana i ndɔgɔɔuni aa nge nhuna ngi fɔha na i tɔɔloni aa ngengelaa nya nhu.
49003008	Hali nya nwɛ yaaiyaai nwɔɔ na aa nge tɔ bɛɛ Ngebɔ ndaa i nhu bɛɛ, kɛlɛ indinɛi nhu bɛɛ, Ngebɔ oo fɛɛlɛ na ɔaa nya eya kangaa ngi ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛ aa Kpitia i ndaa to ngɔ Kilaisi yinayaa gbatɛyaa bombou mbaa naa,
49003009	awa ka ndɔgɔɔundaa aa ningaa i bɛɛ pele na nana Ngebɔ ɔɔ ngi gbundu indinɛi bu la ngeyaabele nhu. Ngebɔ nana i gbɛ o gbɛ gbatɛi kɛɛ gbundu ngindinɛi lɔɔguaɔ lɔgɔ gbinhi gbinhi nhanwa
49003010	kangaa chaanngi ɔgɔ ngi nhu lo kɛbɛlɛ na lɔgɔɔu ngaa ngafɔngaa i natiini taa feenaa na nwanhu gbee ndi ɔ aa ngi ndaa i nhu bele.
49003011	Ngebɔ i indinɛi belenia bɛɛ kangaa i ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa nhu ngi wɔwɔwɔ laalaa na oo hiti nhu aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele mi nwaliki na.
49003012	Awa mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Kilaisi o, ndi ɔ aa mi laanɛɛ na nhu bele ala nhu, moo fɛɛlɛ hɔlɔa aa paalaa ngebɔ gulɔɔ aa ndii gbɛndɛ.
49003013	Faa nwɛɛ ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ ngaa kɛɛlaa awɛɛ nɛɛnwaa nyaai nana nhanwa ngaa yɔgɔlɔ mbu wu lɔgɔ fanwa, gbɛnhaile wɔɔ qani hɔlɔa nhu.
49003014	Indinɛi nhanwa, ngi laaminɛ Ngebɔ le nana mi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala,
49003015	gbɛnhaile kualaa ala le naa nwɛɛ nde ngoo nde i mɛɛ aliyana ka ngelou indinɛi nhu aa ngi laa na hɔlɔ na.
49003016	Ngi laaminɛ kangaa Ngebɔ i wu gɔ aa fɔha nana aa wu nhu gbɛndɛ. Awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ indinɛi belenaa aa ngi gbatɛyaa bombou mbaa na nhu bele,
49003017	awa ngi laaminɛ kangaa Kilaisi i gɛ na wu lii na nwa aa laanɛɛyaa nhu bele, awa kangaa wu lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ndomayaa nhu ɛɛ hape o ka ndambu,
49003018	kangaa wua o ka Ngebɔ ndaa i bɛɛ wu ba ku wu kɔɔ Kilaisi lomayaa na i gee na, gbɛnhaile, ngi lomayaa na mbombou ngɔ maa yia gɛ ngɔ ai na.
49003019	Awa ngi laaminɛ gbɔnhu kangaa wu Kilaisi lomayaa na gɔɔ, nana ningaa tai ku taa kɔɔ ndaalo, kangaa aa pele o pele wu laa fe ngaa ngebɔyaa.
49003020	-
49003021	Ngebɔ aa kunaa i ngenge bele tee ngɔ nanaa bɛnhɛ maa ala nwɔɔli nda, ka nana maa nɛgili aa ala pelendaa nhanwa. Aa indinɛi belenaa ndi ɔ aa ngi fɔha na nhu bele nana aa enge mi nhu. Faa nwɛɛe a ala bihɛa wua ngi ndaa i ngaa wuee, wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o. A ala bihɛa nhaa guna bɛɛ. I bele na.
49004001	Faa nwɛɛe nya ngi kpindi bɛlɛ nau Maliki na nhanwa, ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ kangaa wu eyaabele na i gɛ na aa pele na nana Ngebɔ lo ngɔ la i gɛ na nhuna i uini wuaa.
49004002	Awa a nwaa yeia, a lii lona aa lɔgɔ o lɔgɔ, awa awu lomayaa na lɔgɔɔuna aa kpɔndaa wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i mba.
49004003	A lapia kangaa wu wu hounwayaa na nwanhu gbee nana Yina na aa ba la ndi ɔ aa maa lɛi na nhu bele nana aa wu hou nwa ngilamaa.
49004004	Kilaisi ndaa i ndugu ila mɛɛ aa tuee, awa Yina na nana aa wu hou nwa ngilamaaa Yina ila mɛɛ, ɛɛ Ngebɔ i uini gbo wuaa nɛɛnwaa la ila faa nwɛɛ.
49004005	Awa Maliki ila mɛɛ i na, pele na nana maa laanɛɛ la i ila, Ngebɔ Ua na i ila.
49004006	Ngebɔ ila mɛɛ gbɔnhu i na, alɛɛ ningaa i bɛɛ ti Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, ala nwɛ i mi nwanhu bɛɛ, ala nwɛ aa enge mi nhu bɛɛ, awa alaa mi nhu bɛɛ.
49004007	Ngebɔ oo fembɛ hea muɛɛ aa ngila ngila ndi ɔ aa pele na Kilaisi i kɔɛ gɔɛi la mi nwa,
49004008	ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi gbo, "Nhuna i lɛi puou feenaa na nwanhu, kɛɛ ya aa kpindi bɛlɛu belaa gbinhi gbinhia. Awa kɛɛ fembɛ hea ningaaɛ."
49004009	Kɛlɛ gbɛɛ i mi nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa "kɛɛ lɛa feenaa na nhu?" Nana i mi nɛɛnwaa ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, kɛɛ yeia mbu pɛnhɛɛ bei ngelou indinɛi nhu.
49004010	Faa nwɛɛ nuu ila na i yeii mbu, alɛɛ gbɔnhu i lɛi puou feenaa na nwanhu, kangaa i ba gɛ mii o mii.
49004011	Awa ala nwɛɔ i fembɛ hei ningaaɛ. Kɛɛ lagbitia nhu ɔhɛa kangaa ti bele ngaa to mbelaa, lagbitia i Ngebɔ letua, lagbitia i ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ gɛɛ gɛɛ mbelaa, lagbitia i kangaa ti bele ngaa Ngebɔ ndaa i nwanhu gbee mbelaa, awa lagbitia ti bele ngaa ningaa nagɔli mbelaa.
49004012	I indinɛi belenia kangaa i Ngebɔ ndaa i maa gbatɛ kangaa ti ku ti Ngebɔ enge na bele, nana ɔɔ laanɛɛ belaa i nhu gbɛndɛ natiini Kilaisi lugu na aa tuee.
49004013	Awa kangaa mua bɛɛ mi laanɛɛ aa pele ila, awa mi ngebɔ Lou na gɔɔ, awa kangaa mi hiti nhu aa pele o pele ɛɛ Kilaisi i na.
49004014	Nhuna indinɛi aa bele, maigɔ bele gbɔnhu ɛɛ ndengaa natiini tai loto hitɛ nwa ndɛɛ lɛɛ nagɔli bou nwa, nana ndɛɛ gɔɔla mbelaa taa ningaa nagɔli la nhuna taa gɛ tɔɔ ningaa i kaka.
49004015	Kɛlɛ kamaa tɔmbaga na gɛ aa ndomayaa, awa indinɛi ɔɔ pelenaa mi nhu gbɛndɛ aa pele o pele Kilaisi nhu. Kilaisi nwɛ ngukoko na aa ala
49004016	awa laanɛɛ belaa i mɛ ala lugu na aa tuee. Awa ndugu indinɛi hou ɔ nwa ngilamaa, awa to tomaa nga na nwɛ i hou ngɔ ngilamaa. Nhuna kpapi o kpapi i ndugu indinɛia aa ngi nda enge na bele, nhu nwɛɛ Kilaisi gbɔha na aa pele ndugu na bɛɛ aa gbɛa, kangaa nhu gbɛndɛ ndomayaa nhu.
49004017	Maliki na ɛgɛ ngi indinɛi gɛ aa wuee. Wu eyaabele na ɛɛ bele ɛɛ ningaa i natiini tai laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ awa ti nɛgili na kolo ai nhu.
49004018	Ti nɛɛnwaa na gbindi ɔ. Awa ti nwaa gɔha puou ndɛɛhu naa nana Ngebɔ aa fe, gbɛnhaile, tai gbɛ o gbɛ gɔɔ, awa ti lihilihi ɔ.
49004019	Gbɛ o gbɛ ai na gbɔnhu aa pele taa ufe. Ti eyaabele na nyɔu ɔ nja lee ngɔnhu, awa ti goonhu nɛɛ ɔ gbo aa nhanda nyɔu gɛbɛlɛ belendaa aa gbele o gbele.
49004020	Awa indinɛi aile ti wu nagɔlii la ndaa to ngɔ Kilaisia,
49004021	wua laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa wuee. Ti wu nagɔliia ndaa to ngɔ Kilaisia kangaa wu tɔmbaga na gɔɔ nana i Yisɔsi nhu.
49004022	A gbena aa nana belendaa wee pele ngɔɔ nhuna waile Ngebɔ gɔɔ ngɔ. Gbaa aa lɔgɔ na siina wu lo ngɔɔ gbo a nhanda nyɔu belendaa.
49004023	Kawaa pele Ngebɔ i wu lii na bele ngaa ndii nyiɛ hiti ɔ nhu tii wu nɛɛnwaa na o,
49004024	awa kawaa wu eyaabele ngɔha na nwaa lobi ngaa ngeyaabele nyiɛ nana Ngebɔ i kpatɛi awa pele ngɔ ɛɛ ngi nda na. Ngeyaabele ngindinɛi i gbɔha na lɔgɔɔu Ngebɔyaa nhu tii teenjaa nhu o.
49004025	Faa nwɛɛe a gbena aa ndɛɛ gɔɔlandaa! Nuu o nuu kaa tɔmbaga na gɛ aa ngi ndege lou na, gbɛnhaile mua bɛɛ ningaa ilangaa i mɛ aa muee, mua Kilaisi lugu na aa muee.
49004026	Awa ina baa gbaai, bɛɛ nhanda nyɔu bele. Awa bɛɛ pote baa gɛ ndii gbaai nhu nhaa foo na i gula.
49004027	Awɛɛ fɛɛlɛ he ngafɔ naɛ hali.
49004028	Nuu na nana aa nwɔa bele ngɔɔ ka gbe nda chaanngi nhu, awa kaa tɔɔlo ngaa ngengelaa ndaa nwɛnhɛi na nhanwa, awa kangaa i ba ku i gbɔ mbaa mbelaa i mba.
49004029	Awɛɛ pote njia nyɔu aa gua wu la, kɛlɛ a njia nwaa hii nhiɛ gɛa aa lɔgɔ o lɔgɔ nana aa gbɔ ningaaa. Awa natiini taa mɛi mɛi tɔɔ nduba hɔlɔa kualaa wu laa yia na nhu.
49004030	Awɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ bele nana aa pele Ngebɔ Yina na nwaa nwɔu. Yina na Ngebɔ Seeli na nwɛ wu nhu nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa lɔgɔ ɔɔ baa nhuna Ngebɔ ɔɔ wu umbo hiti ɔ nhu.
49004031	A gbena ndii nyɔua ka ndii gbaai. Yɔkpɔu o, ngɛi piindaa o, ka tolomayaa ɛɛ gɛ na gbɔnhu wu liiya.
49004032	Kɛlɛ kpɔmbayaa ka maaumayaa i gɛa wu eya wu ndegea i fanwa. Awa awu ndegea i ti nhanda nyɔu na loa na tuɛɛ ɛɛ Ngebɔ i wu nhanda nyɔu na loi na wuɛɛ aa Kilaisi nhu bele.
49005001	Kina Ngebɔ lomayaa lengaa nwɛ aa wuee, kawaa lapi wu bele ɛɛ ala.
49005002	Awa wu eyaabele na k`a ndomayaa aa gɛ nhu ɛɛ Kilaisi i loni gbo aa muee, awa kɛɛ ngi lɛɛhu na gɔannga mi nhanwa ɛɛ fembɛ nhai gu nɛɛ nɛɛ, ka chaaga nana aa ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ.
49005003	Kina Ngebɔ ndaa i mɛ aa wuee, maa ai nhiɛi ndo siandaa o nhanda nyɔu nyɔu lagbiti o i gɛ na wu liiya.
49005004	Awa maa ai nhiɛi wu laa yia na i gɛ nyɔui, nana ai ba aa mbɛɛ Ngebɔ nwa. Kɛlɛ wu laa yia na i belena aa fiɛ guandaa Ngebɔ nwa.
49005005	Kɛlɛ a laanɛɛa aa kɛɛlaa ndo sia mɔɔ, inaile chanhainjaa gbahamba nwɔɔ, inaile nuu na nana feelaa ɔ, napangaa haga eebɔa batou mɔɔ, maa nwɔɔ nana bonda, kpapi ai na alɛɛ mɛɛ Kilaisi nwanhayaa na la o ka Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na la.
49005006	Awɛɛ pote nuu o nuu aa wu nwɔu mɔu aa njia nana kolo ai nhu, gbɛnhaile, indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ kpei Ngebɔ ɔɔ gbaai natiini ma tai nwaa bɛɛ ma alau.
49005007	Indinɛi nhanwa, a sogia maa belaa i siinaa, awɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ bele ngilamaaa wui tua o.
49005008	Wua bɛnhɛ wee naanɔɔ kpindi nhu ndi ɔ aa wu eyaabele na lepele, kɛlɛ kina woo belenga aa Maliki na ndaa, faa nwɛɛ wuaa waun na nhu. Faa nwɛɛ wu eyaabele na kaa bele ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti waun na nhu,
49005009	gbɛnhaile waun na alɛɛ aa ba aa qani ngindinɛi, napangaa nana kpekpe ngɔ bɛɛ, ka nana tee ngɔ bɛɛ, awa ka nana tɔmbaga ɔ bɛɛ.
49005010	A lapia wu nana nagɔli aa Maliki na goonhu nɛɛ.
49005011	Awa awɛɛ gula gbɛ o gbɛ belendaa nhu nana kpindi nhu nhanda le, nana aigɔ ba aa qani ningaa nwa, kɛlɛ a maa nhanda na siina guaa kpou.
49005012	Maa ufe ngɔ bɛnhɛ aa nana gɛndaa taa pele kundɔ na nhu.
49005013	Ina gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ taa ba la waun na nhu, nhu nwɛɛ maa pele ngɔ na gɔɔ i na.
49005014	Gbaa nana bɛɛ taa kua kpou, oo belenga aa waun. Faa nwɛɛ ti kɛi tɛɛ, "Bia na bi njii nhu una! Awa huua kualaa haa na nhu, awa Kilaisi ɔɔ huonaa bi nwa."
49005015	Faa nwɛɛ a sogia nana nhanwa waa pele. Wu eyaabele na ɛɛ bele ɛɛ ningaa natiini tai gbɛ o gbɛ gɔɔ, kɛlɛ i belena ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti nhu lo ngɔ.
49005016	Awa fɛɛlɛ o fɛɛlɛ waa hɔlɔ, a engea la, gbɛnhaile muaa lɔgɔ nyɔu nyɔu nhu chaanngi.
49005017	Awɛɛ bele ɛɛ mɔu mɔu mbelaa kɛlɛ a lapia wu nana gɔɔ Maliki na lo ngɔ la wu pele.
49005018	Awɛɛ ndɔɔ gbɔɛ nhaa i wu hou, gbɛnhaile ɔɔ wu nyaaia, kɛlɛ a pelena kangaa Ngebɔ Yina na i sia aa wuee hiti ɔ nhu.
49005019	Awa a yɛpɛa wu ndegea le aa njɛpɛ nana aa gua ngebɔ ue gɔɔ na nhu. A Ngebɔ batouna aa ngue aaindaa nana Yina na aa pu wu nɛɛnwaa, awa a ngue aaina Maliki na le aa wu lii na bɛɛ.
49005020	A fiɛ guaa mi Kɛɛgɛ na nwa Ngebɔ aa lɔgɔ o lɔgɔ, gbɛ o gbɛ na nhanwa ndi ɔ aa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi laa na nhu bele.
49005021	Nuu o nuu kaa gbɔha na nwaa bɛɛ ndege lou nau, ndi ɔ aa mbɛɛ na i wu eya Kilaisi nhanwa.
49005022	Nyanhaa i kawaa gbɔha na nwaa bɛɛ wu nhiingaa i mbu ɛɛ wu ba gbɔha na nwaa bɛɛ Maliki nau.
49005023	Gbaa nhii na alɛɛ ngukoko nwɔɔ na aa ala nyanha na nwanhu ɛɛ Kilaisi i na gbo aa ngukoko nwɔɔ laanɛɛ belaa i manhu bɛɛ. Awa Kilaisi gbɔha na alɛɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i ngumbo, awa tuɛɛ ala lugu na aa tuee.
49005024	Faa nwɛɛe nyanhaa i kataa nwaa bɛɛ ti nhiingaa i mbu hiti ɔ nhu, ɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa i taa nwaa bɛɛ Kilaisiu.
49005025	Wua nhiingaa i ngaa wuee a lona aa wu nyanha i ɛɛ Kilaisi i loni aa laanɛɛ belaa i nhaa kɛɛ haaa ti nhanwa.
49005026	Awa Kilaisi i indinɛi belenia kangaa i laanɛɛ belaa i kɔan Ngebɔ nwa ndi ɔ aa ngi oo na lepele. I indinɛi belenia nhuna i bilani aa ti gɛndaa chanhai ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ ua na lepele,
49005027	kangaa i ba aa laanɛɛ belaa i ala gbɔha na le ti nyande na nhu bɛɛ, awa kangaa ti bele ngaa ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu kɛlɛ ngai tuaa, awa tɛɛgɛ o tɛɛgɛ ɛɛ gɛ ti nwa.
49005028	Nhiingaa i kataa lo ngaa ti nyanhaa i ɛɛ ti lo ngɔ na gbo aa ti lugu na. Nhii na nana ndo ngɔ aa ngi nyanha na, ndo ngɔ aa gbɔha na.
49005029	Nuu ai na nana tolo ɔ aa ala lugu na. Kɛlɛ i ndaa gɔ, awa i manhu gbee ɛɛ Kilaisi aa pele gbo aa laanɛɛ belaa i,
49005030	gbɛnhaile mua bɛɛ kpapi nwɛ aa muee Kilaisi lugu naa.
49005031	Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Indinɛi nhanwa, nhii na ɔɔ ngi kɛɛgɛ na loa ka ngi nje na, awa ɔɔ nwaa gbɔnaa tii ngi nyanha na o, awa feengaa i tɔɔ belenaa aa ngila mɔɔ."
49005032	Awa tɔmbaga bombou mbaa nwɛ ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ Ngebɔ Gbaali indinɛi nhu, nana ngi kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa ndaa to ngɔ Kilaisia ka laanɛɛ belaa i.
49005033	Kɛlɛ tɔmbaga indinɛi ndaa to ngɔ gbɔnhu wuaa, gbɛnhaile nhii ngoo nhii kaa lo ngaa ngi nyanha na ɛɛ ala gbɔha na, awa nyanha o nyanha kaa mbɛɛ gɛ ngi nhii naa.
49006001	Ndengaa, a nwaa bɛɛa wu ungaa i mbu gbɛnhaile wu laanɛɛyaa enge na nwɛ, awa alɛɛ gbɔnhu pelendaa nwaa nhiɛ ɔ.
49006002	-
49006003	Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Mbɛɛ gɛa bi kɛɛgɛ naa ka bi nje na. Kangaa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ i ba gɛ nwaa nhiɛi bi nhanwa, awa kangaa bi chiiyaa i gɛ gɔha ngelou na nhu." Pɛnhɛɛ Sɔ na nwɛ nana aa nɛɛnwaa lo fe.
49006004	Kɛɛgɛa, awɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ bele ngaa wu lengaa i nana aa pele taa gbaai. Kɛlɛ a ti siaa aa pele na Maliki na lo ngɔ la.
49006005	Nduaa, kawaa nwaa bɛɛ wu nwanhu belaa i mbu, awa a mbɛɛ gɛa tuaa aa wu lii na bɛɛ, awa a lapia kangaa wu ti goonhu nɛɛ ɛɛ wu ba pele gbo aa Kilaisi.
49006006	Awɛɛ indinɛi bele gbo gbɛnhaile tua taa wu gbee, ɛɛ wu lo ngɔ gbo kangaa wu ningaa goonhu nɛɛ, kɛlɛ aa nana belena Ngebɔ lo ngɔ la aa wu lii na bɛɛ ɛɛ Kilaisi eyaalakpangaa.
49006007	Awu enge na belena aa koonhu nɛɛ ɛɛ ngeyaalakpangaa. Awa i belena ɛɛ ningaa aile gbo waa enge tuɛɛ kɛlɛ Maliki na nwɛ waa enge mbɛ.
49006008	A nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa aa kɛɛlaa Maliki na ɔɔ nuu o nuu baabaaa ngi enge nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhanwa aa pele, i bele ngaa ngeyaalakpandou ai bele ngaa ngeyaalakpandou.
49006009	Awa wua wu ningaa i manhu, a belena aa ningaa gbekpengaa wu eyaalakpangaa i ngee, awɛɛ pele taa lua ndi ɔ aa nana nhanwa waa gɛ wɔɔ pele ngaa tuee. A nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa aa kɛɛlaa wua o ka wu eyaalakpangaa i Maliki ila mɛɛ i wu eya mɛɛ aliyana, nana ɔɔ nuu o nuu gɔhɔ aa pele ila na kele.
49006010	Nya gbelenwaa na, ngi kɛ aa wuee, wu nhu gɛa gbɛndɛni wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Maliki na o ndi ɔ aa ngi fɔha bombou mbaa na nhu bele.
49006011	A nhaanhaa i pua nwa bɛɛ natiini Ngebɔ aa ti ɔa wu eya kɔɔ na nhanwa, kangaa wu ba ku wu gɔ aa Ngafɔ Manha na sɔti na.
49006012	Gbaa mi gɔɔ na mi nhu, mai gɔi aa ningaa, kɛlɛ mua maa gɔ aa manhayaa ka fɔhayaa nana mai ku maa tɔ. Mua maa gɔ aa natiini ti ngelou indinɛi gbindi na nwanhu, ka ngafɔngaa i natiini fɔha na tuaa feenaa na nhu.
49006013	Faa nwɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na a pua nwa nana Ngebɔ i ngɔai wu eya, kangaa nhuna lɔgɔ nyɔu na aa ba wu ba ku wu lele Setani sɔti naa. Awa kawaa ku wu lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ nhaa kɔɔ na ngaa lo.
49006014	Indinɛi nhanwa, a huua wu tɔmbaga na ili nwa aa tɛbɛi, awa a teenjaa bua nwa aa loongo.
49006015	A nwaa gbatɛa aa maa lɛi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa nhanwa, awa maa nwaa gbatɛ na i belena ɛɛ chambala.
49006016	A pelena wu laanɛɛ na i wu nwanhu gbee kangaa wu ba ku wu Nuu Nyɔu na hagɔli na gbele nana aa pii wuaa.
49006017	A ndendouyaa gbauna wu pɛɛ umbaa, awa aa Ngebɔ oo na gbauna ɛɛ Saasigɔ nana Yina na aa ngɔa wu eya.
49006018	Indinɛi bɛɛ a pelena laaminɛ nhu, a Ngebɔ nwɔɔlina kangaa i gbɔ wuaa. A laaminɛa aa gbele o gbele Yina na fɔha na nhu. Indinɛi nhanwa, a sogia kangaa wai ba gbaha, awa a laaminɛa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ Ngebɔ ndaa i fanwa.
49006019	Awa a laaminɛa gbɔnhu nya nhanwa kangaa Ngebɔ i ngoo ɔa nya eya nhuna ngaa gɛ ngɔɔ yɛpɛ, awa kangaa ngi ku ngi yɛpɛ aa ndii gbɛndɛ nana lɔgɔɔundaa nhanwa aa ningaa i ndɔɔgu ngɔ na ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhu.
49006020	Gbaa Ngebɔ oo nya longa kangaa ngi ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ indinɛi gɛ hali nha nyaa kpindi bɛlɛu. A laaminɛa nya nhanwa kangaa nya lii gbɛndɛ ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛ ma ɛɛ ngi ba gɛ na.
49006021	Mi ndege nhiindou na Tikikɔsi nana mi lo ngɔ na la, ɔɔ baa wuee bɛɛ aa nya nwaanhaa na kangaa wu nana gɔɔ aa bele ngaa nge. Nuu nwɛɛ nana ngeyaalakpandou gbekpe mɛɛ aa ala Maliki na enge na nhu.
49006022	Faa nwɛɛ ngaa ala lee wu nwanhu, kangaa i kɛ aa wuee nana aa bele ngaa nuee, awa kangaa i wu nhu gbɛndɛ.
49006023	Kangaa mi Kɛɛgɛ na Ngebɔ, ka Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i kɔ aa maa lɛi o, ndomayaa o, ka laanɛɛyaa.
49006024	Awa kangaa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na i gɛ na tii natiini ngoo bɛɛ ti lo ngɔ na aa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi aa ndomayaa nana ngaa ai lo.
50001001	Nya Pɔɔlu ka Timootii, Yisɔsi Kilaisi eyaalakpangaa i ngaa nuee, nua nwɛ naa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee wua Ngebɔ ndaa i ngaa wuee bɛɛ, ngu mbelaa i ngoo ka wu gbɔmba belaa i wu mɛɛ Filipaai laa waa na nhu wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
50001002	Kangaa Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na ka Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi i panda bandayaa lɔgɔɔu ngaa wuee ka maa lɛi.
50001003	Lɔgɔ na bɛɛ ngaa nɛgili aa wuee k`angi fiɛ gua ni Eebɔ na nwa wu nhanwa,
50001004	awa lɔgɔ o lɔgɔ bɛɛ ngaa laaminɛ wu nhanwa bɛɛ k~angi laaminɛ aa koonhu nɛɛ,
50001005	pele na nhanwa nana wu gbɔnga la nyaa aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛndaa aa ningaa i, kualaama aa lɔgɔ na wu laanɛɛi la nhaahaai.
50001006	Awa faa nwɛɛe nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngebɔ, nana i ngenge gbekpe ngindinɛi lɔɔloni wu nhu ɔɔ tonaa nda nhaa ngaa lo aa foo na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ɔɔ ba boma.
50001007	Kina ndomayaa lɔ ngeya wu nhanwa bɛɛ faa nwɛɛ maa nhiɛ ɔ ngaa nɛgili indinɛi bonda bele ngaa wuee. Wua bɛɛ woo gbɔnga nyaa aa ngenge indinɛi belendaa Ngebɔ i ngɔai ngeya ndi ɔ aa ngi banda bandayaa na, kualaama aa lɔgɔ na fɛɛlɛ ee nyɛɛ aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nwaa gbɛndaa nhanwa awa ka laanɛɛ belaa i nhu gbɛndɛndaa nhanwa, awa ka chaanngi nhu ngi bei kpindi bɛlɛ nau.
50001008	Ngebɔ i kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa indinɛi ngaa kɛ tɔmbaga nwɛɛ, aa kɛɛlaa ndomayaa na i ngeya wu nhanwa kua ɔ Yisɔsi Kilaisi le.
50001009	Awa k`angi laaminɛ aa kɛɛlaa wu lomayaa na i nwaa lo, awa wu gɔɔnjaa na i nwaa lo, awa kangaa wu nana gɔɔ waa pele,
50001010	kangaa wu nana nhu ɔhɛ nana kpekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ. Wɔɔ gɛa chanhaini kualaa nhanda nyɔu nhu awa waigɔ tɛɛgɛ hɔlɔ gbɔnhu aa Foo na Kilaisi ɔɔ ba ma boma.
50001011	Kangaa nana waa pele pele i gɛ gbekpeni aa tɔmbaga, gbɛnhaile Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwɛ aa pele indinɛi aa bele wu nhu kangaa i ba ba aa mbɛɛ Ngebɔ nwa ka mbihɛ.
50001012	Ni ndegea, nya lo ngɔ la wu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nhanda indinɛi i bele pelenga aa nge, oo pelenga ningaa gbinhi gbinhia too laanɛɛa aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na,
50001013	indinɛi nhanwa kulugbaangaa i bɛɛ taa manha mbaa na guuguu na nwaa nhu gbee ka inditiini bei bɛɛ too nhu kɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa nyaa kpindi bɛlɛu, gbɛnhaile Kilaisi eyaalakpandou nwɛ aa nge.
50001014	Nya biindaa na kpindi bɛlɛ nau oo pelenga laanɛɛ belaa gbinhi gbinhia ti ndii gbɛndɛ hɔlɔ aa njigbalaa Maliki na nhu, kangaa ti Ngebɔ oo na gɛɛ gɛɛ aa ndii gbɛndɛ.
50001015	-
50001017	Aa tɔmbaga, ningaa lɛingaa k`ati ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ ndaa to ngɔ Kilaisia, gbɛnhaile tolo lɔ ti nɛɛnwaa nya nhanwa awa ti lo ngɔ aa mbaabaga. Ti indinɛi bele gbo kangaa ti nhai hɔlɔ kɛlɛ ai ti nɛɛnwaa na, awa tɔɔ tɔɔngaa tɔɔ ni yɔgɔlɔ na nwaa lonaa kina ngi kpindi bɛlɛ nau. Kɛlɛ lagbitia i k`ati ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ ndaa to ngɔ Kilaisia aa ti nɛɛnwaa na gbɛnhaile ti lo ngɔ aa nge, awa ti nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ oo ngenge indinɛi ɔaa ngeya ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nwaa gbɛndaa nhanwa.
50001018	Ti pele bɛnhɛ aa ti nɛɛnwaa na inaile tai pele ngaa ti nɛɛnwaa na ala aile aa nhanda nyaai, kɛlɛ kangaa gbo taa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ aa ningaa i aa pele o pele Kilaisi nhanwa, nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ ala na nhanwa. Awa ngɔɔ gɛa koonhu nɛɛ nhu,
50001019	gbɛnhaile ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wu laaminɛ na waa pele nya nhanwa ka kpɔ mba na nana Yisɔsi Kilaisi Yina na aa fe mbɛ ɔɔ pelenaa ti nya gua kpindi bɛlɛ nau.
50001020	Ngɔi bombou mbaa lɔ mba ka laanɛɛ nhu gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ aa kɛɛlaa ngɔɔ nana belenaa tee ngɔ aa gbele o gbele awa nya lii ɔɔ gbɛndɛnaa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ eengaa bɛnhɛ aa chaanngi nhu, kangaa nya eyaabele na i ba pele ningaa ti mbɛɛ gɛ Kilaisia, ngi gɛ bɛnhɛ haai ngaa i gɛ haai.
50001021	Nya, nya nhanwa ndɛɛhu na nana ai gɛi na Kilaisi nhanwa ndɛɛhu ai le. Awa haa nwɛɛ aa ba aa ndɛɛhu gbekpe.
50001022	Kɛlɛ ina gbo ngaa gɛ bei ngelou indinɛi nhu tuun, ngɔɔ kunaa ngi li gulɔɔ aa ngenge nwaa nhii nhiɛ belendaa, faa nwɛɛe ngai nana gɔɔ ngɔɔ nhu ɔhɛ.
50001023	Nyaa nhanda fee ngindinɛi loganhu. Ngɔi lɔ nyaa ngi haa kangaa ngi li ngi gɛ na nii Kilaisi o, gbɛnhaile indinɛi lɔ kolo ɔ nya nhanwa.
50001024	Kɛlɛ wu lɔgɔ fanwa maa nhiɛ ɔ nja lee ngɔnhu ngaa gɛ ngelou indinɛi nhu.
50001025	Indinɛi nhanwa, nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa ni lɛɛhu na ɔɔ lonaa nda. Ngɔɔ gɛa na tii wua o bɛɛ kpɔndaa nhanwa wuaa kangaa wu laanɛɛ nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa koonhu nɛɛ.
50001026	Kangaa nya lɔgɔ fanwa wɔɔ koonhu nɛɛ gbinhi gbinhi hɔlɔa Kilaisi nhu nhuna ngɔɔ ba boma.
50001027	Awa nana kolo nhanda na le ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa kawaa nana bele ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na Kilaisi nhanwa lo ngɔ la wu pele, kangaa hali bɛnhɛ ngi ba inaile ngai bai ngaa wu lɔ, ngɔɔ wu nwaanhaa nwɛinaa aa kɛɛlaa wuaa loni nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ nhanda ila fanwa, awa wu enge gbo ngilamaaa aa ngoo ila kele laanɛɛ na nhanwa nana ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na lo ngɔ na la.
50001028	Awɛɛ lua wu haaleengaa i mba hali. Indinɛi nwɛ ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa tuee aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti nyaaia awa ɔɔ ndendouyaa hea wuɛɛ.
50001029	A indinɛi belena gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo fɛɛlɛ na hea wuɛɛ ngengelaa nhanwa Kilaisiɛ, ai beleni gbo waa laanɛɛ aa ala k`a tɔɛ na nwɛe kɛlɛ kawaa yɔgɔlɔ ala lɔgɔ fanwa.
50001030	Chaanngi nhu waa gulaa nyaa kɔɔ na nhu. Kawu naa lɔaɔ ngee gee gɔ pɛnhɛɛ, awa ɛɛ waa mɛi gbo maa gɔɔ ila na nwɛ tuun ngaa kɔ.
50002001	Kina wu hou ɔ na nwa wui Kilaisi o ala nwɛ aa pele wu nhu gbɛndɛ, ala aile? Kilaisi lomayaa na wu nhanwa ala nwɛ aa wu lɔɔndɔɔ, ala aile? Ngebɔ Yina na ala nwɛ aa hounwayaa gbatɛ wu loganhu, ala aile? Ndomayaa lɔ wu nhu ka maaumayaa, ala aile?
50002002	Indinɛi nhanwa, a pelena nya goonhu nɛɛ na laa fe ndi ɔ aa nɛgili ila kpaundaa, ndomayaa i gɛ wu loganhu awa nɛɛnwaa ila ngi gɛ wu eya.
50002003	Awɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ bele nana ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa wu hɔɔndi ɔ, ka nana ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa waa yonga haka leea, kɛlɛ maa bɛɛyaa i gɛa wu loganhu. A nɛgilia aa lagbitia i aa kɛɛlaa ti gbekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ wuaa.
50002004	Awɛɛ nɛgili gbo aa wu nwaa nhanda na, kɛlɛ a nɛgilia gbɔnhu aa lagbitia i ti nwaa nhanda na.
50002005	Wu nɛgili na bele ngɔ na kaa bele ɛɛ Kilaisi nda nɛgili ɔ na, ɛɛ ti ngaaini bei ngue na nhu.
50002006	Ala bele ngɔ ɛɛ Ngebɔ aa pele o pele, kɛlɛ ai nɛgilii aa kɛɛlaa ala nwaa gɛɛlaa na sɔun tii ngebɔ o nhanda nwɛ nana ɔɔ lo nhu,
50002007	kɛɛ loko guaa ti nwaa gɛɛlaa na nhu sɔun tii Ngebɔ o, awa kɛɛ belenga ɛɛ nuu gbɔha, awa kɛɛ lɔgɔɔunga nuu gbɔha guague nhu, awa kɛɛ belenga ɛɛ ngeyaalakpandou.
50002008	Kɛɛ gbɔha na belenga aa maa yei nwɔɔ awa kɛɛ nwaa bɛɛa nhaa bɛnhɛ kɛɛ haaa napangaa ngi nwaa ufe haa na i peleni kpekpa ngulu naa.
50002009	Indinɛi nhanwa, ka Ngebɔ i ala lɛa nga mbɛɛyaa bombou mbaa nhinde, awa kɛɛ ndaa hea alɛɛ nana mbɛɛ bombou mbaa i mba tee ngɔ ndaa o ndaaa,
50002010	kangaa mbɛɛ hendaa nhanwa Yisɔsi laa naɛ, ningaa i bɛɛ ka ngafɔngaa i tɔɔ ombi hitɛa alɛɛ, napangaa natiini bɛɛ ti aliyana, ka ngelou i nhu awa ka lɔu na,
50002011	awa tɔɔ kɛa kpou aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi Maliki nwɛ aa ala, nana ɔɔ mbɛɛ gɛ Ngebɔa mi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala.
50002012	Faa nwɛɛe wua nya lo ngɔ na aa wuee, wee nwaa bɛɛa nyɛɛ nhuna ngee na tii wua o. Chaanngi nhu a nwaa bɛɛa nyɛɛ tee ngɔ pɛnhɛɛ naɔ ngee na tii wua o. A engea aa wu gaanhu na bɛɛ kangaa wu bila ngenge na nwa nana Kilaisi i tɔɔloni wu nhu nhuna i ndendouyaa hei wuee. A pelena aa wu nɛɛnwaa na bɛɛ.
50002013	Ngebɔ nwɛ aa enge wu nhu kangaa i pele kpala ngi gɛ wuaa awa wu ku wu nana bele kpala ngi alaa wu pele pele.
50002014	Waa gɛ aa gbɛ o gbɛ belendaa, awɛɛ gɔɔ nhu yia awa awɛɛ mɔɔli mɔɔli pele,
50002015	kangaa wu bele ngaa Ngebɔ lengaa natiini tɛɛgɛ ai ti nwa, wu gɛ leoni awa wu nhanda i gɛ gbekpeni nana hiti ɔ nhu chɔɔ koto goto mbelaa liiya ka nhanda nyɔu belaa. Kawaa bele ɛɛ waun nana aa huo gbindi nhu ningaa indiini ndiiya,
50002016	waa gɛ aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa aa tuee nana aa ndɛɛhu nyiɛ he tuɛɛ. Ina waa indinɛi bele, ngɔɔ goonɛa wu nhu aa Foo na Kilaisi ɔɔ ba ma, gbɛnhaile indinɛi nwɛ ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa ngai lapii yaai awa ngai engei yaai.
50002017	Naangaa tɔɔ nya baaa ɛɛ chaaga nana ɔɔ gula wu chaaga na nwa, napangaa wu laanɛɛ na wu hembɛ na nwɛ. Ina indinɛi aa bele nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ awa ngɔɔ ni goonhu nɛɛ na lɔgɔɔunaa aa wuee bɛɛ.
50002018	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, wua gbɔnhu kawaa goonhu nɛɛ awa a wu nda goonhu nɛɛ na lɔgɔɔuna aa nge.
50002019	Ina Maliki na guunmayaa na nwɛ, nya nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngɔɔ Timootii lonaa wuee guui nhu, kangaa ngi ngoolee hɔlɔ wu nhanwa nana ɔɔ nya goonhu nɛɛ.
50002020	Nuu ai na nana aa nɛgili aa wu nwaa nhanda na ɛɛ ala aa pele.
50002021	Ti nɛgili ɔ gbo aa ti nwaa nhanda na kɛlɛ ti lɔgɔlaa aile aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwaa nhanda na.
50002022	Wu nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Timootii oo ngi goloyaa na lɔgɔɔunga ngeyaabele nhu. Nya o ala o noo enge ngilamaaa ɛɛ kɛɛgɛ o ngi nhiindou o ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛndaa nhanwa.
50002023	Faa nwɛɛe nya nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngɔɔ Timootii lonaa wuee nhu gutu ɔ na ngaa kɔɔ nya bele ngɔ na tɔɔ nya bele.
50002024	Awa nya yigba ngɔ Maliki na nhu aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ gbɔnaa nyaa kangaa nya o gbɔnhu ngi ba wuee guui nhu.
50002025	Ngoo tɔa aa kɛɛlaa kangaa mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na Ɛpafolaitɔsi lo wuee boma, nana wu teeni nya nwanhu kangaa i gbɔ nyaa. Noo gɔ ngenge naa ngilamaa.
50002026	K`awu nwɔi i gbaaiɔ alaa bɛɛ, awa ka ala nɛɛnwaa yogobeenga, gbɛnhaile kawu mɛinga aa kɛɛlaa kɛɛ hegbɛa.
50002027	Aa tɔmbaga kɛɛ hegbɛa nhaa kɛɛgɛa ɔɔ haa. Kɛlɛ ka Ngebɔ i nwaaua ala nwa, awa ala ila ngɔ aile gboe kɛlɛ nya boma gbɔnhu. Kangaa i maaumayaa waa ɛa nya au nwa.
50002028	Faa nwɛɛe kpala mbaa lɔ nyaa ngi to wuee kangaa wu goonhu nɛɛ aa ala lɔndaa gbɔnhu, awa kangaa nya lii na i ba golo hei.
50002029	Faa nwɛɛe a ala binjana aa koonhu nɛɛ ɛɛ wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ. Awa a mbɛɛ gɛa ningaa indiini bondaa ɛɛ ala.
50002030	Gbaa kɛɛgɛa ɔɔ haa Kilaisi enge na nhanwa, gbɛnhaile kɛɛ gbɔha guaa aa chaaga kangaa i bila ngenge na nwa nana wu ngɔai ala eya kangaa i pele nyɛɛ.
50003001	Ni ndegea, nya gbelenwaa na, kang~a~a gɛ a goonhu nɛɛa wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Maliki na o. Nya lɔgɔlaa aile aa nhanda ila ngindinɛi gbaalindaa gbɔnhu wuee, gbɛnhaile ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ belenaa aa wu nwanhu gbee.
50003002	A sogia ningaa nyɔu nyɔua i mba natiini ti eyaabele na guague ngɔ na aa njiaa, ti lo ngɔ na aa kɛndaa aa kɛɛlaa k`a ningaa taa ningaa ti nwanha nhanda bele.
50003003	Gbaa mua, mua nwɛ ningaa i ngaa muee mi manha nhanda gbekpe na hɔlɔa, awa k`ami Ngebɔ batou ndi ɔ aa ngi Yina na fɔha na lepele, awa k`ami goonhu nɛɛ mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, awa mai yigbani nuu gbɔha eyaabele nhu.
50003004	Ina ngaa lo nda, ngaa yigbanaa nhanda indinɛi nhu, awa ina nuu lagbiti aa nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa aa kunaa i yigba nuu gbɔha eyaabele nhu, nya bɛnhɛ saabu lɔ mbɛ tee ngɔ alaa.
50003005	Gbaa nhuna ti nya leni i kpauni aa mi guu ɔfɛla, ngɔsaakpa na nwa, kati nya nwanha nhanda belenga ɛɛ Yuua i taa pele. Nya Iisilɛli nwɔɔ gaai gaai nwɛɛ aa nge kualaa Bɛnjaminii ti bɛɛyaa goo na nhu, awa ni bembaa i ngɔɔ bɛɛ Hibulua nwɛɔ aa tuee. Aa ba aa sɔ na nwakɛndaa lepele, Falesi nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa nge, napangaa kpapi na nana aa Yuua i ti sɔ na nwakɛ nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ.
50003006	Kangi longa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ Yuua i ti laanɛɛyaa na nhanwa nhaa kangi Kilaisi laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa sɛɛgɛa. Ina nuu aa belenaa aa tee mɔɔ ndi ɔ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa nhanwa sɔ nau, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa nya kɛlɛ ngai mba nha.
50003007	Kɛlɛ nana bɛɛ ngi ba nɛgili la aa kɛɛlaa qani nwɛ nya nhanwa, ngai kpauni aa qani Kilaisi lɔgɔ fanwa.
50003008	Aa tɔmbaga ngai gbɛ o gbɛ gbau ngɔ aa qani, gbaa nya lo ngɔ la ngi ni Nwaliki na gɔɔ Yisɔsi Kilaisi, gbaa indinɛi nwɛ kolo ɔ lee ngɔ bɛɛ. Ngoo loko guaa gbɛ o gbɛ nhu ala lɔgɔ fanwa awa ngaa gbɛ o gbɛ na lɔa gbo ɛɛ kaagɔɔ, kangaa ngi Kilaisi hɔlɔ aa nya qani,
50003009	awa ni hou nwa nii ala o hiti ɔ nhu. Ngai leeni Ngebɔ gulɔɔ ndi ɔ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa sɔ nau, kɛlɛ nya lee ngɔ ngebɔ gulɔɔ gbɛnhaile nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa Kilaisi, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ aa nuu belenaa aa tee mɔɔ, gbɛnhaile maa nwɔɔ na laanɛɛ ɔ.
50003010	Nana gbo kpala ngi nyaa ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, ngi Kilaisi gɔɔ ka fɔha na nana i huui alau kualaa haa na nhu, awa ngi yɔgɔlɔ ɛɛ i yɔgɔlɔi, awa ngi lapi kangaa ngi haa ɛɛ ala i haai,
50003011	awa nya nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ huua nyau kualaa haa na nhu.
50003012	Ai beleni aa kɛɛlaa ngoo hɔlɔa tɔ inaile ngoo hiti nhu, kɛlɛ ngi nɔa nhu aa ndapilaa kangaa ngi ku ma, gbɛnhaile Yisɔsi Kilaisi oo nya belenga aa ngi nda.
50003013	Ni ndegea, ngai nɛgilii ma aa kɛɛlaa ngoo pelenga aa nya nda, kɛlɛ nhanda ila ngaa pele, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa ngi nɔa nana nwa i leenga awa ngi lapi nana nhanwa i nya gulɔɔ.
50003014	Faa nwɛɛ ngaa gbɛndɛ kangaa ngi nhumbu aa hiti kpelenwaa ngi ba paabaa na hɔlɔ. Paabaa na nwɛ aa ngui na nana Ngebɔ i peleni muaa ndi ɔ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi lepele ndɛɛhu na nhanwa i mi nwanhu na.
50003015	Mua bɛɛ mi gbɛa ɔ na laanɛɛ na nhu kamaa nɛgili indinɛi bonda bele, kɛlɛ ina nɛgili lagbiti lɔ wu lɛingaa nɛɛnwaa, Ngebɔ ɔɔ pelenaa wu nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba.
50003016	Kangaa gbo nagɔli na mi hɔlɔa mi hou aa tɔmbaga.
50003017	Ni ndegea, wua bɛɛ a nana belena ngaa pele. Noo kuague kpekpe na lɔgɔɔunga wu nhanwa, faa nwɛɛ a natiini kpeena taa hitɛ ni guague na bou nwa.
50003018	Naa gbinhi ɔ ngoo njia indinɛi gɛa aa wuee awa nya ngaa kɛ gbɔnhu aa wuee tii ngɔɔ o aa kɛɛlaa, ningaa gbinhi gbinhia lɛingaa lɔ na natiini ti eyaabele na i ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa ti lolo ɔ aa kolo na nana Kilaisi i haai fanwa ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa, napangaa kpekpa ngulu na.
50003019	Awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti biinaa yahandama, gbɛnhaile ti eebɔ na nwɛ aa ti lugu na nwaa nhanda. K`ati goonɛ nana nhu ti ba ufe nda, awa ti nɛɛnwaa bu ɔ gbo ngelou i nhu nhaanhaa i nhu.
50003020	Kɛlɛ mua lugulea nwɛ aa muee mɛɛ aliyana, awa mua maa mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na nwaa golo napangaa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi nana ɔ ba kualaa aliyana.
50003021	Ɔɔ mi yaaiyaai lugu na nwaa lobinaa nana ɔɔ haa, awa ɔɔ pelenaa ɛɛ ngi nda lugu gbekpe na ndi ɔ aa ngi fɔha na nana ɔɔ pele i ku i ba aa gbɛ o gbɛ na ala gbɔha na le, awa ɔɔ gɛa ti nwanhu, awa tua pa tɔɔ gɛa alau.
50004001	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, wua nya lo ngɔ na na wuee, wu nwɔi na aa gbaai nyaa, wuɛɛ waa pele nya goonhu nɛɛ awa nya goonɛ ɔ wu nhu. Faa nwɛɛe a lona nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Maliki na o wua na nya lo ngɔ na aa wuee.
50004002	Yuolia, bia o Sindigi o ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ kangaa wu lo ngoo ila nhu ɛɛ ndege nyɛɛlengaa Maliki na nhu.
50004003	Awa bia gbɔnhu nya ndege enge nwɔɔ, gbɔna njiengaa indiini mba, gbɛnhaile noo enge ngilamaaa aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛndaa. Awa ka ningaa lagbitia ti gbɔnga nyaa, napangaa Kilɛmɛnde o ka nya ndege enge belaa lagbitia i natiini Ngebɔ i ti laa na gbaalia natiini ti gɔɔ na nhu ti ndɛɛhu na hɔlɔa nana Ngebɔ aa fe.
50004004	A goonhu nɛɛa wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Maliki na o aa gbele o gbele. Ngi kɛ gbɔnhu aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa a goonhu nɛɛa.
50004005	Maliki na alaa ba guui nhu, faa nwɛɛe a pelena ningaa i bɛɛ ti tɔ aa kɛɛlaa wu lii lo ngɔ.
50004006	Awa awɛɛ lii nhɛɛ gbɛ o gbɛ nhanwa, kɛlɛ nhanda o nhanda nhu a laaminɛa, awa wu Ngebɔ nwɔɔli nana nhanwa wu baa ngɔ la, awa wu fiɛ gua ala nwa aa gbele o gbele.
50004007	Awa maa lɛi na nana Ngebɔ aa fe ningaa tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba, maa nwaa lɛi indinɛi ɔɔ wu lii na nwanhu gbeenaa ka wu nɛgili na ɛɛ wu hou ɔ na nwa wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
50004008	Kpelenwaa na, ni ndegea, a nɛgilia nhanda indinɛi nwa bɛɛ, natiini ti gbekpe ngɔ tee ngɔ bɛɛ, awa ti hiti ɔ nhu mbihɛ nhanwa, napangaa nhanda nana tɔmbaga le, mbɛɛ mba, tee ngɔ, chanhai ngɔ, ndomayaa ɔ awa ka panda banda ɔ.
50004009	A pua ngeyaabele nhu nana bɛɛ ngi wu nagɔlia la, nana wu hɔlɔa kualaa nya le, nana wu mɛinga kualaa nya le, awa tii nana o wu tɔa nya nhu. Awa Ngebɔ na nana aa maa lɛi he ɔɔ gɛa na tii wua o.
50004010	Ngi goonhu nɛɛ mbombou ngɔ ni hounwayaa na nhu nii Maliki na o, gbɛnhaile kpelenwaa na wu lɔgɔlaa ɔ gbɔnhu aa nge. Aa tɔmbaga wu lɔgɔlaa ɔ aa nge kɛlɛ wai fɛɛlɛ hɔlɔi waa ndɔgɔɔu.
50004011	Ai beleni k`a kpala mɛɛ ngaa gbala mbaa fanwa gbɛnhaile oo nya lugu gɔɔnga aa kɛɛlaa, aa pele o pele nana aa gɛ nya eya ku ngɔ aa nge,
50004012	ngi mbaanjaa gɔɔnaa awa ngi hɔlɔyaa gɔɔnaa, awa ngoo gbundu ngindinɛi nagɔlia, awa kangaa nhanda o nhanda nhu, ngi hɔlɔ kpinhi ɔ, ngai hɔlɔ kpinhi ɔ, ndɔɛ i gɛ nyaa, ndɔɛ ai gɛ nyaa, nya lii lɛi ɔ gbo.
50004013	Ngaa kunaa ngi gbɛ o gbɛ bele kualaa fɔha na nhu nana Kilaisi aa fe nyɛɛ.
50004014	Kɛlɛ wu pelenia maa nhiɛ ɔ wu gbɔni nyaa kpɔu gbɔu na nhu ngee na.
50004015	Wua kpei Filipaaia i ngaa wuee wuaa kɔɔ ngɔ pandaa aa kɛɛlaa nhuna pɛnhɛɛ ngi ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛi aa lɔgɔ na ngi guai Masilonia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, laanɛɛ belaa lagbitia tai gbɔni nyaa aa nahoo hembɛ, k`a wua gbo wu peleni.
50004016	Hali nhuna ngee Tɛsalonaika laa waa na nhu, kawu gbɔnga nyaa tee ngɔ naa ila nhu aa nana ngi baa ngee nya nwa.
50004017	Ai beleni aa kɛɛlaa k`a fembɛ na nwɛ ngaa ngɔie kɛlɛ nya lo ngɔ la ngi qani lɔ nana ɔɔ mbɛɛyaa nwaa lo wu laa banda na nwa.
50004018	Nana wu teeni nyɛɛ tee ngɔ mɔɔ nhu awa nya lii lɛi ɔ, kina somila na wu teeni nyɛɛ aa Ɛpafolaitɔsi ngoo hɔlɔa. Wu somila na pele ngɔ ɛɛ ngua gu nɛɛ nɛɛ, awa chaaga nwɛ nana ngebɔ i kuun ngɔ ma awa alaa ala goonhu nɛɛ ngɔ.
50004019	Ngebɔ na ngaa batou ɔɔ wu gɔa aa gbɛ o gbɛ na nana wu baa ngɔ la kualaa ngi gbatɛyaa bombou mbaa na nhu ɛɛ wu hou ɔ na nwa wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
50004020	Kangaa Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na i mbɛɛyaa hɔlɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ. Kangaa i bele.
50004021	Wu ha mbɛ Ngebɔ ndaa i ma natiini ti hou ɔ na nwa tii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o. Laanɛɛ belaa i ni bei ngilamaaa ti fama leeni wuɛɛ.
50004022	Ngebɔ ndaa i bɛɛ ti fama leeni wuɛɛ, eengaa bɛnhɛ aa natiini taa enge mɛɛ Hota Manha Mbaa na guuguu na nhu ti fama leeni wuɛɛ.
50004023	Kangaa Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi i panda bandayaa lɔgɔɔu ngaa wuee.
51001001	Nya nwɛ Pɔɔlu aa nge, Yisɔsi Kilaisi lo mɔɔ na, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo ndaalaaa kangaa ngi bele ngaa ngi lo mɔɔ. Awa ka mi ndege laanɛɛwɔɔ na Timootii i gulaa nya nwa aa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaalindaa wu nwanhu,
51001002	wua Ngebɔ ndaa i ngaa wuee awa ni ndege lengaa i ngaa wuee gbɔnhu wu yigba ngɔ na Kilaisi nhu wu mɛɛ Kɔlɔɔsi, kangaa Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na i panda bandayaa lɔgɔɔu ngaa wuee awa i maa lɛi ɔa wu eya.
51001003	Aa gbele o gbele k`ani fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi Kɛɛgɛ na nhuna naa gɛ aa laaminɛlaa wu nhanwa,
51001004	gbɛnhaile noo mɛinga aa kɛɛlaa wu laanɛɛ ɔ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi awa wu lo ngɔ aa Ngebɔ ndaa i.
51001005	Wu indinɛi belenia gbɛnhaile wu nɛɛnwaa la ɔ nana nhu Ngebɔ i makɛa wu gulɔɔ mɛɛ Aliyana, nana i belenga aa wu nda nhuna pɛnhɛɛ wu tɔmbaga oo na nwɛini napangaa Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na,
51001006	nana i wu nwaaia. Awa aa baa aa nduba gbinhi gbinhi ningaa nwa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ. Awa oo sia ngelou gbɔha i nhu bɛɛ ɛɛ aa pele ngɔɔ wu liiya kualaa lɔgɔ na wu mɛini awa ka lɔgɔ na wu nhu kɔɔni aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na aa ndɔgɔɔu tɔmbaga ɔ,
51001007	ɛɛ Ɛpafilɔsi nana mi lo ngɔ na la i wu nagɔlii la. Ala nuu nwɛɛ aa ala nana aa enge Kilaisiɛ ɛɛ naa pele. Ala i enge maa nhiɛ ɔ Kilaisiɛ awa indinɛi kpɔmbayaa waa nwɛ mi nhanwa.
51001008	Oo ba i kɛ aa nuee pele ngɔ na Ngebɔ Yina na i pelenga wu longa aa wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i.
51001009	Saabu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ naa laaminɛ wu nhanwa aa gbele o gbele kualaama aa lɔgɔ na ni wu nwaanhaa nwɛini. Awa k`ani Ngebɔ nwɔɔli kangaa i pele laanɛɛ belaa i wu Kɔlɔɔsi wu nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngi laalaa naa wu lɛɛhu na nhanwa, awa kangaa Ngebɔ Yina na i pele wu nhu lo hɔlɔ bɛɛ, awa ka nɛɛnwaa nhu lee bɛɛ. Poungaa na siina, wu ba gɛ na ɛɛ Maliki na lo ngɔ la wu gɛ na.
51001010	Awa aa gbele o gbele tɔ, wɔɔ nana belenaa aa Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ. Wɔɔ gɛa aa nhanda nwaa nhii nhiɛ bele pelendaa aa pele gbinhi gbinhi, awa wɔɔ baa wu Ngebɔ gɔɔ pandaa.
51001011	K`angi laaminɛ kangaa Ngebɔ i wu nhu gbɛndɛ aa fɔha na bɛɛ kualaa ngi fɔha na le nana mbombou ngɔ na tee ngɔ bɛɛ, kangaa wu ba lii gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ kpɛndɛ na nhu bɛɛ nana aa wu nwaai tii ndii lo ngoo.
51001012	Awa wu fiɛ gua Kɛɛgɛ na nwa aa koonhu nɛɛ nana i pelenga mi hitia nhu aa kpapi hɔlɔndaa nanaa i makɛ ngɔ ngi ndaa i fanwa mɛɛ ngi nwanhayaa waun na nhu.
51001013	Ngebɔ oo mi nwaa gaaunga Kualaa kpindi na fɔha na eya. Oo ba aa muee maa lɛi ɔ nyɔɔ mɛɛ ngi Lou na nwanhayaa na la nana ala lo ngɔ waa na la.
51001014	Ngebɔ oo mi umbonga ndi ɔ aa ngi Lou na lepele, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa oo mi nhanda nyɔu na lo na muɛɛ.
51001015	Kilaisi nana mi ala lɔi pele ngɔ ɛɛ Ngebɔ nana mai ala lɔ. Ala nwɛ Ngebɔ Lou na aa ala yeingaa Ngebɔ i gilaa gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛi.
51001016	Ngebɔ oo gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛa i aliyana ka ngelou i nhu ndi ɔ aa Yisɔsi gbɔmbayaa na lepele, nhaanhaa i maa ti lɔ o, ka nhaanhaa i mai ti lɔ, napangaa ngafɔngaa i bɛɛ, natiini fɔha tuaa o, manha ngaa o, natiini ti lagbitia nwanhu o, ka natiini taa fɔhayaa la. Ngebɔ i gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛia ndi ɔ aa Yisɔsi gbɔmbayaa na lepele awa ala nhaa nwɛɛ i gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛi.
51001017	Kilaisi alaa naɔ pɛnhɛɛ yeingaa Ngebɔ i gilaa gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛi, awa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ alaa ngi lomaa na ndi ɔ aa ti hounwayaa na lepele tii Kilaisi o.
51001018	Ala nwɛ laanɛɛ belaa i ti ukoko nwɔɔ na le napangaa ala lugu na. Ala nwɛ laanɛɛ belaa i ti lɛɛhu na lɔɔlomaa na le. Ala nwɛ pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na aa ala i huua haa na nhu, kangaa i pɛnhɛɛ tomaa na gbau gbɛ o gbɛ nhu.
51001019	Gbaa Ngebɔ oo nhu ɔhɛa kangaa ala bele ngɔ na nana hiti ɔ na nhu i gɛ Kilaisi nhu.
51001020	Awa Ngebɔ oo ndaalaa ɔ aa gbɛ o gbɛ na nwaa laanndaa nwa boma aa ngi Lou na gbɔmbayaa na lepele. Ngi Lou na haa na i peleni ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa, napangaa kpekpa ngulu na oo ba aa ndoganhu gbatɛ indinɛi, kangaa gbɛ o gbɛ na i aliyana ka ngelou i nhu i ba ngee boma.
51001021	Pɛnhɛɛ naɔ nhanda ɔa ɔɔ wu loganhu wua o Ngebɔ o, awa Ngebɔ haaleengaa nwɛɔ aa wuee gbɛnhaile woo nhanda nyɔu belengaɔ aa ala ka nɛgili nyɔu.
51001022	Kɛlɛ ngi Lou na haa na nhanwa i peleni, oo ba aa ndoganhu gbatɛ wu loganhu wua o Ngebɔ o, kangaa Ngebɔ i ba ba aa wuee ala au bele nhu ɛɛ ningaa natiini tai lɛɛi gbɛ o gbɛ nhu.
51001023	Kɛlɛ aa tɔmbaga kawaa li gulɔɔ aa njigbalaa Ngebɔ Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na nhu, awa wu lo nhu nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ. Awɛɛ fɛɛlɛ he gbɔha naɛ aa kɛɛlaa waa gɛ nhu nyɔngɔ kualaa nɛɛnwaa la na nhu nana Kilaisi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na aa fe wuɛɛ, napangaa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nana wu mɛinga. Ningaa too Kilaisi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛa aa ningaa i ngelou gbɔha i nhu bɛɛ. Awa maa enge na nwɛ Ngebɔ i ngɔaa ngeya.
51001024	Awa chaanngi, nya yɔgɔlɔlaa na wu lɔgɔ fanwa oo pelenga nya goonhu nɛɛ. Kilaisi yɔgɔlɔ na i peleni laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa napangaa ala lugu na, ala nwɛ ngi loa aa bila ma.
51001025	Awa Ngebɔ oo nya belenga aa ngenge nwɔɔ laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa. Oo ngenge indinɛi ɔaa ngeya napangaa ngi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na hɛpɛ na gɛndaa nhanwa fiou wu qaniyaa nhanwa.
51001026	Ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ indinɛi ala nwɛ gbundu na le i ndɔɔguaɔ aa lɔgɔ nhu gɔha gɔha ningaa i mba, kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu oo kuaa kpahita Ngebɔ ndaa i ngee.
51001027	Ngebɔ oo ndaalaaa aa kɛɛlaa ngi ndaa i kataa ngi gbundu na gɔɔ, napangaa gbundu mbombou mbaa na nana i ngeya ningaa gbɔhaa i fanwa bɛɛ. Gbundu na siina ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi alaa wu nhu, nhunhaa na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa wɔɔ wu nda gbapi hɔlɔa Ngebɔ bɛɛyaa naa.
51001028	Awa ni ngoo na gɛ aa ningaa i ndaa to ngɔ Kilaisia. K`ani nuu o nuu laanhii ngaa nhanda na nana maa ai nhiɛi taa pele, awa kani nuu o nuu nagɔlia aa nhu lo na bɛɛ i ni eya. Njɛpɛ nwɛɛ ni kɛi aa tuee kangaa ni ba ba aa nuu o nuu Ngebɔ le ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu hounwayaa nhu tii Kilaisi o.
