51001029	Saabu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ ngaa nwɔɛ nwa aa fɔha bombou mbaa na nana Kilaisi i pui nya nhu.
51002001	Nya lo ngɔ la wu nya lapi ɔ na gɔɔ ngi lapia la wu nhanwa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ka laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa ti Laolisia nhaa natiini fanwa gbɔnhu tai lɛ nya gɔɔni lɛ.
51002002	Awa indinɛi ngi pele kangaa ti ndii gbɛndɛ hɔlɔ, awa ti ba lo ngaa ti ndege lengaa i pandaa hounwayaa nhu, kangaa ti ba hiti nhu nɛɛnwaa la hɔlɔ nana maa hɔlɔ, nhuna maa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ nanaa hiti ɔ nhu, awa nhuna gbɔnhu maa Ngebɔ gbundu na gɔɔ napangaa Kilaisi.
51002003	Kilaisi ala nwɛ i pelenga mi Ngebɔ nhu lo na gɔɔnga ka ngi gɔɔnjaa na nana i ndɔɔgu nhuɔ pele ngɔ na ɛɛ kɛin.
51002004	Ngi indinɛi gɛ aa wuee kangaa awɛɛ pote nuu aa wu nwɔu mɔu ngaa ndɛɛ lɛɛ yɛpɛ hali i gɛ nɛɛ nɛɛi.
51002005	Hali ngai gɛi na tii wua o, kɛlɛ a pelena ɛɛ nyaa na tii wua i ngoo. Awa nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ aa naa lɔndaa aa kɛɛlaa wu hou ɔ nwa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa njigbalaa Kilaisi nhu, awa nuu ai ku aa wu nhu yanja.
51002006	Awa kina wu kuunnga Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwa mi Nwaliki na, a belena ala le ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti hounwayaa nhu tii ala o.
51002007	A hape bua ala nhu, awa wu bele ngɔ na kaa gɛ yigbani pandaa nana nhu aa kɛ aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa. Wu wu laanɛɛ na bu ala nhu pandaa ɛɛ gbo ti wu nagɔlii la, awa wu luunhu ba ngaa fiɛ guandaa ala nwa.
51002008	A sogia kangaa nuu ɛɛ pele waa bele ngaa nduaa aa nɛgili na bele ngɔ na taa pele, nana kolo ai nhu taa ningaa nwɔu mɔu nda, nana mbembaa i taa ti laalalengaa i nagɔli la, awa ka nagɔli na gbɔnhu nana aa gua ngafɔngaa i ngee natiini taa sia aa ngelou na bɛɛ. Awa nhu lo ngindinɛi bonda ai guai Kilaisi le.
51002009	Kilaisi ala laa fe ngɔ aa Ngebɔ bele ngɔ na yɔ ngi nuu gbɔhayaa na nhu.
51002010	Awa Ngebɔ oo ndɛɛhu hea wuɛɛ nana hiti ɔ nhu nhuna wu houi nwa wui Kilaisi o. Ala manha na nwɛ aa ala ngafɔngaa i manhu natiini taa manhayaa la ka natiini taa fɔhayaa la.
51002011	Nhuna wu houi nwa wui ala o, oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa wu nwanha nhanda bele ngɔ tɔ. Ai beleni ɛɛ manha nhanda indinɛi ningaa i taa pelengee kɛlɛ Kilaisi nda nwanha nhanda na nwɛ i peleni, napangaa nhanda baandaa wuaa kualaa nhanda nyɔu na fɔha na eya nana i wu nhu.
51002012	Nhuna ti Ngebɔ ua na beleni aa wuee, oo belenga ɛɛ Ngebɔ oo wu lɔɔgua maau ndoga nhu wui Kilaisi o ngilamaa. Awa nhuna gbɔnhu ti Ngebɔ ua na beleni aa wuee, oo pelenga boma wu gɛ na ndɛɛhu nyiɛ nhu. Awa oo huua wuu kualaa maau ndoga na nhu ɛɛ wui Kilaisi o ngilamaaa nana i huuiɔ alau kualaa haa na nhu. Indinɛi bɛɛ i belenia ndi ɔ aa wu laanɛɛyaa na lepele aa Ngebɔ fɔha na.
51002013	Lɔgɔ lagbiti ɔ wu haa ɔɔ Ngebɔ nda gbapi na nhu gbɛnhaile nhanda nyɔu nɛɛ ɔɔ wu la, gbaa wu nwanha nhanda bele ngɔ aileɔ lɛ, napangaa nhanda nyɔu na fɔha na guandaa wu nhu. Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ oo ndɛɛhu nyiɛ hea wuɛɛ ɛɛ i fei Kilaisiɛ. Awa oo mi nhanda nyɔu na loa na muɛɛ bɛɛ.
51002014	Kue na nana i muaaɔ maa Ngebɔ baabaa la nana i pu ngɔɔ kɔɔ nhu, awa ka sɔ kɛbɛlɛ gɛbɛlɛ na nana aa gɛ mɛɛ indinɛi bele, oo ngaa sibia fiou. Awa Ngebɔ oo pelenga kangaa fɔha ɛɛ gɛ mba gbɔnhu kpɔ, pele ngɔ ɛɛ kpakpa mɛɛ ti kpakpani aa lɔndima na ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa napangaa kpekpa ngulu na.
51002015	Awa ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa gbɔnhu napangaa kpekpa ngulu na, naa nwɛɛ Kilaisi i fɔha na guai na ngafɔngaa i ngeya natiini manhangaa aa tuee o, ka natiini ti lagbitia nwanhu. Nana i peleni aa tuee ala nwɛɔ aa kɛɛlaa kɛɛ pelenga nuu o nuu i naa lɔa kpahita ndi ɔ na aa ti ilindaa na nhanwa i ti ilii tee ala bou nwa ee sia aa tuee ɛɛ nuu aa gɛ aa kunjaa sia belendaa.
51002016	Awɛɛ kuun nuu lagbiti aa wu gɔhɔ ndaa to ngɔ nana nhanwa waa mɛ, ka nana nhanwa waa kpɔɛ, inaile nuu ɛɛ wu gɔhɔ ndaa to ngɔ tɔɔgɔɔ hoo lɛingaa nhanwa nana ti nhu ɔhɛ ngɔ fogo na nhu Ngebɔ batoundaa ma nhanwa, inaile ngau nyiɛ gbolo guu guandaa nhanwa, awa ka Yuua ti Lɛɛhu Hoo nhanwa.
51002017	Sɔ kɛbɛlɛ gɛbɛlɛ indinɛi bɛɛ, nhanda na pelendaa gulɔɔ na ɔɔ bele, maa guague na nwɛ. Kɛlɛ nana tɔmbaga ɔ na ala nwɛ aa Kilaisi.
51002018	Awɛɛ fɛɛlɛ he nuu o nuuɛ aa kpau wu eya nana aa bele ngaa wu baabaa na, napangaa nuu na nana i gbɔha na gbau ngɔ aa kolonhu nwɔɔ tee ngɔ ningaa i mba bɛɛ, gbɛnhaile ala aa nhanda lɔa nɛɛnwaa na nhu nana Ngebɔ aa ndɔgɔɔu nda, nana aa hɛlɛ wuaa, kangaa wu gula ngi lɛɛ lɛɛ nwaa yeiyaa naa ka laaminɛlaa malekaa le ɛɛ k`a Ngebɔ nwɛ aa tuee. Nuu indinɛi bonda ngaunwaa lɛ ɔ ndi ɔ aa ngi nuu gbɔhayaa nɛgili na lepele. Kɛlɛ ngi aunwaa lɛyaa na nhunhaa ai mba hali.
51002019	Awa maa nwɔɔ indinɛi bonda oo gbenga aa njigbalaa Kilaisi nhu nana ndugu na ukoko na aa ala, napangaa laanɛɛ belaa i. Nhuna Kilaisi aa ndugu indinɛi nwanhu gbee, nhu nwɛɛ ndugu indinɛi aa nhu gbɛndɛnjaa hɔlɔ. Awa nhu nwɛɛ gila kaai na lo tomaa nga na bɛɛ ɔɔ enge aa ngi bele. Awa oo gbɛa gila ɛɛ Ngebɔ lo ngɔ la i gbɛa.
51002020	Nhuna Kilaisi i haai, oo belenga ɛɛ wui kilaisi o wu haai nwa ngilamaaa awa ka Ngebɔ wu nwaa gaaunga kualaa ngafɔngaa i ngeya natiini ngelou i nhu nwanhangaa i ngaa tuee. Gbɔɔ gbɔnhu wu ngelou na eyaabele gɛbɛlɛ na nhu? Gbɔɔ waa nwaa bɛɛ sɔ kɛbɛlɛ indinɛiu,
51002021	ɛɛ kɛɛlaa, awɛɛ sia india, inaile awɛɛ sii sia naa, awa awɛɛ indinɛi gɔgɔ.
51002022	Awa Sɔ ngindinɛi bɛɛ i kɛi aa muee ndaa to ngɔ ndaa nwɛnhɛi naa nana maa bila ngaa mɛndaa o, ka nana maa bila ngaa kpɔɛndaa kolo ɛa gɛ nhu gbɔnhu. Indinɛi bɛɛ sɔ mɛ nuu gbɔha i kpatɛ gbatɛi ningaa nagɔlindaa la nhanwa.
51002023	Ningaa i ti nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa sɔ ngindinɛi bonda kpatɛ gbatɛ ngɔ na nhu lo tɔ nhu, kɛlɛ nhu lo ngai nhu hali. I hɛlɛ ningaaa aa kɛɛlaa kataa malekaa batou. Ka ndɛɛ lɛɛ nwaa yei belendaa, awa ka lugu na yɔgɔlɔndaa aa pele o pele. Sɔ ngindinɛi ai gbɔ nuua kpendaa nhanwa nanaa ala lugu na lo ngɔ la i pele.
51003001	Nhuna Ngebɔ i huui Kilaisiu kualaa haa na nhu, mi gɛa wua nwɛ i huui wuu ngilamaa. Faa nwɛɛe a lii na bua gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu i Ngebɔ eya mɛɛ aliyana, mɛɛ Kilaisi i na heii ngi nwanhayaa gbakaa na nhu Ngebɔ ɛha loko na nhu.
51003002	A nɛɛnwaa na bua gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu nana i aliyana, kɛlɛ ngelou indinɛi nhu nhaanhaa i ngaile waa nɛɛnwaa bu ti nhu.
51003003	Mi gɛa woo haaa, awa wu lɛɛhu na makɛ ngɔ tii Kilaisi nda na o Ngebɔ nhu.
51003004	Wu lɛɛhu na ngengelaa nhaa nwɛɛ gbo Kilaisiɛ kpɛti i na. Nhuna Kilaisi ɔɔ gbɔha na lɔgɔɔu gbɔnhu bei ngelou i nhu, awa wua gbɔnhu wɔɔ gɛa na tii ala o awa wɔɔ ngi bɛɛyaa na hɔlɔa!
51003005	Faa nwɛɛe a loko guaa ngelou na ɔi na nhu fesaun nana i wu nhu aa enge, nhanda ɛɛ ndo siandaa o, chanhainjaa gbaha mba o, feelaa o, ka kɔɔli, napangaa ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa batoundaa.
51003006	Awa Ngebɔ gbaai mba na ɔɔ yeia ningaa i ma natiini taa nhanda nyɔu indinɛi bonda bele bɛɛ.
51003007	Wua kpei nhanda nyɔu indinɛi bonda ala nwɛ wee maa guayaa nhuɔ nhuna wee maa yamana na nhu.
51003008	Kɛlɛ chaanngi kawaa loko gua nhanda indinɛi bonda nhu bɛɛ, napangaa ndii gbaai o, kpilia heindaa o, ndondo ngoo nwa o, njafa o, ka njia gbɔlɔ kpɔlɔ guandaa la.
51003009	A wɛhaa ndɛɛ gɔɔla gbɔnhu nuu o nuu le. Gbaa woo guaɔ wu bele ngɔ ɔha na nhu tii maa eyaabele na o.
51003010	Awa chaanngi wuaa bele ngɔ nyiɛ nhu tɔ. Ngebɔ nana i wu beleni aa ningaa nyiɛa alaa pele kangaa wu bele fɛi fɛi ɛɛ ala gbɔha na, kangaa i pele wu ala gɔɔ hiti ɔ nhu pandaa.
51003011	Indinɛi nhanwa Ngebɔ i pelenga, ndoganhu bai ai Yuua i ndoganhu tii natiini ngoo Yuua aile aa tuee, inaile ndoganhu bai ai natiini ndoganhu seemangaa aa tuee tii natiini ngoo seemangaa aile aa tuee, inaile paa belaa o, lugulea o, natiini ti u ndo ɔ nhu ngelou i nhu nhanda na nwa o ka natiini ti u ngai loi nhu, nduaa o ka natiini nduaa aile aa tuee, tua indinɛi kpɛlɛ ndoganhu bai ai ti loganhu. Nuu lagbiti ai na gbɔnhu k`a Kilaisi kpɛti ala nwɛ kolo ɔ, awa Kilaisi ala nwɛ i wu nhu bɛɛ.
51003012	Wua bɛnhɛ Ngebɔ ndaa nwɛ aa wuee gbɔnhu. Oo longa aa wuee, oo wu nhu ɔhɛa kangaa wu bele ngaa ngi ndaa. Maaumayaa o, nhanda banda o, ndii lo ngoo, maa yeiyaa o, i gɛa wu eya wu ndege lengaa i fanwa.
51003013	Nuu na bɛɛ ngi ndege gbilia ngaa gɛ ala nɛɛnwaa i ndoa na alɛɛ. A nhanda nyɔu loa na wu ndege lengaa i mbɛ ɛɛ Maliki na i ndoa na wuɛɛ.
51003014	Awa lamanhu na tɔ bɛɛ, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa waa lo ngaa wu ndege lengaa i, gbɛnhaile ndomayaa ala nwɛ aa gbɛ o gbɛ na hou nwa hounwayaa gbekpe nhu.
51003015	A pelena maa lɛi na Kilaisi i pelenga wu hɔlɔa i wu nhanda na gɔhɔ nana i wu nɛɛnwaa na, gbaa Ngebɔ oo uinga wuaa ngilamaaa kangaa wu bele ngaa ndugu ila, awa kangaa wu ba maa lɛi indinɛi bonda hɔlɔ. Awa kawaa fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa.
51003016	A pelena Kilaisi oo bombou mbaa na i la wu nɛɛnwaa. Awa wu nhu gɛa loni aa pele o pele aa gbɔha nagɔlindaa nhanwa awa wu gbɔha laanhii ndaanhii. A Ngebɔ gɔɔ ue na aaina. A ngue aaina ndaa to ngɔ Yisɔsia. Awa wu ngue aai kualaa Ngebɔ Yina na le, awa fiɛ guandaa i gɛa wu nhu.
51003017	Nana bɛɛ waa pele ka nana bɛɛ waa kɛ, a pelena awa wu kɛ ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti laanɛɛ ɔ aa Yisɔsi, awa wu gɛ gbɔnhu aa fiɛ guandaa Ngebɔ nwa mi Kɛɛgɛ na ndi ɔ aa Kilaisi lepele.
51003018	Wua wu nhiingaa i mbɛ a nwaa bɛɛa wu nhiingaa i mbu. Indinɛi ala nwɛ waa pele gbaa wu yigba ngɔ Kilaisi nhu.
51003019	Nyanha belaa, a lona aa wu nyanhaa i awa awɛɛ ti bele ngaa nduaa.
51003020	Ndengaa, a nwaa bɛɛa wu ungaa i mbu aa gbele o gbele ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti yigba ngɔ Kilaisi nhu, awa na ala nwɛ aa nɛɛ Ngebɔɛ.
51003021	Ndengaa belaa, awɛɛ pele wu lengaa i taa gbaai aa ti guu guandaa mba nhanda o nhanda nhu taa pele, kangaa ti nɛɛnwaa ai ba nyaai.
51003022	Nduaa i, a nwaa bɛɛa wu nwanhu belaa i mbu gbɛ o gbɛ nhu. Awɛɛ gɛ too gɛa na taa gɛ aa wu gbeendaa nhu nwɛɛ waa nwaa bɛɛ tiu, gbɛnhaile wu lo ngɔ la ti wu bihɛ, kɛlɛ a pelena aa lii na gbɛnhaile wuaa mbɛɛ gɛ ngɔ Maliki naa.
51003023	Nana bɛɛ waa pele a pelena aa wu gaanhu gbɛndɛ na bɛɛ, awa i belena ɛɛ ngenge nwɛɛ waa pele kpɔndaa nhanwa Maliki naa, awa ai beleni gbo ngengelaa kpɔndaa ningaaa.
51003024	A ndaa nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa wɔɔ kɛin na hɔlɔa kualaa Maliki na le aa wu nɛɛnwaa lo paabaa, gbaa Kilaisi ala nwɛ wu ala gaanhu kpei, awa ala nwɛ waa enge ala nhanwa.
51003025	Nuu na bɛɛ aa nhanda nyɔu bele ɔɔ yɔgɔlɔa nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa bɛɛ i pelenga, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ ai kalahai gɔhɔ pele.
51004001	Manhu belaa, a wu luaa i houa maa nhiɛ ɔ aa tee pele. Awa a ndaa nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa wua gbɔnhu wuaa nuuu nana i aliyana.
51004002	Awɛɛ gbe ngaa laaminɛlaa. Awa a oolaa nana nwa waa gɛ aa kɛndaa Ngebɔ le tii fiɛ guandaa o ala nwa.
51004003	Lɔgɔ na bɛɛ waa laaminɛ, a laaminɛa gbɔnhu ni nhanwa kangaa Ngebɔ i ba pele na laau nuɛɛ Ngebɔ oo na gɛndaa nhanwa ndaa to ngɔ na Kilaisia, napangaa ngoo na nana i gbundu na nhu, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo na gɛndaa nhaa nwɛɛ ngi kpindi bɛlɛ nau chaanngi.
51004004	Faa nwɛɛe a laaminɛa kangaa ngi ba ku ngi Ngoo na gɛ aa pele na ningaa tɔɔ nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ la mba, gbaa indinɛi nwɛ hiti ɔ nhu ngi pele.
51004005	Wu nhu gɛa loni aa wu bele ngɔ na waa gɛ na wui natiini ngoo tai laanɛɛi aa Kilaisi. A engea maa nhiɛ ɔ aa fɛɛlɛ o fɛɛlɛ, i ba lɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa wua laanɛɛ belaa nwɛ aa wuee.
51004006	Nhuna waa gɛ aa njɛpɛlaa wui ningaa o wu laahaa i gɛa nɛɛi. Kawaa kɔɔ waa gee nuu gbɛɛmbo ngaa tɔmbaga bele.
51004007	Tikikɔsi mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na nana ni lo ngɔ waa na aa ala, ɔɔ kɛa aa wuee nana bɛɛ i beleni aa nge mi guu indinɛi nhu. Ala ngenge nwɔɔ nwɛ nana nuu aa yigba nhu, awa ala nwɛ naa enge Maliki naɛ ngilamaa.
51004008	Nya ngaa ala lo wuee kangaa i pele wu goonhu nɛɛ boma aa kɛndaa nhanwa aa wuee nana aa bele ngaa nuee bɛɛ.
51004009	Onɛsimɔsi nana i wu nda gbapi na nhu wua laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa wuee, ala nwɛ ɔɔ ala laalo. Ala gbɔnhu mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na nwɛ nana ni lo ngɔ waa na la awa nuu nwɛɛ nana nuu aa yigba nhu.
51004010	Alisitakɔsi nana ni kpindi bɛlɛ nau ngilamaaa i fama leeni wuɛɛ. Maaki gbɔnhu Banabaasi kɛɛgɛ golo na lou na i hai wu nwa. Kawu ngooleekɔɔ hɔlɔa nana pu ngɔ nhu aa kɛɛlaa wu Maaki binja nhuna aa baa wuee.
51004011	Yɔsua nana taa ui mba gbɔnhu aa Yɔsitɔsi i fama leeni gbɔnhu wuɛɛ. Chawangaa indiini ti lɔɛ na nwɛ Yuua i ngaa tuee gbo ti laanɛɛ ɔ aa Kilaisi. Ti enge tii nya o Ngebɔ nwanhayaa na lɔgɔ fanwa, awa too gbɔnga nyaa kpɔ.
51004012	Ɛpafilɔsi i fama leeni wuɛɛ. Ala ngila mɔɔ nwɛ aa ala i guai wu gbapi na nhu awa ala, ala nwɛ aa enge Kilaisiɛ. Ala lii na bɛɛ oo pua ngi laaminɛ na nhu wu nhanwa. I Ngebɔ nwɔɔli kangaa i pele wu laanɛɛ na maa ɛɛ lobi, kɛlɛ wu bele ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu Ngebɔ nhanda nhu, awa ɛɛ ningaa gbɔnhu natiini ti laanɛɛ ɔ nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa Kilaisi, awa kangaa i pele wu nwaa bɛɛ Ngebɔu hiti ɔ nhu.
51004013	awa nya gbɔha i kpei nya ku ngɔ ngaa seeliyaa he ngenge ɔ na nhanwa i engea la wu nhanwa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, awa ka natiini nhanwa ti Laolisia ka Hilapolisi.
51004014	Luuki ni Sipa nwɔɔ na aa ala, nana ni lo ngɔ na la ka Limaasi ti fama leeni wuɛɛ.
51004015	A kɛa aa mi ndege lengaa i ti Laolisia wɛɛ ni hai ti nwa, awa ni hai Nimifa nwa ka laanɛɛ belaa i natiini taa gɔɛ ngi bɛlɛ nau.
51004016	Waa bila ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi galandaa, a pelena gbɔnhu Laolisiaa i ti kala.
51004017	A kɛa aa Achipusu aa kɛɛlaa ngenge na nana ti ngɔa ngɔ ngeya napangaa kpɔndaa nhanwa Maliki naa kaa bila ma.
51004018	Nya Pɔɔlu ngi fama indinɛi gbaali aa nya guegue ɔgɔ na. Awa kili ɛɛ nɔa wuɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa nyaa kpindi bɛlɛu. Kangaa Ngebɔ i wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa.
52001001	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, nii Silibanɔsi o, ka Timootii, nua nwɛ naa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee, wua laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa wuee wu mɛɛ Tɛsalonaika, Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na ndaa i ngaa wuee tii mi Nwaliki na o Yisɔsi Kilaisi. Kangaa Ngebɔ i wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa o ka maa lɛi.
52001002	Aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ k`ani fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa wu nhanwa bɛɛ, awa aa gbele o gbele naa gɛ aa laaminɛlaa, k`ani laaminɛ na wu nhanwa.
52001003	N`i laaminɛ na nhu naa gɛ aa pelendaa mi Eebɔ na le nana mi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, k`ani nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla ngenge na nwa nana wu pelenga gbɛnhaile kawu laanɛɛa aa Yisɔsi, awa wu gee engei nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ gbɛnhaile wu lo ngɔ aa Yisɔsi, awa nhaa wu nɛɛnwaa la na wu pu ngɔ nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kpou mi Nwaliki na nhu Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
52001004	N`i ndegea, ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ lo ngɔ aa wuee, awa oo wu nhu ɔhɛa kangaa wu bele ngaa ngi ndaa.
52001005	Gbaa ni Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhanwa nana ni kɛi aa wuee ai gbelei gbo njɛpɛ nhue kɛlɛ kani Ngebɔ Yina na fɔha bombou mbaa na lɔgɔɔunga gbɔnhu nhuna ni ngoo na gɛi aa wuee, awa laanɛɛ na nana ni pele ngɔ aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na lɔmbaga na kani ndɔɔgɔɔunga aa wuee hiti ɔ nhuɔ chɔɔ. Wu nana gɔɔnaa ni peleni nhuna nee na tii wua o. Ni na belenia wu qaniyaa nhanwa.
52001006	Kawu hitɛa ni ɔgɔbo nhu awa ka mi Nwaliki na ɔgɔbo nhu. Awa hali nha kawu yɔgɔlɔa nja lee ngɔnhu, kɛlɛ kawu kuunnga ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nwa Kilaisi nhanwa aa koonhu nɛɛ nana i guai Ngebɔ Yina na le.
52001007	Awae kawu belenga aa kuague laanɛɛ belaa i ngee bɛɛ tee Masilonia ka natiini ngee tee Akeea.
52001008	Masilonia o, Akeea o, naa lɔɛ na aile gboe Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na mi Nwaliki na nhanwa ti mɛini na kualaa wuee, kɛlɛ ningaa i ti mii o mii tua taa wu laanɛɛ na bele ngɔ na nwaanhaa nwɛi ngɔɔ aa Ngebɔ. Faa nwɛɛe ai na gbɔnhu naa kɛ wu nhanwa.
52001009	gbaa ti gbɔha na k`ati kɛ ni binja ngɔ na nhanwa wu ni binjani la nhuna ni hitima beleni aa wuee, awa k`ati kɛ boma ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa i fanwa wu gbenga aa ti batoundaa, awa woo tɔɔlonga aa Ngebɔ na batoundaa nana kɛndɛ lɔmbaga Eebɔ na aa ala,
52001010	awa ka ngi Lou na nwaa golondaa aa ba kualaa aliyana, napangaa Yisɔsi nana Ngebɔ i huui alau kualaa haa na nhu. Awa ala nwɛ ɔɔ mi gua Ngebɔ gbaai mba na eya nana aa ba.
52002001	N`i ndegea, wua wu gbɔha na wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa n`i baalaa naɔ wuee sia haka aileɔ.
52002002	Wu kɔɔnaa ti gee ni yɔgɔlɔi awa ti gee njia nyɔu gɛɛ gɛɛi aa nuee mɛɛ Filipaai yeingaa ni gila ba wuee mɛɛ Tɛsalonaika laa waa na nhu. Awa hali nha tolomayaa gbinhi gbinhi ee naanɔɔ ni nhanwa, ka ni Eebɔ na i ndii gbɛndɛ fea nuɛɛ kangaa ni ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛ aa wuee nana i guai ala le.
52002003	N`i oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na naa kɛ aa wuee ai guai kaka ngee, inaile ni lii nwa nana maa gbindi ɔ, inaile nai ndɛɛ beleni aa tɔmbaga.
52002004	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i kuunni ni nwa aa kɛɛlaa ni hiti ɔ nhu aa ngi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa nhanwa aa ningaa i, faa nwɛɛ pa naa kɛ. Awa nai kɛi ningaa gbɔhaa goonhu nɛɛndaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nana aa ni lii na gbɛngbɛ ala nwɛ naa ala goonhu nɛɛ.
52002005	Gbaa ɛɛ gbo wu kɔɔ ngɔ, Ngebɔ gbɔha na seeli nwɛ, aa kɛɛlaa nai bai wuee naa ndaahaa nɛɛ bele, inaile nai ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛi aa wuee kangaa ni qani hɔlɔ wu nhu!
52002006	Nai peleni kangaa ni mbihɛ hɔlɔ nuu o nuu eya, i bele bɛnhɛ aa kualaa wuee inaile ningaa lagbitia le,
52002007	hali nha nhai gbala ngi ba gɛa nuaa wu eya ɛɛ Kilaisi lo mbelaa. Kɛlɛ ni lii lo ngɔɔ nhuna nee na tii wua o, ɛɛ gbo ndou nje aa lii lo ngi leengaa i mbu.
52002008	Ndomayaa na nhanwa nana i ni eya wu nhanwa, kpala ngee naanɔɔ nuaa aa kɛɛlaa naa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛ aa wuee nana i guai Ngebɔ le, nɛɛ gbele gbo maa gee na nwa, kɛlɛ ni ku boma ni gbɔ wuaa aa pele o pele naa ku nda hali haalaa wu nhanwa, gbɛnhaile ni lo ngɔ aa wuee nja lee ngɔnhu!
52002009	N`i ndegea, aa tɔmbaga wu ngenge gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ na gɔɔnaa tɔ ti njɔgɔlɔ na o nana ni pelenga. Kani engea aa foo ka kpɔkɔ kangaa ni gooti na ai ba la wu umbaa, nhuna naa gɛ aa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛndaa aa wuee nana i guai Ngebɔ le.
52002010	Wua n`i seelia nwɛ aa wuee, awa ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa Ngebɔ n`i seeli nwɛ, aa kɛɛlaa n`i eyaabele na bele ngɔ na ee na wuee laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa wuee, ngeyaabele na siina chanhai ngɔɔ, awa tee ngɔɔ, awa tɛɛgɛ aile mbaɔ.
52002011	Ɛɛ wu kɔɔ ngɔ gbo aa kɛɛlaa ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ wu liiya kani ala houa ɛɛ gbo ndou kɛɛgɛ aa ngi leengaa hou.
52002012	Kani wu lii gbɛndɛnga, kani wu lɔɔndɔɔnga, awa kani ndaanhii ngɔa ɔaa wu eya nana ɔɔ pele wu gɛ na aa pele na nana aa Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ, nana i uini wuaa kangaa wu gɛ ngi nwanhayaa na la ka ngi bɛɛyaa na nhu.
52002013	Awa saabu indinɛi nhanwa, k`ani fiɛ gua gbɔnhu Ngebɔ nwa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa, nhuna wu Ngebɔ oo na hɔlɔi ni eya kawu kuunnga ma ɛɛ ngoo nana i guai Ngebɔ le, nana aa kɛɛlaa qai, Ngebɔ le mɛ i guai na, kɛlɛ wai kpauni ɛɛ ngoo nana i guai ningaa gbɔhaa le. Gbaa alaa ngenge nhu wu nhu wua na wu laanɛɛ ɔ na.
52002014	Ni ndegea, laanɛɛ belaa i aa Ngebɔ ti Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, ti hounwayaa na nhu tii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, woo hitɛ ti ɔgɔbo na nhu, gbaa wua gbɔnhu wu ndege bɔlɔgɔɔ nhu belaa i too pelenga woo yɔgɔlɔ ɛɛ Yuua i ti peleni natiini ti Yulia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu ti yɔgɔlɔi,
52002015	Yuua i natiini ti Maliki na baai ka Ngebɔ letua i, awa kati mi aa sɛɛgɛa. Ngebɔ ai goonhu nɛɛi ti nwa hali, gbɛnhaile ti haaleenjaa ɔ aa nuu o nuu!
52002016	Kati lapia aa ni bɛndindaa aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa aa Kpitia i, nana i ba ba Kpitia i ma aa ndendouyaa. Aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, nhanda nyɔu na nana taa pele ngɔɔ, too ndaa fenga hiti ɔ nhu. Indinɛi nhanwa, ngaa guanwaa na tɔ, Ngebɔ gbaai mba na oo yeia ti nwa!
52002017	N`i ndegea, nua ni nhanwa, nhuna ni loganhu gɔɛi aa wuee hɔgɔi, nai wu lɔ ma gbɔnhu aa au, kɛlɛ wuaa ni nɛɛnwaa na nhu. Awa nhu nwɛɛ wu nwɔi aa gbaai nuua nja lee ngɔ nhu kangaa ni wu lɔ gbɔnhu!
52002018	Ngɔi ee naanɔɔ nuaa kangaa ni bɛɛla boma wuee, eengaa tɔ bɛnhɛ nya kpei Pɔɔlu aa nge! Ngi kɛ gbɔnhu, nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, k`a noo baɔ, kɛlɛ Setani nwɛ i ni bɛndii aa paalaa.
52002019	Na nhu bɛɛ, wua nwɛ n`i nɛɛnwaa la na aa wuee, ka n`i goonhu nɛɛ na, awa wua nwɛ wu pelenga nɔɔ yonga lee Maliki na gulɔɔ nana nhanwa ni kuni ni pelenga nhuna ɔɔ ba.
52002020	Aa tɔmbaga, wua nwɛ naa goonɛ wu nhu, awa wua nwɛ n`i goonhu nɛɛ na aa wuee!
52003001	Na nhu bɛɛ, naigɔ ku naa lii lo mbu gbɔnhu. Awae noo nɛgilia aa kɛɛlaa maa nhiɛ ɔ i ba gɛɛ ni nhanwa aa ndoolaa gbo ni ila ngɔ Atɛnisi
52003002	awa ni n`i ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na Timootii lo nana aa Ngebɔ enge na bele ngilamaaa tii nua o napangaa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛndaa Kilaisi nhanwa aa ningaa i. Ni ala lonia kangaa i ba i wu nhu gbɛndɛ awa i pele wu ndii gbɛndɛ hɔlɔ wu laanɛɛ na nhu,
52003003	kangaa nuu ɛɛ bɛɛla bou nwa wu liiya ngaa sɛɛgɛ indinɛi nhanwa, gbɛnhaile wu nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa indinɛi gbɔnhu Ngebɔ guunmayaa na nwɛ mi nhanwa.
52003004	Gbaa nhuna nee na tii wua o, kani nhumbua aa kɛ aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa mɔɔ yɔgɔlɔa. Awa ɛɛ wu kɔɔ ngɔ gbo tɔ chanhai aa kɛɛlaa ala nwɛ i beleni.
52003005	Saabu indinɛi nhanwa, ɛɛ ngi kɔɔ ngɔ gbo tɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngaigɔ ku ngaa lii lo mbu gbɔnhu, faa nwɛɛ ngi Timootii loni wuee kangaa i ba i wu laanɛɛ na bele ngɔ na gɔɔ. Gbaa ni lua ɔ aa kɛɛlaa naangaa Ngafɔ mbaa na oo wu nhuanga. Awa ina aa ku wu nwa, ka oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ni enge na bɛɛ ni pelenga oo gua nuɛɛ fuu!
52003006	Kɛlɛ kina Timootii oo bɛɛlaa boma bei nuee kualaa wuee, awa oo ba aa wu laa banda ngu to ngɔ wu laanɛɛ na bele ngɔ naa o ka wu lomayaa na bele ngɔ naa, awa ka kɛɛlaa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ k`awu nɛgili banda bele ngaa nuee, wu bote boma k`a n`i ɔi i gbaai wuaa ni lɔndaa nhanwa ɛɛ gbo wu ɔi ee gbaai nuaa wu lɔndaa nhanwa.
52003007	Faa nwɛɛe n`i ndegea, saabu indinɛi nhanwa, wu laanɛɛ na oo pelenga ni ndii gbɛndɛ hɔlɔ kpɔu gbɔu na nhu nana ni yɔgɔlɔi nhu,
52003008	gbaa chaanngi nhu, pele ngɔ ɛɛ ndɛɛhu nyiɛ ni nhanwa, ina waa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ wu lɛɛhu na nhu, wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Maliki na o.
52003009	Chaanngi nhu k`anaa fiɛ gua mi Eebɔ na nwa wu nhanwa. Ni fiɛ gua ma koonhu nɛɛ na nhanwa i ni eya chaanngi nhu wu lɔgɔ fanwa.
52003010	Aa foo o foo ka kpɔkɔ o kpɔkɔ k`ani laaminɛ ala le nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kangaa i pele ni wu lɔ aa au kangaa ni ba gbɔ wuaa aa nana ɔandaa wu eya wu baa ngɔ la wu laanɛɛ na nhu aa Kilaisi.
52003011	Kangaa Ngebɔ gbɔha na mi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, awa ka mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi ti pele lɔgɔɔu ngaa nuee kangaa ni ba wuee!
52003012	Awa ndomayaa na nana i wu eya wu gbɔha na loganhu o, ka ndomayaa na nana i wu eya ningaa nhanwa bɛɛ, maa lomayaa na siina, kangaa mi Nwaliki na i pele i li aa nwaa lo tuun nhaa i gɛ waa i hiti ni nda lomayaa na nwa nana i ni eya wu nhanwa.
52003013	Aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, ɔɔ wu nhu gbɛndɛnaa wu lii na nwa kangaa wu ba gɛ chanhaini awa wu gɛ hitii nhu mi Eebɔ na gulɔɔ nana mi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, nhuna mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi ɔɔ ba tii natiini ngoo bɛɛ ngi ndaa i ngaa tuee.
52004001	N`i ndegea, kpelenwaa na tɔ bɛɛ, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa ni wu nwɔɔli awa ni wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ ngaa Maliki na laa na Yisɔsi aa kɛɛlaa, ɛɛ ni ndɔgɔɔuni gbo aa wuee wu sia ɔ na waa sia, awa wɔɔ gee Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ, awa aa tɔmbaga pa ngemɛɛ gɛnhi wu na, kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu ni wu nwɔɔli ngaa kɛɛlaa a pelena wu tee mɔɔ nhu.
52004002	Gbaa wua wu nana gɔɔ kɔɔnaa tɔ ni kɛi aa wuee pele pelendaa nhanwa, awa nana ni kɛi aa wuee ala nwɛ mi nwaliki na Yisɔsi i kɛi aa nuee kangaa ni kɛ aa wuee.
52004003	Ngebɔ kpala tɔɔ alaa kangaa wu gɛ na ɛɛ ningaa natiini ti gbɔha na gɔan ngɔ Ngebɔ nwa hiti ɔ nhu, awa awɛɛ ndo sia.
52004004	Ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ wu gɛgɛingaa i ndiiya kaa kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa k`a aa gɛ na tii ngi nyanha na o aa pele na nana ɔɔ Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ la,
52004005	kɛlɛ ɛɛ bele gbo aa nda pou nhanwa ɛɛ ngelou nhu belaa i natiini tai Ngebɔ gɔɔ.
52004006	Nuu ɛɛ nhanda nyɔu bele ngaa ngi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ maa nhanda indinɛi nhu hali, gbɛnhaile nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ Maliki na ɔɔ natiini kpɔɔnia taa pele ngaa ti ndege lengaa i, ɛɛ gbo ni nhumbuaɔ pɛnhɛɛ aa kɛ aa wuee, awa kani wu laanhiinga fanwa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ.
52004007	Gbaa Ngebɔ i uinia muaa kangaa mi gɛ na ɛɛ ningaa natiini ala bo mɛɛ aa tuee, kɛlɛ ai uini muaa kangaa mi gɛ na ɛɛ ndo sia mbelaa.
52004008	Faa nwɛɛe nuu o nuu nana aa gbee nagɔli indinɛia, ai gbeei nuu gbɔha eyae kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nana aa Yina na ɔa wu eya ala nwɛ i gbeei ngeya.
52004009	Ngai laanɛɛi k`a nuu aa ngooleekɔɔ gbaali gbɔnhu wu nwanhu ngu to ngɔ ndomayaa nhanwa wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa, gbɛnhaile wua wu gbɔha na kpei Ngebɔ oo wu nagɔlia kangaa ndomayaa i gɛ wu loganhu,
52004010	gbaa aa tɔmbaga, wua waa wu lomayaa na lɔgɔɔu tɔ bɛnhɛ aa mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ ti mɛɛ Masilonia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Kɛlɛ n`i ndegea, ni wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ kangaa wu pele bɛnhɛ tee ngɔ indinɛia.
52004011	A lapia nhaa kangaa wu gɛ ndiilɛi nhu, awa a gɛa wu nda enge na nhu nana ngɔa ngɔ wu eya, awa wu enge aa wu guegue loko na, ɛɛ gbo ni gɛi wu nwa wu pele,
52004012	kangaa ningaa i natiini ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa aile aa tuee ti ba mbɛɛ gɛ wuaa, awa wua o pa waigɔ hagba la nuu o nuu nhu nana nhanwa kpala ngi wuaa.
52004013	N`i ndegea, ngɔi ai nuaa aa kɛɛlaa natiini ti haa ɔɔ wu lo maa gbindi nhu, kangaa wu nwaa ai ba nwɔu ɛɛ natiini nɛɛnwaa la ai ti eya.
52004014	Mi laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nhuna Yisɔsi i haai kɛɛ huua kualaa haa na nhu, awa aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, mi laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa natiini ti haa ɔɔ kɛlɛ ti laanɛɛ ɔɔ aa Yisɔsi, tua na siina, Ngebɔ ɔɔ huua tiu boma awa ɔɔ baa aa tuee ngilamaaa tii Yisɔsi o.
52004015	Nana Maliki na i gɛi ni kɛ aa wuee alɛɛ gbo pa naa kɛ aa wuee. Mua na maigɔ gɛ haai lɛ nhuna Maliki na ɔɔ ba, mua na siina, mua aile pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ nhumbu aa gɛ na tii ala o, kɛlɛ natiini ti haa ɔ na, tua nwɛ pɛnhɛɛ.
52004016	Aa maa lɔgɔ nana, Maliki na gbɔha na ɔɔ yɛpɛa ndabi nhu, ngi nwaleka nwanha na ɔɔ oo guaa, awa ningaa tɔɔ Ngebɔ hueu na oo nwɛinaa, awa Maliki na gbɔha na ɔɔ yeia kualaa aliyana. Awa natiini ti haa ɔɔ awa ti laanɛɛ ɔɔ aa Kilaisi, tɔɔ nhumbua pɛnhɛɛ aa huu haa na nhu.
52004017	Nhu nwɛɛ mua na maigɔ gɛ haai lɛ tɔɔ mi nwaa gbɔ kpɔ ngaa tuee ngilamaaa feenaa na nhu Maliki na nwaaindaa nhanwa ngee na nhu feenaa na nhu. Awae mɔɔ gɛa na mii Maliki na o aa lɔgɔ o lɔgɔ.
52004018	Faa nwɛɛe a gbɔha na lɔɔndɔɔna loganhu aa indinɛi ngi kɛa aa wuee.
52005001	Ni ndegea, ngai laanɛɛi k`a nuu aa gulaa nhu aa ngooleekɔɔ gbaalindaa wuee kangaa i nana gbandi ɔ gɛ aa wuee gbee na nhanwa nhanda indinɛi ɔɔ bele pele nda,
52005002	gbɛnhaile wua wu gbɔha na kpei wu kɔɔnaa chanhai aa kɛɛlaa Maliki na ɔɔ ningaa gbulanaa aa paalaa, ɛɛ gbo nwɔa nwɔɔ aa ningaa gbula ngaa kpindi.
52005003	Nhuna waa mɛi ningaa taa gɛ, "Gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ maa lɛi ɔ, faa nwɛɛe amɛɛ lua," aigɔ gɛ ti nɛɛnwaae tɔɔ ti nyaaia. Ti yɔgɔlɔ nhu gbaai gbaai na ɔɔ belenaa ɛɛ ndou le koonhu gbaai aa njie hou nhuna aa gɛ fuu na nhu, awa ningaa taigɔ maa hakpa.
52005004	Kɛlɛ wua n`i ndege laanɛɛ belaa, wua wai kpindi nhu, awa Foo na siina ɛɛ wu gbula ɛɛ nwɔa nwɔɔ aa ningaa gbula.
52005005	Gbaa wua bɛɛ foo na o ka waun na ngi lengaa nwɛ aa wuee. Awae mua kpɔkɔ na lengaa aile aa muee inaile kpindi na lengaa.
52005006	Awae amɛɛ nɔa nwa ɛɛ natiini taa yii, kɛlɛ ami gɛa nwaa gbatɛi awa mi aa gɛ loni.
52005007	Gbaa kpindi na nhu nwɛɛ ningaa taa yii la, awa nhu nwɛɛ boma ningaa taa gɛ ndɔɔ hou nhu.
52005008	Kɛlɛ kina mua foo na lengaa nwɛ aa muee, ami belena aa ngaa lo mbelaa. Kam~a~a laanɛɛ gbau ka ndomayaa mi pu nwa aa loongo, awa nɛɛnwaa la na nana i mi eya ndendouyaa hɔlɔndaa nhanwa, ami pɛɛa umbaa ɛɛ kaau umaai.
52005009	Ngebɔ ai mi nhu ɔhɛi kangaa i mi gbɔɔni aa ngi gbaai mba na, kɛlɛ i mi nhu ɔhɛia kangaa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi i ndendouyaa he muee,
52005010	nana i haai mi nhanwa kangaa mi gɛ na ngilamaaa tii ala o, hali mi gɛ haai inaile mai gɛ haai nhuna aa ba.
52005011	Faa nwɛɛe a gbɔha na lii gbɛndɛna loganhu awa wu gbɔ kpɔ gbɔha naa ɛɛ waa pele gbo chaanngi nhu.
52005012	N`i ndege laanɛɛ belaa, ni wu nwɔɔli kangaa wu mbɛɛ gbekpe kɛ ningaa i mba natiini taa enge wu liiya, ti wu gulɔɔ awa Maliki na i ti nhu ɔhɛi kangaa ti wu laanhii ngaa pele ngɔ na laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aa gɛ na.
52005013	A ti gbauna aa wu lomayaa belaa tii mbɛɛ bombou mbaa o ti enge na nhanwa nana taa pele. A gɛa na maa lɛi nhu wu gbɔha na loganhu.
52005014	N`i ndege laanɛɛ belaa, ni wu nwɔɔli kangaa wu yɛpɛ pele baamba belaa i ma, wu natiini ndii gbɛndɛ ti nɛɛnwaa nyaai ɔ na, a gbɔna natiini mba kpɔ mba gbala ngi tuaa, awa wu lii lo ngaa nuu o nuu.
52005015	A tɔa aa kɛɛlaa nuu ɛɛ nhanda nyɔu aa bɛɛla, kɛlɛ aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ nhanda banda belendaa ɔi i gɛa wuaa wu loganhu awa ka nuu o nuu nhanwa.
52005016	A goonhu nɛɛa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ,
52005017	a laaminɛa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ,
52005018	gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu a fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa. gba indinɛi Ngebɔ guunmayaa na nwɛ wu nhanwa wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
52005019	Awɛɛ Ngebɔ Yina na bɛndi aa ngi enge na belendaa.
52005020	Nhuna nuu aa gɛ alaa yɛpɛ Ngebɔ lɔgɔ fanwa, awɛɛ au bii maa yɛpɛ na nwanhu,
52005021	kɛlɛ a gbɛ o gbɛ na gbɛngbɛa pandaa, awa wu nana hou kpɛɛtɛtɛ waa tɔ kpekpe ngɔ na nhu,
52005022	awa wu loko gua nhanda nyɔu gɛbɛlɛ nhu bɛɛ.
52005023	Kangaa Ngebɔ na nana aa maa lɛi he muɛɛ, i wu bele ɛɛ ala gbɔha na aa pele o pele, awa wu luu na i wu nhu, ka wu lɛɛhu na, awa ka wu lugu na, wu nhanda baa maa gee indinɛia bɛɛ kualaa tɛɛgɛ o tɛɛgɛ eya nhuna mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ɔɔ ba.
52005024	Ala i uini wuaa, ala hiti ɔ nhu nuu aa laanɛɛ aa ala, awa ɔɔ pelenaa.
52005025	Ni ndege laanɛɛ belaa, a laaminɛa ni nhanwa!
52005026	Wu ha nuɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa i ma bɛɛ aa ti guunndaa lepele.
52005027	Ngi wu nwɔɔli ngaa Maliki na fɔha na kangaa wu ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gala laanɛɛ belaa i ngee bɛɛ.
52005028	Kangaa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi banda bandayaa na i gɛ na tii wua o.
53001001	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, nii Silibanɔsi o, ka Timootii, nua nwɛ naa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee, wua laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa wuee wu mɛɛ Tɛsalonaika, Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na ndaa i ngaa wuee tii mi Nwaliki na o Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
53001002	Kangaa mi Kɛɛgɛ na Ngebɔ tii Maliki na o Yisɔsi Kilaisi, ti wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa o ka maa lɛi.
53001003	N`i ndege laanɛɛ belaa, oo belenga aa n`i enge aa kɛɛlaa kanɔɔ fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa qai wu nhanwa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ. Nhanda gbekpe na nwɛ kpei naa pele, gbɛnhaile wu laanɛɛ na nhu lɔ aa gbɛndɛ pandaa, awa ndomayaa na nana i ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ eya wu liiya wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa alaa nwaa lo.
53001004	Na nhaa nwɛɛ ni gbɔha na kpei naa yonga lee wu nhanwa laanɛɛ belaa i ngee mii o mii. K`ani yonga lee wu nhanwa gbɛnhaile wuaa loni nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kpou wu laanɛɛ na nhu, ngaa sɛɛgɛ na nhanwa bɛɛ nana taa pele ngaa wuee ka njɔgɔlɔ na bɛɛ nana aa wu nwaai.
53001005	Indinɛi nwɛ aa ndɔgɔɔu Ngebɔ aa gee nuu gɔhɔ ngaa tee pele. Awa indinɛi nhanwa, ɔɔ wu belenaa aa ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu ngi nwanhayaa na laa nhanwa, nana nhanwa wua waa maa yɔgɔlɔ na bele.
53001006	Ngebɔ ɔɔ nana belenaa tee ngɔ. Ɔɔ baa aa njɔgɔlɔ natiini ma taa pele waa yɔgɔlɔ,
53001007	awa wua na waa yɔgɔlɔ, ɔɔ pelenaa wu lɛɛhu, awa nua gbɔnhu ɔɔ pelenaa aa nuee. Ɔɔ indinɛi belenaa nhuna mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi ɔɔ ba kualaa aliyana tii ngi fɔha bombou mbaa nwalekaa i ngoo aa ngɔmbu ho na,
53001008	kangaa i natiini kpɔɔni tai Ngebɔ gɔɔ ngɔ, awa tai nwaa bɛɛi Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ nau mi Nwaliki na nhanwa Yisɔsi.
53001009	Ngebɔ ɔɔ pelenaa ti yɔgɔlɔ, gbɛnhaile ɔɔ ti gbɔɔnia wɔwɔwɔ fanwa, aa ti gbaaindaa mi Nwaliki naa ka kualaa ngi bombounjaa nwaa luu lua naa,
53001010	nhuna ɔɔ ba maa Hoo na nwa, awa ngi ndaa i bɛɛ tɔɔ mbɛɛ bombou mbaa gɛa alaa, awa natiini bɛɛ ti laanɛɛi tɔɔ ala bihɛa nja lee ngɔnhu. Wua gbɔnhu wɔɔ gɛa ti liiya, gbɛnhaile woo laanɛɛa aa ngoo na nana ni kɛi aa wuee.
53001011	Na nhaa nwɛɛ naa laaminɛ wu nhanwa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, kangaa mi Eebɔ na i wu hiti nhu nana nhanwa i uini wuaa. Kangaa ngi fɔha na i nana laa fe wu ngɔi ngɔ kpekpenjaa nhanwa, awa i pele wu bila nana nwa waa pele gbɛnhaile kawu laanɛɛa.
53001012	Aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, mi Nwaliki na laa na Yisɔsi ɔɔ mbihɛ hɔlɔa wu eya, awa wua gbɔnhu wɔɔ hɔlɔa ala eya, ndi ɔ aa mi Eebɔ na banda bandayaa na lepele o ka mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi nda na.
53002001	N`i ndegea, ngu to ngɔ na mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi baalaa naa, ka mi aa lɔgɔlaa na ngilamaaa tii ala o, n`i wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ ngaa kɛɛlaa,
53002002	wu nɛɛnwaa ɛɛ yogobee lɛmbi, inaile nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ ngɛɛ gɛ wu nhu, i bele ngaa nuu i gɛ wu nwa Yina na nwɛ i kɛi aa ala, inaile wu mɛi ngoo nhu, inaile wu tɔ ngooleekɔɔ nhu nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ nuɛɛ ni kpaalii, aa kɛɛlaa mi Nwaliki na baa Hoo oo hiti ma.
53002003	Awɛɛ kuun nuu o nuu aa wu nwɔu mɔu hali. Gbaa yeingaa Yisɔsi i ba, ningaa gbinhi ɔ tɔɔ gɔngaa hea Ngebɔa, awa Nuu nyɔu na ɔɔ gbɔha na lɔgɔɔunaa, napangaa nana Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala nyaai yahandama.
53002004	Ɔɔ nwaagaia Ngebɔ nwa ka nana bɛɛ ningaa taa batou. Ɔɔ gbɔha na gbaunaa aa kɛɛlaa ala gbekpe ngɔ tee ngɔ tuaa bɛɛ. Awa ɔɔ ɔaa i hei Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau i gbɔha na bele ɛɛ Ngebɔ.
53002005	Ee wai nda ngɔ nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa kangi indinɛi gɛa aa wuee nhuna ngee na tuun tii wua o?
53002006	Awa chaanngi nhu wu nana gɔɔnaa tɔ i nhanda indinɛi bɛndi ngɔ lɛ. Gbaa lɔgɔ gbandi na nwa, ɔɔ gbɔha na lɔgɔɔunaa.
53002007	Gbaa ningaa gbinhi ɔ tua taa nana bele kpala ngai Ngebɔa, awa mua maa indinɛi gɔɔnaa gbo nana nhanwa Ngebɔ i ndɔgɔɔunga aa muee. Kɛlɛ nana pelendaa na i na ɛagɔ bele ndɛ nhaa pɛnhɛɛ nuu na nana i nhanda indinɛi bɛndi ngɔ Ngebɔ i ala gua pele na nhu.
53002008	Nhu nwɛɛ Nuu Nyɔu na ɔɔ gbɔha na lɔɔgɔɔu, awa nhuna Maliki na Yisɔsi ɔɔ ba, awa ɔɔ lɛɛhu bua ma aa laa na nana ɔɔ ala baa, awa ngi huonjaa bombou mbaa na ɔɔ Nuu Nyɔu na nyaaia bɛɛ.
53002009	Nuu Nyɔu indinɛi ɔɔ baa Setani fɔha na nhu, awa ɔɔ engea aa fɔha bɛɛ, ka kamaa nhanda, awa ka ndɛɛ lɛɛ gamaa nhanda guague,
53002010	awa pele nyɔu gɛbɛlɛ na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ lɔ ngeya nana ɔɔ natiini mɔu mɔu nda ti u ngɔɔ lo nhu, gbɛnhaile tai kuunniɔ taa lo ngaa tɔmbaga na kangaa ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔ.
53002011	Awa indinɛi nhanwa, Ngebɔ ɔɔ fɔha leenaa tuɛɛ kangaa i ti aa nɛɛ, kangaa ti ba laanɛɛ aa ndɛɛ na.
53002012	Nhu gbɛɛlaa na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, natiini bɛɛ tɛa laanɛɛi aa tɔmbaga na, kɛlɛ ti goonhu nɛɛ ɔɔ aa nhanda nyɔu belendaa, tua na siina, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti nyaaia.
53002013	N`i ndegea, kanaa fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa wu nhanwa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, wua na Maliki na lo ngɔ na aa wuee. Gbaa nhuna Ngebɔ i wu beleni aa ngi ndaa aa ngi Yina na fɔha na nhu bele o ka nhuna i peleni wu laanɛɛi aa tɔmbaga na, oo lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa oo wu nhu ɔhɛaɔ kualaa tɔɔlomaa na kangaa wu ndendouyaa hɔlɔ.
53002014	Awa indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛɔ i uini wuaa aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhu bele nana ni kɛi aa wuee, kangaa wua gbɔnhu wu ba mbɛɛ bombou mbaa na hɔlɔ nana i mi Nwaliki naa Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
53002015	Faa nwɛɛe n`i ndegea, a lona nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, awa tɔmbaga na nana ni wu nagɔlii la, i bele bɛnhɛ aa ngoo nhu nwɛ ni kɛi na aa wuee, inaile aa ngooleekɔɔ, a houa.
53002016	Chaanngi nhu, kangaa mi Nwaliki na gbɔha na Yisɔsi Kilaisi, tii Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na o, nana i loni aa muee, awa aa ngi banda bandayaa na nhu bele, kɛɛ wɔwɔwɔ ndii gbɛndɛ ngɔaa mi eya ka nɛɛnwaa la nhu gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ,
53002017	i wu lii na lɔɔndɔɔ awa i wu nhu gbɛndɛ kangaa wu gɛ aa nana gɛndaa ka nana belendaa kpekpe ngɔ aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ.
53003001	Kpelenwaa na, n`i ndegea, a laaminɛa ni nhanwa kangaa Maliki na oo na i lo nda aa njanjandaa nhu lɛmbi lɛmbi, awa ningaa ti hou aa mbɛɛ, ɛɛ gbo wua wu houi aa mbɛɛ.
53003002	Wu laaminɛ boma kangaa Ngebɔ i ni gua nɛɛnwaa sukulu mbelaa eya tii ningaa nyɔua o, gbɛnhaile nuu o nuu aile ala laanɛɛ ɔ aa ngoo na.
53003003	Kɛlɛ Maliki na hiti ɔ nhu laanɛɛlaa nhanwa aa ala, awa ɔɔ wu nhu gbɛndɛnaa i wu nwanhu gbee kualaa Nuu Nyɔu na eya.
53003004	Awa Maliki na lɔ maa laanɛɛyaa na siina ɔa ngɔ ni eya wu nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa, wua waa nana bele ni kɛi aa wuee awa wɔɔ tonaa nda aa pelendaa.
53003005	Awa kangaa Maliki na i pele wu lo ngaa Ngebɔ, awa i pele wu lii lo ɛɛ Kilaisi i lii loniɔ.
53003006	Chaanngi nhu, n`i ndegea, ni kɛ aa wuee aa mi nwaliki na laa na Yisɔsi Kilaisi aa kɛɛlaa, laanɛɛ nwɔɔ o laanɛɛ nwɔɔ nana ai gɛi na ɛɛ ni kɛi aa wuee, awa i gɛ njaaiyaai hei nhu, a gbeea alaa.
53003007	Gbaa wua wu gbɔha na wu nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa kawaa hitɛ ni ɔgɔbo nhu. Gbaa nhuna nee na tii wua o, naile pele baambayaa nhu.
53003008	Inaile nai nuu nwɛnhɛi nwɛi ngeya nana nai maa baabaa beleni. Nana ni peleni, kani ngenge gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ belenga. Awa kani engea aa foo ka kpɔkɔ kangaa n`i gooti na ai ba la nuu o nuu umbaa wu liiya.
53003009	Tee ngɔ ni nhanwa waa ni gooti na la umbaa, kɛlɛ waa tɔ nai peleni, ni lo ngɔ la kangaa n`i bele ngaa kuague wu nhanwa, awa wu hitɛ ni ɔgɔbo nhu.
53003010	Gbaa hali nhuna nee naɔ tii wua o, kani gɛa wu nwa, "Nuu o nuu nana aa lele ngengea, awa ɛɛ mɛnhɛi nwɛ nha."
53003011	Ni indinɛi gɛia gbɛnhaile k`ani mɛi ngaa kɛɛlaa lɛingaa lɔ na wu liiya tuaa njaaiyaai hei nhu, tai bele nhu, kɛlɛ ka piindaa gbo ningaa lagbitia ti nhanda nhu.
53003012	Awa ningaa indiini bonda, ni kɛ aa tuee awa ni ti laanhii ngaa Maliki na laa na Yisɔsi Kilaisi aa kɛɛlaa ti engea, awa ti ba ti nda guegue nwɛnhɛi nwɛ ndiilɛi nhu.
53003013	Kɛlɛ wua, n`i ndegea, awɛɛ gaanhu haa aa nhanda banda belendaa.
53003014	Ina nuu aa lele aa nwaa bɛɛlaa nanau ni kpaalia ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi nhu, maa nwɔɔ na aa tɔa gbo, kɛlɛ awɛɛ loko bu ngi nhanda nhu, kangaa i ufe.
53003015	Awɛɛ ala gbau ɛɛ faalee mɔɔe kɛlɛ a ala laanhiina ɛɛ wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ.
53003016	Chaanngi nhu, kangaa Maliki na gbɔha na nana aa maa lɛi he ningaaɛ i wu gɔ aa maa lɛi aa gbele o gbele awa aa pele o pele. Kangaa Maliki na i gɛ na tii wua o bɛɛ.
53003017	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, nya nwɛ ngi fama oo indinɛi gbaalii wuee aa nya guegue loko na, awa kpaali indinɛi bonda nwɛ aa nya lɔgɔɔu ngooleekɔɔ o ngooleekɔɔ nhu nana ngaa kpaali. Ngemɛɛ ngaa kpaali bele.
53003018	Kangaa mi nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi banda bandayaa na i gɛ na tii wua o bɛɛ.
54001001	Nya nwɛ Pɔɔlu aa nge, Yisɔsi Kilaisi lo mɔɔ na aa nge, ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ nana mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala i kɛi, ka Yisɔsi Kilaisi nana mi nɛɛnwaa la na aa ala, ala gbɔnhu kɛɛ kɛa.
54001002	Nya nwɛ ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali nya nhiindou gbekpe na nwanhu laanɛɛ na nhu napangaa Timootii. Kangaa Ngebɔ nana kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, ka mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa, ti maaumayaa gbau wu nwa, awa ti wu gɔ aa maa lɛi.
54001003	Ɛɛ gbo ngi bi nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛni hɔgɔi nhuna ngee li Masilonia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, nyaa gbo bi nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛndaa nhu tuun aa kɛɛlaa bi lee nwɛɛ, gɛa lɛ mɛɛ Ɛfisɔsi kangaa bi ningaa nagɔli mbelaa i nagɔli na, kangaa tai ba ningaa nagɔli aa nagɔli nana ngaa hɛɛla ngɔ aa mi nda na.
54001004	Kɛa aa tuee aa kɛɛlaa ti gbe ngaa ningaa i nagɔlindaa aa njia ɔha na nana i lɛmbingaɔ tɔ nhaa, nana tɔmbaga ai nhu, awa ka mbembaa i ti laa na nwaa nhanda, nana pounhaa na nwɛ aa tonga. Tai ngenge nwa Ngebɔ laalaa nau nana mi kɔɔ ngɔ aa laanɛɛ na nhu bele.
54001005	Kolo na ngi indinɛi gɛi fanwa ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa ndomayaa i gɛ na nana aa sege nuu lii nwa nana ndii na chanhai ngɔ, nɛɛnwaa na gue ɔ, awa tɔmbaga laanɛɛ i gɛ ngeya.
54001006	Ningaa lɛingaa too gɔngaa heaɔ indinɛia, awa too hitɛ ɔɔ kaka pele nhu aa mɔu mɔu njɛpɛ gɛndaa.
54001007	Ngɔi lɔ tuaa ti bele ngaa ningaa nagɔli mbelaa aa sɔ na, hali nha tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ bɛnhɛ nanaa taa kɛ, inaile nhanda na nana taa nwaa nwɔi la, tai kɔɔ.
54001008	Mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Sɔ na kpekpe ngɔ ina nuu aa sia la aa ngi bele.
54001009	K`a ningaa taa nda nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa sɔ na tai kpatɛi nuu na nhanwa nana tee ngɔ, kɛlɛ ti kpatɛia natiini fanwa taa sɔ na aai o, natiini ti gbonjou ngɔ na nhu o, ngebɔyaa gbahamba belaa i ngoo, nhanda nyɔu belaa o, natiini fanwa ti lɔgɔlaa aile aa gbɛ o gbɛ nana ngu to ngɔ Ngebɔa, natiini taa ti kɛɛgɛa i paa baa inaile ti njea i, awa ka ningaa baa mbelaa,
54001010	ndo sia mbelaa o, natiini ngoo taa kahe mba ɔhi gbɛ loganhu o, natiini taa ningaa aa nwɔa o, ndɛɛ gɔɔla mbelaa o, ka gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ nana ai leeni.
54001011	Nagɔli indinɛi ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ bɛɛyaa oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na lepele nana nduba Eebɔ na i ngɔai nya eya kɛndaa nhanwa.
54001012	Ngi fiɛ gua Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwa mi Nwaliki na aa ala, nana i nya nhu gbɛndɛnga ngenge na nhanwa, gbɛnhaile oo nya gbaunga aa hiti nhu nwɔɔ, aa nya ɔandaa ngi enge na nhu,
54001013	hali nha aa pɛnhɛɛ naɔ kangi njia nyɔu gɛa aa ala, kangi ningaa aa sɛɛgɛa awa kangi ala ɛinga. Kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, ka Ngebɔ i maaumayaa gbaunga nya nwa, gbɛnhaile ngai lɛ gɛiɔ laanɛɛi awae ngaile nana gɔɔ ngee pele.
54001014	Ka mi Nwaliki na i ngi banda bandayaa gbinhi gbinhi na bua nya nwa, awa kɛɛ laanɛɛ na ɔaa nya eya ka ndomayaa na nana mi nda nwɛ mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
54001015	Indinɛi tɔmbaga yia nwɛ taa kɛ awa kam~a~a kuun ma hiti ɔ nhu awa mi laanɛɛ la, aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi i baia ngelou indinɛi nhu kangaa i ndendouyaa he nhanda nyɔu bele mbelaaɛ, awa nya nwɛ lamanhu nhanda nyɔu bele mɔɔ na aa nge ti liiya.
54001016	Kɛlɛ ka Ngebɔ i maaumayaa gbaunga nya nwa saabu indinɛi nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa, Yisɔsi Kilaisi i ba ngi lii lonjaa na lɔgɔɔu aa nge, lamanhu nhanda nyɔu bele mɔɔ na aa nge ti liiya, kangaa maa lii lonjaa na i ba bele ngaa kuague natiini fanwa bɛɛ tɔɔ bele guna aa laanɛɛ belaa aa ala awa tɔɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ.
54001017	Kangaa mbɛɛ o ka mbihɛ i gɛ Ngebɔ ila ngɔ i nwa, nana wɔwɔwɔ manha mbaa na aa ala, ai haa, awa nuu ai tɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ! Kangaa i bele.
54001018	Ni lou, Timootii, ngi indinɛi gɛ aa biee pelendaa nhanwa, nana ndi ɔ aa nana Ngebɔ letua i ti kɛi bi nhanwa. Engea aa maa oo na ɛɛ bi gɔɔ nhaanhaa kangaa bi ku bi gɔ pandaa,
54001019	awa gɛa bi laanɛɛ na nhu o ka bi nɛɛnwaa gue na. Ningaa lɛingaa tai oo nhɛɛni ti nɛɛnwaa gue na nwa awa too ti laanɛɛ na gbɛɛbaaa.
54001020	Tua na siina liiya, tua nwɛ aa Himaniɔsi o ka Alɛkisanda natiini ngi ti gɔanni Setani fɔha na nwa, kangaa ti gbele aa njia nyɔu gɛndaa aa Ngebɔ.
54002001	Pɛnhɛɛ nhanda na nhu bɛɛ, nya lo ngɔ la kangaa ningaa i ti indinɛi bele. kataa yɛpɛ Ngebɔ le nuu o nuu nhanwa bɛɛ, ti Ngebɔ nwɔɔli laaminɛ nhu kangaa i gbɔ tuaa, kataa ala nwɔɔli kangaa i nana ɔa ti eya ti baa ngɔ la, awa kataa fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa nuu o nuu nhanwa.
54002002	Kataa indinɛi bele boma manhangaa waa waa i fanwa ka natiini bɛɛ fɔha na i ti eya, kangaa mi gɛ ndɛi ɔ nhu nyɔɔ tii maa lɛi o, mi ku mi nana bele aa Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ ka nana tee ngɔ aa pele o pele.
54002003	Indinɛi nhanda gbekpe mɛɛ awa aa Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛa nana mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala,
54002004	nana ngɔi mba kangaa ningaa i bɛɛ ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔ awa ti ba ti tɔmbaga na gɔɔ.
54002005	gbaa Ngebɔ ila mɛɛ i na, ka ngɔa ndoganhu nwɔɔ ila boma Ngebɔ loganhu o ka ningaa i, napangaa ndakpa na Yisɔsi Kilaisi,
54002006	nana i gbɔha na gɔanni mi umbondaa nhanwa bɛɛ. Na, ndɔgɔɔundaa nwɛɔ lɔgɔ gbekpe na nwa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ lo ngɔ la kangaa nuu o nuu i ndendouyaa hɔlɔ,
54002007	awa saabu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ i nya nhu ɔhɛi kangaa ngi bele ngaa ngoo na gɛ mɔɔ o ka to mɔɔ kangaa ngi bele ngaa ningaa nagɔli mɔɔ Kpitia i fanwa, ngoo na gɛndaa nhanwa laanɛɛ nhu o ka tɔmbaga nhu. Ndɛɛ aile ngaa kɔɔlae kɛlɛ tɔmbaga na nwɛ ngaa kɛ!
54002008	Faa nwɛɛe nya lo ngɔ la kangaa kɛgɛingaa i ti mii o mii natiini ti gɔan ngɔ na Ngebɔ nwa, maa gɛgɛingaa i siina ti laaminɛ awa ti loko na lɛɛ lɛɛ nga nhuna taa gɛ aa laaminɛlaa, kɛlɛ tɛɛ pele kpaai nhu inaile mbaabaga nhu.
54002009	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa njiengaa i, nya lo ngɔ la kangaa ti nwaa ili pandaa. Tɛɛ gbɔha na lɔgɔɔu maa ili nhu, kɛlɛ ti maa yeiyaa nwaa ili belena. Tɛɛ ngaani guu gua ti u naa kangaa ningaa ti ti gbee nyandendaa nhanwa, ka mabɔɔn, inaile aa nahoo gɔtu nwaa nhii nhiɛ, inaile mɔɔ mba gɔla gɔla,
54002010	kɛlɛ ti gɛa ngenge nhu nana kpekpe ngɔ, nana mbɛ ngɔ ma njie ngaa nhanwa natiini taa gbɔha na gbau ɛɛ ngebɔ belaa.
54002011	Njie ngaa i ti nagɔli hɔlɔa ndɛi ɔ nhu nyɔɔ awa kataa gɛ nwaa yeiyaai hiti ɔ nhu.
54002012	Kɛlɛ ngai fɛɛlɛ hei njiengaaɛ kɛgɛingaa nagɔlindaa nhanwa inaile ti ti fɔha na gbɔɔnda kɛgɛingaa nwa, kɛlɛ kataa londo.
54002013	Gbaa Alama pɛnhɛɛ Ngebɔ i ala gbatɛi yeingaa i gilaa Iibi gbatɛ.
54002014	Awa Alama aile kaai na i ala nwɔu mɔunie kɛlɛ njie na nwɛ kaai na i ala nwɔu mɔuni, awa kɛɛ gulaa nhanda nyɔu nhu.
54002015	Kɛlɛ aa pele o pele, njie na ɔɔ ndendouyaa hɔlɔa aa foli hɔlɔndaa nhu bele, ina aa li gulɔɔ aa ngi laanɛɛ na o, ndomayaa o, ka ngebɔyaa maa yeiyaa nhu.
54003001	Indinɛi tɔmbaga nwɛɛ taa kɛ aa kɛɛlaa, ina kɛgɛi na kpala tɔ mba i bele ngaa laanɛɛ belaa ti lokulɔ nwɔɔ, ngenge gbekpe mɛɛ i ngɔia pelendaa nhanwa.
54003002	Laanɛɛ belaa ti lokulɔ nwɔɔ k`a ndaa banda aa gɛ mba nana kɛlɛ ngai mba. Ngi nyanha na kaa gɛ ila kele ngeya, kaa bele ngaa nuu nana ngaa lo ngɔ, i gɛ kuni aa kpɔɔndalaa lii na nwa, mbɛɛ gɛ alaa, i gɛ kuni aa hotangaa binjandaa ngi heinwaa na, awa kaa gɛ kuni aa ningaa nagɔlindaa.
54003003	Ɛɛ bele ngaa ndɔɔ hou mɔɔ inaile kɔɔ gɔɔ nwɔɔ, kɛlɛ i gɛa nwaa yeii ka maa lɛi, awa ɛɛ nahoo nwaa lii ɔa goo nhu.
54003004	Kaa gɛ kuni ngi bongaa i ti nwaa nhanda nau pandaa, awa i pele ngi lengaa i ti nwaa bɛɛ alau, awa ti mbɛɛ gɛ alaa aa pele o pele.
54003005	Gbaa ina kɛgɛi na ai bɛɛlii aa ngi bongaa i ti nwaa nhanda laalaa mba, ɔɔ gee sia aa natiini maa nhanda ti laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Ngebɔ?
54003006	Ɛɛ bele ngaa laanɛɛ nwɔɔ nyiɛ. Ina aa bele nda, naangaa ɔɔ aunwaa lɛa awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala gɔhɔnaa ɛɛ i Ngafɔ mbaa na gɔhɔni.
54003007	Kaa bele ngaa nuu nana ningaa i natiini laanɛɛ belaa aile aa tuee taa mbɛɛ gɛ alaa, kangaa ai ba chambo hɔlɔ awa aa gɔɔ ngafɔ mbaa na nwaai naa.
54003008	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, kpɔmba belaa i laanɛɛ belaa i nhu k`a ti s`ɔ ngaa gɛ gbekpeni awa mbɛɛ gɛ tuaa, kɛlɛ tɛɛ bele ngaa nɛɛ fee fee mbelaa. Tɛɛ luu ndɔɔ gbɔɛ nja lee ngɔnhu, inaile tɛɛ nuu nwɛ nahoo nhanda nhu.
54003009	Kɛlɛ kataa Ngebɔ lɔmbaga gbundu na hou aa ɔgɔ hee ngɔ nana Ngebɔ i ndɔgɔɔuni aa muee. awa kataa hou aa nɛɛnwaa gue.
54003010	Tua gbɔnhu kataa ti nhua pɛnhɛɛ, awa ina taa ku nhua na nwa, nhu nwɛɛ taa enge ɛɛ kpɔ mba belaa laanɛɛ belaa i nhu.
54003011	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, ngemɛɛ aa ti nyanhaa i. K`a ti s`ɔ ngaa gɛ gbekpeni awa mbɛɛ gɛ tuaa, kɛlɛ tɛɛ bele ngaa njafa belaa. Kɛlɛ kataa bele ngaa ningaa natiini ti aa lo ngɔ, awa ti bele ngaa ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu ningaa taa laanɛɛ aa tuee gbɛ o gbɛ nhu.
54003012	Ningaa i natiini kpɔmba belaa aa tuee laanɛɛ belaa i nhu, kataa bele ngaa ningaa natiini taa nyanhaa ila ilangaa hei. Awa ti lengaa i maa nhanda na o ti bɛlɛ unhanda na o kataa bɛɛi aa sialaa la pandaa.
54003013	Gbaa kpɔmba belaa i natiini taa ti enge na bele pandaa tɔɔ tomaa gbekpe hɔlɔa awa tɔɔ kunaa ti yɛpɛ aa ndii gbɛndɛ ti laanɛɛ na nhanwa nana i Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu.
54003014	Nya nɛɛnwaa lɔ na aa paalaa nhanwa wuee guui nhu, kɛlɛ ngi nhanda indinɛi gbaali gbaali pɛnhɛɛ wu nwanhu kangaa wu pele pele,
54003015	kangaa ina nya baalaa aa nwaa gbɛndɛɛ, ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi ɔɔ pelenaa wu kɔɔ maa gee gɛ na ɛɛ Ngebɔ bongaa. Pongaa indiini siina, kɛndɛ Eebɔ na laanɛɛ belaa i mɛ aa tuee. Tuɛɛ nyɔkɛ na aa tuee ka ndambu na tɔmbaga na houndaa nhanwa.
54003016	Nuu ai na nana aa nwaagai Ngebɔ lɔmbaga gbundu na bombounjaa na nwa nana mi laanɛɛ ɔ la. Kɛɛ belenga aa nuu gbɔha. Ka Yina na i ngi leenjaa na lɔgɔɔunga, awa ka malekaa ti ala lɔa. Kati ngoo na gɛa aa ningaa i ala nhanwa, ka ningaa i ti laanɛɛa aa ala ngelou gbɔha i nhu bɛɛ, awa ka Ngebɔ i ala lɛa aliyana.
54004001	Yina na lɔ kɛ ngɔ chanhai aa kɛɛlaa lɔgɔ ɔɔ baa, ningaa lɛingaa tɔɔ gbahaa ti laanɛɛ nau. Tɔɔ nwaa bɛɛa ndɛɛ gɔɔla ngafɔngaau ka ti nagɔli nau.
54004002	Pele manhu lɛɛ gɔɔla mbelaa i tuɛɛ taa ndɛɛ na siina bonda yanja nhu, natiini ti nɛɛnwaa haa ɔ ɛɛ kɔu gbɔu lɔ ti ti nɛɛnwaa na nwɔni la.
54004003	Ningaa i siina bonda tuɛɛ taa ningaa nagɔli aa kɛɛlaa nuu ɛɛ nyanha gɔli, awa mɛnhɛi lɛingaa lɔ na taa gɛ gbɔnhu nuu ɛɛ mɛ. Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ i mɛnhɛi nana siina gbatɛ gbatɛia mɛndaa nhanwa. Awa natiini laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa tuee awa ti baa tɔmbaga na gɔɔ ma, taa mɛa aa fiɛ guandaa nhu bele ala nwa.
54004004	Gbaa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ Ngebɔ i kpatɛi kpekpe ngɔ. Kpee mba gee ai na. Kɛlɛ ina waa gɛ wɔɔ mɛ, a kpauna pɛnhɛɛ wu fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa fanwa laaminɛ nhu.
54004005	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na o, laaminɛ na o, oo pelenga i gɛ hitii nhu aa mɛndaa.
54004006	Ina baa nhanda indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛ aa mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i, bɔɔ belenaa aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi eyaalakpandou gbekpe. Awa wu lii na ɔɔ gɛa ndaa gɔ hɔlɔ ngɔ aa ngoo na nana wu laanɛɛa la ka nagɔli gbekpe na nana wu hitɛa pou nwa.
54004007	Kɛlɛ awɛɛ loko bu njia ɔha ɔha nhu nana Ngebɔ lɔmbaga ai nhu na, kɛlɛ nana waa pele alɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa, a gbɔha na siaa ngebɔyaa nhanda nhanwa.
54004008	Gbaa lugu na siandaa maa qani na kolo, kɛlɛ gbɔha na siandaa ngebɔyaa nhanda nhanwa qani tɔ nhu gbɛ o gbɛ na nhanwa bɛɛ, gbɛnhaile alaa nɛɛnwaa lo fe ngɔ muɛɛ ndɛɛhu nhanwa chaanngi nhu o ka guna.
54004009	Indinɛi tɔmbaga yia nwɛ nana nuu o nuu aa kuun ma awa i laanɛɛ la hiti ɔ nhu.
54004010	Gbaa indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ maa nwɔɛ nwa awa mi maa gboofɛɛ nhu, gbɛnhaile moo mi nɛɛnwaa la na bua kɛndɛ Eebɔ na nhu, nana Ndendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala ningaaɛ bɛɛ, eengaa tɔ bɛnhɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i kpei.
54004011	Bia ti nagɔlia aa indinɛi awa bi kɛ aa tuee pelendaa nhanwa.
54004012	Bɛɛ pele nuu aa au bii bi nwanhu gbɛnhaile ndakpandou golo nwɛ aa biee, kɛlɛ belena aa kuague laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa bi yɛpɛ ɔ na nhu o, bi eyaabele na nhu o, bi lomayaa na nhu o, bi laanɛɛ na nhu o, ka bi chanhainjaa na nhu.
54004013	Gɛa Ngebɔ Gbaali na galandaa nwaa gboofɛɛ nhu faka na nhu kpou, ngoo na gɛndaa aa ningaa i, ka ti nagɔlindaa.
54004014	Bɛɛ au bii fembɛ na nwanhu nana i bi nhu nana Yina na i ngɔai bi eya, nana bi hɔlɔi nhuna Ngebɔ letu na i njia gɛi, awa ka nhuna mbaa waangaa i ti ɔgɔ bɛɛ bɛɛi bi nwa.
54004015	Nhanda indinɛi bua ngeyaabele nhu awa bi gbɔha na gɔan ma, kangaae ningaa i bɛɛ ti ba tɔ baa gee li gulɔɔ.
54004016	Bele ngɔ gbatɛa gbɔha na nhanwa o ka bi nagɔli na baa pele ngaa ningaa i. Gɛa aa maa nhanda nhanda indinɛi bele pelendaa, gbɛnhaile baa gɛ aa pelendaa, bɔɔ pelenaa bi gbɔha na bi ndendouyaa hɔlɔ awa ka natiini gbɔnhu taa oo nhɛɛ bi nagɔli na nwa ti hɔlɔ.
54005001	Bɛɛ njia nhu gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ kɛ aa nhiikolo, kɛlɛ yɛpɛa ngee ndɛi ɔ nyɔɔ ɛɛ baa yɛpɛ bi kɛɛgɛ le. Ndakpangaa golo goloa i houa ɛɛ bi ndege nhiindengaa,
54005002	bi nyaagoloa i hou ɛɛ bi njea, awa bi nyɔugbɛangaa i hou ɛɛ bi ndege nyɛɛlengaa, awa bi indinɛi bele bɛɛ aa chanhainjaa.
54005003	Mbɛɛ gɛa ngɔɔ nyanha i mba natiini ti gbɔmba nwɔɔ ai na awa wu gbɔ tuaa.
54005004	Kɛlɛ ina ngɔɔ nyanha aa gɛ na nana ndengaa ti alɛɛ, inaile taalalengaa ti ngeya, ti bɛnhɛɛ kooti na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa kataa ti eebɔyaa na lɔɔlo ti bongaa i ngee, awa pele ngɔ indinɛi nwɛ tɔɔ ti ungaa i ti lɔndɔ na gua la ka ti taalaa i, gbɛnhaile na nwɛ aa Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ.
54005005	Chaanngi nhu njie na nana ngɔɔ nyanha aa ala kpei, napangaa nana i ila bou nwa, oo ngi nɛɛnwaa la na bua Ngebɔ nhu, awa alaa gbo laaminɛ belendaa nhu tuun aa foo ka kpɔkɔ kangaa i gbɔ alaa.
54005006	Kɛlɛ ngɔɔ nyanha na nana aa gbɔha gɔan gbɔha goonhu nɛɛndaa nhanwa ala haa ɔ tɔ, hali nha ala gɛndɛ ɔ.
54005007	Nhanda nhanda indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛa aa tuee kangaa nuu ai ba kɛlɛ maai tuaa.
54005008	Kɛlɛ ina nuu lɔgɔlaa aile aa ngi ungaabɛɛmbaa i, eengaa bɛnhɛ aa natiini ngi bongaa i ngaa tuee, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa maa nwɔɔ na oo nwaagaia ngi laanɛɛ na nwa awa ngi nhanda nyɔu ɔ tee ngɔ laanɛɛ gbahamba nwɔɔa.
54005009	Kɔɔ na nwa mɛɛ baa ngɔɔ nyanhaa i ti laa na bu na, bɛɛ ngɔɔ nyanha laa gbaali na nana ngi hogo ai hiti puu buu ɔhita nhu aa ala lɛmbindaa lepele ngee nwanhu. Awa fee na boma, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa naa oo gɛ ɔ ila gbo kele i kɛmbɛ guaa,
54005010	ndaa banda i gɛ alaa ngenge gbekpe fanwa, i bele ngaa njie nana i ndengaa siaaɔ pandaa, i gɛ ɔ aa hotangaa binjandaa ngi heinwaa na, i gɛ ɔ aa laanɛɛ belaa ɔgɔsambala na nwaa guandaa, i gɛ ɔ aa kpɔ mba belendaa aa natiini tee kpɔu gbɔu nhu, awa kaa bele ngaa njie nana i gbɔha na gɔan ngɔ ngenge gbekpe pelendaa nhanwa aa pele o pele.
54005011	Kɛlɛ bɛɛ ngɔɔ nyanhaa gbɛlɛ kpɛlɛngaa i kula mba, gbɛnhaile nhuna ti ɔi na ɔɔ pele ti lo ngaa kɛmbɛ guandaa, naa lɔgɔ na siina tɔɔ gɔngaa hea Kilaisia,
54005012	awae indinɛi ɔɔ baa aa kɔhɔ ti nwa, gbɛnhaile too ti bɛnhɛɛ nɛɛnwaa lo na nyaaia nana ti fei Ngebɔɛ.
54005013	Awa na aile gbo ti gbele ɔ mae kɛlɛ taa belenaa gbɔnhu aa pele baamba belaa, ɛɛ taa lee tee nhu ningaa ti bɛlɛ la. Awa pele baambayaa na aile gboe kɛlɛ taa belenaa aa njafa belaa ka sia nhu belaa. Taa nhanda nwaa yɛpɛ gɛa nana tai hitii nhu taa kɛ.
54005014	Faa nwɛɛe nya lo ngɔ la kangaa ngɔɔ nyanhaa gbɛlɛ kpɛlɛngaa i ti kɛmbɛ guu gua, ti foli hɔlɔ, awa ti ti bɛlɛ nau nhanda nwanhu gbee, kangaa tɛɛ fɛɛlɛ he mi haaleengaa i mbɛ taa ndaa nyɔu he muɛɛ.
54005015	Gbaa ngɔɔ nyanhaa lɛingaa too gɔngaa hea tɔ ndandaa nhanwa Setania.
54005016	Kɛlɛ njie ngoo njie nana laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aa ala, ina ngɔɔ nyanhaa taa gɛ ngi bongaa i nhu natiini ti lo ngɔ aa kpɔ mba, i gbɔna tuaa awa maa gooti na ɛɛ la laanɛɛ belaa i ngumbaa, kangaa ti ba gɛ ngɔɔ nyanhaa lagbitia i ti sago nhu napangaa natiini ti ila ila na bou nwa.
54005017	Mbaa waangaa i natiini taa ngenge gbekpe pele ɛɛ ngu mbelaa laanɛɛ belaa i ndiiya kataa mbɛɛ gɛ tuaa heinwaa fee fee awa ti paabaa hɔlɔ heinwaa fee fee, eengaa tɔ bɛnhɛ aa natiini taa nwɔɛ nwa aa ngoo na gɛɛ gɛɛndaa o ka ningaa i nagɔlindaa.
54005018	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ, "Bɛɛ nika na laa na ili mba nhuna aa gɛ aa mba nigandaa biɛɛ" awa "Ngenge nwɔɔ na kataa ngi baabaa na ɔa ngeya."
54005019	Bɛɛ oo nhɛɛ fɔɔlɛ hɔɔlɛ yia nwa nana taa ba la bi nwanhu ngu to ngɔ nuu waaa, kɛlɛ k`a feengaa inaile ningaa chawangaa taa kɛ, bi gilaa oo nhɛɛ ma.
54005020	Awa natiini fanwa ti nɔa ɔ na nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhu, yiaa ti nwa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ti bɛpɛ na au bele nhu bɛɛ, kangaa lagbitia i pɛpɛ na bɛɛ ti ba lua.
54005021	Ngi bi nwɔɔli Ngebɔ au bele nhu o, Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, ka ngi nhu ɔhɛ nwalekaa i aa kɛɛlaa bi nwaa bɛɛ nhanda indinɛiu ngi kɛa aa biee pele pelendaa nhanwa. nhanda indinɛi bele pelena aa teengaa, kɛlɛ bɛɛ nuu gbau aa kɛɛlaa ala gbekpe ngɔ tee ngɔ lagbiti naa gbɛ o gbɛ nhu.
54005022	Bɛɛ lii gbɛi aa ɔgɔ bɛɛndaa nuua ala gɔanndaa nhanwa Ngebɔ enge na belendaa nhanwa. Bɛɛ gula lagbitia i ti nhanda nyɔu naa, kɛlɛ gɛa chanhainjaa nhu.
54005023	Bɛhaa nja ila ngɔ gbɔɛ gbɔnhu, kɛlɛ gɛa ndɔɔ golo gbɔɛndaa bi goo nhu na nhanwa, awa tii baa hegbɛ hegbɛa gbɔnhu lɛmbi lɛmbi.
54005024	Ningaa lɛingaa ti nhanda nyɔu na tɔndaa nhu ai mba, awa ti nhanda nyɔu na aa lonaa gulɔɔ tuaa kɔhɔ na le. Kɛlɛ lagbitia i ti nhanda nyɔu na nuu ai nhumbu aa tɔ.
54005025	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa ngeyaabele kpekpe na tɔndaa nhu ai mba, awa hali bɛnhɛ nana ai guai kpou ala gbɔnhu ai lo ndɔɔgu nhu.
54006001	Natiini nduaa i ngaa tuee kataa ti nwanhu belaa i kpau ngaa ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu aa mbɛɛ o mbɛɛ gɛndaa nhanwa tuaa, kangaa nuu ai ba njia nyɔu gɛ aa Ngebɔ laa na ka mi nagɔli na maa pele ngaa ningaa i.
54006002	Awa nduaa i natiini ti nwanhu belaa i laanɛɛ belaa nwɛ aa tuee, tɛɛ mbɛɛ baa ti nwanhu belaa i siinaa gbɛnhaile ti ndege laanɛɛ belaa nwɛ aa tuee. Kɛlɛ maa nhiɛ ɔ gila ti nhanwa taa mbɛɛ gɛ tuaa nja lee ngɔnhu, gbɛnhaile ti nwanhu belaa i taa enge tiu laanɛɛ belaa nwɛ aa tuee awa ti lo ngɔ aa ti nwanhu belaa i. Kabaa ti nagɔli awa bi ngoo indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛ aa tuee.
54006003	Nuu na bɛɛ aa ningaa nagɔli aa ngoo lagbiti nana ngaa hɛɛla ngɔ, awa ai kuun ngɔ tɔmbaga oo na nwa mi Nwaliki na nhanwa Yisɔsi Kilaisi, awa tii mi eebɔyaa na nwaa nagɔli na o maa pele ngaa ningaa i,
54006004	maa nwɔɔ na siina ngaunwaa lɛ ɔ awa nɛɛnwaa haa ɔ. Awa s~ɔ kpɔlɔ nwɛ i ngeya tonga fanwa o, mbaabaga o, ngɛi ngoo, kpaahaa gbaahaa o,
54006005	tonga ngoo nana kpelenwaa ai mba kualaa ningaa eya natiini ti nɛɛnwaa haa ɔ awa tɔmbaga na ɛa ti eya gbɔnhu kpɔ. Ti nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngebɔyaa pele nwɛɛ nuu aa gbatɛ la.
54006006	Ngebɔyaa na hati aa baa aa qani mbombou mbaa nhuna nuu lii aa lɛi nana nwa i ngeya.
54006007	Gbaa mai bai aa gbɛ o gbɛ ngelou i nhu, awae maigɔ li aa gbɛ o gbɛ kualaa ngelou i nhu!
54006008	Kɛlɛ ina maa mɛnhɛi hɔlɔ ka kɔla gɔla, maa gee indinɛi aa mi lii lɛia.
54006009	Kɛlɛ natiini ti lo ngɔ la ti gbatɛ taa gualaa kpɔu gbɔu nhu, awa taa gɔɔa maaia nana aa ba aa mɔu mɔu nhanda gbinhi gbinhi o ka ngɔi nana aa ba aa nyaai, nana aa ti u ndo nhu awa i ti gbɔɔni nhaa guna bɛɛ.
54006010	Gbaa nahoo na lomayaa na alɛɛ hape na aa ala ngeyaabele nyɔu nhanwa bɛɛ. Awa lɛingaa too feelaaɔ aa hɔɔlɔndaa, nana i pelenga ti nwaa gɛ gɔha laanɛɛ naa, awa oo ti lii nyaaia aa maa nwɔuyaa gbinhi gbinhi.
54006011	Kɛlɛ bia, Ngebɔ nda nwɛ aa biee, bɛɛ loko bu maa gee indinɛi nhu bɛɛ, kɛlɛ gɛa teenjaa nwaa gboofɛɛ nhu o, ngebɔyaa o, laanɛɛ o, ndomayaa o, ndoolaa nhu gbɛndɛnjaa nhu o, ka maa yeiyaa.
54006012	Bi sɔbɛ na houa kangaa bi lo gbo laanɛɛ nhu, awa bi ba ku bi wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na hɔlɔ nana Ngebɔ i uini biaa fanwa, nhuna bi bi gɛɛ gɛɛ na beleni bi laanɛɛ na nhanwa seelia gbinhi gbinhia au bele nhu.
54006013	Ngi kɛ aa biee Ngebɔ au bele nhu nana aa ndɛɛhu he gbɛ o gbɛ naɛ bɛɛ, ka Yisɔsi Kilaisi au bele nhu nana i gɛɛ gɛɛi aa ngi laanɛɛ na nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ Pɔntɔsi Paileti gulɔɔ,
54006014	a nwaa bɛɛa nanau ngi kɛɛ gɛɛa aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa, awa wu pele ngaa laanɛɛ aa Foo na mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ɔɔ ba ma.
54006015	Ala baalaa na ɔɔ belenaa lɔgɔ gbekpe na nwa nana Ngebɔ i ndai paalaa ma nhanwa, Ngebɔ nana nduba nwɔɔ na aa ala ka Manha. Manhangaa waa waa i ti nwanha mbaa na aa ala, awa malikia i ti Nwaliki na nwɛ.
54006016	Ala ila ngɔ kele ai haa. Alaa waun nhu nana nuu ai kpɛɛ kpɛlaa. Nuu ai lɛ ala lɔi lɛɔ. Nuu ai ku aa tɔ. Kangaa mbɛɛ gɛ alaa ka wɔwɔwɔ fɔha na! Kangaa i bele.
54006017	Awa natiini fanwa ti gbatɛ ɔ na ngelou indinɛi nhu, kɛa aa tuee aa kɛɛlaa tɛɛ aunwaa lɛ, inaile tɛɛ ti nɛɛnwaa la na bu nhanda lɛingaa nhu nana tai hagba la ngɔ nhu ɛɛ kpatɛyaa, kɛlɛ ti ti nɛɛnwaa la na buu bua Ngebɔ nhu, nana aa gbɛ o gbɛ na he muɛɛ kpinhi ɔ kangaa mi goonhu nɛɛ.
54006018	kɛa aa tuee aa kɛɛlaa ti nhanda banda bele, ti gbatɛ ngenge gbekpe nhu, awa ti nhai he ningaaɛ kpinhi gbinhi ɔ, awa ti gɛ nwaa gbatɛi aa kpɔndaa natiini mba ti baa ngɔ aa nana kpala ngi tuaa.
54006019	Aa pele ngɔ indinɛi tɔɔ kpatɛyaa aa lɔgɔa ti gbɔha nhanwa nana ɔɔ bele ngaa ndambu gɛndɛ gɛndɛ gulɔɔ na nhanwa. Awa nhu nwɛɛ tɔɔ ku ti ndɛɛhu na hɔlɔ nana tɔmbaga lɛhu na le.
54006020	Timootii, nana nwanhu gbeena pandaa ngɔa ngɔ na bi eya. Bɛɛ loko bu njɛpɛ nhu nana ai eebɔyaai ka mɔu mɔu tonga pelendaa, nana ningaa lɛingaa taa ui mba ngaa haa ɔ aa "Kɔɔnjaa."
54006021	Gbaa lɛingaa too pelengaɔ aa ti nhanda bombou mbaa, awa oo pelenga ti laanɛɛ na oo lo nhu ti eya. Kangaa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na i gɛ bi nwa.
55001001	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, Ngebɔ i nya nhu ɔhɛi kangaa ngi bele ngaa to mɔɔ Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhanwa, nana i nya loni kangaa ngi ba ngi ngoo na gɛ ndɛɛhu na nhanwa nana Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo fei, nana i mi eya mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
55001002	Nya nwɛ ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali nya nhiindou na nwanhu nana nya lo ngɔ waa na la Timootii. Kangaa Ngebɔ nana Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, ka mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti bi gɔ aa panda bandayaa, ti maaumayaa gbau bi nwa, awa ti bi gɔ aa maa lɛi.
55001003	Ngi fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa nana ngaa enge mbɛ aa nɛɛnwaa gue ɔ ɛɛ nya bembaa i ti peleniɔ. K`angi fiɛ gua ala nwa nhuna ngaa gɛ aa nɛgililaa aa wuee aa gbele o gbele nya laaminɛ na nhu aa foo ka kpɔkɔ.
55001004	Ngaa nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla bi ɔɔ na nwa bi peleni nhuna mi bi loi, awa alaa pele bi ɔi gbaai nyaa nja lee ngɔ nhu, kangaa koonhu nɛɛ i ba nya laa fe.
55001005	Ngi nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla bi lɔmbaga laanɛɛ na nwa i bi eya, napangaa tɔmbaga laanɛɛ na nana pɛnhɛɛ ee bi taala na eya njie kee na taa ui mba aa Loasi, ka bi nje na Yunisi. Nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa alaa gbɔnhu bi eya.
55001006	Saabu indinɛi nhanwa, ngi kili hitɛ gbɔnhu biɛɛ aa nyiɛ aa kɛɛlaa, fembɛ na nana Ngebɔ i fei biɛɛ nhuna ngi ɔgɔ na bɛɛi bi nwa, fembɛ na siina i gɛa bi eya kɛndɛyaa nhu tuun.
55001007	Gbaa Ngebɔ ai Yina ɔai mi eya nana aa pele maa luae kɛlɛ i Yina ɔaia mi eya nana aa mi laa fe ngaa fɔha o, ndomayaa o, ka gbɔha nhu houndaa.
55001008	Faa nwɛɛe awɛɛ ufe ngaa seeliyaa hendaa mi Nwaliki na nhanwa, awa awɛɛ ufe ngaa nge, ngi gbindi bɛlɛu nwɔɔ na aa nge. Kɛlɛ gulaa nyaa njɔgɔlɔ na nhu Kilaisi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛndaa nhanwa ɛɛ Ngebɔ aa maa nhu gbɛndɛnjaa na ɔa bi eya fanwa.
55001009	Kɛɛ ndendouyaa hea muɛɛ awa kɛɛ uinga muaa kangaa mi bele ngaa ngi ndaa, nana nhaile mi pelengae kɛlɛ ngi nda laalaa na nwɛ ka ngi banda bandayaa na, nana i fei muɛɛ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele yeingaa i gilaa ngelou na gbatɛ,
55001010	kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu oo ndɔgɔɔunga aa muee aa mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na baalaa na nhu bele Yisɔsi Kilaisi, nana i haa na fɔha na gbelea awa oo wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu lɔgɔɔunga aa muee aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhu bele.
55001011	Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na lɔgɔ fanwa, Ngebɔ oo nya nhu ɔhɛa kangaa ngi bele ngaa to mɔɔ o, ningaa nagɔli mɔɔ o, ka Kilaisi Oo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na gɛ mɔɔ,
55001012	awa saabu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ ngaa yɔgɔlɔ gbɔnhu aa nhanda nhanda indinɛi. Kɛlɛ ngai ngaa ufe hɔlɔi, gbɛnhaile ngi nuu na gɔɔnaa nana ngi laanɛɛa la, awa nya hagba la ɔ ala nhu aa kɛɛlaa ala ku ngɔ aa nana nwanhu gbee i ngɔaa nya eya nha Foo bombou mbaa na i hiti ma.
55001013	Tɔmbaga oo na ngi bi nagɔlii la houa aa loko hee ngɔ, ɛɛ kuague bi nhanwa nana ba hitɛ pou, awa bi lo laanɛɛ na nhu ka ndomayaa na nana mi bo mɛɛ mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
55001014	Aa Ngebɔ Yina na fɔha na nhu bele nana i mi nhu, tɔmbaga na nana i ngɔai bi eya, manhu gbeena.
55001015	Bi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa natiini bɛɛ ti Eesia bɔlɔgɔɔ na gakanwaa na kati gbeea nyaa, Figɛlɔsi o Hamoyinisi o ngila mbelaa nwɛɔ aa tuee ti gbeei nuaa.
55001016	Kangaa Maliki na i maaumayaa gbau Onɛsifolɔsi nwa o ngi bongaa i ngoo, gbɛnhaile i gbɔnia nyaa naa gbinhi ɔ. Ai ufeni aa kɛɛlaa kpindi bɛlɛu nwɔɔ nwɛ aa nge,
55001017	kɛlɛ nhu gutu ɔ na i hitii Loomu bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, kɛɛ hitɛa aa nya ɔɛ ɔɛ nhaa kɛɛ nya lɔa.
55001018	Kangaa Maliki na i maaumayaa gbau ala nwa aa Foo na Maliki na ɔɔ ba! Awa bi kɔɔnaa pandaa gbɛɛ enge nwɛ i peleni nyɛɛ mɛɛ Ɛfisɔsi.
55002001	Faa nwɛɛ bia bi nhanwa, nya lou, bi nhu gɛa gbɛndɛni panda bandayaa na nhu nana mi bo mɛɛ mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
55002002	Awa nagɔli na nana bi mɛini ngee pele ngaa ningaa seelia gbinhi gbinhia au bele nhu, maa nagɔli na siina, pelena aa ningaa natiini bi kɔɔ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa nuu aa hagba laa ti nhu, awa tɔɔ kunaa ti ningaa lagbitia nagɔli la boma.
55002003	Gulaa nyaa njɔgɔlɔ na nhu ɛɛ Yisɔsi Kilaisi gulugbaa gbekpe.
55002004	Kulugbaa na nana aa gɛ ngi enge na belendaa nhu ai gula natiini ti nhandaa kulugbaangaa aile aa tuee, gbɛnhaile ngɔi lɔ mba i tomaa nwɔɔ na goonhu nɛɛ nana i ala gbauni kulugbaa enge na nhu.
55002005	Awa nuu na nana aa gula kpaganɛ binhɛ boogea, kaa nwaa bɛɛ sɔ nau nana ndaa laa ngɔ maa binhɛ na nhanwa, i gilaa togbo hɔlɔ.
55002006	Nhɛɛ enge nwɔɔ na nana aa sɔbɛ hou, alɛɛ pɛnhɛɛ ngi nda nii na hɔlɔndaa aa gɛ ngeya.
55002007	Nɛgilia nana nwa ngaa kɛ, gbaa Maliki na ɔɔ pelenaa bi ku bi nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ mba bɛɛ.
55002008	Nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwa, nana Ngebɔ i huui alau kualaa Haa na nhu, nana Leebilini ti goo na nhu lou na aa ala, ɛɛ ngaa kɛ gbo ngi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhu.
55002009	Awa kina nya ngaa Kilaisi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛ, kangi yɔgɔlɔ awa kati nya bii bɛnhɛ kpindi bɛlɛu ɛɛ nhandambayaa bombou mbaa nwɔɔ. Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ oo na ai kpindi bɛlɛu.
55002010	Saabu indinɛi nhanwa, nya lii lo ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛ nau Ngebɔ nhu ɔhɛ belaa i lɔgɔ fanwa, kangaae tua gbɔnhu ti ba ndendouyaa na hɔlɔ nana aa ba aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele tii paalaa o aa mbɛɛ nana wɔwɔwɔ kee nwɛ.
55002011	Njia indinɛi tɔmbaga nwɛɛ, "Ina moo haa ɔ ngilamaa mii ala o, mɔɔ gɛa na boma tii ala o.
55002012	Ina maa gɛ gbo lii loni, mɔɔ heia manhayaa na la ngilamaaa mii ala o. Ina maa nwaagai ala nwa, ala gbɔnhu ɔɔ nwaagaia mi nwa.
55002013	Ina maa gɔngaa he mi laanɛɛ naa ala nhu, ala ɔɔ gɛa gbo laanɛɛyaa nhu, gbɛnhaile ai nwaagai gbɔha na nwa."
55002014	Indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛa aa tuee, awa bi ndaanhii kɛndɛ gɛndɛ he tuɛɛ Ngebɔ au bele nhu aa kɛɛlaa tɛɛ njia nwaa longa pele, gbɛnhaile ai nhanda gbekpe pele kɛlɛ i natiini nyaai taa oo nhɛɛ ma.
55002015	Bi sɔbɛ gbekpe na belena nana ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa ngenge nwɔɔ gbekpe mɛɛ aa biee, nana Ngebɔ lii lɛi ɔ ma, ɛɛ ngenge nwɔɔ nana ai ufe ngaa ngi enge na, kɛlɛ nuu nwɛɛ nana aa ningaa nagɔli aa Ngebɔ lɔmbaga oo na mbɛ ngɔ ma.
55002016	Bɛɛ loko bu njɛpɛ nwaa nhanda nhu nana ai eebɔyaai, tii mɔu mɔu njɛpɛ o nana aa pele ningaa i ti li aa nwaa gɛ gɔha Ngebɔa.
55002017	Nagɔli nana bonda aa siaa nhu lɛɛ ɛɛ ndugu nwaa hegbɛ. Ndakpangaa feengaa natiini taa ningaa nagɔli aa nagɔli nana siina bonda tua nwɛ aa Himaniɔsi o ka Filitɔsi.
55002018	Too gua tɔmbaga bele na nhu awa tua taa laanɛɛ belaa i lɛingaa ti laanɛɛ na nhupu ngaa kɛɛlaa lɔgɔ na ningaa taa huu la haa nhu, maa lɔgɔ na oo leenga.
55002019	Kɛlɛ ndambu gɛndɛ gɛndɛ na nana Ngebɔ i kpatɛa gbɛ o gbɛ ai ku aa sii sia la. Awa alɛɛ ngoo indinɛi gbaali gbaali ngɔ ma, "Maliki na i natiini kɔɔnaa ngi ndaa i ngaa tuee" awa "Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa gɛ Maliki na nda nwɛ aa ala, kaa gɔngaa he ngeyaabele nyɔua."
55002020	Pɛlɛ na nana mbaa ɔ, naa nwɛɛ ngunde nhaanhaa gbinhi gbinhia ti na. Awa pɛpɛ ngaile kpatɛ ngɔ aa mabɔɔn ngoo ka nahoo gɔu, kɛlɛ lɛingaa gbatɛ ngɔ aa ngulu o ka pɔlɔ. Taa engea aa lɛingaa faka nhu nhanda nhanwa, awa lagbiti na pa pɛlɛu enge nhanwa gbo.
55002021	Faa nwɛɛe, ina nuu aa gbɔha na chanhai kualaa nhanda nhanda nyɔu nyɔu nana nhu, awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ engea aa ala tɔɔgɔɔ nhanda nhanwa gbɛnhaile ala gua ngɔ mba tɔɔgɔɔ awa ala golo ɔ ala Nwanhu nwɔɔ na le. Ala nwaa gbatɛ ɔ ngenge gbekpe pelendaa la nhanwa aa pele o pele.
55002022	Loko guaa feelaa na nhu nana aa gɛ ndakpandou goloa, bi gɛ teenjaa nwaa gboofɛɛ nhu o, laanɛɛ o, ndomayaa o, ka maa lɛi, wui natiini ngoo taa ui Maliki naa kualaa ndii chanhai nhu kpɔ mba nhanwa.
55002023	Bɛɛ gula mɔu mɔu njɛpɛa nana nhu lo ngai nhu. Gbaa bi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa aa baa aa mbaabaga.
55002024	Maliki na eyaalakpandou ai bele ngaa mbaabaga nwɔɔ, kɛlɛ kaa bele ngaa nuu nana nhanda banda ɔ ningaa le bɛɛ, i gɛ kuni aa ningaa nagɔlindaa awa i bele ngaa ndii lo mɔɔ nhanda nhu,
55002025	i ngi haaleengaa i hitɛ pele gbekpe nhu aa maa yeiyaa, gbaa naangaa aa belenaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ fɛɛlɛ na hea tuɛɛ kangaa ti bɛ awa ti ba ti tɔmbaga na gɔɔ.
55002026	Awa nhu nwɛɛ tɔɔ nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ nanaa ɔɔ pele ti Ngafɔ mbaa na nwaai na nwaa hakpa, nana i ti houaɔ ɛɛ nduaa kangaa ti ngi guunmayaa na bele.
55003001	Ndaa nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa gbele mba Yamana na nhu, lɔgɔ ɔɔ baa baa nana kaande ngɔ.
55003002	Gbaa ningaa tɔɔ gɛa hɔɔndii, ti gɛ nahoo liii, yonga leendaa o, ngaunwaa lɛ o, ndaa gbɛndɛ ngoo, taigɔ nwaa bɛɛ ti ungaa i mbu, nuu gbɔhayaa aigɔ gɛ ti nhu, awa taigɔ gɛ eebɔyaai.
55003003	Taigɔ gɛ nhanda bandai, taigɔ gɛ nwaaumayaai, tɔɔ gɛa yafa yafai, taigɔ gbɔha nhu hou, tɔɔ ningaa gɛa kaahee awa tɔɔ gɔɔ gɔɔa, awa tɔɔ loloa aa nhanda gbekpe.
55003004	Tɔɔ gɛa bulugini, tɔɔ gɛa aa kpundɛlaa nhanda nwa, tɔɔ gbɔha lɛa nga, tɔɔ lonaa aa nɛɛ nɛɛ yeingaa nha ti ba lo ngaa Ngebɔ.
55003005	K`ati pele ɛɛ tua taa Ngebɔ batou, kɛlɛ tai pote Ngebɔ fɔha na aa enge ti lɛɛhu na nhu. Maa belaa i nana bonda, bɛɛ loko bu ti nhanda nhu.
55003006	Gbaa lɛingaa lɔ na ti liiya natiini taa ɔa ɔa ningaa ti bɛlɛu, k`ati njiengaa hɔlɔ na natiini taa gula tuaa, napangaa natiini ti guunmayaa na gaanhu haa ɔ na, awa ti lɛɛ ɔ nja lee ngɔ nhu ti nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa, awa ti laa fe ngɔ na aa ngɔi gɛbɛlɛ na bɛɛ.
55003007	Njiengaa nwɛ natiini taa nagɔli hɔlɔ aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, kɛlɛ tai ku taa tɔmbaga na gɔɔ.
55003008	Awa ɛɛ gbo ndakpangaa feengaa indiini Yaniisi o ka Yambilisi ti loloi aa Moosisi, aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, ndakpangaa indiini ngaa ti yɛpɛ i gɛ, ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu ti lolo ɔ na aa tɔmbaga na. Ningaa nwɛ natiini ti nɛɛnwaa haa ɔ awa kpaha belaa nwɛ aa tuee laanɛɛ nhu.
55003009	Kɛlɛ taigɔ li la gulɔɔ nhu gɔha, gbɛnhaile nuu o nuu ɔɔ ti nwɔu mɔu ngɔ na bele ngɔ na lɔa. Gbaa ngemɛɛ i beleni aa Yaniisi o ka Yambilisi.
55003010	Kɛlɛ Timootii, chaanngi nhu boo ndaa nya nagɔli na bele ngɔ na bou nwa ngaa pele ngaa ningaa i, nya sɔ na bele ngɔ na, nana ngi to ngɔ lii na nwa aa pelendaa, nya laanɛɛ na, nya lii lo na, nya lomayaa na, ka nya londaa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛ nhu.
55003011	Ngaa sɛɛgɛ na ngi hɔlɔ hɔlɔi, ka njɔgɔlɔ na ngi pele peleni. Bi nana gɔɔnaa bɛɛ i bele peleni aa nge mɛɛ Antiɔki o, Aikoniɔmu o, ka Lisitila. Ngaa sɛɛgɛ nwaa luu lua na nana ngi pii piini nwanhu! Kɛlɛ ka Maliki na i nya guaa na ndiiya bɛɛ.
55003012	Awa aa tɔmbaga ngi kɛ aa kɛɛlaa nuu o nuu nana aa gɛ ɔɔ ngebɔyaa hei bele ngi lɛɛhu na, hounwayaa nhu aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi, tɔɔ ala aa sɛɛgɛa.
55003013	Awa nhu nwɛɛ ningaa nyɔu nyɔua i ngoo, houmanhu belaa i ngoo, ti bele nyɔu na ɔɔ gɛ aa nwaa londaa, tɔɔ gɛa aa ningaa aa nɛɛndaa awa ti gbɔha na aa nɛɛ gbɔnhu.
55003014	Kɛlɛ bia bi nhanwa, gɛa gbo tɔmbaga na nhu bi nagɔlia o ka nana bi laanɛɛa la nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kpou. Bi nuu na gɔɔnaa bi maa nagɔli na hɔlɔi ngeya,
55003015	awa bi nda nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa kualaama bi gbɛlɛ ngɔ na nhuɔ, boo Ngebɔ Gbaali na gɔɔ kɔɔngaɔ, nana ku ngɔ aa nhu lo fe biɛɛ nana ngu to ngɔ ndendouyaaa aa laanɛɛ nhu bele Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu.
55003016	Ngebɔ Gbaali na bɛɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ i pui ningaa i nda natiini ti kpaali gbaalii, awa qani tɔ nhu ningaa nagɔlindaa la nhanwa. Aa kɛa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ti gaka na nhanwa taa pele, i tee nhanda na lɔgɔɔu kualaa nana liiya ngaa haa ɔ, i ningaa nagɔli aa nana belendaa tee ngɔ,
55003017	kangaa nuu na nana Ngebɔ nda aa ala i gɛ hitii nhu awa i gɛ nwaa gbatɛi aa ngenge o ngenge belendaa nana kpekpe ngɔ.
55004001	Ngebɔ au bele nhu o ka Yisɔsi Kilaisi au bele nhu, nana ɔɔ kɛndɛ belaa i kɔhɔ ka haa belaa i, awa ala baalaa na nhanwa o ka ngi nwanhayaa na nhanwa o, ngi bi nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ ngaa kɛɛlaa,
55004002	ngoo na gɛa aa ningaa i. Nwaa gbatɛa aa kɛndaa aa tuee aa lɔgɔ o lɔgɔ, i bele ngaa kɛ ndɔgɔ pelena ti kɔɔ, Yɛpɛa tuee nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, ndii gbɛndɛ fea tuɛɛ, gɛa ndii lo mbombou mbaa nhu ti nhanwa awa bi ti nagɔli.
55004003	Lɔgɔ na ɔɔ baa nhuna ningaa taigɔ tɔmbaga nagɔli hou, kɛlɛ tɔɔ hitɛa ti nda ɔi na bou nwa, awa tɔɔ gɛa gbo aa ningaa nagɔli mbelaa gbau kpaundaa tuun ti gbɔha nhanwa, natiini tɔɔ ti nagɔli aa nana gbo ngɔi na tuaa ti mɛi.
55004004	Tɔɔ gɔngaa hea oo nhɛɛndaa tɔmbaga oo na nwa, ti oo nhɛɛ njia ɔha ɔha nwa nana tɔmbaga ai nhu.
55004005	Kɛlɛ bia Timootii, belena aa nuu nana ngaa lo ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛ nhu bɛɛ. Nhuna baa gɛ kpɔu gbɔu liiya, lona nhu nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, awa bi enge na belena ɛɛ Kilaisi oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ mɔɔ, awa bi enge gbɔha na belena ɛɛ Ngebɔ eyaalakpandou.
55004006	Gbaa nya nhanwa, too baa nya gua aa chaaga, awa nya haa lɔgɔ na oo hiti ma.
55004007	Ngoo nya sɔbɛ gbekpe na houa kpaganɛ na nhu, awa ngoo bilanga ma, awa ngai gbelei aa laanɛɛlaa aa ala nhaahaai.
55004008	Awa chaanngi nhu kunjaa logbo nwakɛ ngɔ nyɛɛ. Maa logbo na nwɛ aa niɔu na nana Maliki na ɔɔ ngɔa nya eya teenjaa lɛɛhu nhanwa. Maliki na, nana teenjaa Gɔhɔ mɔɔ na aa ala, ɔɔ ngɔa nya eya aa Foo na ɔɔ ba ma. Awa nya ila ngɔ aile gbo ɔɔ ngɔa ngeyae kɛlɛ ɔɔ ngɔaa boma natiini ngeya bɛɛ taa ala baalaa na nwaa golo ndomayaa nhu.
55004009	Lapia nhaa kangaa bi ba nya le guui nhu.
55004010	Ngelou indinɛi nhu nhanda na nwaa lomayaa na oo pelenga Limɔsi oo gua nya bou nwa, oo ya mɛɛ Tɛsalonaika. Kilɛsɛnisi oo ya boma mɛɛ Galeesia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, awa Taitɔsi pa, oo ya mɛɛ Lalimatia bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
55004011	K`a Luuki ila ngɔ na gbo kele mbe alɛɛ i na tii nya o. Pelena bi ba aa Maaki, gbɛnhaile aa gbɔna nyaa ngenge na nhu.
55004012	Ngoo Tikikɔsi leenga mɛɛ Ɛfisɔsi laa waa na nhu.
55004013	Nhuna baa gɛ bɔɔ ba, bi ba mbɛ aa nya lonwa na nana ngi ndoiɔ aa Kapɔsi mɛɛ Tiloasi laa waa na nhu. Bi ba mbɛ boma aa kɔɔ na siiyaa fee na ngi ndoo looi na.
55004014	Ndakpa na nana aa kɔu nhaanhaa i kpatɛ gbatɛ, napangaa Alɛkisanda kɛɛ nhanda gbaai gbaai bele pelenga aa nge nja lee ngɔ nhu. Kɛlɛ Maliki na ɔɔ ala baabaaa ndi ɔ aa nana lepele i pelenga.
55004015	Bi gbɔha na kpei sogia alaa, gbɛnhaile ala lolo ɔ nja lee ngɔ nhu aa nagɔli na nana maa pele ngaa ningaa i.
55004016	Pɛnhɛɛ ndɔgɔ na ngi yɛpɛiɔ tuee gbɔha guandaa nhanwa ti eya, nuu aile nya bou nwa, tua bɛɛ kati gbeea nyaa. Kangaa Ngebɔ i ndo na tuɛɛ!
55004017	Kɛlɛ Maliki na ee naanɔɔ tii nya o, awa kɛɛ nhu gbɛndɛnjaa hea nyɛɛ, kangaa ngi bila ngaa ngoo na gɛɛ gɛɛndaa, kangaa Kpitia i bɛɛ ti mɛi. Awa kangi belenga aa ndendou kualaa yala na la.
55004018	Maliki na ɔɔ nhanda baanaa nyaa kualaa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu nana nyɔu ɔ, awa ɔɔ lia aa nge ngi aliyana nwanhayaa na la nhanda aigɔ gɛ nyaa. Kangaa mbɛɛ gɛ alaa nhaa guna bɛɛ. Kangaa i bele.
55004019	Ngi fama leeni Pilisilaɛ o, Akuilaɛ o, ka Onɛsifolɔsiɛ o ngi bongaa i ngoo.
55004020	Ka Ilaisitɔsi i loa mɛɛ Kɔlindi laa waa na nhu, awa kangi Tilofimɔsi loa mɛɛ Mailitɔsi, gbɛnhaile ala hegbɛ ɔ.
55004021	Lapia nhaa kangaa bi ba yeingaa nhanwa na i gilaa hiti. Yubulɔsi o, Pulɛnisi o, Lainɔsi o, ka Kilɔlia ti fama leeni biɛɛ, awa nhaa gbɔnhu mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ ti hai wu nwa.
55004022	Maliki na i gɛ na tii wu luu na o. Kangaa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na i gɛ na tii wua bɛɛ.
56001001	Nya nwɛ Pɔɔlu aa nge ngaa enge Ngebɔɛ, awa Yisɔsi Kilaisi lo mɔɔ nwɛ gbɔnhu aa nge. I nya lonia kangaa ngi Ngebɔ nhu ɔhɛ belaa i ti laanɛɛ na li gulɔɔ awa ka tɔmbaga na lɔgɔɔundaa aa tuee nana aa ba kualaa mi laanɛɛ na nhu.
56001002	Ngi indinɛi bele nɛɛnwaa la na nhanwa nana i mi eya wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na nhanwa. Awa Ngebɔ nana ai ndɛɛ gɔɔla ala nwɛ i mi nɛɛnwaa longaɔ aa ndɛɛhu indinɛi sii na yeingaa ngelou na i gilaa lɔɔlo,
56001003	awa oo ndɔgɔɔungaɔ gbɔnhu ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhu lɔgɔ gbekpe na nwa. Awa Ngebɔ mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala, ala nwɛ i maa enge na ɔaa nya eya, awa kɛɛ kɛa aa nge kangaa ngi loi nda.
56001004	Awa Taitɔsi, biee mɛ ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali na bia ni lɔmbaga nhiindou na aa biee laanɛɛ na nhu nana ku ngɔ na mi nhu yɛ. Kangaa Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na awa ka Yisɔsi Kilaisi mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na ti panda bandayaa lɔgɔɔu ngaa biee awa ti maa lɛi ɔa bi eya.
56001005	Baa tɔ ngi bi loi Kiliti, kangaa bi gbɛ o gbɛ na laalaa mba aa ngi bele nana i loi pelendaa nhanwa, taa o taa nhu mbaa waangaa nhu ɔhɛa na ɛɛ gbo ngi kɛi aa biee gɛnhi.
56001006	Nuu waa na kaa bele ngaa nuu nana tɛɛgɛ ai mba hali, ngi nyanha na kaa gɛ ila, awa ngi lengaa i kataa gɛ laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ awa ti nwaanhaa ɛɛ gɛ siai nhu aa kɛɛlaa ti gbonjou ngɔ nhu, awa inaile ti nwaa bɛɛ gbaha mba ɔ.
56001007	Kina laanɛɛ belaa ti nuu waa na ala nwɛ Ngebɔ enge na i laai ngumbaa, faa nwɛɛ tɛɛgɛnwaa ɛɛ gɛ alaa, awa ai aunwaa lɛ, ai bele ngaa ndii gbaai nwɔɔ waa, ai bele ngaa nuu nana aa ndɔɔ waa gbɔɛ, ai bele ngaa kpanaa mɔɔ, awa ai gɔɔli ngaa naho.
56001008	Kɛlɛ k`a nuu gbɔhayaa aa gɛ ala nhu, awa i lo ngaa nana maa nhiɛ ɔ, awa i gbɔha na nwanhu gbee, awa i gɛ leeni, ngebɔyaa i gɛ ala nhu, awa i gbɔha nhu hou.
56001009	Awa kaa ngoo na hou aa loko hee ngɔ nana nuu aa hagba la nhu, awa ka nana i kuun ngɔ nagɔli na nwa nana ti ala nagɔlia la, kangaa i ba ku i ningaa lagbitia nagɔli aa tɔmbaga nagɔli na, awa i ba natiini pu aa tee pele gbɔnhu taa nwaagai tɔmbaga oo na nwa.
56001010	Gbaa maa bɛɛ gbahamba belaa gbinhi gbinhia lɔ na, natiini taa lee ngaa njia yaaiyaai gɛɛ gɛɛ, awa k`ati ningaa nwɔu mɔu, eengaa bɛnhɛ aa inditiini ti manha nhanda i nwaa nhanda i nhu napangaa Yuua i.
56001011	Awa kam~a~a ti laa bɛɛ, gbaa tua taa pele pu nwa i ɔa ɔa pongaa loganhu ndi ɔ aa ti nagɔlindaa aa nana ai hitii nhu taa ningaa nagɔli la, awa ti indinɛi bele kangaa ti qani hɔlɔ nhu.
56001012	-
56001014	Ti ndege Kiliti nwɔɔ ila kee, nana ti eebɔ letua i ngila kee nwɛɔ aa ala, kɛɛ tɔmbaga yia gɛa, ɛgɛ, "Kilitia i ndɛɛ gɔɔla mbelaa nwɛ aa tuee aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ. Awa ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ kpaai nhuaa nyɔu nyɔua, awa ti yaaiyaai ɔ kɛlɛ ti goo gbɔlɔ ɔ mba." Saabu indinɛi nhanwa, yeingaa ti oo nhɛɛ Yuua i ti lua ngɔha na awa taa pii ngɔ na bele, awa ka ningaa gbɔhaa i ti sɔ sɔ na napangaa natiini ti lele ɔ na tɔmbaga naa, yiaa ti nwa pandaa kangaa ti ba laanɛɛ hɔlɔ nana hiti ɔ nhu.
56001015	Gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ chanhai ngɔ natiini ngee ti nɛɛnwaa na chanhai ngɔ na. Kɛlɛ gbɛ o gbɛ ai chanhaini ningaa nyɔu nyɔua i ngee natiini tai laanɛɛi, awa ti nɛɛnwaa na laa fe ngɔ aa nhanda nyɔu awa ka ti lii na nwa.
56001016	Tua tɛɛ ti Ngebɔ gɔɔnaa kɛlɛ ti eyaabele na lɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa tai ala gɔɔ. Ti lolomayaa ɔ awa ti nwaa bɛɛ gbaha mba ɔ, awa tai hitii nhu aa nhanda banda belendaa hali.
56002001	Kɛlɛ bia bi nhanwa, ningaa nagɔlia aa nana mbɛ ngɔ na ma aa tɔmbaga nagɔli na.
56002002	Kɛa aa kɛgɛingaa waa waa i aa kɛɛlaa k`ati aa gɛ loni toke, ti kolo nhanda bele, ti nhu gɛ loni, ti laanɛɛ na i gɛ hitii nhu, ka ti lomayaa na, awa ka wu lii lonjaa na.
56002003	Kɛa aa njiengaa waa waa i gbɔnhu aa kɛɛlaa k`ati eyaabele na aa gɛ nwaa nhiɛi ɛɛ njiengaa natiini ngebɔyaa aa gɛ ti nhu, awa tɛɛ bele ngaa njafa belaa inaile ti bele ngaa nduaa ndɔɔ eya, awa ti ningaa nagɔlia aa nana maa nhiɛ ɔ,
56002004	nyɔugbɛangaa i siandaa nhanwa kangaa ti lo ngaa ti nhiingaa i ka ti lengaa i,
56002005	kangaa ti gɛ kuni aa gbɔha nhu houndaa, ti gɛ chanhaini, awa kangaa ti bele ngaa ngunde pɛlɛ nyanhaa gbekpengaa, awa ti nwaa bɛɛ ti nhiingaa i mbu kangaa nuu ai ba njia nyɔu gɛ aa ngoo na nana i bai kualaa Ngebɔ le.
56002006	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa ndakpangaa i, ati gbɔɔndaa kangaa ti gɛ kuni aa gbɔha nhu houndaa.
56002007	Gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu bɛɛ kabaa bele ngaa kuague aa ngeyaabele maa nhii nhiɛ lɔgɔɔundaa, awa nhuna baa gɛ aa ti nagɔlindaa tɔmbaga lɔgɔɔuna aa tuee ka kolo nhanda.
56002008	Awa bi tɔmbaga yia gɛ nana tɛɛgɛ hɔlɔmaa ai mba, kangaa mi haaleengaa i ti ba lo ngufe nhu, gbɛnhaile gbɛ o gbɛ ai na tɔɔ kɛ nana nyɔu ɔ ngu to ngɔ muaa.
56002009	Kɛa aa nduaa i kangaa ti nwaa bɛɛ ti nwanhu belaa i mbu. Awa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu bɛɛ ti nana belena ɔɔ ti nwanhu belaa i koonhu nɛɛ, awa tɛɛ tonga to loganhu aa tuee.
56002010	Awa tɛɛ nwɔa bele ti eya, kɛlɛ kataa laanɛɛyaa lɔgɔɔu aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, kangaa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu bɛɛ ti ba aa ndaa banda Ngebɔ nagɔli na nwa, Ngebɔ nana mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala.
56002011	Gbaa Ngebɔ oo ngi banda bandayaa na lɔgɔɔunga nana aa ba aa ndendouyaa nuu o nuu nwa.
56002012	Awa panda bandayaa na siina nwɛ aa mi sia kangaa mi lele nanaa bɛɛ ngebɔyaa aile, awa ka ngelou na nhu ɔi na bɛɛ. Awa i mi sia kangaa mi ku ngaa gbɔha nhu houndaa, awa mi teenjaa nhanda bele, awa kangaa mi gɛ ngebɔyaa lɛɛhu nhu ngelou indinɛi nhu,
56002013	nhuna maa nduba Hoo na nwaa golo nana mi nɛɛnwaa la ɔ kulɔɔ, napangaa mi Eebɔ bombou mbaa na bɛɛyaa na lɔgɔɔundaa awa ka mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na, Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
56002014	Ala nwɛ i gbɔha gɔanni mi nhanwa kangaa i mi umbo kualaa mi nhanda nyɔu na nhu bɛɛ, tii mi belendaa nhanwa o aa chanhai mbelaa natiini gbo ala bo mɛɛ aa tuee kpɛti, awa ka pelendaa aa ningaa natiini ngeyaabele kpekpe maa heelaa waa aa gɛ tuaa.
56002015	Indinɛi bɛɛ kɛa aa ningaa i, bi ti lii gbɛndɛ awa bi yia ti nwa aa fɔha waa. Awa nuu ɛɛ lɛgɛ bi nhu.
56003001	Kili hitɛa tuɛɛ kangaa ti gɛ manhangaa i mbu awa ka natiini taa fɔha la, ti nwaa bɛɛ tiu awa ti nwaa gbatɛ ngenge gbekpe pelendaa nhanwa aa pele o pele.
56003002	Awa tɛɛ nuu yia nyɔu gɛ, awa tɛɛ baabaga kɛlɛ ti gɛa lɛii nyɔɔ, awa nuu gbɔhayaa i gɛa ti nhu nuu o nuu nhanwa.
56003003	Gbaa mua lɔgɔ lagbiti ɔɔ mi nwɔu mɔu ngɔɔ. Awa mi nwaa bɛɛ gbaha mba ɔɔ, awa mi gaka ngɔɔ, nduaa nwɛɔ aa muee ngɔi gɛbɛlɛ eya o, ka nɛɛ nɛɛ kɛbɛlɛ. Awa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ mi nɛɛnwaa nyɔu ɔ ka tolo nɛɛnwaa mi ndege ningaa gbɔhaa i fanwa, ningaa lolo ɔɔ aa muee, awa tolomayaa lɔɔ mi gbɔha na loganhu.
56003004	Nhuna Ngebɔ mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na nhanda banda na i lɔgɔɔuni ka ngi lomayaa na,
56003005	kɛɛ ndendouyaa hea muɛɛ, ai beleni k`a nhanda gbekpe na nhaa nwɛɛɔ nana mi pele pelengaɔe kɛlɛ ngi nwaaumayaa na nhaa nwɛɛ i ndendouyaa hea la muɛɛ aa Ngebɔ Yina na nhu bele, nana aa ndenjaa nyiɛ ɔa mi eya o ka ndɛɛhu nyiɛ aa Ngebɔ ua na nhu bele nana maa hɔlɔ.
56003006	Ngebɔ kɛɛ ngi Yina indinɛi yeia mi nwa nana kpinhi ɔ nja lee ngɔ nhu ndi ɔ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na,
56003007	kangaa i ba mi bele ngaa tee mbelaa ala gulɔɔ ndi ɔ aa ngi banda bandayaa na lepele, awa mi ba wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na hɔlɔ nana mi nɛɛnwaa la ɔ nhu.
56003008	Indinɛi tɔmbaga yia nwɛ. Nya lo ngɔ la bi fɔha bu nhanda indinɛi nhu bɛɛ kangaa natiini ti laanɛɛa aa Ngebɔ, ti ba maa lii ɔa goo nhu aa gbɔha na gɔanndaa nhanda banda belendaa nhanwa, nana kpekpe ngɔ awa qani tɔ nhu nuu o nuu nhanwa.
56003009	Nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ a ndaa bɛɛa, napangaa mɔu mɔu ndaanhu lo ngoo, mbembaa ti yia nhu gɔha gɔha o, mbaabaga o, awa ka Sɔ maa baabaga, gbɛnhaile indinɛi bɛɛ qani ngai nhu awa kolo ai nhu.
56003010	Ndoganhubai bai ɔa mɔɔ na nhanwa pa, ina baa ala laanhii naa ila, inaile naa fee, bɛhaa gɛnwayaa aa ala,
56003011	gbaa wua wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nuu indinɛi bonda nuu nyɔu nyɔu nwɛ, awa nhanda nyɔu bele mɔɔ nwɛ, awa oo gbɔha na lɛɛa.
56003012	Nhuna ngɔɔ Atimɔsi lo biee inaile Tikikɔsi, pelena nhaa bi ba nya le bei Nikapolisi, gbaa ngoo ndaalaaa aa kɛɛlaa mɛɛ lɔ ngɔɔ nhanwa hei bele na.
56003013	Pelena nhaa bi gbɔ Sinasia Sɔ mɔɔ waa na, ka Apɔlɔsi ti sia na nhu, kangaa nhanda ɛɛ gɛ na nana ngi baa ngaa ɔa ti nwa.
56003014	Mi ungaa i nagɔlia aa kɛɛlaa ti gɛ aa nhanda banda belendaa kpɔndaa nhanwa mbaa mbelaa i mba, awa tɛɛ bele ngaa kua fuu mbelaa.
56003015	Inditiini bɛɛ ni bei ngilamaaa ti fama leeni biɛɛ. Bi ha nuɛɛ natiini ma ti lo ngɔ na aa nuee laanɛɛ na nhu. Kangaa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na i gɛ wu nwa bɛɛ.
57001001	Nya nwɛ Pɔɔlu aa nge ngi kpindi bɛlɛ nau ndi ɔ aa nana nhanwa ngi pele ngɔ Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhanwa. Failimɔni biee mɛ ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali na bia baa enge tii nua o kangaa ningaa ti Kilaisi gɔɔ.
