Awa Timootii, nana gbɔnhu ala laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi kɛɛ gulaa nya nwa aa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaalindaa nhanwa biee.
57001002	Bi lee nwɛɛ bi ha mbɛ laanɛɛ belaa i ma taa gɔɛ bi bɛlɛ nau. Awa bi ha Aafia nwa mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na, ka Aachipusu nana aa yɔgɔlɔ nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ tii mua o kangaa ningaa ti Kilaisi gɔɔ.
57001003	Kangaa Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na ka Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti panda bandayaa bele ngaa wuee awa ti maa lɛi ɔaa wu eya.
57001004	Failimɔni, aa gbele o gbele ngaa gɛ aa laaminɛlaa k`angi laaminɛ bi nhanwa, awa k`angi fiɛ gua Ngebɔ nwa bi nhanwa.
57001005	gbɛnhaile ngoo mɛinga aa kɛɛlaa bi lo ngɔ aa laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ, awa bi laanɛɛ ɔ aa Maliki na Yisɔsi.
57001006	Nya laaminɛ na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa ni hounwayaa na mi wua o ɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa, maa hounwayaa na siina ɔɔ baa aa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ bombou mbaa nduba na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nhanwa nana i mi eya mi lɛɛhu na nhu mi hounwayaa na nhu mii Yisɔsi Kilaisi o.
57001007	Ngoo koonhu nɛɛ bombou mbaa hɔlɔa gbɛnhaile bi lo ngɔ aa bi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i, awa na oo nya lii gbɛndɛnga. Nya ndege laanɛɛwɔɔ, boo pelenga laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ ti goonhu nɛɛ.
57001008	Saabu indinɛi nhanwa, fɔha na lɔ nyaa ngaa njia nhu gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ kɛ aa biee kangaa bi nana bele nhɔ pelendaa ee bi eya, gbaa ni ndege nwɛ aa biee Kilaisi nhanwa kɛlɛ ngaigɔ pele.
57001009	Kina nya lo ngɔ aa biee faa nwɛɛ ngaa nɛɛnwaa nhaa gɔɔ bele pa, nya nwɛ Pɔɔlu aa nge ngaa sia aa ngoo na Yisɔsi nhanwa, awa chaanngi nyaa gbɔnhu kpindi bɛlɛu ala nhanwa.
57001010	Bi lee nwɛɛ ngi gula bi ɔgɔu Onɛismɔsi nhanwa nana i belenga ɛɛ nya lou gbɛnhaile ngoo pelenga i Yisɔsi gɔɔ, awa ngoo belenga tɔ ɛɛ ngi kɛɛgɛ bei kpindi bɛlɛ nau.
57001011	Lɔgɔ lagbiti kolo nwɔɔ aileɔ aa ala biee kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu kolo nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala.
57001012	Ngoo ba ngaa pele i bɛɛla biee boma. Pele ngɔ ɛɛ nya lii na nwɛ ngaa tee biee
57001013	ɛɛ ngi kpindi bɛlɛ nau Ngebɔ oo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nhanwa, ngɔi ee nyaaɔ kangaa i lo nyaa le aa bi boto nda kpɔndaa nhanwa nyaa.
57001014	Ngai loni la bi gbɔ nyaa gbaa ngoo kɛa aa biee aa kɛɛlaa kabaa gbɔ nyaa, kɛlɛ i belena aa kɛɛlaa ngɔi ee biaaɔ bi pele. Faa nwɛɛ ngaigɔ gbɛ o gbɛ bele k~a bia nwɛ baa kuun ma.
57001015	Naangaa indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ Onɛsimɔsi i guaiɔ bi nwa lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa kangaa i ba bɛɛla boma biee i gɛ na aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ.
57001016	Gbaa chaanngi nhu ndua aile gbo aa ala kɛlɛ kolo ɔ lee ngɔ nduaa. Bi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na nwɛ. Nya lo ngɔ aa ala kpɔ. Kɛlɛ bɔɔ gɛa loni aa ala tee ngɔ nyaa gbɛnhaile bi lua nwɛ aa ala awa bi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ nwɛ aa Maliki na.
57001017	Ina baa nɛgili aa nge ɛɛ nuu nana waa enge nwa ngilamaaa Maliki na nhanwa, gɛa ma bi bɛlɛ i lɔ ɛɛ baa kɛ ɔ aa nge.
57001018	Ina aa bele ngaa oo nhanda nyɔu belenga aa biee inaile pa oo kue houa bi nwa, maa nhanda laa nya umbaa.
57001019	Nya Pɔɔlu aa nge, ngi indinɛi gbaali aa nya guegue ɔgɔ na aa kɛɛlaa ngɔɔ bi baabaaa. Ngai loni la nhɔ ngi kili hitɛ biɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa nya gue lɔ biaa ndɛɛhu nyiɛ na nhanwa bi hɔlɔa Kilaisi nhu.
57001020	Bi lee nwɛɛ Failimɔni gbɔna nyaa aa pele indinɛi Maliki na lɔgɔ fanwa. Koonhu nɛɛ hea mbɛ ɛɛ bi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ.
57001021	Ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi ngi baa tee, nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa bɔɔ nana belenaa ngi bi nwɔɔlini la pelendaa nhanwa. Ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa bɔɔ pelenaa tee gɔ nanaa ngi bi nwɔɔlini la pelendaa nhanwa nyɛɛ.
57001022	Nhanda ila gbɔnhu, kungu nhu gbatɛa nyɛɛ tolou mɛɛ ngaa ba ngaa yigiyaa na, gbɛnhaile nya nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ nana belenaa wuɛɛ bɛɛ waa laaminɛ ala le fanwa, awa ɔɔ pelenaa kangaa ngi bɛɛla wuee boma.
57001023	Awa Ɛpafilɔsi, nana ni kpindi bɛlɛ nau ngilamaaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhanwa i hai bi nwa.
57001024	Maaki o, Alisitakɔsi o, Lɛmaasi o, ka Luuki ti fama leeni biɛɛ. Tua, nua nwɛ naa enge ngilamaa.
57001025	Kangaa Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi i panda bandayaa bele ngaa wuee.
58001001	Pɛnhɛɛ pɛnhɛɛ yamana na nhuɔ, Ngebɔ kɛɛ yɛpɛa mi bembaa i ngee aa ngi letua i nhu bele, aa pele gɛbɛlɛ gbinhi gbinhi,
58001002	kɛlɛ gbele mba yamana indinɛi nhu, oo yɛpɛ muee aa ngi Lou na nhu bele. Ala nhu bele nwɛɛ Ngebɔ i ngelou na gbatɛi la, awa ala nwɛ Ngebɔ i ala nhu ɔhɛa kangaa gbɛ o gbɛ na i bele ngaa ala bo.
58001003	Kɛɛ huo yain ɛɛ Ngebɔ aa huo yain, awa ala bele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ Ngebɔ gbɔha na aa pele o pele. Alaa ngelou gbɔha na hou ngɔ aa fɔha na nana i ngi oo na nhu aa kɛ, awa nhuna i ningaa i chanhaini aa ti nhanda nyɔu na londaa na nhanwa tuɛɛ, nhu nwɛɛ i heii Lamanhu Eebɔ na ɛha loko na nhu gaka.
58001004	Ngebɔ kɛɛ pelenga ngi Lou na i belenga aa nuu bombou mbaa tee ngɔ malekaa i mba, ɛɛ gbo ndaa na i ngeya taa ui mba aa "Ngebɔ Lou" kolo lɔ nhu tee ngɔ ndaa naa taa ui mba aa "malekaa."
58001005	Gbaa Ngebɔ ai lɛ gɛiɔ maleka nwa, "Nya Lou nwɛ aa biee. Haai ngoo belenga aa bi Kɛɛgɛ." Inaile Ngebɔ ai lɛ gɛiɔ maleka nhanwa, "Ngɔɔ belenaa aa ngi Kɛɛgɛ, awa ala ɔɔ belenaa aa nya Lou."
58001006	Kɛlɛ nhuna Ngebɔ i gɛi ɔɔ ngi Nhu Ɔhɛ Lou na lee ngelou na nhu, kɛɛ gɛa, "Ngebɔ nwalekaa i bɛɛ kataa ala batou."
58001007	Kɛlɛ malekaa i fanwa kɛɛ gɛa, "Ngebɔ kɛɛ malekaa i kpatɛa kangaa ti bele ɛɛ fɛfɛ, awa kɛɛ ngi eyaalakpangaa i kpatɛa kangaa ti bele ɛɛ ngɔmbu le."
58001008	Kɛlɛ indinɛi nwɛ Ngebɔ i kɛi ngi Lou na nhanwa, "Oo Ngebɔ, bi nwanhayaa na ɔɔ gɛa na nhaa guna bɛɛ! Bɔɔ siaa aa bi nwanhayaa na aa tee pele na."
58001009	Bi lo ngɔ aa nana tee ngɔ, awa bi lolo ɔ aa nana ngaa haa ɔ. Na nhaa nwɛɛe Ngebɔ, bi Eebɔ na, oo bi nhu ɔhɛa kangaa bi mbombounjaa hɔlɔ ka koonhu nɛɛ nana tee ngɔ bi ndege lengaa i mba."
58001010	Kɛɛ gɛa boma, "Maliki, bia, gbɛ o gbɛ na lɔɔlomaa na kabi pɔlɔgɔɔ na gbatɛa, awa kabi feenaa heenaa na gbatɛ gbatɛa aa bi guegue loko na.
58001011	Tua tɔɔ loa nhu, kɛlɛ bia baigɔ lo nhu. Tɔɔ uaa ɛɛ kɔla ɔha.
58001012	Bɔɔ ti laa bɛɛ bɛɛa mba ɛɛ taa laangɔnɛ gɔla laa bɛɛ bɛɛ mba. Awa taigɔ lo bele ngɔ nhu. Kɛlɛ bia bɔɔ gɛa bele ngɔ nhu. Bi lɛɛhu na kpelenwaa ai mba."
58001013	Ngebɔ ai gɛi bɛnhɛ maleka nwa, "Heia bei nya ɛha loko na nhu gaka nhaa ngi pele bi haaleengaa i ti gɛ bi ɔgɔsambala nau."
58001014	K`a gbɛɛ nha tɔ aa malekaa i? Yina eyaalakpangaa nwɛ aa tuee natiini taa enge Ngebɔɛ. Awa tua nwɛ Ngebɔ aa ti lo to kangaa ti li ti gbɔ natiini mba ndendouyaa hɔlɔndaa i ti eya.
58002001	Faa nwɛɛe tɔmbaga oo na nana mi mɛinga kam~a~a hou aa loko hee ngɔ, ina na aile, mɔɔ nɔa nɔa ma.
58002002	Gbaa ina ngoo na nana Ngebɔ i kɛi aa mi bembaa i aa malekaa i nhu bele, ngoo na siina moo maaia aa kɛɛlaa tɔmbaga ɔɔ, awa nuu o nuu nana ai hitɛi pou nwaɔ aa ngi bele ngeyaabele nhu, inaile ai nwaa bɛɛi mbuɔ, ka Ngebɔ i ngaa teengaa gbɔɔni na belenga aa ala,
58002003	k`a mua mɔɔ gee kpɔɔni nwaa hakpa ina mai kuunni ndendouyaa bombou ngindinɛi nwa? Maliki na gbɔha na nwɛ pɛnhɛɛ i ndendouyaa indinɛi nwaa yia gɛi, awa natiini ti mɛini i kɛi too ndɔgɔɔunga aa muee aa kɛɛlaa tɔmbaga nwɛɛ.
58002004	Awa ka Ngebɔ i ngi nda seeliyaa na lɔgɔɔunga nhanda ila ngindinɛi nhu aa kuague nhanda bele pelendaa o, kaila nhanda o, kamaa nhanda gɛbɛlɛ o, ka fembɛ hembɛ na nana Ngebɔ Yina na aa fe ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na lepele.
58002005	Ngebɔ ai malekaa i peleni aa manhangaa ngelou nyiɛ na nhanwae nana i baa paa nwa, napangaa nana maa maa yia gɛ.
58002006	Kɛlɛ kpaali ngɔ nhinde Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu gɛnhi, "Ngebɔ, gbɛɛ aa nuu gbɔha, nana baa nɛgili fanwa, inaile gbɛɛ aa ala aa kɛɛlaa kabaa gɛ ngi sago nhu?
58002007	Lɔgɔ lɛingaa nhanwa, kabi pelenga ngi lomaa na ai hitii malekaa i ti nda na nwa. Awa nhu nwɛɛ bi ngi lomaa na lɛi nga kangaa i bele ngaa mbɛɛ mba nwɔɔ bombou mbaa,
58002008	awa boo ala belenga aa manha gbɛ o gbɛ na nwanhu bɛɛ." Nhuna Ngebɔ i ala beleni aa manha gbɛ o gbɛ na nwanhu, gbɛ o gbɛ ai na i loi nana ai ngɔai ngeya. Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu mua mai tɔ ma aa kɛɛlaa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ alaa alau.
58002009	Kɛlɛ k`ami Yisɔsi lɔ. Lɔgɔ lɛingaa nhanwa, ka Ngebɔ i pelenga ngi lomaa na ai hitii malekaa i ti nda lomaa na nwa, kangaae aa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na nhu bele, kaa haa ningaa i lɔgɔ fanwa bɛɛ. Awa njɔgɔlɔ na nhanwa i peleni ka haa na i peleni, indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ i tomaa ɔai ala eya nana mbɛɛ bombou mbaa i mba.
58002010	Ngebɔ i gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛia ala gbɔha na nhanwa, awa ala le mɛ gbɛ o gbɛ na aa gua na. Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa tee ngɔ Ngebɔ nhanwa aa Yisɔsi belendaa aa nuu nana hiti ɔ nhu, ndi ɔ aa njɔgɔlɔ na nhu bele nana Yisɔsi i peleni, kangaae ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti ba bele ngaa ngi lengaa, awa ti ba ɔa ngi bɛɛyaa na nhu nana mbombou ngɔ. Gbaa Yisɔsi nwɛ aa lo ti gulɔɔ, awa ala nwɛ aa pele taa ndendouyaa hɔlɔ.
58002011	Gbaa Yisɔsi nana aa ningaa chanhai kualaa ti nhanda nyɔu na nhu, ala o ka natiini aa ti chanhai, tua nwɛ bɛɛ Kɛɛgɛ ila na i ti eya. Na nhaa nwɛɛ Yisɔsi ai ufe ngaa nguindaa tuaa aa ngi ndegea.
58002012	Kɛɛ gɛa Ngebɔ nwa, "Ngɔɔ bi laa banda gɛa aa nya ndegea i. Ngɔɔ bi bihɛ ngue aainaa ti liiya nhuna taa gɛ batou ngaa lɔgɔ na nhu."
58002013	Kɛɛ gɛa gbɔnhu, "Ngɔɔ hagba laa Ngebɔ nhu." Awa kɛɛ gɛa boma, "Nya nwɛ aa indinɛi nii ndengaa i ngoo natiini Ngebɔ i ti ɔaa nya eya."
58002014	Kina Ngebɔ lengaa i bɛɛ ndugu lɔ ti nwa awa qanwa lɔ ti nhu, faa nwɛɛ Yisɔsi gbɔha na i beleni ɛɛ tua, kangaa i haa, awa ngi haa na nhu, i ba ku i Ngafɔ mbaa na nyaai, nana fɔha na ngeya haa na nwanhu.
58002015	Aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, kɛɛ nhanda baanga natiini mba nduaa i ngaa tueeɔ ti lɛɛhu gbɔha na nhu bɛɛ, gbɛnhaile ti lua ɔ haa naa.
58002016	Gbaa mi nhu kɔɔnaa tɔ chanhai aa kɛɛlaa malekaa i ngaile aa kpɔ mba bele ngaa tuee, kɛlɛ Eebilahamu goo na nhu lengaa i mɛ aa kpɔ mba bele ngaa tuee.
58002017	Awa faa nwɛɛe kaa bele ɛɛ ngi ndegea i aa pele o pele, kangaa i bele ngaa Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa nana maaumayaa ɔ awa i bele ngaa nuu nana hiti ɔ nhu ningaa taa laanɛɛ la Ngebɔ enge na nhu, kangaa Ngebɔ i ba ningaa i ti nhanda nyɔu na lo na tuɛɛ.
58002018	Gbaa kina ala gbɔha na kɛɛ yɔgɔlɔa nhuna nhua ngi ala nwaaleii, aa kunaa i gbɔ natiini mba nhua ngaa ti nwaai.
58003001	Wua nya ndege laanɛɛ belaa i nga wuee, Ngebɔ i wu belenga aa ngi ndaa, a Yisɔsi gbauna aa kɛɛlaa ala nwɛ To mɔɔ na aa ala ka Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na mi laanɛɛ na nhanwa mi pou.
58003002	Ala laanɛɛyaa ɔɔ Ngebɔ gulɔɔ nana i ala nhu ɔhɛi ngi enge na belendaa nhanwa, ɛɛ gbo Moosisi laanɛɛyaa ɔ naɔ Ngebɔ gulɔɔ, nhuna ee ngi enge na bele Ngebɔ ndaa i nhu.
58003003	Mbɛɛ bombou mbaa lɔ Yisɔsia tee ngɔ Moosisia, ɛɛ gbo mbɛɛ na i pɛlɛ lo mɔɔ naa tee ngɔ pɛlɛ na gbɔha naa.
58003004	Gbaa pɛlɛ o pɛlɛ nuu nwɛɛ aa to, kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa gbɛ o gbɛ na lo to ala nwɛ aa Ngebɔ.
58003005	Chaanngi nhu Moosisi ala laanɛɛyaa ɔɔ Ngebɔ le nhuna i ngi enge na beleni Ngebɔ bɛlɛ gbɔha nau ɛɛ ngeyaalakpandou, awa kɛɛ yɛpɛa nhanda na nhanwa nana kɛndaa ee Ngebɔ eya guna nhanwa.
58003006	Kɛlɛ Kilaisi ala laanɛɛyaa ɔɔ Ngebɔ gulɔɔ ɛɛ gbo Ndou na, nana i Ngebɔ bɛlɛ na nwanhu. Mua nwɛ Ngebɔ bɛlɛ na aa muee ina maa lii gbɛndɛ kpou, awa mi hagba la nana nhu mi nɛɛnwaa la ɔ nhu nhaa kpelenwaa na i hiti.
58003007	Faa nwɛɛe ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Yina na aa gɛ, "Ina waa ala oo na nwɛi haai,
58003008	awɛɛ bele ngaa tihi lihi belaa ɛɛ wu bembaa i ti peleniɔ nhuna ti lelei aa nwaa bɛɛlaa Ngebɔu, nhuna ti nya nhuani mɛɛ tombo na nhu.
58003009	Naa nwɛɛ wu bembaa i ti lapii na nya nwa aa nya nhuandaa, awa kati nya enge na lɔa nana ngi peleni fogo buu buu naai fanwa.
58003010	Faa nwɛɛe kangi gbaaia maa ningaa i ma, awa kangi gɛa, 'K`ati gaka ti lii na nwa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, awa ti lele ɔ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa nya oo nau.'
58003011	Awae kina kangi gbaaia, faa nwɛɛɔ ngi kɔa beleni ti nhanwa, 'Taigɔ ɔa mɛɛ ngi ba naa ɔa ti eya ndɛɛhulaa na nhanwa!' "
58003012	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, a sogia kangaa nuu ɛɛ gɛ wu liiya nana ngi nhanda sukulu ngɔ nja lee ngɔnhu nhaa ai laanɛɛ gbɔnhu aa Ngebɔ, nana aa pele aa bote kualaa kɛndɛ Eebɔ na eya.
58003013	Kɛlɛ nana pelendaa i wu eya ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. Pelendaa kangaa nhanda nyɔu ɛɛ wu ila kee gaka awa ai ba pele aa lihi lihi, kawaa gɛ aa kpɔ kpɔndaa nwa aa foo o foo, ina gbo tɔ ndaa na taa ui mba aa "Haai" nana i Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu mi nhaa nwɛɛ.
58003014	Gbaa mua moo belenga aa nhanda ilangaa mii Kilaisi o ina mai gbelei aa hagba landaa mi laanɛɛ na nhu nana i mi eyaɔ kualaa tɔɔlomaa naɔ.
58003015	Indinɛi nwɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Ina waa ala oo na nwɛi haai, awɛɛ bele ngaa tihi lihi belaa ɛɛ wu bembaa i ti peleniɔ nhuna ti lelei aa nwaa bɛɛlaa Ngebɔu."
58003016	Elei mɛ aa ningaa i natiini ti Ngebɔ oo na nwɛiniɔ kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ kati lelea aa nwaa bɛɛlaa alau? Tua nwɛɔ aa ningaa i bɛɛ natiini Moosisi i hitɛiɔ ti gulɔɔ kualaa Iyibiti bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
58003017	Awa elei mɛɔ i gbaalɛii ti nwa fogo buu buu naai na nhanwa? Tua nwɛɔ aa ningaa i natiini ti nhanda nyɔu beleniɔ, napangaa natiini ti haai mɛɛ tombo na nhu.
58003018	Awa elei mɛɔ i kɔa na beleni ti nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa taigɔ ɔa mɛɛ i ba naa ɔa ti eya ndɛɛhulaa na nhanwa? Tua nwɛɔ aa natiini tai nwaa bɛɛi ngi oo nau.
58003019	Awae moo tɔa aa kɛɛlaa tai ɔaiɔ maa lɛɛhu nhinde na gbɛnhaile tai laanɛɛi.
58004001	Awae kina nɛɛnwaa lo na nana Ngebɔ i fei muɛɛ ndɛɛhu nhinde na nhanwa, maa nɛɛnwaa lo na lɔ nhu lɛ laai, faa nwɛɛe ami sogia kangaa nuu ɛɛ gɛ wu liiya nana ɔɔ gbaha aa ngɔalaa maa nɛɛnwaa lo nhinde na.
58004002	Gbaa aa tɔmbaga too ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛa aa muee ɛɛ gbo ti kɛiɔ gbɔnhu aa tuee, kɛlɛ tai maa qani hɔlɔi gbɛnhaile, nhuna ti mɛini tai kuunni ma aa laanɛɛ.
58004003	Gbaa mua na mi laanɛɛa, mɔɔ ɔaa maa lɛɛhu nhinde na. Ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i gɛa, "Ɛɛ gbo ngi kɔa na beleni nhuna nya gbaai ɔ naɔ, 'Taigɔ ɔa mɛɛ ngi ba na ɔa ti eya ndɛɛhulaa na nhanwa!' " I indinɛi gɛia hali nha ngi enge na aa lo ɔɔ tɔ nana ee pele ngɔɔ kualaa lɔgɔ na i ngelou na gbatɛiɔ.
58004004	Gbaa nhinde lagbiti Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu, kati njia indinɛi gbaalia na ngu to ngɔ foo na ngɔfɛla naa, "Awa ka Ngebɔ i lɛɛhua foo na ngɔfɛla na nwa, nhuna i bilani aa ngi enge na belendaa bɛɛ."
58004005	Awa kɔɔ indinɛi nhu napangaa kpapi indinɛi nhu ngaa naa gala, oo gɛ na gbɔnhu, "Taigɔ ɔa mɛɛ ngi ba naa ɔa ti eya ndɛɛhulaa na nhanwa.
58004006	Natiini ti nhumbuiɔ pɛnhɛɛ aa Ngoo nwaa Nhii Nhiɛ na nwɛi tai ndɛɛhu nhinde nana hɔlɔi gbɛnhaile tai laanɛɛi. Awa lɛingaa lɔ na bɛnhɛ natiini fɛɛlɛ he ngɔ tuɛɛ aa naa hɔlɔndaa.
58004007	Faa nwɛɛe Ngebɔ oo foo lagbiti nhu ɔhɛa taa ui mba aa "Haai." Nhuna mi bembaa i tai ɔai ndɛɛhu nhindɛ na, fogo gbinhi gbinhi i leeni naa bou nwa, ka Ngebɔ i njia gɛa aa Leebili nhu bele aa pele ngɔ indinɛi i kpaalia la gɛnhi, "Ina waa ala oo na nwɛi haai, awɛɛ bele ngaa tihi lihi belaa."
58004008	Gbaa ina i beleniaɔ aa kɛɛlaa k`a Yɔsua i hitɛiaɔ ti gulɔɔ ndiilaa nhanwa ndɛɛhu nhinde na, Ngebɔ ai ba yiaɔ gbɔnhu ngu to ngɔ foo lagbitia nana paalaa i na.
58004009	Indinɛi lɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ aa muee aa kɛɛlaa fɛɛlɛ lɔ na tuun Ngebɔ ndaa i fanwa aa kɛɛlaa kataa lɛɛhu, ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i lɛɛhuiɔ foo na nwa nana hiti ɔ naɔ ngɔfɛla na nhu.
58004010	Gbaa nuu na bɛɛ nana aa ɔa mɛɛ Ngebɔ aa lɛɛhu na, ala bɛnhɛ gbɔnhu oo lɛɛhua kualaa ngi nda enge enge na nhu, ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i lɛɛhui kualaa ngi nda enge enge na nhu.
58004011	Faa nwɛɛe mua mi nhanwa, ami lapia nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kangaa mi ɔa ndɛɛhu nhinde na, kangaa nuu ɛɛ gɛ mi liiya nana aigɔ ɔa na gbɛnhaile ai nwaa bɛɛi ɛɛ mi bembaa i tai nwaa bɛɛiɔ.
58004012	Mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ oo na kɛndɛ ɔ awa fɔha lɔ nhu. Ngaa lii ɔ tee ngɔ ngaa fee mbogaa. Ku ngɔ aa ndoganhu bai gbatɛ nuu na lɛɛhu na loganhu o ka maa nwɔɔ na luu na, ku ngɔ aa ndoganhu bai gbatɛ nuu na gaai na loganhu o ka nguu ngua na nana aa gɛ maa gaai na nhu, awa ku ngɔ boma aa nana gɔhɔ ningaa taa nɛgili ma o ka nana taa kuku ma nɛɛnwaa nhu.
58004013	Gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu bɛɛ nana Ngebɔ i kpatɛi, gbɛ o gbɛ ai na nana ndɔɔgu ɔ Ngebɔa. Gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ kua ɔ kpou awa alaa laai kɛɛ tɔ. Awa ala le mɛ mɔɔ kɔan kula na mi gbɔha na nhanwa.
58004014	Mi laanɛɛ na nana mi pou nwa, ami houa aa loko hee ngɔ. Gbaa Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa bombou mbaa lɔ mi eya nana i ya Ngebɔ au bele na nhu gbɔha na, napangaa Yisɔsi nana Ngebɔ Lou na aa ala.
58004015	Mi Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na nuu nwɛɛ nana aa naa lɔ mi nhanwa nhuna mi gaanhu aa gɛ haai. Gbaa ka nhua ngi ala nwaaia aa pele o pele ɛɛ gbo aa mi nwaai, kɛlɛ ai nhanda nyɔu beleni hali.
58004016	Awa faa nwɛɛe ami lii gbɛndɛna, awa ami kpɛɛa Ngebɔ nwanhayaa gbakaa na gbɛlaa, gbaa naa nwɛɛ panda bandayaa i na, awa naa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ ɔɔ maaumayaa lɔgɔɔu na aa muee ka panda bandayaa, kangaa i gbɔ muaa nhuna maa gɛ kaande nhanda nhu.
58005001	Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa waa waa i ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nana Ngebɔ i nhu ɔhɛa kualaa ningaa gbɔhaa liiya, i nhu ɔhɛia kangaa i bele ngaa ti guanguma nwɔɔ ngengelaa nhanwa Ngebɔɛ ningaa i lɔgɔ fanwa, napangaa paalaa aa fembɛ hembɛ o ka chaaga guu guandaa Ngebɔ le ningaa i ti nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa ti pelengaɔ.
58005002	Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ waa bonda ɛɛ indinɛi ku ngɔ aa lii lo ngaa ningaa i taa gaka, gbɛnhaile ala gbɔha na gbɔnhu k`ɛɛ nhanda nyɔu bele pele.
58005003	Awa kina ala gbɔha na ala gaanhu haa ɔ aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, indinɛi nhanwae kaa chaaga gua ngi nda nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa nana i pele pelenga ɛɛ gbo aa kua ningaa i fanwa.
58005004	Nuu ai mbɛɛ nana nhu ɔhɛ gbɔha nhanwa, napangaa gbɔha belendaa aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ waa. Kɛlɛ k`a Ngebɔ ui na ila ngɔ na gbo alɛɛ aa nuu bele nda, ɛɛ gbo i Eelɔni beleni laɔ.
58005005	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, Kilaisi ai mbɛɛ nana nhu ɔhɛi gbɔha nhanwa aa gbɔha belendaa aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ waa, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nwɛ i ala nhu ɔhɛi, napangaa Ngebɔ na nana i gɛi, "Nya Lou na nwɛ aa biee. Haai ngoo belenga aa bi Kɛɛgɛ.'
58005006	Ɛɛ i kɛi gbo gbɔnhu kpapi lagbiti nhu kɔɔ indinɛi nhu, "Bɔɔ belenaa aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ, ɛɛ gbo Mɛlikisilɛki ee naɔ."
58005007	Nhuna Yisɔsi ee ngelou nhuɔ, kɛɛ labia aa ngɔɔ awa kɛɛ ngaai bua nhuna ee laaminɛ Ngebɔ le nana i kuni i ala guai haa na nhu. Ka Ngebɔ i ala oo nwɛinga gbɛnhaile alaa mbɛɛ gɛ ngɔɔ Ngebɔa.
58005008	Haliɔ Ngebɔ Lou nwɛ aa ala, kɛɛ maa bɛɛyaa goonhu gɔɔnga aa njɔgɔlɔ na nhu bele nana i yɔgɔlɔi la.
58005009	Nhuna Ngebɔ i bilani aa ngenge indinɛi ala nhu, kɛɛ belenga aa nuu na nana aa wɔwɔwɔ ndendouyaa he ningaaɛ bɛɛ natiini taa nwaa bɛɛ alau,
58005010	awa ka Ngebɔ i ala belenga aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ waa ɛɛ gbo Mɛlikisilɛki ee naɔ.
58005011	Nhanda gbinhi gbinhi lɔ ni eya kɛndaa nhanwa ngu to ngɔ nanaa ngi bilani aa kɛndaa chaanngi, kɛlɛ ngambondaa gbɛndɛ ngɔ, gbɛnhaile wu nɛɛnwaa haa ɔ.
58005012	Lɔgɔ bele ngɔ ɛɛ indinɛi kawaa gɛ kuni wu ningaa lagbitia nagɔli, kɛlɛ nhaahaai, wu lo ngɔ la kangaa ningaa ti wu nagɔli gbɔnhu aa Ngebɔ oo na kualaa tɔɔlomaa na gbɔha na. Awa wua waa nyii gbɔɛ lɛ tuun ɛɛ ndengaa lalaa kɛlɛ wai bakalangaa ti nwɛnhɛi nwɛ ma.
58005013	Gbaa nuu na bɛɛ nana aa nyii gbɔɛ lɛ maa nwɔɔ na ndou lala nwɛ aa ala. Maa nwɔɔ nana bonda ai bɛɛlii aa nana nhu ɔhɛ tee ngɔ Ngebɔ gulɔɔ.
58005014	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa mɛnhɛi gaai gaai nwɛ bakala mɛ aa ala, awa nuu nwɛɛ nana i nhanda loganhu gɔɔ ngɔ, kangaae i bɛɛi aa nana nhu ɔhɛndaa kpekpe ngɔ tii nana o nyɔu ɔ.
58006001	Faa nwɛɛe kam~a~a bou he pɛnhɛɛ nagɔli naaɔ Yisɔsi nhanwa, kangaa mi ba li gulɔɔ aa nagɔli na nana kpɛndɛ ngɔ na ala nhanwa. Amɛɛ bɛɛla gbɔnhu tɔɔlomaa na njɛpɛlaa nhanwa gbo kpɛti potendaa nhanwa kualaa nhanda nyɔu nhu o ka njɛpɛlaa laanɛɛlaa nhanwa aa Ngebɔ.
58006002	Amɛɛ bɛɛla gbɔnhu nagɔli na le nana i na Ngebɔ ua bele pelendaa nhanwa o, ɔgɔ bɛɛ bɛɛndaa ningaa umbaa o, ningaa huulaa nhanwa haa nhu o, ka wɔwɔwɔ kɔhɔ pelendaa o aa ningaa.
58006003	Ami lia gulɔɔ ina Ngebɔ aa kuun.
58006004	Saabu na mɔɔ li gulɔɔ ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. Ina natiini ti Ngebɔ lɔmbaga na gɔɔnga taa gbe maa lɔmbaga naa, pele o pele ai na nuu aa ku aa ti nɛɛnwaa na bote boma tɔmbaga na siina le gbɔnhu. Nya ngaa yɛpɛ ningaa nhanwa natiini ti longaɔ waun na nhu nana aa sege Ngebɔ le, natiini ti fembɛ na gɔɔnga nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, too ti nda gbapi hɔlɔaɔ Ngebɔ Yina naa,
58006005	too kɔɔnga kualaa nhanda nhanda na nhu nana i bele pelenga aa tuee aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ oo na kpekpe ngɔ, awa too fɔha na gɔɔnga nana aa ba kualaa yamana lagbiti na le nana ɔɔ ba.
58006006	Ina natiini ti indinɛi gɔɔngaɔ bɛɛ, too bou he Ngebɔa, maa bele ai na gbɔnhu nana ɔɔ pele ti bɛ, gbɛnhaile ti gbɔha na nwɛ kpei ti Ngebɔ Lou na gbakpani kpekpa ngulu naa gbɔnhu, awa k`ati ala aa ufe gbɔnhu kpou.
58006007	Pɔlɔgɔɔ na nwɛ aa indinɛi nana Ngebɔ aa nduba. Pɔlɔgɔɔ na nana aa nja na gbɔɛ nana aa wa ma, awa nana aa pele nhii nhiinhaanhaa i taa gbɛa maa nhiɛ ɔ ningaa i fanwa natiini ti nhiini tuɛɛ.
58006008	Kɛlɛ ina ngai ngai ngoo, nguu o, aa gɛ aa faailaa ma, tɔɔ kpaunaa aa kuafuu pɔlɔgɔɔ, awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ taangaaa. Ngaa guanwaa na, tɔɔ mɔnaa aa ngɔmbu.
58006009	Nya gɛnwa belaa, hali nha ni yɛpɛ aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, ni nhu kɔɔnaa tɔmbaga nhu aa kɛɛlaa wua wu gbɔha na wɔɔ hitɛa pele gbekpe na bou nwa, kangaa wu ba ndendouyaa hɔlɔ.
58006010	Ngebɔ i tee nhanda bele. Wu enge na wu pelenga o ka ndomayaa na wu ndɔgɔɔuni ala nhanwa kili aigɔ nɔa alɛɛ. Wu ndɔgɔɔunia aa kpɔndaa Ngebɔ ndaa i mba, awa wua waa gbɔ tuaa tuun.
58006011	Awa kpala tɔ nuaa aa pele o pele aa kɛɛlaa a gɛa wu sɔbɛ na houndaa nhu nhaa kpelenwaa na i hiti, kangaa wu gbɛ o gbɛ na hɔlɔ nana wu nɛɛnwaa la ɔ fanwa.
58006012	Kpala ngai nuaa wu gɛ yaaiyaai wu gɛ ɔ na waa gɛ na wui Yisɔsi Kilaisi o, kɛlɛ a belena ɛɛ natiini ti laanɛɛ ɔ na awa ti lii lo ngɔ na, awae k`ati nana hɔlɔ Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo fei.
58006013	Aa lɔgɔ na Ngebɔ i Eebilahamu nɛɛnwaa loni, kɛɛ gɔaa gbɔha na nwa aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ nana belenaa i maa gɔa na beleni. I gɔaia gbɔha na nwa, gbɛnhaile nuu ai na nana mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ alaa kɔalaa ma nhanwa.
58006014	I gɛia, "Aa tɔmbaga ngɔɔ bi lubaa, awa ngɔɔ pelenaa bi ndengaa gbinhi gbinhia hɔlɔ."
58006015	Ka Eebilahamu i lii longa, awae kɛɛ nana hɔlɔa Ngebɔ i ala nɛɛnwaa loni aa ngɔandaa ngeya.
58006016	Gbaa ningaa gbɔhaa i taa gɔaa nuu nwa nana mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ tuaa, awa pu nwa na bɛɛ aa ɔa ti loganhu, maa gɔa nana bonda nwɛ aa njia na aa lo.
58006017	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, kpala ngee naanɔɔ Ngebɔa i ndɔgɔɔu maa ɛa ɔ aa ningaa natiini nana hɔlɔndaa aa gɛ ti eya i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei, aa kɛɛlaa ai ngi laalaa nyaai, awa faa nwɛɛ i gɔai ngi nda laa na nwa, ndɔgɔɔundaa nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ pelenaa.
58006018	Nhanda fee ngindinɛi lɔ na nana maa ai lobi, napangaa nɛɛnwaa lo na o ka kɔa na nana Ngebɔ i peleni, awa Ngebɔ ai ndɛɛ gɔɔla fanwa. Awae mua na mi manhu gbeenjaa hɔlɔa ala eya, ndii gbɛndɛ mbombou mbaa lɔ mi eya nɛɛnwaa lo na houndaa nhanwa aa loko fee nana nda ngɔ mi nhanwa.
58006019	Nɛɛnwaa la indinɛi i mi eya alaa mi hou ngɔ kangaa mi lo gbɛndɛ ngɔ kpou. Alaa pele ngɔ mi lii na i gbɛndɛ awa ai sii sia, awa ɔɔ ɔaa kahe mba nhinde na, kɔla waa na bou nwa nana i na nhɛɛni Ngebɔ Bɛlɛ nau,
58006020	mɛɛna Yisɔsi i longa na gulɔɔ muaa aa ndiilaa na mi lɔgɔ fanwa. Awa Ngebɔ oo ala nhu ɔhɛa kangaa i bele ngaa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ waa wɔwɔwɔ ɛɛ gbo Mɛlikisilɛki ee naɔ.
58007001	Gbaa Mɛlikisilɛki indinɛi nana manha mbaa na aa alaɔ Selɔmu bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu nhanwa, Lamanhu Eebɔ na Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala. Awa nhuna Eebilahamu ee bɛɛla kualaa kɔɔ na nhu mɛɛna i kuni na manhangaa waa waa naaingaa i ma, ka Mɛlikisilɛki i gɔɛnga aa ala pele na nhu, awa kɛɛ Eebilahamu lubaa.
58007002	Awa nana bɛɛ Eebilahamu i kuai na manhangaa waa waa i ngeya, kɛɛ kɔɛmaa gɛa puu, awa kɛɛ kɔɛmaa ila guaa ma kɛɛ ngɔaa Mɛlikisilɛki eya. (Ndaa na taa ui mba aa Mɛlikisilɛki, koonhu na nwɛɔ aa "Teenjaa Nwanha mbaa". Awa kina manha mbaa nwɛɔ aa ala Selɔmu bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu nhanwa, ngi laa na goonhu na nwɛɔ gbɔnhu aa "Maa lɛi Nwanha mbaa".)
58007003	Nhinde ai na mɛɛna ti kpaalii na ele nwɛɛ Mɛlikisilɛki kɛɛgɛ na aa ala inaile ngi nje na. Tai gbɛ o gbɛ gɛi aa muee pongaa i fanwa natiini i guai ti nhu. Mai ala le ndɔgɔ gɔɔ, inaile mai ngi haa nhanda bele ngɔ gɔɔ. Faa nwɛɛe ala bele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ Ngebɔ Lou na nwɛ aa ala, gbɛnhaile Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ nwɛ aa ala wɔwɔwɔ.
58007004	Woo Mɛlikisilɛki bombou ngɔ na bele ngɔ na lɔa ee na! Gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ nana Eebilahamu mi bemba na i kuai manhangaa waa waa i ngeya kɔɔ na nhu, kɛɛ kɔɛa kɔɛmaa puu, awa kɛɛ kɔɛmaa ila na ɔaa Mɛlikisilɛki eya aa nii.
58007005	Awa Sɔ na kɛɛ kɛa aa Libai goo na nhu lengaa i bɛɛ ti beleni aa Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa aa kɛɛlaa ti Ngebɔ nii hou hou Iisilɛlia i ngeya kɔɛmaa ila kualaa kɔɛmaa puu na nhu, napangaa ti ndege bɔlɔgɔɔ nhu belaa i mɛɔ tee Ngebɔ nii indinɛi hou hou ti eya, hali nha tua gbɔnhu Eebilahamu goo na nhu lengaa nwɛɔ aa tuee.
58007006	Kɛlɛ Mɛlikisilɛki ala ai guai Libaini ti goo na nhu, kɛlɛ kɛɛ Ngebɔ nii na houa Eebilahamu eya kɔɛmaa i ila kualaa kɔɛmaa puu na, awa kɛɛ Eebilahamu lubaa, napangaa Eebilahamu nana Ngebɔ i nɛɛnwaa lo fei alɛɛ.
58007007	Indinɛi maagai hounwaa o ai mba, aa kɛɛlaa nuu na nana aa nduba he ala lee ngɔ nuu naa nana taa ala luba.
58007008	Ngu to ngɔ na Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa i mba natiini ti guai Libaini ti goo na nhu, tee Ngebɔ nii na hou, tua ningaa gbɔhaa nwɛ aa tuee natiini taa haa. Kɛlɛ ngu to ngɔ na Mɛlikisilɛkia, nana i Ngebɔ nii na houi, ala nuu nwɛɛ nana kɛndɛ ɔ lɛ tuun, ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi.
58007009	Nuu aa gɛa bɛnhɛ Libai gbɔha na kpei nana ningaa tee Ngebɔ nii gua ngee, kɛɛ Ngebɔ nii guaa aa Eebilahamu nhu bele.
58007010	Gbaa kina Eebilahamu i nii na guai nhuna Mɛlikisilɛki i ala nwaaleii, mi gɛa tɔ Libai gbɔnhu kɛɛ kuaa, gbɛnhaile Libai Eebilahamu goo na nhu lou nwɛɔ aa ala.
58007011	Nhuna Yuu chaaga guanjaa na ee Libaini ti goo na nhu, naa lɔgɔ na nwɛɔ ti Sɔ na laa laai kati ngɔaa ningaa i ngeya tee Iisilɛli. Ina k`a ti enge na gbekpe ngɔɔ hiti ɔ nhu, Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ lagbiti gbala ngai ba gɛ naɔ gbɔnhu muaa, nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ Mɛlikisilɛki, kɛlɛ ai beleni ɛɛ Eelɔni.
58007012	Gbaa ina maa lobi ngaa ɔa Yuu chaaga guanjaa na nhu, k`a maa lobi ngaa ɔa pa Sɔ na nhu.
58007013	Awa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi nana ti nhanda indinɛi gɛɛ gɛɛi fanwa, nde ndagbiti nhu nwɔɔ nwɛɔ aa ala, awa nuu ai lɛ beleniɔ aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ ngi le nana nhu, mɛɛ chaaga na guamaa nhinde na Yuua ti Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau.
58007014	Nuu o nuu i nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa mi Nwaliki na Yula le na nhu nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala. Awa Moosisi ai nde ngindinɛi gulai kpagaa nhuna i yɛpɛi Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa nhanwa.
58007015	Maa gee indinɛi oo belenga aa seeliyaa gɛndɛ gɛndɛ nhuna Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ lagbiti aa huu nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ Mɛlikisilɛki,
58007016	nana ai beleni aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ ndi ɔ aa Sɔ ngee pele inaile nuu gbɔha s`ɔ s`ɔ nhu, kɛlɛ ngi Yuu chaaga guanjaa na i baia kualaa fɔha na le nana i na ngi lɛɛhu na nhu, awa maa lɛɛhu na ngaa ai lo.
58007017	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Bɔɔ belenaa aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ, Ɛɛ gbo Mɛlikisilɛki i beleni laɔ."
58007018	Gbaa Ngebɔ oo Sɔ ngɔha na laa lɛ kaka, gbɛnhaile fɔha aile mbaɔ kpɔndaa nhanwa ningaaa.
58007019	Gbaa Sɔ na nana Moosisi i kpaali gbaalii ai kuni aa ningaa gbɔhaa bele ngaa hiti nhu belaa Ngebɔ gulɔɔ. Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu Ngebɔ oo nɛɛnwaa la gbekpe hea muɛɛ, awa alɛɛ ɔɔ pele mɔɔ gbɛɛ Ngebɔ gbɛlaa.
58007020	Nhanda lagbiti na ala nwɛ aa kɔa na nana Ngebɔ i peleni.
58007021	Gbaa aa tɔmbaga natiini ti nhumbuiɔ aa bele pɛnhɛɛ aa Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa, Ngebɔ ai maa gɔa belenie kɛlɛ nhuna Yisɔsi i beleni aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ, ka Ngebɔ i maa gɔa belenga nhuna i gɛi, "Maliki na oo kɔa belenga awa aigɔ nɛɛnwaa lobi fanwa. 'Bɔɔ belenaa aa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ.' "
58007022	Indinɛi oo Yisɔsi belenga aa kuague kpekpe ngilimayaa gbekpe fanwa.
58007023	Pɛnhɛɛ Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa i ngɔɔ ti gbinhi ɔɔ gbenhaile kati haa ɔ. Awa haa na nwɛ ee pele ngɔɔ taile ku taa ti enge na lo nda.
58007024	Kɛlɛ Yisɔsi nda Yuu chaaga guanjaa na wɔwɔwɔ faa nwɛɛ, gbɛnhaile alaa na wɔwɔwɔ fanwa, awa nuu aigɔ ngi enge na bele ala boma.
58007025	Awae nhu gbɛɛlaa na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa aa gbele o gbele ala ku ngɔ aa ndendouyaa he natiini mbɛ taa ba Ngebɔ le aa ala lepele, gbɛnhaile nhaa guna bɛɛ alaa na kɛɛ yɛpɛ Ngebɔ le ti nhanwa.
58007026	Faa nwɛɛe Yisɔsi Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na bonda nwɛ kpala ngi muaa. Ala bele ngɔ ɛɛ Ngebɔ, napangaa nuu na nana ala leo ɔ nhanda nhu, awa tɛi ngai alaa. Ngebɔ oo ala loganhu baia aa nhanda nyɔu bele mbelaa, awa oo ala lɛa nga feenaa na nwanhu.
58007027	Ala ai beleni ɛɛ Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa waa waa lagbitia i. Chaaga guandaa ai ala eya aa foo o foo, aa kɛɛlaa i kua pɛnhɛɛ ngi nda nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa, awa poungaa na siina, i ba kua ningaa i ti nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa, gbɛnhaile oo chaaga guaɔ naa ila kele awa kpɔha nhu nwɛɛɔ, napangaa nhuna i gbɔha na guaiɔ aa chaaga.
58007028	Gba Sɔ na nana Moosisi i kpaalii, ee ningaa gbamaa belenaa aa Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa waa waa natiini tee nhanda nyɔu bele pele, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nda nɛɛnwaa lo na aa fe, nana aa maa gɔa bele, nana Sɔ na i nhumbui aa lo gulɔɔ alaa, maa gee na siina, alɛɛ aa Ndou na nhu ɔhɛ pelendaa nhanwa aa Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa, nana ala hiti ɔ nhu Ngebɔ gulɔɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ.
58008001	Chaanngi nhu nana maa maa yia gɛ ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa lɔ mi eya nana i heii manhayaa na la, Ngebɔ fɔha Kɛɛgɛ na ɛha loko na nhu mɛɛ aliyana.
58008002	Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa nwɛ aa ala nana aa enge mɛɛ kahe mba nhinde bombou mbaa na, napangaa tɔmbaga gbaanya nana nuu gbɔha aile i toni, kɛlɛ Maliki na Ngebɔ alɛɛ i toni.
58008003	Gbaa Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ taa ala nhu ɔhɛa kangaa i fembɛ na ɔa Ngebɔ eya, awa i bote boma i chaaga gua Ngebɔ le. Awa mi nda Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa indinɛi maa nhiɛ ɔ gbɔnhu ala nhanwa nhai aa gɛ ngeya fendaa nhanwa Ngebɔɛ.
58008004	Ina alaa ngelou i nhu, ai ba bele ngaa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ hali, gbɛnhaile Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa lɔ na ngelou i nhu natiini taa fembɛ he ɛɛ gbo Yuua i ti Sɔ na i kɛi.
58008005	Ngenge na nana Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa indiini taa pele nɛi mɛɛ gbo nana kuague ngɔ aa ngenge na nana mi Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na aa pele mɛɛ aliyana. Gbaa nhuna Moosisi i gɛi ɔɔ Kpaanya na lo, ka Ngebɔ i gɛa ala nwa, "Tɔa aa kɛɛlaa bi gbɛ o gbɛ na gbatɛ aa pele na ngi ndɔgɔɔuni aa biee nhuna mee mɛɛ njie naa."
58008006	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu, Ngebɔ oo Yuu chaaga gua ngenge ɔaa Yisɔsi eya nana kpekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ ti nda naa bɛɛ, ɛɛ gbo ngilimayaa na gbekpe ngɔ na nana i kpatɛi Ngebɔ loganhu o ka Ngebɔ ndaa i, gbɛnhaile aa indinɛi nhu bele, Ngebɔ oo nɛɛnwaa lo ngɔaa mi eya nhanda gbekpe fanwa nana tee ngɔ.
58008007	Gbaa ina nhanda aile pɛnhɛɛ ngilimayaa naa, Ngebɔ ai ba gula nhu aa lagbiti nhu ɔhɛndaa gbɔnhu.
58008008	Kɛlɛ ka Ngebɔ i tɔa aa kɛɛlaa ngi ndaa i too gbahaa aa nana laa fendaa pɛnhɛɛ ngilimayaa na i kɛi, nhuna i gɛi ti nwa, "Yamana ɔɔ baa nhuna ngɔɔ ngilimayaa nyiɛ gbatɛ loganhu aa ningaa i ti Iisilɛli bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu o, ka ningaa i ti Yula bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu.
58008009	Aigɔ bele ɛɛ ngilimayaa na ngi kpatɛiɔ loganhu nii ti bembaa i ngoo, aa lɔgɔ na ngi houi ti lokoa kangi ti guaa Iyibiti bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu. Tai nana beleni kpala ngee ngilimayaa naa nana ngi kpatɛi loganhu nii tua o, awae ngaile ti sago nhu.
58008010	Chaanngi nhu, ngilimayaa i nwɛ aa indinɛi ngɔɔ kpatɛ loganhu nii ningaa i ngoo ti Iisilɛli yamana na nhu ɔɔ ba. Ngɔɔ nya Sɔ na bua ti nɛɛnwaa na, awa ngɔɔ kpaalia ti lii na nwa. Ngɔɔ belenaa aa ti Eebɔ, awa tua tɔɔ belenaa aa nya nda ningaa.
58008011	Nuu aigɔ gula nhu aa ndege lugule nagɔlindaa, awa nuu aigɔ gɛ ngi ndege nwa, 'Maliki na gɔɔna.' Gbaa tua bɛɛ tɔɔ nya gɔɔnaa tɔɔlo ngɔ na nuu yaaiyaai na le ti liiya nhaa tɛ ɔ nuu bombou mbaa na le ti liiya.
58008012	Awa ngɔɔ maaumayaa gbaunaa ti nhanwa aa ti nhanda nyɔu na londaa na tuɛɛ, awa ti nhanda nyɔu na gili aigɔ hitɛ gbɔnhu nyɛɛ."
58008013	Nhuna Ngebɔ i yɛpɛi ngilimayaa nyiɛ nhanwa, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa oo pɛnhɛɛ kee na lɛa kaka aa kɛɛlaa ngɔha ɔ. Awa mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ nana aa ɔha awa i ua, ɔɔ loa nhu.
58009001	Pɛnhɛɛ ngilimayaa na sɔ sɔ ngee ngeyaɔ batou na nhanwa, awa kahe mba nhinde ee naanɔɔ mɛɛna nuu gbɔha i naa gbatɛi batou pelendaa na nhanwa.
58009002	Kati kpaanya longa, napangaa ngitia gee na, nana tee ui mba aa Kahe mba Nhinde, naa nwɛɛ sɔuntaa na ee na heii, awa ka mbɛtɛ na, tii lɛgɛ na o nana fe ngɔɔ Ngebɔɛ.
58009003	Kɔla waa na fee na bou nwa, nana ee nhɛɛni na, naa nwɛɛ Kpaanya na ee na nana taa ui mba aa Kahe mba Nhinde bombou mbaa na.
58009004	Naa indinɛi naa nwɛɛ sebe na nwɔmaa nhinde na ee na ku na nhanwa nana kpatɛ ngɔ aa mabɔɔn, awa Ngilimayaa Guma na nana maa gbɔɛ ngɔɔ aa mabɔɔn bɛɛ, maa guma na nhu, naa nwɛɛ kɔuhɛɛ ee na nana kpatɛ ngɔɔ aa mabɔɔn. Awa mabɔɔn gɔuhɛɛ na nhu, naa nwɛɛ mɛnhɛi na ee na nana Ngebɔ i teeni mbu kualaa aliyana, ka Eelɔni likpɔ na nana ndaga ee gbɔku mba, awa ka kɔtu gindo kindo fee na nana Ngebɔ i ngi Sɔ na gbaali gbaalii maɔ.
58009005	Kuma na gɔma, haga lonhaia natiini taa ui tuaa aa chɛlubimi tee naanɔɔ ma, natiini ti ndɔgɔɔu ngɔɔ mɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ee naanɔɔ, ti gobo na nhu huo ngɔɔ nwanhu Ngebɔ ee ningaa i ti nhanda nyɔu na lo na tuɛɛ. Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu lɔgɔ aile aa indinɛi ngɔɔ ku ngi maa gee indinɛi nwaa yia gɛ bɛɛ.
58009006	Ngemɛɛ gɛnhi nhanda indinɛi laalaa ngɔ laɔ, aa kɛɛlaa Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa i k`ati li kpaanya na ngitia gee nau aa foo o foo ti enge na bele ma,
58009007	kɛlɛ Kpaanya na fee nau, k`a Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na gbo kpɛti alɛɛ aa ɔa na naa ila fogo na nwa. Kaa ɔa na aa qanwa nana aa chaaga gua la Ngebɔ le ala gbɔha lɔgɔ fanwa ka nhanda nyɔu na nana ningaa i ti pelenga, kɛlɛ tai kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nhanda nyɔu nwɛ tee pele.
58009008	Ngebɔ Yina na lɔ mi nagɔli ngɔ la tɔ chanhai kualaa ndaalaa indinɛi nhu bɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa, pele na nana i na ngɔalaa la Kahe mba Nhinde bombou mbaa na ai lɛ laauniɔ lɛ, gbɛnhaile ngitia Gbaanya na lɔ loni lɛ tuun.
58009009	Indinɛi tuugɔɔ nwɛ mi nda yamana na nhanwa. Alaa ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ aa muee aa kɛɛlaa fembɛ hembɛ o, ka chaaga guandaa Ngebɔ le ala aile aa batou pele mɔɔ na lii na chanhai hiti ɔ nhu,
58009010	gbɛnhaile nhanda indinɛi ngu to ngɔ gbo nanaa nuu aa mɛ o, ka nana aa kpɔɛ, awa ka mɔɔ gɛbɛlɛ belendaa. Sɔ mɛ nana kpatɛ gbatɛ ngɔɔ ndugu na nhanwa gbo nhaa lɔgɔ na i hiti ma nhuna Ngebɔ ɔɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na bele ngaa ngi nyiɛ.
58009011	Kɛlɛ Kilaisi oo ba tɔ ɛɛ Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa nhanda gbekpe na nhanwa nana i baa baa. Kpaanya na nana aa enge mbu hiti ɔ nhu awa mbombou ngɔ lee ngɔ kpaanya lagbiti naa. Nuu gbɔha aile i kpatɛi aa ɔgɔ, napangaa ngelou indinɛi nhu aile.
58009012	Nhuna Kilaisi i ɔai aa Kpaanya indinɛi nhu bele, awa kɛɛ kpɔha nhu ɔa belenga naa ila mɛɛ Kahe mba Nhinde bombou mbaa na, ai lii na aa njengaa ti qanwa o nika lengaa ti qanwa o kuandaa nhanwa aa chaaga. Nana i peleni, ngi nda guegue qanwa na nwɛ i kpauni kɛɛ mi umbonga la, awa kɛɛ nhanda baanga muaa nhaa guna bɛɛ.
58009013	Gbaa Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ na aa njengaa i ti qanwa na gbau, tuulaa i ti qanwa na o, ka nika haa lou na taa mɔ maa luhu na, aa puu buu ningaa i ma natiini tai chanhaini Ngebɔ gulɔɔ, indinɛi aa ti belenaa aa chanhai mbelaa.
58009014	Ina nhuaa i ti qanwa na fɔha lɔ mba aa na belendaa, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi qanwa na fɔha bombou mbaa lɔ mba aa mi lii na chanhaindaa. Kɛɛ gbɔha na gbaunga nana nhanda nyɔu aile nhu, kɛɛ kuaa aa chaaga Ngebɔ le mi lɔgɔ fanwa aa Ngebɔ Yina na nhu bele nana i na wɔwɔwɔ. Indinɛi nhanwa, ngi qanwa na aa mi lii na chanhainaa, kualaa nhanda nyɔu nhu nana aa ba aa haa, kangaa mi ba kɛndɛ Eebɔ na batou.
58009015	Chaaga indinɛi nhanwa, Kilaisi nwɛ ngɔa ndoganhu nwɔɔ na aa ala ningaa gbɔhaa i ndoganhu ka Ngebɔ ngilimayaa nyiɛ na nhanwa nana i kpatɛi. Ngilimayaa nyiɛ indinɛi pele ngɔ ɛɛ fɛi ma nana nuu aa pele yeingaa i gilaa haa. Kilaisi i ngilimayaa indinɛi gbatɛia kangaa natiini Ngebɔ i uinga tuaa aa ngi ndaa ti ba ba ti nhaanhaa gbekpengaa i hɔlɔ nana Ngebɔ i ti nɛɛnwaa loni fanwa aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ ngɔaa ti eya, awa ti bo mɛɛ nhaa guna bɛɛ. Indinɛi aa belenaa gbɛnhaile Kilaisi oo haaa. Ngi haa na nwɛ ɔɔ nhanda baa ningaa i mba kualaa nhanda nyɔu na nhu nana ti peleni nhuna tee ngilimayaa ɔha nau.
58009016	Gbaa mɛɛna fɛi ma na siina aa gɛ na, kaa bele qai aa kɛɛlaa nuu na nana i ngilimayaa na siina gbatɛi i haa.
58009017	Gbaa ngilimayaa na aa engea ina gbo nuu na i kpatɛi oo haaa. Kɛlɛ ina ai haai, ngilimayaa na aigɔ enge.
58009018	Faa nwɛɛe hali pɛnhɛɛ ngilimayaa na ai lɔɔloniɔ qanwa boma.
58009019	Gbaa nhanda na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nana Ngebɔ i gɛi k`a ningaa i taa pele, nhuna Moosisi i bilani aa maa nhanda na gɛɛ gɛɛndaa, kɛɛ nika lengaa i ti qanwa na gbaunga, ka njengaa i ti nda na, awa kɛɛ nhupunga aa nja. Awa kɛɛ laangɔnɛ gɔla golo gbaunga nana ti kpatɛi aa nhua gbee, awa ndugu na gbɔu ɔɔ wou, awa kɛɛ ngɔaa ngulua nana taa ui mba aa hisɔpi, awa kɛɛ ngɔaa qanwa nau, awa kɛɛ fain fainga kɔɔ na nwa nana Sɔ na gbaali gbaali ngɔ na ma, awa kɛɛ fain fainnga boma ningaa i ma bɛɛ.
58009020	Nhuna i fain fainni ti nwa kɛɛ gɛa, "Indinɛi qanwa na nwɛ nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa ngilimayaa na tɔmbaga nwɛɛ nana Ngebɔ i gɛi wu nwa wu nwaa bɛɛ mbu."
58009021	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, ka Moosisi i qanwa na nhai fainnga Kpaanya na nwa o ka nhaanhaa i ma bɛɛ tee enge aa tuee batou na nwa.
58009022	Awa ndi ɔ na aa Sɔ na lepele, nuu aa gɛa gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ qanwa nwɛɛ aa chanhai. Gbaa ina tai qanwa bui, maa bele ai na nana taa nuu nhanda nyɔu lo la na alɛɛ.
58009023	Pɛnhɛɛ naɔ kataa qanwa bu qai aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, kangaa ti ba nhaanhaa i natiini gbatɛ gbatɛ kuague na le nhaanhaa i fanwa ti aliyana, kangaa tua ti ba chanhai Ngebɔ gulɔɔ. Kɛlɛ aliyana nhaanhaa i kpɔha na, ti lo ngɔ aa chaaga nana kpekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ indinɛi.
58009024	Gbaa Kilaisi ai ɔai Kahe mba Nhinde bombou mbaa na nana ningaa gbɔhaa ti kpatɛi aa ɔgɔ, nana aa kɛɛlaa kuague mɛɛɔ tɔmbaga gee na nhanwa. Kɛlɛ kɛɛ ɔaa aliyana gbɔha na, awa chaanngi nhu alaa loni Ngebɔ au bele nhu mi lɔgɔ fanwa.
58009025	Kilaisi ala gbɔha guandaa aile ngeya aa chaaga naa gbinhi ɔ. Ai beleni ɛɛ Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na nana ee ɔa Kahe mba Nhinde bombou mbaa na aa fogo o fogo, awa ee qanwa gbaunaa nana ngi nda qanwa aile.
58009026	Ina ai ba bele ngɔɔ gɛnhi, njɔgɔlɔ gbinhi gbinhi belendaa i ba gɛa Kilaisi eya naa gbinhi ɔ kualaama aa lɔgɔ na Ngebɔ i Ngelou na gbatɛi. Kɛlɛ ɛɛ chaanngi nhu gbo, i baia naa ila kele awa kpɔha nhu nwɛɛ gbele mba yamana na nhu ngelou i nhu, kangaa i nhanda nyɔu gbau ti eya ndi ɔ aa ngi gbɔha chaaga na i kuai.
58009027	Awa ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i nhu ɔhɛ ngɔɔ ningaa nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa kataa haa naa ila, awa na oo leenaa nga, oo ti gɔhɔnga,
58009028	ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa Kilaisi. Kɛɛ gbɔha na gɔannga kuandaa nhanwa aa chaaga naa ila, ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti nhanda nyɔu na gbaundaa nhanwa ti eya. Ala baalaa na ɔɔ fee kulaa ma gbɔnhu, kɛlɛ aigɔ loko bu gbɔnhu nhanda nyɔu nwaa nhanda nhu, kɛlɛ ndendouyaa hendaa nhaa nwɛɛ natiini mbɛ taa ala nwaa golo.
58010001	Gbaa Sɔ na kuague mɛɛ gbo aa ala nhaanhaa gbekpengaa i fanwa tɔɔ ba guna, kɛlɛ nhaanhaa gbekpengaa i kpɔha na aile kpei. Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa i tuaa nhu tuun aa chaaga ila na siina guandaa aa fogo o fogo. Sɔ na pae ndi ɔ na aa chaaga bonda nana guu guandaa nhu bele, fɔha ai mba aa natiini chanhai hiti ɔ nhu natiini taa gbɛɛ Ngebɔ gbɛlaa.
58010002	Ina k`a fɔha nana bonda lɔ ti eya, ningaa tai ba gɛ aa chaaga guandaa tuun, gbɛnhaile ina i ba bele ngaa too chanhainjaa hɔlɔaɔ aa chaaga indinɛi guu guandaa nhu bele, taigɔ nɛgili gbɔnhu aa ti nhanda nyɔu na.
58010003	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ pele ngɔ indinɛi gbo, chaaga nana taa kuu gua aa fogo o fogo, alaa pele ti nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla ti nhanda nyɔu na nwa ti pele pelengaɔ.
58010004	Gbaa nikaa ti qanwa o njengaa ti qanwa o ai ku aa nhanda nyɔu gbau ningaa eya.
58010005	Nhu gbɛɛlaa na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa nhuna Kilaisi i bai ngelou indinɛi nhu, kɛɛ gɛa Ngebɔ nwa, "Bai loni aa chaaga guu guandaa o fembɛ hembɛ o, kɛlɛ faa nwɛɛ bi nya lugu na gbatɛa.
58010006	Nhuaa i taa ti nwɔ mɔ aa ngi gbɔha chaaga nhanwa, ka chaaga guandaa nhanda nyɔu gbaundaa nhanwa ningaa eya, maa gee nana ai bi goonhu nɛɛ ngɔ.
58010007	Nhu nwɛɛ ngi gɛi, 'Oo Ngebɔ, nya gbeendɛ bi guunmayaa na belendaa nhanwa ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi nya nhanwa.' "
58010008	Kɛɛ nhumbua pɛnhɛɛ aa gɛ, "Chaaga guu guandaa, fembɛ hembɛ o, nhuaa nwɔ mɔndaa o aa ngi gbɔha chaaga nhanwa o, ka nhuaa baa baandaa ningaa ti nhanda nyɔu gbaundaa nhanwa ti eya, bai loni aa maa gee nana, awa ai bi goonhu nɛɛ ngɔ." I indinɛi gɛia hali nha tua taa chaaga indinɛi guu gua ɛɛ gbo Sɔ na lo ngɔ la.
58010009	Nhu nwɛɛ i gɛi, "Oo Ngebɔ, nya gbeendɛ, bi guunmayaa na belendaa nhanwa." Indinɛi oo lɔgɔɔunga aa muee aa kɛɛlaa, Ngebɔ oo pɛnhɛɛ chaaga na gua ngɔ na guaa kpagaa, awa oo ba aa fee na gua ngɔ na.
58010010	Aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na belendaa, ka Yisɔsi Kilaisi i lugu na guaa aa chaaga naa ila awa kpɔha nhu nwɛɛ. Awae indinɛi oo mi chanhainga kualaa mi nhanda nyɔu na nhu.
58010011	Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa i ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ i ngi enge na bele ngaa gbele o gbele, awa i chaaga ila na siina gua naa gbinhi ɔ. Kɛlɛ maa chaaga indinɛi guu guandaa ai ku aa nhanda nyɔu gbau nuu eya.
58010012	Kɛlɛ Kilaisi nhanwa, ala chaaga ila mɛɛ i kuai naa ila kele, nana fɔha nhu aa kɛɛlaa i ku i nhanda nyɔu gbau ningaa eya nhaa guna bɛɛ, awa nhu nwɛɛ i heii Ngebɔ ɛha loko na nhu gaka.
58010013	Naa nwɛɛ i na aa wolo nhaa Ngebɔ i pele ngi haaleengaa i ti gɛ ala ɔgɔsambala nau.
58010014	Aa chaaga ila na nana i kuai pae Kilaisi oo pelenga Ngebɔ ndaa i too belenga aa chanhai mbelaa hiti ɔ nhu nhaa guna bɛɛ.
58010015	Ngebɔ Yina na lɔ ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ gbɔnhu aa muee chanhai aa kɛɛlaa nhanda nhanda indinɛi tɔmbaga nwɛɛ. Kɛɛ nhumbua aa gɛ,
58010016	"Indinɛi ngilimayaa na nwɛ ngɔɔ kpatɛ loganhu mii tua o yamana nana nhu ɔɔ ba, ngemɛɛ Maliki na i kɛi. Ngɔɔ nya sɔ na buu bua ti lii na nwa, awa ngɔɔ kpaali gbaalia ti nɛɛnwaa na nhu."
58010017	Awa nhu nwɛɛ i gɛi, "Ngaigɔ nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla gbɔnhu kpɔ ti nhanda nyɔu na nwa ka ti eyaabele nyɔu na."
58010018	Kina Ngebɔ oo ningaa i ti nhanda nyɔu na loa na tuɛɛ, maa chaaga guandaa ai na pa gbɔnhu kpɔ.
58010019	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, qanwa na nhanwa nana Yisɔsi i pui nhuna i haai, fɔha nwɛ mi hɔlɔa ngɔalaa nhanwa Kahe mba Nhinde bombou mbaa na, nana gbɛ o gbɛ aigɔ nyaai ma.
58010020	Yisɔsi oo pele nyiɛ nana laaunga muɛɛ nana ningaa taa ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ la. I ndaaunia aa kɔla na nhu bele nana aa gɛ nhɛɛni Kahe mba Nhinde bombou mbaa na gulɔɔ. Awa nhuna maa yɛpɛ pele nyiɛ na siina nhanwa aa kɔla na nhu bele, Yisɔsi lugu na nwɛ maa maa yia gɛ.
58010021	Awa kina Yuu chaaga gua mɔɔ bombou mbaa lɔ mi eya nana aa Ngebɔ ndaa i manhu gbee,
58010022	faa nwɛɛe ami baa ala gbɛlaa aa tɔmbaga lii, awa mi gɛ hagba la ngɔ mi laanɛɛ na bele ngɔ na nhu, mi lii na i gɛ uai chanhai kualaa nhanda nyɔu nhu, gbɛnhaile Yisɔsi qanwa na oo mi nɛɛnwaa na chanhainga kualaa nhanda nyɔu nɛgili nhu, awa moo mi lugu na nwɔɔa aa nja nana chanhai ngɔ.
58010023	Nɛɛnwaa la na nana Ngebɔ i fei muɛɛ mi gɛi mi laanɛɛ ɔ la, kam~a~a hou aa loko fee, gbaa ala i nɛɛnwaa lo na hei ala hiti ɔ nhu nuu aa laanɛɛ la.
58010024	K`a gbɔha nwaa sago nhanda aa gɛ mi loganhu, kangaa kpɔ kpɔ nwa i gɛ mi loganhu ndomayaa lɔgɔɔundaa nhanwa o ka ngenge gbekpe pelendaa.
58010025	Amɛɛ gbaha aa u kɔɛndaa ngilamaaa ɛɛ lɛingaa i taa pele. Kɛlɛ ami gɛa aa ndii gbɛndɛ fee heendaa gbɔhaɛ pandaa, ɛɛ wu tɔa gbo tɔ aa kɛɛlaa Foo na mi Nwaliki na ɔɔ ba ma oo gbɛɛa tɔ mi gbɛlaa.
58010026	Gbaa chaaga guandaa lagbiti aigɔ gɛ na gbɔnhu kpɔ nana ɔɔ mi chanhai kualaa mi nhanda nyɔu na nhu ina maa li gulɔɔ aa nhanda nyɔu belendaa kahalaa, kɛlɛ too tɔmbaga na lɔgɔɔunga aa muee awa moo kɔɔnga.
58010027	Nana gbo tɔ i loa muɛɛ ala nwɛ aa Kɔhɔ na nwaa golondaa ndua bombou mbaa nhu, awa ka ngɔmbu bombou mbaa na nana ɔɔ natiini nyaai ti lolo ɔ na aa Ngebɔ!
58010028	Nuu o nuu nana ai nwaa bɛɛi Sɔ nau nana Moosisi i kpaalii, ti ala baaa, awa taigɔ maaumayaa gbau fanwa, nhuna taa kɔhɔ ti ndɛɛ, awa ningaa feengaa inaile chawangaa ti bele ngaa maa seelia.
58010029	Ɛɛ nuu na tɔ nana aa au bii Nuu na Lou na nwanhu, i bote boma ngilimayaa nyiɛ na nwaa qanwa na nana i ala beleni aa chanhai mɔɔ kualaa nhanda nyɔu nhu, ai maa gee na lɔi aa gbɛ o gbɛ, awa oo botenga boma i njia nyɔu gɛ aa Yina na nana aa panda bandayaa he? Nɛgililɛ baa gbɛɛ gbɔɔni bombou mbaa nwɛ maa nwɔɔ nana bonda aa hɔlɔ!
58010030	Gbaa mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ nwɛ i gɛi, "Nya nwɛ ngɔɔ nuu na gbɔɔni, awa nya nwɛ ngɔɔ kue na guu gua." Awa kɛɛ gɛa gbɔnhu, "Maliki na ɔɔ ngi nda ningaa i kɔhɔnaa."
58010031	Ndua mba nhanda bombou mbaa nwɛ nhuna nuu aa gula tɔmbaga Eebɔ na eya kɔhɔ fanwa.
58010032	A nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlalɛ wee gee na pɛnhɛɛ na nhuna pɛnhɛɛ wu nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔi Ngebɔ nhanda naa. Aa maa lɔgɔ nana haliɔ kawu yɔgɔlɔa mbombou ngɔ, kɛlɛ kawu lii longa nhaa kawu kunga.
58010033	Aa lɔgɔ lɛingaa ningaa tee wu yakpayaaa faka nhu awa tee wu gbɔɔnia, awa aa lɔgɔ lɛingaa wee gɛa ngilamaaa wui ningaa o natiini tee yɔgɔlɔ aa pele ngɔ indinɛi.
58010034	Kawu maaumayaa gbaunga kpindi bɛlɛu belaa nwa, awa nhuna ti wu nhaanhaa i kuai wu eya, kawu goonhu nɛɛa, gbɛnhaile wu nhu kɔɔnia aa kɛɛlaa nhaanhaa gbekpengaa lɔ wuɛɛ natiini tɔɔ gɛ wu eya nhaa guna bɛɛ.
58010035	Faa nwɛɛe awɛɛ hagba gua Ngebɔ nhu, gbɛnhaile ɔɔ wu baabaaa aa paabaa bombou mbaa.
58010036	Kawaa lii lo, kangaa wu ba Ngebɔ guunmayaa na bele awa wu nana hɔlɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei.
58010037	Gbaa ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛi, "Nhu golo aa lɛmbi, nuu na nana paalaa i na ɔɔ baa. Aigɔ nwaa gbɛndɛɛ.
58010038	Kɛlɛ nya lee mbelaa i fanwa, tɔɔ gɛa laanɛɛ nhu awa tɔɔ gɛa kɛndɛyaa nhu. Kɛlɛ ina ngila mɔɔ aa bɛɛla bou nwa, nya goonhu aigɔ nɛɛ ma."
58010039	Kɛlɛ mua ningaa aile aa muee natiini taa bɛɛla bou nwa awa ti u ngi lo nhu. Kɛlɛ mi nda na nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, laanɛɛ lɔ mi eya awa moo ndendouyaa hɔlɔa.
58011001	Nhuna taa gɛ laanɛɛ, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa hagba landaa nwɛ nhanda na nhu nana mi nɛɛnwaa la ɔ fanwa, hagba landaa nwɛ nhanda na nhu nana mai tɔ.
58011002	Gbaa laanɛɛ ala nwɛ i peleni Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛi ɔɔ ɔɔ belaa i maɔ.
58011003	Aa laanɛɛ, moo nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔa aa kɛɛlaa, Ngebɔ i ngelou na gbatɛia aa laa yia. K`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa nhaanhaa i natiini nuu aa ti lɔ, Ngebɔ i ti gbatɛia kualaa nana nhu nuu ai tɔ.
58011004	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Eebɛli i chaaga guaa Ngebɔ le nana kpekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ Keeni nda chaaga naa i kuai. Aa ngi laanɛɛ na nhu bele, ka Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛa ala nwa awa kɛɛ ala gbaunga aa tee mɔɔ, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ gbɔha na ka ala goonhu nɛɛa ngi hembɛ na nwa. Awa aa ngi laanɛɛ na nhu bele, hali ala haa ɔ, kɛlɛ alaa yɛpɛ tuun.
58011005	Aa laanɛɛ, Inɔki ai haai kɛɛ lɛa aliyana. Awa nuu ai ala lɔi gbɔnhu gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo ala gbaunga kɛɛ tɛa. Gbaa ka Ngebɔ Gbaali na i kɛa aa kɛɛlaa yeingaa i lɛi aliyana, ee nana bele pelenaaɔ ee Ngeb'o goonhu nɛɛ.
58011006	Nuu ai Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ aa bele ngaa laanɛɛ ai maa nwɔɔ na eya. Gbaa nuu o nuu nana aa ba Ngebɔ le k`a laanɛɛ aa gɛ ngeya aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ lɔ na, awa aa natiini paabaaa taa ala ɔɛ ɔɛ.
58011007	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Nɔa i ndaanhii na nwɛinga nana Ngebɔ i feiɔ nhanda na nhanwa nana ɔɔ bele pele gulɔɔ, nana Nɔa ai lɛ tɔi lɛɔ. Kɛɛ nwaa bɛɛa Ngebɔu awa kɛɛ njaa lɛndɛ gbatɛa, mɛɛna ala o ngi bongaa i ngoo ti ndendouyaa hɔlɔi na. Nhu gbɛɛlaa na nwɛɔ aa kɛɛlaa, ka Ngebɔ i ngelou na nyaaia. Awa teenjaa na nana aa gua laanɛɛ nhu, ka Nɔa i hɔlɔa Ngebɔ eya.
58011008	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Eebilahamu i nwaa bɛɛa Ngebɔu nhuna Ngebɔ i uini alaa kangaa i gua i li pɔlɔgɔɔ nhu, nana Ngebɔ i ala nɛɛnwaa longa aa ngɔandaa ngeya kangaa i bele ngaa ala bo. Kɛɛ guaa ngi nda bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu ai mɛɛ gɔɔni ee li na.
58011009	Aa laanɛɛ, kɛɛ hota hei belenga mɛɛ pɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu nana Ngebɔ i ala nɛɛnwaa loni fanwa. Kɛɛ heia na kpaanya gbaanya mbu, tii Aaisaaki o ka Yekɔpi, gbaa nɛɛnwaa lo ngila na nwɛ kele Ngebɔ i ngɔai ti eya.
58011010	Gbaa Eebilahamu nɛɛnwaa ee taa waa gulɔɔ nana wɔwɔwɔ ndambu lambu ee mba, nana nyɛgi mɔɔ na o to mɔɔ na o ala nwɛ aa Ngebɔ.
58011011	Laanɛɛ nwɛɔ i peleni Sela i ndou leni, haliɔ ala lee ngɔ foli hɔlɔ to nhu, gbenhaile kɛɛ hagba laa ala nhu aa kɛɛlaa hiti ɔ nhu nuu aa laanɛɛ aa ala, napangaa Ngebɔ nana i nɛɛnwaa lo na hei.
58011012	Awa hali Eebilahamu nhiikolo nwɛɔ aa ala, awa k`a haa na i ala gbɛɛ gbɛɛ, kualaa ala ila ngɔ nana le, naa nwɛɛ koo nhu leengaa ti guaa na natiini ti gbinhi ɔ ɛɛ teelega na i Ngebɔ naa, ti gbinhi ɔ nhaa ɛɛ qɛa na nana aa gɛ qɛagbaa na nhu, awa nuu ai ku aa kpaga.
58011013	Tua indinɛi bɛɛ laanɛɛ nhu nwɛɛɔ ti haai na. Tai nhaanhaa i hɔlɔi natiini Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei, kɛlɛ kati tɔa nhu gɔha awa kati pinjanga, awa kati kɛa kpou aa kɛɛlaa hotangaa nwɛ aa tuee ngelou i nhu ka sii sia belaa.
58011014	Gbaa ningaa i natiini taa njia indinɛi bonda gɛ, tuaa ndɔgɔɔu ngɔɔ aa ningaa i kpou aa kɛɛlaa tua taa au sia aa nhinde mɛɛna naa ɔɔ bele ngaa tuee.
58011015	Taile nɛgili aa pɔlɔgɔɔ nana ti guai nhu. Ina ti pelenia, ti ba fɛɛlɛ hɔlɔa aa mbɛɛlalaa na.
58011016	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ pele ngɔ na gbo, pɔlɔgɔɔ gbekpe mɛɛ tee ngɔi ngɔɔ, napangaa aliyana gee na. Awae maa ai ufeni Ngebɔ nhanwa nhuna taa ui mba aa ti Eebɔ, gbɛnhaile oo taa waa gbatɛa ti nhanwa.
58011017	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Eebilahamu i ngi nhiindou na Aaisaaki guaa aa chaaga nhuna Ngebɔ i Eebilahamu nhuani. Ala nwɛɔ Ngebɔ i nɛɛnwaa lo na hei alɛɛ, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ, ala nwaa gbatɛ ɔɔ aa ngi nhiindou ila ngɔ na guandaa aa chaaga.
58011018	Ala nwɛɔ Ngebɔ i gɛi ala nwa, "Aaisaaki nhu bele nwɛɛ bɔɔ koo nhu lengaa i hɔlɔ aa naa bele nana ngi bi nɛɛnwaa longa fanwa."
58011019	Eebilahamu laanɛɛ ɔɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ku ngɔɔ aa huulaa ningaau hali kualaa haa nhu, awa faa nwɛɛ maa gɛa tɔ, pele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ k`a haa nhu nwɛɔ Aisaaki i huui na nhuna i bai boma Eebilahamu le.
58011020	Laanɛɛ nwɛɔ i peleni Aaisaaki i Yɛkɔpi lubai tii Isɔ o, napangaa nduba nana tɔɔ hɔlɔ guna gulɔɔ.
58011021	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Yekɔpi i Yosɛfu nhiindengaa i ndubaa aa ngila ngila nhuna haa na ee bɛɛ ma. Kɛɛ bɛɛa ngi likpɔ naa awa kɛɛ Ngebɔ batounga.
58011022	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Yosɛfu, nhuna i gɛi ɔɔ haa, kɛɛ yɛpɛa ngu to ngɔ Iisilɛlia i mba ti baalaa na nhanwa kualaa Iyibiti, awa kɛɛ fɛi ma oo loa nana nhanwa taa pele ngaa ala boonwa na.
58011023	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Moosisi ungaa i, nhuna ti ala leni, kati ala lɔɔgua ngau chawa fanwa, gbɛnhaile ti tɔia aa kɛɛlaa ala nyande ngɔɔ, awa tai luai aa manha mbaa na sɔ na nyaaindaa.
58011024	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Moosisi, nhuna i bambagani, ai poteni gbɔnhu taa gɛ ma Iyibiti nwanha mbaa na nyanhalou na, ngi lou nwɛɔ aa ala.
58011025	I tɔia aa kɛɛlaa maa nhiɛ ɔɔ ala nhanwa aa yɔgɔlɔ ngilamaaa tii Ngebɔ ndaa i ngoo, tee ngɔ bɛnhɛ aa gɛ nɛɛ nɛɛ nhu lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa, nana ɔɔ ba ala nwa aa nhanda nyɔu.
58011026	I tɔia aa kɛɛlaa maa nhiɛ ɔɔ ala nhanwa aa yɔgɔlɔ ɛɛ Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na i peleni, tee ngɔ bɛnhɛ ala belendaa aa kpatɛ nwɔɔ Iyibiti bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, gbaa gulɔɔ baabaa nwɛɔ ee pele nhu gbee nda.
58011027	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Moosisi i guaa Iyibiti ndua aile ala nhu bɛnhɛ manha mbaa na gbaai na nhanwa. Kɛɛ nwundanga, gbɛnhaile oo nuu na lɔa nana ningaa tai tɔ.
58011028	Aaaa yɔgɔlɔ ngilamaaa tii Ngebɔ ndaa i ngoo, tee ngɔ bɛnhɛ aa gɛ nɛɛ nɛɛ nhu lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanw laanɛɛ, ka Moosisi i nhanda indinɛi lɔɔlonga taa gɛ ma Pii Manhu Gbolo, awa tii kɛndaa o aa Iisilɛlia i aa kɛɛlaa kataa qanwa nhai fain ti bɛlɛ na laa go na nwa, kangaa Ndɛɛhu Nyaai Maleka na ai ba ba aa Iisilɛlia i ti nhiindengaa i paa natiini foli laa guangaa i ngaa tueeɔ.
58011029	Aa laanɛɛ, ka Iisilɛlia i ti Nja Gbɔu Gbɔu na leea baa tɔ ɛɛ k`a njiemaa nwɛɔ tee sia na. Kɛlɛ nhuna Iyibitia i ti gɛi tɔɔ nwɔi ti nwa, ka nja na i yeia aa tuee.
58011030	Aa laanɛɛ, ka kpingbii na nana Yɛlikoa i ti toni Yɛliko laa waa na nwa nhuna Iisilɛlia i ti mbeembeeni kati ndaa kulaa nhu mi guu ɔfɛla fanwa, Iisilɛlia i ti laanɛɛ na kɛɛ pelenga kpingbii na siina i lɔgɔa.
58011031	Aa laanɛɛ, tai ndo sia nyanha waa na Leehaabi baaiɔ ngilamaaa tii natiini ngoo tai nwaa bɛɛi Ngebɔu, gbaa nhuna Iisilɛlia i ti lii nhanda sɔgbɛ ma ndɔɔgu nhu taa waa na nhu mɛɛ nyɔugbɛa indinɛi ee na, kɛɛ ti binjanga maa nhiɛ ɔ.
58011032	Ngigbɛɛ gbɔnhu ngɔɔ kɛ? Gbaa lɔgɔ aigɔ gɛ ngeya njɛpɛlaa nhanwa Giliɔni nhanwa o, Balaaki o, Saamisini o, Yɛfita o, Leebili o, Saamɛɛli o, ka Ngebɔ letua i,
58011033	natiini aa kɛɛlaa aa laanɛɛ nhu bele, kati gɔa aa pɔlɔgɔɔ gbɔha gbɔha awa kati kunjaa hɔlɔa. Kati nana belenga tee nhanda le awa kati nana hɔlɔa Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei. Ti laanɛɛ na lɔgɔ fanwa, ka Ngebɔ i yalaa i ndaa na houa mba kangaa tɛɛ ti nwɛ,
58011034	kati ngɔmbu waa waa aa sibia, kati haa nwaa hakpaa saasigɔ eya. Ti gaanhu haa ɔɔ, kɛlɛ ka ti gaanhu gbɛndɛnga. Kati belengaɔ aa kɔɔ gulugbaangaa waa waa, awa kati kunga ti haaleengaa i ti gulugbaangaa i ma.
58011035	Aa laanɛɛ nhu bele, njiengaa i kati ti ungaabɛɛmbaa hɔlɔa boma ti huui kualaa haa na nhu. Ka ningaa lɛingaa ti yɔgɔlɔa nja lee ngɔnhu ti haaleengaa i ngeya nhaa kati haa hɔlɔa, gbɛnhaile tai kuunni taa nwaagai Ngebɔ nwa ti ba njɔgɔlɔ na nwaa hakpa. Ti indinɛi belenia gbɛnhaile ti nɛɛnwaa lɔ naɔ aa kɛɛlaa tɔɔ huua maa haa na nhu awa ti ba ndɛɛhu gbekpe hɔlɔ.
58011036	Kati ngɛɛ ngɛɛ nhɛɛnga ti lɛingaaa awa kati ti gbɔannga, awa kati ti lɛingaa gulaa kɔɛndɛa awa kati ya aa tuee kpindi bɛlɛu.
58011037	Kati ti lɛingaa baaa aa fuulu awa kati ti lɛingaa nhu lee leea aa fee fee, awa kati ti lɛingaa baa baaa aa saasigɔ. Ngemɛɛ tee lee tee ngaa mbaala gɔɔ na ka nje kɔɔ na nana tee pu ngɔ nwa ɛɛ ti nwaa ili gɔla. Kati belenga aa mbaa mbelaa, kati yɔgɔlɔa, awa kati ti houa nyɔu ɔɔ.
58011038	Ngemɛɛ tee lee tee qɛa bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu o, njie njie na nhu o, yaanga nhu o, ka pu pu nhu lɔu na. Maa ai nhiɛi nha i ba gɛɛ ningaa bondaa ɛɛ indiini, ti gbekpe ngɔ na, ti gɛ ngelou indinɛi nhu.
58011039	Ningaa indiini bɛɛ ti laa banda lɔɔ ningaa la ti laanɛɛ na nhanwa, kɛlɛ tai nana hɔlɔi Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei,
58011040	gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ oo nhanda laalaaaɔ mi nhanwa nana kpekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ. Ndaalaa na nwɛɔ aa kɛɛlaa nua o tua o, ɔɔ mi gbaunaa ngilamaaa i mi bele ngaa ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu ala gulɔɔ.
58012001	Faa nwɛɛe kina seelia gbinhi gbinhia indiini tɔ mi eya bɛɛ, ami gbɔha na guaa gbɛ o gbɛ na eya nana aa mi gulɔɔ gbibi, ka nhanda nyɔu na nana ai loto mi hou ma, amɛɛ gbaha mi gbaganɛ binhɛ nau nana i laai mi gulɔɔ.
58012002	Ami Yisɔsi gbeena nana mi laanɛɛ na yigba ngɔ na ala nhu kualaa tɔɔlomaa na nhaa ndi ɔ kpelenwaa na. Ai gbahai ngi laanɛɛ nau kpekpa ngulu naa mi lɔgɔ fanwa. Kɛlɛ na i peleni ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, haa na nana i peleni kpekpa ngulu naa, maa yakpayaa na siina ai tɔi aa gbɛ o gbɛ, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ lɔ koonhu nɛɛ nwakɛ ngɔ ala gulɔɔ, awa faa nwɛɛe alaa heii Ngebɔ nwanhayaa gbakaa na nwaa ɛha loko na nhu gaka.
58012003	A nɛgilia nana nwa i leeni ala umbaa. I gee kuni tolomayaa gbinhi gbinhi nwa kualaa nhanda nyɔu belaa eya! Awae awɛɛ pele wua wu gbɔha na waa nɛɛnwaa nyaai nhaa wu gbaha.
58012004	Gbaa wu gɔɔ na waa kɔ loganhu wui nhanda nyɔu o, wai lɛ kɔi lɛ nhaa i hiti mɛɛna taa wu baa na.
58012005	Ee njia na nana aa wu lii gbɛndɛ ɛɛ Ngebɔ i kɛi aa wuee ɛɛ ngi lengaa, kili oo nɔa wuɛɛ? "Ni lou, nhuna baa gaka, oo nhɛɛna Maliki na nwa i bi bu aa tee pele, awa bɛɛ nɛɛnwaa nyaai nhuna aa bi gbɔɔni.
58012006	Gbaa Maliki na i ningaa bu aa tee pele natiini ala lo ngɔ na aa tuee, awa i nuu o nuu gbɔɔni nana ala aa kuun ma ɛɛ ngi lou."
58012007	Faa nwɛɛe a lii lona kpɔɔni na eya nana waa hɔlɔ, gbaa Ngebɔ i wu gbɔɔni ɛɛ ngi lengaa. Ee ndou lɔ na nana ngi kɛɛgɛ ai kpɔɔni?
58012008	Ina ai wu gbɔɔnii, ɛɛ aa pele ngaa ngi lengaa i bɛɛ, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ngi guegue lengaa aile aa wuee, kɛlɛ ndo nhu lengaa nwɛ aa wuee.
58012009	Nana gbɔnhu ngɔɔ kɛ, ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, kɛɛgɛa lɔ mi eya bei ngelou i nhu natiini taa mi gbɔɔni, awa muaa mbɛɛ gɛ ngɔ tuaa. Kɛlɛ gbɔɔ tɔ mai nwaa bɛɛ mi Kɛɛgɛ nau nana i aliyana, kangaa mi ba ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ?
58012010	Gbaa tua taa mi gbɔɔnia lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa gbo aa pele na ti lo ngɔ la, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ ala i mi gbɔɔni mi gbekpenjaa nhanwa, kangaa i ba mi bele ngaa chanhai mbelaa ɛɛ ala i na.
58012011	Chaanngi nhu nhanwa, kpɔɔni na bɛɛ maa hɔlɔ maa tɔa ngaa gbaai ɔ, kɛlɛ mai tɔ ma ngaa nɛɛ ɔ. Gulɔɔ na puou, natiini ti kpɔɔni indinɛi bonda beleni aa tuee, tɔɔ maa lɛiyaa baabaa na hɔlɔa napangaa teenjaa lɛɛhu.
58012012	Faa nwɛɛe a loko na nhu laanna nana nhu haa ɔ na, ka wu ombi na nana nhu mɛgɛ mɛgɛ ngɔ na!
58012013	A siaa pele lee tee nhu wu gbala na nhanwa, kangaa mɛɛna naa gunduu ngɔ na, naa ai ba bo nga, kɛlɛ maa nhiɛ ɔ aa kɛndɛyaa hɔlɔ.
58012014	A lapia kangaa wu gɛ maa lɛi nhu aa nuu o nuu, awa wu lapi kangaa wu gɛ chanhainjaa nhu, gbɛnhaile nuu aigɔ Maliki na lɔ ina maa gee indinɛi ai ngeya.
58012015	A tɔa aa kɛɛlaa kualaa wu liiya, nuu ɛɛ gɔngaa he Ngebɔ banda bandayaa naa. Awa a sogia gbɔnhu kangaa nuu ɛɛ bele wu liiya ɛɛ ngogbɛ ulu, nana aa pele nhaanhaa lagbitia taa gɛ nwɔai. Ningaa i natiini bonda, taa baa aa kpɔu gbɔu awa taa ningaa gbinhi gbinhia ti lɛɛhu nyaaia.
58012016	Nuu ɛɛ bele ngaa ndo sia mɔɔ inaile i au bii Ngebɔ nhanda na nwanhu ɛɛ Isɔ i peleniɔ, nhuna i ndaliayaa na nwaa siai ngi ndaboogee na nwa mɛnhɛi nwɛ ngɔ ila fanwa.
58012017	Gbaa wu nhu kɔɔnaa tɔ aa kɛɛlaa poungaa nwɛɔ gila kpala ngee alaa kangaa i nduba na hɔlɔ nana ngi kɛɛgɛ na i fei. Kɛlɛ hali nha kɛɛ ngaai bua fanwa, ai hɔlɔi, gbɛnhaile ai pele gɔlii nana i ba eyaabele na nwaa lobi nda ɔ nana i pelenga.
58012018	Gbaa wua wai bai ɛɛ Iisilɛlia i ti bai njie nga nana ningaa taa sia mba, ka ngɔmbu ho nga, ka kpindi awa ka kpindi nhiɛ nhu, ka hɛfɛ mbaa le,
58012019	ka fueu na hɛmaa, ka mɛɛ nuu oo aa gua na ndabi nhu. Nhuna ningaa i ti maa oo na nwɛini, kati maa nɛɛ nɛɛ pelenga kangaa tɛhaa ngoo lagbiti nwɛi gbɔnhu,
58012020	gbɛnhaile tai kuni ngoo nau nana i gɛi, "Hali bɛnhɛ i bele ngaa nhua nwɛɛ aa sia njie nanaa fau, kataa maa hɔɔ aa fuulu nhaa ti paa."
58012021	Aa tɔmbaga, nhanda nhanda na nana ningaa i ti tɔi nhinde na siina oo pelenga ti lua nja lee ngɔnhu. Awa hali Moosisi bɛnhɛ kɛɛ gɛa, "Nya ngaa gbɛi aa ndua!"
58012022	Kɛlɛ wua woo ba Saiɔni Yie naa o ka tɔmbaga Eebɔ na laa waa na nhu, napangaa Yɛlusalɛmu na nana i aliyana, mɛɛna ngi nwalekaa wuulu wuulua i ti na.
58012023	Woo ba waa gula koonhu nɛɛ aalɔgɔ naa nana Ngebɔ bɛnhɛɛ ndengaa i taa pele, napangaa natiini ti laa na gbaali ngɔ na mɛɛ aliyana. Woo ba Ngebɔ le, nana kɔhɔ mɔɔ na aa ala nuu o nuu nhanwa bɛɛ, awa woo ba tee mbelaa i ti luu na le nana Ngebɔ i pelenga i hitia nhu.
58012024	Awa woo ba Yisɔsi le nana ngɔa ndoganhu nwɔɔ na aa ala ngilimayaa nyiɛ na nhanwa, awa woo ba fain qanwa na le nana aa nɛɛnwaa lo fe nhaanhaa gbekpengaa nhanwa, tee ngɔ nanaa Eebɛli qanwa na aa pele.
58012025	A tɔa aa kɛɛlaa awɛɛ lele aa oo nhɛɛndaa Yisɔsi nwa nana aa yɛpɛ wuee. Gbaa natiini ti leleiɔ aa oo nhɛɛndaa nuu na nwa ngelou indinɛi nhu nana i ti laanhiini, tai kpɔɔni nwaa hakpai. Ɛɛ mua mɔɔ gee maa hakpa ina maa gɔngaa he nuu naa nana aa mi laanhii, nana i mɛɛ aliyana?
58012026	Aa maa lɔgɔ nana, ka ala oo na i pɔlɔgɔɔ na gbɛia. Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu oo mi nɛɛnwaa longa gɛnhi, "Ngɔɔ pɔlɔgɔɔ na gbɛia gbɔnhu naa ila, awa ala aile gbo ngɔɔ kpele mbae kɛlɛ ngɔɔ ti gbɛia ngilamaaa tii aliyana na o."
58012027	Njia indinɛi, "naa ila gbɔnhu" alaa ndɔgɔɔu ngɔ chanhai aa kɛɛlaa, nhaanhaa i natiini Ngebɔ i ti gbatɛi tuɛɛ tɔɔ gbɛi awa tɔɔ nwɔinaa kangaa nhaanhaa i natiini tai gbɛi hali, tuɛɛ tɔɔ lo ti lomaa na.
58012028	Faa nwɛɛe kina maa manhayaa hɔlɔa nana ai gbɛi hali, ami fiɛ guaa ala nwa fanwa, awa mi ala batou ngaa pele na nana aa ala goonhu nɛɛ la, mbɛɛ nhu o ka ndua nhu.
58012029	Gbaa aa tɔmbaga, mi Eebɔ na ala bele ngɔ ɛɛ nyaai ɔmbu.
58013001	Laanɛɛ legeyaa lomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu nana kpelenwaa ai mba.
58013002	A gɛa aa hotangaa binjandaa wuee na, gbaa aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, ningaa too malekaa binjanga laɔ kɛlɛ tai kɔɔ bɛnhɛ aa kɛɛlaa malekaa nwɛɔ.
58013003	A nɛgilia aa natiini ti kpindi bɛlɛ nau, wu pele ɛɛ k`a wuɛɛ wu mbu ngilamaa. A nɛgilia aa natiini taa yɔgɔlɔ, wu pele ɛɛ k`a wua waa yɔgɔlɔ ɛɛ tua.
58013004	Ningaa i bɛɛ kataa mbɛɛ gɛ kɛmbɛa, awa nyanha belaa i ngoo tɛɛ ndo sia. Ngebɔ ɔɔ natiini kɔhɔnaa tai leeni ti gɛmbɛ hei na nhu, awa ka natiini taa ndo sia.
58013005	A loko guaa nahoo lomayaa nhu, awa nana i wu eya i wu lii lɛia. Gbaa Ngebɔ oo gɛ, "Ngaigɔ nwaa gɛ gɔha wuaa. Ngaigɔ gbee wuaa."
58013006	Ami lii gbɛndɛna awa mi gɛ, "Maliki na nya gbɔmba nwɔɔ na nwɛ, faa nwɛɛe ngaigɔ lua. Gbɛɛ nuu ɔɔ pele ngaa nge?"
58013007	A nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa wu gulɔɔ belaa i maɔ pɛnhɛɛ, natiini ti Ngebɔ oo na gɛi aa wuee. Awa wu nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla nana nwa i beleni aa tuee ti bele ngɔ na nhanwa tee naɔ, a hitɛa ti laanɛɛ na bele ngɔ na bou nwa.
58013008	Yisɔsi Kilaisi ila na gbengi, alɛɛ haai, awa alɛɛ gbɔnhu nhaa guna bɛɛ, ala nwaa ai lobi hali.
58013009	Awɛɛ fɛɛlɛ he nagɔli gɛbɛlɛ bɛɛ nana taa pele ngaa wuee, nana ɔɔ wu nwɔi pele gbekpe na nhu. Gbaa maa nhiɛ ɔ Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na aa wu nhu gbɛndɛ wu lii na nwa, kɛlɛ sɔ na nana ndaa laa ngɔ mɛnhɛi nhanwa aigɔ ku aa wu nhu gbɛndɛ aa pele ngɔ indinɛi. Natiini taa nwaa bɛɛ maa sɔ nau ai gbɔni tuaa hali.
58013010	Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa i natiini taa enge mɛɛ Yuua i taa batou na bele na, teegiyaa ai tuɛɛ taa nana nwɛ kua ngɔ aa chaaga mɛɛ chaaga gua nhinde na.
58013011	Gbaa Yuua i ti Yuu Chaaga Gua Mɔɔ waa na aa baa aa nhuaa i ti qanwa na mɛɛ Kahe mba Nhinde bombou mbaa na chaaga guandaa la nhanwa nhanda nyɔu nhanwa. Kɛlɛ nhuaa i ti lugu na k`ati mɔ ndɔgbɔa.
58013012	Awa faa nwɛɛe ka Yisɔsi i haaa ndɔgbɔa, kangaa i ningaa i bele ngaa chanhai mbelaa aa ngi qanwa na kualaa ti nhanda nyɔu na nhu.
58013013	Faa nwɛɛe ami lia ala le ndɔgbɔ naa mi gula ngi ufe naa.
58013014	Gbaa taa waa ai bei ngelou indinɛi nhu muɛɛ. Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ maa taa waa na ɔɛ ɔɛ nana paalaa i na.
58013015	Ami Ngebɔ bihɛa aa Yisɔsi nhu bele ɛɛ mi chaaga na aa gbele o gbele, napangaa mi laa yia na nana aa ngi laa na bihɛ bihɛ.
58013016	Nhanda banda belendaa o, kpɔndaa nhanwa ningaa o aa ti gɔndaa aa nana i wu eya o, a pelena, gbɛnhaile chaaga indinɛi bonda alaa Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ ngɔ.
58013017	A nwaa bɛɛa wu gulɔɔ belaa i mbu awa wu nana bele taa gɛ wu nwa wu pele. Gbaa tua taa wu luu na nwanhu gbee ɛɛ ningaa natiini kɔan kulandaa i ti eya Ngebɔ nwa ti enge na nhanwa taa pele. Faa nwɛɛe a nwaa bɛɛa tiu kangaa ti ti enge na bele ngaa koonhu nɛɛ. Inaile tɔɔ pelenaa aa nɛɛnwaa nyaai, awa maa gee na pa aigɔ bele ngaa kpɔ mba wu nhanwa.
58013018	A laaminɛa ni nhanwa. Ni nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nana naa pele, pele na nwɛ, gbɛnhaile ngɔi lɔ nuaa ni nana bele tee ngɔ gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu.
58013019	Awa ngi nɔa wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛndaa na nhu kangaa wu laaminɛ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ nya bɛɛlaa boma wuee guui nhu.
58013020	Chaanngi nhu kangaa Ngebɔ nana aa maa lɛi he, nana i huui mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsiu kualaa haa na nhu, Yisɔsi nana mbaalaa lo mɔɔ waa na aa ala, ndi ɔ aa ngi qanwa na nana i pui wɔwɔwɔ ngilimayaa na nhanwa,
58013021	kangaa maa lɛi he Ngebɔ na siina i gbɛ o gbɛ na ɔa wu eya nana kpekpe ngɔ awa kpala ngi wuaa, kangaa wu ngi guunmayaa na bele, awa kangaa ala, i nana bele mi nhu aa ala goonhu nɛɛ, awa i pele ngaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele. Awa kangaa maa bihɛ na i gɛ Yisɔsi Kilaisi nwa nhaa guna bɛɛ! Kangaa i bele.
58013022	Nya ndegea, ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ kangaa wu lii lo awa wu oo nhɛɛ ngoo indinɛi nwa nana ngi kɛa aa wuee pelendaa nhanwa, gbaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi ngi kpaalii wu nwanhu ngoo gbinhi gbinhi aile i nhu.
58013023	Kpala tɔ nyaa wu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa mi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na Timootii, too nhanda baanga mba kualaa kpindi bɛlɛ nau. Ina aa nhumbu aa ba guui nhu, ngɔɔ pelenaa ni ba nii ala o nhuna ngɔɔ ba wuee hitima na nwa.
58013024	Wu ha nuɛɛ wu gulɔɔ belaa i ma bɛɛ ka Ngebɔ ndaa i bɛɛ. Mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i ti guai Itali ti fama leeni wuɛɛ.
58013025	Kangaa Ngebɔ banda bandayaa na i gɛ wu nwa bɛɛ. Kangaa i bele.
59001001	Nya nwɛ Yemiisi aa nge, Ngebɔ o ka Maliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi ti eyaalakpandou na aa nge, ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali. Ngi fama leeni Ngebɔ ndaa i mbɛ bɛɛ ti yanja ngɔ na ngelou gbɔha i nhu.
59001002	Nya ndegea, nhuna bɛɛ nhua kɛbɛlɛ aa wu nwaai, a kpauna aa koonhu nɛɛ nhanda,
59001003	gbɛnhaile wu nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhuna wu laanɛɛ na aa ku nhua na nwa, ɔɔ pelenaa wu lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ wu laanɛɛ na nhu.
59001004	A tɔa aa kɛɛlaa wu londaa na nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ i gɛ hitii nhu, kangaa wu bele ngɔ na i ba gɛ hitii nhu gbɛ o gbɛ nhu, kangaa wai ba baa ngaa gbɛ o gbɛ.
59001005	Kɛlɛ ina wu ila kee aa baa ngaa nhu lo, i Ngebɔ nwɔɔlina laaminɛ nhu kangaa i ngɔa ala eya, awa ɔɔ ngɔaa ala eya, gbɛnhaile toko nhu nhuo ngɔ ningaa nwa bɛɛ awa ai nuu aa ufe fanwa.
59001006	Kɛlɛ nhuna nuu aa Ngebɔ nwɔɔli nhai nhanwa, i laanɛɛa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ pelenaa alɛɛ, kɛlɛ nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ ngɛɛ gɛ maa nwɔɔ na nhu, gbɛnhaile nuu na nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ ngaa gɛ nhu, ala bele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ nja yii nana hɛfɛ ngaa fɛ, i ndi mɛɛ awa i pa bei.
59001007	-
59001008	Gbaa nuu nana bonda nana nɛɛnwaa na ngaa fee, awa ngi laalaa ai lo ma, ɛɛ nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ gbɛ o gbɛ hɔlɔa Maliki na eya.
59001009	Mbaa mɔɔ na nana aa gɛ Yisɔsi bou nwa i goonhu nɛɛa nhuna Ngebɔ aa ala lɛ nga.
59001010	Awa kpatɛ nwɔɔ na nana aa nda Kilaisia, i goonhu nɛɛa boma nhuna Ngebɔ aa ala yei mbu, gbɛnhaile ɔɔ haaa lɛmbi i ngi gbatɛyaa na lo ɛɛ gbo nguu na nana ngi loolo na ai loto haa nwa.
59001011	Gbaa nhuna foo na aa gbandɛ, awa ngi le na i bu nguu loolo na nwa, aa pelenaa i be woee, ɔɔ bua mbu, awa ngi nyande na ɔɔ nyaaia. Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, kpatɛ nwɔɔ na ɔɔ haaa nhuna aa gɛ ngi gbatɛyaa na nwaa nhanda nhu.
59001012	Nduba lɔ nuu na nwa nana aa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu nhuna nhua ngaa ala nwaai, gbɛnhaile nhuna aa ku nhua na nwa nana aa ala nwaai, ɔɔ ngi baabaa na hɔlɔa aa ndɛɛhu na nana Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo fei natiini mbɛ ti lo ngɔ na aa ala.
59001013	Ina nhua ponda aa nuu hagɔli, maa nwɔɔ na ɛɛ gɛ, "Ngebɔ nwɛ aa nya hagɔli." Gbaa nhanda nyɔu ai Ngebɔ hagɔli, awa Ngebɔ gbaha na gbɔnhu ai nuu hagɔli.
59001014	Kɛlɛ feelaa nyɔu nyɔu na aa gɛ nuu na lii na nwa, alɛɛ aa ala hagɔli kangaa i nhanda nyɔu bele.
59001015	Nhu nwɛɛe nhuna ngi heelaa nyɔu nyɔu na aa lɛ ala nɛɛnwaa, aa pelenaa i nhanda nyɔu bele. Awa nhuna nhanda nyɔu na aa gbɛa hiti ɔ nhu, pounhaa na nwɛ aa haa.
59001016	Nya lomayaa laanɛɛ legea i, awɛɛ kuun nuu aa wu nwɔu mɔu.
59001017	Nhai o nhai nana kpekpe ngɔ, awa ka fembɛ o fembɛ nana hiti ɔ nhu, aliyana nwɛ kua ɔ na, kualaa Kɛɛgɛ na le nana aa waun na he kualaa feenaa na nhu, nana ala gbɔha na ai nwaa lobi ɛɛ nhai lagbiti nwaa nɛi ngaa lobi.
59001018	Aa ngi guunmayaa na kɛɛ mi gbatɛa aa ngoo na nhu bele nana tɔmbaga ɔ na, kangaa mi ba bele ngaa ningaa natiini kolo i ti nhu tee ngɔ ndɛɛhu nhu nhaia i mba bɛɛ.
59001019	A indinɛi laa nɛɛnwaae nya lomayaa laanɛɛ legea i! Nuu o nuu ɛɛ gbɛndɛɛ ngaa njia nwɛindaa, kɛlɛ i lɔgɔ gbauna yeingaa i gilaa yɛpɛ, awa i lɔgɔ gbauna boma yeingaa i gilaa gbaai.
59001020	Gbaa ndii gbaai aigɔ tee nhanda na bele nana kpala ngi Ngebɔa.
59001021	Faa nwɛɛe a loko guaa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu nana ai chanhaini ka nana bɛɛ ngeyaabele nyɔu le. A nwaa yeia Ngebɔɛ awa wu kuun ngoo na nwa nana aa nhii wu lii na nwa, nana ku ngɔ aa ndendouyaa he wu lɛɛhu naɛ.
59001022	Kɛlɛ a belena aa ningaa natiini taa nana bele ngi oo na aa kɛ, kɛlɛ awɛɛ bele ngaa mɛi mbelaa gbo kpɛti. Gbaa nuu na nana aa mɛi kpo kɛlɛ ai nwaa bɛɛi mbu ala aa gbɔha na nwɔu mɔu.
59001023	Gbaa nuu na bɛɛ nana aa ngoo na nwɛi kɛlɛ ai nwaa bɛɛi mbu, ala bele ngɔ ɛɛ nuu nana aa gbɔha gbee mɛɛmunɛ nhu.
59001024	Gbaa kina o gbɔha na gbeenga awa oo ya, nhu gutu ɔ na siina kili oo nɔa alɛɛ ala bele ngɔ na i na.
59001025	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa sɔ na gbɛngbɛ pandaa nana hiti ɔ nhu, awa nana aa nhanda baa ningaaa, awa maa nwɔɔ na i pele ɛɛ gbo maa sɔ na aa ningaa nagɔli, ina ai mɛini gbo kili aa nɔa alɛɛ, kɛlɛ i nwaa bɛɛ maa oo nau, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ala lubaa kpinhi ɔ gbɛ o gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu maa nwɔɔ na aa pele.
59001026	Ina nuu aa gbɔha gbau ngaa kɛɛlaa ala eebɔyaa ɔ, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ ai nana gbeeni aa kɛ, ngi eebɔyaa na kua ɔ fuu, awa ala aa gbɔha na nwɔu mɔu.
59001027	Nana Ngebɔ Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala i kpau ngɔ aa tɔmbaga eebɔyaa nana kpekpe ngɔ hiti ɔ nhu ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. A gɛa pondengaa i ti sago nhu tii ngɔɔ nyanhaa i ngoo ti yɔgɔlɔ na nhu ti na, awa wu sogi boma kangaa awɛɛ pele ngelou na aa wu nwaa nɔgɔ.
59002001	Nya ndegea, kina laanɛɛ belaa nwɛ aa wuee aa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi, nana mbɛɛmbayaa Nwaliki na aa ala, awɛɛ ndoganhu bai gbatɛ ningaaa aa ti lɔ ngɔ na.
59002002	Gbaa ina nuu aa ba mɛɛ waa gɛ na ngaa lɔgɔ nhu kɔɛ fanwa nana mabɔɔn hue aa gɛ ngɔgɔsiboa, awa ala nwaa ili ngɔ aa kɔla nwaa nhii nhiɛ, mbaa mɔɔ oo ba na nana maa ili ngɔ aa kɔla haga,
59002003	awa woo lii bua tɔ nuu na le tolou nana maa ili ngɔ na aa kɔla nwaa nhii nhiɛ na, woo gɛ ma, "Bia heia bei heinwaa gbekpe na," awa woo gɛ mbaa mɔɔ na nwa, "Bia lona mɛɛ, inaile heia nya ɔgɔu."
59002004	Nhuna waa indinɛi bele, ee k`a wɛa ndɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa ningaa lagbitia ti gbekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ lagbitia i mba? Awa ee wɛa belenga aa kɔhɔ mbelaa natiini ti nɛgili ɔ na nyɔu ɔ?
59002005	A oo nhɛɛndɛ nya ndegea, wua nya lo ngɔ na aa wuee, ee Ngebɔ ai mbaa mbelaa i nhu ɔhɛi ti ngelou indinɛi nhu kangaa ti gbatɛ laanɛɛ nhu, awa kangaa manhayaa na i bele ngaa ti bo nana Ngebɔ i natiini nɛɛnwaa loni fanwa ti lo ngɔ na aa ala?
59002006	Kɛlɛ woo chambo tɛa aa mbaa mɔɔ na. Ee kpatɛ belaa i ngaile taa wu gbɔɔnda ngɔ na bele, awa ti bote boma ti li aa wu guukuu njia baka mbu?
59002007	Ee tua aile taa njia nyɔu na gɛ aa mbɛɛ mba laa na nana ti uini la wuaa, napangaa Ngebɔ ndaa i?
59002008	Wɔɔ gɛa aa tee nhanda na belendaa ina waa nwaa bɛɛ Ngebɔ nwanhayaa Sɔ nau, nana i Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu gɛnhi, "Lona aa bi ndege nuu gbɔha na ɛɛ bi lo ngɔ na aa bi gbɔha na."
59002009	Kɛlɛ ina waa nuu gɔhɔ ngaa ala lɔ ngɔ na, woo lɛɛa nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhanwa, awa sɔ na ɔɔ bi gbaunaa aa sɔ ngaai mɔɔ.
59002010	Gbaa nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nwaa bɛɛ Sɔ kpɔha nau, kɛlɛ i ngaai i ila, ala lɛɛ ɔ aa Sɔ na bɛpɛ na aaindaa bɛɛ.
59002011	Gbaa ngila mɔɔ na nana i gɛi, "Awɛɛ ndo sia," alɛɛ gbɔnhu i gɛi "Awɛɛ nuu baa nhanda gbaai mba nhanwa." Hali bɛnhɛ wai ndo sia i, kɛlɛ ina waa nuu baa nhanda gbaai mba nhanwa, woo belenga aa Sɔ na aai mbelaa.
59002012	Awa a yɛpɛa awa wu eyaabele na i bele ɛɛ ningaa natiini Sɔ na ɔɔ ti gɔhɔ, napangaa Sɔ na nana aa nhanda baa muaa.
59002013	Gbaa Ngebɔ aigɔ maaumayaa lɔgɔɔu nhuna ɔɔ nuu na gɔhɔ nana ai nwaaumayaai. Kɛlɛ maaumayaa fɔha ɔ lee ngɔ kɔhɔ mba.
59002014	Nya ndegea, kolo na ngigbɛ nwɛ i nhu ina nuu aa gɛ ala laanɛɛ ɔ aa Ngebɔ, kɛlɛ ai nana bele ma nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa laanɛɛ lɔ ngeya, ee maa laanɛɛ nana ɔɔ ndendouyaa hea alɛɛ?
59002015	Ina wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ, nana kɛgɛi ngaa ala, ka wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ, nana njie ngaa ala, nana fɛli aa gɛ ma, awa ai mɛnhɛi hɔlɔ ma aa gbele o gbele,
59002016	awa wu ila kee oo gɛ ti nwa, "Kangaa Ngebɔ i wu luba! Kangaa Ngebɔ i wu gɔ aa maa ili nhaanhaa ka mɛnhɛi!" Kɛlɛ wua pa wai nana ɔai ti eya kpala ngi ti lugu naa. Kolo na ngigbɛ nwɛ i nhu?
59002017	Awae ngemɛɛ aa laanɛɛlaa aa Ngebɔ, ina nuu aa gɛ gbo ala laanɛɛ ɔ aa Ngebɔ, kɛlɛ ai nana bele ma nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa laanɛɛ lɔ ngeya, ngi laanɛɛ na siina kua ɔ fuu.
59002018	Kɛlɛ nuu siiyaa lɔ na aa gɛa, "Bia bi laanɛɛ ɔ aa Ngebɔ, awa nya ngaa nana belenaa nana aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa laanɛɛ lɔ nya eya." Awa ngɔɔ gɛa ala nwa, "Ndɔgɔɔundɛ aa nge nuu aa gee laanɛɛ nana ngeyaabele ngai mba. Ngɔɔ nya nda laanɛɛ na lɔgɔɔunaa aa biee aa nya eyaabele na bele ngɔ na."
59002019	Wu laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ i ila mɛɛ. Ina wuaa kuun ngɔ ma gɛnhi, maa nhiɛ ɔ. Kɛlɛ a ndaa nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa ngafɔngaa i kpei ti laanɛɛ ɔ, awa k`ati gbɛi aa ndua.
59002020	Bia mɔu mɔu mɔɔ indinɛi aa biee! Ee bi lo ngɔ la ti ndɔgɔɔu ngaa biee aa kɛɛlaa laanɛɛ na nana ngeyaabele ngai nhu kua ɔ fuu?
59002021	Ee ngeyaabele faa aile Ngebɔ i mi bemba na Eebilahamu beleniɔ aa tee mɔɔ ala gulɔɔ, nhuna i ngi nhiindou na Aaisaaki guai aa chaaga Ngebɔ le mɛɛ chaaga gua nhinde na?
59002022	Waa tɔa aa kɛɛlaa ngi laanɛɛ na o ala eyaabele na o kɛɛ engea ngilamaa. Ka ala eyaabele na i pelenga ngi laanɛɛ na i hitia nhu.
59002023	Awa ka Ngebɔ Gbaali na laa fenga nana i gɛi, "Ka Eebilahamu i laanɛɛa aa Ngebɔ, awa ngi laanɛɛ na nhanwa, ka Ngebɔ i ala gbaunga aa tee mɔɔ." Awae ka ningaa ti uinga alaa aa Ngebɔ gɛnwa nwɔɔ.
59002024	Woo tɔa tɔ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ aa nuu belenaa aa tee mɔɔ ala gulɔɔ ndi ɔ aa maa nwɔɔ na eyaabele na lepele, kɛlɛ laanɛɛ nhu ila ngɔ aile gbo kpɛti.
59002025	Ee pele ngɔ ila na aile gbɔnhu aa ndo sia nyanha waa na taa ui mba aa Leehaabi, nana Ngebɔ i ala belenga aa tee mɔɔ ala gulɔɔ aa ngi eyaabele na nhu bele, Iisilɛlia i fanwa i ti binjani ti lii ngu ndɛkpɛ na nwa pɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu mɛɛ Leehaabi ee na, awa kɛɛ pɛa bele lɔgɔɔunga aa tuee?
59002026	Gbaa ɛɛ gbo lɔɔ nuu na lugu na nana tuu ai gɛi nhu, poonwa nwɛɛ. Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa indinɛi, laanɛɛ na nana ngeyaabele ngai gɛi nhu kua ɔ fuu.
59003001	Nya ndegea, awɛɛ gɛ gbinhi waa bele ngaa ningaa nagɔli mbelaa. Ɛɛ wu kɔɔ ngɔ gbo tɔ aa kɛɛlaa, mua ningaa nagɔli mbelaa i ngaa muee tɔɔ mi gɔhɔnaa mbombou ngɔ tee ngɔ ningaa lagbitia i mba.
59003002	Gbaa mua bɛɛ maa gakanaa aa pele gbinhi gbinhi. Kɛlɛ ina nuu ai kaka ma nana nhu aa kɛ, maa nwɔɔ na siina kpekpe ngɔ hiti ɔ nhu, awa ala ku ngɔ aa lugu gbɔha na nwanhu gbeendaa.
59003003	Chaanngi nhu ina maa kɔu gutu gutu ɔa ɔa soia la kangaa ti nwaa bɛɛ miu, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa ti lugu gbɔha na nhaa nwɛɛ bɛɛ.
59003004	Nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlalɛ baa njaa lɛndɛ na nwa. Hali mbaa waa ɔ mbombou ngɔ, awa hɛfɛ nhu gbɛndɛ kpɛndɛ ngaa fɛa kangaa i sia gua, awa ngulu nwaa lɛbɛ lɛbɛ golo nwɛ aa pele i li mɛɛna bɛɛ kpala ngi nuu naa aa sia la kangaa i li na.
59003005	Ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu aa nɛɛ na kpapi golo nwɛ aa ala ndugu na nhanwa, kɛlɛ na nhu bɛɛ k`ɛɛ yonga lee nhanda bombou mbaa nhu. Nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlalɛ baa aa kɛɛlaa ndɔgbɔ bombou mbaa na ngɔmbu golo nwɛ tanii aa mɔ!
59003006	Nɛɛ na pele ngɔ ɛɛ ngɔmbu. Pele ngɔ ɛɛ ngeyaabele sukulu na bɛɛ nana i ngelou gbɔha i nhu. Nɛɛ na nana i kpapi na liiya i mi lugu naa, alɛɛ aa nhanda nyɔu yanja mi lugu gbɔha na nhu. Alɛɛ aa ngɔmbu la nana ɔɔ nuu na lɛɛhu gbɔha na bele ngɔ na nyaai ngaa lo fɛ, awa maa ɔmbu na siina yahandama gbɔha na nwɛ kua ɔ na.
59003007	Nuu gbɔha ku ngɔ aa nhuaa londaa, awa oo nhuaa gɛbɛlɛa lagbitia longaɔ bɛɛ, ɛɛ nhuaa gbaai gbaaia o, qɔia o, kuu kuu nhaia o, njau nhaia o.
59003008	Kɛlɛ nuu ai na nana i kungaɔ i nɛɛ na longa ɛɛ taa nhua lo. Nhai nyɔu nyɔu nwɛ awa nuu ai ku aa nhu hou. Awa ndaa fe ngɔ aa makɔi nana aa nuu baa.
59003009	Mi nɛɛ na ala nwɛ maa fiɛ gua la mi Nwaliki na nwa nana mi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala. Alɛɛ gbɔnhu maa ningaa laangaa la, natiini Ngebɔ i ti gbatɛi aa ngi guague na.
59003010	Nuu gbɔha laa ila na goo nhu, naa nwɛɛ nduba aa gua na, awa naa nwɛɛ laangaa aa gua na gbɔnhu. Nya ndegea, indinɛi bonda ɛɛ bele.
59003011	Ee nja nɛɛ nɛɛ o nja labu labu o ngunhu ila na nwɛ aa gua na?
59003012	Nya ndegea, ee maangolo ngaa wanaa kpɔɔn ngulua? Inaile ee kpɔɔn ngaa wanaa pɔpɔ ɔgɔa? Awa ai bele pa bɛnhɛ aa kɛɛlaa nja gbekpe ngi gua kpolo ya nhu.
59003013	Ee nuu lɔ na wu liiya nana nhu lo ngɔ awa i nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ nhandaa? Maa nwɔɔ na siina i ndɔgɔɔuna aa muee aa ngi lɛɛhu gbekpe na nhu bele, ngi eyaabele na maa yeiyaa nhu ka nhu lo.
59003014	Kɛlɛ ina wu lii na laa fe ngɔ aa tolo o, tolomayaa o, ka fɔɔndiyaa, awɛɛ yonga lee awae awɛɛ ndɛɛ gɔɔla tɔmbaga naa.
59003015	Nhu lo ngindinɛi bonda, nana aile aa sege mi nwanhu nae, kɛlɛ ngelou i nhu gee nwɛ. Kua ɔ nuu gbɔha nɛgili ɔ nhu, ka ngafɔngaa le.
59003016	Gbaa mɛɛna ningaa taa gɛ na ti lolo ɔ awa ti lo ngɔ la ti gbekpe tee ngɔ lagbitia i mba, yogobee ngaa gɛa na ka nhanda o nhanda nana nyɔu ɔ.
59003017	Kɛlɛ nhu lo na nana aa sege mi nwanhu na pɛnhɛɛ nhanda na nhu, chanhai ngɔ, maa lɛiyaa ɔ, maa yeiyaa ɔ, saabu lɔ mba nana kpekpe ngɔ, ndaa fe ngɔ aa maaumayaa, awa aa baa aa nguluwa kpekpe, nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ ngai nhu, awa pele manhuyaa ai nhu.
59003018	Nhuna maa enge maa lɛiyaa nhanwa, oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa moo tɔɔnhai hugu nhainga ningaa lii nwa nana aa ba aa kpekpenjaa.
59004001	Mii nwɛ mbaabaga na o ka kɔɔ gɔɔ na i wu loganhu sege ɔ na? Sege ɔ wu heelaa na le nɛɛ nɛɛ fanwa, nana ai lɛɛhu aa kɔɔ gɔɔ wu nhu.
59004002	K`awu nhaanhaa heelaa, kɛlɛ wai ku waa ti hɔlɔ, awae kawu gɛ wɔɔ ningaa baa. K`awu nhaanhaa ɔi nja lee ngɔ nhu kɛlɛ wai ku waa ti hɔlɔ, awae k`awu baabaga awa k`awu gɔɔ gɔɔ. Wai hɔlɔ ma gbɛnhaile wai Ngebɔ nwɔɔli ma fanwa.
59004003	Awa nhuna waa Ngebɔ nwɔɔli nhai nhanwa wai hɔlɔ, gbɛnhaile wai nhu nwɔɔli ma aa tee pele. Waa nhu nwɔɔlinaa gbo wu nda nɛɛ nɛɛ na nhanwa.
59004004	Wua laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa indiini ngaa wuee! Ee wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa kɛnwayaa gbatɛndaa aa ngelou na faaleenjaa nwɛ Ngebɔ le kaka? Faa nwɛɛe nuu na nana bɛɛ kpala ngi mba i bele ngaa kɛnwa nwɔɔ ngelou na nhanwa, maa nwɔɔ na siina oo gbɔha na belenga aa Ngebɔ haalee.
59004005	Awɛɛ nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa tɔmbaga ai Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu nana i gɛi, "Tuu na nana Ngebɔ i ngɔai mi nhu, maa luu na siina ndaa fe ngɔ aa tolo ɔi."
59004006	Kɛlɛ panda bandayaa na nana Ngebɔ aa fe nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ lee ngɔ. Ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Ngebɔ tolo ɔ aa ngaunwaa lɛ nwɔɔ na, kɛlɛ aa panda bandayaa hea maa yei nwɔɔ naɛ."
59004007	Faa nwɛɛe a nwaa bɛɛa Ngebɔu. A Ngafɔ mbaa na gbɛa nwa, awa ɔɔ binhɛa wuaa.
59004008	A gbɛɛa Ngebɔ gbɛlaa awa ala ɔɔ gbɛɛa wu gbɛlaa. Wua nhanda nyɔu belaa, a eyaa na uu uaa! Wua pele manhu belaa, a lii na nwaa chanhaina!
59004009	A nwaa nwɔua awa wu ɔɔ. Awu ɛɛ na gbelea awa wu ɔɔ. Awa wu goonhu nɛɛ na i belena aa maa nwɔuyaa!
59004010	A nwaa yeia Maliki na gulɔɔ, awa ɔɔ wu lɛa nga.
59004011	Nya ndegea, awɛɛ gɛ aa njia nyɔu gɛɛ gɛɛndaa loganhu. Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa njia nyɔu gɛ aa ngi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ, inaile i ala gɔhɔ, maa nwɔɔ na siina oo njia nyɔu gɛa aa Ngebɔ Sɔ na, awa oo kɔhɔnga boma. Awa ina baa Sɔ na gɔhɔ, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa bia nuu aile aa biee nana ala nwaa bɛɛlaa i na Sɔ nau, kɛlɛ Sɔ na gɔhɔ mɔɔ nwɛ aa biee.
59004012	Sɔ fee mɔɔ ila mɛɛ kele i na awa alɛɛ gbo aa Kɔhɔ na bele. Ala ila ngɔ na nwɛ gbo kele ku ngɔ aa ndendouyaa he ningaaɛ awa ka ti nyaaindaa. Kɛlɛ ele nwɛɛ aa biee baa bi ndege lou gɔhɔ?
59004013	Chaanngi nhu a oo nhɛɛndɛ nya nwa, wua na waa gɛ, "Haai inaile lian nɔɔ lia taa waa nana bonda nhu, mɛɛna nɔɔ gɛ na fogo ila fanwa, ni gɛ na ngenge nhu awa ni nahoo waa hɔlɔ."
59004014	Na nhu bɛɛ bai bi lɛɛhu na bele ngɔ na gɔɔ ɔɔ bele nda lian. Bi bele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ nduuli na nana aa lɔgɔɔu lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa awa oo lo nhu.
59004015	Nana maa nhiɛ ɔ waa kɛ ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, "Ina Ngebɔ aa kuun, nɔɔ gɛa na, awa nɔɔ indinɛi belenaa, awa nɔɔ na belenaa."
59004016	Kɛlɛ ɛɛ pele ngɔ na gbo, k`awu yonga lee wu aunwaa lɛ na nhu. Yonga nana siina bonda bɛɛ ngi nyɔu nwɛɛ.
59004017	Faa nwɛɛe nuu na nana i nhanda gbekpe na gɔɔ ngɔ pelendaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ i lele aa pelendaa, maa nwɔɔ na siina oo nhanda nyɔu belenga.
59005001	Wua kpatɛ belaa i ngaa wuee, a oo nhɛɛndɛ nya nwa! A labia aa ngɔɔ nana nhu gɔha wu gbɔu gbɔu na nhanwa nana ɔɔ wu nwaai!
59005002	Wu gbatɛyaa na oo luua awa wu gɔla na oo belenga aa ngilia laa bo.
59005003	Wu nwabɔɔn na ka wu gɔpa gɔu na oo gbuuli, awa kpuulilaa na nwɛ ɔɔ bele ngaa wu nwaa seeli, awa ɔɔ wu lugu na nwɛa ɛɛ ngɔmbu. Woo kpatɛyaa aa lɔgɔa yamana indinɛi nhu nana gbele mba Hoo na le.
59005004	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu ngenge belaa i natiini ti engei wuɛɛ wu nhɛɛ na nhu, awa ka ti baabaa na i loa wu eya wai ngɔai ti eya, a oo nhɛɛndɛ paabaa na siina nwaa chaagbe na nwa! Awa natiini ti tɔɔnhai na lɛɛ lɛɛi mba wuɛɛ, ti ɔɔ na taa pele, Maliki na nana Lamanhu Eebɔ na aa ala oo mɛinga.
59005005	Wu lɛɛhu na bei ngelou i nhu ndaa fe ngɔɔ aa nana gbo bɛɛ ngɔi i wuaa ka nɛɛ nɛɛ. Woo bɔɔlɔ foo na nhanwa tɔɔ wu haga la ɛɛ nhuaa.
59005006	Woo nuu gɔhɔnga nana ala lee ngɔ awa woo ala baaa. Kɛlɛ tai wu gbelei.
59005007	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndegea, a lii lona nhaa Maliki na i ba. A nɛɛnwaa sialɛ baa nhɛɛ la mɔɔ na nwa nhuna aa gɛ aa ngi bɔlɔgɔɔ na nwaa golondaa kangaa i ba aa tɔɔnhai nwaa nhii nhiɛ. Aa loa maa golo ma aa ndii lo nhaa pɛnhɛɛ nja na i wa awa nhanwa na i lee.
59005008	Wua gbɔnhu a lii lona. A lii na bua ngilamaa, gbaa Maliki na baalaa na maa gutu ɔ.
59005009	Nya ndegea, awɛɛ liilee liilee loganhu, kangaa Ngebɔ ai ba wu gɔhɔ. Kɔhɔ mɔɔ na maa gutu ɔ awa maa gbatɛ ɔ aa lɔgɔɔundaa.
59005010	Nya ndegea, nhuna maa yɛpɛ njɔgɔlɔ nhanwa o ka ndii lo, ami Ngebɔ letua i kpauna aa kuague, natiini ti yɛpɛi aa Maliki na laa na.
59005011	Maa uinaa tuaa aa koonhu nɛɛ belaa, gbɛnhaile kati longa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ti laanɛɛ na nhu. Woo Yoobi lii lo na nwaanhaa nwɛinga i peleni, awa wu kɔɔnaa Maliki na i gee engei ala nhanwa ngaa guanwaa na. Gbaa Maliki na ndaa fe ngɔ aa maa nwɔuyaa o ka maaumayaa.
59005012	Kɛlɛ ala na nwanhu tɔ bɛɛ nya ndegea, nhuna waa nɛɛnwaa lo fe, awɛɛ gɔa Ngebɔ nwa fanwa. Awɛɛ gɔa aliyana nwa, inaile pɔlɔgɔɔ i nwa, inaile gbɛ o gbɛ lagbiti nwa. A gɛa gbo gbɛ o gbɛ nwa "Aaha" nhuna aa bele ngaa aaha nhanda, awa a gɛa "Aanhoo" nhuna aa bele ngaa aanhoo nhanda, kangaa Ngebɔ ai ba wu gɔhɔ.
59005013	Ee wu ila kee lɔ njɔgɔlɔ nhu? Kaa laaminɛ. Ee wu ila kee goonhu nɛɛ ɔ? Kaa mbihɛ bihɛ ue aai.
59005014	Ee wu ila kee lɔ na nana hegbɛ ɔ? Kaa pele ningaa ti ui ngui mbaa waangaa i mba laanɛɛ belaa i nhu kangaa ti ba ti laaminɛ alɛɛ awa ti ngua bu ala nwa aa Maliki na laa na.
59005015	Awa laaminɛ indinɛi nana ti peleni laanɛɛ nhu ɔɔ pelenaa hegbɛ nwɔɔ na i gɛndɛ, awa Maliki na ɔɔ ala gɛndɛa. Awa ina aa bele ngaa oo ɔa ɔaa nhanda nyɔu nhu, Ngebɔ ɔɔ ndoa na alɛɛ.
