59005016	Faa nwɛɛe a gɛɛ gɛɛa aa wu nhanda nyɔu na loganhu, awa wu laaminɛ bele loganhu, kangaa wu kɛndɛyaa hɔlɔ. Tee mɔɔ na laaminɛ na aa pele fɔha bombou baa lɔ nhu kpɔ mba nhanwa.
59005017	Ilaiya nuu gbama nwɛɛɔ aa ala ɛɛ mua gbo. Kɛɛ laaminɛa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ kangaa nja wandaa ɛɛ gɛ na, awa nja ai wani pɔlɔgɔɔ i nwa fogo chawa fanwa ngi gɛlɛ.
59005018	Kɛɛ laaminɛa boma kangaa nja wandaa i gɛ na, awa ka nja i wanga, awa ka tɔɔnhai na i haaia pɔlɔgɔɔ na nwa.
59005019	Nya ndegea, a indinɛi laa nɛɛnwaa aa kɛɛlaa, ina wu ila kee oo gakanga aa kualaa tɔmbaga bele na nhu, awa wu ila kee oo bɛɛlaa na boma aa ala,
59005020	nuu na bɛɛ nana aa bɛɛla boma aa nhanda nyɔu nwɔɔ na kualaa ngi gaka pele na nhu, ɔɔ maa nwɔɔ na guaa haa nhu, awa pounhaa na ɔɔ belenaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ maa nwɔɔ na nhanda nyɔu gbinhi gbinhi na loa na alɛɛ.
60001001	Nya nwɛ Pita aa nge, Yisɔsi Kilaisi lo mɔɔ na, ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi lee Ngebɔ nhu ɔhɛ belaa i manhu natiini ti yanja ngɔ na nhu bɛɛ mɛɛ Pɔntɔsi bɔlɔgɔɔ na gaka gakanwaa o, Galeesia o, Kapalosia o, Eesia o, awa ka Bitinia.
60001002	Ngebɔ mi Kɛɛgɛ na oo wu nhu ɔhɛaɔ, ndi ɔ aa ngi laalaa na lepele, awa ngi Yina aa oo wu belenga aa ngi ndaa, kangaa wu nwaa bɛɛ Kilaisiu, awa kangaa ngi haa na i ba pele wu bele ngaa ningaa natiini ti chanhai ngɔ. Kangaa Ngebɔ i wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa o ka maa lɛi nana hiti ɔ nhu.
60001003	Ami fiɛ guaa Ngebɔ nwa, nana mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi Eebɔ na aa ala ka ngi Kɛɛgɛ na. Gbaa aa ngi nwaaumayaa bombou mbaa na, oo mi gɔa aa ndɛɛhu nyiɛ aa huulaa Yisɔsi Kilaisiu kualaa haa na nhu. Kilaisi huulaa na haa na nhu, ala nwɛ i nɛɛnwaa la he ngɔ muɛɛ nana kɛndɛ ɔ.
60001004	Faa nwɛɛ mua maa pele nhu gbee ngaa nduba gbinhi gbinhi na hɔlɔndaa nana Ngebɔ aa makɛ ngi ndaa i fanwa. Awa alaa nduba indinɛi nwakɛ ngɔ aliyana mɛɛna aigɔ luu na, inaile bɛnhɛ aigɔ nyaai na, inaile aigɔ ua.
60001005	Nduba indinɛi alaa na wu nhanwa, wua na aa wu laanɛɛ na lepele, Ngebɔ fɔha na oo wu nwakɛa kangaa gbɛ o gbɛ aigɔ bele ngaa wuee ndendouyaa na nhanwa nana Ngebɔ i maa gbatɛa ndɔgɔɔundaa nhanwa aa wuee gbele mba lɔgɔ na nhu.
60001006	A goonhu nɛɛa indinɛi nhanwa, hali i bele chaanngi wu nwaa nwɔu ɔ njɔgɔlɔ gɛbɛlɛ na nhanwa waa pele. Njɔgɔlɔ indinɛi bɛɛ alaa na gbo lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa.
60001007	Njɔgɔlɔ indinɛi bɛɛ i ba kangaa ningaa ti kɔɔ ina wu laanɛɛ na kpekpe ngɔ. Mabɔɔn na aa nyaaia, kɛlɛ k`a ngɔmbu aa nhua. Faa nwɛɛ wu laanɛɛ na nana kpekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ mabɔɔn mba, katɔɔ nhua kangaa i ba lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ. Awa indinɛi aa bele, Ngebɔ ɔɔ wu bihɛa, awa ɔɔ mbɛɛ gɛa wuaa aa lɔgɔ na Yisɔsi Kilaisi aa ba.
60001008	-
60001009	Wu lo ngɔ aa ala, hali wai lɛ tɔi chaanngi. Awa wua waa ndendouyaa hɔlɔ gbɛnhaile wu laanɛɛ ɔ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi. Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ waa goonhu nɛɛ nja lee ngɔnhu aa koonhu nɛɛ nana nuu ai ku aa maa yia gɛ.
60001010	Ndendouyaa indinɛi nhanwa, ka Ngebɔ letua i ti nhu sɔgbɛa pandaa, awa kati ngoolee na gɛa nana aa gua Ngebɔ le ngu to ngɔ fembɛ indinɛia nana Ngebɔ ɔɔ fe wuɛɛ.
60001011	Kilaisi Yina na i ti nhu kɛɛ ndɔgɔɔunga aa tuee aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi ɔɔ yɔgɔlɔa, kɛlɛ na aa lee nga, nhanda bombou mbaa ɔɔ bele pelenaa. Awa kati lapia aa kpɛngbɛndaa nhanda indinɛi bele ngɔ na ɔɔ bele, awa ka gbee na ɔɔ bele nda.
60001012	Nhuna tee yɛpɛ nhanda nhanda indinɛi nhanwa, ka Ngebɔ i ndɔgɔɔunga aa ngi letua indiini aa kɛɛlaa ti enge na ti peleniɔ ti nda qaniyaa nhaa aileɔe kɛlɛ wu nda qani na nhaa nwɛɛɔ. Awa chaanngi, ningaa i natiini taa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛɛ gɛɛ too kɛa gbɔnhu aa wuee ndaa to ngɔ nhanda ila na siina. Awa ti kɛia ndi ɔ aa Ngebɔ Yina na fɔha na nhu bele nana Ngebɔ i teeni kualaa aliyana. Hali malekaa i kpei kpala ngee tuaaɔ kangaa ti nhanda indinɛi gɔɔ.
60001013	Faa nwɛɛe a nɛɛnwaa na nwaa gbatɛa ngenge nhanwa. Awa a una. A nɛɛnwaa laa hiti ɔ nhu nduba na nhanwa nana Ngebɔ ɔɔ ngɔa wu eya nhuna Yisɔsi Kilaisi ɔɔ ba.
60001014	A nwaa bɛɛa Ngebɔu. Awɛɛ pele ngɔi nana i wuaaɔ nhuna waile Kilaisi gɔɔ ngɔ, maa ɔi na aa wu bele ngɔ na nwaa lobi chaanngi nhu,
60001015	kɛlɛ tɛɛgɛ ɛɛ gɛ wu nwa gbɛ o gbɛ na nhu bɛɛ waa pele, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ nana i uini wuaa tɛɛgɛ ai ala nwa.
60001016	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Tɛɛgɛ ɛɛ gɛ wu nwa gbɛnhaile nya gbɔha i tɛɛgɛ ai nya nwa."
60001017	Wua waa laaminɛ Ngebɔ le k`awu ui mba aa Hapa, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ ai nɛgili aa ngila mɔɔ aa kɛɛlaa kpekpe ngɔ tee ngɔ nuu lagbitia. I nuu o nuu gɔhɔ ndi ɔ aa nana lepele maa nwɔɔ na i pelenga. Faa nwɛɛe a mbɛɛ gɛa alaa ɛɛ wu na ngelou indinɛi nhu.
60001018	Gbaa wu paabaa na gɔɔnaa Ngebɔ i peleni kangaa i wu umbo kualaa wu eyaabele nyɔu na nhu nana wu bembaa i ti wu nagɔlia laɔ. Awa nhai na nana Ngebɔ i paabaa na beleni laɔ, nhai aile nana nuu aa nyaai ɛɛ mabɔɔn ngoo ka kɔpa gɔu.
60001019	Ngebɔ i wu umbonia aa Kilaisi haa na i peleni ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa nana mɔɔ gbɛndɛ ngɔ mbaɔ. Kilaisi kɛɛ belenga ɛɛ mbaala nana tɛi ngai mba hali chaaga guandaa la nhanwa.
60001020	Ngebɔ oo Kilaisi nhu ɔhɛaɔ yeingaa i gilaa ngelou indinɛi gbatɛ ɔɔ, kɛlɛ wu lɔgɔ fanwa, kɛɛ ala lɔgɔɔunga aa wuee gbele mba yamana indinɛi nhu.
60001021	Wu laanɛɛ ɔ aa Ngebɔ aa Kilaisi nhu bele, nana Ngebɔ i huui alau kualaa haa na nhu, awa oo mbɛɛ bombou mbaa hea alɛɛ. Awa indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ wu laanɛɛ ɔ aa Ngebɔ, awa wu nɛɛnwaa la ɔ gbɔnhu ala nhu.
60001022	Chaanngi nhu kina woo nwaa bɛɛa tɔmbaga nau, awa maa nwaa bɛɛ na siina nhu woo wu lii na chanhainga, awa indinɛi oo pelenga chaanngi wu ndomayaa gbekpe hɔlɔ wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i fanwa, faa nwɛɛe ndomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu aa wu lii na bɛɛ.
60001023	Ngebɔ oo wu belenga aa ngi lengaa aa ngi oo na nhu bele nana kɛndɛ ɔ awa wɔwɔwɔ kee nwɛ. Awae ndengaa nwɛ aa wuee ngungaa nhanwa natiini tai haa.
60001024	Ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Ningaa i bɛɛ ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ nguu, awa ti bombounjaa na pele ngɔ ɛɛ ngulu loolo na. Gbaa nguu na aa benaa, awa ngulu loolo na pa i bu mbu,
60001025	kɛlɛ Maliki na oo na alaa na nhaa guna bɛɛ." Maa oo na nwɛ aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ indinɛi ti kɛiɔ aa wuee.
60002001	Faa nwɛɛe a loko guaa nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhu aa pele o pele, ɛɛ ndɛɛ gɔɔlandaa o, pele manhuyaa o, tolo o, ka ngɛi piindaa.
60002002	A belena ɛɛ ndengaa lalaa awa gbɛ o gbɛ lagbiti gbala ngai tuaa k`a yinayaa nyii gbɔɛ mɔi gbo, kangaa waa kpɔɛ, wu ba ku wu ndendouyaa hɔlɔ, awa wu ba gbɛa wu laanɛɛ na nhu.
60002003	Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "wua woo Maliki na nhanda banda na lɔa aa guegue."
60002004	A baa Maliki na le, gbɛnhaile alɛɛ pele ngɔ ɛɛ kɔtu nana kɛndɛ ɔ, nana pɛlɛ lo mbelaa i ti lelei mbaɔ aa kɛɛlaa kolo ai nhu, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ oo nhu ɔhɛa aa kɛɛlaa kolo lɔ nhu.
60002005	A baa wu bele ɛɛ kɔtu nana kɛndɛ ɔ, awa a pelena kangaa Ngebɔ i ngi yinayaa bɛlɛ na lo ngaa wuee. Awa pɛlɛ indinɛiu napangaa laanɛɛ belaa i, wuɛɛ wɔɔ bele na aa Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa i. Awa wɔɔ yinayaa chaaga guu guaa nana aa Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele.
60002006	Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Nya Ngebɔ aa nge, ngoo kɔtu nhu ɔhɛa nana kolo nhu. Awa kɔtu indinɛi alɛɛ ngɔɔ to mɛɛ Saiɔni ɛɛ bahi, awa nuu o nuu nana aa laanɛɛ la, maa nwɔɔ na siina ngaigɔ ala aa ufe."
60002007	Kɔtu indinɛi kolo lɔ nhu mbombou ngɔ wu nhanwa wua wu laanɛɛa, kɛlɛ natini tai laanɛɛi, oo belenga ti nhanwa ɛɛ Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Kɔtu na nana pɛlɛ lo mbelaa i ti lelei mbaɔ aa kɛɛlaa kolo ai nhu, ala nwɛ i belenga ɛɛ bahi na."
60002008	Awa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛ gbɔnhue, "Kɔtu indinɛi ɔɔ pelenaa ningaa ti lugba mba, awa ɔɔ belenaa ɛɛ faha nana tɔɔ gula ma." Tɔɔ lugbaa mba gbɛnhaile tai laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ oo na. Awa indinɛi alɛɛ Ngebɔ i ndaalaaaɔ ti nhanwa.
60002009	Kɛlɛ wua nhu ɔhɛ belaa nwɛ aa wuee. Yuu chaaga gua mbelaa nwɛ aa wuee Manha mbaa na nhanwa. Nde mɛ aa wuee nana i gbɔha na gɔannga Ngebɔ nwa. Awa wuɛɛ Ngebɔ ndaa i ngaa wuee kpei. Ngebɔ i wu nhu ɔhɛia kangaa wu ngi enge nwaa luu lua na gɛɛ gɛɛ, napangaa Ngebɔ nana i uini wuaa kualaa kpindi na nhu ndiilaa ngi waun mbombou mbaa na nhu.
60002010	Aa lɔgɔ ila maɔ, Ngebɔ ndaa aileɔ aa wuee, kɛlɛ chaanngi woo belenga aa Ngebɔ ndaa. Awa lɔgɔ ila maɔ gbɔnhu, Ngebɔ aile ngi nwaaumayaa na lɔgɔɔu ngaa wuee, kɛlɛ chaanngi wua waa hɔlɔ.
60002011	Ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ nya ndegea ɛɛ ningaa natiini hotangaa aa tuee ngelou indinɛi nhu. Awɛɛ nana bele wu lugu na lo ngɔ la i pele, gbɛnhaile nana wu lugu na lo ngɔ la, tai mbɛ nhu tii wu luu na o.
60002012	Wu eyaabele na i gɛa gbekpeni pandaa ningaa i ndiiya natiini tai laanɛɛi, kangaa hali ti kɛ aa kɛɛlaa waa nhanda nyɔu belenaa, kɛlɛ ina taa wu eyaabele gbekpe na lɔ, tɔɔ Ngebɔ bihɛa aa foo na ɔɔ ba ma ningaa i kɔhɔ ma.
60002013	A nwaa bɛɛa ningaa i mbu bɛɛ taa pɔlɔgɔɔ na nhanda na laalaa mba kangaa Maliki na goonhu nɛɛ. A nwaa bɛɛa Hota Manha mbaa nau gbɛnhaile alɛɛ i manhu na bɛɛ.
60002014	A nwaa bɛɛa hota manhangaa i mbu, gbɛnhaile Hota Manha mbaa na nwɛ i ti nhu ɔhɛi kangaa ti ningaa i gbɔɔni natiini taa nhanda nyɔu bele, awa kangaa ti natiini mbihɛ taa nhanda banda bele.
60002015	Gbaa Ngebɔ ndo ngɔ la wu nhanda banda bele, kangaa wu mɔu mɔu mbelaa i kpele aa njia gɛɛ gɛɛndaa nana tai kɔɔ ndaa to ngɔ wuaa. Awa indinɛi ti pele gbo gbɛnhaile tai wu gɔɔ.
60002016	Wua nhanda baamba belaa nwɛ aa wuee. Kɛlɛ awɛɛ nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa kina nhanda baa ngɔ wuaa, faa nwɛɛ wɔɔ nhanda nyɔu bele. Kɛlɛ a gɛa na ɛɛ Ngebɔ eyaalakpangaa.
60002017	A mbɛɛ gɛa nuu o nuua, awa a lona aa wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i. A luaa Ngebɔa awa wu mbɛɛ gɛ Hota Manha mbaa naa.
60002018	Wua ngeyaalakpangaa, a nwaa bɛɛa wu nwanhu belaa i mbu awa wu mbɛɛ gɛ tuaa. Awɛɛ pele gbo natiini mbɛ taa nhanda banda bele wuɛɛ, kɛlɛ a pelena boma natiini mbɛ taa wu yɔgɔlɔ.
60002019	Ina taa wu gbɔɔni nhanda nyɔu nhanwa nana wai peleni, awa wu lii lo maa gbɔɔni na siinau kangaa wu Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ, Ngebɔ ɔɔ wu lubaa.
60002020	K`a mbihɛ na ngigbɛ nwɛ wɔɔ hɔlɔ ina taa wu gbanhi nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhanwa? Kɛlɛ ina taa wu gbanhi nhanda banda belendaa nhanwa, awa wu lii lo maa gbɔɔni nau, Ngebɔ ɔɔ wu lubaa.
60002021	Gbaa indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛɔ Ngebɔ i uini wuaa kangaa wu pele ɛɛ Kilaisi i peleni, gbɛnhaile Kilaisi gbɔha na kɛɛ Yɔgɔlɔa wu nhanwa.
60002022	Kilaisi ai nhanda nyɔu beleni, awa hali nuu ila kelembe ai ndɛɛ yia nwɛini ala la.
60002023	Nhuna ningaa tee ala ɛi, ai ngaa bɛɛlai ti nwa. Awa nhuna tee ala gbɔɔni, ai gɛi ti nwa, "Ngɔɔ nhanda nyɔu bele ngaa wuee." Kɛlɛ kɛɛ nɛɛnwaa laa Ngebɔ nhu nana tee Kɔhɔ mɔɔ na aa ala.
60002024	Awa Kilaisi gbɔha na nwɛ i mi nhanda nyɔu na lai umbaa aa ngi haa na i peleni ningaa nhɛɛ ngulu naa, kangaa mi bele ɛɛ k`a mi haa ɔ ngu to ngɔ nhanda nyɔu na fɔha naa, awa kangaa mi ba gɛ na teenjaa nhanwa. Awa ngi yɔgɔlɔ na oo pelenga wu kɛndɛyaa hɔlɔ.
60002025	Wu bele ngɔ ɛɛ mbaalaa natiini ti loa nhuɔ, kɛlɛ chaanngi too ba boma aa wuee kangaa wu hitɛ Nhuaa Lo mɔɔ na bou nwa ka wu Nwakɛ mɔɔ na.
60003001	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, wua nyanhaa i ngaa wuee, a nwaa bɛɛa wu nhiingaa i mbu kangaa ina nhii ngaa gɛ na nana ai laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ oo na, wu eyaabele na ɔɔ pelenaa i laanɛɛ, hali bɛnhɛ wai yɛpɛi ndaa to ngɔ Ngebɔa
60003002	gbɛnhaile tɔɔ wu eyaabele na gbekpe ngɔ na lɔa ka wu nwaa bɛɛyaa na.
60003003	Awɛɛ gɛ gbo nyandeni aa nana nhanwa waa pu nwa, ɛɛ wu u na gbatɛ gbatɛndaa o, mabɔɔn ngɔandaa ou nhu o, ka ndonwa na waa pu nwa.
60003004	Kɛlɛ kawaa nyande ndi ɔ aa wu eyaabele na lepele. A belena aa nyanhaa natiini ti lɛi ɔ nyɔɔ awa ti nwaa yei ɔ aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, gbaa indinɛi nyande mɛɛ nana ai ɔha awa alɛɛ kolo ɔ lee ngɔ bɛɛ Ngebɔ gulɔɔ.
60003005	Gbaa njiengaa i natiini ti eebɔyaa ɔ naɔ, napangaa natiini ti ti nɛɛnwaa la na bui Ngebɔ nhu, k`ati ti ti nyande na lɔgɔɔu ngɔɔ aa nwaa bɛɛlaa ti nhiingaa i mbu.
60003006	Awa ngemɛɛ Sela ee naɔ, kɛɛ nwaa bɛɛa ngi nhii nau Eebilahamu, awa kɛɛ uinga alaa aa ala nwanhu nwɔɔ. Chaanngi ina waa nhanda gbekpe pele awa wai luai gbɛ o gbɛa, woo belenga aa ngi nyanhalengaa.
60003007	Wua gbɔnhu nyanha belaa i ngaa wuee, a gɛa na wui wu nyanhaa i ngoo aa pele na nana tee ngɔ. Awa a mbɛɛ gɛa tuaa gbɛnhaile njiengaa nwɛ aa tuee, kaanhu ai tuaa ɛɛ kɛgɛingaa. A mbɛɛ gɛa tuaa gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti gɔa aa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na ɛɛ ɔɔ wu gɔ la gbo. A indinɛi belena kangaa gbɛ o gbɛ ai ba wu laaminɛ na nyaai.
60003008	Yeingaa ngɛɛ ngɔɔ gbele, kang~a~a indinɛi gɛ aa wuee. A gɛa ngoo ila nhu, awa a gbɔna wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i mba. A ndomayaa lɔgɔɔuna aa tuee, awa awɛɛ aunwaa lɛ.
60003009	Awɛɛ nhanda nyɔu aa bɛɛlaa natiini ma taa nhanda nyɔu bele ngaa wuee. Awɛɛ taangaa aa bɛɛlaa natiini ma taa wu laangaa. Kɛlɛ a Ngebɔ nwɔɔlina kangaa i ningaa i siina luba, gbɛnhaile indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ Ngebɔ i uini wuaa kangaa wu nduba hɔlɔ.
60003010	Ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ Gbaali na i gɛi, "Nuu o nuu nana ndo ngɔ la i ndɛɛhu aa nɛɛ ɔ gɔɔ, awa ndo ngɔ la gbɔnhu i au bɛɛ lɔgɔ gbekpe ma, kaa gbe ngaa njia nyɔu gɛndaa o ka ndɛɛ gɔɔlandaa.
60003011	Awa maa nwɔɔ na kaa gbe ngaa nhanda nyɔu belendaa awa i nana bele kpekpe ngɔ, awa kaa lapi nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa maa lɛi gɔlindaa aa ala nɛɛnwaa na bɛɛ.
60003012	Gbaa Maliki na i tee mbelaa i manhu gbee, awa i oo nhɛɛ gbɔnhu ti laaminɛ na nwa taa pele. Kɛlɛ Ngebɔ ai loni aa ningaa i natiini taa nhanda nyɔu bele."
60003013	Nuu na ngigbɛɛ ɔɔ nhanda nyɔu bele ngaa wuee ina wu lo ngɔ wu nhanda gbekpe pele?
60003014	Kɛlɛ hali bɛnhɛ ti wu gbɔɔni tee nhanda belendaa nhanwa, Ngebɔ ɔɔ wu lubaa. Faa nwɛɛ awɛɛ lua nuu o nuua, awa awɛɛ lii nhɛɛ.
60003015	Kɛlɛ a Kilaisi batouna ɛɛ Maliki wu lii na nwa. A nwaa gbatɛa aa lɔgɔ o lɔgɔ kangaa wu nuu o nuu gbɛɛmbo nana aa wu nwɔɔli kangaa wu kɛ aa ala ndaa to ngɔ nɛɛnwaa la na nhanwa i wu nhu,
60003016	kɛlɛ a pelena aa maa yeiyaa o ka mbɛɛ. Awɛɛ nhanda nyɔu bele, kangaa nhuna ningaa taa njia nyɔu gɛ ndaa to ngɔ wuaa, ti ba lo ngufe nhu, gbɛnhaile too njia nyɔu gɛa nana ndaa to ngɔ wu nhanda gbekpe naa waa pele ɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa aa Kilaisi.
60003017	Maa nhiɛ ɔ aa kpɔu gbɔu hɔlɔndaa teenjaa nhanwa ina a bele ngaa Ngebɔ guunmayaa, tee ngɔ kpɔu gbɔu hɔlɔndaa nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhanwa.
60003018	Gbaa Kilaisi kɛɛ haaa naa ila kele mi nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa, awa kpɔha nhu haa nwɛɔ i peleni. Ala ai nhanda nyɔu belenie kɛlɛ kɛɛ haaa nhanda nyɔu bele mbelaa i fanwa. Awa indinɛi i belenia kangaa i ba aa muee Ngebɔ le. Ngu to ngɔ na ala lugu naa, kɛɛ haaa, kɛlɛ ngu to ngɔ na ngi luu naa ai haai kɛlɛ kɛndɛ ɔ.
60003019	Awa maa gɛndɛyaa na nhu kɛɛ ya i ngi oo na gɛa aa ningaa i ti luua i natiini ti maa golo nhu kpindi bɛlɛu ti gɔhɔndaa nhanwa.
60003020	Tuua indiini ningaa i ti luua i mɛ natiini tai nwaa bɛɛiɔ Ngebɔu. Ngebɔ kɛɛ fɛɛlɛ hea tuɛɛ kangaa ti ba pele ngɔɔ nhuna Nɔa ee njaa lɛndɛ waa na gbatɛ. Ningaa tee ɔsaakpa ɔɔ kpɛti tua nwɛɔ ti ɔai njaa lɛndɛ na nhu awa kati ndendouyaa hɔlɔa aa teendaa aa nja na nhu bele.
60003021	Ngebɔ Ua pele ngɔ ɛɛ indinɛi. Ngebɔ Ua ai na maa nɔgɔ guandaa nhanwa nuu lugu nwa. Alaa na nɛɛnwaa lo fendaa nhanwa Ngebɔɛ kualaa nɛɛnwaa gue nhu. Awa chaanngi nhu Ngebɔ Ua nwɛ aa ndendouyaa he wuɛɛ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi huulaa na nhu bele kualaa haa nhu.
60003022	Yisɔsi indinɛi nana Ngebɔ i huua alau kualaa haa na nhu ala nwɛ i ya aliyana, awa alaa heii Ngebɔ ɛha loko na nhu gaka, awa alaa fɔha la malekaa i manhu ka yinaa gɛbɛlɛa bɛɛ natiini fɔha i tuaa awa taa fɔha la.
60004001	Kilaisi lugu na kati kpɔɔnia, faa nwɛɛe wua kpei kawaa nwaa gbatɛ aa nɛgililaa aa pele na Kilaisi i peleni la. Gbaa ina nuu aa yɔgɔlɔ ndugu na nhu, ala loko ai gɛ gbɔnhu nhanda nyɔu belendaa nhu.
60004002	Awa kualaama tɔ aa lɔgɔ indinɛi nhaa aa lɔgɔ na bɔɔ gɛ la ngelou indinɛi nhu, bɛɛ nana bele kpala ngi ningaa i mba bi pele, kɛlɛ nana belena Ngebɔ lo ngɔ la bi pele.
60004003	Aa pɛnhɛɛ naɔ kawu nana belenga laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa i tee pele pele. Nhanda na wee pele pele ngɔɔ ngufe maa nhanda nwɛɔ, napangaa ndo siandaa o, feelaa nyɔu nyɔu o, ndɔɔ hounjaa o, ndɔɔ gbɔɛ gbɔɛ kpolo o, ka ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa batoundaa.
60004004	Awa chaanngi ningaa i natiini tai laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ too gbɛia wuaa, gbɛnhaile tai wu lɔ ma gbɔnhu waa nhanda nyɔu indinɛi bonda bele pele nana tua taa pele, awa faa nwɛɛ taa njia nyɔu gɛ ndaa to ngɔ wuaa.
60004005	Kɛlɛ kɔan kulandaa ɔɔ gɛa ti eya Ngebɔ le ti gbɔha nhanwa, nana maa gbatɛ ɔ aa kɛndɛ belaa i kɔhɔndaa o ka haa belaa i.
60004006	Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ Kilaisi i ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛiɔ gbɔnhu aa haa belaa i. Tua nwɛ Ngebɔ i ti gɔhɔnga aa kɛɛlaa kataa haa ɛɛ gbo ningaa bɛ katɔɔ haa. Kilaisi i ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na gɛia aa tuee kangaa ti gɛ na ti luu na nhu aa pele na Ngebɔ i na.
60004007	Ngelou na gbelelaa nhu ai gɔha gbɔnhu, faa nwɛɛe a gɛa kuni aa gbɔha nhu houndaa, awa wu aa gɛ loni kangaa wu ku wu laaminɛ.
60004008	Awa nana kpekpe ngɔ tee ngɔ bɛɛ, ala nwɛ aa indinɛi ngi baa kɛ, k`a ndomayaa aa gɛ wu loganhu nana hiti ɔ nhu, gbɛnhaile ndomayaa alɛɛ aa nhanda nyɔu gbinhi gbinhi nwaa gbibi.
60004009	Awa a gɛa aa nhanda gbatɛndaa loganhu aa koonhu nɛɛ.
60004010	Kina nuu o nuu oo tɔɔgɔɔ hembɛ hɔlɔa kualaa Ngebɔ le, faa nwɛɛe kaa enge la kpɔndaa nhanwa ngi ndegea i mba. Awa aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, nuu o nuu ɔɔ engea maa nhiɛ ɔ aa fembɛ gɛbɛlɛ na nana Ngebɔ i fei wuɛɛ.
60004011	Nuu na bɛɛ aa bele ngaa Ngebɔ yia gɛ mɔɔ, kaa Ngebɔ oo na gɛ. Awa nuu na bɛɛ kpɔmba nwɔɔ aa ala, kaa gbɔ ningaa lagbitia i mba aa kaanhu gua na nana Ngebɔ aa fe alɛɛ. Nana nhu bɛɛ waa pele, wu pele kangaa Ngebɔ i mbihɛ hɔlɔ aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele. Fɔha o mbɛɛ o i gɛ ala nwa nhaa guna bɛɛ. I belena.
60004012	Nya ndege laanɛɛ belaa, nhua kpɛndɛ kpɛndɛ ngindinɛi waa yɔgɔlɔ mbu ɛɛ pele waa gbɛi, ɛɛ nhanda nana ai lɛ beleniɔ, k`a alɛɛ aa bele ngaa wuee.
60004013	Kɛlɛ a goonhu nɛɛa aa kɛɛlaa wua waa yɔgɔlɔ ɛɛ Kilaisi i yɔgɔlɔi, kangaa wu ba goonhu nɛɛ aa lɔgɔ na nhuna aa ba ma, awa wu ba ngi bombounjaa na gɔɔ.
60004014	Nduba lɔ wu nwa ina ningaa taa wu ɛi wu laanɛɛ ɔ na nhanwa aa Kilaisi. Indinɛi nwɛ aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ Yina na alaa wu nwa.
60004015	Nuu ɛɛ yɔgɔlɔ nhanda nhanda indinɛi bonda belendaa nhanwa, ɛɛ nuu baandaa o, nwɔa o, nhanda nyɔu o, ka pii piindaa ningaa lagbitia ti nhanda nhu.
60004016	Kɛlɛ ina taa nuu yɔgɔlɔ indinɛi nhanwa nana laanɛɛ nwɔɔ aa ala, ɛɛ ufe fanwa. I Ngebɔ bihɛa gbɛnhaile laanɛɛ nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala.
60004017	Lɔgɔ na oo hiti nhu ningaa i kɔhɔndaa nhanwa, awa Ngebɔ ndaa i tuɛɛ pɛnhɛɛ ɔɔ ti gɔhɔ. Ina kɔhɔ na aa lɔɔlo muaa, gbɛɛ ɔɔ bele ngaa ningaa i natiini tai laanɛɛi aa ngoo nwaa nhii nhiɛ na nana i guai Ngebɔ le?
60004018	Gbaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔe tee mɔɔ nhanwa aa ndɛndouyaa hɔlɔndaa. K`a gbɛɛ tɔ ɔɔ bele ngaa nuu na nana ai laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ awa ala eyaabele na nyɔu ɔ?"
60004019	Faa nwɛɛe ningaa i natiini taa yɔgɔlɔ gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ guunmayaa na nwɛ, kataa gbɔha na gɔan Ngebɔ nwa ndi ɔ aa ti eyaabele na lepele. Ala nwɛ i ti gbatɛi, awa taa nɛɛnwaa laa ala nhu.
60005001	Nya Pita aa nge ngila mɔɔ nwɛ aa nge mbaa waangaa i ndiiya, awa seeli nwɛ gbɔnhu aa nge Kilaisi yɔgɔlɔ na nhanwa i peleni. Awa ngɔɔ belenaa aa kpapi hɔlɔ mɔɔ nduba naa nana Ngebɔ ɔɔ ndɔgɔɔu. Faa nwɛɛe ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ wua mbaa waangaa i ngaa wuee laanɛɛ belaa i ndiiya. Ngi wu nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ,
60005002	kangaa wu Ngebɔ ndaa i manhu gbee ɛɛ mbaalaa lo mbelaa i taa ti baalaa i manhu gbee. Ngebɔ nwɛ i ti ɔai wu eya kangaa wu ti nwanhu gbee. Awɛɛ indinɛi bele ɛɛ kɔɔbi nhanda, kɛlɛ a pelena gbɛnhaile wu lo ngɔ la wu Ngebɔ goonhu nɛɛ. Awa awɛɛ pele paabaa nhanwa, kɛlɛ a pelena gbɛnhaile wu goonhu nɛɛ ɔ aa pelendaa.
60005003	Awɛɛ bele ɛɛ ningaa nwanhu belaa natiini manhu Ngebɔ i ti ɔaa wu eya, kɛlɛ a ndɔgɔɔuna aa tuee taa gee gɛ na ndi ɔ aa wu eyaabele na bele ngɔ na.
60005004	Awa nhuna Mbaalaa Lo mɔɔ waa na aa ba, ɔɔ niɔu mbombou mbaa na ɔaa wu eya nana mbɛɛ bombou mbaa i mba, nana ɔɔ gɛ wu eya nhaa guna bɛɛ.
60005005	Awa wua ndakpangaa i ngaa wuee, aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, kawaa nwaa bɛɛ wu waa waangaa i mbu. Ngi kɛ aa wuee bɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa awɛɛ bele ngaa ngaunwaa lɛ belaa, awa awɛɛ nɛgili aa kɛɛlaa wu gbekpe ngɔ lee ngɔ ningaa lagbitia i mba. Ngebɔ Gbaali na ɛgɛe "Ngebɔ ai loni aa ngaunwaa lɛ belaa, kɛlɛ i gbɔ natiini mba ti nwaa yei ɔ."
60005006	Wuaa Ngebɔ fɔha nau, awae a nwaa yeia, kangaa nhuna ngi lɔgɔ na aa hiti ma, i ba wu lɛ nga.
60005007	Wu lii nhɛɛ na bɛɛ a ndoa aa Ngebɔ, gbɛnhaile alɛɛ aa wu nwanhu gbee.
60005008	Wu aa gɛa loni, awa awɛɛ nɔa nwa gbɛnhaile wu haalee na, napangaa Ngafɔ mbaa na, alaa lee tee ngaa au sia aa nuu ɛɛ kɔi aa gɛ aa kpɔulaa maa nuu na siina nyaaindaa nhanwa.
60005009	A lona nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ wu laanɛɛ na nhu awa wu gbee alaa. Gbaa wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wu ndege laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ ngelou indinɛi nhu tua taa yɔgɔlɔ ɛɛ wua waa yɔgɔlɔ.
60005010	Kɛlɛ waa golo gɛ yɔgɔlɔi lɔgɔ nhu gutu nhanwa, Ngebɔ ɔɔ pelenaa wu bele ngaa ningaa natiini ti hiti ɔ nhu, awa ɔɔ pelenaa wu nhu gbɛndɛ ka wu laanɛɛ na, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ nana aa panda bandayaa na bɛɛ aa ndɔgɔɔu ngaa ningaa ala nwɛ i uinga wuaa, kangaa wu kpapi hɔlɔ ngi wɔwɔwɔ mbɛɛ naa wu hounwayaa na nhu wui Kilaisi o.
60005011	Fɔha i gɛa alaa nhaa guna bɛɛ. I belena.
60005012	Sailasi nwɛ i ngooleekɔɔ gutu indinɛi gbaalii nyɛɛ. Nya laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nuu nwɛɛ nana ngaa hagba la nhu. Ngoo ngooleekɔɔ gbaalia kangaa ngi wu lii gbɛndɛ, tii nya seeliyaa na lɔgɔɔundaa o aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa nana ngi kpaalia wu nwanhu ngu to ngɔ Ngebɔ lɔmbaga banda bandayaa naa. A lona nhu nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ.
60005013	Laanɛɛ belaa i ti mɛɛ Babilɔni laa waa na nhu ti hai wu nwa. Tua gbɔnhu Ngebɔ oo ti nhu ɔhɛa. Nya nhiindou na gbɔnhu Maaki i hai wu nwa.
60005014	Wu ha nuɛɛ gbɔha na nwa loganhu pandaa ɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa. Kangaa maa lɛi i gɛ wu nwa bɛɛ wua laanɛɛ belaa i ngaa wuee aa Kilaisi.
61001001	Nya nwɛ Saimɔni Pita aa nge, Yisɔsi Kilaisi eyaalakpandou na ka ngi lo mɔɔ na. Nya nwɛ ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali natiini manhu ti laanɛɛ hɔlɔa nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ mi nda na, aa mi Eebɔ na leenjaa na nhu bele o ka Ndendouyaa He Mɔɔ na Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
61001002	Kangaa panda bandayaa o ka maa lɛi i bele ngaa wu bo nana mbunde ngɔ aa Ngebɔ gɔɔnjaa na nhu bele i wu nhu ka Maliki na Yisɔsi gɔɔnjaa na.
61001003	Ngebɔ fɔha bombou mbaa na oo gbɛ o gbɛ na ɔaa mi eya nana kpala ngi muaa kangaa mi gɛ na ala nhanwa aa tɔmbaga, ndi ɔ aa nuu na gɔɔndaa na nana i uini muaa kangaa mi kpapi hɔlɔ ngi nda bɛɛ bombou mbaa naa o ka ngi gbekpenjaa naa.
61001004	Awa pele indinɛi nwɛ i mi gɔa la aa fembɛ nana mbombou ngɔ awa kolo ɔ ɛɛ gbo i mi nɛɛnwaa loniɔ, kangaa ndi ɔ na aa fembɛ indinɛi lepele, wu ba ku wu bɛa feelaa nyɔu nyɔu naa nana i ningaaa ngelou indinɛi nhu, nana aa ti nyaai, awa kangaa wu eyaabele na i ba bele ɛɛ Ngebɔ nda na.
61001005	Indinɛi nhanwae a lapia kangaa wu wu laanɛɛ na nwaa lo ngaa kpekpenjaa.
61001006	Awa wu gbekpenjaa na le, a kɔɔnjaa nwaa lona ma. Awa wu gɔɔnjaa na le, a gbɔha nhu houndaa nwaa lona ma, awa wu gbɔha na nhu houndaa le, a maalona aa ndii lo, wu lii lonjaa na le, a maalona aa ngebɔyaa,
61001007	awa wu eebɔyaa na le, a maalona aa ndegeyaa nhanda banda, awa wu legeyaa nhanda banda na le, a maalona aa ndomayaa.
61001008	Ina nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ waa pele ngaa lɔgɔ bɛɛ, awa k`awu maalo ngaa pelendaa, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa mi Nwaliki na gɔɔndaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi ɛa peleni wu lɛɛhu na aa gua fuu.
61001009	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana ai nhanda indinɛi beleni bɛɛ, ala bele ngɔ ɛɛ nuu na nana ala liti ɔ inaile ai ku aa gɔhanwaa lɔ. Maa nwɔɔ na kili oo nɔa alɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ oo ala chanhainga kualaa ngi nhanda nyɔu na nhu nana ee pele ngɔɔ.
61001010	Faa nwɛɛe nya ndege laanɛɛ belaa, a lapia pandaa kangaa wu ba ndɔgɔɔu wu eyaabele na nhu aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ oo uinga wuaa, awa oo wu nhu ɔhɛa. Awa ina waa indinɛi bele, waigɔ gbaha wu laanɛɛ na nhu.
61001011	Aa pele ngɔ indinɛi Ngebɔ ɔɔ fɛɛlɛ hiti hiti nhu ɔaa wu eya ngɔalaa nhanwa manhayaa na la nana mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi bo mɛɛ, nana Ndendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala. Maa nwanhayaa na siina kpelenwaa ai mba.
61001012	Awae nya lo ngɔ la ngi nhanda indinɛi gili hitɛ wuɛɛ bɛɛ aa gbele o gbele. Ngɔɔ indinɛi belenaa hali tɔ wu kɔɔnaa, awa hali tɔ bɛnhɛ wu nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ tɔmbaga na nhu nana wu hɔlɔa.
61001013	Nya nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa maa nhiɛ ɔ nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ ngaa kili hitɛ wuɛɛ nhuna ngi ngelou i nhu lɛ.
61001014	Nyaa kɔɔ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa nya haalaa na nhu ai gɔha gbɔnhu ɛɛ mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi i kɛi aa nge kpou.
61001015	Awae ngɔɔ lapia kangaa ngi pele gɔli nana ɔɔ pele wu nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla nhanda indinɛi nwa bɛɛ aa gbele o gbele nhuna ngɔɔ gɛ haai.
61001016	Nua noo kɛaɔ aa wuee ndaa to ngɔ mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi fɔha naa o ka ala baalaa na. Nai njia ɔha gɛiɔ aa wuee nana nuu i kɛi aa nuee, kɛlɛ nua kpei kani ngi bombounjaa na lɔa aa ni nda au na.
61001017	Nua nee naanɔɔ nhuna Ngebɔ nana Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, i Yisɔsi bihɛi awa kɛɛ mbɛɛ bombou mbaa hea alɛɛ. Maa lɔgɔ na nwɛɔ Ngebɔ i yiai kualaa aliyana gɛnhi, "Indinɛi nya lomayaa Lou na nwɛ, awa nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ ala nwa."
61001018	Nua kpei nuɛɛ ni Ngebɔ oo na nwɛini nhuna i yɛpɛi kualaa aliyana nhuna nee njie naa nii Yisɔsi o.
61001019	Awa faa nwɛɛe nana Ngebɔ letua i ti kɛiɔ, nuaa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ mba pandaa. Awa wɔɔ pelenaa maa nhiɛ ɔ ina waa oo nhɛɛ ti nwa ɛɛ waun ngaa huo kpindi nhu. Kawaa gɛ aa indinɛi belendaa nhaa ngee na o awa ng`e~enhu leelega na i huo wu lii na nwa.
61001020	Pɛnhɛɛ nhanda na ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, kawaa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ aa kɛɛlaa nuu ai ku ala gbɔha nhu aa nana nhu huo fuo Ngebɔ letua i ti kɛi kualaa Ngebɔ Gbaali na nhu.
61001021	Gbaa Ngebɔ letua i tai ngoo gɛi nana sege ɔ ti guegue nɛgili nhue kɛlɛ Ngebɔ Yina na alɛɛ i peleni tee ngoolee na gɛɛ gɛɛ nana i guai Ngebɔ le.
61002001	Ndɛɛ lɛɛ letua tee naanɔɔ Iisilɛlia i ndiiya, awa ngemɛɛ gbɔnhu ndɛɛ lɛɛ ningaa nagɔli mbelaa tɔɔ gɛ na wu liiya. Tɔɔ baa aa ndɛɛ lɛɛ nagɔli nana aa ningaa u ndo nhu. Awa tɔɔ nwaagaia Manhu nwɔɔ na nwa nana i ti umboni. Indinɛi alɛɛ ɔɔ pele ti haa hɔlɔ lɛmbi.
61002002	Ningaa gbinhi gbinhia tɔɔ nhanda nyɔu na belenaa nana tua taa pele. Awa ti eyaabele na nhanwa, ningaa gbinhi ɔ tɔɔ yɛpɛa nyɔu ɔ ndaa to ngɔ tɔmbaga Bele naa.
61002003	Ndɛɛ lɛɛ ningaa nagɔli mbelaa indiini, nahoo nwɔi waa ɔɔ gɛa tuaa. Tɔɔ qani hɔlɔa wu nhu ndi ɔ aa ndɛɛ na lepele nana taa kɔɔla gɔɔla wuaa. Indinɛi nhanwa, Ngebɔ oo ndaalaaaɔ giilɛ aa ti gbɔɔnindaa, awa ti nyaai mɔɔ na ai njii nhu.
61002004	Ngebɔ kɛɛ malekaa i kpɔɔnia nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa ti peleni, awa kɛɛ ti biinga mɛɛ yahandama. Naa nwɛɛ tɔɔ gɛ na kpindi nhu nhaa Kɔhɔ Foo na i hiti.
61002005	Aa pɛnhɛɛ naɔ, ka Ngebɔ i ngelou na gbɔɔnia aa nja he mbombou mbaa, kɛlɛ k`a Nɔa gbo nana ee yɛpɛ ningaa i ngee teenjaa nhanda belendaa nhanwa, ala nwɛɔ gbo i loi ai haaiɔ aa maa lɔgɔ nana, tii ningaa ɔfɛlangaa lagbitia o. Gbaa ka Ngebɔ i pelenga nja he na i ngelou gbɔha na nwaa gbibia ningaa i ti nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa.
61002006	Ngebɔ kɛɛ taa waa waa fee mɔnga kpugu. Taa waa waa na siina ala nwɛɔ aa Sɔlɔmu o ka Gɔmola. Awa i indinɛi belenia kangaa i ba bele ngaa kuague nana nhanwa ɔɔ pele ngaa ningaa nyɔu nyɔua i.
61002007	Kɛlɛ ka Ngebɔ i pelenga kpɔu gbɔu indinɛi i biinga Lɔɔti nwanhu, gbɛnhaile nuu gbekpe mɛɛɔ aa Lɔɔti. Awa koonhu ai nɛɛi nhanda nyɔu na nwa nana sɔ ngaai mbelaa i tee pele taa waa waa indi nhu.
61002008	Tee mɔɔ indinɛi Lɔɔti, nana ee ningaa nyɔu nyɔua indiini ndiiya, awa aa foo o foo kɛɛ naa lɔa, awa kɛɛ mɛinga nhanda nyɔu na nana taa pele pele. Awa kɛɛ gbaaia alaa.
61002009	Indinɛi oo lɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa ningaa i natiini ti leo ɔ nhanda nhu, ina nhua ngaa ti nwaai, Maliki na mbɛɛi ɔ aa ti guandaa nhua na siina nhu. Awa mbɛɛi ɔ gbɔnhu aa ningaa nyɔu nyɔua i pundaa kpɔɔni nhu nhaa Kɔhɔ Foo na i hiti.
61002010	Ningaa i tɔ bɛnhɛ Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti gbɔɔni tee ngɔ na tɔ bɛɛ, tua nwɛ aa natiini taa nhanda nyɔu bele ɛɛ gbo ti lii na aa ti gɔ pelendaa nhanwa, awa tai nwaa bɛɛ Ngebɔ fɔha nau. Ndɛɛ lɛɛ ningaa nagɔli mbelaa indiini ti aunwaa lɛ ɔ. Tai lua, awa tai lua bɛnhɛ aa mbɛɛmba belaa bombou mbaa i ngɛindaa ti mɛɛ aliyana.
61002011	Hali bɛnhɛ malekaa i, fɔha na nana i tuaa, nana tee ngɔ na ningaa nagɔli mbelaa i indiini ti nda fɔha naa, malekaa i siina, tai njia hɔɔlɛ hɔɔlɛ ma aa ngɛi ngoo ndɛɛ lɛɛ ningaa nagɔli mbelaa indiini mba mɛɛ Maliki na gulɔɔ.
61002012	Kɛlɛ ndakpangaa indiini, ti nɛgili ɔ na o ka ti eyaabele na, pele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ nhuaa i natiini ti na gbo ti houndaa nhanwa ka ti baandaa. Ndakpangaa indiini, k`ati njia nyɔu gɛ ndaa to ngɔ nhanda naa nana tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ mba. Awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti nyaaia ɛɛ nhuaa gbaai gbaaia,
61002013	awa nhanda nyɔu nyɔu ɔɔ belenaa aa tuee nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa nana ti pelengaɔ. Tua ti nɛgili ɔ aa kɛɛlaa nhanda nwaa nhii nhiɛ nwɛ ti nhanwa aa nhanda nyɔu belendaa aa foo kende nana aa ti lii lɛi. Maa ufe ngɔ, awa maa lua ɔ bɛnhɛ nhuna taa nwaa gbɔ tii wua o ngilamaaa mɛnhɛi nwɛ ma. Indinɛi bɛɛ taa pele, mɔu mɔu mɛɛ ti lo ngɔ la ti wu nwɔu mɔu.
61002014	K`ati au sia aa njiengaa aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ kangaa ti ndo sia aa tuee. Tai gbele aa nhanda nyɔu belendaa. K`ati ningaa nwɔu mɔu natiini ti yaaiyaai ɔ na ti laanɛɛ na nhu. Ti lii na lɔ nagɔli hɔlɔ ngɔ kɔɔli fanwa, awa Ngebɔ lɔ ti laangaa ngɔ awa maa laangaa na siina alaa ti nwa!
61002015	Too gua pele gbekpe na nhu awa too ya aa kaka pele na. Too hitɛ Beelamu gaka pele na bou nwa, napangaa Beelamu nana Beɔ nhiindou na aa alaɔ. Awa Beelamu indinɛi nuu nwɛɛɔ nana ndo ngɔɔ aa nahoo nana aa hou hou kualaa ngi eyaabele nyɔu na nhu.
61002016	Kɛlɛ ka Ngebɔ i yiaa ala nwa ngi nhanda nyɔu na nhanwa nana ee pele pele. Gbaa bapu na nana ee ma heii ee sia aa ala, ka maa bapu na i yɛpɛa ala le ɛɛ nuu gbɔha aa yɛpɛ, awa ka maa yɛpɛ na siina i pelenga Beelamu i gbelea aa ngi nwɔuyaa nhanda na belendaa.
61002017	Ningaa indiini bonda, ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ nja loga nana nhu bɛɛi ɔ kpegele. Awa ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ nikpi ngaa gɛ aa teendaa Ngebɔ naa nana hɛfɛ mbaa aa fɛ. Awa tua na siina, Ngebɔ oo nhinde nwakɛa ti nhanwa mɛɛna naa gbindi ɔ tiisii.
61002018	K`ati mɔu mɔu ngaunwaa lɛ yia gɛɛ gɛɛ, nana taa natiini mɔu mɔu nda ti loganhu gɔɛa gbo chaan aa natiini ti nhanda nyɔu belendaa nwaa hei nhu.
61002019	K`ati ti nɛɛnwaa lo ngaa kɛɛlaa nhanda ɔɔ baanaa tuaa, kɛlɛ tua ti gbɔha na, nduaa nwɛ aa tuee ti nda guegue eyaabele na eya nana ɔɔ ti nyaai. Gbaa nuu i bele ngaa ndua gbɛ o gbɛ na eya nana aa gɛ kuni ala nwa.
61002020	Gbaa ina ningaa taa gɔngaa he ngelou na nhu eyaabele nyɔu naa gbɛnhaile too mi Nwaliki na gɔɔnga, nana mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala, napangaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi, awa ti bɛɛla boma maa eyaabele ngɔha na nhu, tɔɔ gɛa tomaa nyɔu nyɔu nana nyɔu ɔ lee ngɔ pɛnhɛɛ kee naa.
61002021	Gbaa maa nhiɛ ɔ i ba gɛɛ kpɔ ti nhanwa ina tai ba teenjaa bele na gɔɔ ngɔɔ, tee ngɔ bɛnhɛ taa kɔɔ awa too gɔngaa hea nanaa Ngebɔ i kɛi aa tuee pelendaa nhanwa.
61002022	K`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa, nana i belenga aa tuee, oo belenga tɔmbaga nhu ɛɛ chaai ngindinɛi i kɛi, "Njia i bɛɛla boma nana nwɛ ma i baia la nha," awa "Ndondɛ na nana ti mɔnwɔi oo guekuenga boma njogbo na nhu."
61003001	Nya lomayaa belaa i, ngooleekɔɔ na fee na nwɛ aa indinɛi ngi kpaalia wu nwanhu. Awa ngooleekɔɔ fee na ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ nhu, ngoo lapi aa wu nɛɛnwaa na laau ndaaundaa nɛgili gbekpe fanwa aa nhanda nhanda indinɛi gili hitɛndaa wuɛɛ,
61003002	aa kɛɛlaa wu nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla nana nwa Ngebɔ letua i ti kɛɛ gɛɛaɔ giilɛ aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ belenaa, awa tii nana o Maliki na nana Ndendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala i kɛaɔ aa wu lo mbelaa i kangaa wu pele.
61003003	Pɛnhɛɛ nhanda na, kawaa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ indinɛia aa kɛɛlaae gbele mba yamana na nhu, ningaa tɔɔ baa natiini tɔɔ ngɛɛ ngɛɛ nhɛɛ wuaa. Awa ningaa nwɛ natiini taa nana bele gbo maa heelaa na aa gɛ tuaa.
61003004	Awa tɔɔ gɛa, "I nɛɛnwaa lo feia aa kɛɛlaa alaa ba, kɛlɛ ala mii tɔ? Kualaama aa yamana na mi bembaa i ti haai laɔ nhaa paalaa yamana indinɛi nhu, gbɛ o gbɛ na pele ngɔ ila na nwɛ gbo kele ɛɛ ngelou na lɔɔlo ngee naɔ!"
61003005	Kpala ngaile tuaaɔ ti indinɛi hou aa tɔmbaga aa kɛɛlaa, Ngebɔ i yɛpɛiaɔ gbo, awa ka njɛpɛ na siina i pelenga feenaa heenaa na i gbatɛa ka ngelou i. Pɔlɔgɔɔ na i gbatɛia kualaa nja nhu, awa nja na nwɛ i pele ngɔ pɔlɔgɔɔ na gɛɛlaa na lo ngɔ nda.
61003006	Awa nja nwɛɛɔ gbɔnhu i ngelou na nyaanii aa maa yamana na, napangaa nja he na.
61003007	Kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu ngelou na alaa makɛ nhu Ngebɔ oo na eya, kangaa i nyaai hɔlɔ ngɔmbu eya. Alaa makɛ nhu foo na nhanwa nhuna Ngebɔ ɔɔ natiini kɔhɔ ngebɔyaa ai ti nhu, awa nhu nwɛɛ gbɔnhu ɔɔ ti nyaai.
61003008	Kɛlɛ nya lomayaa belaa, njia ila ngindinɛi gili ɛɛ nɔa wuɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa Maliki na le kaka, mi guu ila na, pele ngɔ gbo ɛɛ fogo wuulu ila mɛɛ. Awa fogo wuulu ila na, pele ngɔ ɛɛ mi guu ila mɛɛ ala nhanwa.
61003009	Maliki na ai nwaa gbɛndɛɛ ngaa nana belendaa aa maa nɛɛnwaa lo fe, ɛɛ ningaa lɛingaa taa nɛgili ma gɔi aa pele ngɔ nana. Kɛlɛ ala lii lo ngɔ aa wuee, gbɛnhaile ai loni la i nuu o nuu nyaai, kɛlɛ ndo ngɔ la kangaa ningaa i bɛɛ ti bote kualaa ti nhanda nyɔu na nhu.
61003010	Kɛlɛ Foo na nana Maliki na ɔɔ ba ma, maa Hoo na gbɔha na siina ɔɔ baa ɛɛ nwɔa nwɔɔ aa ba. Awa maa hoo na siina nwa nwɛɛ ngelou gbɔha na ɔɔ nyaai. Feenaa heenaa na ɔɔ nyaaia aa yɔkpɔu bombou mbaa nana ɔɔ kula gula. Awa nhu nwɛɛ foo na o, ngau foo na o, ka teelega na bɛɛ ngɔmbu na ɔɔ ti nyaai bɛɛ. Awa pɔlɔgɔɔ na o ka nana bɛɛ i ma ɔɔ nwɔnaa kpugu.
61003011	Kina nhaanhaa indiini bɛɛ tɔɔ nyaaia aa pele ngɔ indinɛi, gbɛɛ belaa sii ya nwɛ wɔɔ bele nda? Kawaa gɛ chanhaini wu lɛɛhu na nhu, awa wu gɛ gbɔha na gɔan ngɔ Ngebɔ nwa,
61003012	nhuna waa gɛ aa Ngebɔ Hoo na nwaa golondaa o, ka maa guu na nwaa gbandindaa, napangaa Foo na nhuna feenaa heenaa na ɔɔ nwɔ mɔ kpugu awa ɔɔ nyaai, awa maa ɔmbu ila na siina, nhu nwɛɛ gbɔnhu foo na o, ngau foo na o ka teelega na bɛɛ ɔɔ mɔ mɔ kpugu.
61003013	Kɛlɛ mua maa pele nhu gbee ngaa ngelou nyiɛ mɛɛna teenjaa belaa i tɔɔ hei na, ɛɛ gbo Ngebɔ i maa nɛɛnwaa lo na hei.
61003014	Faa nwɛɛe nya lomayaa belaa, kina wua waa pele nhu gbee ngaa nhanda nhanda indinɛi, a sɔbɛ houa pandaa kangaa nhuna Maliki na aa ba, ɛɛ maai tɛi ngaa gɛ wuaa Ngebɔ le kaka, kɛlɛ i maaia wu gɛ chanhaini, awa wu gɛ maa lɛi nhu ala nhu.
61003015	A nɛgilia indinɛi nwa aa gbele o gbele aa kɛɛlaa, ndii lo na nana Maliki na aa pele, ndendouyaa hendaa nhaa nwɛɛ wuɛɛ, ɛɛ mi ndege na Pɔɔlu nana mi lo ngɔ waa na la i maa ooleekɔɔ na gbaalii wu nwanhu, nana ai kpaalii kualaa ngi nda nhu lo nhu, kɛlɛ i kpaaliia kualaa nhu lo na nhu nana Ngebɔ i fei alɛɛ.
61003016	Kɛɛ nhanda nhanda indinɛi nwaa yia gɛɛ gɛɛa ngi ooleekɔɔ na nhu bɛɛ nana i kpaali gbaalii. Nhanda lɛingaa lɔ na ngi ooleekɔɔ na nhu nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔndaa mba gbɛndɛ ngɔ. Awa ningaa i natiini tai kɔɔ, inaile ti nɛɛnwaa na aa fee fee na, taa nhu huo fuonaa aa ndɛɛ lɛɛ bele, ɛɛ gbo taa pele ngaa kpapi lɛingaa lagbiti Ngebɔ Gbaali Gbaali na nhu. Awa tɔɔ haa hɔlɔ hɔlɔa indinɛi nhanwa taa pele pele.
61003017	Kɛlɛ wua nya lomayaa belaa i ngaa wuee, woo nhumbu tɔ aa indinɛi nhu kɔɔ. Faa nwɛɛe a sogia kangaa natiini sɔ ngaai mbelaa i ngaa tuee, tai ba pele waa gaka, awa fee na o gbɔnhu tai ba pele wu nhu gbɛndɛ to na wu nhu, aa gbaha.
61003018	Kɛlɛ a tona nda aa kpɛalaa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi, Ndendouyaa He Mɔɔ na banda bandayaa na nhu o ka ngi gɔɔnjaa na nhu. Kangaa mbɛɛ bombou mbaa i gɛ ngi laa na nwa chaanngi nhu o ka guna bɛɛ! Kangaa i bele.
62001001	Ni ngoo indinɛi gbaali wuee ndaa to ngɔ Ngoo naa nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ, nana i naɔ kualaa ngelou gbɔha na lɔɔlomaa na. Noo mɛinga, noo ala lɔa aa ni au na, aaha, noo ala lɔa, awa ni loko na oo sia alaa.
62001002	Nhuna ndɛɛhu indinɛi i guai kpou kani tɔa, awa kani ngi yia gɛa, awa kani kɛa aa wuee ndaa to ngɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu naa nana ee na tii Kɛɛgɛ na o, awa kɛɛ pelenga ni kɔɔnga.
62001003	Nana ni tɔa o ka nana ni mɛinga noo loinga la wuee gbɔnhu, kangaa wu gula ni nwa hounwayaa naa nana ni nhu nua o, Kɛɛgɛ na o, awa ka ngi Lou na Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
62001004	Ni indinɛi gbaali kangaa ni goonhu nɛɛ na laa fe.
62001005	Chaanngi nhu ngoo na nana ni mɛinga kualaa ngi Lou na le, maa oo na siina ni loinga la wuee ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, Ngebɔ waun mɛɛ, awa kpindi ai na ala nhu hali.
62001006	Ina aa bele maa gɛ muaa hounwayaa nhu mii ala o, awa poungaa na siina mi kpindi na nhu, ndɛɛ nwɛɛ maa kɔɔla mi laa yia na nhu awa ka mi eyaabele na nhu.
62001007	Kɛlɛ ina maa sia waun na nhu ɛɛ ala i waun na nhu, awa na aa lee nga hounwayaa i gɛ mi loganhu, awa Yisɔsi qanwa na napangaa Ngi Lou na, ɔɔ gɛa aa mi chanhaindaa kualaa mi nhanda nyɔu na nhu bɛɛ.
62001008	Ina maa gɛ mua nhanda nyɔu ai mi nhu, moo gbɔha na nwɔu mɔunga awa tɔmbaga na ai mi nhu.
62001009	Ina maa gɛɛ gɛɛ aa mi nhanda nyɔu na, Ngebɔ nuu nwɛɛ nana nuu aa yigba nhu, awa tee ngɔ, awa ɔɔ mi nhanda nyɔu na loa na muɛɛ, awa ɔɔ mi chanhainaa kualaa mi goto gotonjaa na nhu bɛɛ.
62001010	Ina maa gɛ mai nhanda nyɔu bele ngɔ, moo ala belenga aa ndɛɛ nwɔɔ, awa ngi oo na ai mi lii na nwa.
62002001	Ni lengaa, nya ngaa ngoo indinɛi gbaali wuee kangaa wɛhaa nhanda nyɔu bele gbɔnhu, kɛlɛ ina wu ila kee aa nhanda nyɔu bele, ngɔa ndoganhu nwɔɔ lɔ na mi nhanwa nana aa ɔa mi loganhu mii Kɛɛgɛ na o, napangaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi tee mɔɔ na.
62002002	Awa Kilaisi ala nwɛ i nhanda nyɔu lombɛyaa chaaga na guai aa gbɔha na mi nhanwa, awa mi nda nhanda nyɔu na aile gbo kpɛti, kɛlɛ nuu o nuu nda nhanda nyɔu na nhaa nwɛɛ gbɔnhu.
62002003	Ina maa nwaa bɛɛ Ngebɔ sɔ nau, mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa moo ala gɔɔnga.
62002004	Ina nuu aa gɛ i ala gɔɔnaa kɛlɛ ai nwaa bɛɛi ngi sɔ nau, nuu indinɛi bonda ndɛɛ nwɔɔ nwɛ, awa tɔmbaga ai ala nhu hali.
62002005	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa nwaa bɛɛ ngi oo nau, ala nwɛ ngi lomayaa na Ngebɔ nhanwa i hitia nhu aa tɔmbaga. Pele na nwɛ aa indinɛi maa kɔɔ nda aa kɛɛlaa muaa hounwayaa nhu mi Ngebɔ o.
62002006	Nuu na nana aa gɛ alaa hounwayaa nhu tii Ngebɔ o kaa gɛ na ɛɛ Yisɔsi Kilaisi i peleni gbo.
62002007	Nya ndegea, awa sɔ ngindinɛi ngaa kpaali wuee ngi nyiɛ aile, sɔ ngɔha na nwɛ nana i wu eyaɔ kualaa tɔɔlomaa na. Sɔ ngɔha na ala nwɛ aa ngoo na wu bilangaɔ tɔ aa mɛindaa.
62002008	Kɛlɛ na nhu kpɛlɛ, sɔ na ngaa kpaali wuee sɔ nyiɛ nwɛ, awa sɔ ngindinɛi lɔmbaga na tɔ ngɔ Kilaisi nhu awa ka wu nhu gbɔnhu. Gbaa kpindi na lɔ aa li awa waun na lɔ aa huo.
62002009	Nuu na bɛɛ nana aa gɛ alaa waun na nhu, poungaa na siina ala lolo ɔ aa ngi ndege lou na, maa nwɔɔ na siina alaa lɛ kpindi na nhu nhaa chaan.
62002010	Nuu na bɛɛ ndo ngɔ aa ngi ndege lou na ala nwɛ i waun na nhu, awa gbɛ o gbɛ aigɔ gɛ ala nhu nana ɔɔ pele nuu lagbiti aa gula nhanda nyɔu nhu.
62002011	Kɛlɛ nuu na bɛɛ nana aa lolo aa ngi ndege lou na, maa nwɔɔ na siina alaa kpindi na nhu, ala nwɛ aa sia nhu, awa ai mɛɛna gɔɔ aa li na, gbɛnhaile kpindi nhiɛ na oo ala litia.
62002012	Nya ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee, nya lengaa, gbɛnhaile wu nhanda nyɔu na Ngebɔ oo ndoa na wuɛɛ Kilaisi lɔgɔ fanwa.
62002013	Nya ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee kɛɛgɛa, gbɛnhaile wu Kilaisi gɔɔnaa nana i naɔ kualaa ngelou na lɔɔlomaa na. Nya ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee ndakpangaa, gbɛnhaile woo kunga Nuu Nyɔu na nwa.
62002014	Nya ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee ndengaa, gbɛnhaile wu Kɛɛgɛ na gɔɔnaa. Nya ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee kɛɛgɛa, gbɛnhaile wu Kilaisi gɔɔnaa nana i naɔ kualaa ngelou na lɔɔlomaa na. Nya ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wuee ndakpangaa, gbɛnhaile wu nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, awa Ngebɔ oo na alaa wu nhu, awa wua woo kunga Nuu Nyɔu na nwa.
62002015	Awɛɛ lo ngaa ngelou na inaile gbɛ o gbɛ na nana ngelou na nda na le. Ina wu lo ngɔ aa ngelou na, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa wai loni aa Kɛɛgɛ na.
62002016	Gbɛ o gbɛ na bɛɛ nana ngelou na nda na le, napangaa nana nhanda nyɔuyaa na aa ngɔi, nana ningaa gbɔhaa taa tɔ awa ti lo nda, awa ka gbɛ o gbɛ na i ngelou indi nhu nana ningaa taa aunwaa lɛ la, ai na ila kelembe nana i segei Kɛɛgɛ na le. Kɛlɛ pɛpɛ ngindinɛi bɛɛ ngelou na nhu nwɛɛ i segei na.
62002017	Ngelou na o, awa ka gbɛ o gbɛ na i nhu nana ningaa gbɔhaa taa ngɔi, ɔɔ leenaa, kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa Ngebɔ guunmayaa na bele ala ɔɔ gɛa na wɔwɔwɔ.
62002018	Nya lengaa, kpelenwaa na oo gbɛɛa mi gbɛlaa! Kati kɛa aa wuee aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi haalee na ɔɔ baa, awa chaanngi nhu Kilaisi haaleengaa gbinhi gbinhia too hitɛa, faa nwɛɛe mi kɔɔnaa tɔ aa kɛɛlaa kpelenwaa na oo gbɛɛa mi gbɛlaa.
62002019	Ningaa indiini aa tɔmbaga taile ni gɛnwayaa naa awa indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ ti segei nuee. Ina aa bele ngaa tee naanɔɔ ni gɛnwayaa naa, tai ba loganhu bai ɔɔ aa nuee. Kɛlɛ ti loganhu baia aa nuee kangaa i ba gue chɛhɛ aa kɛɛlaa hali bɛnhɛ ngila mɔɔ kele ai nuaa.
62002020	Kɛlɛ wua Kilaisi oo Ngebɔ Yina na yeiaɔ wu nwa, awa wu hɛpɛ na bɛɛ wu tɔmbaga na gɔɔnaa.
62002021	Ngai ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaalii wuee aa kɛɛlaa nhanwa wai tɔmbaga na gɔɔ, kɛlɛ ngi kpaaliia wuee gbɛnhaile wu kɔɔnaa, awa wu kɔɔnaa gbɔnhu aa kɛɛlaa tɔmbaga na nhu ndɛɛ ai gua na.
62002022	Ele nwɛɛ tɔ ndɛɛ nwɔɔ na le? Ala nwɛ aa nuu na nana aa lele aa kɛndaa aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ nwɛ. Nuu indi bonda Kilaisi haalee na nwɛ, gbaa o gbeea Kɛɛgɛ naa ka Ndou na.
62002023	Gbaa nuu na bɛɛ aa lele aa kuunndaa Ndou na nwa, oo lele Kɛɛgɛ naa, awa nuu na bɛɛ aa kuun Ndou na nwa Kɛɛgɛ na lɔ ngeya gbɔnhu.
62002024	A kɔɔna aa kɛɛlaa Ngoo na nana wu mɛinga kualaa tɔɔlomaa na kawaa gɛ nda ngɔ nɛɛnwaa. Ina waa nwaa bɛɛ Ngoo na siinau, awa aa gbele o gbele wɔɔ gɛa na hounwayaa nhu wui Ndou na o ka Kɛɛgɛ na.
62002025	Awa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na ala nwɛ Kilaisi i mi nɛɛnwaa loni fanwa.
62002026	Nya ngaa indinɛi gbaali wuee ndaa to ngɔ natiini fanwa taa lapi aa wu nwɔu mɔundaa.
62002027	Kɛlɛ wua Kilaisi oo ngi Yina na yeia wu nwa. Kina ngi Yina na lɔ wu nhu, faa nwɛɛ ai hitii nhu gbɔnhu nuu aa wu nagɔli. Gbaa ngi Yina na i wu nagɔli aa gbɛ o gbɛ na, awa gbɛ o gbɛ na pa aa wu nagɔli la tɔmbaga ɔ, awa ndɛɛ aile. A nwaa bɛɛa Ngebɔ Yina na nagɔli nau, awa wu lo hounwayaa nhu wui Kilaisi o.
62002028	Aaha ni lengaa, a loa hounwayaa nhu wui ala o kangaa lɔgɔ na ɔɔ ba, ndii gbɛndɛ ngi gɛ mi laa fe ngɔ awa mai ba lɔɔgu alaa ngufe nhu aa Foo na ɔɔ ba ma.
62002029	Wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi ala lee ngɔ faa nwɛɛ kawaa kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nuu na nana aa tee nhanda bele maa nwɔɔ na Ngebɔ lou nwɛ.
62003001	A ndomayaa bombou mbaa na gbeendɛ nana Ngebɔ i pelenga aa muee. Ngi lomayaa bombou mbaa na oo pelenga ti ui muaa aa Ngebɔ lengaa, awa aa tɔmbaga ala nwɛ aa muee. Indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ ngelou na ai mi gɔɔ, gbɛnhaile ai Ngebɔ gɔɔni.
62003002	Ni lomayaa belaa, mua Ngebɔ lengaa nwɛ aa muee chaanngi, kɛlɛ mai kɔɔ ndɛ pandaa gbɛɛ mɔɔ bele nda. Kɛlɛ mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nhuna Kilaisi ɔɔ ba, mɔɔ belenaa ɛɛ ala, gbɛnhaile mɔɔ ala lɔa ɛɛ ala bele ngɔ na i na.
62003003	Nuu o nuu nana i nɛɛnwaa la indinɛi bonda bele ngɔ Kilaisi nhu oo gbɔha na nwakɛa chanhai ngɔ, ɛɛ gbo Kilaisi chanhai ngɔ na.
62003004	Nuu na bɛɛ nana aa nhanda nyɔu bele ala lɛɛ ɔ aa Ngebɔ sɔ na nyaaindaa, gbɛnhaile nhanda nyɔu na sɔ nyaaindaa nwɛ.
62003005	Wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi i baia kangaa i nhanda nyɔu na nwɔi ningaa nwa, awa ala ai nhanda nyɔu bele ngɔ.
62003006	Nuu o nuu nana ti hounwayaa nhu tii Kilaisi o ai nhanda nyɔu belendaa lo nda, kɛlɛ nuu na bɛɛ nana aa nhanda nyɔu belendaa lo nda, k`a oo belenga aa kɛɛlaa, ai ala lɔi awa ai ala gɔɔni.
62003007	Nuu ɛɛ wu nwɔu mɔu ni lengaa! Nuu na bɛɛ aa tee nhanda bele tee mɔɔ nwɛ, ɛɛ gbo Kilaisi lee ngɔ na.
62003008	Nuu na bɛɛ aa nhanda nyɔu belendaa lo nda, maa nwɔɔ na siina Ngafɔ mbaa na nda nwɛ aa ala, gbɛnhaile Ngafɔ mbaa na ala oo nhanda nyɔu belengaɔ kualaa tɔɔlomaa na gbɔha na. Saabu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ kpei Ngebɔ Lou na i bai nana nyaaindaa nhanwa Ngafɔ mbaa na i pelengaɔ.
62003009	Nuu na bɛɛ Ngebɔ lou aa ala ai nhanda nyɔu belendaa lo nda, gbaa Ngebɔ bele ngɔ na gbɔha na alaa ala nhu, awa kina pa Ngebɔ ngi Kɛɛgɛ na nwɛ, ai nhanda nyɔu belendaa lo nda.
62003010	Awa indinɛi ndoganhu bai bombou mbaa na nwɛ i Ngebɔ lengaa i ndoganhu tii Ngafɔ na lengaa i ngoo. Nuu na nana ai tee nhanda beleni inaile ai loni aa ngi ndege lou na, ala Ngebɔ lou aile aa ala.
62003011	Ngoo na nana wu mɛini kualaa tɔɔlomaa na gbɔha na ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, k`a ndomayaa aa gɛ mi loganhu.
62003012	Amɛɛ bele ɛɛ Keeni nana Nuu Nyɔu na nda na nwɛɔ aa ala, awa kɛɛ ngi ndege nhiindou na gbekpe na kpei kɛɛ paaa kpɔɔ napangaa Eebɛli. Gbɛɛ nhaa nwɛɛ Keeni i ala baai? Gbɛnhaile nhanda na nana ala gbɔha na i pele peleni ngaa haa ɔɔ, kɛlɛ nhanda na nana ngi ndege na i pele peleni tee ngɔɔ.
62003013	Nya ndegea, awɛɛ gbɛi ina ngelou na nhu belaa i taa lolo aa wuee.
62003014	Mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa moo loko guaa haa na eya awa moo botenga ndɛɛhu na le. Mi ala indinɛi gɔɔnaa gbɛnhaile mi lo ngɔ aa mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i. Nuu na bɛɛ ndomayaa ai gɛi ngeya, maa nwɔɔ na siina alaa lɛ haa na fɔha nau.
62003015	Nuu na bɛɛ nana aa lolo aa ngi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ, maa nwɔɔ na siina nuu baa mɔɔ nwɛ, awa wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nuu baa mɔɔ wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu ai ala nhu.
62003016	Ngemɛɛ aa indinɛi mi kɔɔ ngɔ ndomayaa i gee na, aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi kɛɛ ngi lɛɛhu na gɔannga mi nhanwa. Mua o gbɔnhu, kam`a`a mi lɛɛhu na gɔan mi ndege lengaa i fanwa.
62003017	Ina kpatɛ nwɔɔ aa ndege lou lɔ mbaa ngɔ, awa poungaa na siina i gɔɔli ngaa mbaa mɔɔ na, ɔɔ gee kɛ aa kɛɛlaa ala lo ngɔ aa Ngebɔ?
62003018	Nya lengaa, mi lomayaa na ɛɛ gɛ mi laahaa na nhu awa ka ngoo nhu. Kaa bele ngaa tɔmbaga lomayaa nana aa gbɔha lɔgɔɔu ngeyaabele nhu.
62003019	Ngemɛɛ aa indinɛi mɔɔ kɔɔ nda aa kɛɛlaa mua tɔmbaga belaa nwɛ aa muee. Saabu indinɛi nhaa nwɛɛ maigɔ lua Ngebɔ au bele nhu.
62003020	Ina mi lii na aa mi lɛɛ, mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ala bombou ngɔ tee ngɔ mi lii naa, awa mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa i gbɛ o gbɛ gɔɔnaa.
62003021	Awa ni lomayaa belaa, ina mi lii na ai mi lɛɛi, ndii gbɛndɛ tɔ mi eya Ngebɔ au bele nhu.
62003022	Awa nana bɛɛ maa mɔɔli fanwa k`ami hɔlɔ, gbɛnhaile mi nwaa bɛɛ ɔ ngi sɔ nau awa k`ami nana bele aa nɛɛ alɛɛ.
62003023	Ngi sɔ na ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, aa kɛɛlaa mi laanɛɛ aa ngi Lou na laa na napangaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi, awa ndomayaa i gɛ mi loganhu ɛɛ gbo Kilaisi i kɛi aa muee pelendaa nhanwa.
62003024	Nuu na nana bɛɛ aa nwaa bɛɛ Ngebɔ sɔ nau ɔɔ gɛa na hounwayaa nhu tii Ngebɔ o, awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ gɛa na hounwayaa nhu tii ala o. Awa mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ alaa mi nhu, Yina na nhanwa nana i ngɔaa mi eya.
62004001	Nya lomayaa belaa, awɛɛ laanɛɛ aa ningaa i hɛpɛ na bɛɛ natiini taa gɛ Ngebɔ Yina na lɔ ti nhu, kɛlɛ ati nhuana kangaa wu kɔɔ ina yina na i ti nhu Ngebɔ le mɛ i segei na. Gbaa ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔ letua gbinhi gbinhia too yanjanga nhu mii o mii.
62004002	Ngemɛɛ aa indinɛi wɔɔ ku wu kɔɔ nda ina Ngebɔ Yina na nwɛ. Nuu na nana aa kɛ aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi i baia ɛɛ nuu gbɔha ala nwɛ Yina na i ngeya nana i segei Ngebɔ le.
62004003	Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa nwaagai indinɛi nwa ndaa to ngɔ na Yisɔsia, ala Yina na ai ala nhu nana i segei Ngebɔ le. Yina na nana i ala nhu i segeia Kilaisi Haalee na le. Kawu mɛinga aa kɛɛlaa ɔɔ baa awa chaanngi nhu alaa ngelou indinɛi nhu tɔ.
62004004	Kɛlɛ wua Ngebɔ ndaa nwɛ aa wuee, ni lengaa, awa woo kunga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔ letua i ma, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ Yina na nana i wu nhu fɔha lɔ alaa tee ngɔ yina naa nana i natiini nhu ngelou na ndaa i ngaa tuee.
62004005	Ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔ letua indiini tua taa yɛpɛa ndaa to ngɔ ngelou na nhu nhanda naa, awa ngelou na i oo nhɛɛ ti nwa gbɛnhaile tua ngelou na ndaa i mɛ aa tuee.
62004006	Kɛlɛ mua Ngebɔ ndaa nwɛ aa muee. Nuu na nana bɛɛ i Ngebɔ gɔɔ ngɔ ala nwɛ aa oo nhɛɛ mi nwa. Nuu na nana bɛɛ Ngebɔ nda aile aa ala ai oo nhɛɛ mi nwa. Awa ngemɛɛ aa indinɛi maa ndoganhu bai na gɔɔ nda i tɔmbaga Yina na loganhu tii yina na o nana ai lɔmbaga i.
62004007	Nya lomayaa belaa, ndomayaa i gɛa wu loganhu, gbɛnhaile ndomayaa i segeia Ngebɔ le. Nuu na nana aa gɛ lomayaai ala Ngebɔ lou nwɛ aa ala awa i Ngebɔ gɔɔnaa.
62004008	Nuu na bɛɛ ai lomayaai ai Ngebɔ gɔɔ, gbaa Ngebɔ ndomayaa ɔ.
62004009	Awa Ngebɔ kɛɛ ngi lomayaa na lɔgɔɔunga mi nhanwa aa ngi Lou ila ngɔ na leendaa nhanwa ngelou na nhu, kangaa mi ba ndɛɛhu hɔlɔ aa ala nhu bele.
62004010	Ngemɛɛ aa indinɛi ndomayaa i na. Ai beleni aa kɛɛlaa mua nwɛ mi loni aa Ngebɔ kɛlɛ ala nwɛ i loni aa muee, awa kɛɛ ngi Lou na leenga kangaa i pele mi nhanda nyɔu na i lo na.
62004011	Nya lomayaa belaa, ina ngemɛɛ aa indinɛi Ngebɔ lo ngɔ na aa muee, awa k`a ndomayaa aa gɛ nha mi loganhu.
62004012	Nuu ai na nana i Ngebɔ lɔa, kɛlɛ ina ndomayaa aa gɛ mi loganhu, indinɛi oo ndɔgɔɔunga aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ lɔ mi nhu, awa ngi lomayaa na oo hiti nhu mi nhu.
62004013	Mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa muaa Ngebɔ nhu awa alaa mi nhu, gbɛnhaile oo ngi Yina na ɔaa mi eya.
62004014	Awa nua noo tɔa awa ni kɛ aa lagbitia i aa kɛɛlaa Kɛɛgɛ na oo ngi Lou na leenga, kangaa i bele ngaa Ndendouyaa He Mɔɔ na ngelou na nhanwa.
62004015	Ina nuu aa kɛ kpou aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Ngebɔ Lou nwɛ, maa nwɔɔ na siina Ngebɔ lɔ ala nhu, awa ala pa alaa Ngebɔ nhu.
62004016	Awa mua mi gbɔha na mi kɔɔnaa awa mi laanɛɛ ɔ aa ndomayaa na nana i Ngebɔ eya mi nhanwa. Ngebɔ ndomayaa ɔ. Nuu na bɛɛ aa gɛ ndomayaa nhu maa nwɔɔ na siina alaa Ngebɔ nhu awa Ngebɔ lɔ ala nhu.
62004017	Ngi lomayaa na oo hiti nhu mi nhu, kangaa mi ba bele ngaa ndii gbɛndɛ hɔlɔ mbelaa aa kɔhɔ Foo na lɔgɔ, awa mɔɔ hɔlɔa, gbɛnhaile mi lɛɛhu na bei ngelou indinɛi nhu pele ngɔ ɛɛ Kilaisi nda na.
62004018	Ndua ai ndomayaa nhu. Ndomayaa na nana hiti ɔ nhu ala nwɛ aa ndua na gbɛ bɛɛ. Nuu na nana aa lua ndomayaa ai ala nhu nana hiti ɔ nhu, gbɛnhaile kpɔɔni le tɔ ndua aa sege na.
62004019	Mi lomayaa ɔ gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ pɛnhɛɛ i loni aa muee.
62004020	Ina nuu aa gɛ ala lo ngɔ aa Ngebɔ kɛlɛ ala lolo ɔ aa ngi ndege lou na, ndɛɛ nwɔɔ nwɛ aa ala. Gbaa aigɔ lo ngaa Ngebɔ nana ai ala lɔ, ina ai loni aa ngi ndege lou na nana aa ala lɔ.
62004021	Sɔ na nana Kilaisi i ngɔai mi eya ala nwɛ aa indinɛi. Nuu na bɛɛ aa lo ngaa Ngebɔ kaa lo ngaa ngi ndege lou na gbɔnhu.
62005001	Nuu na bɛɛ nana aa laanɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi Ngebɔ Nhu Ɔhɛ Nwɔɔ na nwɛ, maa nwɔɔ na siina Ngebɔ lou nwɛ aa ala, awa nuu o nuu nana aa lo ngaa ndou nwɔɔ na, ala lo ngɔ aa ndou na gbɔnhu.
62005002	Ngemɛɛ aa indinɛi maa kɔɔ nda aa kɛɛlaa mi lo ngɔ aa Ngebɔ lengaa i, nhuna maa lo ngaa Ngebɔ awa mi nwaa bɛɛ ngi Sɔ nau.
62005003	Gbaa mi lomayaa na Ngebɔ nhanwa ala nwɛ aa indinɛi aa kɛɛlaa mi nwaa bɛɛ ngi Sɔ nau. Awa ngi Sɔ na kooti bombou mbaa aile mi nhanwa.
62005004	Gbaa nuu na bɛɛ Ngebɔ i ndeni ala gu ngɔ ngelou na nwa, awa nana kunjaa na le ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, aa kɛɛlaa mi laanɛɛ na, ala nwɛ aa ku ngelou na nwa.
62005005	Ele nwɛɛ aa ku ngelou na nwa? K`a nuu na gbo nana ala laanɛɛ ɔ aa kɛɛlaa Yisɔsi ala nwɛ Ngebɔ Lou na aa ala.
62005006	Yisɔsi Kilaisi ala nwɛ i bai aa nja lepele nana ti Ngebɔ ua beleni la aa ala, ka ngi haa na qanwa na. Nja na lepele ai le gbo kpɛti i bai lae kɛlɛ nja na lepele o ka qanwa na.
62005007	Awa Ngebɔ Yina na ala nwɛ Seeli na le, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ Yina na ala nwɛ tɔmbaga na le.
62005008	Seelia i ti chawa ti na, Ngebɔ Yina na, Nja na, awa ka qanwa na, awa ti chawa ngɔ indinɛi tuaa kuun ngɔ nwa.
62005009	Mi kuun ningaa gbɔhaa i ti gbɔha gɛɛ gɛɛ na nwa, kɛlɛ Ngebɔ nda gɛɛ gɛɛ na ala nwɛ mbombou ngɔ tee ngɔ ningaa gbɔhaa i ti nda gɛɛ gɛɛ naa, gbɛnhaile Ngebɔ nda gɛɛ gɛɛ na nwɛ aa indinɛi nana i seeliyaa hei laɔ ndaa to ngɔ na ngi Lou naa.
62005010	Nuu na bɛɛ nana aa laanɛɛ aa Ngebɔ Lou na, Ngebɔ gɛɛ gɛɛ na lɔ maa nwɔɔ na nhu. Nuu na nana ai laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ, oo Ngebɔ belenga aa ndɛɛ nwɔɔ, gbɛnhaile ala ai laanɛɛi aa Ngebɔ nda gɛɛ gɛɛ na nana i peleni ndaa to ngɔ na ngi Lou naa.
62005011	Awa Ngebɔ nda gɛɛ gɛɛ na nwɛ aa indinɛi, aa kɛɛlaa oo ndɛɛhu ɔaa mi eya nana ɔɔ gɛ na wɔwɔwɔ, awa ndɛɛhu indinɛi alaa ngi Lou na nhu.
62005012	Nuu na ndou na ngeya ndɛɛhu lɔ ngeya, kɛlɛ nuu na nana Ngebɔ Lou na ai ngeya ndɛɛhu ai ngeya.
62005013	Wua na wu laanɛɛ ɔ na aa Ngebɔ Lou na laa na, ngi njia indinɛi gbaali wuee, kangaa wu ba kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa woo ndɛɛhu na hɔlɔa nana ɔɔ gɛ na wɔwɔwɔ.
62005014	Awa indinɛi ndii gbɛndɛ na nwɛ i mi eya ala nhu, aa kɛɛlaa ina maa nhu nwɔɔli pele gbɛ o gbɛ nhanwa nana ndi ɔ aa ngi guunmayaa na lepele, ɔɔ mi oo nwɛinaa.
62005015	Awa ina mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nana bɛɛ maa ala nwɔɔli nda aa mɛinaa, mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nana mi ala nwɔɔlini la ngɔandaa nhanwa mi eya moo hɔlɔa.
62005016	Ina nuu oo ngi ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ lɔa k`ɛɛ nhanda nyɔu bele nana ai ba ala nwa aa haa, i laminɛa maa nwɔɔ na siina nhanwa, awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ndɛɛhu ɔaa maa nwɔɔ na eya. Indinɛi alaa na natiini fanwa ti nhanda nyɔu na ai ba ti nwa aa haa. Kɛlɛ nhanda nyɔu lɔ na nana aa ba nuu nwa aa haa, awa ngai kɛi aa kɛɛlaa nuu i laaminɛ maa gee na nhanwa.
62005017	Nhanda nyɔu o nhanda nyɔu nhanda nyɔu nwɛ, kɛlɛ nhanda nyɔu lɔ na nana ai ba nuu nwa aa haa.
62005018	Awa mi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nuu na bɛɛ nana Ngebɔ lou aa ala ai gɛ aa nhanda nyɔu belendaa, gbaa Ngebɔ Lou na nwɛ aa ala nwanhu gbee, awa Nuu Nyɔu na aigɔ nhanda gbaai gbaai bele ngaa ala.
62005019	Mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa mua Ngebɔ ndaa nwɛ aa muee, awa ngelou gbɔha na alaa Nuu Nyɔu na fɔha nau.
62005020	Awa mi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ Lou na oo ba i nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ɔaa mi eya tɔmbaga nwɔɔ na gɔɔndaa nhanwa. Awa muaa tɔmbaga nwɔɔ na nhu, nhaa gbɔnhu Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu ngi Lou na. Awa tɔmbaga Eebɔ na nwɛ aa indinɛi ka wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na.
62005021	Ni lengaa, a nwaa gɛa gɔha ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa i mba.
63001001	Nya nwɛ wu nuu waa na aa nge ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali wu nwanhu nyɔugbɛai ka bi lengaa i, wua Ngebɔ i wu nhu ɔhɛ ngɔ na. Nya lo ngɔ aa wuee aa tɔmbaga ka bi lengaa i. Awa nya ila ngɔ na aile gbo nya lo ngɔ na aa wuee, kɛlɛ ningaa i gbɔnhu bɛɛ ti tɔmbaga na gɔɔ ngɔ ti lo ngɔ aa wuee,
63001002	tɔmbaga na nhanwa nana i mi nhu, awa tɔmbaga na siina ɔɔ gɛa na tii mua o nhaa guna bɛɛ.
63001003	Kangaa panda bandayaa o, maaumayaa o, ka maa lɛi i gɛ na tii mua o, kualaa Ngebɔ le Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala, awa ka Yisɔsi Kilaisi le, napangaa Kɛɛgɛ na Lou na. Kangaa ti indinɛi bele tɔmbaga nhu o ka ndomayaa nhu.
63001004	Nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ mbombou ngɔ aa naa lɔndaa nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa bi lengaa i lɛingaa i ti hitɛ ɔ tɔmbaga na bou nwa ɛɛ gbo Kɛɛgɛ na i kɛaɔ aa muee.
63001005	Awa chaanngi ngi bi nwaa nɛɛ nɛɛ nyɔugbɛa i kangaa ndomayaa i gɛ mi loganhu mii bi lengaa i ngoo. Awa indinɛi ai beleni sɔ nyiɛ nwɛ ngaa kpaali bi nwanhue kɛlɛ sɔ mɛ nana mi hɔlɔaɔ kualaa tɔɔlomaa na.
63001006	Awa ndomayaa nwɛ aa indinɛi, napangaa maa nda ngi sɔ na bou nwa. Awa sɔ na ala nwɛ aa indinɛi, ɛɛ wu mɛingaɔ kualaa tɔɔlomaa na, aa kɛɛlaa wu gɛ ndomayaa nhu.
63001007	Gbaa ningaa nwɔu mɔu mbelaa gbinhi gbinhia too yanjanga nhu ngelou gbɔha i nhu bɛɛ, awa ningaa nwɛ natiini tai kuun ngɔ ma aa kɛɛlaa Kilaisi i baia ɛɛ nuu gbɔha. Nuu indinɛi bonda, ningaa nwɔu mɔu mɔɔ nwɛ aa ala, awa Kilaisi haalee mɛ aa ala.
63001008	A nwanhu gbeena kangaa wai ba bɔɔla nanaa wu engea fanwa, kɛlɛ kangaa wu ba paabaa na hɔlɔ nana hiti ɔ nhu.
63001009	Nuu na nana ai loi Kilaisi nagɔli na nhu awa i bii ngi nagɔli na nwanhu, maa nwɔɔ na siina Ngebɔ ai ngeya. Kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa lo nagɔli na nhu ala nwɛ Kɛɛgɛ na ngeya ka Ndou na.
63001010	Faa nwɛɛe ina nuu aa ba biee, kɛlɛ ai bai aa nagɔli indinɛi, bɛɛ ala binja bi bɛlɛ nau, awa bɛɛ ha ma bɛnhɛ.
63001011	Gbaa nuu na bɛɛ aa ha ala nwa oo gula ngi enge nyɔu naa.
63001012	Hali ngoo na Kpinhi ɔ i nya eya ngaa kpaali wu nwanhu, kɛlɛ ngɛagɔ gula nhu ngaa kɔɔ gbau ka kpaali bele kongo ngaa pele nda, gbaa nya nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa paalaa au bɛɛndaa nhanwa wu nwa, awa mi lo aunwaa mi yɛpɛ, kangaa mi goonhu nɛɛ na i ba hiti nhu.
63001013	Wu ndege nyɛɛlou na ala nhu ɔhɛ ngɔ na, ngi lengaa i ti hai wu nwa.
64001001	Nya nwɛ nuu waa na aa nge ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali biee Geiɔsi, bia nya lo ngɔ na aa biee aa tɔmbaga.
64001002	Nya nwaa lo mɔɔi, nya ngaa laaminɛ kangaa nhanda nhu nɛɛ bi nwa gbɛ o gbɛ nhu, awa bi gaanhu gua ɛɛ gbo ngi nhu kɔɔ ngɔ aa kɛɛlaa ngemɛɛ bi luu na i na.
64001003	Gbaa nya goonhu nɛɛia mbombou ngɔ nhuna mi ndege laanɛɛ belaa i lɛingaa ti bai ti kɛi aa nge, ndaa to ngɔ tɔmbaga naa nana i bi lɛɛhu na nhu, ɛɛ gbo lɔɔ bi nda ngɔ tɔmbaga na bou nwa.
64001004	Koonhu nɛɛ bombou mbaa aigɔ gɛ nya nwa nana aa lee indinɛia, napangaa mɛindaa na nhanwa aa kɛɛlaa nya lengaa i ti hitɛ ɔ tɔmbaga na bou nwa.
64001005	Nya nwaa lo mɔɔi, laanɛɛyaa nhanda nwɛ baa pele aa nhanda banda belendaa aa laanɛɛ belaa i, eengaa bɛnhɛ tɔ aa hotangaa i.
64001006	Awa kati baa ti kɛa bei aa laanɛɛ belaa i bi lomayaa na bele ngɔ na nhanwa ee na ti nhanwa. Bɔɔ pelenaa maa nhiɛ ɔ ina baa hɛi ti nwa ndiilaa nhanwa gulɔɔ aa ti gɔhia na aa pele na nana mbɛ ngɔ ma aa Ngebɔ enge na.
64001007	Gbaa ti ti gɔhia na lɔɔlonia Kilaisi lɔgɔ fanwa awa tai gbɛ o gbɛ houi laanɛɛ gbahamba belaa i ngeya.
64001008	Faa nwɛɛe kam~a~a ningaa indiini bonda laa gɔ, kangaa mi ba bele ngaa ti ndege enge belaa tɔmbaga na nhu.
64001009	Ngoo ngooleekɔɔ gbaalia laanɛɛ belaa i ngee, kɛlɛ Laiɔtilifisi, nana ndo ngɔ na aa gbɔha na belendaa aa ti lokulɔ nwɔɔ, ai nana gbau ngaa kɛ.
64001010	Faa nwɛɛe nhuna ngɔɔ ba, ngɔɔ indinɛi lɛɛ lɛɛa nga bɛɛ aa pele pele, njia nyɔu na aa kɛ ngɔ na bele ndaa to ngɔ na nuaa. Awa ai gbele gbo naa nanae kɛlɛ kɛɛ lele gbɔnhu aa laanɛɛ belaa i pinjandaa, awa natiini gbɔnhu ti lo ngɔ la ti ningaa indiini pinja, kɛɛ ti bɛndi awa i ti gbɛ kualaa laanɛɛ belaa i ndiiya.
64001011	Nya nwaa lo mɔɔi, bɛɛ nhanda nyɔu laabokɔgɔ, kɛlɛ nhanda gbekpe ndaabokɔgɔna. Nuu na nana aa nhanda gbekpe pele, maa nwɔɔ na Ngebɔ nda nwɛ aa ala, kɛlɛ nuu na nana aa nhanda nyɔu bele, maa nwɔɔ na ai Ngebɔ lɔ ngɔ.
64001012	Lɛmitiliɔsi ala ngi yia banda lɔ nuu o nuu la, awa ka tɔmbaga na gbɔha na la, awa nya gbɔnhu ngi yia banda lɔ nya la, awa wu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nana naa kɛ tɔmbaga nwɛɛ.
64001013	Njia gbinhi gbinhi ee naanɔɔ nya eya kpaalindaa nhanwa wu nwanhu, kɛlɛ ngɛagɔ gula nhu gbɔnhu ngaa kpaalii aa kpaali bele kongo o ka njaai.
64001014	Nya nɛɛnwaa la ɔ aa au bɛɛndaa bi nwa guui nhu, awa mi lo aunwaa mi yɛpɛ.
64001015	Kangaa maa lɛi i gɛ bi nwa. Bi lomayaa belaa i ti fama leeni biɛɛ. Kɛa mbɛ aa mi lomayaa belaa i bɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa ngi hai ti nwa aa ngila ngila.
65001001	Nya nwɛ Yuulu aa nge Yisɔsi Kilaisi eyaalakpandou na, awa nya nwɛ gbɔnhu Yemiisi ndege nhiindou na aa nge, ngaa ngooleekɔɔ indinɛi gbaali natiini manhu Ngebɔ lo ngɔ na aa tuee, i uinga tuaa, awa ti Yisɔsi Kilaisi gaanhu.
65001002	Kangaa maaumayaa na nana i Ngebɔ eya wu nhanwa, ka maa lɛiyaa na, awa ka ndomayaa na i bunde wu eya.
65001003	Wua nya lomayaa belaa i ngaa wuee, nhuna ngee sɔbɛ hou aa ngooleekɔɔ gbaalindaa nhanwa wuee ngu to ngɔ ndendouyaa naa nana i mi eya, ngi tɔia aa kɛɛlaa maa nhiɛ ɔ ngaa ngooleekɔɔ gbaali wu nwanhu chaanngi nhu kangaa ngi wu lii gbɛndɛ, kangaa wu sɔbɛ hou aa laanɛɛ na houndaa pandaa nana Ngebɔ i ngɔaa ngi ndaa i ngeya naa ila na awa kpɔha nhu nwɛɛ.
65001004	Gbaa ningaa lɛingaa i natiini kpaali ngɔɔ tɔ ti nhanwa giilɛ aa kɛɛlaa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ti nyaaia, tua na siina tua nwɛ ti ɔaa wu liiya sɔi. Ngebɔyaa gbahamba belaa nwɛ aa tuee natiini taa mi Eebɔ na banda bandayaa na gbau awa ti pote ngaa nhanda nyɔu gɛbɛlɛ, awa k`ati nwaagai mi Nwanhu nwɔɔ ila ngɔ na nwa nana Maliki na aa ala Yisɔsi Kilaisi.
65001005	Gbaa hali wu gbɛ o gbɛ na gɔɔnaa, kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu nya lo ngɔ la ngi wu nɛɛnwaa bɛɛla aa kɛɛlaa nhuna Maliki na i bilani aa ndendouyaa hendaa ningaaɛ aa ti guandaa Iyibiti bɔlɔgɔɔ na nhu, nhu nwɛɛ i natiini nyaaniiɔ tai laanɛɛi.
65001006	Awa malekaa i gbɔnhu, ti liiya natiini tai ti fɔha na houi aa ngi bele, kɛlɛ too gbenga ti guegue heinwaa naa, Ngebɔ oo ti nwakɛa kpindi nhu mɛɛ lɔu na mɛɛna i ti gula gula ngɔ na wɔwɔwɔ kɔɛndɛa nana tɔɔ gɛ nga nhaa Foo Waa na i hiti ti gɔhɔndaa nhanwa.
65001007	Nɛgililɛ baa aa Sɔlɔmua i ngoo Gɔmolaa i ngoo, awa ka taa laa na nana ee ti gbɛlaa gbɛlaa na. Ningaa indiini ti eyaabele na bele pele ngɔɔ gbo ɛɛ malekaa i natiini. Ndo siandaa o, ka ndo siandaa aa kɛgɛi ngoo ndege gɛgɛi ngoo, inaile njie ngoo ndege yie ngoo, awa ka Ngebɔ i ti gbɔɔnia aa ti biindaa wɔwɔwɔ ngɔmbu naa awa ndaanhii mɛɔ nuu o nuu nhanwa bɛɛ.
65001008	Nhanda ila na nwɛ gbɔnhu aa ndakpangaa indiini. Ti gbɔha na ɔa pɛnhɛɛ nhanda lɔɔ lɔɔndaa nhu nɛɛnwaa nhu nana aa pele taa lugu na nwaa nɔgɔ aa nhanda nyɔu, ti lele ɔ aa kuunndaa Maliki na fɔha na nwa, awa kati mbɛɛmba belaa bombou mbaa i ngɛi ti mɛɛ aliyana.
65001009	Na nhu bɛɛ hali malekaa i ti nwanha na taa ui mba aa Maaikɛɛli, tonga na ti peleniɔ loganhu tii Ngafɔ mbaa na o ngu to ngɔ na Moosisia, Maaikɛɛli na siina ai ngɛi ngoo gulai ndiiya Ngafɔ mbaa na gɔhɔndaa nhanwa. Nana gbo i kɛi laɔ ɛgɛ, "Kangaa Maliki na i yɛpɛ biee nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ!"
65001010	Ningaa indiini k`ati ngɛi pii pii nana nhanwa tai nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ mba. Awa nhanda nhanda na nana ti nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ ngɔ mba ɛɛ gbo nhuaa taa nɛɛnwaa hɔlɔ nhandaa nana nuu ai ti nagɔlii la, maa nhanda nhanda na nwɛ ɔɔ ti nyaai.
65001011	Maa lua ɔ na siina ti nhanwa! Too hitɛ Keeni ɔgɔbo na nhu. Awa nahoo lɔgɔ fanwa, too gbɔha na bua aa kaka pele na nana Beelamu ee nhu. Too kɔɔ lo pelenga ɛɛ Kola i kɔɔ lo peleni, awa too nyaai hɔlɔa ɛɛ Kola i nyaai hɔlɔi.
65001012	Kina ningaa indiini ti ufe maa baa mba ɔɔ, ti bele ngɔɔ ɛɛ tɛi tɛi ngaa gɛ wu hounwayaa nwɛnhɛi na nhu nana waa mɛ ngɔ na bele wu aa lɔgɔ na nhu. Ningaa nwɛ natiini ti gbɔha sago nhu gbo kpɛti. Ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ nja gbii nana hɛfɛ ngaa kpɛ nga, awa ti bele ngɔ gbɔnhu ɛɛ ngulu ulu nana ai wa kɛlɛ hiti ɔ nhu aa wa, ngulu ulu nana ti puukua ngɔ nana i haaa.
65001013	Ningaa indiini ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ nja yii kpaai gbaai, awa ti eyaabele na pele ngɔ ɛɛ pue. Ti bele ngɔ ɛɛ tee tee nhu leelegaa, awa Ngebɔ oo nhinde nwakɛa ti nhanwa mɛɛna naa gbindi ɔ lee ngɔ kpindia bɛɛ, awa naa nwɛɛ tɔɔ gɛ na nhaa guna bɛɛ.
65001014	Inɔki, nana ndenjaa beke na kualaa Alama le paalaa ala le hiti ɔ na ngɔfɛla na nhu, ala nwɛɔ i ngoolee na gɛi nana aa gua Ngebɔ le, ɛgɛ, "Kpeendɛ! Maliki na oo ba tii ngi nwalekaa wuulua gbinhi gbinhia o
65001015	paalaa nhanwa aa kɔhɔ ningaa nwa bɛɛ, kangaa ti ningaa i nyaai ngebɔyaa gbaha mba na nhanwa ti peleni, awa ka njia nyɔu nyɔu na nana nhanda nyɔu belaa i tee kɛɛ gɛɛ aa ala!"
65001016	Ningaa indiini k`ati gɔɔ nhu yia aa lɔgɔ bɛɛ awa k`ati ningaa lagbitia lɛɛgɛ lɛɛgɛ, ti hitɛ ti ɔi nyɔu nyɔu na bou nwa, k`ati yonga lee lee gbɔha nhanwa, awa k`ati ningaa lagbitia bihɛ bihɛ kangaa ti nhai hɔlɔ ti eya.
65001017	Kɛlɛ wua nya lomayaa belaa i ngaa wuee, a nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa njia na nwa nana mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi lo mbelaa i ti nhumbuiɔ aa kɛ.
65001018	Kati gɛa wu nwa, "Gbele mba hoo na aa hiti ma, ningaa tɔɔ baa natiini tɔɔ ngɛɛ ngɛɛ nhɛɛ wuaa, napangaa ningaa i natiini taa hitɛ gbo ti eebɔyaa nyɔu nyɔu na bou nwa nana ngebɔyaa gbaha mba ɔ."
65001019	Ningaa indiini bonda tua nwɛ taa pele ndoganhu bai bai aa ɔa ningaa loganhu. Ngelou i nhu nhanda lɔ maa nɛgili i ti goo nhu awa Ngebɔ Yina na ai ti nhu.
65001020	Kɛlɛ wua nya lomayaa belaa i ngaa wuee, a engea aa ngebɔyaa nagɔli kangaa wu gbɔha na nhu gbɛndɛ. A laaminɛa Ngebɔ Yina na fɔha na nhu,
65001021	awa kawɔɔ gbɔha na nwakɛ Ngebɔ lomayaa na nhu nhuna waa gɛ aa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na nwaa golondaa nana Maliki na ɔɔ ngɔa wu eya kualaa ngi nwaaumayaa na nhu nana i ngeya wu nhanwa.
65001022	A ndii gbɛndɛ fea natiini mbɛ ti nɛɛnwaa gɔhɔ ngɔ na ti laanɛɛ na nhu.
65001023	A lagbitia nwaa gbɛa aa ti guandaa ngɔmbua, awa wu maaumayaa gbau gbɔnhu lagbitia nwa kɛlɛ wu pele ndua nhu, awa wu lolo aa ti lonwa kɔha gɔha na bɛnhɛ nana maa nɔgɔ ɔ aa ti ɔi nyɔu nyɔu na.
65001024	Chaanngi nhu nuu na le nana ku ngɔ wuu kangaa awɛɛ gula, awa ala ku ngɔ na boma aa pele wu lo ngi bɛɛyaa na gulɔɔ aa koonhu nɛɛ tɛɛgɛ ai wu nwa,
65001025	Ngebɔ ila ngɔ na le nana mi Lendouyaa He Mɔɔ na aa ala, aa mi Nwaliki na Yisɔsi Kilaisi nhu bele, mbɛɛ i gɛa ala nwa, mbɛɛ bombou mbaa o, lamanhuyaa o, ka fɔha, gbɛnhaile ala bo mɛɛ kualaa tɔɔlomaa na o, chaanngi nhu o, nhaa guna bɛɛ! Kangaa i bele.
66001001	Kɔɔ indinɛi nhu nwɛɛ gulɔɔ lɔgɔɔu nhanda nhanda na gbaali gbaali ngɔ na. Ngebɔ kɛɛ gulɔɔ lɔɔgɔɔu nhanda indinɛi ɔaa ala eya kangaa i ndɔgɔɔu ngaa ngi eyaalakpangaa i nana nhanwa i baa bele pele. Awae ka Yisɔsi Kilaisi i ngi nwaleka longa kangaa i li i ndɔgɔɔu ngaa ngi eyaalakpandou na Yɔni,
66001002	awa ka Yɔni i nana nwaa seeliyaa hea bɛɛ i naa lɔi ala nɛɛnwaa na nhu, napangaa nana Ngebɔ i kɛi o ka nana Yisɔsi Kilaisi i ndɔgɔɔuni aa ala. Awa kɛɛ nana gɛa bɛɛ i naa lɔi.
66001003	Ngebɔ ɔɔ nuu na lubaa nana aa ngi oolee ngindinɛi gala, awa Ngebɔ ɔɔ ningaa i ndubaa natiini taa oo nhɛɛ ngoo indinɛi nwa kɔɔ indinɛi nhu awa k`ati nwaa bɛɛ nanau kpaali ngɔ na nhu! Gbaa lɔgɔ na oo gbɛɛa mi gbɛlaa nhuna nhanda indinɛi bɛɛ ɔɔ bele nda.
66001004	Nya Yɔni aa nge ngi fama leeni laanɛɛ belaa u ngi ɔfɛla naɛ wu mɛɛ Eesia bɔlɔgɔɔ na gaka gakanwaa na. Kangaa Ngebɔ i wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa o ka maa lɛi, napangaa Ngebɔ nana i na chaanngi nhu, i naɔ pɛnhɛɛ, awa ɔɔ ba. Kangaa ngi yinaa ɔfɛlangaa i natiini ti loni ngi nwanhayaa na gulɔɔ ti wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa o ka maa lɛi.
66001005	Awa kangaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi o gbɔnhu i wu gɔ aa panda bandayaa o ka maa lɛi, napangaa Yisɔsi Kilaisi nana ala hiti ɔ nhu laanɛɛlaa nhanwa aa ala, pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na nana i huui kualaa haa nhu, awa nana gbɔnhu manha na aa ala ngelou i nhu nwanhangaa waa waa i fanwa. Ala lo ngɔ aa muee awa oo nhanda baanga muaa kualaa mi nhanda nyɔu na nhu aa ngi haa na
66001006	awa oo mi belenga aa chaaga gua mbelaa ngi nwanhayaa na la, kangaa mi enge ngi Eebɔ naɛ nana ngi Kɛɛgɛ na aa ala. Kangaa mbɛɛ gɛ Yisɔsi Kilaisia ka fɔha nhaa guna bɛɛ. Kangaa i bele.
66001007	A kpeendɛ, alaa ba feenaa na nhu! Nuu o nuu ɔɔ ala lɔa, awa nhaa bɛnhɛ natiini tee ndekpa biilɛ alaa tɔɔ ala lɔa gbɔnhu. Ningaa i bɛɛ ti pɔlɔgɔɔ gbɔha i nhu tɔɔ ɔɔa ala baalaa na nhanwa. Ngemɛɛ ɔɔ bele. Kangaa i bele!
66001008	Maliki na Ngebɔ waa ɛgɛ, "Nya nwɛ pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na aa nge ka gbelemba nwɔɔ na," nana i na chaanngi, nana ee naɔ, awa nana paalaa i na.
66001009	Nya nwɛ Yɔni aa nge, wu ndege laanɛɛ nwɔɔ na aa nge, nana ala hou ɔ na nwa aa Yisɔsi Kilaisi ɛɛ wua gbo. Faa nwɛɛe nya lo ngɔ nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ njɔgɔlɔ na nhu aa ndii lo tii wua o, awa ngɔɔ gɛa na ngilamaaa tii wua o ngi nwanhayaa na la. Lɔgɔ ila ma kati nya aa gbotoa awa kati ya aa nge pɔlɔgɔɔ nwa nana nja ee mbeembee ngɔɔ taa ui naa aa Patimɔsi, gbɛnhaile ngoo Ngebɔ oo na gɛa ka tɔmbaga na nana Yisɔsi i ndɔgɔɔuni aa nge.
66001010	Nhuna ngee na, Lɔgɔwaa na nwa, ka Ngebɔ Yina na i baa i siaa aa nge, awa kangi yɔkpɔu waa oo nwɛinga aa nya bou bele nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ fueu ngoo gɛnhi,
66001011	"Nana gbaalia bi naa lɔi, awa bi maa gɔɔ na lee tee laanɛɛ belaa u ngi ɔfɛla na nwanhu ti taa waa waa ɔfɛla ngindinɛi nhu. Mɛɛ Ɛfisɔsi o, Simaina o, Pagamɔmu o, Taiataila o, Salisi o, Filalɛlifia o, ka Laolisia."
66001012	Nhu nwɛɛ ngi boteni nuu na lɔndaa nhanwa nana ee yɛpɛ, awa kangi mbii ngɔfɛla tɔa nana kpatɛ ngɔɔ aa mabɔɔn sɔuntaa lo tondaa ma nhanwa,
66001013	awa mbii na liiya, kangi nhai lɔa na nana pele ngɔɔ ɛɛ nuu gbɔha, nana ee ndonwa kɔha bu ngɔ nwaɔ hitɛ ngɔ sila, awa i mabɔɔn tɛbɛi ili ngɔ gili nhu.
66001014	Ngu na ee ngumbaa na kue ɔɔ ɛɛ mbaala gbee, kue ɔɔ chɛhɛ chɛhɛ, awa ngau na ee huonaa nhu ɛɛ ngɔmbu.
66001015	K`a ala gbala na i huo yain ɛɛ kɛɛmu nana ti nguni ngɔmbua awa ti maa giihɛ nhaa i huo yain, awa ala oo na bele ngɔ ɛɛ nja aa gɛ aa suulindaa.
66001016	Awa teelega ɔfɛla mɛɛ ee houi ala ɛha loko na eya, awa ngaa fee saasigɔ i ɔai ndaa na nana ngaa lii ɔ. K`a ngaunwaa na i huo yain ɛɛ foo aa gbandɛ aa fooliiliiya.
66001017	Nhuna ngi ala lɔi, kangi gulaa ngɔgɔu, awa kangi belenga ɛɛ haa nwɔɔ. Kɛlɛ kɛɛ ɛha loko na bɛɛa nyaa awa kɛɛ gɛa, "Bɛɛ lua! Nya nwɛ pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na aa nge ka gbelemba nwɔɔ na.
66001018	Nya nwɛ kɛndɛ nwɔɔ na aa nge! Kangi haaa kɛlɛ chaanngi nhu nya gɛndɛ ɔ nhaa guna bɛɛ. Fɔha lɔ nyaa haa na nwanhu o ka haaɔfɔ nhu.
66001019	Chaanngi nhu nana gbaalia baa naa lɔ. Nana gbaalia ɔɔ bele pele chaanngi nhu o, ka nana pelendaa ɔɔ gɛ na gulɔɔ.
66001020	Indinɛi gbundu nhunhaa na nwɛ teelega ɔfɛla na nhanwa nana baa tɔ i houi nya ɛha loko na eya, awa ka mbii ngɔfɛla na nana kpatɛ ngɔ na aa mabɔɔn sɔuntaa londaa ma nhanwa. Teelega ɔfɛla na malekaa i mɛ laanɛɛ belaa u ngɔfɛlangaa i fanwa, awa mbii ngɔfɛla na laanɛɛ belaa u ngi ɔfɛla na nwɛ.
66002001	"Indinɛi gbaalia maleka na le nana i laanɛɛ belaa i manhu mɛɛ Ɛfisɔsi. 'Indinɛi ngoo na nwɛ nana i guai nuu na le nana teelega ɔfɛla na i houi ala ɛha loko na eya, awa alɛɛ gbɔnhu ee sia mbii ngɔfɛla na liiya nana kpatɛ ngɔɔ aa mabɔɔn, sɔuntaa londaa ma nhanwa.
66002002	Ngi wu sɔbɛ na hou ngɔ na gɔɔnaa wu houa ngenge naa nana nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ, awa wu gee lii loni. Awa ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wai mbɛ nhu wui ningaa nyɔu nyɔua o, awa woo natiini nhuanga taa gɛ to mbelaa nwɛ aa tuee kɛlɛ to mbelaa aile aa tuee, awa woo gua ti nwa aa ndɛɛ gɔɔla mbelaa.
66002003	Wu lii lo ngɔ, woo yɔgɔlɔ nya lɔgɔ fanwa, awa wai lɛ gbahai.
66002004	Kɛlɛ indinɛi nwɛ kpaai ɔ nyaa wu nhanwa. Wai loni aa nge chaanngi nhu ɛɛ wu lo ngɔ naɔ aa nge pɛnhɛɛ.
66002005	Faa nwɛɛe a nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa kualaa mɛɛ wu gulaa naɔ! A botena kualaa wu nhanda nyɔu na nhu awa wu nana bele pele wee pele ngɔɔ pɛnhɛɛ. Kɛlɛ ina wai bɛni, ngɔɔ baa wuee ngi wu bii na gbau ngi lomaa na.
66002006	Kɛlɛ indinɛi waa pele nhanda gbekpe mɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa wu lolo ɔ aa nana Nikolasi bou belaa i taa pele. Nya goonhu nɛɛ ɔ fanwa, gbaa nya gbɔha na kpei nya lolo ɔ la.
66002007	'Nuu na nana ngou mba, i oo nhɛɛna nana nwa Yina na aa kɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i! 'Nuu na nana aa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu nhaa i kunjaa hɔlɔ, ngɔɔ fɛɛlɛ hea alɛɛ kangaa i nguluwa na nwɛ nana aa wa ngulu naa nana aa ndɛɛhu he ningaaɛ, nana nhii ngɔ mɛɛ Ngebɔ gbangba na nhu.'
66002008	"Indinɛi gbaalia maleka na le nana i laanɛɛ belaa i manhu mɛɛ Simaina. 'Indinɛi ngoo na nwɛ nana i segei nuu na le nana pɛnhɛɛ mɔɔ na aa ala ka gbelemba nwɔɔ na, nana i haai awa kɛɛ huua gbɔnhu kualaa haa na nhu.
66002009	Ngi kpɔu gbɔu na gɔɔnaa wu nhu. Ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wu baa ngɔ, kɛlɛ bɛnhɛ wu gbatɛ ɔ! Ngi njafa na gɔɔnaa natiini taa pele ngaa wuee ti gɛi Yuua nwɛ aa tuee kɛlɛ Yuua aile pa aa tuee. Setani bou belaa nwɛ aa tuee!
66002010	Awɛɛ lua gbɛ o gbɛa nana wu baa maa yɔgɔlɔ bele. A oo nhɛɛna! Ngafɔ mbaa na oo baa wu lɛingaa bii kpindi bɛlɛu mɛɛna ɔɔ wu nhua na. Awa wɔɔ gɛa kpɔu gbɔu nhu mi guu puu fanwa. Kɛlɛ a gɛa laanɛɛ nhu aa nge, hali bɛnhɛ wu haa fanwa, ngɔɔ togbo biinaa wu nwa napangaa wɔwɔwɔ ndɛɛhu na.
66002011	'Nuu na nana ngou mba, i oo nhɛɛna nana nwa Yina na aa kɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i. 'Nuu na nana aa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu nhaa i kunjaa hɔlɔ, haa na fee na aigɔ gbɛ o gbɛ bele ngaa ala.'
66002012	"Indinɛi gbaalia maleka na le nana i laanɛɛ belaa i manhu mɛɛ Pagamɔmu laa waa na nhu. 'Indinɛi ngoo na nwɛ nana i segei nuu na le nana ngaa fee saasigɔ na ee ɔai ala laa na nana ngaa lii ɔ.
66002013	Ngi wu heinwaa na gɔɔnaa, wuaa heii mɛɛ Setani nwanhayaa na i na ngeya. Ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wai nwaagaii nya nwa, awa wu laanɛɛ ɔ aa nge, hali bɛnhɛ aa yamana na ti Antipasi baai laɔ nana ala laanɛɛ ɔ naɔ aa nge hiti ɔ nhu, awa kɛɛ seeliyaa hea nya nhanwa. Kati ala baaa wu liiya mɛɛ Setani i na.
66002014	Kɛlɛ nhanda chokole tɔ na nana kpaai ɔ nyaa wu nhanwa. Ningaa lɛingaa lɔ na mɛɛ wu liiya ti hitɛ ɔ nagɔli na bou nwa nana Beelamu aa pele ngaa ningaa i, nana i Belaki nagɔlii aa pele na nana ɔɔ sia la aa Iisilɛlia i nhaa ti ɔa nhanda nyɔu nhu, aa ti gɔɔbindaa nhanwa aa mɛnhɛi nwɛndaa nana ti kuaa aa chaaga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le, awa kɛɛ pelenga boma ti ndo siaa.
66002015	Aa pele ngɔ ila na siina, ningaa lɛingaa lɔ wu nhu natiini ti hitɛ ɔ nagɔli na bou nwa nana Nikolasi bou belaa i taa pele ngaa ningaa i.
66002016	Faa nwɛɛe a botena kualaa wu nhanda nyɔu na nhu. Ina wai bɛni, ngɔɔ baa wuee guui nhu ngi gɔ aa maa belaa i siina aa saasigɔ na nana i houi nya laa na.
66002017	'Nuu na nana ngou mba, i oo nhɛɛna nana nwa Yina na kɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i! 'Nuu na nana aa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu nhaa i kunjaa hɔlɔ, ngɔɔ mɛnhɛi ɔaa ngeya nana taa ui mba aa mana, nana Ngebɔ i makɛ ngɔ aliyana. Awa ngɔɔ kɔtu guegue ɔaa ngeya nana ndaa nyiɛ gbaali ngɔ ma nana nuu ai kɔɔ, k`a nuu na gbo nana aa hɔlɔ.'
66002018	"Indinɛi gbaalia maleka na le nana i laanɛɛ belaa i manhu mɛɛ Taiataila. 'Indinɛi ngoo na nwɛ nana i segei Ngebɔ Lou na le, nana ngau na ee huo nhu ɛɛ ngɔmbu, nana kpala na ee huo yain ɛɛ kɛɛmu nana ti nguni ngɔmbua awa ti maa giihɛ nhaa i huo yain.
66002019	Ngi wu enge na gɔɔ kɔɔnaa, wu lomayaa na, wu laanɛɛ na, wu enge na waa pele nya nhanwa, awa ka wu lii lonjaa na. Ngi nhu kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa wua waa maa nhanda indinɛi bele pele chaanngi nhu tee ngɔ bɛnhɛ pɛnhɛɛ naaɔ.
66002020	Kɛlɛ indinɛi nwɛ kpaai ɔ nyaa wu nhanwa. Ala nwɛ aa kɛɛlaa, k`awu fɛɛlɛ he njie nanaɛ Yɛsibɛli nana aa ui gbɔha naa aa Ngebɔ letu. Kɛɛ nya eyaalakpangaa i pu aa kaka pele aa ngi nagɔli na aa pele ngaa ningaa i kangaa ti ɔa ndo siandaa nhu o, ka mɛnhɛi nwɛndaa o nana ti kuaa aa chaaga ndɛɛ lɛɛ eebɔa le.
66002021	Kangi lɔgɔ ɔaa ngeya kangaa i bote kualaa ngi nhanda nyɔu na nhu, kɛlɛ ngɔi ai alaa kangaa i loko gua ngi lo na siandaa nhu.
66002022	Awae ngɔɔ pelenaa i la aa hegbɛ, awa natiini taa ndo sia aa ala, ngɔɔ pelenaa ti gɛ njɔgɔlɔ bombou mbaa nhu. Ina gbo tai bɛni aa ngeyaabele nyɔu na nana taa pele ngaa ala, ngɔɔ nana belenaa aa tuee ngi kɛa.
66002023	Ngɔɔ ala bou belaa i paaa boma bɛɛ, awa nhu nwɛɛ laanɛɛ belaa i bɛɛ tɔɔ kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nya nwɛ aa nuu na nana i ningaa nɛɛnwaa nhaa gɔɔ awa ngi nana gɔɔ ngɔ boma i ti lii na nwa. Ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ wu liiya ngɔɔ ala baabaaa aa ngi enge na bele ngɔ na.
66002024	'Kɛlɛ wu bɛpɛ na bɛɛ wu mɛɛ Taiataila laa waa na nhu, wai hitɛi nagɔli nyɔu nyɔu indinɛi bou nwa, wai nana nagɔlii lagbitia taa ui mba aa "Setani gbundu nhanda na." Wua na siina ngaigɔ kooti la gbɔnhu wu umbaa.
66002025	Kɛlɛ nana i wu eya a houa a loko hee ngɔ pandaa nhaa ngi ba.
66002026	-
66002027	Awa nuu na nana aa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu nhaa i kunjaa hɔlɔ, awa i nana bele kpala ngi nyaa nhaa kpelenwaa na, ngɔɔ fɔha ila na ɔaa ngeya nana ngi hɔlɔi kualaa nya Kɛɛgɛ na eya. Ngɔɔ fɔha ɔaa ngeya nde kɛbɛlɛ na nwanhu. Ɔɔ gɛa ti nwanhu aa kɔu likpɔ, awa ɔɔ ti nhu aai aaia ɛɛ pɔlɔhɛɛ.
66002028	Awa ngɔɔ teelega ɔaa ti eya nana aa huo ngaa ngeenhu.
66002029	'Nuu na nana ngou mba, i oo nhɛɛna nana nwa Yina na aa kɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i.'
66003001	"Indinɛi gbaalia maleka na le nana i laanɛɛ belaa i manhu mɛɛ Salisi. 'Indinɛi ngoo na nwɛ nana i segei nuu na le nana Ngebɔ Yinaa ɔfɛlangaa i ti ngeya ka teelega ɔfɛla na. Ngi nana gɔɔnaa waa pele. Ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa ndaa lɔ wuaa aa kɛɛlaa wu gɛndɛ ɔ, kɛlɛ wai gɛndɛi. Wu haa ɔ!
66003002	Kɛlɛ a una, wu ndɛɛhu gɛlɛ na nhu gbɛndɛ nana i loa wu nhu kangaa wai ba haa fɛ. Gbaa ngoo gua ma aa kɛɛlaa nana wu pelenga ai lɛ hitii nhu nya Eebɔ na gulɔɔ.
66003003	Faa nwɛɛe a nɛɛnwaa bɛɛlaa nana nwa ti wu nagɔlii la ka nana wu mɛini. A nwaa bɛɛa mbu awa wu bote kualaa wu nhanda nyɔu na nhu. Ina wai uni, ngɔɔ baa wu nwa ɛɛ nwɔa nwɔɔ, awa waigɔ lɔgɔ na gɔɔ bɛnhɛ ngɔɔ ba ma.
66003004	Kɛlɛ wu lɛingaa lɔ na lɛ tuun mɛɛ Salisi ti ti lonwa na nwakɛa chanhai ngɔ. Wua na siina mɔɔ siaa ngilamaa, mi nwaa ili ngɔ aa kɔla gue, gbɛnhaile wu hiti ɔ nhu aa pelendaa.
66003005	Nuu na nana aa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu nhaa i kunjaa hɔlɔ, ɔɔ nwaa ilia aa kɔla gue, awa ngaigɔ ngi laa na aa sibi kɔɔ na nhu mɛɛ kɛndɛ belaa i ti laa na gbaali ngɔ na. Awa ngɔɔ kɛa kpou nya Kɛɛgɛ na au bele nhu o ka ngi nwalekaa i aa kɛɛlaa nya nda nwɛ aa ala.
66003006	'Nuu na nana ngou mba, i oo nhɛɛna nana nwa Yina na aa kɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i!
66003007	"Indinɛi gbaalia maleka na le nana i laanɛɛ belaa i manhu mɛɛ Filalɛlifia. 'Indinɛi ngoo na nwɛ i segei nuu na le nana i baa kualaa Ngebɔ le awa ala lɔmbaga ɔ gbɔnhu. Saaba na lɔ ngeya nana ee Leebili eyaɔ pɛnhɛɛ, awa nhuna aa ko na laau, nuu ai kpɔlu. Awa nhuna aa kpɔlu, nuu ai ndaau.
66003008	Ngi nana gɔɔnaa waa pele. Ngi kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa fɔha na i wu eya kolo. Woo hitɛ nya nagɔli na bou nwa ngaa pele ngaa ningaa i awa wuaa laanɛɛyaa nhu aa nge. Ngoo ko ndaaunga wu gulɔɔ nana nuu ai ku aa kpɔlu.
66003009	A oo nhɛɛndɛ! Ningaa i natiini Setani bou belaa i ngaa tuee, awa ka ndɛɛ gɔɔla mbelaa i natiini taa gbɔha na bele ngaa Yuua kɛlɛ tai beleni la, ngɔɔ pelenaa ti ba ti ombi hitɛ wuɛɛ. Tua bɛɛ tɔɔ kɔɔnaa aa kɛɛlaa nya lo ngɔ aa wuee.
66003010	Kina kawu nwaa bɛɛa nya oo nau ngi kɛi aa kɛɛlaa wu lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ aa ndiilo, faa nwɛɛ nya gbɔnhu ngɔɔ wu belenaa aa ndendengaa kualaa kpɔu gbɔu yamana na eya nana ɔɔ ba ngelou i nwa kangaa i ningaa i nhua bɛɛ ti pɔlɔgɔɔ i nwa.
66003011	Nya ngaa ba guui nhu. A nana houa i wu eya aa loko hee ngɔ, kangaae nuu ai ba wu logbo na gua wu eya nana hɔlɔndaa i wu eya.
66003012	Nuu na nana aa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu nhaa i kunjaa hɔlɔ, ngɔɔ ala belenaa aa nyɔkɛ nya Eebɔ Bɛlɛ nau, awa naa nwɛɛ ɔɔ gɛ na nhaa guna bɛɛ. Ngɔɔ nya Eebɔ na laa na gbaalia maa nwɔɔ na labaa na, ka nya Eebɔ na laa waa na laa na, nana taa ui mba aa "Yɛlusalɛmu Nyiɛ" nana ɔɔ yei mbu kualaa nya Eebɔ na le aliyana. Awa ngɔɔ nya nda laa nyiɛ na gbaalia na gbɔnhu.
66003013	'Nuu na nana ngou mba, i oo nhɛɛna nana nwa Yina na aa kɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i!'
66003014	"Indinɛi gbaalia maleka na le nana i laanɛɛ belaa i manhu mɛɛ Laolisa. 'Indinɛi ngoo na nwɛ nana i segei nuu na le nana taa ui mba aa "Kangaa i bele," laanɛɛyaa nwɔɔ na aa ala, awa tɔmbaga seeli na aa ala, nana tɔɔlo na aa ala gbɛ o gbɛ na nhanwa nana Ngebɔ i Kpatɛi.
66003015	Ngi ngenge na gɔɔnaa wu pelenga. Wu lii na ngaa fee fee wu goo nhu. I ba nya goonhu nɛɛa ina wu lii na aa gɛ ila ila, hali nha wu lolo ɔ aa nge.
66003016	Kɛlɛ kina wu lii na ngaa fee fee, ngɔɔ yaaiyaai biinaa aa wuee!
66003017	Gbaa k`awu kɛ aa kɛɛlaa nhaimbɛ belaa nwɛ aa wuee awa wu gbatɛ ɔ. Gbɛ o gbɛ na ngaa ku ngɔ wu eya. Kɛlɛ nya ngi kɛ aa kɛɛlaa wai nhu kɔɔ ngaa kɛɛlaa nhai ai wu eya hali awa wu nwaa nwɔu ɔ! Wu baa ngɔ, fɛli lɔ wu nwa, awa wu liti ɔ.
66003018	Faa nwɛɛe ngi nɛɛnwaa he wuɛɛ aa kɛɛlaa kawaa mabɔɔn ngeya nya nwa nana ti kpatɛi ngɔmbua awa ka ngɔmbu na i pelenga kɛɛ chanhainga, kangaa wu ba bele ngaa kpatɛ belaa. Awa kawaa kɔla gue ngeya nya nwa nana waa nwaa ili la, kangaa wu wu ufemaa gbibi la. Awa kawaa ngau gbaai haahaai eya nya nwa wu hitɛ hitɛ wu au na nwa, kangaa wu ba nhanda lɔ.
66003019	Ngaa yɛpɛa nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ nya lomayaa belaa i ngee awa ngaa ti gbɔɔnia. Faa nwɛɛe a nwanhu gbeena, awa wu bote kualaa wu nhanda nyɔu na nhu.
66003020	A oo nhɛɛndɛ! Nyaa loni pɛlɛ na la ngaa ko na lugba lugba. Ina nuu aa nya oo nwɛi awa i ko na laau, ngɔɔ ɔaa ngi bɛlɛ nau, nya o ala o ni hei ni mɛnhɛi nwɛ ngilamaa.
66003021	Nuu na nana aa lo nhu gbɛndɛ ngɔ ngi laanɛɛ na nhu nhaa i kunjaa hɔlɔ, ngɔɔ fɛɛlɛ hea alɛɛ heilaa nhanwa nya gaka nya nwanhayaa gbakaa na nhu, ɛɛ gbo nya ngi kunjaa hɔlɔi, awa chaanngi nhu nyaa heii nya Kɛɛgɛ na gaka ngi Nwanhayaa gbakaa na nhu.
66003022	'Nuu na nana ngou mba, i oo nhɛɛna nana nwa Yina na aa kɛ aa laanɛɛ belaa i!' "
66004001	Nhanda indinɛi i lee teeni nga, kangi nhanda lagbiti lɔa nya nɛɛnwaa na nhu. Kangi ko tɔa ndaau ngɔɔ mɛɛ aliyana. Awa kangi nuu oo nwɛinga nana ngoo na bele ngɔ ɛɛ fueu nana ngi ngoo nwɛingaɔ pɛnhɛɛ ngɔhanwaa ee yɛpɛ nya le. I gɛi nya nwa, "Lɛa bei, awa ngɔɔ nana lɔgɔɔunaa aa biee ɔɔ bele indinɛi bou nwa."
66004002	Awa nhu gutu ɔ na siina ka Ngebɔ Yina na i siaa aa nge. Awa kangi manhayaa gbakaa tɔa na mɛɛ aliyana nana nuu ee nhu heii.
66004003	Awa nuu na nana ee nhu heii ngaunwaa na guague ngɔ aa kɔtu nwaa nhii nhiɛ nana taa ui mba aa yasipa o ka kaniiliani, awa ngeelia ngee naanɔɔ nana ee manhayaa gbakaa na beembee ngɔ nana pele ngɔɔ ɛɛ kɔtu nwaa nhii nhiɛ nana ndugu na bele ngɔ ɛɛ ndaga undu.
66004004	Awa manhayaa gaamba na nhu, manhayaa gbakaa lagbiti buu buu fee i manhu naai ngee naanɔɔ. Awa mbaa waangaa buu buu fee tee manhu naai tuɛɛ tee nhu naɔ hei heii, ti nwaa ili ngɔɔ aa kɔla gue, awa niɔu ngi bɛɛ bɛɛi ti umbaa nana kpatɛ gbatɛ ngɔɔ aa mabɔɔn.
66004005	K`a mi nwaa gɛ mia kulaa manhayaa gbakaa na le, awa k`a ngee i gbandɛ gbandɛ na. Awa sɔuntaa ɔfɛla ngee naanɔɔ hei heii manhayaa gbakaa na gulɔɔ nana ee hou, awa Ngebɔ Yinaa ɔfɛlangaa i mɛɔ.
66004006	Awa manhayaa gbakaa na gulɔɔ gbɔnhu, nhai ee naanɔɔ nana pele ngɔ ɛɛ nja, nana ngaa lo ngɔɔ toke ɛɛ mɛɛmunɛ. Awa manhayaa gaamba na nhu, kundɔ naai mɛɛ ee na. Awa kɛndɛ lonhaia naaingaa nwɛɔ tee na lotoni kundɔ na siina nhu. Kɛndɛ lonhaia i siina ti au na i ti beembee ngɔɔ nhaa i ti laa kula ngɔ nhu.
66004007	Pɛnhɛɛ kee na pele ngɔ ɛɛ yala. Fee na pele ngɔ ɛɛ tuula. Chawa na ngaunwaa na guague ngɔ aa nuu gbɔha aunwaa. Awa naai na pele ngɔ ɛɛ sebe aa gɛ aa piilɛlaa.
66004008	Awa kɛndɛ lonhaia i siina, ngigbɛ o ngigbɛ kobo na mba ɔhita, awa ngau lee lee, awa aa foo ka kpɔkɔ tai gbele aa ngue aaindaa gɛnhi, "Maliki na nana Lamanhu Eebɔ na aa ala, kahe mba ɔ, kahe mba ɔ, kahe mba ɔ, nana i naɔ, ina chaanngi nhu, awa nana paalaa na i na."
66004009	Awa nuu na nana i heii manhayaa gbakaa na nhu, nana i kɛndɛyaa nhu nhaa guna bɛɛ, gbee na bɛɛ kɛndɛ lonhaia i taa gɛ aa ala bihɛ bihɛndaa o, mbɛɛ gɛndaa mba o, ka fiɛ guandaa ma o,
66004010	k`a mbaa waangaa buu buu feengaa i ti manhu naai na taa gula nuu na ɔgɔu nana i heii manhayaa gbakaa na nhu ti ala batou nana i kɛndɛyaa nhu nhaa guna bɛɛ. Ti ti niɔu na guu gua umbaa, ti kula gula manhayaa gbakaa na gulɔɔ, awa ti ngue aai gɛnhi,
